chinese: 今天，已停止种痘，也不再有天花病例的报告。
english: Today, smallpox vaccination has been discontinued, and no more cases of smallpox are reported.

english: Nerve impulses are not necessary to maintain the heart beat.

english: Normally, dilation of the heart produces a stronger beat, so at some stage of dilation the beat usually becomes strong enough to restore the balance of circulation (called "compensation").

english: Digitalis is useful in minimizing decompensation because it increases the strength of the heart beat and therefore the cardiac output.

chinese: 我们今天甚为珍视的科学基础会成为通往明天的跳板，而明天正是我们大多数第20版《希氏内科学》的读者大显身手之时。
english: The scientific infrastructure that we appreciate today is the springboard for the future in which most of the readers of Cecil Textbook of Medicine, 20th edition, will practice.

chinese: 我们今天正以更快的速度经历着这些个“黄金时代”：不到60年前的抗生素的发现，过去30年中对免疫在分子水平上的阐释，以及目前的遗传学，不仅是在分子水平上对其进行了解，而且掌握了利用其为人类直接造福的技能。
english: We now experience these “golden ages” in more rapid order: the discovery of antibiotics less than 60 years ago; an understanding of immunology in molecular terms within the last 30 years; and now in genetics, not just knowledge at the molecular level but understanding how to manipulate genes for the immediate benefit of mankind.

chinese: 从病人和简单的归纳法开始，到今天的单个分子和基本生物化学的过程，是一种获取科学知识的模式。这种模式不应对人类生存环境的其它有益者构成诋毁。
english: This pattern of attaining scientific knowledge, beginning with a sick patient and moving in a reductionist process to individual molecules and fundamental biochemical processes, should not be allowed to lessen our appreciation for the other contributors to the human condition.

chinese: 对佝偻病和软骨病有关的各种异常今天已有了大量的认识和描述。
english: The various disorders associated with rickets and osteomalacia that have been identified and characterized to date are numerous.

chinese: 然而，今天的分子诊断技术提高了诊断这类病人是否属于杂合子的准确率。
english: Today, however, molecular diagnostic tools have refined the ability to determine heterozygosity in this situation.

chinese: 但是今天人们生活在密集的世界里，进行无休止的阅读和案头工作。
english: But people now live in a close-up world—lots of reading and desk work.

chinese: 激发试验：在青霉素产生之前，激发方法是必不可少的，今天则已基本废弃。
english: Provocation: The provocation methods, indispensable before the penicillin era, have largely been abandoned today.

chinese: 今天，药理学和治疗学的进展加深了我们的以下认识：①人体对药物性能的处置机制，②药物对宿主生理完整性所具有的影响能力；③当多种药物同时存在于体内时，药物之间的相互作用和相互竞争影响机体或被机体所影响。
english: Today, advances in pharmacology and in therapeutics have broadened our appreciation of the ① mechanisms involved in disposition of drugs by the body, ② the inherent ability of drugs to modify the physiologic integrity of the host, and ③ the interactions between drugs when present simultaneously in the body and the competition between them for each to influence or to be influenced by the organism.

chinese: 今天，这些药物的应用和效果被看作是医学界一个新纪元的开端，它的意义不仅让我们认识到在健康和疾病中钙作用的复杂性，而且促使一些高度特异性的钙通道阻滞剂的研制和应用。
english: The application and usefulness of these drugs in medicine now should be regarded as the dawn of a new era not only in comprehension of the multiplicity of calcium actions in health and diseases but also in the introduction and application of highly specific calcium channel blocking agents.

chinese: 这些药物或者无扩张效果，或者有讨厌的副作用，如口干、视觉模糊和心跳减慢。
english: These drugs have either been ineffective as dilators or have undesirable side effects such as dryness of the mouth, blurred vision, and slowed heart beat.

chinese: 因此，本发明的一个重要目的是提供使上泌尿道平滑肌扩张和松弛而又不产生诸如口干、瞳孔扩大和心跳减慢等抗胆碱能药物副作用的方法。
english: Thus, it is an important object of the present invention to provide a method for dilating and relaxing the smooth muscles of the upper urinary tract without subjecting the patient to the undesirable side effects of anti-cholinergic drugs, for example dryness of the mouth, dilation of the pupils, and slowed heart beat.

chinese: 脑的偏下部位控制着诸如呼吸、心跳、体温、饥渴的基本活动。
english: The lower parts of the brain control basic functions such as breathing and heart rate as well as body temperature, hunger, and thirst.

chinese: 在其它的情况下，可给病人装上心肺器来保持呼吸和心跳。
english: In other cases, the patient may be placed on a heart and lung machine that maintains respiration and heartbeat.

chinese: 与受体有关的功能是：①血管扩张，②心跳加快，③支气管扩张，④正性肌力作用，⑤肠道松弛，⑥糖元分解和脂肪酸释放。
english: The functions associated with beta receptors are ① vasodilatation, ② cardioacceleration, ③ bronchial relaxation, ④ positive inotropic effect, ⑤ intestinal relaxation, and ⑥ glycogenolysis and fatty acid release.

chinese: 在正常心脏，SA结控制心跳频率，因此SA结称为心脏起搏者。
english: In a normal heart, the SA node controls the rate of heart beat and therefore is called the pacemaker of the heart.

chinese: 将电极置于心脏上的皮肤表面，或置于心脏任两侧，譬如在两臂上，并将电极与适当的记录仪器连接，就可记录到每次心跳所产生的电压。
english: By placing electrodes on the skin over the heart or on any two sides of the heart, such as on the two arms, and connecting these to an appropriate recording instrument, the electrical voltages generated during each heart beat can be recorded.

chinese: 动脉血压为脉动性，这是由于每次心跳心脏将少量血液泵入主动脉。
english: The arterial pressure is pulsatile because a small amount of blood is pumped by the heart into the aorta with each heart beat.

chinese: 然后在两次心跳之间由于血液不断流出大动脉并通过体循环，压力降至80mmHg (10.6kPa) 左右，称为舒张压。
english: Then, between heart beats, because blood continues to flow out of the large arteries and through the systemic circulation, the pressure falls to about 80mmHg (10.6kPa), which is called the diastolic pressure.

chinese: 今天正是由于CT扫描，磁共振和一些特殊的定位仪器，这项技术正成功用于对脑部肿瘤进行定位、活体组织检查及治疗。
english: Today, thanks to CT scanning, MRI, and special stereotactic instruments, the technology is being used successfully to locate, biopsy, and treat brain tumors.

chinese: 今天各种不同的激光已用于很多医学专业，如妇产科、胃肠科、耳鼻喉科、神经外科和皮肤科。
english: Today, various kinds of lasers are used in many medical specialties including gynecology, gastroenterology, otolaryngology, neurosurgery, and dermatology.

chinese: (3)今天，无论是复杂的超声扫描还是经腹壁羊膜穿刺，都能够检查出胎儿有无严重异常。
english: (3) Today, either sophisticated ultrasound scans or amniocentesis can be used to check a fetus for serious abnormalities.

chinese: 今天，对住院病人或高于70岁的非住院病人实施心肺复苏术，成功率不到10％。
english: Cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR), when performed on hospitalized patients or persons older than age 70 out of the hospital, may be successful less than 10% of the time.

chinese: 来自梅奥诊所的一项新的研究发现：食谱中补充γ-亚油酸可以抑制胰腺癌细胞的生长，并且能选择性地促进小鼠中癌细胞的死亡。研究人员表示，所补充的这种被称为GLA的脂肪酸，当和化疗药物吉西他滨联合给予患者的时候能很好地发挥作用。梅奥诊所的病理学家Ruth Lupu博士今天在2012年美国癌症研究协会年度会议上正式报告这些研究结果。Lupu博士说：“对于胰腺癌，很不幸的是目前缺乏有效的治疗药物。我们从20年前的研究结果知道一些多不饱和脂肪酸，像GLA，能普遍地对肿瘤产生一定的影响，但是我们并不知道是那种脂肪酸会起到这种作用，以及这种脂肪酸会对肿瘤影响到何种程度都不是很清楚。”
english: The dietary supplement gamma-linoleic acid can inhibit the growth of a subset of pancreatic cancer cells and selectively promote cancer cell death in mice, a Mayo Clinic study has found. The supplement, a fatty acid also known as GLA, worked particularly well when combined with the chemotherapy drug gemcitabine, the researchers say. The findings were presented today by Mayo Clinic pathologist Ruth Lupu, Ph.D., at the American Association for Cancer Research (AACR) Annual Meeting 2012. "One of the most devastating facts about pancreatic cancer is the paucity of effective drugs that exist to halt a tumor," Dr. Lupu says. "We knew from studies done about 20 years ago that polyunsaturated fatty acids such as GLA could influence cancers in general, but we didn't know which type of fatty acids and to what degree."

chinese: 性活动时，神经反射主要始于阴茎头，然后进入脊髓再返回到性器官，引起；①阴茎勃起；②阴茎旁腺分泌起润滑作用的粘液，③泄精和射精，这些都发生在性兴奋高峰——男性性高潮期。
english: During sexual activity, nerve reflexes begin mainly in the glans of the penis, pass then to the spinal cord, and then return to the sexual organs to cause ① erection of the penis, ② secretion of mucus by glands associated with the penis for the purpose of lubrication, and ③ emission and ejaculation, which occur at the height of sexual stimulation—the period of the male orgasm.

chinese: 在阴道前缘有阴蒂，其勃起与男性阴茎相似，并有一个小得多的像阴茎具有的阴茎头。
english: At the anterior margin of the vagina is the clitoris, which erects like the male penis and has a glans the same as the penis but much smaller.

english: With supratentorial hemorrhages, head and /or eye deviation toward the involved hemisphere is the rule so that the patient "is looking toward the lesion and away from the hemiparesis."

english: The motility is characteristic, consisting of three movements: a projection in the direction of the long axis, a rotation of the spiral on its long axis, and a bending or twisting from side to side.

english: Nine pigs, five male and four female, were implanted with a telemeter package to record the amplitude and frequency of the filling and emptying phase of the renal pelvis.

english: ① Hypoxia, which means low oxygen content and can be caused by (a) low partial pressure of oxygen in the air, (b) abnormalities of the lungs that diminish oxygen diffusion into the pulmonary blood, (c) decreased amounts of hemoglobin in the blood to carry oxygen to the tissues, (d) inability of the heart to pump adequate quantities of blood to the tissues, or (e) inability of the tissues to utilize the oxygen even if it should get there.

chinese: 如上述力量是纵向作用于人体，血液就将会转移到身体的一端，使所有血液要么集中于身体下部，以致没有血液回到心脏并使循环衰竭；要么迫使大量血液到头部，致使脑内和眼内血管破裂。

english: This leads to vasodilatation in all the tissues and causes the heart to pump greater quantities of blood than usual.

english: During Addison's disease, in which the adrenal glands secrete no aldosterone, the extracellular potassium ion concentration sometimes increases to more than double normal, which has a direct effect on the heart to decrease its pumping effectiveness.

english: The excess acid in the blood can lead to diabetic coma, and the excess cholesterol can lead to early development of atherosclerosis and severe heart attacks.

english: During the training process of the marathon runner, the size of the heart chambers and the heart mass both increase about 40 percent.

english: In maximal exercise, the heart pumps blood at about 90 percent of its full pumping capacity.

chinese: 因此在持久体育运动时，向肌肉释放适量氧方面，心脏泵血能力是一个比呼吸系统更为重要的限制因素。
english: Therefore, the pumping capacity of the heart is much more of a limiting factor in delivering adequate oxygen to the muscles during endurance athletics than is the respiratory system.

english: Ancillary investigations in appropriate cases include serological tests for syphilis, electrocardiography to exclude heart block, blood sugar tests to exclude hypoglycaemia, and X-rays of the muscles if there is a suspicion of cysticercosis.

chinese: 尚缺乏充分的事实作为依据来提出肯定的意见，但人们已认为苯妥英治疗与较多的先天性缺陷有关系，包括心脏异常和兔唇，据报道丙戊酸钠可引起较多的神经管缺陷。
english: There are insufficient facts upon which to base firm advice, but phenytoin treatment has been reputed to be associated with more congenital defects, including cardiac abnormalities and hare lip, and sodium valproate has been reported to cause more neural tube defects.

chinese: 缺血性梗死的四种主要原因是：主动脉颅部的粥样硬化性血栓形成，长期的低血压，来自肺静脉、心脏、主动脉弓或颈部动脉的栓子，以及血管痉挛，后者可由偏头痛、高血压脑病或蛛网膜下腔出血所致。
english: The four major causes of ischemic infarction are aortocranial atherothrombosis; prolonged hypotension; emboli from the pulmonary veins, heart, aortic arch, or arteries in the neck; and vasospasm, which can be caused by migraine, hypertensive encephalopathy, or subarachnoid hemorrhage.

chinese: 脑和心脏的缺血性梗死具有下列共同的特点：二者常为粥样硬化的结果；高血压是二者突出的危险因素；两种疾病有同时存在的倾向。
english: Ischemic infarctions of brain and heart have these common features: they both are usually the result of atherosclerosis; hypertension is the preeminent risk factor for both; and there is a tendency of the two conditions to coexist.

chinese: 然而，脑和心脏两种缺血性梗死之间也存在差异，尤其是在激发因素、病理生理学和男性患者占优势方面，后一种情况见于心肌梗死而不是脑梗死。
english: Nevertheless, there are differences, particularly in regard to triggering events, pathophysiology, and male preponderance, in MI that is not present with cerebral infarction.

english: In some cases, these events are preceded or accompanied by syncope or limb shaking TIAs, and many occur during acute cardiac events that can overshadow this serious complication.

chinese: 银泉镇，马里兰州—美国食品药品管理局今天宣布[1]，含有一种合成的孕酮（曲罗酮）的口服避孕药，可能比其他类型的孕酮类避孕药更易于引起深静脉血栓。
english: Silver Spring, MD -Oral contraceptives containing drospirenone, a synthetic progestin, may belinked to a higher risk for venous thromboembolism (VTE) than pills with othertypes of progestins, the US Food and Drug Administration (FDA) announced today[1].

chinese: OncoSec医疗公司今天宣布，改进了治疗晚期实性肿瘤的OncoSec 医疗系统电疗法，对来自欧洲81名原发和局部复发头颈部鳞癌患者进行OMS电化疗4期临床试验，结果数据分析显示电化疗效果好。该研究显示与外科标准治疗结果相比，电化疗更有利于控制局部病灶和提高生存质量。该项结果于2012年4月20日（周五）在荷兰波兹南举办的第五届欧洲头颈部肿瘤会议上被提出。
english: OncoSec Medical Inc.(OTCBB:ONCS), which is developing its advanced-stage OncoSec Medical System(OMS) ElectroOncology therapies to treat solid tumors, today announced positiveinterim analysis of data from 81 subjects in a Phase IV study of primary andlocally recurrent squamous cell carcinoma of the head and neck (HNSCC) treatedwith OMS ElectroChemotherapy in Europe. The study demonstrated the therapy'sability to provide local tumor control and quality of life outcomes thatcompare favorably to standard outcomes associated with surgery. These resultswere presented at the 5th European Conference on Head and Neck Oncology in Poznan, Polandon Friday, April 20, 2012.

chinese: 带状疱疹疫苗于2006年获得许可，但国家统计局显示，很少有人接种疫苗。免疫试验咨询委员会建议60及60岁以上老年人接种疱疹疫苗。食品药品监督管理局也建议50岁至59 岁人群接种。今天发布的此疫苗研究结果为此阶段人群及60岁以上老年人提供了重要的接种疫苗安全性的信息。
english: The herpes zoster vaccine was licensed in 2006, but few people have been vaccinated, national data shows. The ACIP recommends the vaccine for healthy people ages 60 years and older. In 2011, the U.S. Food and Drug Administration approved the use of the herpes zoster vaccine in individuals 50 to 59 years of age. The study results released today provide important safety data for people in this age group as well as adults 60 and older.

chinese: 根据医学研究所今天发表的一项报告，预防肥胖迫切需要整个美国社会行动起来。
english: Obesity prevention requires nothing less than changes throughout American society, according to a report from the Institute of Medicine (IOM) being released today .

chinese: 搏输出量是指每次心跳泵出的血量。
english: The stroke volume output is the amount of blood pumped by the heart with each beat.

chinese: 显然，如果每次心跳只有少量血液泵入动脉系统，则在每个心周期，压力将不会升降很大。
english: Obviously, if only a small quantity of blood is pumped into the arterial system with each beat, the pressure will not rise and fall greatly during each cardiac cycle.

chinese: 训练良好的运动员，其心跳往往变慢，此缓慢实际上表示高效心脏。
english: Very slow heart beats are quite often found in well-trained athletes, the slowness actually indicating efficient hearts.

chinese: 因此，在很易扩张的动脉每次心跳引起的血压升高就比无扩张性动脉要低得多。
english: Therefore, each beat of the heart causes far less pressure rise in very distensible arteries than in nondistensible arteries.

chinese: 这些冲动增加心跳频率和心收缩力，两者均倾向于升高动脉压。
english: These impulses increase the rate of heart beat and also strength of the heart contraction, both of which tend to increase the arterial pressure.

chinese: 这种检查可能伴发副作用（眩晕、恶心、皮肤过敏反应、支气管痉挛，甚至心跳骤停也曾有报道），所以这种检查只有在合格的医疗监护之下才能进行。
english: The technique may be accompanied by unwanted side- effects (vertigo, nausea, allergic skin reaction, bronchospasm and even cardiac arrest have been reported), so that it should be carried out only under proper medical supervision.

chinese: (8)现在，特殊的设备可使人在脑部功能丧失后很长时间内“活着”(也就是有心跳、呼吸)。
english: (8) Nowadays, special equipment can keep people “alive” (that is, with heartbeat and respiration continuing) long after their brains are capable of human functions.

chinese: 首先应考虑到的是恢复呼吸和心跳。
english: The primary considerations include restoration of breathing and heartbeat.

chinese: 停上E间歇不应长于l～2次心跳。
english: This routine should not be stopped for longer than a beat or two.

chinese: 今天宣布的“区域系统的护理服务示范工程”使的旨在促进更好地协调救治不同区域ST抬高心梗患者项目
english: The aim of facilitating better coordinated regional programs for STEMI patients is taking another step forward with the "Regional Systems of Care Demonstration Project," announced today .

chinese: Pharmaceuticals公司和Eisai公司今天宣布：美国食品药品监督管理局（FDA）内分泌和代谢药物咨询委员会以18票赞成，4票反对,1票弃权的结果，通过了对氯卡色林的支持建议，因为有充足而有效的数据可以证实在长期服用氯卡色林的超重及肥胖人群中，药物对其潜在的获益大于对其潜在的风险。氯卡色林是为控制体重而开发的试验性药物，其功能包括减肥作用和对减肥效果的维持作用，适用人群为至少有一种与体重相关的伴生性疾病的超重患者（体重指数大于或等于27）或肥胖患者（体重指数大于或等于30）。
english: Pharmaceuticals, Inc. and Eisai Inc. announced today that the US Food and Drug Administration (FDA) Endocrinologic and Metabolic Drugs Advisory Committee voted 18 to 4, with one abstention, that the available data demonstrate that the potential benefits of lorcaserin outweigh the potential risks when used long-term in a population of overweight and obese individuals. Lorcaserin is an investigational drug candidate intended for weight management, including weight loss and maintenance of weight loss, in patients who are obese (BMI greater than or equal to 30) or patients who are overweight (BMI greater than or equal to 27) and have at least one weight-related co-morbid condition.

chinese: 相应研究于今天（2012年5月7日）发表在国际内分泌学大会和欧洲内分泌学大会的联合会议上。瑞士波尔坦大学校医院内分泌学系临床研究人员Emanuel Christ教授说：目前手术切除胰岛癌的瓶颈在于常规成像方法很精确定位。不过，他和同事们发现胰岛癌细胞表面存在高密度的特定类型受体，可以通过放射标记药物定位这些受体。定位这些受体后，患者接受单电子发射计算机断层显像（single photon emission computed tomography，简写为SPECT，是一种2维或者3维成像技术）扫描联合计算机断层扫描（Computed Tomography，简写为CT）扫描。由于能够对肿瘤实现精确定位，该技术使研究者能够检测到结合了标记性药物所在的肿瘤细胞位置，即使在肿瘤的直径只有1厘米或者更小。
english: Presenting the findings at the joint International Congress of Endocrinology/European Congress of Endocrinology today (7 May 2012), Professor Emanuel Christ, a clinical researcher in the Department of Endocrinology at the University Hospital of Bern, Switzerland, said that at present surgical removal of insulinomas was hampered by difficulties in localising them using conventional imaging procedures. However, he and his colleagues had found that the insulinomas had high densities of a particular type of receptor on their cell surfaces that could be targeted with a radioactively labelled drug. When patients were then scanned by a 2-D/3-D imaging technique called Single Photon Emission Computed Tomography (SPECT) combined with conventional computerised tomography (CT)scan, this technique allowed the researchers to detect where the drug had bound to insulinoma cells, indicating the precise location of the tumours, even when they were as small as about one centimetre in diameter.

chinese: 心跳和(或)呼吸停止后，最严重的急症是大出血，尤其是主要动脉出血。
english: After cardiac and/or pulmonary arrest, the most critical emergency is severe bleeding (hemorrhaging), especially from a main artery.

chinese: 正常分娩，两次宫缩间的基础胎心率是l20-160次／分钟，心跳间心率变异为5次／分钟。
english: In normal labour the basal heart rate between contractions is between 120 and 160 beats per minute, with a continuous slight 'beat-to-beat' variation of the order of 5 beats per minute.

chinese: 恢复期长的减速或者心跳间变异消失可能是危险的征兆。
english: Prolonged deceleration or loss of beat-to-beat variation may be sinister signs.

chinese: 如用超声仪在两个不同部位或方向探测到胎心跳动，双胎的诊断几乎可以肯定。
english: If heart movements are detected with the ultrasound apparatus in two separate areas or directions the diagnosis of twins is almost certain.

chinese: 患儿出现心动过缓，接着呼吸心跳停止，复苏无效。
english: The patient developed bradycardia and then had cardiorespiratory arrest and could not be resuscitated.

chinese: 纤维蛋白沉着可引起疼痛，且当受累器官在壁层体腔表面滑动(如心跳或呼吸时肺运动)时听诊有摩擦音。
english: The fibrin deposit may give rise to pain and a 'friction rub' may be heard on auscultation when the affected organ slides over the parietal coelomic surface, e.g. during beating of the heart or the pulmonary movement of respiration

chinese: Pharmos公司（OTC-PINK: PARS）今天宣布：已经完成了使用左托非索泮（S-托非索泮）治疗高尿酸血症和痛风病人概念证明型临床试验。这个临床IIa期试验在杜克大学杜克临床研究中心完成，研究负责人是医学博士、哲学博士、痛风治疗专家和关键意见领袖John Sundy。该研究的初衷是评价左托非索泮（levotofisopam）作为降尿酸药物在治疗痛风病人过程中的安全性和有效性。
english: Pharmos Corporation (OTC-PINK: PARS) today announced that it has successfully completed a proof-of-concept clinical trial using its compound levotofisopam (S-tofisopam) to treat patients with hyperuricemia and gout. This phase 2a trial was conducted at the Duke Clinical Research Unit of Duke University and the principal investigator was John Sundy, MD, PhD, an expert and key opinion leader in the treatment of gout. The trial was designed to assess the safety and efficacy of levotofisopam as a uric acid-lowering agent in patients with gout.

chinese: 今天，百健艾迪（纳斯达克：BIIB）和Elan公共有限公司（纽约证券交易所：ELN）宣布：在新西兰医学杂志发表了公司在多发性硬化患者中进行的，TYSABRI(那他珠单抗)使用与发生进行性多灶性白质脑病（progressive multifocal leukoencephalopathy，缩写为：PML）风险的全球性风险管理项目的研究结果。PML是一种罕见的但严重的脑部感染，经常使患者死亡或者出现严重残疾。该项目调查了三项与PML相关的风险因素：抗JC病毒（JCV，一种首先发现于PML的多瘤病毒，命名来源于发现者的首字母）抗体状态，TYSABRI治疗前使用免疫抑制剂，以及长期使用TYSABRI进行治疗。
english: Idec (NASDAQ: BIIB) and Elan Corporation, plc (NYSE: ELN) today announced that the New England Journal of Medicine published research from the companies' global risk management program that updates the risk of TYSABRI (natalizumab)-associated progressive multifocal leukoencephalopathy (PML), an infrequent but serious brain infection that usually leads to death or severe disability, in people with multiple sclerosis (MS). The analysis looked at three risk factors associated with a patient's PML risk: anti-JC virus (JCV) antibody status, use of immunosuppressant (IS) therapy prior to TYSABRI initiation, and longer duration of treatment with TYSABRI.

chinese: 今天的开放期刊PLoS ONE发表了这一成果，即利用藻类来生产疟疾的蛋白质，从而在实验室小鼠身上诱导出能对抗疟原虫的抗体来预防疟疾的传播。这项研究进展源自于加州大学圣地亚哥两组生物学家的一次不同寻常的跨学科合作，一组来自于生命科学部和圣地亚哥藻类生物技术中心，该小组在之前曾利用藻类开发出生物制品和生物燃料；另一组生物学家来自于医学院热带医学和急性感染性疾病中心，该中心一直致力于寻找疟疾的诊断、预防和治疗方法。
english: The use of algae to produce malaria proteins that elicited antibodies against Plasmodium falciparum in laboratory mice and prevented malaria transmission was published today in the online, open-access journal PLoS ONE. The development resulted from an unusual interdisciplinary collaboration between two groups of biologists at UC San Diego—one from the Division of Biological Sciences and San Diego Center for Algae Biotechnology, which had been engineering algae to produce bio-products and biofuels, and another from the Center for Tropical Medicine and Emerging Infectious Diseases in the School of Medicine that is working to develop ways to diagnose, prevent and treat malaria.

chinese: Receptos公司今天宣布该公司的技术人员将会向消化疾病周(DDW)年会提交一项科学口头报告。该会议于2012年5月20日，周五上午9时在加利福尼亚圣地亚哥会议中心举办。DDW吸引了来自世界各地的数千名医生、研究人员和学者，他们在这首屈一指的科学会议上分享胃肠道健康方面的最新研究成果。以一篇名为“一种小分子S1P1受体激动剂可以显著改善动物模型的炎症性肠病(IBD)”的摘要为依据，Receptos公司学术人员将会讨论RPC1063在两例不同的IBD体内模型中的积极的临床前数据。
english: Receptos Inc. today announced that company personnel will deliver a scientific podium presentation about RPC1063 at the Digestive Disease Week (DDW) annual meeting at 9 a.m. PDT on Sunday, May 20, 2012 at the San Diego Convention Center in San Diego, California. DDW attracts thousands of physicians, researchers, and academics from around the world to share the latest research in gastrointestinal health topics, for which DDW is the premier scientific conference. Based on an abstract entitled "A small molecule S1P1 receptor agonist with significant efficacy in animal models of inflammatory bowel disease (IBD)," Receptos scientific personnel will discuss positive preclinical data with RPC1063 in two distinct in vivo models of IBD.

chinese: 世界糖尿病领域的领头羊--诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk）今天宣布，美国食品药品管理局（FDA）已经批准Levemir（注射用地特胰岛素[rDNA 来源]）应用于2到5岁1型糖尿病患儿。随着在儿科适应症的扩展，Levemir现在可用于两岁至成年的1型糖尿病患者及2型糖尿病成人患者。
english: Novo Nordisk, a world leader in diabetes care, announced today that the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has approved Levemir (insulin detemir [rDNA origin] injection) for use in children ages two to five years with type 1 diabetes. With the expansion of its pediatric indication, Levemir is now available for type 1 diabetes patients from age two through adulthood and adult patients with type 2 diabetes.

chinese: 今天公布的最新研究显示：皮下注射抗TNF-α药物SIMPONI（戈利木单抗）可以使大部分中到重度溃疡性结肠炎患者出现临床反应，而这些患者在常规治疗中失败或者不能忍受常规药物的副作用。研究人员将杨森公司研发部资助的III期临床试验的结果公布在最新科学发现会议期间的消化药物周（DDW）上。结果显示：在SIMPONI治疗的两个不同剂量组中，超过50%患者在第6周出现了临床反应（该研究的主要终点指标），明显高于对照组的出现比例。与安慰剂组相比，在第六周，SIMPONI治疗组能够显著促进症状缓解、粘膜修复和健康相关的生活质量提高。
english: New study findings presented today show that subcutaneous induction regimens of the anti-tumor necrosis factor (TNF)-alpha therapy SIMPONI(golimumab) induced clinical response in a majority of patients with moderately to severely active ulcerative colitis (UC) who had previously failed or were intolerant to conventional agents. Investigators presented data from the Janssen Research Development sponsored Phase 3 study at Digestive Disease Week (DDW） during a late breaker session and reported that more than 50 percent of patients in each of two SIMPONI dosing groups achieved clinical response at week 6, the primary endpoint of the study, which was significantly more than those in clinical response after receiving placebo. Treatment with SIMPONI also resulted in significant induction of clinical remission and mucosal healing and improvement in health-related quality of life measures at week 6 compared with placebo.

chinese: 参议院今天批准了美国食品药品监督管理局（FDA）安全和创新法案。根据美国消费者协会政策和宣传消费者报告的消息：这项法案在现行法律基础上有所提高，不过，在FDA的现行医疗设备监督方面的缺陷并没有丝毫改进。
english: The Senate approved the Food and Drug Administration Safety and Innovation Act today. While the legislation includes some improvements over current law, it leaves significant flaws with the FDA's current medical device oversight system in place, according to Consumers Union, the policy and advocacy arm of Consumer Reports.

chinese: Rainbow Coral (OTCBB:RBCC) 公司的生物技术子公司Rainbow BioSciences今天宣布,其最新合资对象AmarantusBioSciences有限公司(OTCBB:AMBS)将有望公布旨在评估治疗创伤性脑损伤(TBI)的一项新型蛋白治疗方法潜力的临床前实验结果.
english: Rainbow BioSciences, the biotechsubsidiary of Rainbow Coral Corp. (OTCBB:RBCC), announced today that its latestjoint venture target, Amarantus BioSciences, Inc. (OTCBB: AMBS), expects toannounce the results of a preclinical study evaluating the potential of its newprotein therapy as a treatment for Traumatic BrainInjury (TBI).

chinese: 梗死患者常有心脏节律障碍，这可能是与之同时存在的但却不相关的心脏病所致，也可能是梗死本身所致。
english: Cardiac dysrhythmias are frequent in patients with infarction, either because of coexistent but unrelated cardiac disease, or as a result of the infarction.

chinese: 老年、高血压、昏迷、心脏和呼吸器官并发症、低氧、高碳酸血症、以及神经源性换气过度都是预后不利的因素。
english: Old age, hypertension, coma, cardiorespiratory complications, hypoxia, hypercapnia, and neurogenic hyperventilation are adverse prognostic factors.

chinese: 在致命的脑梗死病例中，尤其是大脑中动脉和颈内动脉分布区的梗死，经天幕疝约为l／3患者的死亡原因，另1／3死于肺炎，20％死于心脏病，死于肺栓塞者占l0％。
english: In fatal eases of cerebral infarction, particularly in the middle cerebral or internal carotid distribution, trans-tentorial herniation is the cause of death in about one third of patients, pneumonia in another third, cardiac causes in 20%, and pulmonary embolism in 10%.

chinese: 心脏病、高血压和男性则是长期死亡率的附加因素。
english: For long-term heart disease, hypertension and male sex were additional factors.

chinese: 例如：有些患者发生大片脑水肿伴颅内压增高。个别人出现抽搐或全身性并发症，包括液体或电解质不平衡、肺炎或心脏疾患。
english: For example, some patients develop massive brain edema with increased intracranial pressure, and an occasional one will have convulsions or systemic complications, including fluid or electrolyte imbalance, pneumonia, or cardiac disorder.

chinese: 使用血浆膨胀剂进行血液稀释和容量置换往往会提高心脏病和脑水肿发病率的情况是值得注意的。
english: The tendency toward an increased prevalence of cardiac events or cerebral edema occurring during hemodilution, and volume substitution with plasma expanders is a matter of concern.

chinese: 对并存心脏梗死和脑梗死的治疗
english: Treatment of Concomitant Cardiac and Cerebral Infarction

chinese: 长期高血压患者显示左心室增大的证据，并经常有提示早期心脏失代偿的舒张期奔马率。
english: Patients with longstanding hypertension show evidence of left ventricular enlargement and often have a diastolic gallop rhythm that suggests incipient cardiac decompensation.

chinese: 伴白质病灶组有较多的昏厥和低血压发作，并有较严重的心脏病病史(84％比36％)。
english: The group with white matter changes had more episodes of fainting and hypotension and had a stronger history of cardiac disease (84 % versus 36%).

chinese: 虽然早期对实验动物的研究使用具有强磁场的小磁体，近来却使用1．5特斯拉的磁体研究人的肌肉、肝脏、心脏和脑。
english: Although the initial studies in laboratory animals used small magnets with strong field strengths, recent applications have utilized 1.5 Tesla magnets to study muscle, liver, heart and brain in humans.

chinese: 体征包括特征性的“蒙古人种样”的面容、单一的掌纹、巨大有裂纹的舌头、肌张力低下、生长延缓和先天性心脏和胃肠道缺陷等。
english: Physical features include characteristic 'mongoloid' facies, single palmar creases, a large fissured tongue, hypotonia, retarded growth and congenital cardiac and gastrointestinal defects.

chinese: 例如,X线电影摄影术用来观察心脏瓣膜的活动情况和发现缺损。
english: For example, cineradiography is used to observe the actions of the heart valves and to note any defects.

chinese: 后天获得性和先天性心脏病、肺癌和食道癌是胸腔外科医师经常治疗的疾病。
english: Acquired and congenital heart disease and both lung and esophageal cancer are the disorders commonly treated by thoracic surgeons.

chinese: 在胚胎学发育的最初阶段，心脏仅是动静脉之间的一段肌肉特别强健和有收缩力的管子；尽管在成人阶段心脏的大小和形状和原来的明显不同，而且完全分隔成左右两侧，但仍可把它比作一个双腔管，在一端(心房)接纳来自静脉的血液，在另一端(心室)将血液泵送至动脉。
english: The heart begins its embryological development as a particularly muscular and contractile tubular segment interposed between the veins and arteries in spite of the fact that it departs markedly from its original size and shape and is in the adult completely into right and left sides, it can still be likened to a double-barreled tube, receiving blood at one end (the atria) from veins and pumping it out at the other end (the ventricles) into the arteries.

chinese: 既然心脏必须向一个方向泵送血液，所以它具有防止血液从高压区反流到低压区的瓣膜。
english: Since the heart must pump blood in only one direction it is provided with valves to insure against backflow from a region of higher to one of lower pressure.

chinese: 按例l—27所用的相同实验方法，给9头猪注射以下剂量：第l次给予2毫克／公斤体重盐酸双苯乙硫酯(其分子式中R为二乙氨基的双取代氨基)，第2次给予2毫克／公斤体重盐酸双苯乙硫酯(其分子式中R为吗啉基的双取代氨基)，第3次给予2毫克／公斤体重盐酸双苯乙硫酯(其分子式中R为哌啶子基的双取代氨基)。
english: The same procedure as utilized in examples 1-27 was used on the nine pigs which were given a dose of 2 milligrams of: first, a thiphenamil hydrochloride (in which R is a disubstituted amino radical of the diethylamino group) per kilogram of body weight; second, a 2 milligram dose of a thiphenamil hydrochloride (in which R is a disubstituted amino radical of the morpholino group) per kilogram of body weight (mg / kg); and third, a 2 milligram dose of a thiphenamil hydrochloride (in which R is a disubstituted amino radical of the piperidino group) per kilogram of body weight (mg / kg).

chinese: 按例l—54所用的相同实验方法，给9头猪使用以下剂量：第l次5毫克／公斤体重盐酸双苯乙硫酯(其分子式中R为二乙氨基的双取代氨基)，第2次给予5毫克／公斤体重盐酸双苯乙硫酯(其分子式中R为吗啉基的双取代氨基)，第3次给予5毫克／公斤体重盐酸双苯乙硫酯(其分子式中R为哌啶子基的双取代氨基)。
english: The same procedure as utilized in examples 1-54 was used on the nine pigs which were given a dose of 5 milligrams of.- first, a thiphenamil hydrochloride (in which R is a disubstituted amino radical of the diethylamino group) per kilogram of body weight (mg/kg); second, a 5 milligram dose of a thiphenamil hydrochloride (in which R is a disubstituted amino radical of the morpholino group)per kilogram of body weight (mg / kg) and third, a 5 milligram dose of a thiphenamil hydrochloride (in which R is a disubstituted amino radical of the piperidino group) per kilogram of body weight (rag / kg).

chinese: 按例l—80所用的相同实验方法，给9头猪注射以下剂量：第l次10毫克／公斤体重盐酸双苯乙硫酯(其分子式中R为二乙氨基的双取代氨基)，第2次10毫克／公斤体重盐酸双苯乙硫酯(其分子式中R为吗啉基的双取代氨基)，第3次l0毫克／公斤体重盐酸双苯乙硫酯(其分子式中R为哌啶子基的双取代氨基)。
english: The same procedure as utilized in examples 1-80 was used on the nine pigs which were given a dose of 10 milligrams of: first, a thiphenamil hydrochloride (in which R is a disubstituied amino radical of the diethylamino group) per kilogram of body weight (mg/kg); second, a 10 milligram dose of a thiphenamil hydrochloride (in which R is a disubstituted amino radical of the morpholino group)per kilogram of body weight (mg/kg); and third, a 10 milligram dose of a thiphenamil hydrochloride (in which R is a disubstituted amino radical of the piperidino group)per kilogram of body weight(rag / kg).

chinese: 5头试验动物的测定，是在打开腹腔和堵塞输尿管的条件下进行的。
english: In five of the experimental animals, measurements were taken with the abdomen open and the ureter obstructed.

chinese: 静脉注射盐酸双苯乙硫酯2.5毫克／公斤体重，使5头试验动物中的4头静息肾盂压显著降低，降至5.9±3.1厘米水柱。
english: Intravenous thiphenamil hydrochloride at 2.5mg / kg significantly reduced the resting renal pelvic pressure to 5.9 -+ 3.1 cm H20 in four of the five test animals.

chinese: 考虑到我们手头有l00多份随机阳性血清，我们选择其中1组用FIAX法测定是否存在I期抗体。
english: Given the fact that we have over 100 random positive sera on hand, we elected to survey a group of them for the presence of phase I antibody by FLAX.

chinese: 主要器官系统回顾：皮肤、造血系统(包括淋巴结)，头、眼、耳、鼻、口、喉、颈、乳房及呼吸系统、心血管系统、胃肠道系统、泌尿系统、肌肉骨骼系统、神经系统、内分泌和精神系统
english: Systematic review of major organ systems: skin, hematopoietic system (including lymph nodes), head, eyes, ears, nose, mouth, throat, neck, breasts, and respiratory, cardiovascular, gastrointestinal, genitourinary, musculoskeletal, nervous, endocrine and psychiatric systems.

chinese: 具体说，前上臂的肱二头肌就是一块屈肌。
english: For example, the biceps muscle in the front of the upper arm is a flexor.

chinese: 而后上臂的肱三头肌则是一块伸肌。
english: The triceps muscle in the back of the upper arm is an extensor.

chinese: 与此同时，肱二头肌放松，使肱三头肌能够把它恢复到原位。
english: At the same time, the biceps relaxes so the triceps can pull it back to its original length.

chinese: 如果您愿意的话，您可以通过曲臂来感受到你上臂肱二头肌的肌腹。
english: If you want, you can feel the fleshy belly of the biceps of your arm when you bend your elbow.

chinese: 试着用手掌去抬桌子边，就可感受到肱二头肌。
english: Now try to lift the edge of a table with your palm and feel the biceps.

chinese: 顺肌腹摸向肘关节，可感受到肱二头肌的肌腱。
english: Follow the fleshy belly toward the elbow and feel its cord-like tendon.

chinese: 肱二头肌、肱三头肌和其它类的骨骼肌也被称为随意肌，这是因为它们接受人主观意愿的驱使。
english: The biceps, triceps or other kinds of skeletal muscles are also called voluntary muscles because they are under the control of our willpower.

chinese: 在生命的头二十年即可发生完全瘫疾或死亡。
english: Complete paralysis and death usually ensue within the first two decades of life.

chinese: 心悸是指对心跳的一种不适感，常被描写为：击拍、敲打、乱跳、落下、停搏、跳跃、赛跑或胸部膨胀样感觉。
english: Palpitation refers to a disagreeable awareness of the heart beat, described as a thumping, pounding, skipping, flopping, stopping, jumping, racing, or expanding sensation in the chest.

chinese: 当心脏每搏容积增大如主动脉瓣返流时，病人可受不正常的心跳感觉而困扰。
english: Patients with a large stroke volume, as in aortic regurgitation, may be troubled with an abnormal sensation of the heart beat.

chinese: 由于心跳、呼吸和身体的温度是生命的临床指征(在没有现代化的检查手段如脑电图以前的年代，上述体征消失即表示死亡)，所以称之为生命体征(脉搏、呼吸频率、体温和血压)，至今仍是所有体检项目中最常采用的项目。
english: Because a heartbeat, breathing, and body warmth are the clinical signs of life (the absence of which signaled death in the era before the advent of modem laboratory aids such as the electroencephalogram), the so-called vital signs (pulse, respiratory rate, temperature, and blood, pressure) continue to be the most frequently examined of all physical findings.

chinese: 延髓除了制造脑脊液之外，它还是几种颅神经的源头和心跳、血管径、呼吸、咳嗽、吞咽、呕吐、打喷嚏及呃逆的控制中枢。
english: In addition to manufacturing cerebrospinalfluid, the medulla is the source of several cranial nerves and the control center for the rate of heartbeat, the diameter of the blood vessels, breathing, coughing, swallowing, vomiting, sneezing, and hiccupping.

chinese: X. 迷走神经(混合)：心跳和运动，喉和消化器官。
english: X. Vagus nerve (mixed): heartbeat and movements, larynx and digestive organs.

chinese: 两个系统通过调节体温、体液平衡、酶的产生、血压、血糖水平、心率和心跳、激素的生成和类似的各种因素，来维持体内稳定。
english: Both systems maintain body homeostasis by regulating body temperature, fluid balance, enzyme production, blood pressure, sugar level, heart rate and beat, hormone production, and similar factors.

chinese: 心率(每分钟心跳次数)由自主神经系统控制。
english: Heart rate, the number of beats per minute, is controlled by the autonomic nervous system.

chinese: 自主神经系统的交感分枝通过心脏加速神经来加快心跳，而副交感分枝通过心脏抑制神经来减慢心跳。
english: The sympathetic division of the ANS increases heartbeat through cardioaccelerator nerves and the parasympathetic division decreases heartbeat through cardioinhibitor nerves.

chinese: 它的计算方法是每分钟心跳的次数乘以每次泵出的血量。
english: It is calculated by multiplying the heartbeat by the amount of blood pumped with each stroke.

chinese: 心跳周期是指一次心跳与下一次心跳间的时间。
english: The cardiac cycle is the time between one heartbeat and the next.

chinese: 整个心跳周期持续0.8秒，分为下列几期：心房收缩期0.1秒，心室收缩期0.3秒，舒张期0.4秒。
english: The entire cycle lasts for 0.8 second and is divided in the following manner: 0.1 atrial systole, 0.3---ventricular systole, 0.4---diastole.

chinese: 心包腔内液体的郁积妨碍心跳。
english: The accumulation of pericardial fluid in the pericardial cavity interferes with heartbeat.

chinese: 心律失常是指不规整的心跳节律。
english: Arrhythmia is an irregular heart rhythm.

chinese: 心脏的一些区域变得和起搏区一样，引起心跳减弱和不规整。
english: Several areas of the heart act as pacemakers and heartbeat is weak and uncoordinated.

chinese: 通常使用体外休克(称为去纤颤)来恢复正常的心跳。
english: Usually the use of external shock (called defibrillation) can return normal coordination.

chinese: 为了避免这种类型的呼吸困难，患者通常会在头和胸部之下垫上两个或更多枕头。
english: Patients usually learn to avoid dyspnea of this sort by sleeping with the head and thorax on two or more pillows.

chinese: 大多数自然流产发生在妊娠头三个月。
english: Most spontaneous abortions occur within the first 3 months of pregnancy.

chinese: 妊娠头三个月内，胎儿对以上因素最为敏感。
english: The fetus is most susceptible to their effects during the first three months of pregnancy.

chinese: 在出生后的头几个月，他是远视眼，就象他的穴居祖先。
english: In the first few months he was long-sighted, like his caveman ancestors.

chinese: a．盘状LE，限局性(头和颈)或全身性(“播散性”)盘状LE。
english: a. Discoid LE, localized (head and neck) or generalized ("disseminated") discoid LE.

chinese: 红斑狼疮脂膜炎(深部LE):该型LE有真皮深层以致皮下的结节，其直径为l～3或l～4cm，像橡胶一样坚实，境界清楚，且为无痛性，最常发生于头、面和上肢的正常皮肤的下面。
english: LE Panniculitis ("LE Profundus"): In this type of LE, deep dermal or even subcutaneous nodules 1 to 3 or 4 cm in diameter, rubbery-firm, sharply defined, and nontender, occur, most often beneath normal skin of the head face, or upper arms.

chinese: 如果用25针头，发生率仅为1％。
english: The incidence is only 1% when a 25-gauge needle is used.

chinese: 头三天经静脉输入氢化可的松，每H 30m9／k9．可能有益。
english: Hydrocortisone, 30 mg/kg/d intravenously, may be useful for the first 3 days.

chinese: 大多数排斥反应发生于头三个月内。
english: Most rejections occur within the first 3 months.

chinese: 头几个月过后死亡相当少见而且大多数存活者术后一年时健康状态极好，这种情况表明可望获得长期存活。
english: Deaths are relatively uncommon after the first few months, and the excellent health of most survivors at 1 year suggests that prolonged survival can be expected.

chinese: 若累及腰4神经根，可见膝腱反射减弱和轻度股四头肌无力。
english: With involvement of the L4 root, the patellar tendon reflex may be diminished and slight quadriceps weakness may be observed.

chinese: 在本书头三章里，对与药物治疗有关的这三个方面将分别在药代动力学、药效动力学和药物间相互作用的详细阐述过程中进行讨论。
english: In the first three chapters, this triad of therapeutics is discussed by elaborating on the pharmacokinetics, the pharmacodynamics, and the drug-drug interactions.

chinese: 此作用可引起股四头肌群肌肉消瘦。
english: This effect causes muscle wasting in quadriceps femoris groups.

chinese: 它用于治疗头、颈和食管的鳞状细胞癌，与其他药物联用可治疗睾丸癌以及何杰金病和其他淋巴瘤。
english: Bleomycin is used in squamous-cell carcinoma of the head, neck, and esophagus, in combination with other drugs in testicular carcinoma, and in Hodgkin's disease and other lymphomas.

chinese: 在每个横桥末端有一个伸长的头，它可以弯动。
english: At the end of each cross-bridge is an elongated head that can bend from side to side.

chinese: 心脏的内膜层，跟与心脏相连血管的内膜相续，称之为心内膜，与血管内膜基本上无区别。
english: The intimal lining of the heart, continuous with the intima of the vessels connecting to it, is known as the endocardium, and does not differ essentially from the intima of blood vessels.

chinese: 它也形成心房和心室间的瓣膜以及从心脏出发的两根大动脉干根部的瓣膜。
english: It also forms the valves that lie between atria and ventricles and at the bases of the two great arterial trunks leaving the heart.

chinese: 心脏的肌性部分，相当于血管的中层，是一种特殊类型的肌肉(心肌)，只存在于心脏和与心脏相连的大血管中。
english: The muscular part of the heart, equivalent to the media of a blood vessel, is a special type of muscle (cardiac muscle) found only in the heart and the great vessels as they attach to it.

chinese: 是这种内在的节律性保持心脏不断收缩；神经冲动只是凋节而不是引发心脏的跳动。
english: It is the built-in rhythmicity that keeps the heart contracting; nerve impulses simply modify rather than initiate the heart beat.

chinese: 心脏的最外层是心外膜(浆膜心包性的脏层)，它的外表面是单层间皮细胞(扁平上皮细胞)，与心包的浆膜面(即内表面)相续。
english: The outermost layer of the heart is the epicardium (visceral layer of the serous pericardium), whose outer surface is a single layer of mesothelial (pavement epithelial) cells continuous with the serous (inner) surface of the pericardium.

chinese: 心包是一个包裹心脏的密闭囊。
english: The pericardium is a closed sac surrounding the heart.

chinese: 纤维性心包内衬间皮(即浆膜性心包的壁层)，它在从心脏出发的大血管周围及沿着心脏后部(即心脏与心包连接处)折转而覆盖在心脏上，在这些部位浆膜层作为心外膜或心旬浆膜层的脏层连续被覆在心脏上。
english: It is lined with mesothelium (tile parietal layer of serous pericardium) that is reflected onto the heart around the great vessels leaving it and along the posterior aspect of the heart where that organ is fused to the pericardium; in these locations the serous layer continues onto the heart as the epicardium or visceral lamina of the serous pericardium.

chinese: 现在来描述心脏的大体形态学。
english: The gross morphology of the heart is described later.

chinese: 这个中空的肌性器官大小大致与本人的拳头相仿，成人期正常情况下完全分成两侧，血液分别经过这两侧循环，在一侧流人和流出，随后回到心脏再从另一侧进入和流出。
english: This hollow, muscular organ, roughly the size of one's fist, is in the adult normally completely divided into sides through which the blood circulates separately, entering and leaving one side and then returning to the heart to enter and leave the other side.

chinese: 把血液运回心脏的大静脉入薄壁的心房，来自全身(肺除外)的静脉汇入右心房，来自肺的静脉入左心房。
english: The great veins carrying blood to the heart enter the thin-walled atria, the veins from all the body except the lungs entering the right atrium, those from the lungs entering the left atrium.

chinese: 心脏肌肉血管丰富，由两根动脉即冠状动脉供给营养，它们起始于刚出心脏的主动脉。
english: The musculature of the heart is highly vascular and is fed by two arteries, the coronary arteries, which arise from the aorta just after it leaves the heart.

chinese: 冠状动脉的一根重要分支阻塞，尤其是通向心室的分支，是心脏病发作或突发性心力衰竭的常见原因；一根动脉的重要分支狭窄太严重，或小分支发生闭塞，会造成心肌局部缺血，而由此产生的疼痛称为心绞痛。
english: Obstruction of a major branch of a coronary artery, especially one to a ventricle, is the common cause of a cardiac stroke, or sudden heart failure; too great narrowing of a major branch of an artery or occlusion of minor branches, produces ischemia of the cardiac muscle, and the pain produced by this is known as angina pectoris.

chinese: 心脏也有神经分布，既有传入神经纤维(包括痛觉神经纤维)，又有自主神经纤维(见第19章)。
english: The heart also has a nerve supply that contains both afferent fibers (including ones of pain) and autonomic fibers (Chap. 19).

chinese: 然而运动神经分布纯粹是调节性的，它作用于心脏，根据机体的需要调节(增加或减低)心跳的速度和强度。
english: The motor nerve supply is a purely regulatory one, however; it acts upon the heart to modify, i.e., increase or decrease, the rate and strength of the heart beat according to the needs of the body.

chinese: 既然心脏分成左右两侧，它便有两个循环。
english: Since the heart is divided into right and left side, there are two circulations through it.

chinese: 贫血的特征是全身皮肤苍白和心跳、呼吸次数增加。
english: Anemia is characterized by a general paleness and increased heart and respiratory rates.

chinese: 兴奋药的作用是提高机体的警觉性，引起不安、失眠、心跳加速，在特殊情况下引起惊厥。
english: The effects of stimulants are increased alertness, restlessness and insomnia, rapid heartbeat, and, in extreme cases, convulsion.

chinese: 心脏抑制药减慢心率并使快速而无规律的心跳恢复为缓慢的正常心跳。
english: Cardiac depressants slow the heart rate and reduce quick, irregular heartbeats to slow, normal beats.

chinese: 血管用药：血管收缩药通过收缩虹管使血压升高和心跳加快。
english: Vascular drugs: Vasoconstrictors raise blood pressure and increase heart rate by constricting the blood vessels.

chinese: 心跳源于SA结(心的起搏点)，该结位于界嵴上部、上腔静脉开口于右心房处的右侧。
english: The heart beat is initiated in the SA node (the pacemaker of the heart), situated in the upper part of the crista terminalis just to the right of the opening of the superior vena cava into the right atrium.

chinese: 刺激迷走神经则心跳变慢甚至停跳。
english: Vagal stimulation slows or even stops the heart.

chinese: 延髓内有心血管和呼吸中枢，分别对心跳和呼吸进行自主性控制。
english: The medulla contains the cardiovascular and respiratory centers for automatic control of heart beat and respiration, respectively.

chinese: 根据发表在美国心脏协会新兴科学系列网络研讨会的最新研究，有些不规则心跳的患者在脱离抗凝药物后会在一个月之内面临一种高的中风或凝血风险。
english: Some patients with irregular heartbeats whoare taken off anti-clotting medication face a high risk of stroke or bloodclotting within a month, according to new research presented at the AmericanHeart Association's Emerging Science Series webinar.

chinese: 今天，美国临床内分泌医师协会(AACE)欢迎了一个来自中国的内分泌医师代表团，该代表团将参加于5月23日至27日在费城举行的AACE第21届科学与临床年度会议。这是该世界人口最多国家的内分泌医师团体首次访问（感觉参与更合适）AACE活动。中国医师将参与讲座和活动，参观行业展览，会见AACE领导层并考察AACE会员的方法与实践。
english: Today, the American Association of Clinical Endocrinologists (AACE) welcomes a delegation of endocrinologists from China to its 21st Annual Scientific and Clinical Congress in Philadelphia May 23-27. It is the first time a group of endocrinologists from the world's most populous nation has visited this AACE event. The Chinese physicians will attend lectures and events, review industry exhibits, meet with AACE leadership and examine the methods and practices of AACE members.

chinese: 美国内分泌专家协会（AACE）今天在线公布了有关胰岛素泵管理的共识意见，并且将会刊登在AACE协会的官方医学期刊内分泌实践中。
english: The American Association of Clinical Endocrinologists (AACE)today published a consensus statement for insulin pump management online, andthe statement will be published in the next issue of the association's officialmedical journal Endocrine Practice.

chinese: 今天，安进公司（纳斯达克股票代码：AMGN）报道了III期临床EVOLVE实验的结果。EVOLVE(EValuation Of Cinacalcet HCl Therapy to Lower CardioVascular Events,译为对盐酸甲状旁腺素降低心血管不良反应的评价)试验用来评估Sensipar/Mimpera（甲状旁腺素）降低心血管不良事件的程度。EVOLVE试验是在3883名继发性甲状旁腺功能亢进（hyperparathyroidism，缩写为HPT）患者中进行的；患者同时患有慢性肾病，正在接受透析治疗。该研究的主要终点指标是复合事件发生，包括全因死亡率或者第一个非致命性心血管不良反应（包括心肌梗塞，不稳定心绞痛的入院治疗，心衰或者外周血管不良反应）的发生率。虽然Sensipar/Mimpara治疗组的复合主要不良事件较少，不过，两组间的差异没有统计学意义；该研究没有达到意向性治疗分析的主要终点指标。
english: Amgen (NASDAQ:AMGN) today announced top-line results of the Phase 3 EVOLVE (EValuation Of Cinacalcet HCl Therapy to Lower CardioVascular Events) trial, which evaluated Sensipar?/Mimpara? (cinacalcet) for the reduction of the risk of mortality and cardiovascular (CV) events among 3,883 patients with secondary hyperparathyroidism (HPT) and chronic kidney disease (CKD) receiving dialysis. The primary endpoint of the study was time to the composite event comprising all-cause mortality or first non-fatal cardiovascular event, including myocardial infarction, hospitalization for unstable angina, heart failure or peripheral vascular event. Although patients in the Sensipar/Mimpara arm experienced numerically fewer composite primary events, the results were not statistically significant, and the trial did not meet its primary endpoint in the intent-to-treat analysis.

chinese: 家用的监测系统采用前瞻性而不是反应性的方式监测老年人的健康，Rantz任务，这样可以提供自动化的数据来警示监控者何时他们的患者需要援助或干预。传感器包括可测量客户家中运动量的视频游戏技术，研究人员将整合可监测个体脉搏、呼吸、心跳的新型液压床传感器。
english: The in-home monitoring systems use proactive, rather than reactive, ways of monitoring seniors' health, according to Rantz, offering automated data that alert care providers when patients need assistance or intervention. The sensors will include video gaming technology for measuring residents' movements in the home, and the researchers will integrate new hydraulic bed sensors that will monitor an individual's pulse, respiration and restlessness.

chinese: 除颤电极导线是连接到植入心脏的装置上，用以检测异常的心脏节律并产生电击来恢复正常的心跳。
english: The lead is a wire attached to the device that is inserted into the heart to detect abnormal heart rhythms and deliver an electrical shock to restore normal heartbeat.

chinese: 如果您或您的孩子服用质子泵抑制剂后出现心跳或心律失常，或者出现心跳加快、心悸、肌肉痉挛、震颤或者癫痫发作等症状，请及时就医。对于儿童，心律失常还可能导致疲劳、胃部不适、头晕和头晕等症状。
english: Seek immediate care if you (or your child) experience an abnormal heart rate or rhythm, or symptoms such as a racing heartbeat, palpitations, muscle spasm, tremor or convulsions while taking a PPI drug. In children, abnormal heart rates may cause fatigue, upset stomach, dizziness and lightheadedness.

chinese: 得益于哥伦比亚工程学院的一项新研究，医生现在能在一次心跳周期中诊断出非周期性的心率失常，此技术无创、花费低，可以在自己的办公室内进行。非周期性的心率失常包括房颤和室颤，同时伴有严重异常的心律，其中一些可危及生命。哥伦比亚工程学院最新研究了一项新技术名为电机械波成像技术，研究者发射非聚焦超声波通过密闭的胸腔进入心脏，这样研究者俘获快帧速图像，使得研究者首次描绘了瞬息事件，比如数十毫秒内的电机械激活，同时在一次心跳周期内成像整个心脏。此项哥伦比亚工程学院的研究最新发表在英国皇家物理学会期刊数据库。
english: Thanksto a new study from Columbia Engineering School,doctors may now be able to diagnose in their offices non-periodic arrhythmias - noninvasively and at low cost -within a single heartbeat. Non-periodic arrhythmias include atrial and ventricular fibrillation, which areassociated with severely abnormal heart rhythm that can in some cases be life-threatening.UsingElectromechanical Wave Imaging (EWI), a technique recently developed atColumbia Engineering, the researchers sent unfocused ultrasound waves throughthe closed chest and into the heart. They were able to capturefast-frame-rateimages that enabled them - for the first time - to map transientevents such as the electromechanical activation that occurs over a few tens ofmilliseconds while also imaging the entire heart within a single beat. TheColumbia Engineering study was recently published in IOPscience.

chinese: Ophthotech公司今天宣布：从第一个临床研究结果看，治疗神经血管性年龄相关性黄斑变性（湿性年龄相关性黄斑变性），联合用药优于单用Lucentis（兰尼珠单抗，抗血管内皮生长因子单抗），两者具有统计学上差异
english: Ophthotech Corporation today announced results from the first clinical trial to show statistically significant superior efficacy over Lucentis (ranibizumab) monotherapy for the treatment of neovascular age-related macular degeneration (wet AMD).

chinese: 注意！美国，该降低体重了——肥胖不但使你一直感觉疲倦而且可能会让你容易出现意外事故，今天在SLEEP2012大会上公布的三项研究结论显示肥胖及抑郁症可能是造成我们在清醒时过度疲乏嗜睡的罪魁祸首。
english: Wake up, America, and lose some weight - it's keeping you tiredandprone to accidents. Three studies being presented today at sleep2012 conclude that obesity and depression are the two main culprits making usexcessively sleepy while awake.

chinese: 辉瑞公司今天发布声明称收到美国食品和药物管理局关于Tafamidis新药申请的答复信。政府要求批准之前需完成次要疗效的研究，以确保建立疗效的证据牢靠。并且还要求关于目前tafamidis新药申请的额外信息。辉瑞将与FDA合作，解决答复信中的问题。Tafamidis是种治疗有症状的成人甲状腺素家族性淀粉样多发性神经病(TTR-FAP)的新型研究药物，可延缓神经损害。
english: Pfizer Inc. announced today that it hasreceived a Complete Response Letter from the U.S. Food and Drug Administration(FDA) on its New Drug Application (NDA) for tafamidis meglumine. The Agency isrequesting the completion of a second efficacy study to establish substantialevidence of effectiveness prior to an approval. The Agency has also asked foradditional information on the data within the current tafamidis NDA. Pfizerwill work with the FDA to address the content of the letter. Tafamidis is anovel, investigational medication for the treatment of Transthyretin FamilialAmyloid Polyneuropathy (TTR-FAP) in adult patients with symptomaticpolyneuropathy to delay neurologic impairment.

chinese: 波士顿Brigham 妇女医院的Marc Bonaca博士今天在美国心脏协会新兴医学系列的在线会议上发表了TRA 2°P TIMI 50研究中的PAD患者数据。
english: The PAD data from TRA 2°P TIMI 50 was presented today by Dr Marc Bonaca (Brigham and Women's Hospital, Boston, MA) in an American Heart Association Emerging Science Series webinar.

chinese: 没有足够的红细胞在体内携带氧分子，病人会出现乏力，气短，心跳加快等症状。
english: Without red blood cells to carry oxygen throughout the body, fatigue, shortnessof breath, rapid heartbeat and other symptoms can occur.

chinese: FDA目前承认，这项研究论证了Qnexa在最初的12个月的治疗中，能帮助病人减去相当多的体重。代理商补充说，许多参与者在他们的第二年中恢复了减轻的体重。对出生缺陷和加速心跳的关注再次增加。
english: The FDA now acknowledges that studies have demonstratedthat Qnexa can help patients lose a considerable amount of weight during theinitial 12 months of treatment. The Agency added that a number of participants put some of their lost weight back on during theirsecond year. Concerns regarding birth defects and accelerated heartbeat wereraised again.

chinese: 胎儿先天性心脏传导阻滞是由于他母亲的免疫系统错误的攻击胎儿心肌中传导心跳信号的神经纤维。
english: The unborn baby's congenital heart block developed when her mother's immune system mistakenly attacked the nerves fibres that transmit heartbeat signals in the fetal heart muscle.

chinese: Veracyte (South San Francisco, CA, USA; www.veracyte.com)是一家在新兴的分子细胞学领域处于领先水平的分子诊断公司。他们今天宣布了一项大样本、多中心、前瞻性研究的结果，证明通过基因表达分类器检测Afirma基因的表达能降低超过一半以上不必要的甲状腺癌手术。
english: Veracyte, Inc., a molecular diagnostics company that is pioneering the emerging field of molecular cytology, today announced results from a large, prospective, multicenter study, which demonstrated the potential for the Afirma Gene Expression Classifier, a gene expression test, to reduce the large number of unnecessary surgeries in thyroid cancer diagnosis by more than half.

chinese: PROLOR生物技术公司(NYSE MKT: PBTH)今天宣布，在第58届血栓与止血国际协会(ISTH)科学与标准化委员会年会上，PROLOR公司科学家Gili Hart博士将公布该公司长效凝血因子用于治疗血友病的临床前研发数据。Hart博士将于明天，即2012年6月30日，在英国利物浦ISTH会议上进行该口头报告。
english: PROLOR Biotech, Inc. (NYSE MKT: PBTH), today announced that PROLOR scientist Dr. Gili Hart will present data on the company's long-acting clotting factors in preclinical development for the treatment of hemophilia at the 58th Annual Meeting of the Science and Standardization Committee of the International Society on Thrombosis and Haemostasis (ISTH). Dr. Hart's oral presentation will take place tomorrow, June 30, 2012, at the ISTH meeting in Liverpool, UK.

chinese: 我希望一旦临床医生开始将基因组分析手段用于诊断，他们就能够理性地使用这些药物。我们今天看到这有望变成现实，我确信很快就会看到它变成现实。临床医生将能够确定特定患者受到了哪种感染，然后从药柜中取出针对这种细菌的药物。这可能会完全改变今天的开药方法。
english: My other hope for clinicians is that they will be able to use them more rationally once they start using genome analysis as a diagnostic tool. What we're seeing in capability today, I have no doubt that it's going to happen very, very soon. The clinician will be able to identify precisely what type of infection is ongoing in this particular patient and then go the shelf and pick the right drugs against the right bugs. That may change the picture entirely.

chinese: Tak Mak博士的这个研究结果今天发表在Nature上，他评论说：“我们首次证明代谢异常可导致癌症发生。这为开发阻断相关基因突变以抑制致癌性代谢酶的产生搭建了平台。”该研究组的科学家分别来自于英国纽约的威尔康乃尔医学院以及美国马萨诸塞州剑桥大学的Agios制药公司。
english: Says Dr. Tak Mak of the findings published today in Nature: "For the first time, we have demonstrated how a metabolite can cause cancer. This sets the stage for developing inhibitors to block the mutation and prevent the production of this disease-initiating enzyme." The research team included scientists at Weill Cornell Medical College, New York City, and Agios Pharmaceuticals, Cambridge, Massachusetts.

chinese: Vertex将在今天，即美国东部时间2012年6月28日早8:00，就这些数据召开面向投资者和媒体的电话会议。该研究的完整数据将提交到一个即将召开的医学会议上进行发布。
english: Vertex will host a conference call for investors and media today, June 28, 2012 at 8:00 a.m. ET, to discuss these data. Full data from this study will be submitted for presentation at an upcoming medical meeting.

chinese: TONIX今天提出的新研究报告证实，该公司舌下含服片型TNX-102（2.4毫克）能使环苯扎林较口服环苯扎林片更快速地交换和吸收。事实上，TONIX公司发现新型SL制剂的吸收同静脉注射环苯扎林一样好。环苯扎林是美国FDA批准的两种肌肉松弛处方药中的活性成分。这两种肌松药由其他制药公司生产。
english: The new research reported by TONIX todaydemonstrates that the Company's SL TNX-102 (2.4 mg) tablet provides fasterdelivery and more efficient absorption of cyclobenzaprine as compared to thecurrently available pills that deliver cyclobenzaprine to the stomach. In fact,TONIX discovered that cyclobenzaprine given in a novel SL formulation isabsorbed as well as intravenous cyclobenzaprine. Cyclobenzaprine is the activeingredient in two prescription muscle relaxants that have been approved by theU.S. Food and Drug Administration and are marketed by other companies.

chinese: 以色列2频道电视台在今天采访了一个原本患有重症肌无力而近期又被诊断为“肌萎缩侧索硬化”的患者。该患者说经过姑息性NurOwn细胞（BrainStorm公司研制）治疗后，他的语言、行走、平衡、姿势、肌力、食欲、消化功能都获得明显改善，体重也增加了。
english: Israeli Channel 2 TV interviewed today a patient suffering from Myasthenia Gravis (MG) and recently diagnosed with ALS. The patient reported that he has experienced visible improvement in his speech, walking, balance, posture, muscle strength, appetite, digestion, and weight gain following compassionate treatment with BrainStorm's NurOwn cell therapy.

chinese: 2012年6月29日--美国商务在线--加利福尼亚州雷德伍德市消息-- A.P.制药公司(OTCBB: APPA.OB)是一家专业制药公司，该公司今天公布了APF530临床3期研究的附加数据，APF530用于预防化疗引起的恶心呕吐反应(CINV)。对该研究子系列数据进行的分析发现，在5天的时间内，APF530与帕洛诺司琼(Aloxi)在控制恶心呕吐以及患者满意度方面效果类似。A.P.公司今天将研究结果以海报方式，发表于在纽约召开的癌症支持性护理跨国协会与国际口腔肿瘤协会(MASCC/ISOO)国际座谈会上。根据之前的报道，临床3期研究表明，APF530与帕洛诺司琼在预防患者急性与迟发型CINV方面效果类似，这些患者的治疗方式为适度呕吐型化疗(MEC)或高度呕吐型化疗(HEC)。
english: REDWOOD CITY, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Jun 29, 2012 - A.P. Pharma, Inc. (OTCBB: APPA.OB), a specialty pharmaceutical company, today announced additional data from the Company's Phase 3 study of APF530 for the prevention of chemotherapy-induced nausea and vomiting (CINV). The findings from the analysis of this subset of data indicate that APF530 offered comparable nausea control and patient satisfaction to palonosetron (Aloxi?) over a 5-day period. The Company presented the study results today at a poster presentation during the Multinational Association of Supportive Care in Cancer and the International Society of Oral Oncology (MASCC/ISOO) International Symposium in New York. As previously reported, the Phase 3 study showed APF530 was comparable to palonosetron in preventing both acute- and delayed-onset CINV in patients receiving either moderately emetogenic chemotherapy (MEC) or highly emetogenic chemotherapy (HEC).

chinese: 而后该头又附着于沿该肌动蛋白微丝更远处并又拉一步。
english: Then the head attaches farther along the actin filament and pulls it still another step.

chinese: 这些头运动是靠三磷酸腺苷分解成二磷酸腺苷提供能量的，三磷酸腺苷分解释放出促进肌肉收缩所需要的能量。
english: The movements of these heads are energized by the breakdown of adenosine triphosphate to adenosine diphosphate, which releases the energy required to promote the muscle contraction.

chinese: 此感觉器官包含一些小的钙化颗粒称为耳石，耳石搁在许多很易兴奋的感觉神经末梢(毛细胞)上，这些耳石的重量引起来自毛细胞的某种特殊形式的神经信号，头的每一个位置与重力牵拉毛细胞的关系都产生一种特殊形式的神经信号，因此，前庭器官发出一个人是否处于平衡的信号，而延脑网状结构则利用此信号引起为维持平衡的适宜的肌肉收缩。
english: " This sensory organ contains small calcified granules, the otoliths, that rest on top of many very excitable sensory nerve endings, the hair cells, and the weight of these otoliths causes a specific pattern of nerve signals from the hair cells for each position of the head with respect to the pull of gravity, Thus, the vestibular apparatus signals whether a person is in balance or out of balance, and the bulb reticular formation utilizes this information to contract the appropriate muscles for maintaining equilibrium

chinese: 位于前部的裂孔可以更容易利用冷凝脉络膜视网膜加以封闭;这种冷凝常可透过裂孔所在部位的结膜进行（用尖端温度为－70℃的冷冻头）。
english: Anteriorly placed tears can more readily be sealed by cryocoagulation of the chorioretina; this is usually applied through the conjunctiva over the site of the break (using a probe with a tip temperature of -70℃).

chinese: 糖尿病玻璃体出血常常消散较慢，可能形成机化，在这种情况下可能需玻璃体切除术，即通过玻璃体切割头顶端的小孔吸出玻璃体，切割头通过睫状体平部切口插入眼内，同时通过外套管注入林格液以代替吸出的玻璃体。
english: Diabetic vitreous haemorrhages are often slow to disperse and may become organized; in such cases a vitrectomy may be indicated, aspirating vitreous through a pore at the tip of the vitrectomy probe, which is inserted into the eye through a pars plana incision; meanwhile the aspirated vitreous is replaced by Ringer's solution through an outer sleeve.

chinese: 两侧的循环当然是同时发生的，量也相等，而追踪一定量血液从其流人心脏的一侧直到它又流回到该侧的循环过程较为方便。
english: Both, of course, occur simultaneously and are equal in volume, but it is convenient to trace a given quantity of blood from the time it enters one side of the heart until it returns again to that side.

chinese: 和心脏右侧的情况一样，左心房收缩时将增加的血液射入左心室，心室收缩使左房室瓣关闭并将血液经主动脉送出，位于主动脉根部的主动脉瓣的关闭，阻止血液反流到舒张的左心室。
english: As in the case of the right side of the heart, contraction of the left atrium injects additional blood into the left ventricle, contraction of the ventricle closes the left atrioventricular valve and forces blood out through the aorta, and closure of the aortic valve at the base of the aorta prevents regurgitation of blood into the relaxing left ventricle.

chinese: 随后，血液经主动脉的分支运送到全身的组织中，在那里释出氧，带走二氧化碳，并流回到心脏的右侧，又重新开始其双循环。
english: The blood is then delivered through the branches of the aorta to the tissues of the body, where it loses oxygen, picks up carbon dioxide, and returns to the right side of the heart to begin its double cycle all over again.

chinese: 既然血液在肺和全身组织内不断地循环，心脏的两侧处置的血液要等量这显然是非常重要的。
english: Since the blood is constantly circulating both to the lungs and the tissues of the body, it is obviously very important that both sides of the heart handle the same amount of blood.

chinese: 正常情况下，心脏扩张会产生更强有力的跳动，所以在扩张的某个阶段，心跳通常强得足以恢复循环的平衡(称为“代偿作用”)。
english: Normally, dilation of the heart produces a stronger beat, so at some stage of dilation the beat usually becomes strong enough to restore the balance of circulation (called "compensation").

chinese: 心搏周期是在心脏充盈和排空的一次搏动期间所发生的一系列变化过程。
english: The cardiac cycle is the series of events occurring during one beat of the heart as it fills and empties.

chinese: 鼻癌和鼻窦癌总计低于所有恶性肿瘤的0.1%，约占头、颈癌的3%。
english: Cancer of the nose and sinuses accounts for less than 0.1 per cent of all malignancies and about 3 per cent of all head and neck cancers.

chinese: 患者倾斜其头避开水流是一种自然反射。
english: It is a natural reaction for the patient to tilt his head away from the stream of fluid.

chinese: 较大的婴幼儿可用手搔抓患耳或将头碰撞床边。
english: In older infants the hand may be put to the affected ear or the head may be banged against the side of the cot.

chinese: 询问过去史应包括任何头和颈的外伤史和全面的内科病史。
english: Inquiries into the past history should include a report of any trauma to the head or neck as well as a full medical history.

chinese: 当患者的头放于关键位置时，产生了一种粗大的变化无常的眼震。
english: When the patient's head is put in the critical position a coarse, variable nystagmus is set up.

chinese: 通常指潜伏期及有临床症状的头几天，如甲型肝炎及麻疹所见。
english: This is usually during the incubation period and the first days of the clinical period of disease as seen in hepatitis A and measles.

chinese: 较好的诊断方法是血培养分离出伤寒杆菌，大多数病人在病程头2周内血培养阳性。
english: The preferred method of diagnosis is isolation of S. typhi from a blood culture, which is positive in most patients during the first two weeks of illness.

chinese: 心脏收缩的区段时间称为收缩期，舒张的那段时间称为舒张期。
english: The period of contraction of the heart is systole, that of relaxation, diastole.

chinese: 20世纪50年代发现血清转氨酶和脱氢酶与心脏和肝脏疾病之间的关系，这一发现对寻找血清中存在的可能有诊断价值的其他酶起了推动作用。
english: The discovery in the 1950s of the relationship between the activities of serum aminotransferases and dehydrogenases and heart and liver diseases gave the impetus to search for other enzymes present in serum which could be of diagnostic value.

chinese: 酶监测最有用和使用最普遍的两个例子可能是肝脏和心脏疾病。
english: Perhaps the two examples in which enzyme monitoring has been most useful and widely applied are those of liver and heart diseases.

chinese: 必须强调的是，酶活性测定本身不是可赖以做出诊断的充分证据，而必须与临床症状和其他证据结合起来考虑，例如心脏病要与心电图一起考虑。
english: It must be emphasized that the measurement of enzyme activity itself is not sufficient evidence on which to make a diagnosis but must be taken in conjunction with the clinical symptoms and other types of evidence, e.g. electrocardiographic evidence in the case of heart disease.

chinese: 应激反应与身心疾病、消化性溃疡病和心脏病有关系，并已知它对健康状况和全身感觉产生有害的影响。
english: Stress has been linked to psychosomatic illness, peptic ulcer disease, and heart disease and is known to have a detrimental effect on health and a general sense of well-being.

chinese: 为了解决这个问题，全国情绪应激反应与心脏病会议已提出应激反应的当代定义如下：“是一种明显令人痛苦或有害的作用力，对人的情绪和躯体引起苦恼或紧张。”
english: In an attempt to ameliorate this problem, the National Conference on Emotional Stress and Heart Disease has offered this contemporary definition of stress: "An obviously painful or adverse force which induces distress or strain upon both the emotional and physical make-up."

chinese: 据估计，这些死者中几乎有25％先前无心脏病症状。
english: It is estimated that almost 25 percent of these victims had no prior symptoms of heart disease.

chinese: 布氏杆菌感染头几周IgM为主要凝集抗体。
english: IgM is the major agglutinating antibody formed in the first few weeks following infection with Brucella organisms.

chinese: 病期头4d抗生素治疗有效。
english: Antibiotic therapy seems to be beneficial if it is initiated within the first four days of illness.

chinese: 急性期(4周内)死亡率为30～40％，而主要在头2h内。
english: The immediate mortality (within 4 weeks) is 30—40% chiefly in the first 2h.

chinese: 目前人们认为猝死是心脏电活动异常造成的。
english: Sudden death is now believed to result from aberrant electrical activity in the heart.

chinese: 这种异常电活动导致心律异常，后者又损害心脏的有效工作能力。
english: This activity leads to abnormal heart rhythms that in turn compromise the heart/s ability to pump effectively.

chinese: 心肌细胞的收缩和舒张受到电脉冲精细准确的调控，而这种电脉冲是带电金属微粒或者离子如钠、钾、钙等通过细胞内和细胞间复杂的分子通道而成形的。当这些通道失活或者功能障碍时，不规则的心跳，医学上称为心律失常就会发生。Filip van Petegem 和Christopher Ahern 教授，UBC大学心血管研究小组的成员，通过使用这个同步光源加速回旋器来观察心肌细胞和其他电兴奋细胞如神经细胞，这些控制钠内流的通道的分子结构。
english: The contraction and relaxation of heart muscle cells depend on minute but finely regulated electrical impulses that are created when charged atoms -- or ions -- of metals such as sodium, potassium and calcium pass through complex molecular channels inside and between cells. Irregular heartbeats, referred to medically as arrhythmias, can happen when these channels leak or otherwise malfunction. Professors Filip van Petegem and Christopher Ahern , members of UBC's Cardiovascular Research Group , used the CLS to determine the molecular structure of a part of the channel that controls the flow of sodium to cells in the heart, as well as in other electrically-excitable cells such as in the nervous system.

chinese: 要使用听诊器为患者做出正确的诊断需要良好的听力，才能对杂音和正常的心跳声进行分辨。然而有很多医生和护士的听力水平较差，难以为患者进行听诊，这就严重妨碍了他们基本的筛检能力。
english: Properly diagnosing patients using a stethoscope requires good hearing to discern the murmurs from normal heart sounds. Yet many doctors and nurses suffer from poor hearing, making it difficult to auscultate their patients, seriously hampering their ability to perform a basic screening.

chinese: 可视化操作有助于听诊者分辨出点击声、摩擦声、劈裂声或心跳周期中的杂音部位。
english: Visualization assists the listener in identifying the position of clicks, rubs, knocks, snaps or murmurs in the cardiac cycle.

chinese: 当上述两药一起使用时，这些药物可能引起心电图上的QT和PR间期延长。QT间期延长可能导致一种名为尖端扭转型室性心动过速的心律异常性疾病。PR间期延长则可能导致一种名为心脏传导阻滞的心律异常性疾病。随着尖端扭转型室性心动过速或心脏传导阻滞的发生，患者可能出现头晕、晕厥或心跳异常。在一些病例中，尖端扭转型室性心动过速可能进一步发展为一种名为心室纤维性颤动的致命性心跳失常。
english: When used together, the drugs may cause prolongation of the QT and PR intervals on an electrocardiogram. Prolongation of the QT interval may lead to a condition known as torsades de pointes, an abnormal heart rhythm. Prolongation of the PR interval may also lead to an abnormal heart rhythm known as heart block. With torsades de pointes or with heart block, patients may experience lightheadedness, fainting, or abnormal heart beats. In some cases, torsades de pointes may progress to a life-threatening irregular heart beat known as ventricular fibrillation.

chinese: 由于对器官保护技术更深入理解，Hines医生开始怀疑在心跳停跳后一小时的固定时间窗内一定要进行器官摘取。他推想，将出现一套系统来一直监测潜在的器官捐赠者直到一个固定的生理学信号出现。
english: With greater understanding of organ Preservation techniques, Dr. Hines suspects that the arbitrary 1-hour window in which the heart must stop beating in order for organ procurement to proceed could change to a system in which the potential donor is monitored for as long as stable physiologic signs are present.

chinese: 对于心跳骤停目击者，心脑复苏的第一步是持续的胸外心脏按压，而不需要同时给予口对口或机械通气。
english: The first step of CCR for witnessed cardiac arrest is continuous chest compressions (CCCs) without mouth-to-mouth or mechanical ventilation.

chinese: 脸红的同时可能还会伴有恶心和心跳加快。脸红主要由一种酶的遗传缺陷所致，这种酶叫做ALDH2，大约有三分之一的亚洲人种存在这种缺陷----日本人，中国人及朝鲜人。对于这种人，仅半瓶啤酒就可以引起这种脸红反应。
english: The flushing response, which may be accompanied by nausea and a rapid heartbeat, is caused mainly by an inherited deficiency in an enzyme called ALDH2, a trait shared by more than a third of people of East Asian ancestry — Japanese, Chinese or Koreans. As little as half a bottle of beer can trigger the reaction.

chinese: 但还有其他一些死亡：仓促而罕见，几分钟之内生命就消失不见。在我所在的那家医院，我们把这种死亡称为“A级情况”。“A”表示停止，就像心跳骤停，患者的心脏突然停搏，我们需要尽力恢复其心跳。
english: And then there are the other deaths: quick and rare, where life leaves a body in minutes. In my hospital these deaths are “Condition A's.” The “A” stands for arrest, as in cardiac arrest, as in this patient's heart has all of a sudden stopped beating and we need to try to restart it.

chinese: 切尼先生的心跳节律不稳定。他和英美几千位同样的患者都在皮下装有小装置，这些小装置在心肌纤颤时能电击除颤使心脏恢复正常。
english: Mr Cheney has an erratic heart beat. He and thousands like him in Britain and the US have a little device permanently implanted under the skin to shock the heart back into regular action when it falters.

chinese: 当真的发生了一些事情，孩子们常常感到有趣、奇怪、或者不安，像他们的心跳的非常的快、他们的手感到湿润、感到胃疼、或他们的腿或胳膊感到软弱无力或颤抖。其他时候，孩子们只是感到头里面有种有趣的感觉，几乎就像他们没有真实的存在那里，而像是他们在观看发生在无关的别人身上一样。
english: When something really bad happens, kids often feel funny, strange, or uncomfortable, like their heart is beating really fast, their hands feel sweaty, their stomach hurts, or their legs or arms feel weak or shaky. Other times kids just feel funny inside their heads, almost like they are not really there, but like they are watching bad things happen to someone else.

chinese: 躯体反应可能是常见的体验，即使是在没有躯体伤害或疾病的情况下。这些反应包括：头疼、头晕、胃疼、肌肉痛、心跳加快、胸部紧缩感、过度换气、食欲不振以及肠道问题。
english: Physical Reactions may be commonly experienced, even in the absence of any underlying physical injury or illness. These reactions include: headaches, dizziness, stomachaches, muscle aches, rapid heart beating, tightness in the chest, hyperventilation, loss of appetite, and bowel problems.

chinese: 前瞻性的研究认为：心室颤动的波形的分析明确增加心跳骤停生存率的分析。
english: Prospective clinical studies are highly warranted to demonstrate that ventricular fibrillation waveform analysis definitely improves survival after cardiac arrest.

chinese: 总结：目前的研究对于心室颤动特征的分析是否是人心跳骤停持续时间评估的可靠依据尚存疑惑。
english: Summary: Recent results question the ventricular fibrillation feature analysis as a reliable tool to estimate the duration of human cardiac arrest.

chinese: 目前的研究：在一些回顾性研究中显示，心室颤动信号的特征分析与评价心跳骤停的结局及最初的心电信号间没有显著的联系。结合当时心室颤动的特点和频率的变化范围，其并未增加心室颤动的预测。心脏复率结果的预测主要依据微波技术，能提高特异性至66％（在95％的可信区间）。
english: Recent findings: In a retrospective clinical study, ventricular fibrillation single feature analysis was not able to reliably estimate duration between cardiac arrest onset and initial electrocardiogram. Combining ventricular fibrillation features in the time and frequency domain by employing neural networks did not further improve the best single feature prediction power taken from higher ventricular fibrillation frequency bands. Cardioversion outcome prediction based on the wavelet technique increased the specificity up to 66% at the 95% sensitivity level.

chinese: 综述的目的：心室颤动是很多患者心跳骤停前的心率失常的首要表现。从1980年至今，心室颤动的体表心电图用于分析可能是成功的抗休克治疗及评估心跳骤停的持续时间。在这两年内，相当的努力使预测心肺复苏的措施有了显著的进步。
english: Purpose of review: Ventricular fibrillation is the primary rhythm in many cardiac arrest patients. Since the late 1980s, the surface electrocardiogram of ventricular fibrillation has been subjected to analysis to obtain reliable information about the likelihood of successful countershock and to estimate the duration of cardiac arrest. Considerable efforts were made in the past 2 years to further improve the predictive power of rescue shock measures.

chinese: [/u]【1】修正： Onyx制药公司今天宣布：美国食品药物管理局（FDA）肿瘤药物咨询委员会(ODAC) 以11票赞成、0票反对、1票弃权通过Kyprolis（carfilzomib拟议的品牌名称）的效益风险评估。Kyprolis将用于治疗曾接受至少两种包括蛋白酶抑制剂或免疫调节剂（IMiD）药物治疗的复发性或难治性多发骨髓瘤患者。
english: SouthSan Francisco, CA. —Jun. 20, 2012—[u]Onyx制药公司宣布美国食品药物管理局（FDA）肿瘤药物咨询委员会(ODAC) 以11票赞成、0票反对、1票弃权认为那些先前至少接受两种治疗包括蛋白酶抑制剂或者免疫调节剂(IMiD)的复发性或者难治性多发骨髓瘤患者使用Kyprolis（carfilzomib拟议的品牌名称）的效益风险评估是有益的。Onyx公司正在推动Kyprolis在多发性骨髓瘤中多线治疗中的应用。

chinese: 今天，在Vancouver举办的2012年度阿尔茨海默病协会国际会议（AAIC）上首次报道了静脉用丙种球蛋白(Gammagard,Baxter)对阿尔茨海默病能够产生长期稳定病情的效果。该项研究考核了认知、记忆、日常功能和情绪等方面。
english: The first report of long-term (three-year) stabilization of Alzheimer's disease symptoms with IVIG (Gammagard,Baxter), including no decline on measures of cognition, memory, daily functioning and mood, was reported today at the Alzheimer's Association International Conference 2012 (AAIC 2012) inVancouver.

chinese: 这项研究，今天在温哥华的国际阿尔兹海默协会研讨会上提出，实验组人员包括了71名从WRAP招募来的中年人，其中29人符合代谢综合征的诊断标准，42人不符合。
english: The study, presented today at the Alzheimer's Association International Conference in Vancouver, British Columbia, involved 71 middle-aged people recruited from the Wisconsin Registry for Alzheimer's Prevention (WRAP). Of this group, 29 met the criteria for metabolic syndrome and 42 did not.

chinese: 今天，辉瑞公司宣布了对普瑞巴林胶囊治疗广泛性焦虑症状（GAD）的长期安全性和有效性的研究（A0081147）结果。研究结果显示：通过对GAD病人追踪调查三个月和六个月，逐渐减少普瑞巴林的治疗用量，药物停药后症状会比较少。
english: Pfizer Inc.(NYSE: PFE) announced today that top-line results forLyrica (pregabalin) capsules Study A0081147 – Long Term Safetyand Efficacy of Pregabalin in Subjects with Generalized Anxiety Disorder (GAD)– demonstrate that drug discontinuation symptoms were low after tapering Lyricatreatment following three months and six months in GAD patients.

chinese: 吉利德科技公司(Gilead Sciences, Inc. Nasdaq: GILD)今天公布了一项为期24周的临床3期试验数据，该试验名为SPIRIT(利匹韦林与特鲁瓦达复方单片剂切换给药对PI的促进作用)，旨在对接受病毒抑制治疗的HIV患者从多片剂(含双蛋白酶抑制剂)切换至每日一次、单片给药的Complera疗法(恩曲他滨/利匹韦林/富马酸替诺福韦酯)进行评估。研究达到了24周主要目标并发现，切换到Complera疗法后的疗效并不比继续进行双蛋白酶抑制剂疗法的疗效差。这些发现将于今天在华盛顿特区召开的第19届国际艾滋病会议(AIDS 2012)上，以口头报告(TUAB0104摘要)的形式发表。
english: Gilead Sciences, Inc. (Nasdaq: GILD) today announced 24-week data from a Phase 3 clinical trial, SPIRIT (Switching boosted PI to Rilpivirine In Combination with Truvada as a Single Tablet Regimen), which evaluated virologically suppressed treatment-experienced HIV patients switching from a multi-pill regimen containing a ritonavir-boosted protease inhibitor to the once-daily single tablet regimen Complera (emtricitabine/rilpivirine/tenofovir disoproxil fumarate). The study met its 24-week primary endpoint, which found that switching to Complera was non-inferior to remaining on a ritonavir-boosted protease inhibitor regimen. These findings will be presented today in an oral session (Abstract #TUAB0104) at the 19th International AIDS Conference (AIDS 2012) in Washington, D.C.

chinese: 慢性阻塞性肺病的慢性肺部状况是美国第三大致死和致残原因。该疾病的患者可能会弗吉尼亚联邦大学的医生发表在今天的《新英格兰医学杂志》上的研究中获益良多。这是一项关于慢性阻塞性肺疾病一周三次剂量的抗生素治疗的研究。
english: Patients suffering from the chronic lung condition COPD, which is the third-leading cause of death and disability in the United States, may benefit greatly from a three times a week dose of an antibiotic, according to a study by Virginia Commonwealth University physicians published in today's issue of the New England Journal of Medicine.

chinese: 有人说，“急诊大夫面临的最大难题是他们不能解决一切问题，而不是今天有哪怕300个病人要接诊。
english: One said, "'emergency physicians have a limited ability to focus on anything other than the 300 patients they're going to see today.'"

chinese: 一个综合的临床前期药物研究机构（CRO）——Ricerca Biosciences——今天宣布推出最新的最先进的细胞检测服务：早期安全性筛查细胞毒性和免疫信号？细胞因子风暴细胞分析。
english: RicercaBiosciences, anintegrated preclinical pharmaceutical contract research organization (CRO),today announced the introduction of two new state-of-the-art cellular assayservices: Early Safety Screening Cytotoxicity and ImmunoSIGNAL? Cytokine StormCellular Assay.

chinese: 奥尼克斯制药公司宣布说今天美国血液协会的医学杂志已经发表了003-A1phase 2b 试验的结果，这是一个评估Kyprolis注射治疗     后阶段多发性骨髓瘤单组多中心试验，这些病人都已经接受了平均5个的抗骨髓瘤方案.
english: OnyxPharmaceuticals, Inc.  announced today that Blood, the medicaljournal of the American Society of Hematology, has published results from the003-A1 Phase 2b trial, a single-arm, multicenter clinical trial evaluatingKyprolis (carfilzomib) for Injection for the treatment of patients withadvanced multiple myeloma, who had received a median of five prior anti-myelomaregimens.

chinese: 英国初级卫生保健信托机构（PCT）主席Jonathan Montgomery教授对这一决定进行了解释：“我们仍然认为政策是合法的，明智的，对病人是安全的。然而，今天考虑到这一政策，董事会推测假如诺华提供折扣价，SHIP地区每年在雷珠单抗上的花费可能将显著地减少750万。”
english: Professor Jonathan Montgomery, chairman of the PCT Cluster Board, explained the decision: “We remain of the view that the policy was lawful, sensible and safe for patients. However, in our consideration of the policy today, the Board has concluded that given the discount being offered, it will be possible to reduce significantly the $7.5 million spent annually on Lucentis in the SHIP area.

chinese: NanoViricides，公司（OTCBB：NNVC）（“本公司”）今天宣布，它雇佣澳大利亚生物制品监管事务咨询的Pty有限公司来协调监管审查和批准在澳大利亚进行广谱抗流感药物Flucide的第一批人体试验。澳大利亚的生物制剂也将促进临床试验网站（S）的选择和临床试验协议的发展。
english: NanoViricides,Inc. (OTC BB: NNVC) (the "Company") announced today that it hasretained Australian Biologics Pty. Ltd., a regulatory affairs consulting firm,to coordinate the regulatory review and approval to conduct the first humantrials in Australia for Flucide?, the Company's broad-spectrum anti-influenzadrug. Australian Biologics will also facilitate clinical trial site(s)selection and development of the clinical trials agreements.

chinese: Rajesh Malik博士（首席药物执行和董事会管理委员）说：“我们对于今天的结果非常的失望和惊讶，特别是我们当初在看到非小细胞肺癌(NSCLC)患者talactoferrin alfa 肿瘤药物的II期双盲随机临床试验的结果后对现在的结果充满期待满。我们计划深入的分析数据来更好的理解目前的结果。我们可能会考虑所有参与到其中的患者和研究员。我们希望该研究的结果可以帮助了解该领域更多科学上的认识，正如对于进展期的非小细胞肺癌(NSCLC)患者有强烈的愿望想要了解新的治疗方法。
english: Rajesh Malik, M.D., Chief Medical Officer and Memberof the Management Board, said: "We are extremely disappointed andsurprised with today's results, especially considering the earlier promisingresults we had seen in two randomized Phase II trialswith talactoferrin alfa in non-small cell lung cancer.We plan to thoroughly analyze the data to better understand these results. Wewould like to thank all of the patients and investigators who participated inthis clinical trial. We hope that the results of this study will help toadvance scientific knowledge in this area, as there is an urgent need for newtreatment options for patients with advanced non-small cell lung cancer."

chinese: 显然，这些病人中有些有潜在性心脏病，但很多人并无这样的病。
english: It is also apparent that although some of these patients have underlying heart disease, many do not.

chinese: 这项今天发表在美国心脏协会科学会议2012年基础心血管科学会议《科学研讨》上的研究，共纳入了年龄7至20岁的29名患者，平均年龄14岁。如Malloy所说，房室结折返性心动过速通常使用以解剖为基础的定位系统，在右房间隔部的Koch三角区描记到心内电图。但由于少见旁路的存在和患者解剖学的变异，以解剖为基础的定位有时存在困难。
english: The study, which was presented today at the American Heart Association Basic Cardiovascular Sciences 2012 Scientific Sessions, included 29 patients ranging from seven to 20 years old, average age 14 years. As Malloy noted, ablation of AVNRT is typically guided by anatomical mapping and electrogram morphology within the triangle of Koch, an area on the septal wall of the right atrium. However, anatomical approaches can be difficult because of the unusual pathway location and variations in the patient's anatomy.

chinese: 2012年8月7日 Achillion制药公司今天宣布，正在进行多剂量的第2阶段试验用以评价使用sovaprevir（既往名为ACH-1625，为每天使用一次的蛋白酶抑制剂）同时联合聚乙二醇干扰素与利巴韦林（P / R）治疗12周，接着追加P / R治疗12周，结果持续病毒应答（SVR 4）为85％至100％。此外，该公司今天宣布：ACH-3102为第二代的泛基因型NS5A的抑制剂，它在健康志愿者中单独使用组和14天多剂量递增组均是安全的且耐受性良好。此外，第一阶段概念证明型临床试验的患者招募已经开始，用以评估在基因1型丙型肝炎病毒患者中ACH-3102的安全性和有效性。
english: on Aug. 7, 2012，Achillion Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (Nasdaq:ACHN) today announced sustained viral response (SVR4) results of 85 to 100 percent from an ongoing multi-dose Phase 2 trial evaluating 12 weeks of dosing with sovaprevir (formerly ACH-1625), a once-daily protease inhibitor, in combination with pegylated interferon plus ribavirin (P/R) followed by an additional 12 weeks of P/R. In addition, the Company announced today that ACH-3102, a second-generation pan-genotypic NS5A inhibitor, has been safe and well tolerated by healthy volunteers in both single and 14-day multiple ascending dose groups. Further, enrollment of patients in a Phase 1 proof-of-concept clinical trial to evaluate the safety and efficacy of ACH-3102 in patients with genotype 1 HCV has been initiated.

chinese: 无论是否有潜在性心脏病，处于应激反应状态的个体都有潜在生命危险。
english: Whether or not there is underlying heart disease, individuals under stress are potentially at risk.

chinese: 当然在心脏病方面，A型行为型似乎与应激反应的不利效应有关。
english: Certainly, in heart disease, the behavior patterns known as type A seem to be related to adverse effects of stress.

chinese: 在上周进行的一次历史性手术中，犹他大学医学中心的外科医师们将一颗完全人工心脏移植到人体内，以永久替代病人自身的心脏。
english: In a history-making operation carried out last week, surgeons at the University of Utah Medical Center implanted a completely artificial heart inside a human being, as a permanent replacement for the patient's own heart.
