chinese: 这颗人工心脏的接受者叫Barnev Clark，是西雅图的61岁退休牙科医师，据报导他在手术后情况良好，这次移植手术因Clark健康状况恶化而提前几小时施行的。
english: The recipient, Barney Clark, a 61-year-old retired dentist from Seattle, was reported in good condition after the operation, which was brought forward by a few hours because of Clark's deteriorating health.

chinese: 外科医师们认为，如果Clark不移植人工心脏，在手术那天可能已经死去。
english: Had Clark not received the artificial heart, surgeons believed he would probably have died on the day of the operation.

chinese: 这次划时代的手术是在病人中进行首次人体心脏移植15周年纪念日的前一天施行的，标志着医学技术的一大成就。
english: The epochal operation, falling one day short of the 15th anniversary of the first heart transplant in a human patient, represents a triumph of medical technology.

chinese: 由犹他大学医学中心外科组Robert Jarvik博士研制的新人工心脏，体积比人的心脏大些，但重量几乎相等。
english: The new heart developed by Dr Robert Jarvik of the Utah team, is rather larger than a human heart, but weighs about the same.

chinese: 它用聚氨基甲酸乙酯和铝模制而成，动力由一个空气压缩机提供，用6英尺长管子把压缩机与人工心脏连结起来。
english: Made of moulded polyurethane and aluminium it is powered by an air compressor, to which it is attached through six-foot long tubes.

chinese: 兰伯西实验室今天推出了该公司版本的爱妥糖，并开始了长达180天的市场专营权期。但这种专营权并不完全，Mylan (MYL)同样享有这些权利。相对于专利药价格来说，这两份大餐可能意味着更大的折扣，因而对于武田公司的爱妥糖收入来说，这也意味着更大的威胁。
english: Ranbaxy Laboratories rolled out its version of Actos today, beginning its 180days of exclusivity on the market. It's not completely exclusive; Mylan (MYL)shares those rights. Their dual entree may spell a bigger discount against thebranded price--and therefore, a bigger threat to Takeda's Actos revenue.

chinese: Jarvik于1972年开始人工心脏的研制工作，用它在动物身上做实验。
english: Jarvik started work on the artificial heart in 1972, using it experimentally in animals.

chinese: 该装置在设计上经过5次重大改动，才成为上周移植到Clark身上的那颗人工心脏的样子。
english: The device went through five major changes in design before taking the form that was implanted in Clark last week.

chinese: 与缺血性心脏病相当不同并且少见得多，缺血性心脏病是因供血动脉堵塞使心脏缺少营养而发生的疾病。
english: It is quite distinct from, and much less common than ischemic heart disease, where the heart becomes starved of food because of blockages in the arteries that serve it.

chinese: 在美国几乎所有的心脏移植都是斯坦福大学医学中心外科组施行的，但他们拒绝给50岁以上的病人做手术。
english: The Stanford University Medical Center team which performs essentially all heart transplants in the US refuses to operate on patients over the age of 50.

chinese: 于是Clark面临的选择只有人工心脏移植或者很快死去。
english: Thus Clark's choice was effectively the artificial heart or a rapid death.

chinese: 这次手术并不是第一次在人体内植入人工心脏。
english: The operation was not the first in which an artificial heart was implanted in a human.

chinese: 大多数的效果反映在抗凝的头6个月内，为此，有些医生主张对年青的病人进行6个月抗凝治疗。
english: Most of the advantage occurred in the first 6 months and some physicians would give anticoagulants for this period of time in young men.

chinese: X线检查头及下颌可以见到继发性甲状旁腺机能亢进的表现。
english: X-ray of head and jaw may show evidence of secondary hyperparathyroidism.

chinese: 糖尿病性肌萎缩：通常发生于中年患者，病人的股四头肌出现疼痛性的不对称的肌无力和萎缩。
english: Diabetic amyotrophy: This usually occurs in middle-aged diabetics who develop painful, asymmetrical weakness and wasting of the quadriceps muscles.

chinese: 急性发作消退后14天开始用别嘌醇，但在头3个月内还应继续同时应用非类固醇抗炎药物治疗或秋水仙碱0．5mg bid。
english: Allopurinol may be started a fortnight after the acute attack has subsided but must be covered by continuation of NSAID therapy or colchicinc 0.5 mg bd for the first 3 months.

chinese: 脑神经在脑、头及颈中传送刺激。
english: The cranial nerves carry impulses between the brain and the head and neck.

chinese: 如果痫性发作的特征总是头和眼睛偏向一侧，或躯干和头的转动在同一侧，这说明损伤在对侧半脑区，往往在前叶或颞叶。
english: If the onset of the seizures is always characterized by head and eye deviation to one side or rotation of the trunk and head to the same side, this indicates a lesion in the opposite hemisphere, usually in the frontal or temporal lobe.

chinese: 将双手放在下腹部骨盆入口，可识别头部，因头比臀较圆且较硬，其活动度取决于与骨盆入口的关系。
english: This is done by placing both hands on the lower abdomen above the pelvic brim; the head is recognized because it is rounder and harder than the breech; its mobility will depend upon its relation to the pelvic brim.

chinese: 研究人员鼓励实验参与者把每周的运动分散到五天以上完成，每次至少10分钟。研究人员为他们提供跑步机供她们在家使用并教她们检测自己的心跳。
english: Participants were encouraged to spread the exercise out over five days during a week, done in at least 10-minute chunks. The women were given treadmills to use at home and taught to monitor their own heart rates.

chinese: 对于真正的心跳停搏，事实上无药可救，因为完全没有可用以刺激的心跳节律。医生试了所有办法。他们用了很多药，以致急救车都被清空了，有人从药房跑进跑出拿来其他的药。
english: The sad truth about a true cardiac arrest is that drugs cannot help because there is no cardiac rhythm for them to stimulate. The doctors tried anyway. They went through so many drugs that the crash cart was emptied out and runners came and went from pharmacy bringing extras.

chinese: 他们通过静脉为病人补充体液，把一盒一盒的肾上腺素挤进静脉内，试图使她恢复心跳。他们甚至给予腺苷（一种危险的强效药物，通过暂时性阻断病人心跳，来逆转不正常心律）。
english: They gave her fluids and squeezed bags  of epinephrine into her veins to try to get her heart to start moving. They may even have given her adenosine, a dangerous and terrifying  drug that can reverse abnormal heart rhythms after briefly stopping the patient's heart.

chinese: 呼吸机接替了CPR，我靠在墙上，满身血污，难以置信。我的同事全权处理了急救过程中的所有琐碎事情：在病人的静脉输液泵另开一条液路、记录病人状况、时不时的喊道，“心脏再次停搏，”意味着她心跳停止。
english: Respiratory took over the CPR and I stood back against the wall, bloody and disbelieving. My co-workers did all the grunt work for the condition: put extra channels  on her IV pump, recorded what was happening, and every now and again called out, “Patient is in asystole again,” meaning she had no heartbeat.

chinese: 研究者们使用的数据来源于长QT综合征登记处，来探讨3287位具有QT间期大于450ms的长QT综合征患者，他们与使用吸入性β2-受体激动剂后晕厥、流产的心跳骤停、猝死的危险性。
english: The researchers used data from the International Long QT Syndrome Registry to examine the risk of syncope, aborted cardiac arrest, or sudden death associated with inhaled bronchodilator therapy for asthma in 3287 patients with a QTc of at least 450 ms.

chinese: 如果头完全在骨盆入口上方，可自由移动，称为头浮，检查者两手手指可在其下方相遇；如果最大直径已入盆或通过了入口平面，头通常是固定的，称之为入盆; 如果头下降入盆腔深部，除非用指尖，否则可能难于触及胎头。
english: If it is completely above the brim it is freely movable and is spoken of as a 'floating head', and the fingers of both hands can be made to meet below it; if the widest diameter has entered or passed through the brim the head is usually fixed and is said to be engaged in the brim; if the head is deeply sunk in the pelvic cavity it may be difficult to feel it except with the finger tips.

chinese: 头完全活动是5/5，开始入盆为4/5，大部分入盆为3/5.
english: A head that is completely free is described as 5/5; one that is beginning to enter the brim as 4/5, and one that has a major part in the brim as 3/5.

chinese: 胎头最大径进入骨盆为2/5，头已入骨盆深部为1/5。
english: Once the widest diameter has passed the brim the notation 2/5 is used, and for a head deeply engaged in the pelvis 1/5.

chinese: 如头在骨盆入口以上，用一手抓握可能更易感觉到，但这种方法对于头已较低者无用。
english: If the head is above the brim of the pelvis it may be felt more easily by the single-handed grip, but this method is of no use if the head is lower down.

chinese: 如果胎臀占据宫底，将触及一宽块状物，不如头圆及硬，臀连接着胎背，足或膝可在附近触及，并可在手下移动。
english: If the breech occupies the fundus a broad mass will be felt, not so round or hard as the head; the breech is continuous with the fetal back, and a foot or knee can often be felt near it, and may move under the hand.

chinese: 如果头占据宫底，则可触及一较臀更硬、更圆、更光滑、更活动的块状物。
english: If the head occupies the fundus it is felt as a harder, rounder, smoother and more mobile mass than the breech.

chinese: 头不依赖于身体而活动，有时可在两手之间冲击。
english: The head can be moved independently of the body, and it can sometimes be balloted between the two hands.

chinese: 宫底内为头所占据时，通常较为臀所占据时窄些。
english: The fundus of the uterus is usually narrower when it contains the head than when it contains the breech.

chinese: 美国两位心血管方面专家研究发现，胆固醇可以影响产生心跳的电解质的流动。研究小组日前在国家科学学院院刊上发表这项导致心律失常的重要原因的文章。
english: Cholesterol can affect the flow of the electrical currents that generate the heart beat, according to a study by two UBC cardiovascular researchers funded by the Heart and Stroke Foundation of BC & Yukon. The research team has just published the important discovery about the causes of cardiac arrhythmias (abnormal heartbeats) in the Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences.

chinese: 据塔拉哈西的佛罗里达州大学研究人员称，当你感到心跳加速，手掌发汗或者头晕目眩时，你已受到了惊吓，即便原因如压力、运动或咖啡因之平常，也很可能会发展为焦虑或惊恐症。
english: People who get scared when they experience a pounding heart, sweaty palms or dizziness -- even if the cause is something as mundane as stress, exercise or caffeine -- are more likely to develop a clinical case of anxiety or panic disorder, according to a Florida State University researcher in Tallahassee, Fla.

chinese: Hurata告诉美国心脏协会参会人员说，虽然本研究的病人数目较少，但是在进一步的研究中会增大机器的应用和病人的例数。总而言之，256层CT很有前途的下一代冠脉和心脏成像技术，能够在一次心跳中完成全心成像。
english: Kurata told AHA meeting attendees that while the "number of patients in this study is very small, I hope that 256 CT can expand and study this patient population in the future. In conclusion, 256 CT seems to be a promising, next-generation (technology) for coronary and cardiac imaging, allowing one-beat, whole-heart imaging."

chinese: “对一些危重患者，尼古丁戒断症状的持续发展能使预后恶化。因此，对ICU的主动吸烟者给予尼古丁替代疗法，”来自梅奥临床医学院的首要研究者Amy Lee博士说“尼古丁的血液动力学效应能导致心跳加快、全身动脉血压升高和冠状动脉收缩。尽管这些潜在的不利因素并没有使健康志愿者和患有稳定性冠状动脉疾病的病人的预后恶化，但可能对患严重疾病的病人有害。
english: "In some critically ill patients, the development of nicotine withdrawal symptoms can worsen their prognosis. As a result, NRT is given to active smokers in the ICU to prevent nicotine withdrawal symptoms," said lead researcher Amy Lee, MD, Mayo Clinic College of Medicine, Minneapolis, MN. "The hemodynamic effects of nicotine may lead to increased heart rate, systemic arterial blood pressure, and constriction of the coronary arteries. Although these potential adverse effects of NRT have not been shown to worsen the prognosis of healthy volunteers and patients with stable coronary artery disease, they may be detrimental in critically ill patients."

chinese: 专家们宣称，当有人突发心跳骤停时，旁人不要采用口对口呼吸来将空气注入患者口中。这一点现在已经成为心肺复苏的关键点。
english: Forget mouth-to-mouth resuscitation. When somebody collapses in cardiac arrest, experts now say, bystanders should not bother breathing into his or her mouth, once considered a key component of cardio-pulmonary resuscitation.

chinese: 在紧急状态下或急症时，如患者心跳骤停，气道管理极为重要，但气管插管仍有极少的禁忌症。直接喉镜下气管插管对已行部分气管切除的患者相对禁忌，因为气管插管步骤导致气管全部横断及气道损伤。
english: In urgent situations or emergencies, such as when a patient is in cardiac arrest,airway management is of paramount importance, and there are very few contraindications to orotracheal intubation. Orotracheal intubation by direct laryngoscopy is somewhat contraindicated in a patient with partial transection of the trachea, because the procedure can cause complete tracheal transection and loss of the airway.

chinese: 结论：NHB供体可扩大尸体肾的来源。尽管无心跳尸体供体的肾移植早期不良事件发生率较高，但远期效果并不比有心跳尸体供体肾移植差。
english: CONCLUSION.: NHB donors carry the potential of expanding the cadaveric kidney pool. Although, transplants from NHB donors are associated with a greater incidence of early adverse events, long-term outcomes appear comparable with those of transplants from HB donors.

chinese: 方法：我们检索了1992年到2005年间对无心跳和有心跳尸体供体肾移植进行比较的相关文献。
english: METHODS.: A literature search was performed for studies comparing kidney transplants from NHB vs. HB cadaveric donors between 1992 and 2005.

chinese: 背景：本研究的目的是为了用荟萃分析方法来评估无心跳（NHB）和有心跳（HB）尸体供体肾移植的移植效果。
english: BACKGROUND.: This study aimed to assess outcomes of kidney transplants from nonheart-beating (NHB) compared with heart-beating (HB) cadaveric donors with meta-analytical techniques.

chinese: 在两项安慰剂对照试验中，Exforge使高达十分之九的患者达到了舒张压低于90 mmHg或舒张压从基线水平下降10 mmHg的治疗目标。舒张压是指心脏在两次心跳之间处于休息时所测量的汞柱厘米高度。
english: In two placebo-controlled trials, Exforge helped up to nine out of ten patients reach their treatment goal of diastolic blood pressure under 90 mmHg, or more than a 10 mmHg reduction in diastolic blood pressure from baseline levels(5). Diastolic blood pressure is measured in millimeters of mercury (mmHg) when the heart is at rest between beats.

chinese: 得克萨斯州的外科医师Denton Cooley博士在未得到食物与药品管理局批准的情况下，曾2次在等待心脏移植的病人中短期植入了人工心脏。
english: Texas surgeon, Dr Denton Cooley twice placed artificial hearts for short periods in patients awaiting heart transplants, without the approval of the FDA.

chinese: 上周的手术其独特之处在于：它是第一次植入一颗永久性人工心脏，以替代人的心脏。
english: What was unique about last week's procedure was that it was the first implantation of a permanent artificial replacement for a human heart.

chinese: 然而，当Clark病情开始迅速恶化，双腿、腹内和肺出现积液，心脏出现危险的心律不齐时，他们将手术提前到凌晨零点30分。
english: However they moved it forward to 12.30 am when Clark's condition began to deteriorate rapidly, with fluid accumulating in his legs, abdomen and lungs, and his heart undergoing dangerously irregular rhythms.

chinese: 手术中，医生们切除了左右心室——即Clark心脏下部的两腔，用上部的两腔即左右心房作为价值16，450美元的人工心脏的固定物。
english: In the operation, surgeons removed the left and right ventricles - the two bottom chambers of Clark's heart, and used the upper chambers, the left and right atria as anchors for the $16,450 artificial heart.

chinese: 犹他大学外科组认为，在最好情况下几周后他能出院，住在盐湖城专门设计的房子里，他将仍然连着为人工心脏供能的压缩机。
english: In the best possible circumstances, the Utah group said, he will be able to leave hospital in a few weeks, to live in a specially-designed house in Salt Lake City, in which he will remain attached to the compressor that powers his heart.

chinese: 只有两个外科组在A1心脏研究方面做出了显著的努力——犹他大学外科组和在休斯敦的另一组。
english: Only two groups have put a significant effort into artificial heart research--the Utah group and another in Houston.

chinese: 英国研究者同世界其他地方的研究者一样，正在研究人体心脏移植。
english: British researchers, like those in the rest of the world are concentrating on human heart transplants.

chinese: 在接下来的几周里，FDA随后将发布几个重要药品的一系列决定。TheStreet's网站今天的综合报道包含了linaclotide 的PDUFA日期（9月7号），Gilead's (GILD)公司HIV combo检测产品Quadde的日期（8月27号），Pfizer (PFE)公司治疗类风湿性关节炎的新药tofacitinib（未确定8月的具体日期），以及Sanofi(SNY)公司密切关注的治疗多发性硬化症新药Aubagio（目前此药由Genzyme公司特许经营）。
english: Over the next few weeks the FDA is slated to deliver a series of decisions on key drugs. TheStreet's roundup today includes the linaclotide PDUFA date of September 7, along with Gilead's (GILD) Aug. 27 date for its HIV combo Quad, Pfizer's (PFE) unspecified August timetable for tofacitinib for rheumatoid arthritis and Sanofi's (SNY) closely-watched Aubagio for multiple sclerosis, which is in Genzyme's hands as keeper of the MS franchise.

chinese: 血液学杂志《血液》今天全文发表了一篇描述symphogen公司产品rozrolimupab最终的2阶段数据的文章。Rozrolimupab是一种新的25种人类重组抗体混合物，而且，这些抗体都同时产自于一个批次。这些数据证实了rozrolimupab在用于原发性免疫性血小板减少性紫癜（ITP）患者治疗时令人称道的安全性及其诱导的血小板计数的迅速增加。波兰罗兹大学的医学博士Tadeusz Robak教授是这篇题为“rozrolimupab，一个25种重组人单克隆RhD抗体混合物在治疗原发性免疫性血小板减少症中的作用”的文章的第一作者，该文已在初版的《血液》杂志上发表，并可以在《血液》杂志的在线版版上阅读。网址为：athttp://bloodjournal.hematologylibrary.org/content/early/recent。
english: The hematology journal BLOOD published today a full-length article describing final Phase 2 data for Symphogen's rozrolimupab, a novel human recombinant mixture of 25 antibodies which all are manufactured simultaneously from a single batch. The data demonstrates rozrolimupab's favorable safety profile and its induction of a rapid increase in platelet counts in patients with Primary Immune Thrombocytopenia Purpura (ITP). Professor Tadeusz Robak, MD, University of Lodz, Poland, is the first author of the article entitled “Rozrolimupab, A Mixture of 25 Recombinant Human Monoclonal Antibodies, in the treatment of Primary Immune Thrombocytopenia” which has been prepublished in First Edition of Blood and can be viewed on Blood Online athttp://bloodjournal.hematologylibrary.org/content/early/recent.

chinese: Sebelius说，之前有49个州、加利福尼亚行政区和四个地区收到资助，开始计划他们的交换系统，而今天有34个州和加利福尼亚行政区收到机构资助奖励，开始建立他们的交换系统。
english: Previously, 49 states, the District of Columbia and four territories received grants to begin planning their exchanges, Sebelius said. With today's awardees, 34 states and the District of Columbia have also received establishment grants to begin building their exchanges.

chinese: 英国心脏基金会的一位发言人说，人工心脏的最大绊脚石不全是制造心脏装置，而是找到一种有效的供能方式。
english: A spokesman from the British Heart Foundation said that the biggest stumbling block with artificial hearts is not so much making the device, but in finding an efficient means of powering it.

chinese: 比如核动力心脏，如果没有辐射问题的话，则是很理想的。
english: A nuclear-powered heart, for example, would be ideal were it not for the radiation.

chinese: 1972—1974年期问，加利福尼亚州南部一个划定地理位置的白人中产阶级社团中所有成年居民的82％参加了一项心脏病危险因素的调查，这是脂类研究诊所流行病学研究的一部分。
english: Between 1972 and 1974, 82% of all adult residents of a geographically defined, upper middle class, Caucasian Southern California community participated in a survey for heart disease risk factors as part of a Lipid Research Clinic prevalence study (14).

chinese: 对肌肉能量代谢和心脏有保护作用的药物制剂
english: Pharmaceutical preparations with protective action on muscle energy metabolism and on the heart.

chinese: 心脏收缩和平滑肌收缩就不是被意识所控制的。
english: Contractions of the heart and smooth muscles are not under conscious control.

chinese: 心血管系统是循环系统的组成之一；心血管系统包括心脏、血管及血液。
english: It is made up of the heart, blood vessels, and blood, which together make up the cardiovascular system.

chinese: 心脏是一块被分为几乎对等两半的肌肉：一半吸收来自肺部的血液，并将血液运送到机体的其余部位，另一半使流经全身的血液回流入肺。
english: The heart is a muscle that is divided into two nearly identical halves: one half receives blood from the lungs and sends it to the rest of the body, the other half sends blood that has traveled through the body back to the lungs.

chinese: 心脏收缩时，动脉把全身血液输送到毛细血管。
english: When the heart muscle contracts, the blood is forced out into arteries and enters small capillaries.

chinese: 罗氏巴塞尔公司总部宣布今天早晨已经在其下属分公司Ventana 医药公司签署了一个协议，将会完全获得私营的BioImagene公司，这个交易期望能在未来几周内完成。
english: The Basel-headquartered group announced this morning that is has signed an agreement under which Ventana Medical Systems, a member of the Roche Group, will acquire 100% of privately-held BioImagine, and that the deal is expected to close “in the coming weeks”.

chinese: 华尔街日报今天报道说，世卫组织常被引用的关于假药的统计数据-占全球市场的10%-可能被夸大了。
english: The Wall Street Journal today reports that commonly cited WHO stats on fake drugs--that they make up 10 percent of the global market--are probably quite inflated.

chinese: 辉瑞公司今天宣布将主动从美国市场撤回治疗急性淋巴细胞白血病的药物Mylotarg（吉姆单抗奥唑米星）。该公司是在FDA的要求下进行这一行动的，因为最近的一项临床研究发现，这种药物存在新的安全性隐患，并且对于纳入的病人来讲并没有显示出增加疗效的证据。
english: Pfizer Inc. today announced the voluntary withdrawal from the U.S. market of the drug Mylotarg (gemtuzumab ozogamicin) for patients with acute myeloid leukemia (AML), a bone marrow cancer. The company took the action at the request of the U.S. Food and Drug Administration after results from a recent clinical trial raised new concerns about the product's safety and the drug failed to demonstrate clinical benefit to patients enrolled in trials.

chinese: 该报告今天被发布在位于华盛顿的美国医学研究院网站上，美国医学研究院是一个非营利性组织，负责为美国政策制定者和公众出谋划策。
english: The report was posted today on the Web site of the Washington-based Institute of Medicine, an independent, non- profit group that advises U.S. policy makers and the public.

chinese: 说起今天发表在《Human Molecular Genetics》的这些发现，共同研究者Christiana Ruhrberg博士解释道：“我们发现一个神经缆生长必须的分子，其传输从鼻子到脑的气味和外激素信号，对负责输送其他产生性激素GnRH的神经细胞的途径发育也至关重要。我们发现具有分子SEMA3A遗传缺陷的鼠，这些途径不能通往脑，取而代之地在脑外形成不能穿过的缠结区域。这意味着产生GnRH的神经细胞不能到达他们最后的目的地，而卡在鼻子或前额。
english: Speaking about the findings, published today (29 November) in Human Molecular Genetics, co-investigator Dr Christiana Ruhrberg explains: "We discovered that a molecule essential for the growth of the nerve cables that transmit odour and pheromone signals from the nose to the brain is also crucial in the development of the highways responsible for transporting other nerve cells that make the sex hormone GnRH. We found that in mice with an inherited deficiency in the molecule SEMA3A, these highways did not lead to the brain, but instead formed impenetrable tangles outside the brain. This means that the nerve cells making GnRH are unable to get to their final destination and instead become stuck in the nose or forehead."

chinese: 据美国物理学家组织网5月16日（北京时间）报道，美国科学家鉴别并合成出一类新化合物，能有力地、有选择地阻止很多丝氨酸水解酶的活动，因此，在基础研究和药物研发领域具有重要用途，相关研究发表在今天出版的《自然·化学生物学》杂志上。
english: Serine hydrolases are a diverse enzyme class representing ～1% of all human proteins. The biological functions of most serine hydrolases remain poorly characterized owing to a lack of selective inhibitors to probe their activity in living systems. Here we show that a substantial number of serine hydrolases can be irreversibly inactivated by 1,2,3-triazole ureas, which show negligible cross-reactivity with other protein classes. Rapid lead optimization by click chemistry–enabled synthesis and competitive activity-based profiling identified 1,2,3-triazole ureas that selectively inhibit enzymes from diverse branches of the serine hydrolase class, including peptidases (acyl-peptide hydrolase, or APEH), lipases (platelet-activating factor acetylhydrolase-2, or PAFAH2) and uncharacterized hydrolases (α,β-hydrolase-11, or ABHD11), with exceptional potency in cells (sub-nanomolar) and mice (<1 mg kg?1). We show that APEH inhibition leads to accumulation of N-acetylated proteins and promotes

chinese: 他们也建议一些可能的医学应用。今天，医生使用激光在体内成像和辐射细胞治病。Yun认为激光可以在体内产生和放大，这样能够在组织中穿透更深。
english: The researchers also suggest possible medical applications. Doctors today shine lasers into the body to gather images or to treat disease by attacking cells. Yun thinks that lasers could instead be generated or amplified inside the body, where they could penetrate the relevant tissues more deeply.

chinese: 所推荐的新的阿尔茨海默病指南今天由阿尔茨海默病协会主办杂志Alzheimer’s  Dementia在线出版。纸质版已安排在此杂志的2011年的5月份出版。
english: The proposed new Alzheimer's disease diagnostic guidelines were published online today by Alzheimer's  Dementia: The Journal of the Alzheimer's Association. Hard copy publication is scheduled for the May 2011 issue of the journal.

chinese: 今天美国FDA宣布了对大剂量使用辛伐他汀的新限制，因为其有导致肌痛和疲乏（肌病），在罕见病例中，导致肾功损害和肾功能衰竭的风险增加。
english: The United States Food and Drug Administration (FDA) today announced new limitations to the use of high-dose simvastatin, due to the increased risk of muscle pain and weakness (myopathy) and in rare cases, kidney damage and failure.

chinese: 今天Nature发表的一项研究指出，抑癌基因BCA1编码的蛋白可能通过阻止一种DNA重复序列的转录控制乳腺癌和卵巢癌。这一新的解释把以往关于BCA1作用机制各不相干的理论整合到一起，对其他肿瘤抑制因子作用机制的了解可能带来帮助。
english: The protein encoded by the tumour-suppressor gene BRCA1 may keep breast and ovarian cancer in check by preventing transcription of repetitive DNA sequences, says a study published today in Nature. This explanation brings together many disparate theories about how the gene functions and could also shed light on how other tumour suppressors work.

chinese: Ashok Venkitaraman表示，今天发表的这项研究可能为我们提供关于BRCA1统一生物学功能方面的暗示，它在肿瘤抑制因子作用中将处于核心位置。
english: The study published today "may provide an inkling of a unifying biological function of BRCA1, which could be at the heart of its tumour suppressor role", says Ashok Venkitaraman, a cancer biologist at the Hutchison-MRC Research Centre in Cambridge, UK, who was not involved in the study.

chinese: 盐或高钠盐摄入的饮食已经引起关注一段时间了。今天美国食品和药物管理局举办了为期一天的听证会,讨论策略以帮助美国人减少饮食中的盐以作为一个最新的尝试抑制美国人的饮食中的钠。
english: Salt or high sodium intake in diet has drawn attention of researchers for a while now. The U.S. Food and Drug Administration held a day-long hearing today, discussing strategies to help Americans cut the salt from their diets as a latest attempt to curb sodium in the American diet.

chinese: 如果胎儿为斜位，头常在一侧髂窝触及，在对侧上方可触及臀。
english: If the fetus is lying obliquely the head is often felt in one iliac fossa, and the breech higher up on the opposite side.

chinese: 另一方法为抬起患者的头部及肩部，让其将躯体重量置于手或肘部，头常能入盆。
english: Another method is to raise the patient's head and shoulders asking her to take the weight of her trunk on her hands or elbows, when the head will often enter the brim.

chinese: 头及臀先露时，胎心音在胎背处听得最清楚, 只有在面先露时可在胎儿心脏处听到。
english: They are best heard over the back of the fetus in vertex and breech presentations; only in face presentations are they usually heard over the heart.

chinese: 宫颈扩张l cm，颈管未消失，头浮。
english: Her cervix is 1-cm dilated, un-effaced with a floating cephalic presentation.

chinese: 若无胎儿窘迫征象，先露为头，可考虑试产。
english: With no evidence of fetal distress and a cephalic presentation a trial of labor is indicated.

chinese: 单个胚芽区分裂不完全时，可能形成某种联体双胎；据报道有许多种类型，他们可能胸骨、骨盆或头相连接，联体的程度从皮肤和软组织的融合到形成头、躯干、内脏、一套或两套肢体相连的怪胎。
english: When the process of division of a single germinal area is incomplete some form of conjoined twins may occur, Many varieties have been described; they may be joined by the sternum, the pelvis or the head, and the degree of union varies from fusion of skin and soft tissues to formation of a double monster in which head, trunk, viscera or limbs may be shared or duplicated.

chinese: 约45％的病例两个胎儿均为头先露；约35％的病例为一头一臀；约10％的病例一个为横位，另一为头位、臀位或横位。
english: In about 45 per cent of cases both twins present by the head; in about 35 per cent one fetus presents by the head and the other by the breech; in about 10 per cent both present by the breech; and in about 10 per cent of cases a transverse lie is associated with a vertex presentation, a breech or a second transverse lie.

chinese: 如是斜或横产式，可立即行外倒转术，使胎儿的头或臀在宫颈上方。
english: If it is oblique or transverse external version is immediately performed to bring one pole of the fetus over the cervix.

chinese: 不管是头或臀先露，按平常方法接生。
english: Delivery is conducted in the ordinary way, whether: the head or the breech comes first.

chinese: 过度成熟儿的颅骨骨化明显，故儿头不易塑型。
english: The skull of the postmature fetus is more ossified, so that moulding is less easy.

chinese: 胎儿小于孕龄但其头腹比例适当，通常是由先天性感染和先天性畸形引起的，称为“低指数”生长模式。
english: The infant who is small-for-dates but has appropriate head-to-abdominal ratios is more often affected by congenital infection or congenital anomalies; this is called a “low-profile” growth pattern.

chinese: 大多数婴儿无明显异常，但在宫内感染的婴儿中约有10％发生先天性异常，诸如小脑儿(头异常小)，因中枢神经系统损伤而致的癫痫、耳聋、智力障碍、精神运动性障碍、视力异常、慢性胃肠炎、黄疸、肺炎或血小板减少症(缺少血小板)。
english: Most infants do not show obvious abnormalities, but about 10% of those infected in utero develop congenital abnormalities, such as microcephaly (an abnormally small head), central nervous system damage resulting in seizures and deafness, mental retardation, psychomotor retardation, ocular abnormalities, chronic gastroenteritis, jaundice, pneumonia, or thrombocytopenia (lack of thrombocytes).

chinese: 头及五官检查显示前囟平坦，双侧鼓膜充血及光反射降低。
english: HEENT evaluation revealed flat anterior fontanelle; tympanic membranes were injected with decreased light reflex bilaterally.

chinese: 头、眼、耳、鼻、喉检查无异常。
english: HEENT exam showed no abnormality.

chinese: 头眼耳鼻喉检查，显示两侧鼓膜色泽轻度发暗，但活动良好。
english: HEENT examination revealed both tympanic membranes were slightly dull, but had good movement.

chinese: 要将脑脊液标本送到室作蛋白质和糖测定。
english: Specimens should be sent to the laboratory for protein and glucose determinations.

chinese: 对可能为中枢神经系统原发性或转移性肿瘤的病例，应送5～l0ml脑脊液到细胞病理室，以确定是否存在恶性细胞。
english: In cases of possible primary or metastatic neoplasm of the central nervous system, 5 to 10 ml of fluid should be sent to the cytopathology laboratory to determine if there are malignant cells.

chinese: 试行查明病毒是必要的，应将脑脊液和血液标本送至病毒学室进行化验。
english: It is desirable to try to identify the virus and specimens of cerebrospihal fluid and blood should be sent to a virological laboratory.

chinese: 在紧急情况下，当病人的病情迅速恶化时，降低血压应在耗费时间的室检查以前进行。
english: In an emergency situation, when a patient's condition is rapidly deteriorating, reduction of blood pressure should precede time-consuming laboratory tests.

chinese: 设想此标准在其他形式的调查研究中对AD患者进行对比研究时也是有用的，这些调查研究包括配对调查、新的诊断性室检查的评价以及临床与病理的关系等。
english: The criteria were also designed to be useful for comparative studies of AD patients in other types of investigations including case control studies, evaluation of new diagnostic laboratory tests, and clinicopathologic correlations.

chinese: ④以及下列室检查的结果：腰椎穿刺正常、脑电图呈正常型或非特异性改变、CT显示进行性脑萎缩的迹象。
english: ④ laboratory results of normal lumbar puncture, normal pattern or nonspecific changes in EEG, and evidence of cerebral atrophy on CT with progression.

chinese: 正如在National Institute of Health，Consensus Conference (全美卫生学会，舆论会议)对“痴呆疾病鉴别诊断”讨论会(1987年)上所强调的那样，一旦完成了病史、体检和简单的室筛选，而尚未阐明痴呆的病因时，就应当施行CT扫描以排除器质性的脑部病变。
english: As was emphasized at the National Institute of Health, Consensus Conference on "Differential Diagnosis of Dementing Diseases" (1987), once a history, physical examination and simple laboratory screen have been completed and a cause for dementia has not been elucidated, a CT scan should be performed to rule out a structural brain abnormality.

chinese: 为了全面研究病情，进行室检查是必要的。
english: Laboratory tests may be necessary to complete the study.

chinese: 本法的最大优点是能将下疳渗出物送室检查，以获得诊断，这就可以不必立刻用暗视野检查了。
english: The great advantage is that a chancre may be diagnosed by sending the exudate from the chancre to the laboratory, thus obviating the necessity of an immediate darkfield examination.

chinese: 其后如稀释4倍时滴定度升高，若非室有误，则表示再感染或复发。
english: A subsequent rise in titer of four dilutions, provided there is no laboratory error,, indicates reinfection or relapse.

chinese: 该词用以表示某些人梅毒血清试验阳性(无室误差)，而且无梅毒的临床症状或病史。
english: This term is used to denote a positive STS (without laboratory error) in persons with no history or clinical evidence of syphilis.

chinese: 淋球菌培养的实施及解释是留作那些专门化的细菌室，特别是那些皮肤科诊所的。
english: Carrying out and interpreting the gonococcal culture are reserved for specialized bacteriological laboratories especially in dermatological clinics.

chinese: 为了比较，研究者们研究了从49名健康人采集的血样，这组健康人包括有偿献血者和接触血液血浆的室工作人员。
english: For comparison, the investigators studied blood specimens from a group of 49 healthy persons consisting of paid blood plasma donors and those working with blood and plasma in the laboratory.

chinese: 临床和室发现：尽管35名患者中31人(88％)有腹痛、恶心、呕吐、发烧和寒颤等单一或几种症状，但往往不能及时做出胆道疾病的诊断。
english: Clinical and laboratory findings: Although the findings of abdominal pain, nausea, emesis, fever, and chills were present alone or in combination in 31 of 35 patients (88 percent), the diagnosis of biliary disease was often delayed.

chinese: 怀疑有胆囊疾病的全胃肠外营养病人的室评价也很困难。
english: The laboratory evaluation of patients receiving TPN who are suspected of having gallbladder disease can be difficult as well.

chinese: 静脉输送血液返回心脏。
english: Blood returns to the heart through veins.

chinese: 这种体液叫淋巴液，它是流经另一个管道系统——淋巴管而回流入心脏。
english: This fluid, called lymph, returns to the heart by way of another system of channels—the lymph vessels.

chinese: 三种肌肉组织为：使骨骼产生运动的骨骼肌或随意肌，心脏的心肌和形成腹部器官壁的平滑肌。
english: The three types are: the skeletal or voluntary muscle that moves the skeleton; the cardiac muscle of the heart; and the smooth muscle that forms the walls of the abdominal organs.

chinese: 举个例子来说，急性心脏病发作常常没有前兆，而且会很快致命。
english: An acute heart attack, for example, often hits without warning and can be quickly fatal.

chinese: 不同的血管X光片显示了心脏和循环系统的疾病。
english: Various kinds of angiograms show heart and circulatory disease.

chinese: 核磁共振，或核磁共振成像，是一种没有副作用，没有伤害性，在强烈磁场下使用放射波的探测手段，它能把大脑、心脏、肝脏和其它人体器官剖析成很薄的片层。
english: Nuclear magnetic resonance, or magnetic resonance imaging, is a hazard-free, non-invasive method that uses radio waves in the presence of a strong magnetic field to probe a patient and generate visual images of thin slices of the brain, heart, liver, and other organs.

chinese: 心电图(ECG)对于诊断某些心脏病是有用的。
english: The electrocardiograph (ECG) is useful for diagnosing certain heart conditions.

chinese: 当心电图仪的电极被固定在病人的胸部时，无论病人是在休息还是在进行某些活动，如在计步器上走动，他心脏的电流活动都可能被记录下来。
english: With electrodes taped to a person's chest, the electrical activity of the heart can be recorded while the patient is either resting or performing some activity, such as walking on a treadmill.

chinese: 心脏的收缩由一个位于心脏内部，被称为窦房结的天然起搏器发出的电脉冲开始。
english: The heart contraction is originated with an electrical impulse in a natural pacemaker called the sinoatrial node, located within the heart itself.

chinese: Peter Zimetbaum博士及其同事注意到在内科学杂志上报道，在维持房颤患者正常心跳的疗效上，胺碘酮优于其他药物，但这种疗效是以更大的副作用为代价的。
english: Dr. Peter Zimetbaum and associates note in the Archives of Internal Medicine that amiodarone is more effective than other drugs for maintaining a normal heartbeat in patients with atrial fibrillation, but this comes at the cost of more side effects.

chinese: 心房纤颤是一种心跳的异常，原因是心脏上部的腔室——心房壁异常快速颤动。这种心律失常加大了心脏内形成血栓风险，并有可能移至大脑引起中风。为此，该类患者经常要使用血液稀释剂（抗凝剂）来预防形成这种血栓。
english: Atrial fibrillation is a heartbeat disturbance in which the walls of the upper chambers of the heart vibrate rapidly. This "arrhythmia" raises the risk that clots may form in the heart and possibly travel to the brain, causing a stroke. For this reason, patients are often treated with blood thinners to prevent these clots from forming.

chinese: 心脏有自己的电传导系统，控制心肌收缩的频率和节律。
english: Thus the heart contains its own electrical conducting system capable of controlling both the rate and order of contractions.

chinese: 对头部或胸部极轻微的挤压震动即可损伤脑或心脏。
english: The slightest jar to the head or chest could damage the brain or heart.

chinese: 急性肺水肿的产生是由于心脏先出了问题，其症状对负责把富氧血输出肺部的肺静脉和左心房施加了压力所致。
english: The fluid buildup is caused by heart trouble that, in turn, produces back pressure in the pulmonary veins and the left atrium of the heart to which they carry oxygen-rich blood from the lungs.

chinese: 治疗可采用输氧，洋地黄加强心脏功能，利尿药来加速肾脏对尿液的排除。
english: The condition is treated with oxygen, digitalis to strengthen heart action, and diuretics to speed fluid removal by the kidneys.

chinese: 心血管系统是由心脏和血管组成。
english: The cardiovascular system is made up of the heart and blood vessels.

chinese: 心脏位于两肺之间，其尖指向左侧。
english: The heart is situated between the lungs with its apex directed toward the left.

chinese: 结论:在这个住院患者的研究中, 脑缺氧后癫痫持续状态似乎是脱险者心跳停止独立的危险因素.  表明对于既定的病因学癫痫持续状态可能预示着不良的后果.
english: CONCLUSION: In this hospital-based cohort, postanoxic status epilepticus (SE) seems to be independently related to death in cardiac arrest survivors, suggesting that SE might determine a bad prognosis for a given etiology.

chinese: 方法:这是一个对脱险的昏迷患者心跳停止连续性回顾性观察的试验.包括对受试者的低温疗法.
english: METHODS: This was a retrospective observation of consecutive comatose survivors of cardiac arrest, including subjects treated with hypothermia.

chinese: 结果：总的平均除颤时间是1分钟（四分位间距，1～3分钟）；2045例（30.1％）患者除颤时间延迟。与除颤时间延迟相关的因素包括黑人、没有入院的心血管疾病诊断、心跳骤停发生在小于250张床位的医院、住在没有监护的单元、心跳骤停发生在下班时间（下午5点到早上8点或周末）。延迟除颤与低生存出院几率显著相关（22.2％vs39.3％，校正后比值比0.48，95％可信区间0.42-0.54，P<0.001）。而且，除颤时间延迟分钟数增加与低生存出院率呈等级相关性。（P<0.001）。
english: Results The overall median time to defibrillation was 1 minute (interquartile range, <1 to 3 minutes); delayed defibrillation occurred in 2045 patients (30.1%). Characteristics associated with delayed defibrillation included black race, noncardiac admitting diagnosis, and occurrence of cardiac arrest at a hospital with fewer than 250 beds, in an unmonitored hospital unit, and during after-hours periods (5 p.m. to 8 a.m. or weekends). Delayed defibrillation was associated with a significantly lower probability of surviving to hospital discharge (22.2%, vs. 39.3% when defibrillation was not delayed; adjusted odds ratio, 0.48; 95% confidence interval, 0.42 to 0.54; P<0.001). In addition, a graded association was seen between increasing time to defibrillation and lower rates of survival to hospital discharge for each minute of delay (P for trend <0.001).

chinese: Gregg C. Fonarow 医生说：“首次心脏发作之后的30天内，患者再次出现心脏病发作，心跳骤停，猝死和其他各种原因导致的死亡的几率是最高的。在首次心脏发作之后的30天内应用卡维地络可以降低各种原因所致的死亡，非致死性的心梗和心跳骤停，其有效率可以达到42%，而且存在统计学意义”
english: "The first 30 days after a heart attack represent the period of greatest risk for recurrent heart attacks, cardiac arrest, sudden death, and all-cause mortality," Dr. Gregg C. Fonarow told Reuters Health. "The results of this analysis from CAPRICORN suggest that, in the first 30 days after a myocardial infarction, carvedilol produced a significant 42% reduction in the risk of all-cause mortality, nonfatal myocardial infarction, or cardiac arrest."

chinese: 常规来说医生应该在患者出现心跳骤停两分钟之内进行抢救。而要做到在患者的身上使用除颤器除颤以恢复心跳，两分钟的时间可以说非常短。
english: Hospital staff are supposed to respond within two minutes when patients' hearts stop beating. That's not much time to mobilize the hollering code-blue team and to get the defibrillator paddles on a patient's chest to shock the heart back into action.

chinese: 结论：住院期间心跳骤停后除颤延迟普遍存在而且与低生存出院率相关。
english: Conclusions Delayed defibrillation is common and is associated with lower rates of survival after in-hospital cardiac arrest.

chinese: 方法：我们入选了369个参加了国家心肺复苏登记的医院的6789例心室颤动或无脉性室性心动过速导致心跳骤停的患者。采用多因素Logistic回归分析，我们明确了与除颤延迟相关的因素。我们探讨了除颤延迟（超过2分钟）与患者生存出院的关系，校正了病人差异和医院差异。
english: Methods We identified 6789 patients who had cardiac arrest due to ventricular fibrillation or pulseless ventricular tachycardia at 369 hospitals participating in the National Registry of Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation. Using multivariable logistic regression, we identified characteristics associated with delayed defibrillation. We then examined the association between delayed defibrillation (more than 2 minutes) and survival to discharge after adjusting for differences in patient and hospital characteristics.

chinese: 背景：专家指南认为对于室性心律失常导致的住院病人心跳骤停应该在2分钟内给予除颤。但是，关于在美国除颤时间延迟的发生率及其对生存率的影响的数据尚很缺乏。
english: Background Expert guidelines advocate defibrillation within 2 minutes after an in-hospital cardiac arrest caused by ventricular arrhythmia. However, empirical data on the prevalence of delayed defibrillation in the United States and its effect on survival are limited.

chinese: 住院期间心跳骤停后除颤时间延迟
english: Delayed Time to Defibrillation after In-Hospital Cardiac Arrest

chinese: 实验室检查也受到置疑。Megan Moynahan，FDA除颤器小组组长，置疑为什么制造商仅仅对电极弯折有限的次数以模拟心跳，使得“所有的设备通过所有的测试。”为什么不弯折电极直到断裂来分辨强韧的电极和脆弱的电极呢。
english: Lab tests got criticized, too. Megan Moynahan, chief of the FDA's defibrillator branch, asked why manufacturers only bend leads a limited number of times, simulating heartbeats, so that “all devices pass all tests.” Why not flex them until they fail, she asked, to separate stronger leads from weaker ones.

chinese: 在她的前期研究中，Mikkola和其同事在哈佛和法国发现胎盘中存在巨大的造血干细胞池，但是若它们起源于其他任何地方并迁徙到胎盘自我更新，那它们是不干净的。Mikkola和她的研究小组使用一独特的小鼠模型，小鼠胚胎无心跳，这样能够找到造血干细胞的起源位置，因为没有血液循环。
english: In her previous research, Mikkola and collaborators in Harvard and France had discovered that the placenta contained a large pool of blood stem cells, but it wasn't clear if they originated elsewhere and migrated to the placenta to self-renew. Using a unique mouse model, a mouse embryo without a heartbeat, Mikkola and her team were able to find the blood stem cells at the site of their origin because there was no circulation of blood through the body.

chinese: 在患者去急诊室后的一个星期后, Decter医生在他的办公室给患者做了检查, 一个形体中等的中年男性. 他的血压是完美的, 心律是规则的, 心跳慢. 事实上他的整个检查结果都是完全正常的. 他做了另外一个心电图, 也是正常的. 虽然他在急诊室的血液检查似乎表明他有心梗, 但无论是心电图还是冠脉造影都没有任何异常.
english: At his office, a week after the trip to the E.R., Decter examined the patient, a fit middle-aged man. His blood pressure was perfect. His heart rate was regular and slow. In fact, his entire exam was completely normal. He got another EKG. Also normal. The patient's blood tests from the E.R. seemed to indicate that he had had a heart attack, but none of the EKGs or the angiogram revealed any abnormality.

chinese: 方法：我们对7001例有前壁心肌梗死病史，没有植入埋藏式自动复律除颤器，在家里发生过1-2次心跳骤停的患者进行随机分组，对照组（呼叫急诊医疗服务并进行心肺复苏[CPR]）和AED组（使用AED，然后呼叫急诊医疗服务并进行CPR）。主要终点为全因死亡。
english: Methods We randomly assigned 7001 patients with previous anterior-wall myocardial infarction who were not candidates for an implantable cardioverter–defibrillator to receive one of two responses to sudden cardiac arrest occurring at home: either the control response (calling emergency medical services and performing cardiopulmonary resuscitation [CPR]) or the use of an AED, followed by calling emergency medical services and performing CPR. The primary outcome was death from any cause.

chinese: 右心房以上的静脉(即直立时的头、颈静脉)血压低于大气压，当损伤累及这些静脉壁时，空气就可被吸入静脉而进入血液循环。
english: The pressure in veins situated above the level of the right atrium (e.g. in the head and neck when upright) is below that of the atmosphere and when a wound involves the wall of such a vein, air may be sucked into it and pass into the circulation.

chinese: 激活的第二个连锁反应为替代或旁路途径，包含另外的成分而且跳过经典补体连锁反应的头三个阶段。
english: A second sequence of activation, the alternative pathway, involves additional components and by-passes the first three stages of the classical complement cascade.

chinese: 昏眩是病人用以表达很多中不同关键的症状名称，例如感觉自体旋转（或）环境旋转、头昏、头眩、头脑不清醒、晕船、晕车、酒醉、蹒跚、站立不稳和眼花等均可诉之为昏眩。
english: This term is applied by patients to an immense variety of sensations such as spinning of self and/or environment, light-headedness, swimming and fuzziness of the head, faintness, seasickness, drunkenness, staggering, unsteadiness, and giddiness.

chinese: 检查床的位置最好是床头靠墙，两侧（特别是右侧）及床脚头应为检查者留出通道。
english: The examining table may be placed with its head against the wall, but b3th sides (particularly the right) and the foot should be accessible to the examiner.

chinese: 颈静脉压：要想满意地进行颈静脉检查，需要有一张床或检查台，病人的头和躯干不同程度地升高。
english: Jugular venous pressure: Satisfactory examination of the neck veins requires a bed or table that will allow the patient's head and trunk to be elevated to various heights.

chinese: (1)心前区的望诊和触诊：检查者移向病床的脚头，从前胸水平观察心前区。
english: (1) Inspection and palpation of the precordium: Move toward the foot of the bed and observe the precordium from the level of the anterior chest.

chinese: 要求病人将头转向你的对侧，并经口作深长呼吸。
english: Then ask the patient to turn his head to the side away from you and take a long, deep breath through his mouth.

chinese: 检查者从病人的头后保持与头部30．48 ～ 45．72 cm (12～18吋)的距离缓慢持续移动一个手指。
english: Slowly bring from behind the patient one constantly moving finger held 12 to 18 inches from his head.

chinese: 对所有的病人都应检查二头肌、三头肌、桡骨膜、髌骨和跟腱反射。
english: Examine the biceps, triceps, radial periosteal, patellar, and Achilles reflexes in all patients.

chinese: 检查二头肌反射时最好是叩击置于肌腱上的检查者的拇指或其他手指。
english: The biceps reflex is best tested by tapping the examiner's finger or thumb, which has been placed over the patient's tendon.

chinese: 用方向术语说明身体结构的位置时，身体应处于解剖位置，即站立位，头和掌向前，两脚稍稍分开。
english: Directional terms indicate the position of body structures when the body is in the anatomical position -- that is, a standing position, head and palms facing forward, and the feet spread slightly apart.

chinese: 旋转：在此情况下，一个结构按长轴转动，例如头的旋转。
english: Rotation: Here a structure turns on its long axis, as in the rotation of the head.

chinese: 髌骨：膝盖骨，位于膝前，它是与股四头肌腱相连接的扁平籽骨。
english: Patella: The kneecap, a flat, sesmoidal bone located in front of the knee in the tendon of the quadriceps femoris muscle.

chinese: 副神经 (传出) ：头, 肩部运动，发音。
english: Accessory nerve (efferent): head and shoulder movements, vocal movements.

chinese: 反射可以分成四种：浅反射(足底反射、腹壁反射、角膜反射)；深反射(称肌肉反射或伸肌反射，它包括：膝跳反射、跟腱反射、肱二头肌和三头肌反射)；内脏反射(光反射——虹膜的收缩；睫脊反射——紧缩皮肤引起瞳孔散大)和病理反射(肛门括约肌控制排粪机能破坏——病人可能大便失禁)。
english: Reflexes can be classified into four groups: superficial (plantar reflex, abdominal wall reflex, corneal reflex), deep (called muscle or myotatic reflex: knee jerk or patellar reflex, Achilles reflex, biceps and triceps reflexes), visceral (light reflex---constriction of the iris, ciliospinal---pinching the skin causes the pupil to dilate), and pathological (destruction of sphincter muscles controlling defecation--individual may be unable to hold back feces).

chinese: 这一标志或其他任何室标志与艾滋病的关系均尚未得到证实，但是在艾滋病患者中，这一比率实际上总是异常低。
english: Neither this marker nor any other, laboratory marker is of proved relevance to AIDS, but the ratio is virtually always abnormally low in patients with AIDS.

chinese: 艾滋病高危组与肝炎高危组的相似性甚至提示，其传播途径也相似，尽管流行病学或室研究并没有说明肝炎病毒与艾滋病原因有什么关系。
english: The similarity of the high risk groups to those seen in hepatitis even suggests a similar route of transmission, although hepatitis viruses have not been implicated in the cause of AIDS by either epidemiological or laboratory investigations.

chinese: 不同的研究人员都有自己的候选因子，但是欧洲一室最近提出了一种最令人感兴趣的起作用的因子。
english: Different investigators have their own candidates, but the most interesting recent contender for the role has emerged from a European laboratory.

chinese: 医疗和研究单位都很紧张，特别是由于有的研究人员担心，他们的设备污染后，可能就不能再用于别的病人,纽约和其他一些地方的人员已从治疗艾滋病人的单位以及从事与艾滋病有关的室工作的单位辞去工作。
english: Facilities for both care and research have been strained, especially in light of concern among some investigators that contamination of their equipment might prohibit its use on other patients, personnel in New York and elsewhere have resigned from units that care for patients with AIDS and that do laboratory work related to AIDS.

chinese: 在诊断可疑的患者中，“全身性红斑狼疮的经典体征”的诊断价值显然在降低，而广泛的神经免疫学室研究和15O-正电子发射X线体层摄影术对中枢神经系统疾病的探查起了很大作用。
english: In patients with doubtful diagnosis the classical signs of SLE are evidently of decreasing diagnostic value, whereas extended neuroimmunological laboratory investigations and 50-positron emission tomography contribute a great deal towards detection of CNS-disease.

chinese: 现有的测试方法可靠性较差，各室测试结果有差异，血小板中存在低温保护剂时测试结果更有问题。
english: The tests currently available have not been reliable from laboratory to laboratory and have questionable value when the platelets are perturbed by the presence of cryoprotectants.

chinese: 在2年合同期内，对从加利福尼亚州内外23个单位送来的1000多份标本进行了生物监测试验，我们室对我们发表过的FIAX技术(Ascher，M.S.，Horwith，G?S.，Thornton，M.F.，Greenwood，J.R.，Berman，M.A.：血清学诊断小鼠、豚鼠、羊和人体Q热的快速免疫荧光法诊断免疫学1：33-38.1983)
english: In the two years of the contract our laboratory performed bio-surveillance testing on over 1000 samples from 23 institutions inside and outside of California using our published FIAX technique (Ascher, M. S., Horwith, G. S., Thornton, M F., Greenwood, J. R., Berman, M. A. A Rapid Immunofluorescent Procedure for Serodiagnosis of Q Fever in Mice, Guinea Pigs, Sheep and Humans. Diagnostic Immunology 1.33-38, 1983).

chinese: 由于最近的室流行，Q热的两个特点今后应该得到更多注意：慢性病和心内膜炎。
english: As a result of recent laboratory outbreaks, two features of Q fever are bound to receive more attention in the future, the chronic disease state and endocarditis.

chinese: 此结果在具备FIAX技术的临床室中直接有用，并减少标准的显微镜荧光抗体试验中所需的烦琐的稀释要求。
english: This result has direct utility in the clinical laboratory setting where FIAX technology is available and lessens requirement for tedious dilution required in the standard microscopically read FA test.

chinese: 除已认识到军事人员在天然暴露环境或生物战中有患Q热的危险外，因人与感染的实验羊接触而发生一些室中的流行。
english: In addition to the recognized risk to military personnel of Q fever in natural exposure settings or biologic warfare, a number of institutional outbreaks have occurred associated with contact of humans with infected experimental sheep.

chinese: 室获得性Q热的论题已列入美国实验动物科学协会全国会议的日程表上，也是1983年8月温哥华召开的国际实验动物科学会议上的一个重要会议论题。
english: The topic of laboratory acquired Q fever has been on the program of the American Association of Laboratory Animal Science national meeting and was a major symposium topic at the International Congress of Laboratory Animal Science in Vancouver in August of 1983.

chinese: 必须有做血尿素氮、血清肌酸酐或内源性肌酸酐清除试验的室设备。
english: Laboratory facilities must be available to perform blood urea nitrogen and serum creatinine or endogenous creatinine clearance tests.

chinese: 不再需要到远离室的检测中心与别人共用一台昂贵的荧光计。
english: No longer will you have to share time on an expensive fluorometer in a central instrument section away from your lab.

chinese: 这些问题促使医生去做出一个诊断，即确立生病的原因，而一个完整的诊断由病人的病史、身体检查和室检查所组成。
english: These questions set the stage for making a diagnosis, i. e. determine the cause of an illness and a diagnosis is accomplished with history, physical examination and laboratory testing.

chinese: 因为体液常常揭示了关于疾病的重要信息，所以在确诊病情上，室检查起着非常重要的作用。
english: Since body fluids often reveal important information about the nature of the disorder, laboratory testing plays an important role in determining the patient's disease.

chinese: 心肌是构成心脏的一层厚厚肌肉；内面由一层薄薄心内膜覆盖，外面由一层薄薄心外膜覆盖。
english: The thick muscle layer of the heart wall is the myocardium, which is lined on the inside with a thin endocardium and is covered on the outside with a thin epicardium.

chinese: 心脏还被包裹在一个称为心包的纤维囊中。
english: The heart is contained within a fibrous sac, the pericardium.

chinese: 位于心脏上面部分的是接受回心血液的心房。
english: The upper receiving chambers of the heart are the atria.

chinese: 动脉将血液带出心脏。
english: Arteries lead blood away from the heart.

chinese: 血管壁分为三层，与心脏的三层相似，即(1)最内面的内膜，其构成光滑的表面，有利于血液流过；(2)第二层，其所占比例较大，由不随意肌组成，并伴以弹力结缔组织；(3)外膜，由具有支撑作用的结缔组织构成。
english: There are three coats (tunics) which resemble the three tissue layers of the heart.

chinese: 静脉将含有废物的血液从组织携带到心脏。
english: They conduct waste-filled blood toward the heart from the tissues.

chinese: 心脏将血液泵入两个循环体系。
english: The heart pumps blood through two circuits.

chinese: 心脏的右边将血泵入肺，通过肺循环使血发生氧合。
english: The right side of the heart pumps blood to the lungs to be oxygenated through the pulmonary circuit.

chinese: 心脏的左边泵出血液通过体循环，将血液分配到机体的其它部位。
english: The left side of the heart pumps blood to the remainder of the body through the systemic circuit.

chinese: 从组织(肺组织除外)而来的血液经腔静脉，即上腔静脉与下腔静脉，回到心脏。
english: Blood returning from tissues other than the lungs enters the heart by way of the venae cavae: the superior vena cava and the inferior vena cava.

chinese: 被氧合的血液通过肺静脉回到心脏的左心房。
english: Oxygenated blood returns to the heart by way of pulmonary veins, which empty into the left atrium.

chinese: 主动脉是一条连续的管道，分成以下几部分：(1)升主动脉—靠近心脏，位于心包内；(2)主动脉弓—从右弯曲到左，并向后延伸；(3)胸主动脉—位于心脏之后，脊柱之前，胸膜后的间隙里；(4)腹主动脉—主动脉的最长部分，跨过腹腔。
english: The aorta is one continuous tube divided into the following regions: 1) the ascending aorta, which is near the heart and inside the pericardial sac; 2) the aortic arch, which curves from the right to the left, and also extends backward; 3) the thoracic aorta, which lies just in front of the vertebral column behind the heart and in the space behind the pleura; and 4) the abdominal aorta, which is the longest section of the aorta, spanning the abdominal cavity.

chinese: 心脏的跳动分为两期：舒张期与收缩期。
english: There are two phases of the heartbeat: diastole (relaxation) and systole (contraction).

chinese: 心室收缩使压力波增大；这种压力波开始于心脏，沿动脉传导。
english: The force of ventricular contraction starts a wave of increased pressure which begins at the heart and travels along the arteries.

chinese: 血压在心动周期中有所变化，在心脏喷血(收缩期)时增大，在心脏舒张(舒张期)时减小。
english: This pressure varies over the course of the cardiac cycle, increasing when blood is ejected from the heart (during systole), and decreasing as the heart relaxes (during diastole).

chinese: 2011.9.15-美国FDA今天宣布，内科医生对于先天性的长QT患者应该慎用抗呕吐药物昂丹司琼（枢复宁，葛兰素史克），因为可能导致患者出现致死性尖端扭转型室性心动过速。
english: September 15, 2011 — Clinicians should avoid using the antinausea drug ondansetron (Zofran, GlaxoSmithKline) in patients with congenital long QT syndrome because they run a particular risk for an abnormal and potentially fatal heart rhythm called torsades de pointes, the US Food and Drug Administration (FDA) announced today.

chinese: 国立血清研究所和Aeras今天宣布一种新的结核病疫苗进入第一阶段临床试验，这种疫苗主要用来阻止那些结核菌的潜在感染者进展为活动性结核病。这项试验由SATVI机构在南非西开普省的Worcester开展。Hassan Mahomed博士是主要研究者。
english: Statens Serum Institut and Aeras today announce the initiation of the first Phase I clinical trial of a new candidate TB vaccine designed to protect people latently infected with TB from developing active TB disease. The trial is being conducted by the South African Tuberculosis Vaccine Initiative (SATVI) at its field site in Worcester, in the Western Cape province of South Africa. Dr. Hassan Mahomed is the principal investigator.

chinese: 在过去的10年中，可利用的HIV服务的增加导致了新增感染率下降了15%，在过去的5年中，AIDS相关的死亡率降低了22%，根据今天世界卫生组织发布的报道。
english: Increased access to HIV services has resulted in a 15% reduction of new infections during the past decade and a 22% decline in AIDS-related deaths in the last 5 years, according to a report released today by the World Health Organization (WHO).

chinese: 认识到新的治疗方法的必要性，公司在2007年启动了礼来结核病药物发现计划以加速药物研发工作。包括今天的宣布，礼来目前已经投入超过17000万美元用于全球抗击结核病和耐多药结核病的事业。
english: Recognizing that new treatment options were needed, the company also launched the Lilly TB Drug Discovery Initiative in 2007 to spur early drug discovery efforts. Including today's announcement, Lilly has now committed more than $170 million to the global fight against TB and MDR-TB.

chinese: 美国临床肿瘤学会 (ASCO)今天推出临床肿瘤2011进展：ASCO年度关于对抗肿瘤进展，一项独立的对今年肿瘤研究领域对患者治疗有最大影响的综述。这项报告同时指出肿瘤学最有前景的发展方向，并且指出在未来肿瘤治疗领域专家的视野。
english: The American Society of Clinical Oncology (ASCO) today released Clinical Cancer Advances 2011: ASCO's Annual Report on Progress Against Cancer, an independent review of the advances in cancer research that have had the greatest impact on patient care this year. The report also identifies the most promising trends in oncology and provides insights from experts on where the future of cancer care is heading.

chinese: 执业医师和药店普遍认为电子处方作为一个重要的工具，可以确保病人的安全并节省时间，但他们对于该项技术所带来多重益处的认识却都比较局限，这是根据卫生保健研究和质量署（AHRQ）（隶属于卫生和人类服务部（HHS））的一项研究得出的结论的这项研究已在线出版在今天的美国医学信息协会杂志上。
english: Physician practices and pharmacies generally view electronic prescribing as an important tool to improve patient safety and save time, but both groups face barriers to realizing the technology's full benefit, according to a study funded by the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services' (HHS) Agency for Healthcare Research and Quality (AHRQ). The study is published online today in the Journal of the American Medical Informatics Association.

chinese: 今天网上发表了年度十大科学突破的完整的名单。
english: The complete list of top 10 scientific breakthroughs of the year was publishedonline today.

chinese: 参加这项研究的儿童是患有针对胰腺B细胞的自身免疫性疾病的无症状儿童。如果胰腺破坏的不能被阻止，随着年龄长大，就会进展为1型糖尿病。预防性应用Diamyd疫苗是为了干预疾病进展。今天还没有药物能阻止1型糖尿病的进展。
english: The children enrolled in the study are healthy, but have all been found to have an ongoing autoimmune process, where their blood sugar-regulating beta cells in the pancreas are being destroyed by their own immune system. If the destruction is not stopped, it can with time lead to type 1 diabetes. Preventive treatment with Diamyd is intended to intervene in the autoimmune process at an early stage, and thus prevent the disease from developing. Today there is no treatment that can halt the progress of disease in type 1 diabetes.

chinese: 过去的数年里，取得医学进步所必须依赖的相关技术的耗费越来越低。上周，位于加利福尼亚州的Carlsbad Life Technologies公司宣布：不久的将来仅需1000美元就可在一天之内完成一个人的基因组测序。而类似的测试在今天仍需数千美元。另外，可以时时监测机体内部蛋白质和代谢水平的技术也已在向我们招手。
english: With each passing year, the technologynecessary for this revolution in medicine is growing less expensive. Last week,Life Technologies of Carlsbad, Calif., announced that it will be able to map anindividual's entire genetic sequence in one day, for $1,000. Similar teststoday cost many thousands of dollars. The ability to follow day-to-day changesin your body's proteins and metabolites is not far behind.

chinese: 欧洲心脏病学会迎来了一个新的“令人感兴趣的”研究，美国心脏病学院的周刊今天公布，提出了一个很新颖的方法来改善心衰病人的内皮细胞功能。在“提出假设”的研究中，熊去氧胆酸在手臂的缺血再灌注中起到了很重要的改善作用，这对于大腿的缺血再灌注起到一个导向作用。但它在运动负荷试验以及几个炎症标志中没起到什么作用，尽管有这些矛盾的数据，ESC的发言人坚信在大量心衰病人身上进行熊去氧胆酸的进一步研究是合理的。
english: The European Society of Cardiology (ESC) welcomes an "intriguing" study, published today in the Journal of the American College of Cardiology, featuring a completely novel approach for improving endothelial function in heart failure. In the "hypothesis generating" study, ursodeoxycholic acid (UDCA) delivered significant improvements in peak post ischemic blood flow in the arm, a trend for improvement in peak post ischemic blood flow in the leg, but failed to show benefits in exercise capacity and several inflammatory markers. Despite such conflicting data, ESC spokespersons believe that further exploration of UCDA is now justified in larger populations of heart failure patients.

chinese: 因为含纳米材料产品的数量预计会爆炸。和未来的暴露情景可能没有像那些今天一样,现有的市场规模选择目标材料研究-照现在实际的情况-有问题。来帮助指导研究,委员会还提到,以下四个研究范畴, 应在五年内解决。
english: Because the number of products containing nanoscalematerials is expected to explode, and futureexposure scenarios may not resemble those of today, selecting targetmaterials to study on the basis of existing market size -- as is the practicenow -- is problematic. To help guideresearch, the committee noted the following fourresearch categories, which should be addressedwithin five years.

chinese: 有时随着变化，我们需要调整战略。不会犯错，但是，在今天的市场，特别是医疗方面，Twitter战略已经是任何媒体战略的重要组成。
english: Sometimes as change occurs, the strategic aspects of it slip by us.  Make no mistake, however, in today's market, particularly in healthcare, a Twitter strategy is an essential component of any media strategy.

chinese: 在伦敦皇家内科医师学会今天发出的一份官方通告中，成员们称会通过以下方法与NTDs进行斗争：
english: The endorsement of the "London Declaration on Neglected Tropical Diseases". The Declaration promises a new level of commitment and collaboration in the tracking of progress.

chinese: 到今天为止，药物短缺防治法已获美国肠外与肠内营养，阿斯利康和血液/肿瘤药房协会学会临床肿瘤学会认可。
english: To date, the Drug Shortage Prevention Act has been endorsed by ASCO, the American Society for Parenteral and Enteral Nutrition, AstraZeneca, and the Hematology/Oncology Pharmacy Association.

chinese: 武田药品有限公司 (Takeda)及其全资子公司，美国武田制药今天宣布EDARBYCLOR（阿齐沙坦酯衍生物和氯噻酮）可以在美国药房买到，其应用于治疗成人高血压。它是目前美国唯一血管紧张素Ⅱ受体阻滞剂和氯噻酮合剂，剂量固定，每天一次，一次一粒。在3期临床试验中，通过临床和24小时动态血压监测，通过降压的统计数据分析，最大剂量的EDARBYCLOR（40/25mg）优于同样最大固定剂量的奥美沙坦酯-双氢克尿塞。此外，还在黑人亚组中观察到 EDARBYCLOR 类似的降压效果。
english: Takeda Pharmaceutical Company Limited (Takeda) and its wholly-owned subsidiary, Takeda Pharmaceuticals U.S.A., Inc., today announced EDARBYCLOR (azilsartan medoxomil and chlorthalidone) is now available by prescription in U.S. pharmacies for the treatment of hypertension to lower blood pressure in adults. It is the only fixed-dose therapy in the U.S. to combine an angiotensin II receptor blocker (ARB) with chlorthalidone in a once-daily, single tablet. In a phase 3 clinical trial, the systolic blood pressure reductions of the maximum dose of EDARBYCLOR (40/25 mg), by both clinic and trough 24-hour ambulatory blood pressure monitoring, were shown to be statistically superior to those of the fixed-dose combination of olmesartan medoxomil-hydrochlorothiazide at its maximum dose (40/25 mg). Additionally, similar blood pressure lowering effects of EDARBYCLOR were observed in a sub-group analysis of black patients.

chinese: 上腔静脉将头、颈和上肢的血液送回心脏(进入右心房)，下腔静脉将身体其余部分的血液送回心脏(也进入右心房)。
english: The superior vena cava returns blood to the heart (enters the right atrium) from the head, neck, and upper extremities and the inferior vena cava returns blood from the rest of the body (again through the right atrium).

chinese: 成熟的精子有头，颈和尾(称作鞭毛)。
english: The mature spermatozoon has a head, a neck, and a tail called a flagellum (whip).

chinese: 龟头(阴茎头)由皮肤的摺叠(称作包皮)覆盖着。
english: The glens or head of the penis is covered by a fold of skin called the prepuce.

chinese: 在局部解剖学中通常将机体分为下列若干区：胸、腹、盆和会阴、下肢、背，上肢、头和颈。
english: During regional anatomy, the body is generally divided into the following regions: thorax, abdomen, perineum and pelvis, lower limb, back, upper limb, head, and neck.

chinese: 解剖方位是人体直立，头、两眼和脚趾正指前方，脚趾和脚跟靠卧、拢，上肢垂于两侧，手掌向前。
english: A person in the anatomical position is standing erect with the head, eyes, and toes directed forward, the heels and toes together, and the upper limbs hanging by the sides with the palms facing anteriorly.

chinese: 下(尾侧、下方)：对向脚或身体下部离头较远的部位。
english: Inferior (Caudal, Below): Toward the feet or lower part of the body and further from the head.

chinese: 每一头臂静脉由颈内静脉和锁骨下静脉在胸锁关节后方汇合而成。
english: Each is formed by the union of the internal jugular and subclavian veins behind the sterno-clavicular joint.

chinese: 因此，上腔静脉收集头、颈、上肢、胸壁和上腹壁的静脉血。
english: Thus the superior vena cava drains all the blood from the head anal neck, upper limbs, and the wall of the thorax and upper abdomen.

chinese: 输出小管将睾丸网连于附睾头。
english: Small efferent ductules connect the rete testis to the head of the epididymis.

chinese: 阴道是产道的最长部分，可为胎儿头所扩张。
english: The vagina is the longest part of the birth canal and can be markedly distended by the fetal head.

chinese: 阴茎海绵体远端膨大形成锥形阴茎头，其凹面覆盖海绵体钝圆的游离端。
english: Distally the corpus spongiosum penis expands to form the conical glans penis, the concavity of which covers the free blunt ends of the corpora cavernosa.

chinese: 阴茎头的边缘明显，称为阴茎冠，是阴茎海绵体末端突出部分。
english: The prominent margin of the glans penis, called the corona of the glans, projects beyond the ends of the corpora cavernosa penis.

chinese: 阴茎的皮肤和筋膜以双层的皮肤皱折伸延称为包皮，部分包围阴茎头。
english: The skin and fasciae of the penis are prolonged as a free fold or double layer of skin, called the prepuce, which covers the glans penis for a variable extent.

chinese: 屈肘时，臂前面隆起为肱二头肌。
english: The rounded eminence on the anterior surface of the arm when the elbow is flexed is the biceps brachii muscle.

chinese: 肱三头肌位子臂的后部。
english: The triceps brachii muscle occupies the posterior part of the arm.

chinese: 他必须在同一时间内考虑诸多的问题，不仅要考虑各种诊断的可能性，而且还要考虑预后的问题，还有给病人说些什么，又该如何去讲的问题，怎样帮助病人尽可能感到舒适，选择哪些室检查项目和治疗措施，以及如何向病人解释交代清楚等等。
english: The physician must be thinking of many different elements at once, not only the diagnostic possibilities but also the prognostic implications, how and what to communicate to the patient, how to help the patient feel as comfortable as possible, which laboratory tests and therapy to choose, and how to explain them clearly to the patient.

chinese: 三种粒细胞命名源于它们在室检验时所摄取的染料颜色。
english: The three types of granulocytes are named for the types of dye they take up in laboratory tests.

chinese: 诊断贫血的主要室检查有平均红细胞体积(MCV)和平均红细胞的血红蛋白浓度(MCHC)。
english: Key tests in diagnosing anemia are MCV (mean corpuscular volume) and MCHC (mean corpuscular hemoglobin concentration).

chinese: 外周血细胞计数异常常是急性白血病最初室检查的结果。
english: Abnormalities of peripheral blood counts are usually the initial laboratory evidence of acute leukemia.

chinese: 将取得的细胞在室里培养，进行检测以寻找有无生化方面疾病。
english: The cells are grown in the laboratory and tested for biochemical disorders.

chinese: 常规室检查常可提供基因缺陷的诊断依据。
english: Conventional laboratory tests often provide helpful diagnostic information to complete the genetic diagnosis.

chinese: 查体和室检查符合拟诊遗传疾病，比如杜兴肌营养不良；绘制出的家谱又能清楚显示X连锁遗传规律；则遗传模式建立就十分容易了。
english: When the physical examination and laboratory studies are typical of a recognized genetic condition such as Duchenne muscular dystrophy and the pedigree demonstrates a clear pattern of X-linked inheritance, developing the genetic model is straightforward.

chinese: 根据各人具体情况制定治疗方案，水溶性普鲁卡因青霉素G(至少每日4.0×106IU)至少应用3～5d并同时服用丙磺舒，或大观霉素直到临床和室各种表现消失。
english: The treatment is established on an individual basis and should be for at least 3~5 days with aqueous penicillin G procaine (at least 4×l0s IU daily) with simultaneous probenecid, or with spectinomycin until clinical and laboratory manifestations have disappeared.

chinese: 要肯定地证明沙眼衣原体的存在应在专门室里对麦克柯伊细胞上进行微生物培养，并且应用碘或姬姆萨染色或荧光标记的单克隆抗体进行鉴定。
english: Definite proof of Chlamydia trachomatis is based on culture of the organisms on McCoy's cells in specialized laboratories and identification using iodine or Giemsa stain or fluorescence-labeled monoclonal antibodies.

chinese: 由于尚不清楚莱特尔病的特别临床表现或室表现，一般的临床特征具有决定性。
english: Because specific clinical or laboratory findings of Reiter's disease are unknown, the general clinical features are decisive.

chinese: 在Callen系列室检查中，该型LE的异常比局限性DLE更为常见，例如沉降率加快、抗核抗体升高和白细胞减少。
english: In Callen's series, laboratory abnormalities such as an elevated sedimentation rate, elevated antinuclear antibodies, or leucopenia were more common with this form of LE than with localized DLE.

chinese: 发热可以是SLE的信号，但室试验(ANA升高、白细胞减少、血尿或蛋白尿)是更为敏感的指征。
english: Fever may signal its occurrence, but laboratory tests (elevation of ANA, leucopenia, hematuria, or albuminuria) are a more sensitive indicator.

chinese: 如果没有发现室异常，则说明应消除疑虑，如果存在2或3项标准，每隔一定时间应仔细再予评价，给予休息、阿斯匹林或苯海拉明并严密观察。
english: If no abnormalities are found, reassurance is advised; if two or three criteria are present, careful reevaluation should be carried out at regular intervals, with rest, aspirin, perhaps diphenhydramine, and close observation.

chinese: 临床与室评价
english: Clinical and Laboratory Evaluation

chinese: 除了准确的病史和体检外，需要室检查以明确代谢性昏迷的诊断。
english: In addition to an accurate history and physical examination, laboratory investigations are required to establish a diagnosis of metabolic coma.

chinese: 既然血管内的压力随着心脏和动脉情况的变化、以及其它因素的不同而有所改变，所以血压测量和仔细分析能为健康评价和健康护理提供有价值的指导。
english: Since the pressure inside the blood vessels varies with the condition of the heart and the arteries as well as with other factors, the measurement of blood pressure together with careful interpretation may prove a valuable guide in the care and evaluation of a person's health.

chinese: 所测的血压分为：(1)收缩压，即心脏收缩时所产生的压力，平均在120左右，用毫米汞柱表示；(2)舒张压，即心脏舒张时所产生的压力，平均在80左右，用毫米汞柱表示。
english: The two measurements made are of: 1) the systolic pressure, which occurs during heart muscle contraction and averages around 120, expressed in millimeters of mercury; and 2) the diastolic pressure, which occurs during relaxation of the heart muscle and averages around 80 millimeters of mercury.

chinese: 其中一个症状是心绞痛，表现为心脏区域的压榨性疼痛；这种疼痛可放射至左臂或左肩，常因用力而诱发。
english: One of its symptoms is angina pectoris, which is manifested as a feeling of constriction around the heart or pain radiating to the left arm or shoulder, usually brought on by exertion.

chinese: 这就叫做心肌梗死，其为心脏猝死的主要原因。
english: This is myocardial infarction, which is a leading cause of sudden death.

chinese: 常有心律失常、即心律紊乱；通常表现为纤维性颤动，即极快而无效的心脏跳动。
english: Often there is an abnormality of the heart rhythm, or arrhythmia, usually fibrillation, an extremely rapid, ineffective beating of the heart.

chinese: 静脉血栓常可循环通过心脏，停留在肺动脉内，导致危及生命的肺栓塞。
english: Often a venous thrombus can travel through the heart and then lodge in an artery of the lungs, resulting in a life-threatening pulmonary embolism.

chinese: 心脏不能有效排空，不能将需要的血液量泵出心脏；也就是说，从静脉回流到心脏的血液多于离开心脏的血液。
english: The heart fails to empty effectively, being unable to pump its required amount of blood; that is to say, more blood enters the heart from the veins than leaves through the arteries.

chinese: 心脏不得不加倍工作，以克服动脉阻力的增大。
english: The heart has to pump vigorously to overcome the increased resistance in the arteries.

chinese: 血管弹性下降，也加重了心脏泵血负担。
english: The vessels lose their elasticity, and place increased burden on the heart to pump blood through the body.

chinese: 其过程属于免疫反应，最终导致心脏瓣膜损害。
english: Rheumatic fever usually occurs in childhood, which can follow a few weeks after a streptococcal infection that sets up an immune reaction ultimately damaging the heart valves.

chinese: 心脏瓣膜(特别是二尖瓣)出现发炎和瘢痕(伴赘生物生长)，不能正常开放与关闭。
english: The valves, especially the mitral valve, become inflamed and scarred (with vegetations), so that they do not open and close normally.

chinese: 心脏瓣膜损害的重要体征是瓣膜杂音出现。
english: A key sign in cases of valvular defects is the presence of murmurs.

chinese: 心内膜炎是由细菌引起的心脏内膜的一种渗出性和增生性炎变，也称为细菌性心内膜炎。
english: Endocarditis is exudative and proliferative inflammatory alterations of the inner lining of the heart caused by bacteria (also called bacterial endocarditis).

chinese: 心脏瓣膜损害可能产生赘生物病变，赘生物可能脱落成为栓子；栓子可能进入小血管，导致血管阻塞。
english: Damage to the heart valves can produce lesions called vegetations that may break off into the bloodstream as emboli, which can lodge in the small vessels, causing obstruction of the vessels.

chinese: 心包炎是围绕在心脏外的一层膜(心包)的炎症。
english: Pericarditis is an inflammation of the membrane (pericardium) surrounding the heart.

chinese: 西雅图,华盛顿州-来自西雅图最新的关于心肺复苏（CPR）研究表明：胸外按压能够挽救心跳骤停患者的生命，即使是对除颤器复律无效的心律失常。
english: Seattle, WA - The latest major cardiopulmonary-resuscitation (CPR) study from Seattle shows that chest compressions can save the lives of people in cardiac arrest even if their arrhythmia does not respond to defibrillator shocks [1].

chinese: Peter Kudenchuk博士指出：“不可电复律的心跳骤停包括心脏停搏和所谓的无脉性电活动，占突发心跳骤停事件的75%左右，对于这类患者行CPR是否能够提高其生存率的严格评估的研究还是第一次。研究结果在线发表在2012年4月2日的《循环》杂志上。
english: Nonshockable cardiac arrest, including asystole and so-called pulseless electrical activity, represent about 75% of sudden cardiac-arrest cases, but this is the first study to rigorously evaluate whether CPR could improve survival in this group, he said. Results of the study are published online April 2, 2012 in Circulation.

chinese: 心肌梗塞过程中，流向心肌的富氧血液为形成的凝块所中断，导致了下游心肌死亡并最终为瘢痕组织所代替。它可以造成心脏充血与排空方面的机械性问题，也对调剂心跳节奏的电流信号产生干扰。
english: During a myocardial infarction the flow of oxygen-rich blood to the heart muscle is interrupted by formation of a clot, causing death of the down-stream heart muscle and its eventual replacement by scar tissue. This can cause mechanical problems with filling and emptying the heart, and it can also interfere with the electrical signals that pace the heartbeat.

chinese: Zipes博士说：“ECD电击电流能穿透胸壁‘捕获’心跳，从而抢占心脏固有的心跳控制能力。在追逃中，逃跑者的心率可达到150次/分，然而ECD电击可能实际上大大提高了心率，甚至导致室性心动过速，而室性心动过速又可进一步进展为室颤，导致正常血液循环停止。”
english: Dr. Zipes said: "An ECD shock delivered through the chest wall can 'capture' the heartbeat, taking over the heart's natural ability to regulate itself. A fighting, fleeing individual might have a normal heart rate of 150, but the ECD shock may increase that rate substantially, leading to ventricular tachycardia, which can progress into ventricular fibrillation that stops normal blood flow."

chinese: Zipes博士说：“ECD电击电流能穿透胸壁‘捕获’心跳，从而抢占心脏的自然跳动能力来达到调控的效果。一次电击，避开个别正常的150次/分心率，但ECD电击可能实际上大大提高了心率，甚至导致室上性心动过速，而室上性心动过速又可进一步进展为室颤，并导致正常的泵血及血液循环停止。”
english: Dr. Zipes said: "An ECD shock delivered through the chest wall can 'capture' the heartbeat, taking over the heart's natural ability to regulate itself. A fighting, fleeing individual might have a normal heart rate of 150, but the ECD shock may increase that rate substantially, leading to ventricular tachycardia, which can progress into ventricular fibrillation that stops normal blood flow."

chinese: 房颤的危险因素包括高血压、心力衰竭、糖尿病、高龄和基础心脏疾病等。一些房颤患者可没有症状，只是在体检时才偶然发现房颤。房颤患者的常见症状包括心悸、心跳过快、心律不齐、气短、胸痛或胸闷。
english: There are a number of risk factors forA-fib, including high blood pressure, heart failure, diabetes, advanced age andheart disease. Some people with A-fib have no symptoms and are unaware of theircondition until it's discovered during a physical examination. Those who dohave A-fib symptoms may experience palpitations or sensations of a racing,irregular heartbeat, shortness of breath, chest pain or lightheadedness.

chinese: 专家无法完全搞清乐观心态是怎样保护我们的心脏，但Davidson和同事们指出乐观心态对与发怒和增加心脏病发作风险有关的心跳，血压，皮质素指标有好的影响。乐观的人睡眠也好，也比那些不大快乐的人较易戒烟，研究员认为。
english: increase heart attack risk. Cheerful people may also sleep better, or may be more successful at quitting smoking than their less joyous counterparts, the researchers note.

chinese: 房颤是心跳不规则的最常见的形式，也是中老年人中风的主要原因。调节心跳的电信号，从而变得不稳定。上面的心房颤抖取代了规则的心跳。并非所有的血液能被泵出，因此可形成血块。血块可以迁移到大脑，导致中风。
english: Atrial fibrillation is the most common form of irregular heartbeat, and a major cause of stroke in the elderly. Electrical signals, which regulate the heartbeat, become erratic. Instead of beating regularly, the upper chambers of the heart quiver. Not all the blood gets pumped out, so clots can form. The clots can migrate to the brain and cause strokes.

chinese: 心律失常是潜在的威胁生命的一种心率或心律异常，它导致心跳过快、过慢或不规则。在世界范围内，数以百万计的人患有心律失常。
english: Arrhythmia is a potentially life-threatening problem with the rate or rhythm of the heartbeat, causing it to go too fast, too slow or to beat irregularly. Arrhythmia affects millions of people worldwide.

chinese: 电机械波成像技术是由Konofagou及其团队今年年初基于超声开发的一项创新技术，当时是用于描记对电刺激即时反应的波形瞬变即电机械波，他们能够通过重建多个心动周期波形来描记这些波形但是这种方法对描记非周期性的心律失常比如纤维性颤动并不适应，在新研究中，研究者开发应用了基于快闪宽光束发射的新成像序列以非常高的快帧速（2000fps）来描记自由呼吸状态下的一次心跳周期的整个心脏波形。
english: EWI is a novel ultrasound-based technique thatKonofagou and her team developed earlier this year to map electromechanicalwaves, the transient deformations occurring in immediate response to theelectrical application. They were able to map these waves by reconstructingimages over multiple cardiac cycles but this method did not allow them to imagenon-periodic arrhythmia such as fibrillation. In the new study, theresearchers developed and applied new imaging sequences based onflash- and wide-beam emissions to image the entire heart atvery high-frame rates (2000 fps) during free breathing in asingle heartbeat.

chinese: 如果使用苯佐卡因产品，需关注使用后是否出现高铁血红蛋白症的如下症状：皮肤、嘴唇和甲床呈蓝色、灰色或苍白色，呼吸短促，疲劳，意识模糊，头痛，头昏以及心跳加快等。如果您或您的孩子在使用苯佐卡因后出现上述任何症状，请立即寻求医疗救助。
english: If benzocaine products are used, watch for signs and symptoms of methemoglobinemia, including pale, gray or blue colored skin, lips, and nail beds; shortness of breath; fatigue; confusion; headache; lightheadedness; and rapid heart rate. If you or your child has any of these symptoms after taking benzocaine, seek medical attention immediately.

chinese: 您需要了解高铁血红蛋白症的症状和体征包括：皮肤、指甲和嘴唇呈蓝色、灰色或苍白色，头痛，头昏，呼吸短促，疲劳以及心跳加快。
english: Know how to recognize the signs and symptoms of methemoglobinemia: pale, gray or blue colored skin, lips, and nail beds; headache; lightheadedness; shortness of breath; nausea; fatigue; and rapid heart rate.

chinese: 电冲动控制心跳的频率，还控制心肌的收缩，使血液能全身流动。心肌梗死之后，梗死后形成的瘢痕组织，会在心脏内形成不规则形状的切片，它将阻断正常电活动或者引起短路。研究人员说，心肌梗死后的患者数量日益增长，然而他们将继续面对脆弱而不稳定的心跳。这种情况促使我们研究更为有效的方法来控制电活动紊乱。
english: Electrical signals control how frequently the heart beats and how the heart muscle contracts to move blood through the body. Following a heart attack, irregularly shaped sections of dead scar tissue may form in the heart and block the electrical flow or cause a short circuit. The researchers say a growing number of people who have survived severe heart attacks go on to face a weak, erratic heartbeat, and that has prompted the search for more effective ways to treat these electrical disturbances.

chinese: 结果：在DCCT期间，强化治疗组的RHR均值比常规治疗组要低，青少年组（每分钟心跳次数分别为69.0和72.0，95% CI 62.8-75.7 和65.7-78.9， p=0.013）和成人组（66.8：68.2; 95% CI 65.3-68.4 和66.6-69.8, p=0.0014）均如此。在EDIC随访期间，两个治疗组间的RHR差别至少持续10年(p<0.0001)。
english: Results: During the DCCT, intensive treatment was associated with lower mean RHR than conventional treatment, both in adolescents (69.0 vs. 72.0 beats per minute; 95% CI 62.8-75.7 and 65.7-78.9, respectively, p=0.013) and adults (66.8 vs. 68.2; 95% CI 65.3-68.4 and 66.6-69.8, respectively, p=0.0014). During follow-up in EDIC, the difference in RHR between the treatment groups persisted for at least 10 years (p<0.0001).

english: RESULTS.: Eighteen comparative studies of 114,081 patients matched the selection criteria; 1,858 received kidney from NHB and 112,223 from HB donor.

english: Each phalanx is also a miniature long bone consisting of a body, a larger proximal end or base, and a smaller distal end or head.

english: The anterior group of muscles (sartorius and quadriceps femoris) lies on the anterior and lateral aspects of the thigh.

chinese: 大腿后群肌(半腱肌、半膜肌、股二头肌)位于股后部，由坐骨神经支配。
english: The hamstring group of muscles (semitendinosus, semimembranosus, and biceps femoris) lies on the back of the thigh and is supplied by the sciatic nerve.

chinese: 围绕腘窝使其成为菱形隙的肌外上有股二头肌、内上有半膜肌和半腱肌、外下及内下分别有腓肠肌的外侧头和内侧头。
english: The muscles surrounding the popliteal fossa delineate a diamond-shaped space that is bounded superolaterally by the biceps femoris muscle, superomedially by the semimembranosus and semitendinosus muscles, and inferolaterally and inferomedially by the medial and lateral heads of the gastrocnemius muscle.

chinese: 头皮由五层构成，但临床上常将头三层视为一层，因为在开颅翻头皮皮瓣或意外事故头皮撕裂时，它们紧密结合在一起。
english: The scalp consists of five layers, but clinically the first three are usually regarded as a single layer because they remain firmly bound together when a scalp flap is turned down during a craniotomy or is torn off in accidents.

chinese: 由于有此疏松结缔组织层，使得固有头皮(头三层能自由移动，并在深度撕裂时易于撕下。
english: This loose areolar tissue allows free movement of the scalp proper (the first three layers) as one sheet; it is easily torn in deep scalp lacerations.

english: The cranial nerves convey the output of the brain to the voluntary muscles concerned with movements of the head, eyes, mouth, face, tongue, pharynx, and larynx.

chinese: 颈部有脉管和神经以及连结头和躯干的其他结构。
english: The neck contains vessels, nerves, and other structures connecting the head and the trunk.

english: Its orifice is directed downward and posterior to it, there is a hood-like tubal elevation called the torus tubarius.

english: This is not to pretend that such a large format can be assimilated quickly; it is a handy reference while a background of biochemical knowledge is built up.

english: 5. Two fifteen-carbon units condense, not head-to-tail but rather tail-to-tail, to yield squalene, which is folded in such a way as to become subject to cyclization.

chinese: 所以，在铅中毒时，由于上述头两个酶受抑制，血红素生成减少，而对第三个酶(合成酶)的反馈抑制作用减弱。
english: So in lead poisoning the production of haem is diminished because of inhibition of the first two enzymes mentioned, but the feedback inhibition of the third (the synthetase) is decreased.

chinese: 医学博士Mravin Ryou领导的研究人员，通过内窥镜技术，用内窥镜自组装磁体在5头猪的小肠内创造了胃肠道支路。Mravin Ryou是哈佛医学院内科讲师，布里格姆妇女医院副主任医师。这些猪每3到6天进行一次观察，直到吻合术的吻合完全形成为止。吻合术是将两段胃肠道的末端通过手术连接起来的一种手术。吻合由磁力压缩提供动力。磁力压缩过程利用了机体对胃肠道的自然修复能力。
english: Researchers led by Marvin Ryou, MD, associate physician, Brigham and Women's Hospital and instructor of medicine at Harvard Medical School, endoscopically created a GI bypass by deploying self-assembling magnets for endoscopy (SAMSEN) magnetic devices into the intestines of five pigs. The pigs were scoped every three to six days until creation of an anastomosis, a surgical bypass connecting two parts of the GI tract. The anastomosis was created by magnetic compression, a process that takes advantage of the body's natural healing process to remodel the GI tract.

english: None of the mothers had received antenatal anti-retroviral therapy, but had positive results on HIV rapid tests administered during labor or delivery, or during the first 2 days following the birth.

chinese: 该发现切实描绘了一幅更清晰的画面：意志如何影响免疫活动。“一头黑斑羚的免疫系统不可能知道一头潜伏在草丛中的狮子正要猛扑过来，而它的大脑知道。”Dhabhar说。在这种情况下，狮子和羚羊一样，当抗病原免疫细胞处于预备状态诸如处于皮肤和粘膜等地方，这些地方都是损伤和后续感染的高危区。
english: The findings paint a clearer picture of exactly how the mind influences immuneactivity. "An impala's immune system has no way of knowing that a lion islurking in the grass and is about to pounce, but its brain does," Dhabharsaid. In such situations, it benefits lion and impala alike whenpathogen-fighting immune cells are in positions of readiness in such places asthe skin and mucous membranes, which are at high risk for damage and consequentinfection.

english: Anxiety is characterized by persistent fatigue usually unrelieved by rest, clammy palms, a normal sleeping pulse rate, and normal laboratory tests of thyroid function.

english: Serum gastrin - Depending on the laboratory, normal basal gastrin levels average 50-100 Pg ml, and levels over 200 Pg / ml can almost always be considered high.

english: Compression of the heart by pericardial fluid can cause cardiac tamponade.

english: Noteworthy physical signs are most evident in the heart, lungs, or respiratory control mechanisms.
