english: This is typically accompanied by relatively normal arterial PO2 values unless intrinsic lung disease of intracardiac shunting is present.

chinese: 其机制是：(1)衰竭的心室不能将泵回心脏的静脉血有效泵出，这势必大大增高心脏充盈压；于是，导致(2)体循环中的大静脉血容量增大；以及(3)因交感神经活动增加而导致静脉舒缩张力增加。
english: Responsible mechanisms include (1) the inability of the failing ventricle to eject the venous return without abnormally high filling pressures, causing (2) an increase in the volume of blood in the large systemic veins, and (3) increased venomotor tone resulting from increased sympathetic nervous system activity.

chinese: 发育疾病中最典型的是闭锁(正常开孔缺如或闭合)、无脑畸胎(脑缺如)、脊柱裂(脊柱呈部分闭合)、唇裂、腭裂、先天性心脏病。
english: Examples of developmental disorders are atresia (absence or closure of a normal body opening), anencephalus (absence of a brain), spina bifida (incomplete closure of the spine), cleft lip, cleft palate, and congenital heart disease.

chinese: 也可波及多个基因，并有环境因素参与——家族遗传倾向，如糖尿病、心脏病、高血压、某些癌肿。
english: They may also be conditions that involve multiple genes interacting with environmental factors—the diseases that “run in families”, such as diabetes mellitus, heart disease, hypertension, and certain forms of cancer.

chinese: 有两类疾病导致每年成百上千人死亡，即癌和心脏病，现在发现，这两类疾病有某些遗传因素。
english: Two diseases that account for the deaths of hundreds of thousands a year, cancer and heart disease, are thought to have some genetic component.

chinese: 最近一项研究表明，某些心脏病可通过常染色体显性遗传发生。
english: A recent study has shown that some forms of heart disease may be inherited as an autosomal dominant trait.

chinese: 了解这样的基因基础可以提醒有这样家族史的人，警惕心脏病可能性；同时，提醒他们注意改变饮食和生活习惯。
english: An understanding of the genetic basis would alert persons from families with an incidence of the disease to the possibility of incurring heart conditions and perhaps cause them to alter their diets and life habits accordingly.

chinese: 例如，对于那些可能通过遗传患上心脏病的人，劝其戒烟，避免吃高脂饮食。
english: For example, those who may inherit genes for heart trouble would stop smoking and avoid high-fat diets.

english: If we decide on this course for homozygotes of PKU, should we not extend the same philosophy to those whose families have a history of heart or schizophrenia?

english: Myocarditis is indicated by cardiomegaly and gallop rhythm, but the electrocardiographic changes are usually not specific.

chinese: 这项研究的作者，将研究发表在今天（周三）的欧洲心脏杂志网络版上，他说：“我们的研究结果显示，观察心衰患者无法坚持复杂的自我保健与必需的简单自我管理方法是一致的。”
english: The authors of the study, which is published online today (Wednesday) in the European Heart Journal [1], say: "Our results are consistent with the observation that people with HF have trouble adhering to complex self-care advice, and suggest that simpler approaches to self-management may be required".

chinese: 新研究显示，与母亲无偏头痛病史的婴儿相比，患偏头痛的母亲出生的小孩更容易患急腹痛。急腹痛即其他方面健康的婴儿过度哭闹。该研究今天已公布，将于2012年2月21日—28日在新奥尔良召开的第64次美国神经病学年会上宣读。
english: New research suggests that mothers who experience migraine may be more likely to have a baby with colic than mothers without a history of migraine. Colic is defined as excessive crying in an otherwise healthy infant. The research was released today and will be presented at the American Academy of Neurology's 64th Annual Meeting in New Orleans April 21 to April 28, 2012.

chinese: 美国食品药品管理局（FDA）今天宣布要修订某些他汀类药物与艾滋病病毒（HIV）和丙肝病毒(HCV)的蛋白酶抑制剂的使用说明，以警示这两类药物之间的相互作用可能增加患肌病和肾衰竭的风险。
english: The US Food and Drug Administration (FDA) today announced that it is revising the labels of certain statins as well as protease inhibitors for HIV and hepatitis C virus (HCV) to warn about interactions between the 2 sets of drugs that could increase the risk for myopathy and kidney failure.

chinese: 今天，他的第二次术后检查，Stanley依然无癌，他说，“我还在这，我感觉很好。”
english: On his second post-operative check-up today, Stanley remains cancer-free. "I'm still here," he sayshappily, "I'm feeling good."

chinese: 今天，机器人手术经常用于前列腺和妇科手术。它已经应用于几个美国和欧洲医疗中心，在加拿大多伦多总医院作为一项有效的技术来治疗肺癌。在2011年胸心血管外科杂志的研究表明，这是一项安全并发症低的程序，与肋骨和神经保留开胸手术比较，出血、感染风险的发生率低，住院时间短，生活质量更高。
english: To date, robotic surgeryhas most often been used for prostate and gynecological surgeries. It is nowbeing used in several U.S. and European centres, and atTGH, as a useful technique in treating lung cancer. Studies in the 2011 Journal of Thoracic and Cardiovascular Surgeryhave shown that it is a safe procedure, and results in lower morbidity, such asblood loss, risk of infection, lower mortality, shorter hospital stays, andbetter quality of life than rib-and nerve-sparing thoracotomy.

chinese: 基于应用移动设备的互动游戏来指导医务工作者，今天我们来看下iPhone/iPodTouch/iPad上的Ward Round软件。
english: To build upon this theme of interactive games on mobile devices to help teachhealthcare providers, today we review the Ward Round App for the iPhone/iPodTouch/iPad.

chinese: 一个国际专家小组今天在柳叶刀上报告，对一线和二线药物耐药的结核病，正变得越来越流行，。他们用“令人震惊”来描述耐药TB的广泛程度。在八个国家中，43.7%的TB（结核病）被发现至少对一个二线药物耐药。
english: Tuberculosis that is resistant to first-line and second-line drugs is becoming more prevalent, an international team of experts reported in The Lancet today. They described levels of extensively drug-resistant TB as "alarming". 43.7% of TB (tuberculosis) cases in eight countries were found to be resistant to at least one second-line drug.

chinese: 2012年9月6日，美通社马里兰州罗克维尔消息——开发癌症治疗新疗法的一个临床阶段的制药公司，EntreMed公司（纳斯达克：ENMD）今天宣布，《欧洲癌症杂志》上发表了一篇题为《ENMD-2076，一种口服的血管生成和增殖激酶抑制剂，对复发性铂耐药卵巢癌具有活性》的论文，该文是由来自波士顿达纳.法伯癌症研究所的厄休拉.A.马它罗尼斯博士撰写的。
english: ROCKVILLE, Md., Sept. 6, 2012 /PRNewswire/ -- EntreMed, Inc. (Nasdaq: ENMD), a clinical-stage pharmaceutical company developing therapeutics for the treatment of cancer, announced today the publication of an article by Ursula A. Matulonis, MD, of Dana-Farber Cancer Institute in Boston, entitled "ENMD-2076, an Oral Inhibitor of Angiogenic and Proliferation Kinases, Has Activity in Recurrent, Platinum Resistant Ovarian Cancer," in the European Journal of Cancer.

chinese: 内分泌学会今天公布了诊治高甘油三酯血症的临床实践指南(CPG)。甘油三酯是一种存在于血液中的脂类，与心血管疾病风险有关。该临床实践指南全称为“高甘油三酯血症的诊断与治疗：内分泌学会临床实践指南”，该指南发布于2012年9月期的内分泌学会刊物《临床内分泌与代谢》(Journal of Clinical Endocrinology and Metabolism ,JCEM)杂志上。
english: The Endocrine Society today issued a Clinical Practice Guideline (CPG) for the diagnosis and treatment of hypertriglyceridemia. Triglycerides are a type of fat found in the blood and are associated with cardiovascular risk. The CPG, entitled "Evaluation and Treatment of Hypertriglyceridemia: An Endocrine Society Clinical Practice Guideline" appears in the September 2012 issue of the Journal of Clinical Endocrinology and Metabolism (JCEM), a publication of The Endocrine Society.

chinese: (美国商业新闻社)东部夏令时2012年9月10日早07:45旧金山消息：Durata Therapeutics公司(NASDAQ: DRTX)今天公布了其优先进行的候选药物，达巴万星的体外研究数据以及检测结果，该产品目前正进行两项全球性临床3期试验，用于治疗急性细菌性皮肤与皮肤结构感染(ABSSSI)。该数据于第52届抗微生物剂与化学疗法跨学科会议(ICAAC)上得到公布，数据表明，达巴万星具有抵抗美国和欧洲多种重要细菌株的效能。
english: SAN FRANCISCO--(BUSINESS WIRE)--September 10, 2012 07:45 AM Eastern Daylight Time--Durata Therapeutics (NASDAQ: DRTX) today announced data from an in vitro study and surveillance results of its lead product candidate, dalbavancin, currently under investigation in two ongoing, global, Phase 3 clinical trials for the treatment of acute bacterial skin and skin structure infections (ABSSSI). The data, presented at the 52nd Interscience Conference on Antimicrobial Agents and Chemotherapy (ICAAC), demonstrate the potency of dalbavancin against numerous significant bacterial isolates in the United States and Europe.

chinese: 2012.9.10 —今天，美联邦健康护理研究和质量（AHRQ）机构宣布：经过4年多的以一系列预防策略为特征的一个项目计划之后，比如洗手、穿脱无菌衣等，全美44个州超过1,000所医院将他们中心静脉有关的血液感染率（CLABSIs）降低了40%。
english: September 10, 2012 — More than 1000 hospitals in 44 states lowered their rate of central line-associated bloodstream infections (CLABSIs) by 40% over 4 years through a program that features a checklist of precautions such as hand washing and donning sterile apparel, the federal Agency for Healthcare Research and Quality (AHRQ) announced today.

chinese: 吸着剂疗法，一家生物制药公司研制的用于心血管疾病和肾脏疾病的治疗方法，今天从CLP1001随机、双盲二期临床试验中得到了积极的数据。针对111名因慢性肾病导致心衰的病人的研究结果显示，CLP1001在改善心衰病人症状上优于安慰剂。
english: Sorbent Therapeutics, Inc. a ********aceutical company developing therapies for cardiovascular and renal diseases, today presented positive data from its randomized, double-blind Phase 2a clinical study of CLP1001. In the study of 111 heart failure patients with chronic kidney disease, CLP1001 demonstrated improvement in heart failure symptoms as compared to placebo.

chinese: 他们的研究发现在线发表于今天的《免疫学》杂志（Immunity），同时研究人员也发现尽管当人变肥胖时iNKT细胞会丧失，但这些细胞在体重减轻时可以恢复，这也就意味着未来采用激活iNKT细胞的方法可能会有助于肥胖、糖尿病以及代谢综合征的治疗。
english: Their discovery, published on-line today in the journal Immunity, also finds that although iNKT cells are lost when humans become obese, they can be restored through weight loss, and further suggests that therapies that activate iNKT cells could help manage obesity, diabetes and metabolic disease.

chinese: 2012年9月17日 - Targacept公司（NASDAQ代码：TRGT）今天宣布了TC-5619用于注意力涣散主导型注意缺陷/多动障碍（ADHDi）的2期临床关键研究结果。在该试验中，TC-5619没有达到主要的疗效评价指标，即比较药物治疗组与安慰剂组对于Conners成人多动症（ADHD）病人量表(CAARS-Inv)评分中注意力不集中的分量表在4周治疗后与基线的变化。在整个研究测评中，安慰剂组的患者评分值持续改善优于TC-5619治疗组的患者。在研究中，TC-5619的安全性和耐受性与安慰剂相当。
english: Targacept, Inc. (NASDAQ: TRGT) today announced top-line results from a Phase 2 trial of TC-5619 as a treatment for inattentive-predominant attention deficit/hyperactivity disorder (ADHDi). In the trial, TC-5619 did not meet the primary outcome measure, change from baseline on the inattention subscale of the Conners' Adult ADHD Rating Scale-Investigator-Rated (CAARS-INV), after four weeks of treatment versus placebo. Across the study measures, patients in the placebo dose group consistently improved more than patients in the TC-5619 dose groups. TC-5619 exhibited a placebo-like safety and tolerability profile in the study.

chinese: 美国甲状腺协会（ATA）今天宣布：诊断和治疗甲状腺功能低下的新的临床实践指南发表于最新一期的《甲状腺》杂志。该指南由ATA和美国临床内分泌学家协会（AACE）共同制定，并将于9月23号（星期天）在加拿大魁北克市召开的第82届美国甲状腺协会年度会议上正式呈现。
english: The American Thyroid Association (ATA) today announced that new clinical practice guidelines for the diagnosis and treatment of hypothyroidism are published in the current issue of Thyroid. The Guidelines were developed jointly by the ATA and the American Association of Clinical Endocrinologists (AACE) and will be presented on Sunday, Sept. 23, during the 82nd Annual Meeting of the American Thyroid Association in Québec City, Québec, Canada.

chinese: 在全髋关节置换手术的头两个星期里，跟年龄和性别匹配的病人相比急性心肌梗死的危险性增高了25倍（风险比25.5；95%CI 17.1—37.9）.全膝关节置换术之后的头两个星期急性心肌梗死的危险性甚至更高（HR 30.9；95% CI11。1—85.5）。第二到第六周，在接受全膝关节置换术的患者中，急性心肌梗死的危险性不在那么重要，但是接受全髋关节置换术的患者，和自控病人相比，仍然存在高出5倍的急性心肌梗死可能。(HR5.05; 95% CI 3.58-7.13).
english: Within the first two weeks of total hip-replacement surgery, the risk of AMIwas 25 times greater when compared with a group of age- and gender-matchedcontrol patients (hazard ratio 25.5; 95% CI 17.1-37.9). The risk of AMI in thetwo weeks following total knee-replacement surgery was even higher (HR 30.9;95% CI 11.1-85.5). In weeks 2 to 6, the risk of AMI in patients undergoingknee-replacement surgery was no longer statistically significant, but patientsundergoing total hip-replacement surgery still had a fivefold greater risk ofAMI compared with control patients (HR 5.05; 95% CI 3.58-7.13).

chinese: 研究人员也测试了他们的平衡能力，他们股四头肌的力量，和总得身体活动能力。最后，参与者填写问卷，以确定他们是否有抑郁和/或焦虑的症状，并判断他们如何评价他们生活质量的高度。
english: The researchers also measured their balance, the strength of their quadriceps, and overall physical performance. Finally, the participants completed questionnaires to determine if they had symptoms of depression and/or anxiety and to gauge how highly they rated their quality of life.

chinese: 太极拳组所有患者均显示显着改善。到12个周结束，他们比不练太极拳组患者平均能多走60码远和348秒。他们也能更稳定地站立并和表现出更大的股四头肌力度，这两者对于慢性阻塞性肺病患者来讲都有重要意义。
english: The tai chi group showed significant improvements across the board. By the end of the 12 weeks, they were, on average, able to walk about 60 yards farther and for 348 seconds longer than the group that did not practice tai chi. They were also steadier on their feet and showed greater quad strength, both of which are important for COPD patients.

chinese: 安硕道琼斯美国医疗保健提供者指数基金(NYSE: IHF)是在该趋势中获益的一个ETF。截至目前，今年IHF已上涨了11%。联合健康(NYSE: UNH)与快捷药方(NASDAQ: ESRX)占IHF的权重超过26%。其他头十名以内的控股方包括Aetna (NYSE: AET)、 Cigna (NYSE: CIG) 和 Humana (NYSE: HUM)。
english: One ETF that is benefiting from that trend is the iShares Dow Jones U.S. Healthcare Providers Index Fund (NYSE: IHF). IHF is up nearly 11 percent year to date. UnitedHealth (NYSE: UNH) and Express Scripts (NASDAQ: ESRX) combine for over 26 percent of IHF's weight. Other top 10 holdings include Aetna (NYSE: AET), Cigna (NYSE: CIG) and Humana (NYSE: HUM).

chinese: 助理研究员Maria Garcia-Fernandez,和凋亡与strang癌症生物学实验室的头Hermann Steller,还有他们的同事们,探索了一种叫做Sept4的基因的活性,这种基因编码一种蛋白ARTS, 这种蛋白能够增加程序化细胞死亡,或凋亡,通过与其他预防细胞死亡的蛋白相拮抗.ARTS是由Sarit Larisch首次发现的 ,他是洛克菲勒大学的访问教授,并且发现在白血病和其他一些癌症中缺乏这种蛋白,表明他能够抑制肿瘤.为了研究ARTS的作用,研究人员繁殖了一组缺乏Sept4基因的经过遗传功能处理的小鼠.
english: Research associate Maria Garcia-Fernandez, Hermann Steller, head of the Strang Laboratory of Apoptosis and Cancer Biology, and their colleagues explored the activity of a gene called Sept4, which encodes a protein, ARTS, that increases programmed cell death, or apoptosis, by antagonizing other proteins that prevent cell death. ARTS was originally discovered by Sarit Larisch, a visiting professor at Rockefeller, and is found to be lacking in human leukemia and other cancers, suggesting it suppresses tumors. To study the role of ARTS, the experimenters bred a line of mice genetically engineered to lack the Sept4 gene.

chinese: 本附件和公司录像使用的是超生引导下的中部进入法，就是针头刺入胸锁乳突肌的两头之间进入颈内静脉。放好探头位置，那样颈内静脉就位于胸锁乳突肌的两头之间。轻轻地触摸皮肤以确认位于肌肉之间而不是穿过其中一条肌肉。用18号针头，确认皮肤位于探头中间，注意不要损坏无菌的保护套。以45度的角度进入，保持注射器的负压直到穿入静脉。
english: Position the transducer so that the internal jugular vein is centered in the resulting ultrasound image and between the two heads of the sternocleidomastoid muscle. Gently palpate the skin to confirm that the puncture will be between the muscle heads and not through one of the heads. With an 18-gauge needle, puncture the skin at the center of the transducer, being careful not to damage the sterile sheath. Advance the needle at a 45-degree angle; maintain negative pressure in the syringe until the vein is punctured.

chinese: 本研究包括38名业余足球爱好者，平均年龄刚超过30岁，都自从幼年起就定期参加运动。他们被要求对去年一整年所进行的头球数进行估计。在足球中，你不能用手和前臂触碰球，因此选手们经常用他们的头来接触高球传递给另一个选手。
english: The study included 38 amateur soccer players with an average age of just over 30, who all played the sport regularly since childhood. They were asked to estimate the number of times they headed the ball during the last year. In soccer you cannot use your hands or lower arms on the ball, so players frequently make contact with high balls using their heads to redirect it to another player.

chinese: “当涉及到治愈心脏，婚姻可能成为有效的药物，但是，他现在越来越‘供不应求’，对于越发老龄化的生育潮可不是好兆头。”Idler说。
english: When it comes to healing hearts, marriage may be powerful medicine, but it's in increasingly short supply, Idler says, which does not bode well for aging baby boomers.

chinese: 这些长效药物的处方在头三个月里减少了50%，数据库显示从大约的1.2%降至0.6%。
english: Prescriptions for these drugs declined by about 50 percent during the first trimester, from roughly 1.2 percent of pregnancies in the database down to 0.6 percent.

chinese: 股四头肌无力是晚期慢性阻塞性肺疾病（COPD）的一个重要并发症，但很少有关于该疾病早期的肌肉体积数据。研究人员认为股四头肌体积在轻度COPD和晚期COPD均会降低，可能与体力活动水平有关系。
english: Quadriceps weakness is an important complication of advanced chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) but few data exist concerning muscle bulk in early disease. We hypothesised that quadriceps bulk, measured by ultrasound rectus femoris cross-sectional area (USRF[sub]CSA[/sub]), would be reduced in mild, as well as advanced, COPD compared with controls, and would correlate with physical activity.

chinese: 端粒(Telomeres)是位于染色体末端的相对较短的一种特殊结构。诺贝尔奖获得者之一美国加利福尼亚旧金山大学的Elizabeth Blackburn博士把端粒比做鞋带头上的防止带子散脱的塑料头。
english: Telomeres are relatively short sections of specialized DNA that sit at the ends of all chromosomes. One of the Nobel Prize winners, Elizabeth Blackburn, Ph.D., of the University of California at San Francisco, has compared telomeres to the plastic tips at the ends of shoelaces that prevent the laces from unraveling.

chinese.english: Most typically, combinations have been observed after hypotension such as that which occurs with brief cardiac arrest or after surgery.

chinese.chinese: 然而运动神经分布纯粹是调节性的，它作用于心脏，根据机体的需要调节(增加或减低)心跳的速度和强度。
chinese.english: The motor nerve supply is a purely regulatory one, however; it acts upon the heart to modify, i.e., increase or decrease, the rate and strength of the heart beat according to the needs of the body.

chinese.chinese: 神经冲动对维持心跳并非必不可少的。
chinese.english: Nerve impulses are not necessary to maintain the heart beat.

chinese.chinese: 随后，若它跳动的强度不足以把它刚接纳的全部血液加上前次心跳时剩余的血液都挤压出去，它必须保持在扩大状态或进一步扩张。
chinese.english: If it then does not beat strongly enough to expel all the blood it has just received plus the residue from the previous beat, it must remain dilated or dilate still more.

chinese.chinese: 正常情况下，心脏扩张会产生更强有力的跳动，所以在扩张的某个阶段，心跳通常强得足以恢复循环的平衡(称为“代偿作用”)。
chinese.english: Normally, dilation of the heart produces a stronger beat, so at some stage of dilation the beat usually becomes strong enough to restore the balance of circulation (called "compensation").

chinese.chinese: 洋地黄对减轻代偿失调有用，因为它能增加心跳的强度从而提高心输出量。
chinese.english: Digitalis is useful in minimizing decompensation because it increases the strength of the heart beat and therefore the cardiac output.

chinese.english: These drugs have either been ineffective as dilators or have undesirable side effects such as dryness of the mouth, blurred vision, and slowed heart beat.

chinese.chinese: 因此，本发明的一个重要目的是提供使上泌尿道平滑肌扩张和松弛而又不产生诸如口干、瞳孔扩大和心跳减慢等抗胆碱能药物副作用的方法。
chinese.english: Thus, it is an important object of the present invention to provide a method for dilating and relaxing the smooth muscles of the upper urinary tract without subjecting the patient to the undesirable side effects of anti-cholinergic drugs, for example dryness of the mouth, dilation of the pupils, and slowed heart beat.

chinese.chinese: 今天，已停止种痘，也不再有天花病例的报告。
chinese.english: Today, smallpox vaccination has been discontinued, and no more cases of smallpox are reported.

chinese.chinese: 我们今天甚为珍视的科学基础会成为通往明天的跳板，而明天正是我们大多数第20版《希氏内科学》的读者大显身手之时。
chinese.english: The scientific infrastructure that we appreciate today is the springboard for the future in which most of the readers of Cecil Textbook of Medicine, 20th edition, will practice.

chinese.chinese: 我们今天正以更快的速度经历着这些个“黄金时代”：不到60年前的抗生素的发现，过去30年中对免疫在分子水平上的阐释，以及目前的遗传学，不仅是在分子水平上对其进行了解，而且掌握了利用其为人类直接造福的技能。
chinese.english: We now experience these “golden ages” in more rapid order: the discovery of antibiotics less than 60 years ago; an understanding of immunology in molecular terms within the last 30 years; and now in genetics, not just knowledge at the molecular level but understanding how to manipulate genes for the immediate benefit of mankind.

chinese.chinese: 从病人和简单的归纳法开始，到今天的单个分子和基本生物化学的过程，是一种获取科学知识的模式。这种模式不应对人类生存环境的其它有益者构成诋毁。
chinese.english: This pattern of attaining scientific knowledge, beginning with a sick patient and moving in a reductionist process to individual molecules and fundamental biochemical processes, should not be allowed to lessen our appreciation for the other contributors to the human condition.

chinese.chinese: 对佝偻病和软骨病有关的各种异常今天已有了大量的认识和描述。
chinese.english: The various disorders associated with rickets and osteomalacia that have been identified and characterized to date are numerous.

chinese.chinese: 然而，今天的分子诊断技术提高了诊断这类病人是否属于杂合子的准确率。
chinese.english: Today, however, molecular diagnostic tools have refined the ability to determine heterozygosity in this situation.

chinese.chinese: 但是今天人们生活在密集的世界里，进行无休止的阅读和案头工作。
chinese.english: But people now live in a close-up world—lots of reading and desk work.

chinese.chinese: 脑的偏下部位控制着诸如呼吸、心跳、体温、饥渴的基本活动。
chinese.english: The lower parts of the brain control basic functions such as breathing and heart rate as well as body temperature, hunger, and thirst.

chinese.chinese: 在其它的情况下，可给病人装上心肺器来保持呼吸和心跳。
chinese.english: In other cases, the patient may be placed on a heart and lung machine that maintains respiration and heartbeat.

chinese.chinese: 与受体有关的功能是：①血管扩张，②心跳加快，③支气管扩张，④正性肌力作用，⑤肠道松弛，⑥糖元分解和脂肪酸释放。
chinese.english: The functions associated with beta receptors are ① vasodilatation, ② cardioacceleration, ③ bronchial relaxation, ④ positive inotropic effect, ⑤ intestinal relaxation, and ⑥ glycogenolysis and fatty acid release.

chinese.chinese: 在正常心脏，SA结控制心跳频率，因此SA结称为心脏起搏者。
chinese.english: In a normal heart, the SA node controls the rate of heart beat and therefore is called the pacemaker of the heart.

chinese.chinese: 将电极置于心脏上的皮肤表面，或置于心脏任两侧，譬如在两臂上，并将电极与适当的记录仪器连接，就可记录到每次心跳所产生的电压。
chinese.english: By placing electrodes on the skin over the heart or on any two sides of the heart, such as on the two arms, and connecting these to an appropriate recording instrument, the electrical voltages generated during each heart beat can be recorded.

chinese.chinese: 动脉血压为脉动性，这是由于每次心跳心脏将少量血液泵入主动脉。
chinese.english: The arterial pressure is pulsatile because a small amount of blood is pumped by the heart into the aorta with each heart beat.

chinese.chinese: 然后在两次心跳之间由于血液不断流出大动脉并通过体循环，压力降至80mmHg (10.6kPa) 左右，称为舒张压。
chinese.english: Then, between heart beats, because blood continues to flow out of the large arteries and through the systemic circulation, the pressure falls to about 80mmHg (10.6kPa), which is called the diastolic pressure.

chinese.chinese: 激发试验：在青霉素产生之前，激发方法是必不可少的，今天则已基本废弃。
chinese.english: Provocation: The provocation methods, indispensable before the penicillin era, have largely been abandoned today.

chinese.chinese: 今天，药理学和治疗学的进展加深了我们的以下认识：①人体对药物性能的处置机制，②药物对宿主生理完整性所具有的影响能力；③当多种药物同时存在于体内时，药物之间的相互作用和相互竞争影响机体或被机体所影响。
chinese.english: Today, advances in pharmacology and in therapeutics have broadened our appreciation of the ① mechanisms involved in disposition of drugs by the body, ② the inherent ability of drugs to modify the physiologic integrity of the host, and ③ the interactions between drugs when present simultaneously in the body and the competition between them for each to influence or to be influenced by the organism.

chinese.chinese: 今天，这些药物的应用和效果被看作是医学界一个新纪元的开端，它的意义不仅让我们认识到在健康和疾病中钙作用的复杂性，而且促使一些高度特异性的钙通道阻滞剂的研制和应用。
chinese.english: The application and usefulness of these drugs in medicine now should be regarded as the dawn of a new era not only in comprehension of the multiplicity of calcium actions in health and diseases but also in the introduction and application of highly specific calcium channel blocking agents.

chinese.chinese: 今天正是由于CT扫描，磁共振和一些特殊的定位仪器，这项技术正成功用于对脑部肿瘤进行定位、活体组织检查及治疗。
chinese.english: Today, thanks to CT scanning, MRI, and special stereotactic instruments, the technology is being used successfully to locate, biopsy, and treat brain tumors.

chinese.chinese: 今天各种不同的激光已用于很多医学专业，如妇产科、胃肠科、耳鼻喉科、神经外科和皮肤科。
chinese.english: Today, various kinds of lasers are used in many medical specialties including gynecology, gastroenterology, otolaryngology, neurosurgery, and dermatology.

chinese.english: (3) Today, either sophisticated ultrasound scans or amniocentesis can be used to check a fetus for serious abnormalities.

chinese.english: Cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR), when performed on hospitalized patients or persons older than age 70 out of the hospital, may be successful less than 10% of the time.

chinese.chinese: 来自梅奥诊所的一项新的研究发现：食谱中补充γ-亚油酸可以抑制胰腺癌细胞的生长，并且能选择性地促进小鼠中癌细胞的死亡。研究人员表示，所补充的这种被称为GLA的脂肪酸，当和化疗药物吉西他滨联合给予患者的时候能很好地发挥作用。梅奥诊所的病理学家Ruth Lupu博士今天在2012年美国癌症研究协会年度会议上正式报告这些研究结果。Lupu博士说：“对于胰腺癌，很不幸的是目前缺乏有效的治疗药物。我们从20年前的研究结果知道一些多不饱和脂肪酸，像GLA，能普遍地对肿瘤产生一定的影响，但是我们并不知道是那种脂肪酸会起到这种作用，以及这种脂肪酸会对肿瘤影响到何种程度都不是很清楚。”
chinese.english: The dietary supplement gamma-linoleic acid can inhibit the growth of a subset of pancreatic cancer cells and selectively promote cancer cell death in mice, a Mayo Clinic study has found. The supplement, a fatty acid also known as GLA, worked particularly well when combined with the chemotherapy drug gemcitabine, the researchers say. The findings were presented today by Mayo Clinic pathologist Ruth Lupu, Ph.D., at the American Association for Cancer Research (AACR) Annual Meeting 2012. "One of the most devastating facts about pancreatic cancer is the paucity of effective drugs that exist to halt a tumor," Dr. Lupu says. "We knew from studies done about 20 years ago that polyunsaturated fatty acids such as GLA could influence cancers in general, but we didn't know which type of fatty acids and to what degree."

chinese.chinese: ①低氧症，意思是氧含量低，它可由下列因素引起：(a)空气中氧分压低，(b)肺异常，减少弥散入肺内血液的氧，(c)血液中把氧携带到组织的血红蛋白含量减少；(d)心脏不能向组织泵送适量的血液；(e)纵使有氧可带到组织，但组织不能利用氧。
chinese.english: ① Hypoxia, which means low oxygen content and can be caused by (a) low partial pressure of oxygen in the air, (b) abnormalities of the lungs that diminish oxygen diffusion into the pulmonary blood, (c) decreased amounts of hemoglobin in the blood to carry oxygen to the tissues, (d) inability of the heart to pump adequate quantities of blood to the tissues, or (e) inability of the tissues to utilize the oxygen even if it should get there.

chinese.chinese: 如上述力量是纵向作用于人体，血液就将会转移到身体的一端，使所有血液要么集中于身体下部，以致没有血液回到心脏并使循环衰竭；要么迫使大量血液到头部，致使脑内和眼内血管破裂。
chinese.english: When such forces are applied vertically, the blood is displaced into one end of the body or the other, causing either loss of all of the blood to the bottom of the body so that none returns to the heart, and the circulation collapses, or forcing so much blood into the head that blood vessels rupture in the brain and eyes.

chinese.english: This leads to vasodilatation in all the tissues and causes the heart to pump greater quantities of blood than usual.

chinese.english: Second, thyroxine has a direct effect on the heart, increasing its rate of metabolism as well as its rate and forcefulness of contraction.

chinese.english: During Addison's disease, in which the adrenal glands secrete no aldosterone, the extracellular potassium ion concentration sometimes increases to more than double normal, which has a direct effect on the heart to decrease its pumping effectiveness.

chinese.chinese: 血液中的酸过多可导致糖尿病性昏迷，而胆固醇过多可导致动脉粥样硬化和严重心脏病的早期发生。
chinese.english: The excess acid in the blood can lead to diabetic coma, and the excess cholesterol can lead to early development of atherosclerosis and severe heart attacks.

chinese.english: During the training process of the marathon runner, the size of the heart chambers and the heart mass both increase about 40 percent.

chinese.chinese: 在最大运动量时，心脏以其最大泵功能的90％左右的能力泵血。
chinese.english: In maximal exercise, the heart pumps blood at about 90 percent of its full pumping capacity.

chinese.english: Ancillary investigations in appropriate cases include serological tests for syphilis, electrocardiography to exclude heart block, blood sugar tests to exclude hypoglycaemia, and X-rays of the muscles if there is a suspicion of cysticercosis.

chinese.english: During sexual activity, nerve reflexes begin mainly in the glans of the penis, pass then to the spinal cord, and then return to the sexual organs to cause ① erection of the penis, ② secretion of mucus by glands associated with the penis for the purpose of lubrication, and ③ emission and ejaculation, which occur at the height of sexual stimulation—the period of the male orgasm.

chinese.chinese: 在阴道前缘有阴蒂，其勃起与男性阴茎相似，并有一个小得多的像阴茎具有的阴茎头。

chinese.english: Silver Spring, MD -Oral contraceptives containing drospirenone, a synthetic progestin, may belinked to a higher risk for venous thromboembolism (VTE) than pills with othertypes of progestins, the US Food and Drug Administration (FDA) announced today[1].

chinese.chinese: OncoSec医疗公司今天宣布，改进了治疗晚期实性肿瘤的OncoSec 医疗系统电疗法，对来自欧洲81名原发和局部复发头颈部鳞癌患者进行OMS电化疗4期临床试验，结果数据分析显示电化疗效果好。该研究显示与外科标准治疗结果相比，电化疗更有利于控制局部病灶和提高生存质量。该项结果于2012年4月20日（周五）在荷兰波兹南举办的第五届欧洲头颈部肿瘤会议上被提出。
chinese.english: OncoSec Medical Inc.(OTCBB:ONCS), which is developing its advanced-stage OncoSec Medical System(OMS) ElectroOncology therapies to treat solid tumors, today announced positiveinterim analysis of data from 81 subjects in a Phase IV study of primary andlocally recurrent squamous cell carcinoma of the head and neck (HNSCC) treatedwith OMS ElectroChemotherapy in Europe. The study demonstrated the therapy'sability to provide local tumor control and quality of life outcomes thatcompare favorably to standard outcomes associated with surgery. These resultswere presented at the 5th European Conference on Head and Neck Oncology in Poznan, Polandon Friday, April 20, 2012.

chinese.chinese: 带状疱疹疫苗于2006年获得许可，但国家统计局显示，很少有人接种疫苗。免疫试验咨询委员会建议60及60岁以上老年人接种疱疹疫苗。食品药品监督管理局也建议50岁至59 岁人群接种。今天发布的此疫苗研究结果为此阶段人群及60岁以上老年人提供了重要的接种疫苗安全性的信息。
chinese.english: The herpes zoster vaccine was licensed in 2006, but few people have been vaccinated, national data shows. The ACIP recommends the vaccine for healthy people ages 60 years and older. In 2011, the U.S. Food and Drug Administration approved the use of the herpes zoster vaccine in individuals 50 to 59 years of age. The study results released today provide important safety data for people in this age group as well as adults 60 and older.

chinese.english: In normal labour the basal heart rate between contractions is between 120 and 160 beats per minute, with a continuous slight 'beat-to-beat' variation of the order of 5 beats per minute.

chinese.english: If heart movements are detected with the ultrasound apparatus in two separate areas or directions the diagnosis of twins is almost certain.

chinese.english: The fibrin deposit may give rise to pain and a 'friction rub' may be heard on auscultation when the affected organ slides over the parietal coelomic surface, e.g. during beating of the heart or the pulmonary movement of respiration

chinese.chinese: 根据医学研究所今天发表的一项报告，预防肥胖迫切需要整个美国社会行动起来。
chinese.english: Obesity prevention requires nothing less than changes throughout American society, according to a report from the Institute of Medicine (IOM) being released today .

chinese.chinese: 今天宣布的“区域系统的护理服务示范工程”使的旨在促进更好地协调救治不同区域ST抬高心梗患者项目
chinese.english: The aim of facilitating better coordinated regional programs for STEMI patients is taking another step forward with the "Regional Systems of Care Demonstration Project," announced today .

chinese.chinese: Pharmaceuticals公司和Eisai公司今天宣布：美国食品药品监督管理局（FDA）内分泌和代谢药物咨询委员会以18票赞成，4票反对,1票弃权的结果，通过了对氯卡色林的支持建议，因为有充足而有效的数据可以证实在长期服用氯卡色林的超重及肥胖人群中，药物对其潜在的获益大于对其潜在的风险。氯卡色林是为控制体重而开发的试验性药物，其功能包括减肥作用和对减肥效果的维持作用，适用人群为至少有一种与体重相关的伴生性疾病的超重患者（体重指数大于或等于27）或肥胖患者（体重指数大于或等于30）。
chinese.english: Pharmaceuticals, Inc. and Eisai Inc. announced today that the US Food and Drug Administration (FDA) Endocrinologic and Metabolic Drugs Advisory Committee voted 18 to 4, with one abstention, that the available data demonstrate that the potential benefits of lorcaserin outweigh the potential risks when used long-term in a population of overweight and obese individuals. Lorcaserin is an investigational drug candidate intended for weight management, including weight loss and maintenance of weight loss, in patients who are obese (BMI greater than or equal to 30) or patients who are overweight (BMI greater than or equal to 27) and have at least one weight-related co-morbid condition.

chinese.chinese: 相应研究于今天（2012年5月7日）发表在国际内分泌学大会和欧洲内分泌学大会的联合会议上。瑞士波尔坦大学校医院内分泌学系临床研究人员Emanuel Christ教授说：目前手术切除胰岛癌的瓶颈在于常规成像方法很精确定位。不过，他和同事们发现胰岛癌细胞表面存在高密度的特定类型受体，可以通过放射标记药物定位这些受体。定位这些受体后，患者接受单电子发射计算机断层显像（single photon emission computed tomography，简写为SPECT，是一种2维或者3维成像技术）扫描联合计算机断层扫描（Computed Tomography，简写为CT）扫描。由于能够对肿瘤实现精确定位，该技术使研究者能够检测到结合了标记性药物所在的肿瘤细胞位置，即使在肿瘤的直径只有1厘米或者更小。
chinese.english: Presenting the findings at the joint International Congress of Endocrinology/European Congress of Endocrinology today (7 May 2012), Professor Emanuel Christ, a clinical researcher in the Department of Endocrinology at the University Hospital of Bern, Switzerland, said that at present surgical removal of insulinomas was hampered by difficulties in localising them using conventional imaging procedures. However, he and his colleagues had found that the insulinomas had high densities of a particular type of receptor on their cell surfaces that could be targeted with a radioactively labelled drug. When patients were then scanned by a 2-D/3-D imaging technique called Single Photon Emission Computed Tomography (SPECT) combined with conventional computerised tomography (CT)scan, this technique allowed the researchers to detect where the drug had bound to insulinoma cells, indicating the precise location of the tumours, even when they were as small as about one centimetre in diameter.

chinese.chinese: Pharmos公司（OTC-PINK: PARS）今天宣布：已经完成了使用左托非索泮（S-托非索泮）治疗高尿酸血症和痛风病人概念证明型临床试验。这个临床IIa期试验在杜克大学杜克临床研究中心完成，研究负责人是医学博士、哲学博士、痛风治疗专家和关键意见领袖John Sundy。该研究的初衷是评价左托非索泮（levotofisopam）作为降尿酸药物在治疗痛风病人过程中的安全性和有效性。
chinese.english: Pharmos Corporation (OTC-PINK: PARS) today announced that it has successfully completed a proof-of-concept clinical trial using its compound levotofisopam (S-tofisopam) to treat patients with hyperuricemia and gout. This phase 2a trial was conducted at the Duke Clinical Research Unit of Duke University and the principal investigator was John Sundy, MD, PhD, an expert and key opinion leader in the treatment of gout. The trial was designed to assess the safety and efficacy of levotofisopam as a uric acid-lowering agent in patients with gout.

chinese.chinese: 今天，百健艾迪（纳斯达克：BIIB）和Elan公共有限公司（纽约证券交易所：ELN）宣布：在新西兰医学杂志发表了公司在多发性硬化患者中进行的，TYSABRI(那他珠单抗)使用与发生进行性多灶性白质脑病（progressive multifocal leukoencephalopathy，缩写为：PML）风险的全球性风险管理项目的研究结果。PML是一种罕见的但严重的脑部感染，经常使患者死亡或者出现严重残疾。该项目调查了三项与PML相关的风险因素：抗JC病毒（JCV，一种首先发现于PML的多瘤病毒，命名来源于发现者的首字母）抗体状态，TYSABRI治疗前使用免疫抑制剂，以及长期使用TYSABRI进行治疗。
chinese.english: Idec (NASDAQ: BIIB) and Elan Corporation, plc (NYSE: ELN) today announced that the New England Journal of Medicine published research from the companies' global risk management program that updates the risk of TYSABRI (natalizumab)-associated progressive multifocal leukoencephalopathy (PML), an infrequent but serious brain infection that usually leads to death or severe disability, in people with multiple sclerosis (MS). The analysis looked at three risk factors associated with a patient's PML risk: anti-JC virus (JCV) antibody status, use of immunosuppressant (IS) therapy prior to TYSABRI initiation, and longer duration of treatment with TYSABRI.

chinese.chinese: 今天的开放期刊PLoS ONE发表了这一成果，即利用藻类来生产疟疾的蛋白质，从而在实验室小鼠身上诱导出能对抗疟原虫的抗体来预防疟疾的传播。这项研究进展源自于加州大学圣地亚哥两组生物学家的一次不同寻常的跨学科合作，一组来自于生命科学部和圣地亚哥藻类生物技术中心，该小组在之前曾利用藻类开发出生物制品和生物燃料；另一组生物学家来自于医学院热带医学和急性感染性疾病中心，该中心一直致力于寻找疟疾的诊断、预防和治疗方法。
chinese.english: The use of algae to produce malaria proteins that elicited antibodies against Plasmodium falciparum in laboratory mice and prevented malaria transmission was published today in the online, open-access journal PLoS ONE. The development resulted from an unusual interdisciplinary collaboration between two groups of biologists at UC San Diego—one from the Division of Biological Sciences and San Diego Center for Algae Biotechnology, which had been engineering algae to produce bio-products and biofuels, and another from the Center for Tropical Medicine and Emerging Infectious Diseases in the School of Medicine that is working to develop ways to diagnose, prevent and treat malaria.

chinese.chinese: Receptos公司今天宣布该公司的技术人员将会向消化疾病周(DDW)年会提交一项科学口头报告。该会议于2012年5月20日，周五上午9时在加利福尼亚圣地亚哥会议中心举办。DDW吸引了来自世界各地的数千名医生、研究人员和学者，他们在这首屈一指的科学会议上分享胃肠道健康方面的最新研究成果。以一篇名为“一种小分子S1P1受体激动剂可以显著改善动物模型的炎症性肠病(IBD)”的摘要为依据，Receptos公司学术人员将会讨论RPC1063在两例不同的IBD体内模型中的积极的临床前数据。
chinese.english: Receptos Inc. today announced that company personnel will deliver a scientific podium presentation about RPC1063 at the Digestive Disease Week (DDW) annual meeting at 9 a.m. PDT on Sunday, May 20, 2012 at the San Diego Convention Center in San Diego, California. DDW attracts thousands of physicians, researchers, and academics from around the world to share the latest research in gastrointestinal health topics, for which DDW is the premier scientific conference. Based on an abstract entitled "A small molecule S1P1 receptor agonist with significant efficacy in animal models of inflammatory bowel disease (IBD)," Receptos scientific personnel will discuss positive preclinical data with RPC1063 in two distinct in vivo models of IBD.

chinese.chinese: 世界糖尿病领域的领头羊--诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk）今天宣布，美国食品药品管理局（FDA）已经批准Levemir（注射用地特胰岛素[rDNA 来源]）应用于2到5岁1型糖尿病患儿。随着在儿科适应症的扩展，Levemir现在可用于两岁至成年的1型糖尿病患者及2型糖尿病成人患者。
chinese.english: Novo Nordisk, a world leader in diabetes care, announced today that the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has approved Levemir (insulin detemir [rDNA origin] injection) for use in children ages two to five years with type 1 diabetes. With the expansion of its pediatric indication, Levemir is now available for type 1 diabetes patients from age two through adulthood and adult patients with type 2 diabetes.

chinese.chinese: 今天公布的最新研究显示：皮下注射抗TNF-α药物SIMPONI（戈利木单抗）可以使大部分中到重度溃疡性结肠炎患者出现临床反应，而这些患者在常规治疗中失败或者不能忍受常规药物的副作用。研究人员将杨森公司研发部资助的III期临床试验的结果公布在最新科学发现会议期间的消化药物周（DDW）上。结果显示：在SIMPONI治疗的两个不同剂量组中，超过50%患者在第6周出现了临床反应（该研究的主要终点指标），明显高于对照组的出现比例。与安慰剂组相比，在第六周，SIMPONI治疗组能够显著促进症状缓解、粘膜修复和健康相关的生活质量提高。
chinese.english: New study findings presented today show that subcutaneous induction regimens of the anti-tumor necrosis factor (TNF)-alpha therapy SIMPONI(golimumab) induced clinical response in a majority of patients with moderately to severely active ulcerative colitis (UC) who had previously failed or were intolerant to conventional agents. Investigators presented data from the Janssen Research Development sponsored Phase 3 study at Digestive Disease Week (DDW） during a late breaker session and reported that more than 50 percent of patients in each of two SIMPONI dosing groups achieved clinical response at week 6, the primary endpoint of the study, which was significantly more than those in clinical response after receiving placebo. Treatment with SIMPONI also resulted in significant induction of clinical remission and mucosal healing and improvement in health-related quality of life measures at week 6 compared with placebo.

chinese.chinese: 参议院今天批准了美国食品药品监督管理局（FDA）安全和创新法案。根据美国消费者协会政策和宣传消费者报告的消息：这项法案在现行法律基础上有所提高，不过，在FDA的现行医疗设备监督方面的缺陷并没有丝毫改进。
chinese.english: The Senate approved the Food and Drug Administration Safety and Innovation Act today. While the legislation includes some improvements over current law, it leaves significant flaws with the FDA's current medical device oversight system in place, according to Consumers Union, the policy and advocacy arm of Consumer Reports.

chinese.chinese: Rainbow Coral (OTCBB:RBCC) 公司的生物技术子公司Rainbow BioSciences今天宣布,其最新合资对象AmarantusBioSciences有限公司(OTCBB:AMBS)将有望公布旨在评估治疗创伤性脑损伤(TBI)的一项新型蛋白治疗方法潜力的临床前实验结果.
chinese.english: Rainbow BioSciences, the biotechsubsidiary of Rainbow Coral Corp. (OTCBB:RBCC), announced today that its latestjoint venture target, Amarantus BioSciences, Inc. (OTCBB: AMBS), expects toannounce the results of a preclinical study evaluating the potential of its newprotein therapy as a treatment for Traumatic BrainInjury (TBI).

chinese.chinese: 按例l—27所用的相同实验方法，给9头猪注射以下剂量：第l次给予2毫克／公斤体重盐酸双苯乙硫酯(其分子式中R为二乙氨基的双取代氨基)，第2次给予2毫克／公斤体重盐酸双苯乙硫酯(其分子式中R为吗啉基的双取代氨基)，第3次给予2毫克／公斤体重盐酸双苯乙硫酯(其分子式中R为哌啶子基的双取代氨基)。
chinese.english: The same procedure as utilized in examples 1-27 was used on the nine pigs which were given a dose of 2 milligrams of: first, a thiphenamil hydrochloride (in which R is a disubstituted amino radical of the diethylamino group) per kilogram of body weight; second, a 2 milligram dose of a thiphenamil hydrochloride (in which R is a disubstituted amino radical of the morpholino group) per kilogram of body weight (mg / kg); and third, a 2 milligram dose of a thiphenamil hydrochloride (in which R is a disubstituted amino radical of the piperidino group) per kilogram of body weight (mg / kg).

chinese.chinese: 按例l—54所用的相同实验方法，给9头猪使用以下剂量：第l次5毫克／公斤体重盐酸双苯乙硫酯(其分子式中R为二乙氨基的双取代氨基)，第2次给予5毫克／公斤体重盐酸双苯乙硫酯(其分子式中R为吗啉基的双取代氨基)，第3次给予5毫克／公斤体重盐酸双苯乙硫酯(其分子式中R为哌啶子基的双取代氨基)。
chinese.english: The same procedure as utilized in examples 1-54 was used on the nine pigs which were given a dose of 5 milligrams of.- first, a thiphenamil hydrochloride (in which R is a disubstituted amino radical of the diethylamino group) per kilogram of body weight (mg/kg); second, a 5 milligram dose of a thiphenamil hydrochloride (in which R is a disubstituted amino radical of the morpholino group)per kilogram of body weight (mg / kg) and third, a 5 milligram dose of a thiphenamil hydrochloride (in which R is a disubstituted amino radical of the piperidino group) per kilogram of body weight (rag / kg).

chinese.chinese: 按例l—80所用的相同实验方法，给9头猪注射以下剂量：第l次10毫克／公斤体重盐酸双苯乙硫酯(其分子式中R为二乙氨基的双取代氨基)，第2次10毫克／公斤体重盐酸双苯乙硫酯(其分子式中R为吗啉基的双取代氨基)，第3次l0毫克／公斤体重盐酸双苯乙硫酯(其分子式中R为哌啶子基的双取代氨基)。
chinese.english: The same procedure as utilized in examples 1-80 was used on the nine pigs which were given a dose of 10 milligrams of: first, a thiphenamil hydrochloride (in which R is a disubstituied amino radical of the diethylamino group) per kilogram of body weight (mg/kg); second, a 10 milligram dose of a thiphenamil hydrochloride (in which R is a disubstituted amino radical of the morpholino group)per kilogram of body weight (mg/kg); and third, a 10 milligram dose of a thiphenamil hydrochloride (in which R is a disubstituted amino radical of the piperidino group)per kilogram of body weight(rag / kg).

chinese.chinese: 5头试验动物的测定，是在打开腹腔和堵塞输尿管的条件下进行的。
chinese.english: In five of the experimental animals, measurements were taken with the abdomen open and the ureter obstructed.

chinese.chinese: 静脉注射盐酸双苯乙硫酯2.5毫克／公斤体重，使5头试验动物中的4头静息肾盂压显著降低，降至5.9±3.1厘米水柱。
chinese.english: Intravenous thiphenamil hydrochloride at 2.5mg / kg significantly reduced the resting renal pelvic pressure to 5.9 -+ 3.1 cm H20 in four of the five test animals.

chinese.chinese: 考虑到我们手头有l00多份随机阳性血清，我们选择其中1组用FIAX法测定是否存在I期抗体。
chinese.english: Given the fact that we have over 100 random positive sera on hand, we elected to survey a group of them for the presence of phase I antibody by FLAX.

chinese.chinese: 主要器官系统回顾：皮肤、造血系统(包括淋巴结)，头、眼、耳、鼻、口、喉、颈、乳房及呼吸系统、心血管系统、胃肠道系统、泌尿系统、肌肉骨骼系统、神经系统、内分泌和精神系统
chinese.english: Systematic review of major organ systems: skin, hematopoietic system (including lymph nodes), head, eyes, ears, nose, mouth, throat, neck, breasts, and respiratory, cardiovascular, gastrointestinal, genitourinary, musculoskeletal, nervous, endocrine and psychiatric systems.

chinese.chinese: 具体说，前上臂的肱二头肌就是一块屈肌。
chinese.english: For example, the biceps muscle in the front of the upper arm is a flexor.

chinese.chinese: 而后上臂的肱三头肌则是一块伸肌。
chinese.english: The triceps muscle in the back of the upper arm is an extensor.

chinese.chinese: 与此同时，肱二头肌放松，使肱三头肌能够把它恢复到原位。
chinese.english: At the same time, the biceps relaxes so the triceps can pull it back to its original length.

chinese.chinese: 如果您愿意的话，您可以通过曲臂来感受到你上臂肱二头肌的肌腹。
chinese.english: If you want, you can feel the fleshy belly of the biceps of your arm when you bend your elbow.

chinese.chinese: 试着用手掌去抬桌子边，就可感受到肱二头肌。
chinese.english: Now try to lift the edge of a table with your palm and feel the biceps.

chinese.chinese: 顺肌腹摸向肘关节，可感受到肱二头肌的肌腱。
chinese.english: Follow the fleshy belly toward the elbow and feel its cord-like tendon.

chinese.chinese: 肱二头肌、肱三头肌和其它类的骨骼肌也被称为随意肌，这是因为它们接受人主观意愿的驱使。
chinese.english: The biceps, triceps or other kinds of skeletal muscles are also called voluntary muscles because they are under the control of our willpower.

chinese.chinese: 在生命的头二十年即可发生完全瘫疾或死亡。
chinese.english: Complete paralysis and death usually ensue within the first two decades of life.

chinese.chinese: 梗死患者常有心脏节律障碍，这可能是与之同时存在的但却不相关的心脏病所致，也可能是梗死本身所致。
chinese.english: Cardiac dysrhythmias are frequent in patients with infarction, either because of coexistent but unrelated cardiac disease, or as a result of the infarction.

chinese.chinese: 老年、高血压、昏迷、心脏和呼吸器官并发症、低氧、高碳酸血症、以及神经源性换气过度都是预后不利的因素。
chinese.english: Old age, hypertension, coma, cardiorespiratory complications, hypoxia, hypercapnia, and neurogenic hyperventilation are adverse prognostic factors.

chinese.chinese: 在致命的脑梗死病例中，尤其是大脑中动脉和颈内动脉分布区的梗死，经天幕疝约为l／3患者的死亡原因，另1／3死于肺炎，20％死于心脏病，死于肺栓塞者占l0％。
chinese.english: In fatal eases of cerebral infarction, particularly in the middle cerebral or internal carotid distribution, trans-tentorial herniation is the cause of death in about one third of patients, pneumonia in another third, cardiac causes in 20%, and pulmonary embolism in 10%.

chinese.chinese: 心脏病、高血压和男性则是长期死亡率的附加因素。
chinese.english: For long-term heart disease, hypertension and male sex were additional factors.

chinese.chinese: 例如：有些患者发生大片脑水肿伴颅内压增高。个别人出现抽搐或全身性并发症，包括液体或电解质不平衡、肺炎或心脏疾患。
chinese.english: For example, some patients develop massive brain edema with increased intracranial pressure, and an occasional one will have convulsions or systemic complications, including fluid or electrolyte imbalance, pneumonia, or cardiac disorder.

chinese.chinese: 使用血浆膨胀剂进行血液稀释和容量置换往往会提高心脏病和脑水肿发病率的情况是值得注意的。
chinese.english: The tendency toward an increased prevalence of cardiac events or cerebral edema occurring during hemodilution, and volume substitution with plasma expanders is a matter of concern.

chinese.chinese: 对并存心脏梗死和脑梗死的治疗
chinese.english: Treatment of Concomitant Cardiac and Cerebral Infarction

chinese.chinese: 长期高血压患者显示左心室增大的证据，并经常有提示早期心脏失代偿的舒张期奔马率。
chinese.english: Patients with longstanding hypertension show evidence of left ventricular enlargement and often have a diastolic gallop rhythm that suggests incipient cardiac decompensation.

chinese.chinese: 伴白质病灶组有较多的昏厥和低血压发作，并有较严重的心脏病病史(84％比36％)。
chinese.english: The group with white matter changes had more episodes of fainting and hypotension and had a stronger history of cardiac disease (84 % versus 36%).

chinese.chinese: 虽然早期对实验动物的研究使用具有强磁场的小磁体，近来却使用1．5特斯拉的磁体研究人的肌肉、肝脏、心脏和脑。
chinese.english: Although the initial studies in laboratory animals used small magnets with strong field strengths, recent applications have utilized 1.5 Tesla magnets to study muscle, liver, heart and brain in humans.

chinese.chinese: 体征包括特征性的“蒙古人种样”的面容、单一的掌纹、巨大有裂纹的舌头、肌张力低下、生长延缓和先天性心脏和胃肠道缺陷等。
chinese.english: Physical features include characteristic 'mongoloid' facies, single palmar creases, a large fissured tongue, hypotonia, retarded growth and congenital cardiac and gastrointestinal defects.

chinese.chinese: 例如,X线电影摄影术用来观察心脏瓣膜的活动情况和发现缺损。
chinese.english: For example, cineradiography is used to observe the actions of the heart valves and to note any defects.

chinese.chinese: 后天获得性和先天性心脏病、肺癌和食道癌是胸腔外科医师经常治疗的疾病。
chinese.english: Acquired and congenital heart disease and both lung and esophageal cancer are the disorders commonly treated by thoracic surgeons.

chinese.chinese: 在胚胎学发育的最初阶段，心脏仅是动静脉之间的一段肌肉特别强健和有收缩力的管子；尽管在成人阶段心脏的大小和形状和原来的明显不同，而且完全分隔成左右两侧，但仍可把它比作一个双腔管，在一端(心房)接纳来自静脉的血液，在另一端(心室)将血液泵送至动脉。
chinese.english: The heart begins its embryological development as a particularly muscular and contractile tubular segment interposed between the veins and arteries in spite of the fact that it departs markedly from its original size and shape and is in the adult completely into right and left sides, it can still be likened to a double-barreled tube, receiving blood at one end (the atria) from veins and pumping it out at the other end (the ventricles) into the arteries.

chinese.chinese: 既然心脏必须向一个方向泵送血液，所以它具有防止血液从高压区反流到低压区的瓣膜。
chinese.english: Since the heart must pump blood in only one direction it is provided with valves to insure against backflow from a region of higher to one of lower pressure.

chinese.chinese: 心悸是指对心跳的一种不适感，常被描写为：击拍、敲打、乱跳、落下、停搏、跳跃、赛跑或胸部膨胀样感觉。
chinese.english: Palpitation refers to a disagreeable awareness of the heart beat, described as a thumping, pounding, skipping, flopping, stopping, jumping, racing, or expanding sensation in the chest.

chinese.chinese: 当心脏每搏容积增大如主动脉瓣返流时，病人可受不正常的心跳感觉而困扰。
chinese.english: Patients with a large stroke volume, as in aortic regurgitation, may be troubled with an abnormal sensation of the heart beat.

chinese.chinese: 由于心跳、呼吸和身体的温度是生命的临床指征(在没有现代化的检查手段如脑电图以前的年代，上述体征消失即表示死亡)，所以称之为生命体征(脉搏、呼吸频率、体温和血压)，至今仍是所有体检项目中最常采用的项目。
chinese.english: Because a heartbeat, breathing, and body warmth are the clinical signs of life (the absence of which signaled death in the era before the advent of modem laboratory aids such as the electroencephalogram), the so-called vital signs (pulse, respiratory rate, temperature, and blood, pressure) continue to be the most frequently examined of all physical findings.

chinese.chinese: 延髓除了制造脑脊液之外，它还是几种颅神经的源头和心跳、血管径、呼吸、咳嗽、吞咽、呕吐、打喷嚏及呃逆的控制中枢。
chinese.english: In addition to manufacturing cerebrospinalfluid, the medulla is the source of several cranial nerves and the control center for the rate of heartbeat, the diameter of the blood vessels, breathing, coughing, swallowing, vomiting, sneezing, and hiccupping.

chinese.chinese: X. 迷走神经(混合)：心跳和运动，喉和消化器官。
chinese.english: X. Vagus nerve (mixed): heartbeat and movements, larynx and digestive organs.

chinese.chinese: 两个系统通过调节体温、体液平衡、酶的产生、血压、血糖水平、心率和心跳、激素的生成和类似的各种因素，来维持体内稳定。
chinese.english: Both systems maintain body homeostasis by regulating body temperature, fluid balance, enzyme production, blood pressure, sugar level, heart rate and beat, hormone production, and similar factors.

chinese.chinese: 心率(每分钟心跳次数)由自主神经系统控制。
chinese.english: Heart rate, the number of beats per minute, is controlled by the autonomic nervous system.

chinese.chinese: 自主神经系统的交感分枝通过心脏加速神经来加快心跳，而副交感分枝通过心脏抑制神经来减慢心跳。
chinese.english: The sympathetic division of the ANS increases heartbeat through cardioaccelerator nerves and the parasympathetic division decreases heartbeat through cardioinhibitor nerves.

chinese.chinese: 它的计算方法是每分钟心跳的次数乘以每次泵出的血量。
chinese.english: It is calculated by multiplying the heartbeat by the amount of blood pumped with each stroke.

chinese.chinese: 心跳周期是指一次心跳与下一次心跳间的时间。
chinese.english: The cardiac cycle is the time between one heartbeat and the next.

chinese.chinese: 整个心跳周期持续0.8秒，分为下列几期：心房收缩期0.1秒，心室收缩期0.3秒，舒张期0.4秒。
chinese.english: The entire cycle lasts for 0.8 second and is divided in the following manner: 0.1 atrial systole, 0.3---ventricular systole, 0.4---diastole.

chinese.chinese: 心包腔内液体的郁积妨碍心跳。
chinese.english: The accumulation of pericardial fluid in the pericardial cavity interferes with heartbeat.

chinese.chinese: 心律失常是指不规整的心跳节律。
chinese.english: Arrhythmia is an irregular heart rhythm.

chinese.chinese: 心脏的一些区域变得和起搏区一样，引起心跳减弱和不规整。
chinese.english: Several areas of the heart act as pacemakers and heartbeat is weak and uncoordinated.

chinese.chinese: 通常使用体外休克(称为去纤颤)来恢复正常的心跳。
chinese.english: Usually the use of external shock (called defibrillation) can return normal coordination.

chinese.chinese: 为了避免这种类型的呼吸困难，患者通常会在头和胸部之下垫上两个或更多枕头。
chinese.english: Patients usually learn to avoid dyspnea of this sort by sleeping with the head and thorax on two or more pillows.

chinese.chinese: 大多数自然流产发生在妊娠头三个月。
chinese.english: Most spontaneous abortions occur within the first 3 months of pregnancy.

chinese.chinese: 妊娠头三个月内，胎儿对以上因素最为敏感。
chinese.english: The fetus is most susceptible to their effects during the first three months of pregnancy.

chinese.chinese: 在出生后的头几个月，他是远视眼，就象他的穴居祖先。
chinese.english: In the first few months he was long-sighted, like his caveman ancestors.

chinese.chinese: a．盘状LE，限局性(头和颈)或全身性(“播散性”)盘状LE。
chinese.english: a. Discoid LE, localized (head and neck) or generalized ("disseminated") discoid LE.

chinese.chinese: 红斑狼疮脂膜炎(深部LE):该型LE有真皮深层以致皮下的结节，其直径为l～3或l～4cm，像橡胶一样坚实，境界清楚，且为无痛性，最常发生于头、面和上肢的正常皮肤的下面。
chinese.english: LE Panniculitis ("LE Profundus"): In this type of LE, deep dermal or even subcutaneous nodules 1 to 3 or 4 cm in diameter, rubbery-firm, sharply defined, and nontender, occur, most often beneath normal skin of the head face, or upper arms.

chinese.chinese: 如果用25针头，发生率仅为1％。
chinese.english: The incidence is only 1% when a 25-gauge needle is used.

chinese.chinese: 头三天经静脉输入氢化可的松，每H 30m9／k9．可能有益。
chinese.english: Hydrocortisone, 30 mg/kg/d intravenously, may be useful for the first 3 days.

chinese.chinese: 大多数排斥反应发生于头三个月内。
chinese.english: Most rejections occur within the first 3 months.

chinese.chinese: 头几个月过后死亡相当少见而且大多数存活者术后一年时健康状态极好，这种情况表明可望获得长期存活。
chinese.english: Deaths are relatively uncommon after the first few months, and the excellent health of most survivors at 1 year suggests that prolonged survival can be expected.

chinese.chinese: 若累及腰4神经根，可见膝腱反射减弱和轻度股四头肌无力。
chinese.english: With involvement of the L4 root, the patellar tendon reflex may be diminished and slight quadriceps weakness may be observed.

chinese.chinese: 在本书头三章里，对与药物治疗有关的这三个方面将分别在药代动力学、药效动力学和药物间相互作用的详细阐述过程中进行讨论。
chinese.english: In the first three chapters, this triad of therapeutics is discussed by elaborating on the pharmacokinetics, the pharmacodynamics, and the drug-drug interactions.

chinese.chinese: 此作用可引起股四头肌群肌肉消瘦。
chinese.english: This effect causes muscle wasting in quadriceps femoris groups.

chinese.chinese: 它用于治疗头、颈和食管的鳞状细胞癌，与其他药物联用可治疗睾丸癌以及何杰金病和其他淋巴瘤。
chinese.english: Bleomycin is used in squamous-cell carcinoma of the head, neck, and esophagus, in combination with other drugs in testicular carcinoma, and in Hodgkin's disease and other lymphomas.

chinese.chinese: 在每个横桥末端有一个伸长的头，它可以弯动。
chinese.english: At the end of each cross-bridge is an elongated head that can bend from side to side.

chinese.chinese: 心脏的内膜层，跟与心脏相连血管的内膜相续，称之为心内膜，与血管内膜基本上无区别。
chinese.english: The intimal lining of the heart, continuous with the intima of the vessels connecting to it, is known as the endocardium, and does not differ essentially from the intima of blood vessels.

chinese.chinese: 它也形成心房和心室间的瓣膜以及从心脏出发的两根大动脉干根部的瓣膜。
chinese.english: It also forms the valves that lie between atria and ventricles and at the bases of the two great arterial trunks leaving the heart.

chinese.chinese: 心脏的肌性部分，相当于血管的中层，是一种特殊类型的肌肉(心肌)，只存在于心脏和与心脏相连的大血管中。
chinese.english: The muscular part of the heart, equivalent to the media of a blood vessel, is a special type of muscle (cardiac muscle) found only in the heart and the great vessels as they attach to it.

chinese.chinese: 是这种内在的节律性保持心脏不断收缩；神经冲动只是凋节而不是引发心脏的跳动。
chinese.english: It is the built-in rhythmicity that keeps the heart contracting; nerve impulses simply modify rather than initiate the heart beat.

chinese.chinese: 心脏的最外层是心外膜(浆膜心包性的脏层)，它的外表面是单层间皮细胞(扁平上皮细胞)，与心包的浆膜面(即内表面)相续。
chinese.english: The outermost layer of the heart is the epicardium (visceral layer of the serous pericardium), whose outer surface is a single layer of mesothelial (pavement epithelial) cells continuous with the serous (inner) surface of the pericardium.

chinese.chinese: 心包是一个包裹心脏的密闭囊。
chinese.english: The pericardium is a closed sac surrounding the heart.

chinese.chinese: 纤维性心包内衬间皮(即浆膜性心包的壁层)，它在从心脏出发的大血管周围及沿着心脏后部(即心脏与心包连接处)折转而覆盖在心脏上，在这些部位浆膜层作为心外膜或心旬浆膜层的脏层连续被覆在心脏上。
chinese.english: It is lined with mesothelium (tile parietal layer of serous pericardium) that is reflected onto the heart around the great vessels leaving it and along the posterior aspect of the heart where that organ is fused to the pericardium; in these locations the serous layer continues onto the heart as the epicardium or visceral lamina of the serous pericardium.

chinese.chinese: 现在来描述心脏的大体形态学。
chinese.english: The gross morphology of the heart is described later.

chinese.chinese: 这个中空的肌性器官大小大致与本人的拳头相仿，成人期正常情况下完全分成两侧，血液分别经过这两侧循环，在一侧流人和流出，随后回到心脏再从另一侧进入和流出。
chinese.english: This hollow, muscular organ, roughly the size of one's fist, is in the adult normally completely divided into sides through which the blood circulates separately, entering and leaving one side and then returning to the heart to enter and leave the other side.

chinese.chinese: 把血液运回心脏的大静脉入薄壁的心房，来自全身(肺除外)的静脉汇入右心房，来自肺的静脉入左心房。
chinese.english: The great veins carrying blood to the heart enter the thin-walled atria, the veins from all the body except the lungs entering the right atrium, those from the lungs entering the left atrium.

chinese.chinese: 心脏肌肉血管丰富，由两根动脉即冠状动脉供给营养，它们起始于刚出心脏的主动脉。
chinese.english: The musculature of the heart is highly vascular and is fed by two arteries, the coronary arteries, which arise from the aorta just after it leaves the heart.

chinese.chinese: 冠状动脉的一根重要分支阻塞，尤其是通向心室的分支，是心脏病发作或突发性心力衰竭的常见原因；一根动脉的重要分支狭窄太严重，或小分支发生闭塞，会造成心肌局部缺血，而由此产生的疼痛称为心绞痛。
chinese.english: Obstruction of a major branch of a coronary artery, especially one to a ventricle, is the common cause of a cardiac stroke, or sudden heart failure; too great narrowing of a major branch of an artery or occlusion of minor branches, produces ischemia of the cardiac muscle, and the pain produced by this is known as angina pectoris.

chinese.chinese: 心脏也有神经分布，既有传入神经纤维(包括痛觉神经纤维)，又有自主神经纤维(见第19章)。
chinese.english: The heart also has a nerve supply that contains both afferent fibers (including ones of pain) and autonomic fibers (Chap. 19).

chinese.chinese: 然而运动神经分布纯粹是调节性的，它作用于心脏，根据机体的需要调节(增加或减低)心跳的速度和强度。
chinese.english: The motor nerve supply is a purely regulatory one, however; it acts upon the heart to modify, i.e., increase or decrease, the rate and strength of the heart beat according to the needs of the body.

chinese.chinese: 既然心脏分成左右两侧，它便有两个循环。
chinese.english: Since the heart is divided into right and left side, there are two circulations through it.

chinese.chinese: 今天，美国临床内分泌医师协会(AACE)欢迎了一个来自中国的内分泌医师代表团，该代表团将参加于5月23日至27日在费城举行的AACE第21届科学与临床年度会议。这是该世界人口最多国家的内分泌医师团体首次访问（感觉参与更合适）AACE活动。中国医师将参与讲座和活动，参观行业展览，会见AACE领导层并考察AACE会员的方法与实践。
chinese.english: Today, the American Association of Clinical Endocrinologists (AACE) welcomes a delegation of endocrinologists from China to its 21st Annual Scientific and Clinical Congress in Philadelphia May 23-27. It is the first time a group of endocrinologists from the world's most populous nation has visited this AACE event. The Chinese physicians will attend lectures and events, review industry exhibits, meet with AACE leadership and examine the methods and practices of AACE members.

chinese.chinese: 美国内分泌专家协会（AACE）今天在线公布了有关胰岛素泵管理的共识意见，并且将会刊登在AACE协会的官方医学期刊内分泌实践中。
chinese.english: The American Association of Clinical Endocrinologists (AACE)today published a consensus statement for insulin pump management online, andthe statement will be published in the next issue of the association's officialmedical journal Endocrine Practice.

chinese.chinese: 今天，安进公司（纳斯达克股票代码：AMGN）报道了III期临床EVOLVE实验的结果。EVOLVE(EValuation Of Cinacalcet HCl Therapy to Lower CardioVascular Events,译为对盐酸甲状旁腺素降低心血管不良反应的评价)试验用来评估Sensipar/Mimpera（甲状旁腺素）降低心血管不良事件的程度。EVOLVE试验是在3883名继发性甲状旁腺功能亢进（hyperparathyroidism，缩写为HPT）患者中进行的；患者同时患有慢性肾病，正在接受透析治疗。该研究的主要终点指标是复合事件发生，包括全因死亡率或者第一个非致命性心血管不良反应（包括心肌梗塞，不稳定心绞痛的入院治疗，心衰或者外周血管不良反应）的发生率。虽然Sensipar/Mimpara治疗组的复合主要不良事件较少，不过，两组间的差异没有统计学意义；该研究没有达到意向性治疗分析的主要终点指标。
chinese.english: Amgen (NASDAQ:AMGN) today announced top-line results of the Phase 3 EVOLVE (EValuation Of Cinacalcet HCl Therapy to Lower CardioVascular Events) trial, which evaluated Sensipar?/Mimpara? (cinacalcet) for the reduction of the risk of mortality and cardiovascular (CV) events among 3,883 patients with secondary hyperparathyroidism (HPT) and chronic kidney disease (CKD) receiving dialysis. The primary endpoint of the study was time to the composite event comprising all-cause mortality or first non-fatal cardiovascular event, including myocardial infarction, hospitalization for unstable angina, heart failure or peripheral vascular event. Although patients in the Sensipar/Mimpara arm experienced numerically fewer composite primary events, the results were not statistically significant, and the trial did not meet its primary endpoint in the intent-to-treat analysis.

chinese.chinese: Ophthotech公司今天宣布：从第一个临床研究结果看，治疗神经血管性年龄相关性黄斑变性（湿性年龄相关性黄斑变性），联合用药优于单用Lucentis（兰尼珠单抗，抗血管内皮生长因子单抗），两者具有统计学上差异
chinese.english: Ophthotech Corporation today announced results from the first clinical trial to show statistically significant superior efficacy over Lucentis (ranibizumab) monotherapy for the treatment of neovascular age-related macular degeneration (wet AMD).

chinese.chinese: 注意！美国，该降低体重了——肥胖不但使你一直感觉疲倦而且可能会让你容易出现意外事故，今天在SLEEP2012大会上公布的三项研究结论显示肥胖及抑郁症可能是造成我们在清醒时过度疲乏嗜睡的罪魁祸首。
chinese.english: Wake up, America, and lose some weight - it's keeping you tiredandprone to accidents. Three studies being presented today at sleep2012 conclude that obesity and depression are the two main culprits making usexcessively sleepy while awake.

chinese.chinese: 辉瑞公司今天发布声明称收到美国食品和药物管理局关于Tafamidis新药申请的答复信。政府要求批准之前需完成次要疗效的研究，以确保建立疗效的证据牢靠。并且还要求关于目前tafamidis新药申请的额外信息。辉瑞将与FDA合作，解决答复信中的问题。Tafamidis是种治疗有症状的成人甲状腺素家族性淀粉样多发性神经病(TTR-FAP)的新型研究药物，可延缓神经损害。
chinese.english: Pfizer Inc. announced today that it hasreceived a Complete Response Letter from the U.S. Food and Drug Administration(FDA) on its New Drug Application (NDA) for tafamidis meglumine. The Agency isrequesting the completion of a second efficacy study to establish substantialevidence of effectiveness prior to an approval. The Agency has also asked foradditional information on the data within the current tafamidis NDA. Pfizerwill work with the FDA to address the content of the letter. Tafamidis is anovel, investigational medication for the treatment of Transthyretin FamilialAmyloid Polyneuropathy (TTR-FAP) in adult patients with symptomaticpolyneuropathy to delay neurologic impairment.

chinese.chinese: 波士顿Brigham 妇女医院的Marc Bonaca博士今天在美国心脏协会新兴医学系列的在线会议上发表了TRA 2°P TIMI 50研究中的PAD患者数据。
chinese.english: The PAD data from TRA 2°P TIMI 50 was presented today by Dr Marc Bonaca (Brigham and Women's Hospital, Boston, MA) in an American Heart Association Emerging Science Series webinar.

chinese.chinese: Veracyte (South San Francisco, CA, USA; www.veracyte.com)是一家在新兴的分子细胞学领域处于领先水平的分子诊断公司。他们今天宣布了一项大样本、多中心、前瞻性研究的结果，证明通过基因表达分类器检测Afirma基因的表达能降低超过一半以上不必要的甲状腺癌手术。
chinese.english: Veracyte, Inc., a molecular diagnostics company that is pioneering the emerging field of molecular cytology, today announced results from a large, prospective, multicenter study, which demonstrated the potential for the Afirma Gene Expression Classifier, a gene expression test, to reduce the large number of unnecessary surgeries in thyroid cancer diagnosis by more than half.

chinese.chinese: PROLOR生物技术公司(NYSE MKT: PBTH)今天宣布，在第58届血栓与止血国际协会(ISTH)科学与标准化委员会年会上，PROLOR公司科学家Gili Hart博士将公布该公司长效凝血因子用于治疗血友病的临床前研发数据。Hart博士将于明天，即2012年6月30日，在英国利物浦ISTH会议上进行该口头报告。
chinese.english: PROLOR Biotech, Inc. (NYSE MKT: PBTH), today announced that PROLOR scientist Dr. Gili Hart will present data on the company's long-acting clotting factors in preclinical development for the treatment of hemophilia at the 58th Annual Meeting of the Science and Standardization Committee of the International Society on Thrombosis and Haemostasis (ISTH). Dr. Hart's oral presentation will take place tomorrow, June 30, 2012, at the ISTH meeting in Liverpool, UK.

chinese.chinese: 我希望一旦临床医生开始将基因组分析手段用于诊断，他们就能够理性地使用这些药物。我们今天看到这有望变成现实，我确信很快就会看到它变成现实。临床医生将能够确定特定患者受到了哪种感染，然后从药柜中取出针对这种细菌的药物。这可能会完全改变今天的开药方法。
chinese.english: My other hope for clinicians is that they will be able to use them more rationally once they start using genome analysis as a diagnostic tool. What we're seeing in capability today, I have no doubt that it's going to happen very, very soon. The clinician will be able to identify precisely what type of infection is ongoing in this particular patient and then go the shelf and pick the right drugs against the right bugs. That may change the picture entirely.

chinese.chinese: Tak Mak博士的这个研究结果今天发表在Nature上，他评论说：“我们首次证明代谢异常可导致癌症发生。这为开发阻断相关基因突变以抑制致癌性代谢酶的产生搭建了平台。”该研究组的科学家分别来自于英国纽约的威尔康乃尔医学院以及美国马萨诸塞州剑桥大学的Agios制药公司。
chinese.english: Says Dr. Tak Mak of the findings published today in Nature: "For the first time, we have demonstrated how a metabolite can cause cancer. This sets the stage for developing inhibitors to block the mutation and prevent the production of this disease-initiating enzyme." The research team included scientists at Weill Cornell Medical College, New York City, and Agios Pharmaceuticals, Cambridge, Massachusetts.

chinese.chinese: 贫血的特征是全身皮肤苍白和心跳、呼吸次数增加。
chinese.english: Anemia is characterized by a general paleness and increased heart and respiratory rates.

chinese.chinese: 兴奋药的作用是提高机体的警觉性，引起不安、失眠、心跳加速，在特殊情况下引起惊厥。
chinese.english: The effects of stimulants are increased alertness, restlessness and insomnia, rapid heartbeat, and, in extreme cases, convulsion.

chinese.chinese: 心脏抑制药减慢心率并使快速而无规律的心跳恢复为缓慢的正常心跳。
chinese.english: Cardiac depressants slow the heart rate and reduce quick, irregular heartbeats to slow, normal beats.

chinese.chinese: 血管用药：血管收缩药通过收缩虹管使血压升高和心跳加快。
chinese.english: Vascular drugs: Vasoconstrictors raise blood pressure and increase heart rate by constricting the blood vessels.

chinese.chinese: 心跳源于SA结(心的起搏点)，该结位于界嵴上部、上腔静脉开口于右心房处的右侧。
chinese.english: The heart beat is initiated in the SA node (the pacemaker of the heart), situated in the upper part of the crista terminalis just to the right of the opening of the superior vena cava into the right atrium.

chinese.chinese: 刺激迷走神经则心跳变慢甚至停跳。
chinese.english: Vagal stimulation slows or even stops the heart.

chinese.chinese: 延髓内有心血管和呼吸中枢，分别对心跳和呼吸进行自主性控制。
chinese.english: The medulla contains the cardiovascular and respiratory centers for automatic control of heart beat and respiration, respectively.

chinese.chinese: 根据发表在美国心脏协会新兴科学系列网络研讨会的最新研究，有些不规则心跳的患者在脱离抗凝药物后会在一个月之内面临一种高的中风或凝血风险。
chinese.english: Some patients with irregular heartbeats whoare taken off anti-clotting medication face a high risk of stroke or bloodclotting within a month, according to new research presented at the AmericanHeart Association's Emerging Science Series webinar.

chinese.chinese: 家用的监测系统采用前瞻性而不是反应性的方式监测老年人的健康，Rantz任务，这样可以提供自动化的数据来警示监控者何时他们的患者需要援助或干预。传感器包括可测量客户家中运动量的视频游戏技术，研究人员将整合可监测个体脉搏、呼吸、心跳的新型液压床传感器。
chinese.english: The in-home monitoring systems use proactive, rather than reactive, ways of monitoring seniors' health, according to Rantz, offering automated data that alert care providers when patients need assistance or intervention. The sensors will include video gaming technology for measuring residents' movements in the home, and the researchers will integrate new hydraulic bed sensors that will monitor an individual's pulse, respiration and restlessness.

chinese.chinese: Vertex将在今天，即美国东部时间2012年6月28日早8:00，就这些数据召开面向投资者和媒体的电话会议。该研究的完整数据将提交到一个即将召开的医学会议上进行发布。
chinese.english: Vertex will host a conference call for investors and media today, June 28, 2012 at 8:00 a.m. ET, to discuss these data. Full data from this study will be submitted for presentation at an upcoming medical meeting.

chinese.chinese: TONIX今天提出的新研究报告证实，该公司舌下含服片型TNX-102（2.4毫克）能使环苯扎林较口服环苯扎林片更快速地交换和吸收。事实上，TONIX公司发现新型SL制剂的吸收同静脉注射环苯扎林一样好。环苯扎林是美国FDA批准的两种肌肉松弛处方药中的活性成分。这两种肌松药由其他制药公司生产。
chinese.english: The new research reported by TONIX todaydemonstrates that the Company's SL TNX-102 (2.4 mg) tablet provides fasterdelivery and more efficient absorption of cyclobenzaprine as compared to thecurrently available pills that deliver cyclobenzaprine to the stomach. In fact,TONIX discovered that cyclobenzaprine given in a novel SL formulation isabsorbed as well as intravenous cyclobenzaprine. Cyclobenzaprine is the activeingredient in two prescription muscle relaxants that have been approved by theU.S. Food and Drug Administration and are marketed by other companies.

chinese.chinese: 以色列2频道电视台在今天采访了一个原本患有重症肌无力而近期又被诊断为“肌萎缩侧索硬化”的患者。该患者说经过姑息性NurOwn细胞（BrainStorm公司研制）治疗后，他的语言、行走、平衡、姿势、肌力、食欲、消化功能都获得明显改善，体重也增加了。
chinese.english: Israeli Channel 2 TV interviewed today a patient suffering from Myasthenia Gravis (MG) and recently diagnosed with ALS. The patient reported that he has experienced visible improvement in his speech, walking, balance, posture, muscle strength, appetite, digestion, and weight gain following compassionate treatment with BrainStorm's NurOwn cell therapy.

chinese.chinese: 2012年6月29日--美国商务在线--加利福尼亚州雷德伍德市消息-- A.P.制药公司(OTCBB: APPA.OB)是一家专业制药公司，该公司今天公布了APF530临床3期研究的附加数据，APF530用于预防化疗引起的恶心呕吐反应(CINV)。对该研究子系列数据进行的分析发现，在5天的时间内，APF530与帕洛诺司琼(Aloxi)在控制恶心呕吐以及患者满意度方面效果类似。A.P.公司今天将研究结果以海报方式，发表于在纽约召开的癌症支持性护理跨国协会与国际口腔肿瘤协会(MASCC/ISOO)国际座谈会上。根据之前的报道，临床3期研究表明，APF530与帕洛诺司琼在预防患者急性与迟发型CINV方面效果类似，这些患者的治疗方式为适度呕吐型化疗(MEC)或高度呕吐型化疗(HEC)。
chinese.english: REDWOOD CITY, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Jun 29, 2012 - A.P. Pharma, Inc. (OTCBB: APPA.OB), a specialty pharmaceutical company, today announced additional data from the Company's Phase 3 study of APF530 for the prevention of chemotherapy-induced nausea and vomiting (CINV). The findings from the analysis of this subset of data indicate that APF530 offered comparable nausea control and patient satisfaction to palonosetron (Aloxi?) over a 5-day period. The Company presented the study results today at a poster presentation during the Multinational Association of Supportive Care in Cancer and the International Society of Oral Oncology (MASCC/ISOO) International Symposium in New York. As previously reported, the Phase 3 study showed APF530 was comparable to palonosetron in preventing both acute- and delayed-onset CINV in patients receiving either moderately emetogenic chemotherapy (MEC) or highly emetogenic chemotherapy (HEC).

chinese.chinese: 除颤电极导线是连接到植入心脏的装置上，用以检测异常的心脏节律并产生电击来恢复正常的心跳。
chinese.english: The lead is a wire attached to the device that is inserted into the heart to detect abnormal heart rhythms and deliver an electrical shock to restore normal heartbeat.

chinese.chinese: 如果您或您的孩子服用质子泵抑制剂后出现心跳或心律失常，或者出现心跳加快、心悸、肌肉痉挛、震颤或者癫痫发作等症状，请及时就医。对于儿童，心律失常还可能导致疲劳、胃部不适、头晕和头晕等症状。
chinese.english: Seek immediate care if you (or your child) experience an abnormal heart rate or rhythm, or symptoms such as a racing heartbeat, palpitations, muscle spasm, tremor or convulsions while taking a PPI drug. In children, abnormal heart rates may cause fatigue, upset stomach, dizziness and lightheadedness.

chinese.chinese: 得益于哥伦比亚工程学院的一项新研究，医生现在能在一次心跳周期中诊断出非周期性的心率失常，此技术无创、花费低，可以在自己的办公室内进行。非周期性的心率失常包括房颤和室颤，同时伴有严重异常的心律，其中一些可危及生命。哥伦比亚工程学院最新研究了一项新技术名为电机械波成像技术，研究者发射非聚焦超声波通过密闭的胸腔进入心脏，这样研究者俘获快帧速图像，使得研究者首次描绘了瞬息事件，比如数十毫秒内的电机械激活，同时在一次心跳周期内成像整个心脏。此项哥伦比亚工程学院的研究最新发表在英国皇家物理学会期刊数据库。
chinese.english: Thanksto a new study from Columbia Engineering School,doctors may now be able to diagnose in their offices non-periodic arrhythmias - noninvasively and at low cost -within a single heartbeat. Non-periodic arrhythmias include atrial and ventricular fibrillation, which areassociated with severely abnormal heart rhythm that can in some cases be life-threatening.UsingElectromechanical Wave Imaging (EWI), a technique recently developed atColumbia Engineering, the researchers sent unfocused ultrasound waves throughthe closed chest and into the heart. They were able to capturefast-frame-rateimages that enabled them - for the first time - to map transientevents such as the electromechanical activation that occurs over a few tens ofmilliseconds while also imaging the entire heart within a single beat. TheColumbia Engineering study was recently published in IOPscience.

chinese.chinese: 没有足够的红细胞在体内携带氧分子，病人会出现乏力，气短，心跳加快等症状。
chinese.english: Without red blood cells to carry oxygen throughout the body, fatigue, shortnessof breath, rapid heartbeat and other symptoms can occur.

chinese.chinese: FDA目前承认，这项研究论证了Qnexa在最初的12个月的治疗中，能帮助病人减去相当多的体重。代理商补充说，许多参与者在他们的第二年中恢复了减轻的体重。对出生缺陷和加速心跳的关注再次增加。
chinese.english: The FDA now acknowledges that studies have demonstratedthat Qnexa can help patients lose a considerable amount of weight during theinitial 12 months of treatment. The Agency added that a number of participants put some of their lost weight back on during theirsecond year. Concerns regarding birth defects and accelerated heartbeat wereraised again.

chinese.chinese: 胎儿先天性心脏传导阻滞是由于他母亲的免疫系统错误的攻击胎儿心肌中传导心跳信号的神经纤维。
chinese.english: The unborn baby's congenital heart block developed when her mother's immune system mistakenly attacked the nerves fibres that transmit heartbeat signals in the fetal heart muscle.

chinese.chinese: 两侧的循环当然是同时发生的，量也相等，而追踪一定量血液从其流人心脏的一侧直到它又流回到该侧的循环过程较为方便。
chinese.english: Both, of course, occur simultaneously and are equal in volume, but it is convenient to trace a given quantity of blood from the time it enters one side of the heart until it returns again to that side.

chinese.chinese: 和心脏右侧的情况一样，左心房收缩时将增加的血液射入左心室，心室收缩使左房室瓣关闭并将血液经主动脉送出，位于主动脉根部的主动脉瓣的关闭，阻止血液反流到舒张的左心室。
chinese.english: As in the case of the right side of the heart, contraction of the left atrium injects additional blood into the left ventricle, contraction of the ventricle closes the left atrioventricular valve and forces blood out through the aorta, and closure of the aortic valve at the base of the aorta prevents regurgitation of blood into the relaxing left ventricle.

chinese.chinese: 随后，血液经主动脉的分支运送到全身的组织中，在那里释出氧，带走二氧化碳，并流回到心脏的右侧，又重新开始其双循环。
chinese.english: The blood is then delivered through the branches of the aorta to the tissues of the body, where it loses oxygen, picks up carbon dioxide, and returns to the right side of the heart to begin its double cycle all over again.

chinese.chinese: 既然血液在肺和全身组织内不断地循环，心脏的两侧处置的血液要等量这显然是非常重要的。
chinese.english: Since the blood is constantly circulating both to the lungs and the tissues of the body, it is obviously very important that both sides of the heart handle the same amount of blood.

chinese.chinese: 正常情况下，心脏扩张会产生更强有力的跳动，所以在扩张的某个阶段，心跳通常强得足以恢复循环的平衡(称为“代偿作用”)。
chinese.english: Normally, dilation of the heart produces a stronger beat, so at some stage of dilation the beat usually becomes strong enough to restore the balance of circulation (called "compensation").

chinese.chinese: 心搏周期是在心脏充盈和排空的一次搏动期间所发生的一系列变化过程。
chinese.english: The cardiac cycle is the series of events occurring during one beat of the heart as it fills and empties.

chinese.chinese: 心脏收缩的区段时间称为收缩期，舒张的那段时间称为舒张期。
chinese.english: The period of contraction of the heart is systole, that of relaxation, diastole.

chinese.chinese: 20世纪50年代发现血清转氨酶和脱氢酶与心脏和肝脏疾病之间的关系，这一发现对寻找血清中存在的可能有诊断价值的其他酶起了推动作用。
chinese.english: The discovery in the 1950s of the relationship between the activities of serum aminotransferases and dehydrogenases and heart and liver diseases gave the impetus to search for other enzymes present in serum which could be of diagnostic value.

chinese.chinese: 酶监测最有用和使用最普遍的两个例子可能是肝脏和心脏疾病。
chinese.english: Perhaps the two examples in which enzyme monitoring has been most useful and widely applied are those of liver and heart diseases.

chinese.chinese: 必须强调的是，酶活性测定本身不是可赖以做出诊断的充分证据，而必须与临床症状和其他证据结合起来考虑，例如心脏病要与心电图一起考虑。
chinese.english: It must be emphasized that the measurement of enzyme activity itself is not sufficient evidence on which to make a diagnosis but must be taken in conjunction with the clinical symptoms and other types of evidence, e.g. electrocardiographic evidence in the case of heart disease.

chinese.chinese: 应激反应与身心疾病、消化性溃疡病和心脏病有关系，并已知它对健康状况和全身感觉产生有害的影响。
chinese.english: Stress has been linked to psychosomatic illness, peptic ulcer disease, and heart disease and is known to have a detrimental effect on health and a general sense of well-being.

chinese.chinese: 为了解决这个问题，全国情绪应激反应与心脏病会议已提出应激反应的当代定义如下：“是一种明显令人痛苦或有害的作用力，对人的情绪和躯体引起苦恼或紧张。”
chinese.english: In an attempt to ameliorate this problem, the National Conference on Emotional Stress and Heart Disease has offered this contemporary definition of stress: "An obviously painful or adverse force which induces distress or strain upon both the emotional and physical make-up."

chinese.chinese: 据估计，这些死者中几乎有25％先前无心脏病症状。
chinese.english: It is estimated that almost 25 percent of these victims had no prior symptoms of heart disease.

chinese.chinese: 目前人们认为猝死是心脏电活动异常造成的。
chinese.english: Sudden death is now believed to result from aberrant electrical activity in the heart.

chinese.chinese: 这种异常电活动导致心律异常，后者又损害心脏的有效工作能力。
chinese.english: This activity leads to abnormal heart rhythms that in turn compromise the heart/s ability to pump effectively.

chinese.chinese: 而后该头又附着于沿该肌动蛋白微丝更远处并又拉一步。
chinese.english: Then the head attaches farther along the actin filament and pulls it still another step.

chinese.chinese: 这些头运动是靠三磷酸腺苷分解成二磷酸腺苷提供能量的，三磷酸腺苷分解释放出促进肌肉收缩所需要的能量。
chinese.english: The movements of these heads are energized by the breakdown of adenosine triphosphate to adenosine diphosphate, which releases the energy required to promote the muscle contraction.

chinese.chinese: 此感觉器官包含一些小的钙化颗粒称为耳石，耳石搁在许多很易兴奋的感觉神经末梢(毛细胞)上，这些耳石的重量引起来自毛细胞的某种特殊形式的神经信号，头的每一个位置与重力牵拉毛细胞的关系都产生一种特殊形式的神经信号，因此，前庭器官发出一个人是否处于平衡的信号，而延脑网状结构则利用此信号引起为维持平衡的适宜的肌肉收缩。
chinese.english: " This sensory organ contains small calcified granules, the otoliths, that rest on top of many very excitable sensory nerve endings, the hair cells, and the weight of these otoliths causes a specific pattern of nerve signals from the hair cells for each position of the head with respect to the pull of gravity, Thus, the vestibular apparatus signals whether a person is in balance or out of balance, and the bulb reticular formation utilizes this information to contract the appropriate muscles for maintaining equilibrium

chinese.chinese: 位于前部的裂孔可以更容易利用冷凝脉络膜视网膜加以封闭;这种冷凝常可透过裂孔所在部位的结膜进行（用尖端温度为－70℃的冷冻头）。
chinese.english: Anteriorly placed tears can more readily be sealed by cryocoagulation of the chorioretina; this is usually applied through the conjunctiva over the site of the break (using a probe with a tip temperature of -70℃).

chinese.chinese: 糖尿病玻璃体出血常常消散较慢，可能形成机化，在这种情况下可能需玻璃体切除术，即通过玻璃体切割头顶端的小孔吸出玻璃体，切割头通过睫状体平部切口插入眼内，同时通过外套管注入林格液以代替吸出的玻璃体。
chinese.english: Diabetic vitreous haemorrhages are often slow to disperse and may become organized; in such cases a vitrectomy may be indicated, aspirating vitreous through a pore at the tip of the vitrectomy probe, which is inserted into the eye through a pars plana incision; meanwhile the aspirated vitreous is replaced by Ringer's solution through an outer sleeve.

chinese.chinese: 鼻癌和鼻窦癌总计低于所有恶性肿瘤的0.1%，约占头、颈癌的3%。
chinese.english: Cancer of the nose and sinuses accounts for less than 0.1 per cent of all malignancies and about 3 per cent of all head and neck cancers.

chinese.chinese: 患者倾斜其头避开水流是一种自然反射。
chinese.english: It is a natural reaction for the patient to tilt his head away from the stream of fluid.

chinese.chinese: 较大的婴幼儿可用手搔抓患耳或将头碰撞床边。
chinese.english: In older infants the hand may be put to the affected ear or the head may be banged against the side of the cot.

chinese.chinese: 询问过去史应包括任何头和颈的外伤史和全面的内科病史。
chinese.english: Inquiries into the past history should include a report of any trauma to the head or neck as well as a full medical history.

chinese.chinese: 当患者的头放于关键位置时，产生了一种粗大的变化无常的眼震。
chinese.english: When the patient's head is put in the critical position a coarse, variable nystagmus is set up.

chinese.chinese: 通常指潜伏期及有临床症状的头几天，如甲型肝炎及麻疹所见。
chinese.english: This is usually during the incubation period and the first days of the clinical period of disease as seen in hepatitis A and measles.

chinese.chinese: 较好的诊断方法是血培养分离出伤寒杆菌，大多数病人在病程头2周内血培养阳性。
chinese.english: The preferred method of diagnosis is isolation of S. typhi from a blood culture, which is positive in most patients during the first two weeks of illness.

chinese.chinese: 布氏杆菌感染头几周IgM为主要凝集抗体。
chinese.english: IgM is the major agglutinating antibody formed in the first few weeks following infection with Brucella organisms.

chinese.chinese: 病期头4d抗生素治疗有效。
chinese.english: Antibiotic therapy seems to be beneficial if it is initiated within the first four days of illness.

chinese.chinese: 急性期(4周内)死亡率为30～40％，而主要在头2h内。
chinese.english: The immediate mortality (within 4 weeks) is 30—40% chiefly in the first 2h.

chinese.chinese: [/u]【1】修正： Onyx制药公司今天宣布：美国食品药物管理局（FDA）肿瘤药物咨询委员会(ODAC) 以11票赞成、0票反对、1票弃权通过Kyprolis（carfilzomib拟议的品牌名称）的效益风险评估。Kyprolis将用于治疗曾接受至少两种包括蛋白酶抑制剂或免疫调节剂（IMiD）药物治疗的复发性或难治性多发骨髓瘤患者。
