chinese.english: SouthSan Francisco, CA. —Jun. 20, 2012—[u]Onyx制药公司宣布美国食品药物管理局（FDA）肿瘤药物咨询委员会(ODAC) 以11票赞成、0票反对、1票弃权认为那些先前至少接受两种治疗包括蛋白酶抑制剂或者免疫调节剂(IMiD)的复发性或者难治性多发骨髓瘤患者使用Kyprolis（carfilzomib拟议的品牌名称）的效益风险评估是有益的。Onyx公司正在推动Kyprolis在多发性骨髓瘤中多线治疗中的应用。

chinese.chinese: 今天，在Vancouver举办的2012年度阿尔茨海默病协会国际会议（AAIC）上首次报道了静脉用丙种球蛋白(Gammagard,Baxter)对阿尔茨海默病能够产生长期稳定病情的效果。该项研究考核了认知、记忆、日常功能和情绪等方面。
chinese.english: The first report of long-term (three-year) stabilization of Alzheimer's disease symptoms with IVIG (Gammagard,Baxter), including no decline on measures of cognition, memory, daily functioning and mood, was reported today at the Alzheimer's Association International Conference 2012 (AAIC 2012) inVancouver.

chinese.chinese: 这项研究，今天在温哥华的国际阿尔兹海默协会研讨会上提出，实验组人员包括了71名从WRAP招募来的中年人，其中29人符合代谢综合征的诊断标准，42人不符合。
chinese.english: The study, presented today at the Alzheimer's Association International Conference in Vancouver, British Columbia, involved 71 middle-aged people recruited from the Wisconsin Registry for Alzheimer's Prevention (WRAP). Of this group, 29 met the criteria for metabolic syndrome and 42 did not.

chinese.chinese: 今天，辉瑞公司宣布了对普瑞巴林胶囊治疗广泛性焦虑症状（GAD）的长期安全性和有效性的研究（A0081147）结果。研究结果显示：通过对GAD病人追踪调查三个月和六个月，逐渐减少普瑞巴林的治疗用量，药物停药后症状会比较少。
chinese.english: Pfizer Inc.(NYSE: PFE) announced today that top-line results forLyrica (pregabalin) capsules Study A0081147 – Long Term Safetyand Efficacy of Pregabalin in Subjects with Generalized Anxiety Disorder (GAD)– demonstrate that drug discontinuation symptoms were low after tapering Lyricatreatment following three months and six months in GAD patients.

chinese.chinese: 心肌细胞的收缩和舒张受到电脉冲精细准确的调控，而这种电脉冲是带电金属微粒或者离子如钠、钾、钙等通过细胞内和细胞间复杂的分子通道而成形的。当这些通道失活或者功能障碍时，不规则的心跳，医学上称为心律失常就会发生。Filip van Petegem 和Christopher Ahern 教授，UBC大学心血管研究小组的成员，通过使用这个同步光源加速回旋器来观察心肌细胞和其他电兴奋细胞如神经细胞，这些控制钠内流的通道的分子结构。
chinese.english: The contraction and relaxation of heart muscle cells depend on minute but finely regulated electrical impulses that are created when charged atoms -- or ions -- of metals such as sodium, potassium and calcium pass through complex molecular channels inside and between cells. Irregular heartbeats, referred to medically as arrhythmias, can happen when these channels leak or otherwise malfunction. Professors Filip van Petegem and Christopher Ahern , members of UBC's Cardiovascular Research Group , used the CLS to determine the molecular structure of a part of the channel that controls the flow of sodium to cells in the heart, as well as in other electrically-excitable cells such as in the nervous system.

chinese.chinese: 要使用听诊器为患者做出正确的诊断需要良好的听力，才能对杂音和正常的心跳声进行分辨。然而有很多医生和护士的听力水平较差，难以为患者进行听诊，这就严重妨碍了他们基本的筛检能力。
chinese.english: Properly diagnosing patients using a stethoscope requires good hearing to discern the murmurs from normal heart sounds. Yet many doctors and nurses suffer from poor hearing, making it difficult to auscultate their patients, seriously hampering their ability to perform a basic screening.

chinese.chinese: 可视化操作有助于听诊者分辨出点击声、摩擦声、劈裂声或心跳周期中的杂音部位。
chinese.english: Visualization assists the listener in identifying the position of clicks, rubs, knocks, snaps or murmurs in the cardiac cycle.

chinese.chinese: 当上述两药一起使用时，这些药物可能引起心电图上的QT和PR间期延长。QT间期延长可能导致一种名为尖端扭转型室性心动过速的心律异常性疾病。PR间期延长则可能导致一种名为心脏传导阻滞的心律异常性疾病。随着尖端扭转型室性心动过速或心脏传导阻滞的发生，患者可能出现头晕、晕厥或心跳异常。在一些病例中，尖端扭转型室性心动过速可能进一步发展为一种名为心室纤维性颤动的致命性心跳失常。
chinese.english: When used together, the drugs may cause prolongation of the QT and PR intervals on an electrocardiogram. Prolongation of the QT interval may lead to a condition known as torsades de pointes, an abnormal heart rhythm. Prolongation of the PR interval may also lead to an abnormal heart rhythm known as heart block. With torsades de pointes or with heart block, patients may experience lightheadedness, fainting, or abnormal heart beats. In some cases, torsades de pointes may progress to a life-threatening irregular heart beat known as ventricular fibrillation.

chinese.chinese: 吉利德科技公司(Gilead Sciences, Inc. Nasdaq: GILD)今天公布了一项为期24周的临床3期试验数据，该试验名为SPIRIT(利匹韦林与特鲁瓦达复方单片剂切换给药对PI的促进作用)，旨在对接受病毒抑制治疗的HIV患者从多片剂(含双蛋白酶抑制剂)切换至每日一次、单片给药的Complera疗法(恩曲他滨/利匹韦林/富马酸替诺福韦酯)进行评估。研究达到了24周主要目标并发现，切换到Complera疗法后的疗效并不比继续进行双蛋白酶抑制剂疗法的疗效差。这些发现将于今天在华盛顿特区召开的第19届国际艾滋病会议(AIDS 2012)上，以口头报告(TUAB0104摘要)的形式发表。
chinese.english: Gilead Sciences, Inc. (Nasdaq: GILD) today announced 24-week data from a Phase 3 clinical trial, SPIRIT (Switching boosted PI to Rilpivirine In Combination with Truvada as a Single Tablet Regimen), which evaluated virologically suppressed treatment-experienced HIV patients switching from a multi-pill regimen containing a ritonavir-boosted protease inhibitor to the once-daily single tablet regimen Complera (emtricitabine/rilpivirine/tenofovir disoproxil fumarate). The study met its 24-week primary endpoint, which found that switching to Complera was non-inferior to remaining on a ritonavir-boosted protease inhibitor regimen. These findings will be presented today in an oral session (Abstract #TUAB0104) at the 19th International AIDS Conference (AIDS 2012) in Washington, D.C.

chinese.chinese: 慢性阻塞性肺病的慢性肺部状况是美国第三大致死和致残原因。该疾病的患者可能会弗吉尼亚联邦大学的医生发表在今天的《新英格兰医学杂志》上的研究中获益良多。这是一项关于慢性阻塞性肺疾病一周三次剂量的抗生素治疗的研究。
chinese.english: Patients suffering from the chronic lung condition COPD, which is the third-leading cause of death and disability in the United States, may benefit greatly from a three times a week dose of an antibiotic, according to a study by Virginia Commonwealth University physicians published in today's issue of the New England Journal of Medicine.

chinese.chinese: 有人说，“急诊大夫面临的最大难题是他们不能解决一切问题，而不是今天有哪怕300个病人要接诊。
chinese.english: One said, "'emergency physicians have a limited ability to focus on anything other than the 300 patients they're going to see today.'"

chinese.chinese: 一个综合的临床前期药物研究机构（CRO）——Ricerca Biosciences——今天宣布推出最新的最先进的细胞检测服务：早期安全性筛查细胞毒性和免疫信号？细胞因子风暴细胞分析。
chinese.english: RicercaBiosciences, anintegrated preclinical pharmaceutical contract research organization (CRO),today announced the introduction of two new state-of-the-art cellular assayservices: Early Safety Screening Cytotoxicity and ImmunoSIGNAL? Cytokine StormCellular Assay.

chinese.chinese: 由于对器官保护技术更深入理解，Hines医生开始怀疑在心跳停跳后一小时的固定时间窗内一定要进行器官摘取。他推想，将出现一套系统来一直监测潜在的器官捐赠者直到一个固定的生理学信号出现。
chinese.english: With greater understanding of organ Preservation techniques, Dr. Hines suspects that the arbitrary 1-hour window in which the heart must stop beating in order for organ procurement to proceed could change to a system in which the potential donor is monitored for as long as stable physiologic signs are present.

chinese.chinese: 对于心跳骤停目击者，心脑复苏的第一步是持续的胸外心脏按压，而不需要同时给予口对口或机械通气。
chinese.english: The first step of CCR for witnessed cardiac arrest is continuous chest compressions (CCCs) without mouth-to-mouth or mechanical ventilation.

chinese.chinese: 脸红的同时可能还会伴有恶心和心跳加快。脸红主要由一种酶的遗传缺陷所致，这种酶叫做ALDH2，大约有三分之一的亚洲人种存在这种缺陷----日本人，中国人及朝鲜人。对于这种人，仅半瓶啤酒就可以引起这种脸红反应。
chinese.english: The flushing response, which may be accompanied by nausea and a rapid heartbeat, is caused mainly by an inherited deficiency in an enzyme called ALDH2, a trait shared by more than a third of people of East Asian ancestry — Japanese, Chinese or Koreans. As little as half a bottle of beer can trigger the reaction.

chinese.chinese: 但还有其他一些死亡：仓促而罕见，几分钟之内生命就消失不见。在我所在的那家医院，我们把这种死亡称为“A级情况”。“A”表示停止，就像心跳骤停，患者的心脏突然停搏，我们需要尽力恢复其心跳。
chinese.english: And then there are the other deaths: quick and rare, where life leaves a body in minutes. In my hospital these deaths are “Condition A's.” The “A” stands for arrest, as in cardiac arrest, as in this patient's heart has all of a sudden stopped beating and we need to try to restart it.

chinese.chinese: 切尼先生的心跳节律不稳定。他和英美几千位同样的患者都在皮下装有小装置，这些小装置在心肌纤颤时能电击除颤使心脏恢复正常。
chinese.english: Mr Cheney has an erratic heart beat. He and thousands like him in Britain and the US have a little device permanently implanted under the skin to shock the heart back into regular action when it falters.

chinese.chinese: 奥尼克斯制药公司宣布说今天美国血液协会的医学杂志已经发表了003-A1phase 2b 试验的结果，这是一个评估Kyprolis注射治疗     后阶段多发性骨髓瘤单组多中心试验，这些病人都已经接受了平均5个的抗骨髓瘤方案.
chinese.english: OnyxPharmaceuticals, Inc.  announced today that Blood, the medicaljournal of the American Society of Hematology, has published results from the003-A1 Phase 2b trial, a single-arm, multicenter clinical trial evaluatingKyprolis (carfilzomib) for Injection for the treatment of patients withadvanced multiple myeloma, who had received a median of five prior anti-myelomaregimens.

chinese.chinese: 英国初级卫生保健信托机构（PCT）主席Jonathan Montgomery教授对这一决定进行了解释：“我们仍然认为政策是合法的，明智的，对病人是安全的。然而，今天考虑到这一政策，董事会推测假如诺华提供折扣价，SHIP地区每年在雷珠单抗上的花费可能将显著地减少750万。”
chinese.english: Professor Jonathan Montgomery, chairman of the PCT Cluster Board, explained the decision: “We remain of the view that the policy was lawful, sensible and safe for patients. However, in our consideration of the policy today, the Board has concluded that given the discount being offered, it will be possible to reduce significantly the $7.5 million spent annually on Lucentis in the SHIP area.

chinese.chinese: NanoViricides，公司（OTCBB：NNVC）（“本公司”）今天宣布，它雇佣澳大利亚生物制品监管事务咨询的Pty有限公司来协调监管审查和批准在澳大利亚进行广谱抗流感药物Flucide的第一批人体试验。澳大利亚的生物制剂也将促进临床试验网站（S）的选择和临床试验协议的发展。
chinese.english: NanoViricides,Inc. (OTC BB: NNVC) (the "Company") announced today that it hasretained Australian Biologics Pty. Ltd., a regulatory affairs consulting firm,to coordinate the regulatory review and approval to conduct the first humantrials in Australia for Flucide?, the Company's broad-spectrum anti-influenzadrug. Australian Biologics will also facilitate clinical trial site(s)selection and development of the clinical trials agreements.

chinese.chinese: Rajesh Malik博士（首席药物执行和董事会管理委员）说：“我们对于今天的结果非常的失望和惊讶，特别是我们当初在看到非小细胞肺癌(NSCLC)患者talactoferrin alfa 肿瘤药物的II期双盲随机临床试验的结果后对现在的结果充满期待满。我们计划深入的分析数据来更好的理解目前的结果。我们可能会考虑所有参与到其中的患者和研究员。我们希望该研究的结果可以帮助了解该领域更多科学上的认识，正如对于进展期的非小细胞肺癌(NSCLC)患者有强烈的愿望想要了解新的治疗方法。
chinese.english: Rajesh Malik, M.D., Chief Medical Officer and Memberof the Management Board, said: "We are extremely disappointed andsurprised with today's results, especially considering the earlier promisingresults we had seen in two randomized Phase II trialswith talactoferrin alfa in non-small cell lung cancer.We plan to thoroughly analyze the data to better understand these results. Wewould like to thank all of the patients and investigators who participated inthis clinical trial. We hope that the results of this study will help toadvance scientific knowledge in this area, as there is an urgent need for newtreatment options for patients with advanced non-small cell lung cancer."

chinese.chinese: 当真的发生了一些事情，孩子们常常感到有趣、奇怪、或者不安，像他们的心跳的非常的快、他们的手感到湿润、感到胃疼、或他们的腿或胳膊感到软弱无力或颤抖。其他时候，孩子们只是感到头里面有种有趣的感觉，几乎就像他们没有真实的存在那里，而像是他们在观看发生在无关的别人身上一样。
chinese.english: When something really bad happens, kids often feel funny, strange, or uncomfortable, like their heart is beating really fast, their hands feel sweaty, their stomach hurts, or their legs or arms feel weak or shaky. Other times kids just feel funny inside their heads, almost like they are not really there, but like they are watching bad things happen to someone else.

chinese.chinese: 躯体反应可能是常见的体验，即使是在没有躯体伤害或疾病的情况下。这些反应包括：头疼、头晕、胃疼、肌肉痛、心跳加快、胸部紧缩感、过度换气、食欲不振以及肠道问题。
chinese.english: Physical Reactions may be commonly experienced, even in the absence of any underlying physical injury or illness. These reactions include: headaches, dizziness, stomachaches, muscle aches, rapid heart beating, tightness in the chest, hyperventilation, loss of appetite, and bowel problems.

chinese.chinese: 前瞻性的研究认为：心室颤动的波形的分析明确增加心跳骤停生存率的分析。
chinese.english: Prospective clinical studies are highly warranted to demonstrate that ventricular fibrillation waveform analysis definitely improves survival after cardiac arrest.

chinese.chinese: 总结：目前的研究对于心室颤动特征的分析是否是人心跳骤停持续时间评估的可靠依据尚存疑惑。
chinese.english: Summary: Recent results question the ventricular fibrillation feature analysis as a reliable tool to estimate the duration of human cardiac arrest.

chinese.chinese: 目前的研究：在一些回顾性研究中显示，心室颤动信号的特征分析与评价心跳骤停的结局及最初的心电信号间没有显著的联系。结合当时心室颤动的特点和频率的变化范围，其并未增加心室颤动的预测。心脏复率结果的预测主要依据微波技术，能提高特异性至66％（在95％的可信区间）。
chinese.english: Recent findings: In a retrospective clinical study, ventricular fibrillation single feature analysis was not able to reliably estimate duration between cardiac arrest onset and initial electrocardiogram. Combining ventricular fibrillation features in the time and frequency domain by employing neural networks did not further improve the best single feature prediction power taken from higher ventricular fibrillation frequency bands. Cardioversion outcome prediction based on the wavelet technique increased the specificity up to 66% at the 95% sensitivity level.

chinese.chinese: 这项今天发表在美国心脏协会科学会议2012年基础心血管科学会议《科学研讨》上的研究，共纳入了年龄7至20岁的29名患者，平均年龄14岁。如Malloy所说，房室结折返性心动过速通常使用以解剖为基础的定位系统，在右房间隔部的Koch三角区描记到心内电图。但由于少见旁路的存在和患者解剖学的变异，以解剖为基础的定位有时存在困难。
chinese.english: The study, which was presented today at the American Heart Association Basic Cardiovascular Sciences 2012 Scientific Sessions, included 29 patients ranging from seven to 20 years old, average age 14 years. As Malloy noted, ablation of AVNRT is typically guided by anatomical mapping and electrogram morphology within the triangle of Koch, an area on the septal wall of the right atrium. However, anatomical approaches can be difficult because of the unusual pathway location and variations in the patient's anatomy.

chinese.chinese: 2012年8月7日 Achillion制药公司今天宣布，正在进行多剂量的第2阶段试验用以评价使用sovaprevir（既往名为ACH-1625，为每天使用一次的蛋白酶抑制剂）同时联合聚乙二醇干扰素与利巴韦林（P / R）治疗12周，接着追加P / R治疗12周，结果持续病毒应答（SVR 4）为85％至100％。此外，该公司今天宣布：ACH-3102为第二代的泛基因型NS5A的抑制剂，它在健康志愿者中单独使用组和14天多剂量递增组均是安全的且耐受性良好。此外，第一阶段概念证明型临床试验的患者招募已经开始，用以评估在基因1型丙型肝炎病毒患者中ACH-3102的安全性和有效性。
chinese.english: on Aug. 7, 2012，Achillion Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (Nasdaq:ACHN) today announced sustained viral response (SVR4) results of 85 to 100 percent from an ongoing multi-dose Phase 2 trial evaluating 12 weeks of dosing with sovaprevir (formerly ACH-1625), a once-daily protease inhibitor, in combination with pegylated interferon plus ribavirin (P/R) followed by an additional 12 weeks of P/R. In addition, the Company announced today that ACH-3102, a second-generation pan-genotypic NS5A inhibitor, has been safe and well tolerated by healthy volunteers in both single and 14-day multiple ascending dose groups. Further, enrollment of patients in a Phase 1 proof-of-concept clinical trial to evaluate the safety and efficacy of ACH-3102 in patients with genotype 1 HCV has been initiated.

chinese.chinese: 兰伯西实验室今天推出了该公司版本的爱妥糖，并开始了长达180天的市场专营权期。但这种专营权并不完全，Mylan (MYL)同样享有这些权利。相对于专利药价格来说，这两份大餐可能意味着更大的折扣，因而对于武田公司的爱妥糖收入来说，这也意味着更大的威胁。
chinese.english: Ranbaxy Laboratories rolled out its version of Actos today, beginning its 180days of exclusivity on the market. It's not completely exclusive; Mylan (MYL)shares those rights. Their dual entree may spell a bigger discount against thebranded price--and therefore, a bigger threat to Takeda's Actos revenue.

chinese.chinese: 综述的目的：心室颤动是很多患者心跳骤停前的心率失常的首要表现。从1980年至今，心室颤动的体表心电图用于分析可能是成功的抗休克治疗及评估心跳骤停的持续时间。在这两年内，相当的努力使预测心肺复苏的措施有了显著的进步。
chinese.english: Purpose of review: Ventricular fibrillation is the primary rhythm in many cardiac arrest patients. Since the late 1980s, the surface electrocardiogram of ventricular fibrillation has been subjected to analysis to obtain reliable information about the likelihood of successful countershock and to estimate the duration of cardiac arrest. Considerable efforts were made in the past 2 years to further improve the predictive power of rescue shock measures.

chinese.chinese: 显然，这些病人中有些有潜在性心脏病，但很多人并无这样的病。
chinese.english: It is also apparent that although some of these patients have underlying heart disease, many do not.

chinese.chinese: 无论是否有潜在性心脏病，处于应激反应状态的个体都有潜在生命危险。
chinese.english: Whether or not there is underlying heart disease, individuals under stress are potentially at risk.

chinese.chinese: 当然在心脏病方面，A型行为型似乎与应激反应的不利效应有关。
chinese.english: Certainly, in heart disease, the behavior patterns known as type A seem to be related to adverse effects of stress.

chinese.chinese: 在上周进行的一次历史性手术中，犹他大学医学中心的外科医师们将一颗完全人工心脏移植到人体内，以永久替代病人自身的心脏。
chinese.english: In a history-making operation carried out last week, surgeons at the University of Utah Medical Center implanted a completely artificial heart inside a human being, as a permanent replacement for the patient's own heart.

chinese.chinese: 这颗人工心脏的接受者叫Barnev Clark，是西雅图的61岁退休牙科医师，据报导他在手术后情况良好，这次移植手术因Clark健康状况恶化而提前几小时施行的。
chinese.english: The recipient, Barney Clark, a 61-year-old retired dentist from Seattle, was reported in good condition after the operation, which was brought forward by a few hours because of Clark's deteriorating health.

chinese.chinese: 外科医师们认为，如果Clark不移植人工心脏，在手术那天可能已经死去。
chinese.english: Had Clark not received the artificial heart, surgeons believed he would probably have died on the day of the operation.

chinese.chinese: 这次划时代的手术是在病人中进行首次人体心脏移植15周年纪念日的前一天施行的，标志着医学技术的一大成就。
chinese.english: The epochal operation, falling one day short of the 15th anniversary of the first heart transplant in a human patient, represents a triumph of medical technology.

chinese.chinese: 由犹他大学医学中心外科组Robert Jarvik博士研制的新人工心脏，体积比人的心脏大些，但重量几乎相等。
chinese.english: The new heart developed by Dr Robert Jarvik of the Utah team, is rather larger than a human heart, but weighs about the same.

chinese.chinese: 大多数的效果反映在抗凝的头6个月内，为此，有些医生主张对年青的病人进行6个月抗凝治疗。
chinese.english: Most of the advantage occurred in the first 6 months and some physicians would give anticoagulants for this period of time in young men.

chinese.chinese: X线检查头及下颌可以见到继发性甲状旁腺机能亢进的表现。
chinese.english: X-ray of head and jaw may show evidence of secondary hyperparathyroidism.

chinese.chinese: 糖尿病性肌萎缩：通常发生于中年患者，病人的股四头肌出现疼痛性的不对称的肌无力和萎缩。
chinese.english: Diabetic amyotrophy: This usually occurs in middle-aged diabetics who develop painful, asymmetrical weakness and wasting of the quadriceps muscles.

chinese.chinese: 急性发作消退后14天开始用别嘌醇，但在头3个月内还应继续同时应用非类固醇抗炎药物治疗或秋水仙碱0．5mg bid。
chinese.english: Allopurinol may be started a fortnight after the acute attack has subsided but must be covered by continuation of NSAID therapy or colchicinc 0.5 mg bd for the first 3 months.

chinese.chinese: 脑神经在脑、头及颈中传送刺激。
chinese.english: The cranial nerves carry impulses between the brain and the head and neck.

chinese.chinese: 如果痫性发作的特征总是头和眼睛偏向一侧，或躯干和头的转动在同一侧，这说明损伤在对侧半脑区，往往在前叶或颞叶。
chinese.english: If the onset of the seizures is always characterized by head and eye deviation to one side or rotation of the trunk and head to the same side, this indicates a lesion in the opposite hemisphere, usually in the frontal or temporal lobe.

chinese.chinese: 将双手放在下腹部骨盆入口，可识别头部，因头比臀较圆且较硬，其活动度取决于与骨盆入口的关系。
chinese.english: This is done by placing both hands on the lower abdomen above the pelvic brim; the head is recognized because it is rounder and harder than the breech; its mobility will depend upon its relation to the pelvic brim.

chinese.chinese: 如果头完全在骨盆入口上方，可自由移动，称为头浮，检查者两手手指可在其下方相遇；如果最大直径已入盆或通过了入口平面，头通常是固定的，称之为入盆; 如果头下降入盆腔深部，除非用指尖，否则可能难于触及胎头。
chinese.english: If it is completely above the brim it is freely movable and is spoken of as a 'floating head', and the fingers of both hands can be made to meet below it; if the widest diameter has entered or passed through the brim the head is usually fixed and is said to be engaged in the brim; if the head is deeply sunk in the pelvic cavity it may be difficult to feel it except with the finger tips.

chinese.chinese: 它用聚氨基甲酸乙酯和铝模制而成，动力由一个空气压缩机提供，用6英尺长管子把压缩机与人工心脏连结起来。
chinese.english: Made of moulded polyurethane and aluminium it is powered by an air compressor, to which it is attached through six-foot long tubes.

chinese.chinese: Jarvik于1972年开始人工心脏的研制工作，用它在动物身上做实验。
chinese.english: Jarvik started work on the artificial heart in 1972, using it experimentally in animals.

chinese.chinese: 该装置在设计上经过5次重大改动，才成为上周移植到Clark身上的那颗人工心脏的样子。
chinese.english: The device went through five major changes in design before taking the form that was implanted in Clark last week.

chinese.chinese: 与缺血性心脏病相当不同并且少见得多，缺血性心脏病是因供血动脉堵塞使心脏缺少营养而发生的疾病。
chinese.english: It is quite distinct from, and much less common than ischemic heart disease, where the heart becomes starved of food because of blockages in the arteries that serve it.

chinese.chinese: 在美国几乎所有的心脏移植都是斯坦福大学医学中心外科组施行的，但他们拒绝给50岁以上的病人做手术。
chinese.english: The Stanford University Medical Center team which performs essentially all heart transplants in the US refuses to operate on patients over the age of 50.

chinese.chinese: 于是Clark面临的选择只有人工心脏移植或者很快死去。
chinese.english: Thus Clark's choice was effectively the artificial heart or a rapid death.

chinese.chinese: 这次手术并不是第一次在人体内植入人工心脏。
chinese.english: The operation was not the first in which an artificial heart was implanted in a human.

chinese.chinese: 头完全活动是5/5，开始入盆为4/5，大部分入盆为3/5.
chinese.english: A head that is completely free is described as 5/5; one that is beginning to enter the brim as 4/5, and one that has a major part in the brim as 3/5.

chinese.chinese: 胎头最大径进入骨盆为2/5，头已入骨盆深部为1/5。
chinese.english: Once the widest diameter has passed the brim the notation 2/5 is used, and for a head deeply engaged in the pelvis 1/5.

chinese.chinese: 如头在骨盆入口以上，用一手抓握可能更易感觉到，但这种方法对于头已较低者无用。
chinese.english: If the head is above the brim of the pelvis it may be felt more easily by the single-handed grip, but this method is of no use if the head is lower down.

chinese.chinese: 如果胎臀占据宫底，将触及一宽块状物，不如头圆及硬，臀连接着胎背，足或膝可在附近触及，并可在手下移动。
chinese.english: If the breech occupies the fundus a broad mass will be felt, not so round or hard as the head; the breech is continuous with the fetal back, and a foot or knee can often be felt near it, and may move under the hand.

chinese.chinese: 如果头占据宫底，则可触及一较臀更硬、更圆、更光滑、更活动的块状物。
chinese.english: If the head occupies the fundus it is felt as a harder, rounder, smoother and more mobile mass than the breech.

chinese.chinese: 头不依赖于身体而活动，有时可在两手之间冲击。
chinese.english: The head can be moved independently of the body, and it can sometimes be balloted between the two hands.

chinese.chinese: 宫底内为头所占据时，通常较为臀所占据时窄些。
chinese.english: The fundus of the uterus is usually narrower when it contains the head than when it contains the breech.

chinese.chinese: 在接下来的几周里，FDA随后将发布几个重要药品的一系列决定。TheStreet's网站今天的综合报道包含了linaclotide 的PDUFA日期（9月7号），Gilead's (GILD)公司HIV combo检测产品Quadde的日期（8月27号），Pfizer (PFE)公司治疗类风湿性关节炎的新药tofacitinib（未确定8月的具体日期），以及Sanofi(SNY)公司密切关注的治疗多发性硬化症新药Aubagio（目前此药由Genzyme公司特许经营）。
chinese.english: Over the next few weeks the FDA is slated to deliver a series of decisions on key drugs. TheStreet's roundup today includes the linaclotide PDUFA date of September 7, along with Gilead's (GILD) Aug. 27 date for its HIV combo Quad, Pfizer's (PFE) unspecified August timetable for tofacitinib for rheumatoid arthritis and Sanofi's (SNY) closely-watched Aubagio for multiple sclerosis, which is in Genzyme's hands as keeper of the MS franchise.

chinese.chinese: 血液学杂志《血液》今天全文发表了一篇描述symphogen公司产品rozrolimupab最终的2阶段数据的文章。Rozrolimupab是一种新的25种人类重组抗体混合物，而且，这些抗体都同时产自于一个批次。这些数据证实了rozrolimupab在用于原发性免疫性血小板减少性紫癜（ITP）患者治疗时令人称道的安全性及其诱导的血小板计数的迅速增加。波兰罗兹大学的医学博士Tadeusz Robak教授是这篇题为“rozrolimupab，一个25种重组人单克隆RhD抗体混合物在治疗原发性免疫性血小板减少症中的作用”的文章的第一作者，该文已在初版的《血液》杂志上发表，并可以在《血液》杂志的在线版版上阅读。网址为：athttp://bloodjournal.hematologylibrary.org/content/early/recent。
chinese.english: The hematology journal BLOOD published today a full-length article describing final Phase 2 data for Symphogen's rozrolimupab, a novel human recombinant mixture of 25 antibodies which all are manufactured simultaneously from a single batch. The data demonstrates rozrolimupab's favorable safety profile and its induction of a rapid increase in platelet counts in patients with Primary Immune Thrombocytopenia Purpura (ITP). Professor Tadeusz Robak, MD, University of Lodz, Poland, is the first author of the article entitled “Rozrolimupab, A Mixture of 25 Recombinant Human Monoclonal Antibodies, in the treatment of Primary Immune Thrombocytopenia” which has been prepublished in First Edition of Blood and can be viewed on Blood Online athttp://bloodjournal.hematologylibrary.org/content/early/recent.

chinese.chinese: Sebelius说，之前有49个州、加利福尼亚行政区和四个地区收到资助，开始计划他们的交换系统，而今天有34个州和加利福尼亚行政区收到机构资助奖励，开始建立他们的交换系统。
chinese.english: Previously, 49 states, the District of Columbia and four territories received grants to begin planning their exchanges, Sebelius said. With today's awardees, 34 states and the District of Columbia have also received establishment grants to begin building their exchanges.

chinese.chinese: 罗氏巴塞尔公司总部宣布今天早晨已经在其下属分公司Ventana 医药公司签署了一个协议，将会完全获得私营的BioImagene公司，这个交易期望能在未来几周内完成。
chinese.english: The Basel-headquartered group announced this morning that is has signed an agreement under which Ventana Medical Systems, a member of the Roche Group, will acquire 100% of privately-held BioImagine, and that the deal is expected to close “in the coming weeks”.

chinese.chinese: 华尔街日报今天报道说，世卫组织常被引用的关于假药的统计数据-占全球市场的10%-可能被夸大了。
chinese.english: The Wall Street Journal today reports that commonly cited WHO stats on fake drugs--that they make up 10 percent of the global market--are probably quite inflated.

chinese.chinese: 辉瑞公司今天宣布将主动从美国市场撤回治疗急性淋巴细胞白血病的药物Mylotarg（吉姆单抗奥唑米星）。该公司是在FDA的要求下进行这一行动的，因为最近的一项临床研究发现，这种药物存在新的安全性隐患，并且对于纳入的病人来讲并没有显示出增加疗效的证据。
chinese.english: Pfizer Inc. today announced the voluntary withdrawal from the U.S. market of the drug Mylotarg (gemtuzumab ozogamicin) for patients with acute myeloid leukemia (AML), a bone marrow cancer. The company took the action at the request of the U.S. Food and Drug Administration after results from a recent clinical trial raised new concerns about the product's safety and the drug failed to demonstrate clinical benefit to patients enrolled in trials.

chinese.chinese: 该报告今天被发布在位于华盛顿的美国医学研究院网站上，美国医学研究院是一个非营利性组织，负责为美国政策制定者和公众出谋划策。
chinese.english: The report was posted today on the Web site of the Washington-based Institute of Medicine, an independent, non- profit group that advises U.S. policy makers and the public.

chinese.chinese: 说起今天发表在《Human Molecular Genetics》的这些发现，共同研究者Christiana Ruhrberg博士解释道：“我们发现一个神经缆生长必须的分子，其传输从鼻子到脑的气味和外激素信号，对负责输送其他产生性激素GnRH的神经细胞的途径发育也至关重要。我们发现具有分子SEMA3A遗传缺陷的鼠，这些途径不能通往脑，取而代之地在脑外形成不能穿过的缠结区域。这意味着产生GnRH的神经细胞不能到达他们最后的目的地，而卡在鼻子或前额。
chinese.english: Speaking about the findings, published today (29 November) in Human Molecular Genetics, co-investigator Dr Christiana Ruhrberg explains: "We discovered that a molecule essential for the growth of the nerve cables that transmit odour and pheromone signals from the nose to the brain is also crucial in the development of the highways responsible for transporting other nerve cells that make the sex hormone GnRH. We found that in mice with an inherited deficiency in the molecule SEMA3A, these highways did not lead to the brain, but instead formed impenetrable tangles outside the brain. This means that the nerve cells making GnRH are unable to get to their final destination and instead become stuck in the nose or forehead."

chinese.chinese: 据美国物理学家组织网5月16日（北京时间）报道，美国科学家鉴别并合成出一类新化合物，能有力地、有选择地阻止很多丝氨酸水解酶的活动，因此，在基础研究和药物研发领域具有重要用途，相关研究发表在今天出版的《自然·化学生物学》杂志上。
chinese.english: Serine hydrolases are a diverse enzyme class representing ～1% of all human proteins. The biological functions of most serine hydrolases remain poorly characterized owing to a lack of selective inhibitors to probe their activity in living systems. Here we show that a substantial number of serine hydrolases can be irreversibly inactivated by 1,2,3-triazole ureas, which show negligible cross-reactivity with other protein classes. Rapid lead optimization by click chemistry–enabled synthesis and competitive activity-based profiling identified 1,2,3-triazole ureas that selectively inhibit enzymes from diverse branches of the serine hydrolase class, including peptidases (acyl-peptide hydrolase, or APEH), lipases (platelet-activating factor acetylhydrolase-2, or PAFAH2) and uncharacterized hydrolases (α,β-hydrolase-11, or ABHD11), with exceptional potency in cells (sub-nanomolar) and mice (<1 mg kg?1). We show that APEH inhibition leads to accumulation of N-acetylated proteins and promotes

chinese.chinese: 他们也建议一些可能的医学应用。今天，医生使用激光在体内成像和辐射细胞治病。Yun认为激光可以在体内产生和放大，这样能够在组织中穿透更深。
chinese.english: The researchers also suggest possible medical applications. Doctors today shine lasers into the body to gather images or to treat disease by attacking cells. Yun thinks that lasers could instead be generated or amplified inside the body, where they could penetrate the relevant tissues more deeply.

chinese.chinese: 所推荐的新的阿尔茨海默病指南今天由阿尔茨海默病协会主办杂志Alzheimer’s  Dementia在线出版。纸质版已安排在此杂志的2011年的5月份出版。
chinese.english: The proposed new Alzheimer's disease diagnostic guidelines were published online today by Alzheimer's  Dementia: The Journal of the Alzheimer's Association. Hard copy publication is scheduled for the May 2011 issue of the journal.

chinese.chinese: 今天美国FDA宣布了对大剂量使用辛伐他汀的新限制，因为其有导致肌痛和疲乏（肌病），在罕见病例中，导致肾功损害和肾功能衰竭的风险增加。
chinese.english: The United States Food and Drug Administration (FDA) today announced new limitations to the use of high-dose simvastatin, due to the increased risk of muscle pain and weakness (myopathy) and in rare cases, kidney damage and failure.

chinese.chinese: 今天Nature发表的一项研究指出，抑癌基因BCA1编码的蛋白可能通过阻止一种DNA重复序列的转录控制乳腺癌和卵巢癌。这一新的解释把以往关于BCA1作用机制各不相干的理论整合到一起，对其他肿瘤抑制因子作用机制的了解可能带来帮助。
chinese.english: The protein encoded by the tumour-suppressor gene BRCA1 may keep breast and ovarian cancer in check by preventing transcription of repetitive DNA sequences, says a study published today in Nature. This explanation brings together many disparate theories about how the gene functions and could also shed light on how other tumour suppressors work.

chinese.chinese: Ashok Venkitaraman表示，今天发表的这项研究可能为我们提供关于BRCA1统一生物学功能方面的暗示，它在肿瘤抑制因子作用中将处于核心位置。
chinese.english: The study published today "may provide an inkling of a unifying biological function of BRCA1, which could be at the heart of its tumour suppressor role", says Ashok Venkitaraman, a cancer biologist at the Hutchison-MRC Research Centre in Cambridge, UK, who was not involved in the study.

chinese.chinese: 盐或高钠盐摄入的饮食已经引起关注一段时间了。今天美国食品和药物管理局举办了为期一天的听证会,讨论策略以帮助美国人减少饮食中的盐以作为一个最新的尝试抑制美国人的饮食中的钠。
chinese.english: Salt or high sodium intake in diet has drawn attention of researchers for a while now. The U.S. Food and Drug Administration held a day-long hearing today, discussing strategies to help Americans cut the salt from their diets as a latest attempt to curb sodium in the American diet.

chinese.chinese: 如果胎儿为斜位，头常在一侧髂窝触及，在对侧上方可触及臀。
chinese.english: If the fetus is lying obliquely the head is often felt in one iliac fossa, and the breech higher up on the opposite side.

chinese.chinese: 另一方法为抬起患者的头部及肩部，让其将躯体重量置于手或肘部，头常能入盆。
chinese.english: Another method is to raise the patient's head and shoulders asking her to take the weight of her trunk on her hands or elbows, when the head will often enter the brim.

chinese.chinese: 头及臀先露时，胎心音在胎背处听得最清楚, 只有在面先露时可在胎儿心脏处听到。
chinese.english: They are best heard over the back of the fetus in vertex and breech presentations; only in face presentations are they usually heard over the heart.

chinese.chinese: 宫颈扩张l cm，颈管未消失，头浮。
chinese.english: Her cervix is 1-cm dilated, un-effaced with a floating cephalic presentation.

chinese.chinese: 若无胎儿窘迫征象，先露为头，可考虑试产。
chinese.english: With no evidence of fetal distress and a cephalic presentation a trial of labor is indicated.

chinese.chinese: 单个胚芽区分裂不完全时，可能形成某种联体双胎；据报道有许多种类型，他们可能胸骨、骨盆或头相连接，联体的程度从皮肤和软组织的融合到形成头、躯干、内脏、一套或两套肢体相连的怪胎。
chinese.english: When the process of division of a single germinal area is incomplete some form of conjoined twins may occur, Many varieties have been described; they may be joined by the sternum, the pelvis or the head, and the degree of union varies from fusion of skin and soft tissues to formation of a double monster in which head, trunk, viscera or limbs may be shared or duplicated.

chinese.chinese: 约45％的病例两个胎儿均为头先露；约35％的病例为一头一臀；约10％的病例一个为横位，另一为头位、臀位或横位。
chinese.english: In about 45 per cent of cases both twins present by the head; in about 35 per cent one fetus presents by the head and the other by the breech; in about 10 per cent both present by the breech; and in about 10 per cent of cases a transverse lie is associated with a vertex presentation, a breech or a second transverse lie.

chinese.chinese: 如是斜或横产式，可立即行外倒转术，使胎儿的头或臀在宫颈上方。
chinese.english: If it is oblique or transverse external version is immediately performed to bring one pole of the fetus over the cervix.

chinese.chinese: 不管是头或臀先露，按平常方法接生。
chinese.english: Delivery is conducted in the ordinary way, whether: the head or the breech comes first.

chinese.chinese: 过度成熟儿的颅骨骨化明显，故儿头不易塑型。
chinese.english: The skull of the postmature fetus is more ossified, so that moulding is less easy.

chinese.chinese: 胎儿小于孕龄但其头腹比例适当，通常是由先天性感染和先天性畸形引起的，称为“低指数”生长模式。
chinese.english: The infant who is small-for-dates but has appropriate head-to-abdominal ratios is more often affected by congenital infection or congenital anomalies; this is called a “low-profile” growth pattern.

chinese.chinese: 大多数婴儿无明显异常，但在宫内感染的婴儿中约有10％发生先天性异常，诸如小脑儿(头异常小)，因中枢神经系统损伤而致的癫痫、耳聋、智力障碍、精神运动性障碍、视力异常、慢性胃肠炎、黄疸、肺炎或血小板减少症(缺少血小板)。
chinese.english: Most infants do not show obvious abnormalities, but about 10% of those infected in utero develop congenital abnormalities, such as microcephaly (an abnormally small head), central nervous system damage resulting in seizures and deafness, mental retardation, psychomotor retardation, ocular abnormalities, chronic gastroenteritis, jaundice, pneumonia, or thrombocytopenia (lack of thrombocytes).

chinese.chinese: 头及五官检查显示前囟平坦，双侧鼓膜充血及光反射降低。
chinese.english: HEENT evaluation revealed flat anterior fontanelle; tympanic membranes were injected with decreased light reflex bilaterally.

chinese.chinese: 头、眼、耳、鼻、喉检查无异常。
chinese.english: HEENT exam showed no abnormality.

chinese.chinese: 头眼耳鼻喉检查，显示两侧鼓膜色泽轻度发暗，但活动良好。
chinese.english: HEENT examination revealed both tympanic membranes were slightly dull, but had good movement.

chinese.chinese: 研究人员鼓励实验参与者把每周的运动分散到五天以上完成，每次至少10分钟。研究人员为他们提供跑步机供她们在家使用并教她们检测自己的心跳。
chinese.english: Participants were encouraged to spread the exercise out over five days during a week, done in at least 10-minute chunks. The women were given treadmills to use at home and taught to monitor their own heart rates.

chinese.chinese: 对于真正的心跳停搏，事实上无药可救，因为完全没有可用以刺激的心跳节律。医生试了所有办法。他们用了很多药，以致急救车都被清空了，有人从药房跑进跑出拿来其他的药。
chinese.english: The sad truth about a true cardiac arrest is that drugs cannot help because there is no cardiac rhythm for them to stimulate. The doctors tried anyway. They went through so many drugs that the crash cart was emptied out and runners came and went from pharmacy bringing extras.

chinese.chinese: 他们通过静脉为病人补充体液，把一盒一盒的肾上腺素挤进静脉内，试图使她恢复心跳。他们甚至给予腺苷（一种危险的强效药物，通过暂时性阻断病人心跳，来逆转不正常心律）。
chinese.english: They gave her fluids and squeezed bags  of epinephrine into her veins to try to get her heart to start moving. They may even have given her adenosine, a dangerous and terrifying  drug that can reverse abnormal heart rhythms after briefly stopping the patient's heart.

chinese.chinese: 呼吸机接替了CPR，我靠在墙上，满身血污，难以置信。我的同事全权处理了急救过程中的所有琐碎事情：在病人的静脉输液泵另开一条液路、记录病人状况、时不时的喊道，“心脏再次停搏，”意味着她心跳停止。
chinese.english: Respiratory took over the CPR and I stood back against the wall, bloody and disbelieving. My co-workers did all the grunt work for the condition: put extra channels  on her IV pump, recorded what was happening, and every now and again called out, “Patient is in asystole again,” meaning she had no heartbeat.

chinese.chinese: 研究者们使用的数据来源于长QT综合征登记处，来探讨3287位具有QT间期大于450ms的长QT综合征患者，他们与使用吸入性β2-受体激动剂后晕厥、流产的心跳骤停、猝死的危险性。
chinese.english: The researchers used data from the International Long QT Syndrome Registry to examine the risk of syncope, aborted cardiac arrest, or sudden death associated with inhaled bronchodilator therapy for asthma in 3287 patients with a QTc of at least 450 ms.

chinese.chinese: 美国两位心血管方面专家研究发现，胆固醇可以影响产生心跳的电解质的流动。研究小组日前在国家科学学院院刊上发表这项导致心律失常的重要原因的文章。
chinese.english: Cholesterol can affect the flow of the electrical currents that generate the heart beat, according to a study by two UBC cardiovascular researchers funded by the Heart and Stroke Foundation of BC & Yukon. The research team has just published the important discovery about the causes of cardiac arrhythmias (abnormal heartbeats) in the Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences.

chinese.chinese: 据塔拉哈西的佛罗里达州大学研究人员称，当你感到心跳加速，手掌发汗或者头晕目眩时，你已受到了惊吓，即便原因如压力、运动或咖啡因之平常，也很可能会发展为焦虑或惊恐症。
chinese.english: People who get scared when they experience a pounding heart, sweaty palms or dizziness -- even if the cause is something as mundane as stress, exercise or caffeine -- are more likely to develop a clinical case of anxiety or panic disorder, according to a Florida State University researcher in Tallahassee, Fla.

chinese.chinese: Hurata告诉美国心脏协会参会人员说，虽然本研究的病人数目较少，但是在进一步的研究中会增大机器的应用和病人的例数。总而言之，256层CT很有前途的下一代冠脉和心脏成像技术，能够在一次心跳中完成全心成像。
chinese.english: Kurata told AHA meeting attendees that while the "number of patients in this study is very small, I hope that 256 CT can expand and study this patient population in the future. In conclusion, 256 CT seems to be a promising, next-generation (technology) for coronary and cardiac imaging, allowing one-beat, whole-heart imaging."

chinese.chinese: “对一些危重患者，尼古丁戒断症状的持续发展能使预后恶化。因此，对ICU的主动吸烟者给予尼古丁替代疗法，”来自梅奥临床医学院的首要研究者Amy Lee博士说“尼古丁的血液动力学效应能导致心跳加快、全身动脉血压升高和冠状动脉收缩。尽管这些潜在的不利因素并没有使健康志愿者和患有稳定性冠状动脉疾病的病人的预后恶化，但可能对患严重疾病的病人有害。
chinese.english: "In some critically ill patients, the development of nicotine withdrawal symptoms can worsen their prognosis. As a result, NRT is given to active smokers in the ICU to prevent nicotine withdrawal symptoms," said lead researcher Amy Lee, MD, Mayo Clinic College of Medicine, Minneapolis, MN. "The hemodynamic effects of nicotine may lead to increased heart rate, systemic arterial blood pressure, and constriction of the coronary arteries. Although these potential adverse effects of NRT have not been shown to worsen the prognosis of healthy volunteers and patients with stable coronary artery disease, they may be detrimental in critically ill patients."

chinese.chinese: 专家们宣称，当有人突发心跳骤停时，旁人不要采用口对口呼吸来将空气注入患者口中。这一点现在已经成为心肺复苏的关键点。
chinese.english: Forget mouth-to-mouth resuscitation. When somebody collapses in cardiac arrest, experts now say, bystanders should not bother breathing into his or her mouth, once considered a key component of cardio-pulmonary resuscitation.

chinese.chinese: 在紧急状态下或急症时，如患者心跳骤停，气道管理极为重要，但气管插管仍有极少的禁忌症。直接喉镜下气管插管对已行部分气管切除的患者相对禁忌，因为气管插管步骤导致气管全部横断及气道损伤。
chinese.english: In urgent situations or emergencies, such as when a patient is in cardiac arrest,airway management is of paramount importance, and there are very few contraindications to orotracheal intubation. Orotracheal intubation by direct laryngoscopy is somewhat contraindicated in a patient with partial transection of the trachea, because the procedure can cause complete tracheal transection and loss of the airway.

chinese.chinese: 结论：NHB供体可扩大尸体肾的来源。尽管无心跳尸体供体的肾移植早期不良事件发生率较高，但远期效果并不比有心跳尸体供体肾移植差。
chinese.english: CONCLUSION.: NHB donors carry the potential of expanding the cadaveric kidney pool. Although, transplants from NHB donors are associated with a greater incidence of early adverse events, long-term outcomes appear comparable with those of transplants from HB donors.

chinese.chinese: 方法：我们检索了1992年到2005年间对无心跳和有心跳尸体供体肾移植进行比较的相关文献。
chinese.english: METHODS.: A literature search was performed for studies comparing kidney transplants from NHB vs. HB cadaveric donors between 1992 and 2005.

chinese.chinese: 背景：本研究的目的是为了用荟萃分析方法来评估无心跳（NHB）和有心跳（HB）尸体供体肾移植的移植效果。
chinese.english: BACKGROUND.: This study aimed to assess outcomes of kidney transplants from nonheart-beating (NHB) compared with heart-beating (HB) cadaveric donors with meta-analytical techniques.

chinese.chinese: 在两项安慰剂对照试验中，Exforge使高达十分之九的患者达到了舒张压低于90 mmHg或舒张压从基线水平下降10 mmHg的治疗目标。舒张压是指心脏在两次心跳之间处于休息时所测量的汞柱厘米高度。
chinese.english: In two placebo-controlled trials, Exforge helped up to nine out of ten patients reach their treatment goal of diastolic blood pressure under 90 mmHg, or more than a 10 mmHg reduction in diastolic blood pressure from baseline levels(5). Diastolic blood pressure is measured in millimeters of mercury (mmHg) when the heart is at rest between beats.

chinese.chinese: 2011.9.15-美国FDA今天宣布，内科医生对于先天性的长QT患者应该慎用抗呕吐药物昂丹司琼（枢复宁，葛兰素史克），因为可能导致患者出现致死性尖端扭转型室性心动过速。
chinese.english: September 15, 2011 — Clinicians should avoid using the antinausea drug ondansetron (Zofran, GlaxoSmithKline) in patients with congenital long QT syndrome because they run a particular risk for an abnormal and potentially fatal heart rhythm called torsades de pointes, the US Food and Drug Administration (FDA) announced today.

chinese.chinese: 国立血清研究所和Aeras今天宣布一种新的结核病疫苗进入第一阶段临床试验，这种疫苗主要用来阻止那些结核菌的潜在感染者进展为活动性结核病。这项试验由SATVI机构在南非西开普省的Worcester开展。Hassan Mahomed博士是主要研究者。
chinese.english: Statens Serum Institut and Aeras today announce the initiation of the first Phase I clinical trial of a new candidate TB vaccine designed to protect people latently infected with TB from developing active TB disease. The trial is being conducted by the South African Tuberculosis Vaccine Initiative (SATVI) at its field site in Worcester, in the Western Cape province of South Africa. Dr. Hassan Mahomed is the principal investigator.

chinese.chinese: 在过去的10年中，可利用的HIV服务的增加导致了新增感染率下降了15%，在过去的5年中，AIDS相关的死亡率降低了22%，根据今天世界卫生组织发布的报道。
chinese.english: Increased access to HIV services has resulted in a 15% reduction of new infections during the past decade and a 22% decline in AIDS-related deaths in the last 5 years, according to a report released today by the World Health Organization (WHO).

chinese.chinese: 认识到新的治疗方法的必要性，公司在2007年启动了礼来结核病药物发现计划以加速药物研发工作。包括今天的宣布，礼来目前已经投入超过17000万美元用于全球抗击结核病和耐多药结核病的事业。
chinese.english: Recognizing that new treatment options were needed, the company also launched the Lilly TB Drug Discovery Initiative in 2007 to spur early drug discovery efforts. Including today's announcement, Lilly has now committed more than $170 million to the global fight against TB and MDR-TB.

chinese.chinese: 美国临床肿瘤学会 (ASCO)今天推出临床肿瘤2011进展：ASCO年度关于对抗肿瘤进展，一项独立的对今年肿瘤研究领域对患者治疗有最大影响的综述。这项报告同时指出肿瘤学最有前景的发展方向，并且指出在未来肿瘤治疗领域专家的视野。
chinese.english: The American Society of Clinical Oncology (ASCO) today released Clinical Cancer Advances 2011: ASCO's Annual Report on Progress Against Cancer, an independent review of the advances in cancer research that have had the greatest impact on patient care this year. The report also identifies the most promising trends in oncology and provides insights from experts on where the future of cancer care is heading.

chinese.chinese: 执业医师和药店普遍认为电子处方作为一个重要的工具，可以确保病人的安全并节省时间，但他们对于该项技术所带来多重益处的认识却都比较局限，这是根据卫生保健研究和质量署（AHRQ）（隶属于卫生和人类服务部（HHS））的一项研究得出的结论的这项研究已在线出版在今天的美国医学信息协会杂志上。
chinese.english: Physician practices and pharmacies generally view electronic prescribing as an important tool to improve patient safety and save time, but both groups face barriers to realizing the technology's full benefit, according to a study funded by the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services' (HHS) Agency for Healthcare Research and Quality (AHRQ). The study is published online today in the Journal of the American Medical Informatics Association.

chinese.chinese: 今天网上发表了年度十大科学突破的完整的名单。
chinese.english: The complete list of top 10 scientific breakthroughs of the year was publishedonline today.

chinese.chinese: 参加这项研究的儿童是患有针对胰腺B细胞的自身免疫性疾病的无症状儿童。如果胰腺破坏的不能被阻止，随着年龄长大，就会进展为1型糖尿病。预防性应用Diamyd疫苗是为了干预疾病进展。今天还没有药物能阻止1型糖尿病的进展。
chinese.english: The children enrolled in the study are healthy, but have all been found to have an ongoing autoimmune process, where their blood sugar-regulating beta cells in the pancreas are being destroyed by their own immune system. If the destruction is not stopped, it can with time lead to type 1 diabetes. Preventive treatment with Diamyd is intended to intervene in the autoimmune process at an early stage, and thus prevent the disease from developing. Today there is no treatment that can halt the progress of disease in type 1 diabetes.

chinese.chinese: 过去的数年里，取得医学进步所必须依赖的相关技术的耗费越来越低。上周，位于加利福尼亚州的Carlsbad Life Technologies公司宣布：不久的将来仅需1000美元就可在一天之内完成一个人的基因组测序。而类似的测试在今天仍需数千美元。另外，可以时时监测机体内部蛋白质和代谢水平的技术也已在向我们招手。
chinese.english: With each passing year, the technologynecessary for this revolution in medicine is growing less expensive. Last week,Life Technologies of Carlsbad, Calif., announced that it will be able to map anindividual's entire genetic sequence in one day, for $1,000. Similar teststoday cost many thousands of dollars. The ability to follow day-to-day changesin your body's proteins and metabolites is not far behind.

chinese.chinese: 欧洲心脏病学会迎来了一个新的“令人感兴趣的”研究，美国心脏病学院的周刊今天公布，提出了一个很新颖的方法来改善心衰病人的内皮细胞功能。在“提出假设”的研究中，熊去氧胆酸在手臂的缺血再灌注中起到了很重要的改善作用，这对于大腿的缺血再灌注起到一个导向作用。但它在运动负荷试验以及几个炎症标志中没起到什么作用，尽管有这些矛盾的数据，ESC的发言人坚信在大量心衰病人身上进行熊去氧胆酸的进一步研究是合理的。
chinese.english: The European Society of Cardiology (ESC) welcomes an "intriguing" study, published today in the Journal of the American College of Cardiology, featuring a completely novel approach for improving endothelial function in heart failure. In the "hypothesis generating" study, ursodeoxycholic acid (UDCA) delivered significant improvements in peak post ischemic blood flow in the arm, a trend for improvement in peak post ischemic blood flow in the leg, but failed to show benefits in exercise capacity and several inflammatory markers. Despite such conflicting data, ESC spokespersons believe that further exploration of UCDA is now justified in larger populations of heart failure patients.

chinese.chinese: 因为含纳米材料产品的数量预计会爆炸。和未来的暴露情景可能没有像那些今天一样,现有的市场规模选择目标材料研究-照现在实际的情况-有问题。来帮助指导研究,委员会还提到,以下四个研究范畴, 应在五年内解决。
chinese.english: Because the number of products containing nanoscalematerials is expected to explode, and futureexposure scenarios may not resemble those of today, selecting targetmaterials to study on the basis of existing market size -- as is the practicenow -- is problematic. To help guideresearch, the committee noted the following fourresearch categories, which should be addressedwithin five years.

chinese.chinese: 有时随着变化，我们需要调整战略。不会犯错，但是，在今天的市场，特别是医疗方面，Twitter战略已经是任何媒体战略的重要组成。
chinese.english: Sometimes as change occurs, the strategic aspects of it slip by us.  Make no mistake, however, in today's market, particularly in healthcare, a Twitter strategy is an essential component of any media strategy.

chinese.chinese: 在伦敦皇家内科医师学会今天发出的一份官方通告中，成员们称会通过以下方法与NTDs进行斗争：
chinese.english: The endorsement of the "London Declaration on Neglected Tropical Diseases". The Declaration promises a new level of commitment and collaboration in the tracking of progress.

chinese.chinese: 到今天为止，药物短缺防治法已获美国肠外与肠内营养，阿斯利康和血液/肿瘤药房协会学会临床肿瘤学会认可。
chinese.english: To date, the Drug Shortage Prevention Act has been endorsed by ASCO, the American Society for Parenteral and Enteral Nutrition, AstraZeneca, and the Hematology/Oncology Pharmacy Association.

chinese.chinese: 武田药品有限公司 (Takeda)及其全资子公司，美国武田制药今天宣布EDARBYCLOR（阿齐沙坦酯衍生物和氯噻酮）可以在美国药房买到，其应用于治疗成人高血压。它是目前美国唯一血管紧张素Ⅱ受体阻滞剂和氯噻酮合剂，剂量固定，每天一次，一次一粒。在3期临床试验中，通过临床和24小时动态血压监测，通过降压的统计数据分析，最大剂量的EDARBYCLOR（40/25mg）优于同样最大固定剂量的奥美沙坦酯-双氢克尿塞。此外，还在黑人亚组中观察到 EDARBYCLOR 类似的降压效果。
chinese.english: Takeda Pharmaceutical Company Limited (Takeda) and its wholly-owned subsidiary, Takeda Pharmaceuticals U.S.A., Inc., today announced EDARBYCLOR (azilsartan medoxomil and chlorthalidone) is now available by prescription in U.S. pharmacies for the treatment of hypertension to lower blood pressure in adults. It is the only fixed-dose therapy in the U.S. to combine an angiotensin II receptor blocker (ARB) with chlorthalidone in a once-daily, single tablet. In a phase 3 clinical trial, the systolic blood pressure reductions of the maximum dose of EDARBYCLOR (40/25 mg), by both clinic and trough 24-hour ambulatory blood pressure monitoring, were shown to be statistically superior to those of the fixed-dose combination of olmesartan medoxomil-hydrochlorothiazide at its maximum dose (40/25 mg). Additionally, similar blood pressure lowering effects of EDARBYCLOR were observed in a sub-group analysis of black patients.

chinese.chinese: 得克萨斯州的外科医师Denton Cooley博士在未得到食物与药品管理局批准的情况下，曾2次在等待心脏移植的病人中短期植入了人工心脏。
chinese.english: Texas surgeon, Dr Denton Cooley twice placed artificial hearts for short periods in patients awaiting heart transplants, without the approval of the FDA.

chinese.chinese: 上周的手术其独特之处在于：它是第一次植入一颗永久性人工心脏，以替代人的心脏。
chinese.english: What was unique about last week's procedure was that it was the first implantation of a permanent artificial replacement for a human heart.

chinese.chinese: 然而，当Clark病情开始迅速恶化，双腿、腹内和肺出现积液，心脏出现危险的心律不齐时，他们将手术提前到凌晨零点30分。
chinese.english: However they moved it forward to 12.30 am when Clark's condition began to deteriorate rapidly, with fluid accumulating in his legs, abdomen and lungs, and his heart undergoing dangerously irregular rhythms.

chinese.chinese: 手术中，医生们切除了左右心室——即Clark心脏下部的两腔，用上部的两腔即左右心房作为价值16，450美元的人工心脏的固定物。
chinese.english: In the operation, surgeons removed the left and right ventricles - the two bottom chambers of Clark's heart, and used the upper chambers, the left and right atria as anchors for the $16,450 artificial heart.

chinese.chinese: 犹他大学外科组认为，在最好情况下几周后他能出院，住在盐湖城专门设计的房子里，他将仍然连着为人工心脏供能的压缩机。
chinese.english: In the best possible circumstances, the Utah group said, he will be able to leave hospital in a few weeks, to live in a specially-designed house in Salt Lake City, in which he will remain attached to the compressor that powers his heart.

chinese.chinese: 只有两个外科组在A1心脏研究方面做出了显著的努力——犹他大学外科组和在休斯敦的另一组。
chinese.english: Only two groups have put a significant effort into artificial heart research--the Utah group and another in Houston.

chinese.chinese: 英国研究者同世界其他地方的研究者一样，正在研究人体心脏移植。
chinese.english: British researchers, like those in the rest of the world are concentrating on human heart transplants.

chinese.chinese: 右心房以上的静脉(即直立时的头、颈静脉)血压低于大气压，当损伤累及这些静脉壁时，空气就可被吸入静脉而进入血液循环。
chinese.english: The pressure in veins situated above the level of the right atrium (e.g. in the head and neck when upright) is below that of the atmosphere and when a wound involves the wall of such a vein, air may be sucked into it and pass into the circulation.

chinese.chinese: 激活的第二个连锁反应为替代或旁路途径，包含另外的成分而且跳过经典补体连锁反应的头三个阶段。
chinese.english: A second sequence of activation, the alternative pathway, involves additional components and by-passes the first three stages of the classical complement cascade.

chinese.chinese: 昏眩是病人用以表达很多中不同关键的症状名称，例如感觉自体旋转（或）环境旋转、头昏、头眩、头脑不清醒、晕船、晕车、酒醉、蹒跚、站立不稳和眼花等均可诉之为昏眩。
chinese.english: This term is applied by patients to an immense variety of sensations such as spinning of self and/or environment, light-headedness, swimming and fuzziness of the head, faintness, seasickness, drunkenness, staggering, unsteadiness, and giddiness.

chinese.chinese: 检查床的位置最好是床头靠墙，两侧（特别是右侧）及床脚头应为检查者留出通道。
chinese.english: The examining table may be placed with its head against the wall, but b3th sides (particularly the right) and the foot should be accessible to the examiner.

chinese.chinese: 颈静脉压：要想满意地进行颈静脉检查，需要有一张床或检查台，病人的头和躯干不同程度地升高。
chinese.english: Jugular venous pressure: Satisfactory examination of the neck veins requires a bed or table that will allow the patient's head and trunk to be elevated to various heights.

chinese.chinese: (1)心前区的望诊和触诊：检查者移向病床的脚头，从前胸水平观察心前区。
chinese.english: (1) Inspection and palpation of the precordium: Move toward the foot of the bed and observe the precordium from the level of the anterior chest.

chinese.chinese: 要求病人将头转向你的对侧，并经口作深长呼吸。
chinese.english: Then ask the patient to turn his head to the side away from you and take a long, deep breath through his mouth.

chinese.chinese: 英国心脏基金会的一位发言人说，人工心脏的最大绊脚石不全是制造心脏装置，而是找到一种有效的供能方式。
chinese.english: A spokesman from the British Heart Foundation said that the biggest stumbling block with artificial hearts is not so much making the device, but in finding an efficient means of powering it.

chinese.chinese: 比如核动力心脏，如果没有辐射问题的话，则是很理想的。
chinese.english: A nuclear-powered heart, for example, would be ideal were it not for the radiation.

chinese.chinese: 1972—1974年期问，加利福尼亚州南部一个划定地理位置的白人中产阶级社团中所有成年居民的82％参加了一项心脏病危险因素的调查，这是脂类研究诊所流行病学研究的一部分。
chinese.english: Between 1972 and 1974, 82% of all adult residents of a geographically defined, upper middle class, Caucasian Southern California community participated in a survey for heart disease risk factors as part of a Lipid Research Clinic prevalence study (14).

chinese.chinese: 对肌肉能量代谢和心脏有保护作用的药物制剂
chinese.english: Pharmaceutical preparations with protective action on muscle energy metabolism and on the heart.

chinese.chinese: 心脏收缩和平滑肌收缩就不是被意识所控制的。
chinese.english: Contractions of the heart and smooth muscles are not under conscious control.

chinese.chinese: 心血管系统是循环系统的组成之一；心血管系统包括心脏、血管及血液。
chinese.english: It is made up of the heart, blood vessels, and blood, which together make up the cardiovascular system.

chinese.chinese: 心脏是一块被分为几乎对等两半的肌肉：一半吸收来自肺部的血液，并将血液运送到机体的其余部位，另一半使流经全身的血液回流入肺。
chinese.english: The heart is a muscle that is divided into two nearly identical halves: one half receives blood from the lungs and sends it to the rest of the body, the other half sends blood that has traveled through the body back to the lungs.

chinese.chinese: 心脏收缩时，动脉把全身血液输送到毛细血管。
chinese.english: When the heart muscle contracts, the blood is forced out into arteries and enters small capillaries.

chinese.chinese: 检查者从病人的头后保持与头部30．48 ～ 45．72 cm (12～18吋)的距离缓慢持续移动一个手指。
chinese.english: Slowly bring from behind the patient one constantly moving finger held 12 to 18 inches from his head.

chinese.chinese: 对所有的病人都应检查二头肌、三头肌、桡骨膜、髌骨和跟腱反射。
chinese.english: Examine the biceps, triceps, radial periosteal, patellar, and Achilles reflexes in all patients.

chinese.chinese: 检查二头肌反射时最好是叩击置于肌腱上的检查者的拇指或其他手指。
chinese.english: The biceps reflex is best tested by tapping the examiner's finger or thumb, which has been placed over the patient's tendon.

chinese.chinese: 用方向术语说明身体结构的位置时，身体应处于解剖位置，即站立位，头和掌向前，两脚稍稍分开。
chinese.english: Directional terms indicate the position of body structures when the body is in the anatomical position -- that is, a standing position, head and palms facing forward, and the feet spread slightly apart.

chinese.chinese: 旋转：在此情况下，一个结构按长轴转动，例如头的旋转。
chinese.english: Rotation: Here a structure turns on its long axis, as in the rotation of the head.

chinese.chinese: 髌骨：膝盖骨，位于膝前，它是与股四头肌腱相连接的扁平籽骨。
chinese.english: Patella: The kneecap, a flat, sesmoidal bone located in front of the knee in the tendon of the quadriceps femoris muscle.

chinese.chinese: 副神经 (传出) ：头, 肩部运动，发音。
chinese.english: Accessory nerve (efferent): head and shoulder movements, vocal movements.

chinese.chinese: 反射可以分成四种：浅反射(足底反射、腹壁反射、角膜反射)；深反射(称肌肉反射或伸肌反射，它包括：膝跳反射、跟腱反射、肱二头肌和三头肌反射)；内脏反射(光反射——虹膜的收缩；睫脊反射——紧缩皮肤引起瞳孔散大)和病理反射(肛门括约肌控制排粪机能破坏——病人可能大便失禁)。
chinese.english: Reflexes can be classified into four groups: superficial (plantar reflex, abdominal wall reflex, corneal reflex), deep (called muscle or myotatic reflex: knee jerk or patellar reflex, Achilles reflex, biceps and triceps reflexes), visceral (light reflex---constriction of the iris, ciliospinal---pinching the skin causes the pupil to dilate), and pathological (destruction of sphincter muscles controlling defecation--individual may be unable to hold back feces).

chinese.chinese: 这项研究的作者，将研究发表在今天（周三）的欧洲心脏杂志网络版上，他说：“我们的研究结果显示，观察心衰患者无法坚持复杂的自我保健与必需的简单自我管理方法是一致的。”
chinese.english: The authors of the study, which is published online today (Wednesday) in the European Heart Journal [1], say: "Our results are consistent with the observation that people with HF have trouble adhering to complex self-care advice, and suggest that simpler approaches to self-management may be required".

chinese.chinese: 新研究显示，与母亲无偏头痛病史的婴儿相比，患偏头痛的母亲出生的小孩更容易患急腹痛。急腹痛即其他方面健康的婴儿过度哭闹。该研究今天已公布，将于2012年2月21日—28日在新奥尔良召开的第64次美国神经病学年会上宣读。
chinese.english: New research suggests that mothers who experience migraine may be more likely to have a baby with colic than mothers without a history of migraine. Colic is defined as excessive crying in an otherwise healthy infant. The research was released today and will be presented at the American Academy of Neurology's 64th Annual Meeting in New Orleans April 21 to April 28, 2012.

chinese.chinese: 美国食品药品管理局（FDA）今天宣布要修订某些他汀类药物与艾滋病病毒（HIV）和丙肝病毒(HCV)的蛋白酶抑制剂的使用说明，以警示这两类药物之间的相互作用可能增加患肌病和肾衰竭的风险。
chinese.english: The US Food and Drug Administration (FDA) today announced that it is revising the labels of certain statins as well as protease inhibitors for HIV and hepatitis C virus (HCV) to warn about interactions between the 2 sets of drugs that could increase the risk for myopathy and kidney failure.

chinese.chinese: 今天，他的第二次术后检查，Stanley依然无癌，他说，“我还在这，我感觉很好。”
chinese.english: On his second post-operative check-up today, Stanley remains cancer-free. "I'm still here," he sayshappily, "I'm feeling good."

chinese.chinese: 今天，机器人手术经常用于前列腺和妇科手术。它已经应用于几个美国和欧洲医疗中心，在加拿大多伦多总医院作为一项有效的技术来治疗肺癌。在2011年胸心血管外科杂志的研究表明，这是一项安全并发症低的程序，与肋骨和神经保留开胸手术比较，出血、感染风险的发生率低，住院时间短，生活质量更高。
chinese.english: To date, robotic surgeryhas most often been used for prostate and gynecological surgeries. It is nowbeing used in several U.S. and European centres, and atTGH, as a useful technique in treating lung cancer. Studies in the 2011 Journal of Thoracic and Cardiovascular Surgeryhave shown that it is a safe procedure, and results in lower morbidity, such asblood loss, risk of infection, lower mortality, shorter hospital stays, andbetter quality of life than rib-and nerve-sparing thoracotomy.

chinese.chinese: Peter Zimetbaum博士及其同事注意到在内科学杂志上报道，在维持房颤患者正常心跳的疗效上，胺碘酮优于其他药物，但这种疗效是以更大的副作用为代价的。
chinese.english: Dr. Peter Zimetbaum and associates note in the Archives of Internal Medicine that amiodarone is more effective than other drugs for maintaining a normal heartbeat in patients with atrial fibrillation, but this comes at the cost of more side effects.

chinese.chinese: 心房纤颤是一种心跳的异常，原因是心脏上部的腔室——心房壁异常快速颤动。这种心律失常加大了心脏内形成血栓风险，并有可能移至大脑引起中风。为此，该类患者经常要使用血液稀释剂（抗凝剂）来预防形成这种血栓。
chinese.english: Atrial fibrillation is a heartbeat disturbance in which the walls of the upper chambers of the heart vibrate rapidly. This "arrhythmia" raises the risk that clots may form in the heart and possibly travel to the brain, causing a stroke. For this reason, patients are often treated with blood thinners to prevent these clots from forming.

chinese.chinese: 结论:在这个住院患者的研究中, 脑缺氧后癫痫持续状态似乎是脱险者心跳停止独立的危险因素.  表明对于既定的病因学癫痫持续状态可能预示着不良的后果.
chinese.english: CONCLUSION: In this hospital-based cohort, postanoxic status epilepticus (SE) seems to be independently related to death in cardiac arrest survivors, suggesting that SE might determine a bad prognosis for a given etiology.

chinese.chinese: 方法:这是一个对脱险的昏迷患者心跳停止连续性回顾性观察的试验.包括对受试者的低温疗法.
chinese.english: METHODS: This was a retrospective observation of consecutive comatose survivors of cardiac arrest, including subjects treated with hypothermia.

chinese.chinese: 结果：总的平均除颤时间是1分钟（四分位间距，1～3分钟）；2045例（30.1％）患者除颤时间延迟。与除颤时间延迟相关的因素包括黑人、没有入院的心血管疾病诊断、心跳骤停发生在小于250张床位的医院、住在没有监护的单元、心跳骤停发生在下班时间（下午5点到早上8点或周末）。延迟除颤与低生存出院几率显著相关（22.2％vs39.3％，校正后比值比0.48，95％可信区间0.42-0.54，P<0.001）。而且，除颤时间延迟分钟数增加与低生存出院率呈等级相关性。（P<0.001）。
chinese.english: Results The overall median time to defibrillation was 1 minute (interquartile range, <1 to 3 minutes); delayed defibrillation occurred in 2045 patients (30.1%). Characteristics associated with delayed defibrillation included black race, noncardiac admitting diagnosis, and occurrence of cardiac arrest at a hospital with fewer than 250 beds, in an unmonitored hospital unit, and during after-hours periods (5 p.m. to 8 a.m. or weekends). Delayed defibrillation was associated with a significantly lower probability of surviving to hospital discharge (22.2%, vs. 39.3% when defibrillation was not delayed; adjusted odds ratio, 0.48; 95% confidence interval, 0.42 to 0.54; P<0.001). In addition, a graded association was seen between increasing time to defibrillation and lower rates of survival to hospital discharge for each minute of delay (P for trend <0.001).

chinese.chinese: 基于应用移动设备的互动游戏来指导医务工作者，今天我们来看下iPhone/iPodTouch/iPad上的Ward Round软件。
chinese.english: To build upon this theme of interactive games on mobile devices to help teachhealthcare providers, today we review the Ward Round App for the iPhone/iPodTouch/iPad.

chinese.chinese: 一个国际专家小组今天在柳叶刀上报告，对一线和二线药物耐药的结核病，正变得越来越流行，。他们用“令人震惊”来描述耐药TB的广泛程度。在八个国家中，43.7%的TB（结核病）被发现至少对一个二线药物耐药。
chinese.english: Tuberculosis that is resistant to first-line and second-line drugs is becoming more prevalent, an international team of experts reported in The Lancet today. They described levels of extensively drug-resistant TB as "alarming". 43.7% of TB (tuberculosis) cases in eight countries were found to be resistant to at least one second-line drug.

chinese.chinese: 2012年9月6日，美通社马里兰州罗克维尔消息——开发癌症治疗新疗法的一个临床阶段的制药公司，EntreMed公司（纳斯达克：ENMD）今天宣布，《欧洲癌症杂志》上发表了一篇题为《ENMD-2076，一种口服的血管生成和增殖激酶抑制剂，对复发性铂耐药卵巢癌具有活性》的论文，该文是由来自波士顿达纳.法伯癌症研究所的厄休拉.A.马它罗尼斯博士撰写的。
chinese.english: ROCKVILLE, Md., Sept. 6, 2012 /PRNewswire/ -- EntreMed, Inc. (Nasdaq: ENMD), a clinical-stage pharmaceutical company developing therapeutics for the treatment of cancer, announced today the publication of an article by Ursula A. Matulonis, MD, of Dana-Farber Cancer Institute in Boston, entitled "ENMD-2076, an Oral Inhibitor of Angiogenic and Proliferation Kinases, Has Activity in Recurrent, Platinum Resistant Ovarian Cancer," in the European Journal of Cancer.

chinese.chinese: 内分泌学会今天公布了诊治高甘油三酯血症的临床实践指南(CPG)。甘油三酯是一种存在于血液中的脂类，与心血管疾病风险有关。该临床实践指南全称为“高甘油三酯血症的诊断与治疗：内分泌学会临床实践指南”，该指南发布于2012年9月期的内分泌学会刊物《临床内分泌与代谢》(Journal of Clinical Endocrinology and Metabolism ,JCEM)杂志上。
chinese.english: The Endocrine Society today issued a Clinical Practice Guideline (CPG) for the diagnosis and treatment of hypertriglyceridemia. Triglycerides are a type of fat found in the blood and are associated with cardiovascular risk. The CPG, entitled "Evaluation and Treatment of Hypertriglyceridemia: An Endocrine Society Clinical Practice Guideline" appears in the September 2012 issue of the Journal of Clinical Endocrinology and Metabolism (JCEM), a publication of The Endocrine Society.

chinese.chinese: Gregg C. Fonarow 医生说：“首次心脏发作之后的30天内，患者再次出现心脏病发作，心跳骤停，猝死和其他各种原因导致的死亡的几率是最高的。在首次心脏发作之后的30天内应用卡维地络可以降低各种原因所致的死亡，非致死性的心梗和心跳骤停，其有效率可以达到42%，而且存在统计学意义”
chinese.english: "The first 30 days after a heart attack represent the period of greatest risk for recurrent heart attacks, cardiac arrest, sudden death, and all-cause mortality," Dr. Gregg C. Fonarow told Reuters Health. "The results of this analysis from CAPRICORN suggest that, in the first 30 days after a myocardial infarction, carvedilol produced a significant 42% reduction in the risk of all-cause mortality, nonfatal myocardial infarction, or cardiac arrest."

chinese.chinese: 常规来说医生应该在患者出现心跳骤停两分钟之内进行抢救。而要做到在患者的身上使用除颤器除颤以恢复心跳，两分钟的时间可以说非常短。
chinese.english: Hospital staff are supposed to respond within two minutes when patients' hearts stop beating. That's not much time to mobilize the hollering code-blue team and to get the defibrillator paddles on a patient's chest to shock the heart back into action.

chinese.chinese: 结论：住院期间心跳骤停后除颤延迟普遍存在而且与低生存出院率相关。
chinese.english: Conclusions Delayed defibrillation is common and is associated with lower rates of survival after in-hospital cardiac arrest.

chinese.chinese: 方法：我们入选了369个参加了国家心肺复苏登记的医院的6789例心室颤动或无脉性室性心动过速导致心跳骤停的患者。采用多因素Logistic回归分析，我们明确了与除颤延迟相关的因素。我们探讨了除颤延迟（超过2分钟）与患者生存出院的关系，校正了病人差异和医院差异。
chinese.english: Methods We identified 6789 patients who had cardiac arrest due to ventricular fibrillation or pulseless ventricular tachycardia at 369 hospitals participating in the National Registry of Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation. Using multivariable logistic regression, we identified characteristics associated with delayed defibrillation. We then examined the association between delayed defibrillation (more than 2 minutes) and survival to discharge after adjusting for differences in patient and hospital characteristics.

chinese.chinese: 背景：专家指南认为对于室性心律失常导致的住院病人心跳骤停应该在2分钟内给予除颤。但是，关于在美国除颤时间延迟的发生率及其对生存率的影响的数据尚很缺乏。
chinese.english: Background Expert guidelines advocate defibrillation within 2 minutes after an in-hospital cardiac arrest caused by ventricular arrhythmia. However, empirical data on the prevalence of delayed defibrillation in the United States and its effect on survival are limited.

chinese.chinese: (美国商业新闻社)东部夏令时2012年9月10日早07:45旧金山消息：Durata Therapeutics公司(NASDAQ: DRTX)今天公布了其优先进行的候选药物，达巴万星的体外研究数据以及检测结果，该产品目前正进行两项全球性临床3期试验，用于治疗急性细菌性皮肤与皮肤结构感染(ABSSSI)。该数据于第52届抗微生物剂与化学疗法跨学科会议(ICAAC)上得到公布，数据表明，达巴万星具有抵抗美国和欧洲多种重要细菌株的效能。
chinese.english: SAN FRANCISCO--(BUSINESS WIRE)--September 10, 2012 07:45 AM Eastern Daylight Time--Durata Therapeutics (NASDAQ: DRTX) today announced data from an in vitro study and surveillance results of its lead product candidate, dalbavancin, currently under investigation in two ongoing, global, Phase 3 clinical trials for the treatment of acute bacterial skin and skin structure infections (ABSSSI). The data, presented at the 52nd Interscience Conference on Antimicrobial Agents and Chemotherapy (ICAAC), demonstrate the potency of dalbavancin against numerous significant bacterial isolates in the United States and Europe.

chinese.chinese: 2012.9.10 —今天，美联邦健康护理研究和质量（AHRQ）机构宣布：经过4年多的以一系列预防策略为特征的一个项目计划之后，比如洗手、穿脱无菌衣等，全美44个州超过1,000所医院将他们中心静脉有关的血液感染率（CLABSIs）降低了40%。
chinese.english: September 10, 2012 — More than 1000 hospitals in 44 states lowered their rate of central line-associated bloodstream infections (CLABSIs) by 40% over 4 years through a program that features a checklist of precautions such as hand washing and donning sterile apparel, the federal Agency for Healthcare Research and Quality (AHRQ) announced today.

chinese.chinese: 吸着剂疗法，一家生物制药公司研制的用于心血管疾病和肾脏疾病的治疗方法，今天从CLP1001随机、双盲二期临床试验中得到了积极的数据。针对111名因慢性肾病导致心衰的病人的研究结果显示，CLP1001在改善心衰病人症状上优于安慰剂。
chinese.english: Sorbent Therapeutics, Inc. a ********aceutical company developing therapies for cardiovascular and renal diseases, today presented positive data from its randomized, double-blind Phase 2a clinical study of CLP1001. In the study of 111 heart failure patients with chronic kidney disease, CLP1001 demonstrated improvement in heart failure symptoms as compared to placebo.

chinese.chinese: 住院期间心跳骤停后除颤时间延迟
chinese.english: Delayed Time to Defibrillation after In-Hospital Cardiac Arrest

chinese.chinese: 实验室检查也受到置疑。Megan Moynahan，FDA除颤器小组组长，置疑为什么制造商仅仅对电极弯折有限的次数以模拟心跳，使得“所有的设备通过所有的测试。”为什么不弯折电极直到断裂来分辨强韧的电极和脆弱的电极呢。
chinese.english: Lab tests got criticized, too. Megan Moynahan, chief of the FDA's defibrillator branch, asked why manufacturers only bend leads a limited number of times, simulating heartbeats, so that “all devices pass all tests.” Why not flex them until they fail, she asked, to separate stronger leads from weaker ones.

chinese.chinese: 在她的前期研究中，Mikkola和其同事在哈佛和法国发现胎盘中存在巨大的造血干细胞池，但是若它们起源于其他任何地方并迁徙到胎盘自我更新，那它们是不干净的。Mikkola和她的研究小组使用一独特的小鼠模型，小鼠胚胎无心跳，这样能够找到造血干细胞的起源位置，因为没有血液循环。
chinese.english: In her previous research, Mikkola and collaborators in Harvard and France had discovered that the placenta contained a large pool of blood stem cells, but it wasn't clear if they originated elsewhere and migrated to the placenta to self-renew. Using a unique mouse model, a mouse embryo without a heartbeat, Mikkola and her team were able to find the blood stem cells at the site of their origin because there was no circulation of blood through the body.

chinese.chinese: 在患者去急诊室后的一个星期后, Decter医生在他的办公室给患者做了检查, 一个形体中等的中年男性. 他的血压是完美的, 心律是规则的, 心跳慢. 事实上他的整个检查结果都是完全正常的. 他做了另外一个心电图, 也是正常的. 虽然他在急诊室的血液检查似乎表明他有心梗, 但无论是心电图还是冠脉造影都没有任何异常.
chinese.english: At his office, a week after the trip to the E.R., Decter examined the patient, a fit middle-aged man. His blood pressure was perfect. His heart rate was regular and slow. In fact, his entire exam was completely normal. He got another EKG. Also normal. The patient's blood tests from the E.R. seemed to indicate that he had had a heart attack, but none of the EKGs or the angiogram revealed any abnormality.

chinese.chinese: 方法：我们对7001例有前壁心肌梗死病史，没有植入埋藏式自动复律除颤器，在家里发生过1-2次心跳骤停的患者进行随机分组，对照组（呼叫急诊医疗服务并进行心肺复苏[CPR]）和AED组（使用AED，然后呼叫急诊医疗服务并进行CPR）。主要终点为全因死亡。
chinese.english: Methods We randomly assigned 7001 patients with previous anterior-wall myocardial infarction who were not candidates for an implantable cardioverter–defibrillator to receive one of two responses to sudden cardiac arrest occurring at home: either the control response (calling emergency medical services and performing cardiopulmonary resuscitation [CPR]) or the use of an AED, followed by calling emergency medical services and performing CPR. The primary outcome was death from any cause.

chinese.chinese: 他们的研究发现在线发表于今天的《免疫学》杂志（Immunity），同时研究人员也发现尽管当人变肥胖时iNKT细胞会丧失，但这些细胞在体重减轻时可以恢复，这也就意味着未来采用激活iNKT细胞的方法可能会有助于肥胖、糖尿病以及代谢综合征的治疗。
chinese.english: Their discovery, published on-line today in the journal Immunity, also finds that although iNKT cells are lost when humans become obese, they can be restored through weight loss, and further suggests that therapies that activate iNKT cells could help manage obesity, diabetes and metabolic disease.

chinese.chinese: 2012年9月17日 - Targacept公司（NASDAQ代码：TRGT）今天宣布了TC-5619用于注意力涣散主导型注意缺陷/多动障碍（ADHDi）的2期临床关键研究结果。在该试验中，TC-5619没有达到主要的疗效评价指标，即比较药物治疗组与安慰剂组对于Conners成人多动症（ADHD）病人量表(CAARS-Inv)评分中注意力不集中的分量表在4周治疗后与基线的变化。在整个研究测评中，安慰剂组的患者评分值持续改善优于TC-5619治疗组的患者。在研究中，TC-5619的安全性和耐受性与安慰剂相当。
chinese.english: Targacept, Inc. (NASDAQ: TRGT) today announced top-line results from a Phase 2 trial of TC-5619 as a treatment for inattentive-predominant attention deficit/hyperactivity disorder (ADHDi). In the trial, TC-5619 did not meet the primary outcome measure, change from baseline on the inattention subscale of the Conners' Adult ADHD Rating Scale-Investigator-Rated (CAARS-INV), after four weeks of treatment versus placebo. Across the study measures, patients in the placebo dose group consistently improved more than patients in the TC-5619 dose groups. TC-5619 exhibited a placebo-like safety and tolerability profile in the study.

chinese.chinese: 美国甲状腺协会（ATA）今天宣布：诊断和治疗甲状腺功能低下的新的临床实践指南发表于最新一期的《甲状腺》杂志。该指南由ATA和美国临床内分泌学家协会（AACE）共同制定，并将于9月23号（星期天）在加拿大魁北克市召开的第82届美国甲状腺协会年度会议上正式呈现。
chinese.english: The American Thyroid Association (ATA) today announced that new clinical practice guidelines for the diagnosis and treatment of hypothyroidism are published in the current issue of Thyroid. The Guidelines were developed jointly by the ATA and the American Association of Clinical Endocrinologists (AACE) and will be presented on Sunday, Sept. 23, during the 82nd Annual Meeting of the American Thyroid Association in Québec City, Québec, Canada.

chinese.chinese: 上腔静脉将头、颈和上肢的血液送回心脏(进入右心房)，下腔静脉将身体其余部分的血液送回心脏(也进入右心房)。
chinese.english: The superior vena cava returns blood to the heart (enters the right atrium) from the head, neck, and upper extremities and the inferior vena cava returns blood from the rest of the body (again through the right atrium).

chinese.chinese: 成熟的精子有头，颈和尾(称作鞭毛)。
chinese.english: The mature spermatozoon has a head, a neck, and a tail called a flagellum (whip).

chinese.chinese: 龟头(阴茎头)由皮肤的摺叠(称作包皮)覆盖着。
chinese.english: The glens or head of the penis is covered by a fold of skin called the prepuce.

chinese.chinese: 在局部解剖学中通常将机体分为下列若干区：胸、腹、盆和会阴、下肢、背，上肢、头和颈。
chinese.english: During regional anatomy, the body is generally divided into the following regions: thorax, abdomen, perineum and pelvis, lower limb, back, upper limb, head, and neck.

chinese.chinese: 解剖方位是人体直立，头、两眼和脚趾正指前方，脚趾和脚跟靠卧、拢，上肢垂于两侧，手掌向前。
chinese.english: A person in the anatomical position is standing erect with the head, eyes, and toes directed forward, the heels and toes together, and the upper limbs hanging by the sides with the palms facing anteriorly.

chinese.chinese: 下(尾侧、下方)：对向脚或身体下部离头较远的部位。
chinese.english: Inferior (Caudal, Below): Toward the feet or lower part of the body and further from the head.

chinese.chinese: 每一头臂静脉由颈内静脉和锁骨下静脉在胸锁关节后方汇合而成。
chinese.english: Each is formed by the union of the internal jugular and subclavian veins behind the sterno-clavicular joint.

chinese.chinese: 因此，上腔静脉收集头、颈、上肢、胸壁和上腹壁的静脉血。
chinese.english: Thus the superior vena cava drains all the blood from the head anal neck, upper limbs, and the wall of the thorax and upper abdomen.

chinese.chinese: 输出小管将睾丸网连于附睾头。
chinese.english: Small efferent ductules connect the rete testis to the head of the epididymis.

chinese.chinese: 阴道是产道的最长部分，可为胎儿头所扩张。
chinese.english: The vagina is the longest part of the birth canal and can be markedly distended by the fetal head.

chinese.chinese: 阴茎海绵体远端膨大形成锥形阴茎头，其凹面覆盖海绵体钝圆的游离端。
chinese.english: Distally the corpus spongiosum penis expands to form the conical glans penis, the concavity of which covers the free blunt ends of the corpora cavernosa.

chinese.chinese: 阴茎头的边缘明显，称为阴茎冠，是阴茎海绵体末端突出部分。
chinese.english: The prominent margin of the glans penis, called the corona of the glans, projects beyond the ends of the corpora cavernosa penis.

chinese.chinese: 阴茎的皮肤和筋膜以双层的皮肤皱折伸延称为包皮，部分包围阴茎头。
chinese.english: The skin and fasciae of the penis are prolonged as a free fold or double layer of skin, called the prepuce, which covers the glans penis for a variable extent.

chinese.chinese: 屈肘时，臂前面隆起为肱二头肌。
chinese.english: The rounded eminence on the anterior surface of the arm when the elbow is flexed is the biceps brachii muscle.

chinese.chinese: 肱三头肌位子臂的后部。
chinese.english: The triceps brachii muscle occupies the posterior part of the arm.

chinese.chinese: 静脉输送血液返回心脏。
chinese.english: Blood returns to the heart through veins.

chinese.chinese: 这种体液叫淋巴液，它是流经另一个管道系统——淋巴管而回流入心脏。
chinese.english: This fluid, called lymph, returns to the heart by way of another system of channels—the lymph vessels.

chinese.chinese: 三种肌肉组织为：使骨骼产生运动的骨骼肌或随意肌，心脏的心肌和形成腹部器官壁的平滑肌。
chinese.english: The three types are: the skeletal or voluntary muscle that moves the skeleton; the cardiac muscle of the heart; and the smooth muscle that forms the walls of the abdominal organs.

chinese.chinese: 举个例子来说，急性心脏病发作常常没有前兆，而且会很快致命。
chinese.english: An acute heart attack, for example, often hits without warning and can be quickly fatal.

chinese.chinese: 不同的血管X光片显示了心脏和循环系统的疾病。
chinese.english: Various kinds of angiograms show heart and circulatory disease.

chinese.chinese: 核磁共振，或核磁共振成像，是一种没有副作用，没有伤害性，在强烈磁场下使用放射波的探测手段，它能把大脑、心脏、肝脏和其它人体器官剖析成很薄的片层。
chinese.english: Nuclear magnetic resonance, or magnetic resonance imaging, is a hazard-free, non-invasive method that uses radio waves in the presence of a strong magnetic field to probe a patient and generate visual images of thin slices of the brain, heart, liver, and other organs.

chinese.chinese: 心电图(ECG)对于诊断某些心脏病是有用的。
chinese.english: The electrocardiograph (ECG) is useful for diagnosing certain heart conditions.

chinese.chinese: 当心电图仪的电极被固定在病人的胸部时，无论病人是在休息还是在进行某些活动，如在计步器上走动，他心脏的电流活动都可能被记录下来。
chinese.english: With electrodes taped to a person's chest, the electrical activity of the heart can be recorded while the patient is either resting or performing some activity, such as walking on a treadmill.

chinese.chinese: 心脏的收缩由一个位于心脏内部，被称为窦房结的天然起搏器发出的电脉冲开始。
chinese.english: The heart contraction is originated with an electrical impulse in a natural pacemaker called the sinoatrial node, located within the heart itself.

chinese.chinese: 心脏有自己的电传导系统，控制心肌收缩的频率和节律。
chinese.english: Thus the heart contains its own electrical conducting system capable of controlling both the rate and order of contractions.

chinese.chinese: 对头部或胸部极轻微的挤压震动即可损伤脑或心脏。
chinese.english: The slightest jar to the head or chest could damage the brain or heart.

chinese.chinese: 急性肺水肿的产生是由于心脏先出了问题，其症状对负责把富氧血输出肺部的肺静脉和左心房施加了压力所致。
chinese.english: The fluid buildup is caused by heart trouble that, in turn, produces back pressure in the pulmonary veins and the left atrium of the heart to which they carry oxygen-rich blood from the lungs.

chinese.chinese: 治疗可采用输氧，洋地黄加强心脏功能，利尿药来加速肾脏对尿液的排除。
chinese.english: The condition is treated with oxygen, digitalis to strengthen heart action, and diuretics to speed fluid removal by the kidneys.

chinese.chinese: 心血管系统是由心脏和血管组成。
chinese.english: The cardiovascular system is made up of the heart and blood vessels.

chinese.chinese: 心脏位于两肺之间，其尖指向左侧。
chinese.english: The heart is situated between the lungs with its apex directed toward the left.

chinese.chinese: 心肌是构成心脏的一层厚厚肌肉；内面由一层薄薄心内膜覆盖，外面由一层薄薄心外膜覆盖。
chinese.english: The thick muscle layer of the heart wall is the myocardium, which is lined on the inside with a thin endocardium and is covered on the outside with a thin epicardium.

chinese.chinese: 心脏还被包裹在一个称为心包的纤维囊中。
chinese.english: The heart is contained within a fibrous sac, the pericardium.

chinese.chinese: 位于心脏上面部分的是接受回心血液的心房。
chinese.english: The upper receiving chambers of the heart are the atria.

chinese.chinese: 动脉将血液带出心脏。
chinese.english: Arteries lead blood away from the heart.

chinese.chinese: 血管壁分为三层，与心脏的三层相似，即(1)最内面的内膜，其构成光滑的表面，有利于血液流过；(2)第二层，其所占比例较大，由不随意肌组成，并伴以弹力结缔组织；(3)外膜，由具有支撑作用的结缔组织构成。
chinese.english: There are three coats (tunics) which resemble the three tissue layers of the heart.

chinese.chinese: 静脉将含有废物的血液从组织携带到心脏。
chinese.english: They conduct waste-filled blood toward the heart from the tissues.

chinese.chinese: 心脏将血液泵入两个循环体系。
chinese.english: The heart pumps blood through two circuits.

chinese.chinese: 心脏的右边将血泵入肺，通过肺循环使血发生氧合。
chinese.english: The right side of the heart pumps blood to the lungs to be oxygenated through the pulmonary circuit.

chinese.chinese: 心脏的左边泵出血液通过体循环，将血液分配到机体的其它部位。
chinese.english: The left side of the heart pumps blood to the remainder of the body through the systemic circuit.

chinese.chinese: 从组织(肺组织除外)而来的血液经腔静脉，即上腔静脉与下腔静脉，回到心脏。
chinese.english: Blood returning from tissues other than the lungs enters the heart by way of the venae cavae: the superior vena cava and the inferior vena cava.

chinese.chinese: 被氧合的血液通过肺静脉回到心脏的左心房。
chinese.english: Oxygenated blood returns to the heart by way of pulmonary veins, which empty into the left atrium.

chinese.chinese: 主动脉是一条连续的管道，分成以下几部分：(1)升主动脉—靠近心脏，位于心包内；(2)主动脉弓—从右弯曲到左，并向后延伸；(3)胸主动脉—位于心脏之后，脊柱之前，胸膜后的间隙里；(4)腹主动脉—主动脉的最长部分，跨过腹腔。
chinese.english: The aorta is one continuous tube divided into the following regions: 1) the ascending aorta, which is near the heart and inside the pericardial sac; 2) the aortic arch, which curves from the right to the left, and also extends backward; 3) the thoracic aorta, which lies just in front of the vertebral column behind the heart and in the space behind the pleura; and 4) the abdominal aorta, which is the longest section of the aorta, spanning the abdominal cavity.

chinese.chinese: 心脏的跳动分为两期：舒张期与收缩期。
chinese.english: There are two phases of the heartbeat: diastole (relaxation) and systole (contraction).

chinese.chinese: 心室收缩使压力波增大；这种压力波开始于心脏，沿动脉传导。
chinese.english: The force of ventricular contraction starts a wave of increased pressure which begins at the heart and travels along the arteries.

chinese.chinese: 血压在心动周期中有所变化，在心脏喷血(收缩期)时增大，在心脏舒张(舒张期)时减小。
chinese.english: This pressure varies over the course of the cardiac cycle, increasing when blood is ejected from the heart (during systole), and decreasing as the heart relaxes (during diastole).

chinese.chinese: 每一指骨为一小的长骨，由一较大的近侧端即底和较小的远侧端即头所组成。
