chinese.english: Each phalanx is also a miniature long bone consisting of a body, a larger proximal end or base, and a smaller distal end or head.

chinese.chinese: 前群肌(缝匠肌和股四头肌)位于股部前外侧面。
chinese.english: The anterior group of muscles (sartorius and quadriceps femoris) lies on the anterior and lateral aspects of the thigh.

chinese.chinese: 大腿后群肌(半腱肌、半膜肌、股二头肌)位于股后部，由坐骨神经支配。
chinese.english: The hamstring group of muscles (semitendinosus, semimembranosus, and biceps femoris) lies on the back of the thigh and is supplied by the sciatic nerve.

chinese.chinese: 围绕腘窝使其成为菱形隙的肌外上有股二头肌、内上有半膜肌和半腱肌、外下及内下分别有腓肠肌的外侧头和内侧头。
chinese.english: The muscles surrounding the popliteal fossa delineate a diamond-shaped space that is bounded superolaterally by the biceps femoris muscle, superomedially by the semimembranosus and semitendinosus muscles, and inferolaterally and inferomedially by the medial and lateral heads of the gastrocnemius muscle.

chinese.chinese: 头皮由五层构成，但临床上常将头三层视为一层，因为在开颅翻头皮皮瓣或意外事故头皮撕裂时，它们紧密结合在一起。
chinese.english: The scalp consists of five layers, but clinically the first three are usually regarded as a single layer because they remain firmly bound together when a scalp flap is turned down during a craniotomy or is torn off in accidents.

chinese.chinese: 由于有此疏松结缔组织层，使得固有头皮(头三层能自由移动，并在深度撕裂时易于撕下。
chinese.english: This loose areolar tissue allows free movement of the scalp proper (the first three layers) as one sheet; it is easily torn in deep scalp lacerations.

chinese.chinese: 脑神经将脑的传出传至与头、眼、口、面、舌、咽和喉运动有关的随意肌。
chinese.english: The cranial nerves convey the output of the brain to the voluntary muscles concerned with movements of the head, eyes, mouth, face, tongue, pharynx, and larynx.

chinese.chinese: 颈部有脉管和神经以及连结头和躯干的其他结构。
chinese.english: The neck contains vessels, nerves, and other structures connecting the head and the trunk.

chinese.chinese: 其开口朝下口的后方，有一头罩状管状隆起称咽鼓管隆凸 (圆枕)，此乃由于咽鼓管软骨部突起所致。
chinese.english: Its orifice is directed downward and posterior to it, there is a hood-like tubal elevation called the torus tubarius.

chinese.chinese: 这样做并非认为如此大的一张图解能很快为读者消化吸收，它聚集了生化知识基础，是一份手头参考。
chinese.english: This is not to pretend that such a large format can be assimilated quickly; it is a handy reference while a background of biochemical knowledge is built up.

chinese.chinese: 5.二个十五碳单位不是头对尾，而是尾对尾地缩合，生成鲨烯，后者以易于环化的方式进行折叠。
chinese.english: 5. Two fifteen-carbon units condense, not head-to-tail but rather tail-to-tail, to yield squalene, which is folded in such a way as to become subject to cyclization.

chinese.chinese: 所以，在铅中毒时，由于上述头两个酶受抑制，血红素生成减少，而对第三个酶(合成酶)的反馈抑制作用减弱。
chinese.english: So in lead poisoning the production of haem is diminished because of inhibition of the first two enzymes mentioned, but the feedback inhibition of the third (the synthetase) is decreased.

chinese.chinese: 医学博士Mravin Ryou领导的研究人员，通过内窥镜技术，用内窥镜自组装磁体在5头猪的小肠内创造了胃肠道支路。Mravin Ryou是哈佛医学院内科讲师，布里格姆妇女医院副主任医师。这些猪每3到6天进行一次观察，直到吻合术的吻合完全形成为止。吻合术是将两段胃肠道的末端通过手术连接起来的一种手术。吻合由磁力压缩提供动力。磁力压缩过程利用了机体对胃肠道的自然修复能力。
chinese.english: Researchers led by Marvin Ryou, MD, associate physician, Brigham and Women's Hospital and instructor of medicine at Harvard Medical School, endoscopically created a GI bypass by deploying self-assembling magnets for endoscopy (SAMSEN) magnetic devices into the intestines of five pigs. The pigs were scoped every three to six days until creation of an anastomosis, a surgical bypass connecting two parts of the GI tract. The anastomosis was created by magnetic compression, a process that takes advantage of the body's natural healing process to remodel the GI tract.

chinese.chinese: 没有一位母亲接受过产前的抗逆转录病毒的治疗，但是在妊娠和分娩期间，或者孩子出生后的头两天这些母亲在进行的HIV病毒快速试验结果是阳性的。
chinese.english: None of the mothers had received antenatal anti-retroviral therapy, but had positive results on HIV rapid tests administered during labor or delivery, or during the first 2 days following the birth.

chinese.chinese: 该发现切实描绘了一幅更清晰的画面：意志如何影响免疫活动。“一头黑斑羚的免疫系统不可能知道一头潜伏在草丛中的狮子正要猛扑过来，而它的大脑知道。”Dhabhar说。在这种情况下，狮子和羚羊一样，当抗病原免疫细胞处于预备状态诸如处于皮肤和粘膜等地方，这些地方都是损伤和后续感染的高危区。
chinese.english: The findings paint a clearer picture of exactly how the mind influences immuneactivity. "An impala's immune system has no way of knowing that a lion islurking in the grass and is about to pounce, but its brain does," Dhabharsaid. In such situations, it benefits lion and impala alike whenpathogen-fighting immune cells are in positions of readiness in such places asthe skin and mucous membranes, which are at high risk for damage and consequentinfection.

chinese.chinese: 既然血管内的压力随着心脏和动脉情况的变化、以及其它因素的不同而有所改变，所以血压测量和仔细分析能为健康评价和健康护理提供有价值的指导。
chinese.english: Since the pressure inside the blood vessels varies with the condition of the heart and the arteries as well as with other factors, the measurement of blood pressure together with careful interpretation may prove a valuable guide in the care and evaluation of a person's health.

chinese.chinese: 所测的血压分为：(1)收缩压，即心脏收缩时所产生的压力，平均在120左右，用毫米汞柱表示；(2)舒张压，即心脏舒张时所产生的压力，平均在80左右，用毫米汞柱表示。
chinese.english: The two measurements made are of: 1) the systolic pressure, which occurs during heart muscle contraction and averages around 120, expressed in millimeters of mercury; and 2) the diastolic pressure, which occurs during relaxation of the heart muscle and averages around 80 millimeters of mercury.

chinese.chinese: 其中一个症状是心绞痛，表现为心脏区域的压榨性疼痛；这种疼痛可放射至左臂或左肩，常因用力而诱发。
chinese.english: One of its symptoms is angina pectoris, which is manifested as a feeling of constriction around the heart or pain radiating to the left arm or shoulder, usually brought on by exertion.

chinese.chinese: 这就叫做心肌梗死，其为心脏猝死的主要原因。
chinese.english: This is myocardial infarction, which is a leading cause of sudden death.

chinese.chinese: 常有心律失常、即心律紊乱；通常表现为纤维性颤动，即极快而无效的心脏跳动。
chinese.english: Often there is an abnormality of the heart rhythm, or arrhythmia, usually fibrillation, an extremely rapid, ineffective beating of the heart.

chinese.chinese: 静脉血栓常可循环通过心脏，停留在肺动脉内，导致危及生命的肺栓塞。
chinese.english: Often a venous thrombus can travel through the heart and then lodge in an artery of the lungs, resulting in a life-threatening pulmonary embolism.

chinese.chinese: 心脏不能有效排空，不能将需要的血液量泵出心脏；也就是说，从静脉回流到心脏的血液多于离开心脏的血液。
chinese.english: The heart fails to empty effectively, being unable to pump its required amount of blood; that is to say, more blood enters the heart from the veins than leaves through the arteries.

chinese.chinese: 心脏不得不加倍工作，以克服动脉阻力的增大。
chinese.english: The heart has to pump vigorously to overcome the increased resistance in the arteries.

chinese.chinese: 血管弹性下降，也加重了心脏泵血负担。
chinese.english: The vessels lose their elasticity, and place increased burden on the heart to pump blood through the body.

chinese.chinese: 其过程属于免疫反应，最终导致心脏瓣膜损害。
chinese.english: Rheumatic fever usually occurs in childhood, which can follow a few weeks after a streptococcal infection that sets up an immune reaction ultimately damaging the heart valves.

chinese.chinese: 心脏瓣膜(特别是二尖瓣)出现发炎和瘢痕(伴赘生物生长)，不能正常开放与关闭。
chinese.english: The valves, especially the mitral valve, become inflamed and scarred (with vegetations), so that they do not open and close normally.

chinese.chinese: 心脏瓣膜损害的重要体征是瓣膜杂音出现。
chinese.english: A key sign in cases of valvular defects is the presence of murmurs.

chinese.chinese: 心内膜炎是由细菌引起的心脏内膜的一种渗出性和增生性炎变，也称为细菌性心内膜炎。
chinese.english: Endocarditis is exudative and proliferative inflammatory alterations of the inner lining of the heart caused by bacteria (also called bacterial endocarditis).

chinese.chinese: 心脏瓣膜损害可能产生赘生物病变，赘生物可能脱落成为栓子；栓子可能进入小血管，导致血管阻塞。
chinese.english: Damage to the heart valves can produce lesions called vegetations that may break off into the bloodstream as emboli, which can lodge in the small vessels, causing obstruction of the vessels.

chinese.chinese: 心包炎是围绕在心脏外的一层膜(心包)的炎症。
chinese.english: Pericarditis is an inflammation of the membrane (pericardium) surrounding the heart.

chinese.chinese: 在全髋关节置换手术的头两个星期里，跟年龄和性别匹配的病人相比急性心肌梗死的危险性增高了25倍（风险比25.5；95%CI 17.1—37.9）.全膝关节置换术之后的头两个星期急性心肌梗死的危险性甚至更高（HR 30.9；95% CI11。1—85.5）。第二到第六周，在接受全膝关节置换术的患者中，急性心肌梗死的危险性不在那么重要，但是接受全髋关节置换术的患者，和自控病人相比，仍然存在高出5倍的急性心肌梗死可能。(HR5.05; 95% CI 3.58-7.13).
chinese.english: Within the first two weeks of total hip-replacement surgery, the risk of AMIwas 25 times greater when compared with a group of age- and gender-matchedcontrol patients (hazard ratio 25.5; 95% CI 17.1-37.9). The risk of AMI in thetwo weeks following total knee-replacement surgery was even higher (HR 30.9;95% CI 11.1-85.5). In weeks 2 to 6, the risk of AMI in patients undergoingknee-replacement surgery was no longer statistically significant, but patientsundergoing total hip-replacement surgery still had a fivefold greater risk ofAMI compared with control patients (HR 5.05; 95% CI 3.58-7.13).

chinese.chinese: 研究人员也测试了他们的平衡能力，他们股四头肌的力量，和总得身体活动能力。最后，参与者填写问卷，以确定他们是否有抑郁和/或焦虑的症状，并判断他们如何评价他们生活质量的高度。
chinese.english: The researchers also measured their balance, the strength of their quadriceps, and overall physical performance. Finally, the participants completed questionnaires to determine if they had symptoms of depression and/or anxiety and to gauge how highly they rated their quality of life.

chinese.chinese: 太极拳组所有患者均显示显着改善。到12个周结束，他们比不练太极拳组患者平均能多走60码远和348秒。他们也能更稳定地站立并和表现出更大的股四头肌力度，这两者对于慢性阻塞性肺病患者来讲都有重要意义。
chinese.english: The tai chi group showed significant improvements across the board. By the end of the 12 weeks, they were, on average, able to walk about 60 yards farther and for 348 seconds longer than the group that did not practice tai chi. They were also steadier on their feet and showed greater quad strength, both of which are important for COPD patients.

chinese.chinese: 安硕道琼斯美国医疗保健提供者指数基金(NYSE: IHF)是在该趋势中获益的一个ETF。截至目前，今年IHF已上涨了11%。联合健康(NYSE: UNH)与快捷药方(NASDAQ: ESRX)占IHF的权重超过26%。其他头十名以内的控股方包括Aetna (NYSE: AET)、 Cigna (NYSE: CIG) 和 Humana (NYSE: HUM)。
chinese.english: One ETF that is benefiting from that trend is the iShares Dow Jones U.S. Healthcare Providers Index Fund (NYSE: IHF). IHF is up nearly 11 percent year to date. UnitedHealth (NYSE: UNH) and Express Scripts (NASDAQ: ESRX) combine for over 26 percent of IHF's weight. Other top 10 holdings include Aetna (NYSE: AET), Cigna (NYSE: CIG) and Humana (NYSE: HUM).

chinese.chinese: 助理研究员Maria Garcia-Fernandez,和凋亡与strang癌症生物学实验室的头Hermann Steller,还有他们的同事们,探索了一种叫做Sept4的基因的活性,这种基因编码一种蛋白ARTS, 这种蛋白能够增加程序化细胞死亡,或凋亡,通过与其他预防细胞死亡的蛋白相拮抗.ARTS是由Sarit Larisch首次发现的 ,他是洛克菲勒大学的访问教授,并且发现在白血病和其他一些癌症中缺乏这种蛋白,表明他能够抑制肿瘤.为了研究ARTS的作用,研究人员繁殖了一组缺乏Sept4基因的经过遗传功能处理的小鼠.
chinese.english: Research associate Maria Garcia-Fernandez, Hermann Steller, head of the Strang Laboratory of Apoptosis and Cancer Biology, and their colleagues explored the activity of a gene called Sept4, which encodes a protein, ARTS, that increases programmed cell death, or apoptosis, by antagonizing other proteins that prevent cell death. ARTS was originally discovered by Sarit Larisch, a visiting professor at Rockefeller, and is found to be lacking in human leukemia and other cancers, suggesting it suppresses tumors. To study the role of ARTS, the experimenters bred a line of mice genetically engineered to lack the Sept4 gene.

chinese.chinese: 本附件和公司录像使用的是超生引导下的中部进入法，就是针头刺入胸锁乳突肌的两头之间进入颈内静脉。放好探头位置，那样颈内静脉就位于胸锁乳突肌的两头之间。轻轻地触摸皮肤以确认位于肌肉之间而不是穿过其中一条肌肉。用18号针头，确认皮肤位于探头中间，注意不要损坏无菌的保护套。以45度的角度进入，保持注射器的负压直到穿入静脉。
chinese.english: Position the transducer so that the internal jugular vein is centered in the resulting ultrasound image and between the two heads of the sternocleidomastoid muscle. Gently palpate the skin to confirm that the puncture will be between the muscle heads and not through one of the heads. With an 18-gauge needle, puncture the skin at the center of the transducer, being careful not to damage the sterile sheath. Advance the needle at a 45-degree angle; maintain negative pressure in the syringe until the vein is punctured.

chinese.chinese: 本研究包括38名业余足球爱好者，平均年龄刚超过30岁，都自从幼年起就定期参加运动。他们被要求对去年一整年所进行的头球数进行估计。在足球中，你不能用手和前臂触碰球，因此选手们经常用他们的头来接触高球传递给另一个选手。
chinese.english: The study included 38 amateur soccer players with an average age of just over 30, who all played the sport regularly since childhood. They were asked to estimate the number of times they headed the ball during the last year. In soccer you cannot use your hands or lower arms on the ball, so players frequently make contact with high balls using their heads to redirect it to another player.

chinese.chinese: “当涉及到治愈心脏，婚姻可能成为有效的药物，但是，他现在越来越‘供不应求’，对于越发老龄化的生育潮可不是好兆头。”Idler说。
chinese.english: When it comes to healing hearts, marriage may be powerful medicine, but it's in increasingly short supply, Idler says, which does not bode well for aging baby boomers.

chinese.chinese: 这些长效药物的处方在头三个月里减少了50%，数据库显示从大约的1.2%降至0.6%。
chinese.english: Prescriptions for these drugs declined by about 50 percent during the first trimester, from roughly 1.2 percent of pregnancies in the database down to 0.6 percent.

chinese.chinese: 股四头肌无力是晚期慢性阻塞性肺疾病（COPD）的一个重要并发症，但很少有关于该疾病早期的肌肉体积数据。研究人员认为股四头肌体积在轻度COPD和晚期COPD均会降低，可能与体力活动水平有关系。
chinese.english: Quadriceps weakness is an important complication of advanced chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) but few data exist concerning muscle bulk in early disease. We hypothesised that quadriceps bulk, measured by ultrasound rectus femoris cross-sectional area (USRF[sub]CSA[/sub]), would be reduced in mild, as well as advanced, COPD compared with controls, and would correlate with physical activity.

chinese.chinese: 端粒(Telomeres)是位于染色体末端的相对较短的一种特殊结构。诺贝尔奖获得者之一美国加利福尼亚旧金山大学的Elizabeth Blackburn博士把端粒比做鞋带头上的防止带子散脱的塑料头。
chinese.english: Telomeres are relatively short sections of specialized DNA that sit at the ends of all chromosomes. One of the Nobel Prize winners, Elizabeth Blackburn, Ph.D., of the University of California at San Francisco, has compared telomeres to the plastic tips at the ends of shoelaces that prevent the laces from unraveling.

chinese.chinese: 在美国路易斯安那州新奥尔良的美国过敏哮喘和免疫学协会的年会上，Rullo称，初生头12个月出现呼吸道感染与5岁时出现持续喘鸣具有相关性，而早期接触过敏原、内毒素及头6个月完全母乳喂养对于哮喘并无影响。
chinese.english: Speaking at the Annual Meeting of the American Academy of Allergy, Asthma, and Immunology in New Orleans, Louisiana, USA, Rullo concluded: “Respiratory infection in the first 12 months of life was associated with persistent wheezing at age 5, whereas exposure to allergen and endotoxin in early life and exclusive breastfeeding for 6 months showed no effect on development of asthma.”

chinese.chinese: 该药物的黑框警告表面，一些儿童、青少年和青年在治疗的头几个月可能增加自杀想法或行为。该警告还指出，抑郁和其他严重的精神疾病是自杀的思想和行动的最重要原因。
chinese.english: The drug has a boxed warning indicating that antidepressant medicines may increase suicidal thoughts or actions in some children, teenagers, and young adults within the first few months of treatment. The warning also notes that depression and other serious mental illnesses are the most important causes of suicidal thoughts and actions.

chinese.chinese: 研究人员将错过机会定义为，流感季节医疗保健就诊的头4个月内青少年未接受流感疫苗接种。
chinese.english: The researchers defined missed opportunities as healthcare visits in the first 4 months of influenza season during which an unvaccinated teen did not receive the influenza vaccine.

chinese.chinese: 最有可能寻求破产保护的是那些少于六个月手头现金的公司，仅仅只有一些处于研制的药物和没有确切临床数据来吸引投资伙伴的公司，Symphony资产主要负责人安德鲁布瑟告诉彭博。根据生物贸易集团汇编资料，370个公共美国生物技术中的21.5%已不到6个月的现金
chinese.english: The most likely to seek bankruptcy are those with less than six months of cash on hand, just a few drugs in development and no definitive clinical data to attract a funding partner, Andrew Busser, principal at Symphony Capital, tells Bloomberg. Twenty-five percent of the 370 public US biotechs have less than six months of cash, according to data compiled by the BIO trade group.

chinese.chinese: 如果积液量大，则对肺静脉产生压力，阻碍血液从肺部回到心脏。
chinese.english: If a considerable amount of fluid is present, pressure on the pulmonary veins may slow the return of blood from the lungs.

chinese.chinese: 心包积液对心脏的挤压可能导致心包填塞。
chinese.english: Compression of the heart by pericardial fluid can cause cardiac tamponade.

chinese.chinese: 左心衰的体征最明显表现在心脏、肺或呼吸系统功能的控制机制上。
chinese.english: Noteworthy physical signs are most evident in the heart, lungs, or respiratory control mechanisms.

chinese.chinese: 查体时，除了发现呼吸频率加快和基础心脏疾病表现出的体征外，在疾病早期很少有这方面的体征。
chinese.english: Apart from tachypnea and possibly evidence of underlying heart disease on physical examination, few physical signs may be present initially.

chinese.chinese: 如果没有心脏内血液分流所导致的内源性肺部疾病存在，则动脉血的氧分压在一般情况下还是比较正常的。
chinese.english: This is typically accompanied by relatively normal arterial PO2 values unless intrinsic lung disease of intracardiac shunting is present.

chinese.chinese: 其机制是：(1)衰竭的心室不能将泵回心脏的静脉血有效泵出，这势必大大增高心脏充盈压；于是，导致(2)体循环中的大静脉血容量增大；以及(3)因交感神经活动增加而导致静脉舒缩张力增加。
chinese.english: Responsible mechanisms include (1) the inability of the failing ventricle to eject the venous return without abnormally high filling pressures, causing (2) an increase in the volume of blood in the large systemic veins, and (3) increased venomotor tone resulting from increased sympathetic nervous system activity.

chinese.chinese: 发育疾病中最典型的是闭锁(正常开孔缺如或闭合)、无脑畸胎(脑缺如)、脊柱裂(脊柱呈部分闭合)、唇裂、腭裂、先天性心脏病。
chinese.english: Examples of developmental disorders are atresia (absence or closure of a normal body opening), anencephalus (absence of a brain), spina bifida (incomplete closure of the spine), cleft lip, cleft palate, and congenital heart disease.

chinese.chinese: 也可波及多个基因，并有环境因素参与——家族遗传倾向，如糖尿病、心脏病、高血压、某些癌肿。
chinese.english: They may also be conditions that involve multiple genes interacting with environmental factors—the diseases that “run in families”, such as diabetes mellitus, heart disease, hypertension, and certain forms of cancer.

chinese.chinese: 有两类疾病导致每年成百上千人死亡，即癌和心脏病，现在发现，这两类疾病有某些遗传因素。
chinese.english: Two diseases that account for the deaths of hundreds of thousands a year, cancer and heart disease, are thought to have some genetic component.

chinese.chinese: 最近一项研究表明，某些心脏病可通过常染色体显性遗传发生。
chinese.english: A recent study has shown that some forms of heart disease may be inherited as an autosomal dominant trait.

chinese.chinese: 了解这样的基因基础可以提醒有这样家族史的人，警惕心脏病可能性；同时，提醒他们注意改变饮食和生活习惯。
chinese.english: An understanding of the genetic basis would alert persons from families with an incidence of the disease to the possibility of incurring heart conditions and perhaps cause them to alter their diets and life habits accordingly.

chinese.chinese: 例如，对于那些可能通过遗传患上心脏病的人，劝其戒烟，避免吃高脂饮食。
chinese.english: For example, those who may inherit genes for heart trouble would stop smoking and avoid high-fat diets.

chinese.chinese: 如果我们在苯丙酮尿症纯合子这个问题上作出这样的决定，那我们是否应将这种理念应用到有心脏病或精神分裂症家族史的家庭成员身上？
chinese.english: If we decide on this course for homozygotes of PKU, should we not extend the same philosophy to those whose families have a history of heart or schizophrenia?

chinese.chinese: 有些婴儿仅仅只有这种LE的表现，或只有心脏的损害，不存在女性优势。
chinese.english: Some infants have only this manifestation of LE, and for heart lesions alone, there is no female predominance.

chinese.chinese: 心肌炎是由心脏扩大及奔马律来表现的，但心电图的改变一般是非特异性的。
chinese.english: Myocarditis is indicated by cardiomegaly and gallop rhythm, but the electrocardiographic changes are usually not specific.

chinese.chinese: 因为异常激烈的竞争，印度市场特别易于滋生**。直到2005年，印度仍旧对药品专利保护不以为意，拒绝禁止国内企业盲目仿制大的医药公司的热点药物。药品品牌则不断增多。今天，有224种经注册品牌的降脂药阿伐他汀可供印度医生选择，这种药被称为立普妥由辉瑞公司在美国和其它地方销售。
chinese.english: The Indian market is particularly vulnerable tocorruption because of the intense competition here. Until 2005, India flouteddrug patents, refusing to rein in domestic copycats of Big Pharma'sblockbusters. Brands proliferated. Today, an Indian doctor can choose fromamong 224 registered brands of the cholesterol-lowering drug atorvastatin, soldby Pfizer Inc as Lipitor in the U.S.and elsewhere.

chinese.chinese: Biogen Idec(NASDAQ: BIIB)及瑞典Swedish Orphan Biovitrum (Sobi) (STO: SOBI)今天宣布了B-LONG临床研究所取得的积极结果，该临床研究旨在对应用于B型血友病患者的一种新型长效凝血因子候选药物进行评价。B型血友病是一种罕见的遗传性疾病，该病可削弱患者的血液凝固能力。
chinese.english: Biogen Idec (NASDAQ: BIIB) and Swedish Orphan Biovitrum (Sobi) (STO: SOBI) today announced positive results from B-LONG, a clinical study that evaluated a new long-lasting clotting factor candidate in people with hemophilia B. Hemophilia B is a rare inherited disorder that impairs blood coagulation.

chinese.chinese: NAMPA提醒消费者：金属包装的可高温消毒食品在最初打包包装时的关键在于维持其无菌状态以及食品的安全。据FDA的记录，在30多年间内尚未因为失败的金属包装而引起食源性疾病。今天的金属包装技术为家庭提供了安全和营养食物的有利来源。
chinese.english: NAMPA reminds consumers that metal packaging enables high temperature sterilization of food products when initially packaged, which is critical in maintaining the sterility and safety of food products. According to FDA records, there has not been an incidence of food-borne illness from a failure in metal packaging in more than 30 years. Today's metal packaging technology provides families with an economic source of safe and nutritious foods.

chinese.chinese: 2012.9.27--美国食品和药物管理局今天批准将Stivarga（regorafenib）治疗经常规治疗后进展和播散至机体其他部位(转移)的结直肠癌患者。
chinese.english: September 27, 2012 -- The U.S. Food and Drug Administration today approved Stivarga(regorafenib) to treat patients with colorectal cancer that has progressed after treatment and spread to other parts of the body (metastatic).

chinese.chinese: 2012.9.27--美国食品和药物管理局今天批准将Stivarga（regorafenib）用于患有晚期结直肠癌的患者，晚期肠癌时癌细胞已经转移至身体其它部位。
chinese.english: September 27, 2012 -- The U.S. Food and Drug Administration today approved Stivarga(regorafenib) to treat patients with colorectal cancer that has progressed after treatment and spread to other parts of the body (metastatic).

chinese.english: The company's shares lost nearly a quarter of its value that day and closed at 68 cents. Since then, the stock has risen 8-fold before today's drop.

chinese.chinese: 经管如此，外科依然是一个很局限的学科。疼痛和亟待解决的感染问题限制着外科医生所能到达的领域。例如，开腹手术就备受谴责——其被证明几乎是致命性的。胸部和关节的手术也是无法进行。故外科的主要职责就是治疗一些外部疾病，内科就是处理一些内部问题（因此“内科”这种术语沿用到了今天）。甚至对于那些在外部就可以直接进入的情况，外科文献上提到也多是失败而不是鼓励大胆尝试。例如，1812年1月的一期杂志上发表的一篇关于脊柱裂的文章，这位外科医生记录一致致死的条件并且详述了处理过程中的错误，如反复地切开、引流，用绷带绑住婴儿的脊膜，这些被证明是完全无用的。他还记录到“皮肤增厚、无弹性，质如皮革且溃疡。”“囊腔里脓液形成，最终婴儿死去。”这类文章通常都持有一种轻蔑的乐观态度。（这位外科医生说道“毫无疑问，如果以应有的谨慎来对待，如果设计出一项用来引流脊膜突出的新技术，那么脊柱裂这种疾病将不再是不可医治的。”）虽然如此，在相当长的一段时间内，外科的突破性成就确实少之又少。
chinese.english: Surgery, nonetheless, remained a limited profession. Pain and the always looming problem of infection restricted the extent of a surgeon's reach. Entering the abdomen, for instance, was regarded with reproach — attempts had proved almost uniformly fatal. The chest and joints were also out of reach. The primary remit of surgery was therefore the management of external conditions, and medicine dealt with the internal ones (hence the term “internal medicine,” which persists to this day). Even for those conditions that appeared to be externally accessible, surgical accounts often spoke of failure more than derring-do. For example, in an article on spina bifida that appeared in the January 1812 issue of the Journal, a surgeon noted the uniform fatality of the condition and recounted an effort to repeatedly lance, drain, and bandage an infant's meningocele, which proved to be utterly futile. The skin “had become thickened, and as inelastic . . . as the upper leather of a shoe; it also ul

chinese.chinese: Ferring制药公司今天宣布：美国食品和药品管理局（FDA）已经接受关于米索前列醇阴道植入型（MVI）缓控剂新药申请（NDA）的复审。Ferring所谋求的是，在需要的时候，MVI能够被准予与催产素一起用于序贯方案，以减少那些宫颈未成熟（宫颈尚未足够柔软和薄得使扩张能够发生）女性的阴道分娩时间。
chinese.english: Ferring Pharmaceuticals Inc. today announced that the U.S. Food and DrugAdministration (FDA) has accepted for review a New Drug Application (NDA) for itscontrolled release misoprostol vaginal insert (MVI). Ferring is seekingapproval for the MVI for decreasing time to vaginal delivery in women with an unfavorable cervix (a cervix that has not yet softened and thinned sothat dilation can take place) when used in sequential regimen with oxytocin augmentation, if needed.

chinese.chinese: Hemispherx生物制药公司于今天（2012年10月22日）宣布，FDA将于本月20号在AAC会议上讨论新药Ampligen(R)用于慢性疲劳综合征的申请。正如先前所说的，PDUFA将于2013年2月2日结束对新药的复审。
chinese.english: Hemispherx Biopharma, Inc. (NYSE MKT:HEB) (the Company or Hemispherx) today announced that the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has scheduled for December 20, 2012 a meeting of the Arthritis Advisory Committee (AAC) to discuss the Ampligen(R) New Drug Application for Chronic Fatigue Syndrome (CFS) which is currently under review by the FDA. As previously announced, the Prescription Drug User Fee Act (PDUFA) review goal for the FDA to complete its review is February 2, 2013.

chinese.chinese: 梯瓦制药公司今天宣布，在11月8-13日于加州Anaheim举行的美国过敏，哮喘与免疫学会（ACAAI）2012年会上，将公布QNASL（丙酸倍氯米松）鼻气雾剂III期临床的补充数据。QNASL是最近获批准的“干性”鼻气雾剂皮质类固醇激素，用于缓解成人和12岁及以上的青少年的季节性和常年过敏性鼻炎症状。
chinese.english: Teva Pharmaceutical Industries Ltd. announced today that additional data from the Phase III clinical program for QNASL- (beclomethasone dipropionate) Nasal Aerosol will be presented at the 2012 Annual Meeting of the American College of Allergy, Asthma and Immunology (ACAAI) in Anaheim, CA on November 8-13, 2012. QNASL- is a recently approved "dry" nasal aerosol corticosteroid that treats seasonal and year-round nasal allergy symptoms in adults and adolescents 12 years of age and older.

chinese.chinese: 11月29日，我将会参加AirStrip Technologies CEO会议，与HCA的临床主任Divya Shroff博士，在随后附带的MobiHealthNews在线会议上讨论医疗点的数字化治疗这个问题。HCA，是世界上最大的私人经营的医疗保健设施企业之一。很高兴，我能听到来自Portela 和 Shroff的声音，他们将会分享HCA的观点（当支持医生工作流程、加强患者体验的数字医疗技术发展后的当今什么才是尽可能实际的）。别忘了在线会议，确保今天注册。
chinese.english: On November 29th at 2PM ET I'll be joining AirStrip Technologies CEO Alan Portela and HCA's Clinical Transformation Officer Dr. Divya Shroff to discuss this very topic in a complimentary MobiHealthNews webinar, Mobile Health At The Point of Care. HCA, of course, is one of the largest private operators of healthcare facilities in the world. I am excited to hear from both Portela and Shroff, who will share HCA's perspective on what is practical today as well as possible in the future when it comes to digital health technologies that support physician workflow and enhance the patient experience. Don't miss this webinar — be sure to register today.

chinese.chinese: 复方制剂在减少心血管事件发生中的应用（以下简称UMPIRE）研究的结果今天在2012年美国心脏协会科学会议中被提出。尽管这种疗法现在被称作固定剂量复方制剂疗法，它最受欢迎的名称还是多效药丸，或者多药疗法。
chinese.english: The results of the study, known as the Use of a Multidrug Pill in Reducing Cardiovascular Events (UMPIRE), were presented today at the American Heart Association 2012 Scientific Sessions. Although the treatment is now called fixed-dose combination therapy, its more popular name is the polypill, or polypharmacy.

chinese.chinese: POZEN股份有限公司（纳斯达克代号：POZN）今天宣布了一项I期临床研究“PA8140-102”的结果，研究表明PA8140，POZEN公司阿司匹林(81 mg)和奥美拉唑(40 mg)的专有药物组合，具有与参考列出产品肠溶（EC）阿司匹林相当的生物利用度，这家公司致力于改变人们生活的转化医学。此外，根据美国食品和药物管理局（FDA）认可的预定标准，研究表明PA8140与利用高度变化药物标准的肠溶阿司匹林是生物等效的。目前POZEN已经完成了所有的临床试验，准备将其纳入PA32540/PA8140新药申请(NDA)包。
chinese.english: POZEN Inc. (NASDAQ: POZN), apharmaceutical company committed to transforming medicine that transformslives, announced today that the results from a Phase 1 study, PA8140-102, demonstratedthat PA8140, POZEN's proprietary combination of aspirin (81 mg) and omeprazole(40 mg), had comparable bioavailability relative to the reference listedproduct, enteric-coated (EC) aspirin (81 mg). In addition, based onpredetermined criteria acceptable to the U.S. Food and Drug Administration(FDA), the study demonstrated that PA8140 is bioequivalent to EC aspirin (81mg) using criteria for highly variable drugs. POZEN has now completed all ofthe clinical trials it intends to include in the PA32540/PA8140 New DrugApplication (NDA) package.

chinese.chinese: 心包炎(是最常见的心脏表现)和心内膜炎也相当频繁。
chinese.english: Pericarditis (the most frequent cardiac manifestation) and endocarditis also occur fairly frequently.

chinese.chinese: 尸检中常受累的器官频率依次为脾、肺、肝、骨、肾、舌或会厌、心脏、胰和甲状腺。
chinese.english: Other organs frequently involved with mycosis fungoides at autopsy were, in order of descending frequency: spleen, lungs, liver, bone, kidney, tongue or epiglottis, heart, pancreas, and thyroid.

chinese.chinese: 还必须考虑并存的疾病(如高血压、心脏病)。
chinese.english: Coexisting diseases (e g, hypertension, cardiac disease) must be considered.

chinese.chinese: 洋地黄、其它心脏药物、抗生素，等等可能需要在手术前即刻和手术中达成胃肠外途径给药并改变药物剂量。
chinese.english: Digitalis, other cardiac drugs, antibiotics, etc, may require a shift to the parenteral route of administration and altered dosage in the immediate preoperative period and during operation.

chinese.chinese: 手术前患有心脏病者，手术后心肌梗塞的发生率为6％，与之相比，无心脏病病史者，则为0.7％。
chinese.english: Patients with preexisting cardiac disease have a 6% incidence of postoperative myocardial infarction compared with a 0.7% incidence in patients without such a history.

chinese.chinese: 有冠状动脉搭桥史者，在无其他特殊心脏疾病的情况下，其危险性似乎并不增加。
chinese.english: A history of coronary artery bypass graft in the absence of other specific cardiac problems does not appear to increase the risk.

chinese.chinese: 有心脏病者，应对主动脉狭窄程度进行估计.
chinese.english: Patients with heart disease should be assessed for aortic stenosis.

chinese.chinese: 若病人无心脏病、体内留有风湿性心脏病或整形材料，这种短暂而轻微的菌血症并无明显的临床意义。
chinese.english: Transient minor bacteremias are usually clinically insignificant except in patients with cardiac or orthopedic prostheses or rheumatic heart disease.

chinese.chinese: 肾移植成功后心脏和肝脏移植也获得了成功； 胰腺移植目前也正由实验阶段转入治疗阶段。
chinese.english: The success of renal transplantation was followed by heart and liver transplantation, and pancreatic transplantation is currently making the transition from experimental to therapeutic status.

chinese.chinese: 临床同种心脏移植的免疫学障碍可能与肾移植相同。
chinese.english: The immunologic barriers to clinical heart allotransplantation are probably the same as those for the kidney.

chinese.chinese: 在切除心脏准备移植期间支持受体循环系统的心肺通路是必不可少的，但遗憾的是这种心肺通路不可能维持很长时间。
chinese.english: Cardiopulmonary bypass to support the recipient's circulatory system during removal of the heart in preparation for transplantation is essential, but this unfortunately cannot be maintained for an extended period.

chinese.chinese: 1905年Carrel首次将心脏异位移植予受体狗的颈部。
chinese.english: The heart was first transplanted heterotopically to the necks of recipient dogs by Carrel in 1905.

chinese.chinese: l905～l967年之间许多实验观察证实：即刻去神经的心脏足以支持循环，l967年第一例人类心脏原位移植获得成功。
chinese.english: Between 1905 and 1967, when the first human heart was successfully transplanted orthotopically, a number of experimental observations had shown that the acutely denervated heart could adequately support the circulation.

chinese.chinese: 取得心脏移植临床经验最多的是斯坦福大学，自1968年以来，那里已进行了350多次心脏移植。
chinese.english: The largest clinical experience in heart transplantation is at Stanford University, where more than 350 heart transplants have been performed since 1968.

chinese.chinese: 这些病人的免疫抑制治疗包括有环孢素，其他的则与心脏受体所用的相同。
chinese.english: Immunosuppression for these patients has included cyclosporine but has otherwise been similar to that used for recipients of heart transplants.

chinese.chinese: 西雅图,华盛顿州-来自西雅图最新的关于心肺复苏（CPR）研究表明：胸外按压能够挽救心跳骤停患者的生命，即使是对除颤器复律无效的心律失常。
chinese.english: Seattle, WA - The latest major cardiopulmonary-resuscitation (CPR) study from Seattle shows that chest compressions can save the lives of people in cardiac arrest even if their arrhythmia does not respond to defibrillator shocks [1].

chinese.chinese: Peter Kudenchuk博士指出：“不可电复律的心跳骤停包括心脏停搏和所谓的无脉性电活动，占突发心跳骤停事件的75%左右，对于这类患者行CPR是否能够提高其生存率的严格评估的研究还是第一次。研究结果在线发表在2012年4月2日的《循环》杂志上。
chinese.english: Nonshockable cardiac arrest, including asystole and so-called pulseless electrical activity, represent about 75% of sudden cardiac-arrest cases, but this is the first study to rigorously evaluate whether CPR could improve survival in this group, he said. Results of the study are published online April 2, 2012 in Circulation.

chinese.chinese: 心肌梗塞过程中，流向心肌的富氧血液为形成的凝块所中断，导致了下游心肌死亡并最终为瘢痕组织所代替。它可以造成心脏充血与排空方面的机械性问题，也对调剂心跳节奏的电流信号产生干扰。
chinese.english: During a myocardial infarction the flow of oxygen-rich blood to the heart muscle is interrupted by formation of a clot, causing death of the down-stream heart muscle and its eventual replacement by scar tissue. This can cause mechanical problems with filling and emptying the heart, and it can also interfere with the electrical signals that pace the heartbeat.

chinese.chinese: Zipes博士说：“ECD电击电流能穿透胸壁‘捕获’心跳，从而抢占心脏固有的心跳控制能力。在追逃中，逃跑者的心率可达到150次/分，然而ECD电击可能实际上大大提高了心率，甚至导致室性心动过速，而室性心动过速又可进一步进展为室颤，导致正常血液循环停止。”
chinese.english: Dr. Zipes said: "An ECD shock delivered through the chest wall can 'capture' the heartbeat, taking over the heart's natural ability to regulate itself. A fighting, fleeing individual might have a normal heart rate of 150, but the ECD shock may increase that rate substantially, leading to ventricular tachycardia, which can progress into ventricular fibrillation that stops normal blood flow."

chinese.chinese: Zipes博士说：“ECD电击电流能穿透胸壁‘捕获’心跳，从而抢占心脏的自然跳动能力来达到调控的效果。一次电击，避开个别正常的150次/分心率，但ECD电击可能实际上大大提高了心率，甚至导致室上性心动过速，而室上性心动过速又可进一步进展为室颤，并导致正常的泵血及血液循环停止。”
chinese.english: Dr. Zipes said: "An ECD shock delivered through the chest wall can 'capture' the heartbeat, taking over the heart's natural ability to regulate itself. A fighting, fleeing individual might have a normal heart rate of 150, but the ECD shock may increase that rate substantially, leading to ventricular tachycardia, which can progress into ventricular fibrillation that stops normal blood flow."

chinese.chinese: 房颤的危险因素包括高血压、心力衰竭、糖尿病、高龄和基础心脏疾病等。一些房颤患者可没有症状，只是在体检时才偶然发现房颤。房颤患者的常见症状包括心悸、心跳过快、心律不齐、气短、胸痛或胸闷。
chinese.english: There are a number of risk factors forA-fib, including high blood pressure, heart failure, diabetes, advanced age andheart disease. Some people with A-fib have no symptoms and are unaware of theircondition until it's discovered during a physical examination. Those who dohave A-fib symptoms may experience palpitations or sensations of a racing,irregular heartbeat, shortness of breath, chest pain or lightheadedness.

chinese.chinese: 专家无法完全搞清乐观心态是怎样保护我们的心脏，但Davidson和同事们指出乐观心态对与发怒和增加心脏病发作风险有关的心跳，血压，皮质素指标有好的影响。乐观的人睡眠也好，也比那些不大快乐的人较易戒烟，研究员认为。
chinese.english: increase heart attack risk. Cheerful people may also sleep better, or may be more successful at quitting smoking than their less joyous counterparts, the researchers note.

chinese.chinese: 房颤是心跳不规则的最常见的形式，也是中老年人中风的主要原因。调节心跳的电信号，从而变得不稳定。上面的心房颤抖取代了规则的心跳。并非所有的血液能被泵出，因此可形成血块。血块可以迁移到大脑，导致中风。
chinese.english: Atrial fibrillation is the most common form of irregular heartbeat, and a major cause of stroke in the elderly. Electrical signals, which regulate the heartbeat, become erratic. Instead of beating regularly, the upper chambers of the heart quiver. Not all the blood gets pumped out, so clots can form. The clots can migrate to the brain and cause strokes.

chinese.chinese: 心律失常是潜在的威胁生命的一种心率或心律异常，它导致心跳过快、过慢或不规则。在世界范围内，数以百万计的人患有心律失常。
chinese.english: Arrhythmia is a potentially life-threatening problem with the rate or rhythm of the heartbeat, causing it to go too fast, too slow or to beat irregularly. Arrhythmia affects millions of people worldwide.

chinese.chinese: 电机械波成像技术是由Konofagou及其团队今年年初基于超声开发的一项创新技术，当时是用于描记对电刺激即时反应的波形瞬变即电机械波，他们能够通过重建多个心动周期波形来描记这些波形但是这种方法对描记非周期性的心律失常比如纤维性颤动并不适应，在新研究中，研究者开发应用了基于快闪宽光束发射的新成像序列以非常高的快帧速（2000fps）来描记自由呼吸状态下的一次心跳周期的整个心脏波形。
chinese.english: EWI is a novel ultrasound-based technique thatKonofagou and her team developed earlier this year to map electromechanicalwaves, the transient deformations occurring in immediate response to theelectrical application. They were able to map these waves by reconstructingimages over multiple cardiac cycles but this method did not allow them to imagenon-periodic arrhythmia such as fibrillation. In the new study, theresearchers developed and applied new imaging sequences based onflash- and wide-beam emissions to image the entire heart atvery high-frame rates (2000 fps) during free breathing in asingle heartbeat.

chinese.chinese: 如果使用苯佐卡因产品，需关注使用后是否出现高铁血红蛋白症的如下症状：皮肤、嘴唇和甲床呈蓝色、灰色或苍白色，呼吸短促，疲劳，意识模糊，头痛，头昏以及心跳加快等。如果您或您的孩子在使用苯佐卡因后出现上述任何症状，请立即寻求医疗救助。
chinese.english: If benzocaine products are used, watch for signs and symptoms of methemoglobinemia, including pale, gray or blue colored skin, lips, and nail beds; shortness of breath; fatigue; confusion; headache; lightheadedness; and rapid heart rate. If you or your child has any of these symptoms after taking benzocaine, seek medical attention immediately.

chinese.chinese: 您需要了解高铁血红蛋白症的症状和体征包括：皮肤、指甲和嘴唇呈蓝色、灰色或苍白色，头痛，头昏，呼吸短促，疲劳以及心跳加快。
chinese.english: Know how to recognize the signs and symptoms of methemoglobinemia: pale, gray or blue colored skin, lips, and nail beds; headache; lightheadedness; shortness of breath; nausea; fatigue; and rapid heart rate.

chinese.chinese: 最有可能寻求破产保护的是那些少于六个月手头现金的公司，仅仅只有一些处于研制的药物和没有确切临床数据来吸引投资伙伴的公司，Symphony资产主要负责人安德鲁布瑟告诉彭博。根据生物贸易集团汇编资料，370个公共美国生物技术中的21.5%已不到6个月的现金
chinese.english: The most likely to seek bankruptcy are those with less than six months of cash on hand, just a few drugs in development and no definitive clinical data to attract a funding partner, Andrew Busser, principal at Symphony Capital, tells Bloomberg. Twenty-five percent of the 370 public US biotechs have less than six months of cash, according to data compiled by the BIO trade group.

chinese.english: One of them nodded. “I can't hear my students,” she said. “They all mumble.”

chinese.chinese: 之后杨向中博士与其他研究人员一起，于1999年在史托斯康州大学通过成熟细胞克隆出一头奶牛。科罗拉多州立大学生物化学系教授小乔治.E赛戴尔（George E. Seidel Jr.）称，这头叫艾米的克隆牛，是“我们在克隆大型动物方面的进一步完善及重要的改进”。
chinese.english: With other researchers, Dr. Yang then used adult cells to clone a cow at the Storrs campus of UConn in 1999. That clone, named Amy, was a “further and important refinement of the techniques we use in the basic cloning of large animals,” said George E. Seidel Jr., a professor of biochemical sciences at Colorado State University.

chinese.chinese: 结果：采集连续36名采用外科手术治疗顽固性矢状面畸形患者的完整数据。25名患者(71%)至少有1块肌肉MEP振幅降低大于80%。在这25名患者中有15名患者TcMEPs得到改善，其中1例为下肢复位、4例通过外科手术减压、10例通过容量和药物复苏后得到改善，在这15名患者均未出现明显的神经损伤。10名患者(29%)尽管采用在截骨处进一步减压及损伤，但TcMEP信号降低并未改善。10名患者在治疗末均存在至少有1块肌肉TcMEP降低大于67%，所有患者均存在术后神经功能障碍。术后显示神经损伤的TcMEP改变的患者大部分出现截骨处闭合或永久性硬脑膜回缩。9名患者出现髂腰肌或股四头肌肌力减退。1名患者出现单足背屈肌力降低。在多个肌群监测TcMEPs对预测损伤具有较高的灵敏性和特异性。9名患者出院时运动功能完全恢复，仅有1例患者(4/5级)在6周随访时运动功能检查正常。
chinese.english: Results. Thirty-five consecutive patients underwent surgery for fixed sagittal plane deformity with complete neuromonitoring data. Twenty-five patients (71%) had an episode of greater than 80% reduction in MEP amplitude to at least 1 muscle. Fifteen of 25 had improvement of TcMEPs after repositioning of the legs (1), additional surgical decompression (4), or volume and pharmacologic resuscitation (10). All 15 of these awoke with no detectable neurologic injury. Ten patients (29%) had reduced TcMEP signals that did not improve despite further decompression and manipulation of the osteotomy site. All 10 had a greater than 67% drop in TcMEPs for at least 1 muscle persisting at the end of the case, and all had a postoperative neurologic deficit. The TcMEP changes in patients who demonstrated nerve injury postoperatively were observed most often during osteotomy closure or sustained dural retraction. 9 patients had weakness involving the iliopsoas or quadriceps; 1 patient had isolated unila

chinese.chinese: 电冲动控制心跳的频率，还控制心肌的收缩，使血液能全身流动。心肌梗死之后，梗死后形成的瘢痕组织，会在心脏内形成不规则形状的切片，它将阻断正常电活动或者引起短路。研究人员说，心肌梗死后的患者数量日益增长，然而他们将继续面对脆弱而不稳定的心跳。这种情况促使我们研究更为有效的方法来控制电活动紊乱。
chinese.english: Electrical signals control how frequently the heart beats and how the heart muscle contracts to move blood through the body. Following a heart attack, irregularly shaped sections of dead scar tissue may form in the heart and block the electrical flow or cause a short circuit. The researchers say a growing number of people who have survived severe heart attacks go on to face a weak, erratic heartbeat, and that has prompted the search for more effective ways to treat these electrical disturbances.

chinese.chinese: 结果：在DCCT期间，强化治疗组的RHR均值比常规治疗组要低，青少年组（每分钟心跳次数分别为69.0和72.0，95% CI 62.8-75.7 和65.7-78.9， p=0.013）和成人组（66.8：68.2; 95% CI 65.3-68.4 和66.6-69.8, p=0.0014）均如此。在EDIC随访期间，两个治疗组间的RHR差别至少持续10年(p<0.0001)。
chinese.english: Results: During the DCCT, intensive treatment was associated with lower mean RHR than conventional treatment, both in adolescents (69.0 vs. 72.0 beats per minute; 95% CI 62.8-75.7 and 65.7-78.9, respectively, p=0.013) and adults (66.8 vs. 68.2; 95% CI 65.3-68.4 and 66.6-69.8, respectively, p=0.0014). During follow-up in EDIC, the difference in RHR between the treatment groups persisted for at least 10 years (p<0.0001).

chinese.chinese: 结果：共18项比较性研究中的114081名病人符合纳入标准，其中1858名接受无心跳尸体供体肾移植，112223名接受有心跳尸体供体肾移植。
chinese.english: RESULTS.: Eighteen comparative studies of 114,081 patients matched the selection criteria; 1,858 received kidney from NHB and 112,223 from HB donor.

chinese.chinese: 结果：研究组中肾脏超滤过出现率为24%但没有增加发生微蛋白尿的风险。比较了有无超滤过人群后的未校正HR在随访头5年为0.8(95% CI 0.4–1.7)、头10年为1.0(0.6–1.7)在头15年内为0.8(0.5–1.4)。这一模型对影响基线能导致相似结果的危险因素进行校正，包括A1C 、诊断糖尿病年龄、病程、是否吸烟。另外，在随访中超滤状态的改变也应对微白蛋白尿的HR影响最小化。
chinese.english: RESULTS— Renal hyperfiltration was present in 24% of the study group and did not increase the risk of developing microalbuminuria. The unadjusted HR for microalbuminuria comparing those with and without hyperfiltration at baseline was 0.8 (95% CI 0.4–1.7) during the first 5 years, 1.0 (0.6–1.7) during the first 10 years, and 0.8 (0.5–1.4) during 15 years of follow-up. The model adjusted for baseline known risk factors including A1C, age at diagnosis of diabetes, diabetes duration, and cigarette smoking resulted in similar HRs. In addition, incorporating changes in hyperfiltration status during follow-up had minimal impact on the HRs for microalbuminuria.

chinese.chinese: Oleynikov和他的同事们研发出一种fixed-base相机，可以通过小切口进入腹腔，还研发出一种移动式、可植入的机器人，可在内脏上滚动并进行活检。显而易见，这种技术将克服当前微型机器人的缺点，将来这种机器人可能经脐、阴道、膀胱切口植入。一旦植入，外科医生可能变成一只控制中心，根据需要启动每个机器人，指挥他们完成手头的工作。
chinese.english: Oleynikov and colleagues have developed a fixed-base camera that can be deployed through a small incision into the abdomen as well as a mobile, insertable robot capable of "rolling" onto an organ and taking a biopsy. It seems clear that technology will conquer the current shortcomings of the microrobot and that in the future a squadron of these robots may be deployed via a single 15 mm umbilical, transvaginal, or transvesical incision. Once inserted, the surgeon may well retire to a console where he/she can activate each robot as need be and direct it to complete the task at hand.

chinese.chinese: 医学会，一个为政府部门研究科学事务的独立组织，也建议在上市头两年的新药上贴有“新药”的标志，以提醒消费者关于此药的危险和益处还了解甚少。
chinese.english: The IOM, an independent group that studies scientific matters for the government, also suggested that drugs carry a "new drug" symbol during the first two years on the market to alert consumers that less is known about the risks and benefits.

chinese.chinese: 头3个月期间，一秒钟有效呼气容量(FEV1)，皮下注射组有微小改变，但后来未见进展。在0到24个月之间，调整治疗组，一秒钟有效呼气容量(FEV1)下降的年平均率有差异，?0.007 L/year (90% confidence interval [CI], ?0.021 to 0.006).，不过，在3个月至24个月之间，为0.000 L/year (95% CI, ?0.016 to 0.016)。治疗小组之间，一氧化碳的扩散量(DLCO)，无明显差异。
chinese.english: During the first 3 months, small differences in FEV1 developed favoring subcutaneous insulin, but these changes did not progress. Between months 0 and 24, adjusted treatment group difference in FEV1 annual rate of change was ?0.007 L/year (90% confidence interval [CI], ?0.021 to 0.006). However, this was 0.000 L/year (95% CI, ?0.016 to 0.016) during months 3 to 24. DLCO annual rate of change was not significantly different between treatment groups.

chinese.chinese: 方法：使用三具尸体的T1至T10节段的双侧胸椎进行研究，植入不同温度的同一种类椎弓根螺钉。使用十字头以5毫米/分钟的速度检测轴向拉出试验。每隔二十分之一秒记录拉出试验的拉出应力和移位情况，直至完全拉出。
chinese.english: Methods. Three cadaveric thoracic calf spines were instrumented between T1-T10 bilaterally with one type of pedicle screws stored at different insertional temperatures. The axial pullout tests were performed at cross head speed of 5 mm/min. Pullout loads and displacement were recorded at 1/20 seconds intervals until failure occurred.

chinese.chinese: 2008年1月，在《美国医学杂志》发表的一项调查指出，如果2型糖尿病人在诊断后的头两年进行肥胖术，糖尿病是可以减轻/治愈的。该调查包括55个年龄在20到60岁之间，新诊断的肥胖糖尿病患者。半数患者接受胃带状术，减小胃的大小，另一半用一般方法治疗。接受手术者平均体重减轻21%。另一组减轻不到2%.治疗后两年，接受手术的73%（29人中22）血糖比诊断时降低并且不再服用药物！。对这一组来说，2型糖尿病，可以认为是“治愈” "in remission."。未接受手术者，两年后评估，只有13%治愈。
chinese.english: In January 2008, a study published in the Journal of the American Medical Association demonstrated that obesity surgery can send type 2 diabetes into remission if the surgery is done within the first two years of the person being diagnosed. This study included 55 newly diagnosed diabetics between ages 20 and 60 who were obese. Half of the participants had gastric banding surgery to reduce the size of their stomachs. The other half was treated in the usual way. The people who had surgery lost an average of 21% of their body weight. The other group lost less than 2% on average. Two years after treatment, 73% of those who had surgery (22 out of 29 patients) had blood sugar levels below the number used to diagnose diabetes -- and they were not taking medication! For this group, type 2 diabetes was considered to be "in remission." Only 13% of the group that did not have surgery had a remission at the two-year evaluation.

chinese.chinese: 来自于纽卡斯尔总医院的肿瘤顾问Mark Verrill博士说：“对于早期HER2阳性的乳腺癌病人来说，曲妥珠单抗联合化疗可使病人获得治愈的最佳机会。没有其他方法能够确保HER2的状态，那些有机会治疗的女性而没有治疗，那么她们在诊断后的头几年间将有显著的肿瘤复发的危险。“
chinese.english: Dr Mark Verrill, Consultant Oncologist, Newcastle General Hospital said, "For women with early stage HER2-positive breast cancer, chemotherapy with trastuzumab offers patients the best chance of a cure. Without failsafe mechanisms in place to ensure that HER2 status is known, there is a chance that women who may benefit from this treatment will not receive it, putting them at significantly greater risk of their cancer coming back during the first few years after diagnosis.||

chinese.chinese: 在本实验中，Dr. Christian C. Apfel和他的同事试验这个操作的有效性，包括让病人处于头低脚高位，人工扩张肺五次以鼓励肺功能复苏，促使二氧化碳从腹腔排出。
chinese.english: In the present study, Dr. Christian C. Apfel and colleagues tested the efficacy of one such maneuver, which involves placing the patient in Trendelenburg position and performing five manual inflations of the lung to encourage pulmonary recruitment and promote carbon dioxide efflux from the abdominal cavity.

chinese.chinese: 杨向中博士与日本科学家合作，于1998年利用牛耳皮肤细胞克隆出一头牛。该克隆成果证明很容易获得可发育的细胞，而且可改善克隆牛的大小和体重、高产奶量及其他有价值的遗传特性。
chinese.english: Dr. Yang collaborated with Japanese scientists in 1998 to clone a prize bull with cells scratched from the animal's ear. The resulting clone proved that viable cells were relatively easy to obtain and could improve efficiency in cloning cattle for size and weight, high milk production and other favorable genetic traits.

chinese.chinese: 那个一天要宰杀1万9千头活猪的工厂里，一些工人出现了神经系统的问题，因此连卫生官员们都被招来了。因为去年秋天，奥斯汀医疗中心的医生们遇到的这个病着实奇怪的。三个病人有着相似却少见的一系列症状：虚弱疲乏，疼痛麻木以及腿脚针刺感。
chinese.english: When some workers at the plant, which kills and butchers 19,000 hogs a day, developed neurological problems, health officials were called in. And the disease that confronted doctors at the Austin Medical Center here last fall was strange indeed. Three patients had the same highly unusual set of symptoms: fatigue, pain, weakness, numbness and tingling in the legs and feet.

chinese.chinese: 该研究主要关注离心运动，该运动在下山的过程中人类的大腿股四头肌所经历的锻炼相似。在该研究中研究者主要关注胫骨前肌，位于人类的胫骨前方。这个模拟运动包括在10个循环的7套动作中对脚趾的肌肉施加一个持续的伸缩与指向的力，在每一套运动之间有2分钟的休息时间。
chinese.english: The research focused on eccentric exercise, which creates a motion similar to the way in which quadriceps in human thighs are exercised during a downhill run. In the study, the scientists focused on the tibialis anterior muscle, located on the front of the shin in humans. The simulated exercise involved continuous flexing and pointing of the toes to exert the muscle  during seven sets of 10 cycles, with two minutes of rest between each set.

chinese.chinese: 虽然与肝脏、心脏和肾脏相比，胰腺移植并非生命必要的器官移植，但它在治疗胰岛素依赖性糖尿病方面具有极大的潜力。
chinese.english: Although pancreatic transplantation, involves transplantation of a nonessential organ as compared to the liver, heart, or kidney, it has enormous potential in the management of patients with insulin-dependent diabetes.

chinese.chinese: 如果不予治疗，毒性甲状腺肿会引起进行性的严重的分解代谢紊乱和心脏损害。
chinese.english: If left untreated, thyrotoxicosis causes progressive and profound catabolic disturbances and cardiac damage.

chinese.chinese: 焦虑性神经官能症、心脏病、贫血、胃肠病、肝硬化、结核、肌无力和其它肌病、绝经期综合征、嗜铬细胞瘤、原发性眼病、假性毒性甲状腺肿在临床上可能与甲状腺功能亢进难以鉴别。
chinese.english: Anxiety neurosis, heart disease, anemia, gastrointestinal disease, cirrhosis, tuberculosis, myasthenia and other muscular disorders, menopausal syndrome, pheochromocytoma, primary ophthalmopathy, and thyrotoxicosis factitia may be clinically difficult to differentiate from hyperthyroidism.

chinese.chinese: 这样可完全绕开肝的血循环，而不阻断下肢静脉血流回到心脏。
chinese.english: This will permit total isolation of the liver circulation without interrupting venous return from the lower extremities to the heart.

chinese.chinese: 在心脏骤停和传导阻滞伴晕厥发作时，可心内注射肾上腺素和异丙肾上腺素。
chinese.english: Epinephrine or isoproterenol may be administered intracordally in cardiac arrest and heart block with syncopal seizures.

chinese.chinese: 例如，甾醇类、洋地黄、碘、阿的平、有机汞和四环素类分别在脂肪、心脏、肾和骨组织中浓集。
chinese.english: For example, steroids, digitalis, iodine, quinacrine organic mercurials, and tetracyclines are concentrated in the fat, heart, thyroid gland, liver, kidney, and bone respectively.

chinese.chinese: 影响植物神经系统的药物可用于治疗开角性青光眼，诊断重症肌无力，作为胃肠道和尿道平滑肌兴奋剂治疗手术后的腹胀气和尿潴留，作为骨胳肌弛松药，如箭毒中毒的解毒剂;作为三环抗忧郁药中毒的解毒药；作为麻醉前用药，扩瞳药，以及睫状肌麻痹药；溃疡病胃酸过多时，本类药用于迷走兴奋引起的胃酸分泌，延缓胃排空；也用于治疗前庭神经紊乱，巴金森症；与局部麻醉药合用，治疗低血压症、休克；改善房室传导，提高心室自律性治疗心脏传导阻滞，用于支气管哮喘，可作为减轻鼻充血的药物；治疗发作性睡眠病，脑功能微小障碍；诊治嗜铬细胞瘤；治疗心律失常、心绞痛、高血压、甲状腺毒症和震颤。
chinese.english: Drugs influencing the autonomic nervous system are used in wide-angle glaucoma, in diagnosis of myasthenia gravis, as gastrointestinal and urinary tract stimulants in postoperative abdominal distention and urinary retention, as antidotes to poisoning from skeletal muscle relaxant such as curare, as antidotes to poisoning by tricyclic antidepressants, as preanesthetic medications, as mydriatics, as cycloplegics, in peptic acid oversecretion to diminish vagally mediated secretion of gastric juices, in slowing of gastric emptying, in vestibular disorders, in parkinsonism, in combination with local anesthetics, in hypotension and shock, in heart block to improve atrioventricular conduction and to stimulate ventricular automaticity, in bronchial asthma, as nasal decongestants, in narcolepsy, in minimal brain dysfunction, in diagnosis and treatment of pheochromocytoma, in cardiac arrhythmias, in angina pectoris, in hypertension, in thyrotoxicosis, and in tremor.

chinese.chinese: 膀胱、支气管、胃肠道、心脏、瞳孔和性器官则受两类相互拮抗的植物神经分支支配。
chinese.english: In bladder, bronchi, gastrointestinal tract, heart, pupil, and sex organs, the two divisions of the autonomic nervous system have opposing effects.

chinese.chinese: 阿托品和东莨菪碱为巅茄类生物碱，与其他人工合成抗胆碱药一样，可抑制乙酰胆碱和拟胆碱药对平滑肌、心脏、外分泌腺的毒蕈碱样作用。
chinese.english: Atropine and scopolamine, which are belladonna alkaloids, as well as other synthetic anticholinergic drugs, inhibit the actions of acetylcholine and cholinomimetic drugs at muscarinic receptors in smooth muscles, heart, and exocrine glands.

chinese.chinese: 用较大剂量时(1~3mg)，可产生瞳孔散大(阻断虹膜括约肌)，使睫状肌麻痹(阻断睫状肌)，其心脏效应表现为：短暂的心动过缓(中枢迷走神经兴奋)和心动过速(阻断窦房结的迷走神经)。
chinese.english: In somewhat larger doses (1-3mg), it produces mydriasis (blockade of the iris sphincter muscle), cycloplegia (blockade of the ciliary muscle), and cardiovascular effects characterized by transient bradycardia (central vagal stimulation) and tachycardia (vagal blockade at the SA node).

chinese.chinese: β1受体主管 兴奋心脏和脂肪分解。
chinese.english: Beta1 is responsible for cardiac stimulation and lipolysis.

chinese.chinese: β2受体激动剂用于治疗哮喘特别有效，因为它们使支气管扩张，而兴奋心脏的作用较小。
chinese.english: Beta2 agonists are especially useful in the treatment of asthma because they produce bronchodilation without much cardiac acceleration.

chinese.chinese: 肾上腺素和其相关药物的治疗用途有：作为支气管扩张剂(哮喘时兴奋β2受体)；扩瞳剂(收缩辐射状肌肉)；治疗青光眼(降低眼内压)；治疗变态反应(防止抗原引起的组胺释放)；治疗低血压(升高平均压)；用作减轻鼻充血的药物(恢压敏)；用于局部麻醉(使手术野无血，延缓麻醉药的吸收，延长麻醉作用时间，保护大随和心脏不受局麻药毒性作用的影响)；用作心脏兴奋剂(心脏传导阻滞时，心内注射肾上腺素和异丙肾上腺素可改善房室传导速率和兴奋心室自律性)。
chinese.english: The therapeutic uses of epinephrine (or related drugs) are: as bronchodilator (beta2 receptor activation in asthma); as mydriatic (contracts radial muscle); in glaucoma (lowers intraocular pressure); for allergic reactions (prevents antigen-induced histamine releases); in hypotension (increasing mean pressure); as nasal decongestant (mephentermine); for local anesthesia (to produce a bloodless field of operation, to delay absorption and give longer duration of anesthetic action, and to protect brain and heart against toxic effects of local anesthetics); as cardiac stimulant (epinephrine or isoproterenol may be injected in heart block to improve atrioventricular conduction velocity and to stimulate ventricular automaticity).

chinese.chinese: 苯肾上腺素(新福林)：苯肾上腺素为一直接作用且持久的收缩血管药，对中枢和心脏均无甚作用。
chinese.english: Phenylephrine (Neo-Synephrine): Phenylephrine is a direct-acting and long-acting vasoconstrictor and has little effect on the CNS or the heart.

chinese.chinese: 甲氧胺(美速克新命)：甲氧胺是一作用持久的缩血管药，不兴奋心脏。
chinese.english: Methoxamine (Vasoxyl): Methoxamine is a long-acting vasoconstrictor and does not cause cardiac stimulation.

chinese.chinese: UBC作为一家全球性的生物制药公司主要致力于免疫学方面的治疗和研究。今天他们宣布了Cimzia治疗成人中度到重度类风湿性关节炎的试验成果，包括对该药的长期疗效、剂量、安全性及对日常生活的影响的评估。数据结果已经在2012年华盛顿召开的美国风湿学会年会上发布。2012年11月14日
chinese.english: UCB, a global biopharmaceutical company focusing on immunology treatment and research, today announced findings from studies that evaluated the long-term outcomes, dosing, safety and impact on daily living of Cimzia (certolizumab pegol) for adults with moderate to severe rheumatoid arthritis (RA). The data were presented at the American College of Rheumatology's (ACR) 2012 Annual Scientific Meeting in Washington, D.C., November 10-14, 2012.

chinese.chinese: 辉瑞的大胆尝试不是移动化临床试验时代已经到来的唯一指示。MedCityNews今天报道，“赛诺菲合作创新挑战赛”中最后四支决赛队伍中的两支是关于临床试验的。赛诺菲挑战赛旨在寻求提高病人在医疗保健活动中参与度的方法。其中一支决赛队伍Kim McCleary建议让经历慢性疼痛的患者通过手机回答从合作到终末疼痛关于他们健康的问题，收集可以改进临床试验的数据。另一支决赛队伍Sharon Terry of Genetic Alliance提出建立一个所有疾病的登记系统，以病人为导向并为不同疾病研究提供大量数据来源。
chinese.english: Pfizer's venture is not the only indication that the mobile-enabled clinical trial's time has come. MedCityNews reported today that two of the four finalists in the Sanofi Collaborate Activate Innovation challenge deal with clinical trials. The Sanofi challenge seeks ideas for increasing patient engagement in healthcare. One finalist, Kim McCleary from Partnering to End Pain, suggested using smartphones to get sufferers of chronic pain to answer questions about their health, generating data that could improve clinical trials. Another, Sharon Terry of Genetic Alliance, proposed the creation of a Registry for All Diseases that would create a patient-driven, crowd-sourced database for research into different diseases.

chinese.chinese: 引起Starko博士怀疑的是高剂量（今天被认为是不安全的剂量）的阿司匹林被广泛应用于治疗疾病，而阿司匹林过量所产生的症状很难与感冒的症状相区别，尤其在那些生病后不久即死亡的病人中。
chinese.english: What raised Dr. Starko's suspicions is that high doses of aspirin, amounts considered unsafe today, were commonly used to treat the illness, and the symptoms of aspirin overdose may have been difficult to distinguish from those of the flu, especially among those who died soon after they became ill.

chinese.chinese: 科学今天（2009-9-4）来自Syracuse大学的研究者发现在混合细胞白血病蛋白复合体中的第二种分子开关，他们相信这种分子开关能够用于预防非正常细胞的过度产生，而这种现象在多种癌症包括白血病中都存在。
chinese.english: ScienceDaily (Sep. 4, 2009) — A team of Syracuse University researchers discovered a second molecular switch within the Mixed Lineage Leukemia protein complex that they believe could be exploited to prevent the overproduction of abnormal cells that are found in several types of cancer, including leukemia.

chinese.chinese: SymphogenA/S今天在癌症研究杂志在线版发表了有关Sym004药物的令人激动的数据。该数据显示Sym004在体内外对不同组织器官癌细胞系具有协同抑制效应。
chinese.english: Symphogen A/S today announced the publication of encouraging data for Sym004 in the on-line edition of Cancer Research (January 15, 2010; 70(2)). The data showed that Sym004 provided synergistic inhibitory effects against cancer cell lines of different tissue origin in vitro and in vivo.

chinese.chinese: 圣地亚哥、印第安纳波利斯和马萨诸塞州WALTHAM，2010年3月15日/ PRNewswire-FirstCall/---Amylin制药公司、礼来和Alkermes公司今天宣布FDA发出了关于BYDUREON（胰高血糖素样肽-1类似物Exenatide缓释注射用混悬液）新药申请（NDA）的完整回复函。
chinese.english: SAN DIEGO, INDIANAPOLIS, and WALTHAM, Mass., March 15, 2010 /PRNewswire-FirstCall/ -- Amylin Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (Nasdaq:AMLN - News), Eli Lilly and Company (NYSE:LLY - News) and Alkermes, Inc. (Nasdaq:ALKS - News) today announced that the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has issued a complete response letter regarding the New Drug Application (NDA) for BYDUREON (exenatide for extended-release injectable suspension).

chinese.chinese: 无论什么原因（肥胖危害到脑），影响都是严重的。现今美国约有1 /3的成年人肥胖，痴呆也是老年人中最具有破坏性和花销不菲的健康问题之一。今天的肥胖可能导致明天的痴呆，这真让人忧心。
chinese.english: Whatever the causes, the implications are grave. In the United States today, around one-third of adults are obese. At the same time, dementia is already one of the most costly and devastating health problems of old age. The possibility that obesity today will lead to higher rates of dementia in the future is, therefore, deeply alarming.

chinese.chinese: 基因泰克的血液/肿瘤临床研究副总裁斯蒂芬.凯尔西（Stephen Kelsey）称，对此不必担忧，至少目前不必担忧。今天早上，健康博客（Health Blog ）记者采访了出席曼哈顿Piper Jaffray投资银行卫生保健年会的基因泰克公司负责人，凯尔西称罗氏提出440亿美元的收购价格对于挽留员工或者唤起员工的士气并没有任何的实际效果。

The Health Blog dropped in on the Genentech presentation this morning at Piper Jaffray's annual health care conference in Manhattan where Kelsey said Roche's $44 billion offer hasn't had any discernible effect on employee retention or morale.

chinese.chinese: 斯托瓦斯医学研究所的李凌衡实验室确定出骨髓干细胞利基的精确位置。 今天，研究结果发表在了在线自然研究进展刊物上。

chinese.chinese: 时报报道，参议院金融委员会主席共和党人库克.格拉斯利（Chuck Grassley）今天公布了这些调查信件的电子版，其中要求惠氏和DesighWrite（一家论文撰写公司）公布撰写杂志论文及使用医生署名所涉及的费用。

chinese.english: Clinical and laboratory findings: Although the findings of abdominal pain, nausea, emesis, fever, and chills were present alone or in combination in 31 of 35 patients (88 percent), the diagnosis of biliary disease was often delayed.

chinese.english: This study aimed to assess outcomes of kidney transplants from nonheart-beating (NH compared with heart-beating (H cadaveric donors with meta-analytical techniques.

chinese.chinese: 心血管学家们进行了一个系统的研究，证明冠脉搭桥手术在心脏跳动的时候进行，这有可能会增加患者的死亡率。研究者们认为，除非个别案例中，停止心跳被证明是是危险的，否则，不应该提倡心脏跳动的同时进行手术。
chinese.english: Coronary artery bypass surgery performed whilst the heart is still beating may carry an increased likelihood of death, according to a systematic review by Cochrane researchers. The researchers suggest beating heart surgery should not be recommended except in specific cases where stopping the heart might be risky.

chinese.chinese: 根据加拿大医学会期刊（CMAJ）发表的一项研究表明不规则心跳，比如房颤，是老年心血管疾病高危人群认知障碍和丧失生活自理能力的有力的预测因子。
chinese.english: An irregular heartbeat - atrial fibrillation - is a strong predictor of cognitive decline and the loss of independence in daily activities in older people at risk of cardiovascular disease, according to a study in CMAJ (Canadian Medical Association Journal).

chinese.chinese: 健康的心脏组织是由各种类型的细胞组成，包括维持心跳的心肌细胞，为心肌细胞提供结构支持的心肌成纤维细胞。“在一次心肌梗死后心肌细胞受伤甚至死亡，这些细胞很少甚至不能再生带给患者巨大的问题”，Srivastava解释说，损伤后成纤维细胞转移至损伤部位并形成疤痕的是重构过程的一部分。
chinese.english: Healthy heart tissue is composed of a mixture of several kinds of cells, including cardiomyocytes, which provide beating muscle, and cardiac fibroblasts, that provide architectural support to the myocytes. "When heart muscle cells become injured and die following an MI, patients have the major problem that these cells have little or no capacity for regeneration," explained Srivastava. Part of the process of remodelling that occurs following the injury is that fibroblast cells migrate to the site and create the scar.

chinese.chinese: 西雅图华盛顿大学的Peter Kudenchuk博士和他的同事们研究了3960例由不可电复律心律失常心律失常导致的非创伤性院外心跳骤停患者的记录，在患者到达医院前由急救人员对其实施心肺复苏。“研究的重要性在于我们将重点放在对可电复律心律失常患者的救治上，这就是为什么大众对除颤器的使用和快速除颤的方法能够提升并推广,这本是毫无异议的，但是可电复律的心律失常只占心跳骤停很小的比例。”
chinese.english: Dr Peter Kudenchuk (University of Washington, Seattle) and colleagues analyzed records of 3960 patients with nontraumatic out-of-hospital cardiac arrest resulting from nonshockable initial rhythms that were treated with CPR by emergency personnel prior to the patient reaching a hospital. "Why the study is important is that a huge emphasis has been placed on treating patients with shockable arrhythmias. That's why these public-access defibrillators and rapid shock [methods] have evolved and been promoted and rightly so, but shockable rhythms account for only a small proportion of cardiac arrests."

chinese.chinese: 硫酸甲苯丁胺(恢压敏)：硫酸甲苯丁胺是一兴 奋心脏的长效缩血管剂。

chinese.english: Isoproterenol: Isoproterenol is a potent activator of beta-adrenergic receptors, possessing both bronchodilating and heart-stimulating properties.

chinese.chinese: 它用于支气管哮喘、房室传导阻滞和心脏骤停。

chinese.english: Terbutaline (Brethine) and Metaproterenol (Alupent, Metaprel): These agents are selective beta2-adrenergic receptor stimulants causing pronounced bronchodilatation with negligible cardiac stimulation in therapeutic doses.

When I was in medical school the level of public trust in medicine was higher than it is today, mainly because it was so noncommercial at the outset. Trust had eroded to some extent, and medicine became a venture capital business as the years went by.

chinese.chinese: 月经的平均年龄从二十世纪70年代发生了很大的变化。 今天，月经的平均年龄在美国白人女孩是12.6岁，黑人女孩是12.1岁，墨西哥-美国女孩是12.2岁。 尽管比率在不同国家之间有轻微地变化，按照一份2007年的乳腺癌基金报告，欧洲女孩，平均起来，也在12-13岁之间开始月经周期。
chinese.english: The average age of menstruation hasn't changed much since the 1970s. Today, the average age of menarche in the United States is 12.6 among white girls, 12.1 for black girls and 12.2 for Mexican-American girls. Although rates vary slightly between countries, European girls, on average, also begin menstruating between the ages of 12 and 13, according to a 2007 report from the Breast Cancer Fund.

chinese.chinese: 在今天的新闻发布会上，现任CDC主管Richard Besser提出了一个关于流感爆发的令人不安的问题：为什么青少年和年轻的成年人对流感反应如此之强烈？
chinese.english: On today's press call, acting CDC Director Richard Besser addressed a troubling question about the flu outbreak: Why are teenagers and young adults so hard hit?

chinese.chinese: 今年国会将重新制定美国儿童营养计划，譬如学校午餐计划，妇女，婴儿与儿童营养餐计划。农业委员会的某位发言人说，今天这项决定将会被引入立法，作为2009年更大范围的司法再授权2的一部分。
chinese.english: U.S. child nutrition programs such as school lunches and the Women, Infants and Children feeding program are due for renewal this year. An Agriculture Committee spokesman said one option would be to include the legislation introduced today as part of the broader reauthorization later in 2009.

chinese.chinese: 诺华今天称它正耗资12亿美元从EBEWE Pharma（一家澳大利亚企业）收购其仿制药业务，诺华通过Sandoz unit在仿制药领域已经占有一席之地，同EBEWE Pharma的交易将其仿制药市场拓展到标准化疗药物领域（包括Bristol Myers Saqubbs的Txol 和Sanofi-Aventis的Eloxatin）
chinese.english: Novartis today said it's spending $1.2 billion to buy a specialty generics business from EBEWE Pharma, a closely held Austrian company. The deal will give Novartis, already a well-established player in generics through its Sandoz unit, access to several standard chemotherapy drugs, including generic versions of Bristol-Myers Squibb's Taxol and Sanofi-Aventis's Eloxatin.

chinese.chinese: 结果来自一项II 期临床试验，该研究纳入了302例以前从未治疗过的转移性乳腺癌患者，刊登在今天的临床肿瘤杂志上（JCO）。
chinese.english: The findings, from a phase 2 trial that enrolled 302 women with previously untreated metastatic breast cancer, were published online today in the Journal of Clinical Oncology (JCO).

chinese.chinese: 阿斯利康今天公布的Brilinta研究，共纳入18000多名患者，对Brilinta和波利维降低心脏病发作、中风以及由心血管导致的死亡风险进行了比较。以上是联邦政府药品临床试验登记处对该研究的描述记录。
chinese.english: The Brilinta study whose results AstraZeneca reported today included more than 18,000 patients, and compared how Brilinta and Plavix reduced the risk of a composite of heart attacks, strokes and death from cardiovascular causes. Here's a description of the study on a federal drug trials registry.

chinese.chinese: 参议员Edward Kennedy是HELP的主席，长期支持控烟，在声明中称：数十年不负责任的拖延终于结束。今天具有历史意义的投票将把数百万儿童从终身烟瘾和夭折中拯救出来。公共健康专家一致赞同此立法是国会所能采取的最重要举措以减少青少年吸烟比例。
chinese.english: Sen. Edward Kennedy (D-Mass.), the chairman of the HELP Committee and a longtime advocate of tobacco control efforts, said in a statement: "Decades of irresponsible delay are finally over. Today's landmark vote will save millions of children from a lifetime of addiction and premature death. Public health experts overwhelmingly agree that enactment of this legislation is the most important action Congress can take to reduce youth smoking.”

chinese.chinese: 最大的可能是政府今天将投入更多资金至医疗健康业，许诺明天实现节省，最终永远不可能成功削减开支。很少有政府一开始花更多钱，最后成功削减开支的例子。
chinese.english: The most likely possibility is that the government will spend more on health care today, promise to realize savings tomorrow and never succeed in lowering costs. It is rare that governments successfully cut costs by first spending more money.

chinese.chinese: FDA今天早间行动非常迅速的对阿斯利康的Seroquel 发布公文决断书。
chinese.english: The FDA was a bit quick on the trigger in making public some documents about AstraZeneca's Seroquel this morning.

chinese.chinese: 成为一个医生，你需要在准备的道路上花很多的时间，如低着头，试图不要被强迫，试着让它从一天到另一天，这会很震惊，你会发现自己在另外的一端，一些人和你握手，问你要赚多少钱。而然这天到来了。两年前，我完成了自己作为外科室实习的第八年也就是最后一年。我在波士顿布莱根妇科医院的外科职员工作得到了第二次面试，我曾在这个地方培训过。这是个很好的工作，我专攻我很感兴趣的某些肿瘤的外科手术，但是我也要做一些普通的外科手术。在指定的那天，我穿上自己喜欢的衣服坐在外科室主席木画板制的办公室里。他坐在我对面，然后他告诉我我的工作是我自己的。“你想做这份工作吗？”我愿意，我有点惊讶的说。他解释道，这份工作有三年的基本薪水。然后，我将会作为我自己：我将会带来我的病人，我会自己付医药费。接着他说道，我们应该付你多少钱？
chinese.english: To become a doctor, you spend so much time in the tunnels of preparation—head down, trying not to screw up, trying to make it from one day to the next—that it is a shock to find yourself at the other end, with someone shaking your hand and asking how much money you want to make. But the day comes. Two years ago, I was finishing my eighth and final year as a resident in surgery. I had got a second interview for a surgical staff position at the Brigham and Women's Hospital, in Boston, where I had trained. It was a great job—I'd get to specialize in surgery for certain tumors that interested me, but I'd also be able to do some general surgery. On the appointed day, I put on my fancy suit and took a seat in the wood-panelled office of the chairman of surgery. He sat down opposite me and then he told me the job was mine. “Do you want it?” Yes, I said, a little startled. The job, he explained, came with a guaranteed salary for three years. After that, I would be on my own: I'd make what I br
