chinese.english: To become a doctor, you spend so much time in the tunnels of preparation—head down, trying not to screw up, trying to make it from one day to the next—that it is a shock to find yourself at the other end, with someone shaking your hand and asking how much money you want to make. But the day comes. Two years ago, I was finishing my eighth and final year as a resident in surgery. I had got a second interview for a surgical staff position at the Brigham and Women's Hospital, in Boston, where I had trained. It was a great job—I'd get to specialize in surgery for certain tumors that interested me, but I'd also be able to do some general surgery. On the appointed day, I put on my fancy suit and took a seat in the wood-panelled office of the chairman of surgery. He sat down opposite me and then he told me the job was mine. “Do you want it?” Yes, I said, a little startled. The job, he explained, came with a guaranteed salary for three years. After that, I would be on my own: I'd make what I br

chinese.chinese: 结果：15年间，腰椎的骨密度保持稳定。尽管如此，在一些患者中依然发现，头10年中，骨皮质的骨密度开始下降，随访15年后，在股骨颈最终下降了10 ± 3%（中位数±SEM， P < 0.05），桡骨末端最终下降了35 ± 5%; P < 0.05。37％没有症状的甲旁亢患者在15年随访期间出现了疾病的进展（至少有一个和多个符合手术指征）。在一开始就符合手术指征对于预防疾病的进展没有意义。接受手术的患者在手术后的15年间骨密度始终保持稳定。
chinese.english: Results: Lumbar spine BMD remained stable for 15 yr. However, BMD started to fall at cortical sites even before 10 yr, ultimately decreasing by 10 ± 3% (mean ± SEM; P < 0.05) at the femoral neck, and 35 ± 5%; P < 0.05 at the distal radius, in the few patients observed for 15 yr. Thirty-seven percent of asymptomatic patients showed disease progression (one or more new guidelines for surgery) at any time point over the 15 yr. Meeting surgical criteria at baseline did not predict who would have progressive disease. BMD increases in patients who underwent surgery were sustained for the entire 15 yr.

chinese.chinese: 这项研究被认为在受伤后肌肉力量恢复中提出的第一个性别差异的报告。它是由俄亥俄州立大学的Brian C. Clark, Richard L. Hoffman, and David W. Russ以及佛罗里达大学的Todd M. Manini，Gainesville共同合作完成的。研究人员将在美国生理学会会议—生物学的综合运动V上讨论他们的研究， “妇女与男子相比敷料固定3周后随意基肌力量的恢复是被抑制”。会议将于2008年9月24 -27日在南卡罗来纳州的希尔顿头岛举行。《理疗与康复医学集刊》杂志也接受了这一初步数据结果作为“简报”迅速出版。
chinese.english: The study is believed to be the first report of sex-differences in muscle strength restoration following disuse. It was conducted by Brian C. Clark, Richard L. Hoffman, and David W. Russ of Ohio University, Athens; and Todd M. Manini of the University of Florida, Gainesville. The researchers will discuss their study, “Restoration of Voluntary Muscle Strength Following 3-Weeks of Cast Immobilization Is Suppressed in Women Compared to Men,” at the American Physiological Society conference, The Integrative Biology of Exercise V. The meeting will be held September 24-27, 2008 in Hilton Head, SC. The journal Archives of Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation has also accepted a 'brief report' of this preliminary data for rapid publication.

chinese.chinese: 在接下来的10天内，她的女儿看了六个不同的医生，做了一些血液检测和扫描，并开了十几种药物。没有人给出确切的诊断或治疗。 “我的头有什么毛病，”年轻女子不断重复着， “它是不正常的。”
chinese.english: Over the next 10 days her daughter saw six different doctors, had many blood tests and scans and tried a dozen medicines. No one had a diagnosis or a cure. “There's something wrong in my head,” the young woman kept repeating. “It's just not right.”

chinese.chinese: 墨西哥国家卫生当局在韦拉克鲁斯州Perote的调查万头猪养殖农场寻找流感爆发的源头。
chinese.english: In Mexico, state health authorities looking for the initial source of the outbreak toured a million-pig hog farm in Perote, in Veracruz State.

chinese.chinese: “据推测，有些地区一头猪可能感染两种病毒。我们不知道是在哪里在何时感染的。可能已经以这种形式携带了很久”，Rambaut说。
chinese.english: “Presumably somewhere there was a pig infected with both forms. We don't know where or when. It could have been circulating in this form for a while,” said Rambaut.

chinese.chinese: 在该研究中，对32名男性竞技自行车车手（年龄大都在28、29岁及三十出头）的骨密度，与同龄对照组人群进行了比较，对照组为爱运动但并非竞技运动员的男性。骨骼扫描显示，与对照组相比，几乎所有自行车手的脊柱骨密度都显著偏低。其中一些比较年轻的车手，不过20出头，脊柱就出现骨质疏松症状，这距离全身骨骼骨质疏松仅一步之遥。Smathers 说，“发现这些二十几岁的家伙出现骨质疏松真是令人惊奇也让人十分不安。”
chinese.english: In his study, the bone density of 32 male, competitive bike riders, most in their late 20s and early 30s, was compared to that of age-matched controls, men who were active but not competitive athletes. Bone scans showed that almost all of the cyclists had significantly less bone density in the spine than the control group. Some of the racers, young men in their 20s, had osteopenia in their spines, a medical condition only one step below full-blown osteoporosis. “To find guys in their twenties with osteopenia was surprising and pretty disturbing,” Smathers says.

chinese.chinese: 那么减轻体重呢？举重使肌肉坚实但不能燃烧更多的热量。增加的肌肉和肌体内的骨骼肌总量相比是极小的量。并且肌肉在静息状态下代谢率非常低。你不可能一直屈伸你的肱二头肌吧。
chinese.english: And what about weight loss? Lifting weights builds muscles but will not make you burn more calories. The muscle you gain is minuscule compared with the total amount of skeletal muscle in the body. And muscle has a very low metabolic rate when it's at rest. (You can't flex your biceps all the time.)

chinese.chinese: 但是，在我们的整个谈话中，我注意到，尽管她在笑，玛拉从未感动。她生硬的坐着，拱着背，头昂起并稍微向左转，她的左手臂弯曲对她的胸部，好像抱着一个孩子。
chinese.english: But throughout our conversation， I noticed that despite her laughter， Marla never moved。 She sat stiffly， hunched over and cocked slightly to the left， with her left arm bent against her chest， as if cradling a baby。

chinese.chinese: 这一标志或其他任何室标志与艾滋病的关系均尚未得到证实，但是在艾滋病患者中，这一比率实际上总是异常低。
chinese.english: Neither this marker nor any other, laboratory marker is of proved relevance to AIDS, but the ratio is virtually always abnormally low in patients with AIDS.

chinese.chinese: 艾滋病高危组与肝炎高危组的相似性甚至提示，其传播途径也相似，尽管流行病学或室研究并没有说明肝炎病毒与艾滋病原因有什么关系。
chinese.english: The similarity of the high risk groups to those seen in hepatitis even suggests a similar route of transmission, although hepatitis viruses have not been implicated in the cause of AIDS by either epidemiological or laboratory investigations.

chinese.chinese: 不同的研究人员都有自己的候选因子，但是欧洲一室最近提出了一种最令人感兴趣的起作用的因子。
chinese.english: Different investigators have their own candidates, but the most interesting recent contender for the role has emerged from a European laboratory.

chinese.chinese: 医疗和研究单位都很紧张，特别是由于有的研究人员担心，他们的设备污染后，可能就不能再用于别的病人,纽约和其他一些地方的人员已从治疗艾滋病人的单位以及从事与艾滋病有关的室工作的单位辞去工作。
chinese.english: Facilities for both care and research have been strained, especially in light of concern among some investigators that contamination of their equipment might prohibit its use on other patients, personnel in New York and elsewhere have resigned from units that care for patients with AIDS and that do laboratory work related to AIDS.

chinese.chinese: 在诊断可疑的患者中，“全身性红斑狼疮的经典体征”的诊断价值显然在降低，而广泛的神经免疫学室研究和15O-正电子发射X线体层摄影术对中枢神经系统疾病的探查起了很大作用。
chinese.english: In patients with doubtful diagnosis the classical signs of SLE are evidently of decreasing diagnostic value, whereas extended neuroimmunological laboratory investigations and 50-positron emission tomography contribute a great deal towards detection of CNS-disease.

chinese.chinese: 现有的测试方法可靠性较差，各室测试结果有差异，血小板中存在低温保护剂时测试结果更有问题。
chinese.english: The tests currently available have not been reliable from laboratory to laboratory and have questionable value when the platelets are perturbed by the presence of cryoprotectants.

chinese.chinese: 在过去的40年里，医生们可以利用强的松来治疗或逆转巨细胞动脉炎的某些症状，但病人需要坚持一年或更长的时间每日服药。医学及哲学博士Cornelia M. Weyand说，“在我们治疗的头几天，病人就能很快得以解善，问题是病人必须在很长的时间里服用大剂量的强的松，很有可能出现一些副作用。”常见的副作用包括高血压，糖尿病和骨质疏松症。Cornelia M. Weyand同时也是Emory 大学Kathleen B. and Mason I. Lowance人类免疫中心主管之一及这篇文章的作者之一。
chinese.english: For the last 40 years, physicians have been able to treat and reverse some symptoms of GCA by prescribing prednisone, to be taken daily over a year or more. "Patients improve promptly and reliably, within days of when we treat them," says Cornelia M. Weyand, MD, PhD, co-director of the Kathleen B. and Mason I. Lowance Center for Human Immunology at Emory University and an author of the paper. "The problem is that patients have to take prednisone for a long time and in high doses, and they are at risk of developing side effects." Common side effects include hypertension, diabetes and osteoporosis.

chinese.chinese: 为进一步探讨二甲双胍在孕期服用的安全性，Koren及其同事参阅了大量医学文献，近500名PCOS或糖尿病女性患者在怀孕头三个月内服用二甲双胍的八项研究也包括在内。
chinese.english: From the pooled data, the malformation rate in the treatment group was 1.7 percent compared with 7.2 percent in disease-matched control subjects who did not receive metformin.

chinese.chinese: WHO精神与神经疾病协调员Jose Bertolote引用研究数据称，几乎所有自杀者都是一时冲动所为，如果他们手头没有这些农药，死亡是完全可以避免的。
chinese.english: Jose Bertolote, WHO coordinator of mental and brain disorders, cited studies showing nearly everyone who committed suicide acted on impulse and their deaths could have been prevented if lethal chemicals had not been available.

chinese.chinese: 而且，在男性中，抽烟减少的与重度抽烟的相比，头15年的死亡率只有轻微的减少。但是在15年后，两组的死亡率就很接近了。
chinese.english: And men who cut back only had slightly lower death rates from all causes combined than the heavy smokers during the first 15 years. After that, death rates were comparable.

chinese.chinese: 在2年合同期内，对从加利福尼亚州内外23个单位送来的1000多份标本进行了生物监测试验，我们室对我们发表过的FIAX技术(Ascher，M.S.，Horwith，G?S.，Thornton，M.F.，Greenwood，J.R.，Berman，M.A.：血清学诊断小鼠、豚鼠、羊和人体Q热的快速免疫荧光法诊断免疫学1：33-38.1983)
chinese.english: In the two years of the contract our laboratory performed bio-surveillance testing on over 1000 samples from 23 institutions inside and outside of California using our published FIAX technique (Ascher, M. S., Horwith, G. S., Thornton, M F., Greenwood, J. R., Berman, M. A. A Rapid Immunofluorescent Procedure for Serodiagnosis of Q Fever in Mice, Guinea Pigs, Sheep and Humans. Diagnostic Immunology 1.33-38, 1983).

chinese.chinese: 由于最近的室流行，Q热的两个特点今后应该得到更多注意：慢性病和心内膜炎。
chinese.english: As a result of recent laboratory outbreaks, two features of Q fever are bound to receive more attention in the future, the chronic disease state and endocarditis.

chinese.chinese: 此结果在具备FIAX技术的临床室中直接有用，并减少标准的显微镜荧光抗体试验中所需的烦琐的稀释要求。
chinese.english: This result has direct utility in the clinical laboratory setting where FIAX technology is available and lessens requirement for tedious dilution required in the standard microscopically read FA test.

chinese.chinese: 除已认识到军事人员在天然暴露环境或生物战中有患Q热的危险外，因人与感染的实验羊接触而发生一些室中的流行。
chinese.english: In addition to the recognized risk to military personnel of Q fever in natural exposure settings or biologic warfare, a number of institutional outbreaks have occurred associated with contact of humans with infected experimental sheep.

chinese.chinese: 室获得性Q热的论题已列入美国实验动物科学协会全国会议的日程表上，也是1983年8月温哥华召开的国际实验动物科学会议上的一个重要会议论题。
chinese.english: The topic of laboratory acquired Q fever has been on the program of the American Association of Laboratory Animal Science national meeting and was a major symposium topic at the International Congress of Laboratory Animal Science in Vancouver in August of 1983.

chinese.chinese: 必须有做血尿素氮、血清肌酸酐或内源性肌酸酐清除试验的室设备。
chinese.english: Laboratory facilities must be available to perform blood urea nitrogen and serum creatinine or endogenous creatinine clearance tests.

chinese.chinese: 最重要的是，尽管白血病和脑瘤幸存者中风风险都明显增加，但在癌症确诊的头二十年内仍是一个比较不同的事情。作者注意到。
chinese.english: "Importantly, although the risk of stroke among leukemia and brain tumor survivors is significantly increased, it is still a relatively uncommon event during the first two decades after the cancer diagnosis," the authors note.

chinese.chinese: 不再需要到远离室的检测中心与别人共用一台昂贵的荧光计。
chinese.english: No longer will you have to share time on an expensive fluorometer in a central instrument section away from your lab.

chinese.chinese: 这些问题促使医生去做出一个诊断，即确立生病的原因，而一个完整的诊断由病人的病史、身体检查和室检查所组成。
chinese.english: These questions set the stage for making a diagnosis, i. e. determine the cause of an illness and a diagnosis is accomplished with history, physical examination and laboratory testing.

chinese.chinese: 因为体液常常揭示了关于疾病的重要信息，所以在确诊病情上，室检查起着非常重要的作用。
chinese.english: Since body fluids often reveal important information about the nature of the disorder, laboratory testing plays an important role in determining the patient's disease.

chinese.chinese: 通过增加心输出量降低氧耗量(缩小心脏体积和减慢心率)而加强心脏效率。
chinese.english: They increase cardiac efficiency by increasing cardiac output and decreasing oxygen consumption (decreased heart size and rate).

chinese.chinese: 最常报道的心脏中毒的体征是心律失常，如心室异位性除极、Ⅱ度和III度传导阻滞、结性心动过速、房性心动过速伴传导阻滞、室性心动过速、窦房阻滞和窦性停搏。
chinese.english: The most commonly reported cardiac signs of toxicity are dysrhythmias such as ventricular ectopic depolarization, second- and third-degree heart block, junctional tachycardia, atrial tachycardia with block, ventricular tachycardia, sinoatrial block, and sinus arrest.

chinese.chinese: 心律失常可由于起搏细胞或传导组织(或两者)的血液供应异常导致心脏受损(如心肌梗死)所引起。
chinese.english: Cardiac dysrhythmias may be caused by a damaged heart (e.g. myocardial infarction) resulting from an abnormality in blood supply to pacemaker cells or conducting tissues, or both.

chinese.chinese: 在窦房结，电冲动产生有规律间隔的心脏收缩，其频率为每秒钟一次。
chinese.english: At the sinoatrial (SA) node, electrical impulses generate a cardiac contraction at regular intervals and with a frequency of one beat per second.

chinese.chinese: 心律失常偏离上述模式是由于下列异常情况引起：①冲动产生的异常，或②冲动传导的异常，于是在心脏的特殊传导组织中某部位，正常冲动的传导速率就被减慢。
chinese.english: Dysrhythmias deviate from the above and result from abnormalities either in ① impulse generation or in ② impulse conduction, whereby the normal impulse conduction rate is slowed somewhere in the specialized conducting system of the heart.

chinese.chinese: 这种失调常发生在房室结或希氏束(心脏阻滞)或两者兼有，但也并非总是如此。
chinese.english: This disturbance is frequently, but not always, found in the AV node or in the bundles of His (heart block), or both.

chinese.chinese: 同样，增加心脏传导速率的药物，能有助于减轻心脏阻滞；而减慢心脏传导速率的药物可减慢快速的心率。
chinese.english: Similarly, drugs that increase conduction velocity in the heart can help to alleviate heart block, while those that decrease conduction velocity may slow a rapid heart rate.

chinese.chinese: 现今，外科医师使用各种各样的器械,从已用了几个世纪的最简单的刀()到各种复杂的装备(如心肺机)。
chinese.english: Today the surgeon makes use of a variety of instruments ranging from the simple knife (scalpel) used for centuries to complex devices, such as the heart-lung machine.

chinese.chinese: ：是用来切割组织的外科刀。
chinese.english: Scalpel: Scalpels are surgical knives used to cut tissue.

chinese.chinese: 住院治疗时间为期2周。常规治疗包括每周3次在局部麻醉下使用清创用。蛆虫清创术治疗是使用含80个无菌蛆的封闭的敷料（Vitapad, BioMonde实验室）。出院时才用常规的换药方式，并在第30天对患者随访。
chinese.english: Treatment was administered during a 2-week hospital stay. Conventional treatment consisted of surgical debridement 3 times a week with a scalpel, with use of topical anesthesia. The MDT was administered using an enclosed dressing (Vitapad, BioMonde Laboratories) containing 80 sterile maggots. At discharge, a conventional dressing was applied, and patients were followed-up at day 30.

chinese.chinese: 来自Urology杂志的报道：No-needle麻醉能有效控制接受无输精管切除术患者的疼痛（一种流行的术式，包含一微小的穿刺，代替了切开）。
chinese.english: A no-needle anesthetic method is an effective means of pain control for men undergoing no-scalpel vasectomy, a popular type of vasectomy that involves a small puncture of the skin rather than an incision, according to a report in the journal Urology.

chinese.chinese: Rosenthal在结尾时表达了比较悲观的想法，对所有这些努力表示疑问。她写道：以这两个主要目的作为改革的目标， 控制费用和分流钱从较强的工作到相对并不是很强的工作中—比如从内镜和医生到初级医疗人员，—即使计划很完善，也将会有很大的抵触。
chinese.english: Rosenthal closes with a rather gloomy thought that puts the whole endeavor in doubt. She writes: Given that the two major goals of reform are to constrain spending growth and to move money from more intensive to less intensive settings — from doctors who carry endoscopes and scalpels to primary care physicians, for example — there will be substantial resistance to even the best-designed plans.

chinese.chinese: 它可抑制整个心脏的传导速率，但对房室结的作用既弱于奎尼丁也不及普鲁卡因胺。
chinese.english: It depresses conduction velocity throughout the heart but has less effect at the AV node than does either quinidine or procainamide.

chinese.chinese: 它对心脏没有迷走效应。
chinese.english: It does not have a vagolytic effect in the heart.

chinese.chinese: 本药是一种强效的心脏抑制剂，直接影响收缩性、心输出量和心率。
chinese.english: This agent is a potent cardiac depressant, directly affecting contractility, cardiac output, and heart rate.

chinese.chinese: 对严重心动过缓、心脏阻滞及心脏停搏病人，可用肾上腺素和异丙肾上腺素（β-肾上腺素能激动剂)处理。
chinese.english: Epinephrine and isoproterenol (beta-adrenergic stimulants) may be used in severe bradycardia, heart block and cardiac arrest.

chinese.chinese: 此外，对窦性心动过缓和心脏阻滞可用阿托品(抗胆碱药)。
chinese.english: In addition, atropine (a cholinergic blocking agent) is used in sinus bradycardia and heart block.

chinese.chinese: 本类药不能用于伴有心脏贮备能力降低的水肿状态，因为是时任何细胞外液增加都是有害的。
chinese.english: They should not be used in edematous states associated with diminished cardiac reserve, since any increase in extracellular fluid volume constitutes a hazard.

chinese.chinese: 心脏对氧的需要
chinese.english: Oxygen Demand of the Heart

chinese.chinese: 心脏通过心输出量的调节，经常为组织提供足够的氧，以避免缺氧。
chinese.english: By adjustment of cardiac output, the heart constantly attempts to provide sufficient oxygen to the tissue to prevent hypoxia.

chinese.chinese: WHO下辖IARC今天宣布将紫外线日光浴床列入它们的高致癌风险目录--对人类有致癌作用
chinese.english: The World Health Organization's International Agency for Research on Cancer (IARC) announced today that it has moved UV tanning beds to its highest cancer risk category -- "carcinogenic to humans."

chinese.chinese: 今天发表的研究可能成为 JCVI之前研究的突破。 2007年，该团队发表了将原生丝状支原体的基因组植入山羊支原体细胞的试验结果。结果显示山羊支原体细胞改造成丝状支原体。这项工作首次明确一个概念，即，DNA是生命的软件，是DNA决定着细胞表型。
chinese.english: The research published today was made possible by previous breakthroughs at JCVI. In 2007 the team published results from the transplantation of the native M. mycoides genome into the M. capricolum cell which resulted in the M. capricolum cell being transformed into M. mycoides. This work established the notion that DNA is the software of life and that it is the DNA that dictates the cell phenotype.

chinese.chinese: 今天，动脉系统的状态仍然通过血压计测定血压进行评估。但这些不能确定系统的生物学年龄，仅仅是心脏的收容压和舒张压。
chinese.english: The state of the arterial system, to date, has been evaluated through blood pressure measurement using the traditional armband. But this does not enable one to identify the biological age of the system, only the systolic and diastolic pressures.

chinese.chinese: 美国国家健康研究所已经启动了“敲除老鼠计划”（KOMP）,这是一项工作量巨大的研究，期望能够敲除掉老鼠基因组中超过三分之一的基因。今天，研究所指定了四个研究中心，它们获得了为期5年总额共计5000万美元的资助来创建突变细胞系和老鼠，期望能够提供给研究者针对任何疾病的突变小鼠或任何他们想要研究的发育相关基因。
chinese.english: The National Institutes of Health (NIH) has kicked off its Knockout Mouse Project (KOMP), a massive effort to delete over a third of the genes in the mouse genome. Today, the institute named four centers that together will receive nearly $50 million over 5 years to create mutant cell lines and mice. The resource is expected to provide researchers with a mouse mutant for whatever disease or development gene they want to study.

chinese.chinese: 该结果发表在今天脑期刊的在线电子版上，结果表明经过音乐训练的儿童的大脑与未经训练儿童相比，不仅其大脑对于音乐的反应方式不同，而且这种训练可以有效提高他们的记忆能力。经过一年音乐训练之后，有训练者在包括识字、口述记忆、视觉空间处理、算术以及智商测试等与一般智能技巧相关的测试当中具有更出色的表现。
chinese.english: The findings, published today (20 September 2006) in the online edition of the journal Brain, show that not only do the brains of musically-trained children respond to music in a different way to those of the untrained children, but also that the training improves their memory as well. After one year the musically trained children performed better in a memory test that is correlated with general intelligence skills such as literacy, verbal memory, visiospatial processing, mathematics and IQ.

chinese.chinese: 美国心律协会今天出版最终建议，为心脏病患者们的复苏过程以及起博器和可植入除颤复律器(ICDs)提供更清楚的，更及时且更一致的信息，。该建议也对内科医师，FDA的官员们、众议院议员们和植入性心脏装置的咨询者们提供了明确的指引。另外，该建议也提及了装置操作的国际原则。
chinese.english: The Heart Rhythm Society today issued final recommendations to provide heart patients with clearer, timelier and more consistent information about the recall process and the performance of pacemakers and implantable cardioverter defibrillators (ICDs). The recommendations also offer specific guidance to physicians, Food and Drug Administration (FDA) officials and members of Congress about performance issues and advisories for implantable cardiac devices. In addition, the final recommendations report also addresses international principles related to device performance.

chinese.chinese: 以Matthias von Herrath医学博士为首的研究组在今天刊发的《实验医学杂志》在线版本上以论文“阻断白介素-10受体之后慢性病毒感染的消退”的形式宣布了他们的发现。Scripps研究所Michael Oldstone带领实施的另一项研究产生了相似结果，星期天发表在一科学杂志上。
chinese.english: The research team, led by Matthias von Herrath, M.D., announced its finding in a paper, "Resolution of a Chronic Viral Infection Following IL-10 Receptor Blockade," published today in the online version of the Journal of Experimental Medicine. A separate study, led by Michael Oldstone from the Scripps Research Institute, produced similar results and was published Sunday in a science journal.

chinese.chinese: La Jolla 敏感症与免疫学研究所(LIAI)的研究者今天宣布了一项可以为治疗丙肝和其他慢性感染提供了新方法的重大发现。研究组使用鼠对照实验研究，通过阻断免疫系统一关键信号分子，可以消除试验组动物的慢性病毒感染。这一发现与可以引发肝脏疾病和肝癌的丙型肝炎有特定的相关性，可能也适用于艾滋病、巨细胞病毒和其他慢性病毒感染。
chinese.english: A major finding that could lead to a new approach for treating hepatitis C and other chronic virus infections was announced today by researchers at the La Jolla Institute for Allergy & Immunology (LIAI). The research team, using controlled laboratory studies of mice, was able to eliminate a chronic virus infection in the animals by blocking a key messenger molecule in the immune system. The finding has particular relevance for hepatitis C, a viral illness which can cause liver disease and cancer, but may also be applicable to AIDS, cytomegalovirus and other chronic virus infections.

chinese.chinese: 位于美国明尼苏达州Bloomington 的MGI医药公司在今天的一个申明中宣布，美国FDA发布了对这个申请叫做saforis的口服药物的可批准文件中表达了这样的要求，FDA要求该公司进行一些新的临床试验对其药效作进一步评价
chinese.english: The Food and Drug Administration made the request on the medicine, called Saforis, in a so-called approvable letter, Bloomington, Minnesota-based MGI Pharma said today in a statement. The FDA wants a new trial to evaluate effectiveness of the drug, the company said.

chinese.chinese: 今天，政府还通过一系列电视、电影广告开始了首次全国性饮酒知识教育活动。
chinese.english: The Government also began the first national alcohol awareness campaign today with a series of television and cinema advertisements.

chinese.chinese: 牙买加第一项HIV疫苗临床试验已经开始,有24位志愿者参与其中,这项试验要测试一种试验中的疫苗。从今天开始,Gleaner周日版将登载参与这项试验志愿者的日记。卫生部流行病与艾滋病主管Peter Figueroa博士说,参与者不可能通过试验疫苗感染HIV病毒或是产生艾滋病。“我必须强调不可能通过试验疫苗感染HIV病毒或是产生艾滋病,因为疫苗不是来源于活的HIV病毒、灭活的或者是减毒的HIV病毒，也并非来自于感染细胞。”他谈到。
chinese.english: The first HIV vaccine trial in Jamaica has begun with 24 persons who have volunteered to be tested from an experimental vaccine. Beginning today, The Sunday Gleaner will carry a diary of persons participating in the study. Dr. Peter Figueroa, chief of epidemiology and AIDS at the Ministry of Health, said it was not possible for persons to contract HIV or develop AIDS from the experimental vaccine. "I must stress that it is not possible to get HIV infection or develop AIDS from experimental vaccinesbecause they are not made from live HIV, killed HIV (or) weakened HIV or infected cells," he stated.

chinese.chinese: 今天发表的一项新研究称，哺乳动物细胞核是由按模式排列的各组成部分构成的，而这种排列模式是可以根据统计学预知的。科学家希望这一发现，即细胞核内部并非随机排列，将使我们更深刻地理解细胞的工作机制，可能最终使我们对疾病（比如癌症）中它们失能的机制更加了解。
chinese.english: The nucleus of a mammal cell is made up of component parts arranged in a pattern which can be predicted statistically, says new research published today. Scientists hope this discovery that parts of the inside of a cell nucleus are not arranged at random will give greater insight into how cells work and could eventually lead to a greater understanding of how they become dysfunctional in diseases like cancer.

chinese.chinese: 非裔美国女性面临着乳腺癌致死的巨大危险，部分原因是由于相比于白人女性，她们诊断出乳腺癌已经是比较晚期。“癌症”今天的网络版出版的新发现表明，通过一项延伸至社区的教育项目给病人引导者，由他们来劝告或引导已经确诊的病人，来减少乳腺癌诊断期别的差异。
chinese.english: African American women face a greater risk of death from breast cancer, in part because they tend to be diagnosed at later stages of the disease than white women. New findings published online today in Cancer suggest that this disparity in stage of diagnosis can be reduced, using a program that pairs educational outreach to the community with patient navigators who advise and guide diagnosed patients.

chinese.chinese: 罗氏今天称，投资南旧金山 ,加州Genentech公司股票的投资人，每股将折合89美元，比7月18日的收盘价高出8.8％。巴塞尔的该瑞士公司已经取得Genentech公司 56％的股份。
chinese.english: Investors in South San Francisco, California-based Genentech would get $89 a share in cash, 8.8 percent more than the July 18 closing price, Roche said today. The Basel, Switzerland-based company already owns 56 percent of Genentech.

chinese.chinese: 今天Genentech股票的交易价超过92美元，这说明有些人期待更好的收购价。但是罗氏能给出多高的价呢？可能不会太高。考虑到罗氏之前收购了Genentech约56％的股份，所以罗氏不会给其他公司出高价的机会。这意味着不可能出现近期其他生物技术并购案中的竞标抬价现象。
chinese.english: Genentech shares have traded above $92 today, an indication that some expect a sweeter deal. But how much higher would Roche go? Maybe not that much. Under the terms of Roche's earlier acquisition of about 56% of Genentech, Roche can keep other companies from swooping in with higher offers. That means a bidding war of the sort that's driven up other recent biotech acquisitions isn't likely.

chinese.chinese: 他必须在同一时间内考虑诸多的问题，不仅要考虑各种诊断的可能性，而且还要考虑预后的问题，还有给病人说些什么，又该如何去讲的问题，怎样帮助病人尽可能感到舒适，选择哪些室检查项目和治疗措施，以及如何向病人解释交代清楚等等。
chinese.english: The physician must be thinking of many different elements at once, not only the diagnostic possibilities but also the prognostic implications, how and what to communicate to the patient, how to help the patient feel as comfortable as possible, which laboratory tests and therapy to choose, and how to explain them clearly to the patient.

chinese.chinese: 三种粒细胞命名源于它们在室检验时所摄取的染料颜色。
chinese.english: The three types of granulocytes are named for the types of dye they take up in laboratory tests.

chinese.chinese: 诊断贫血的主要室检查有平均红细胞体积(MCV)和平均红细胞的血红蛋白浓度(MCHC)。
chinese.english: Key tests in diagnosing anemia are MCV (mean corpuscular volume) and MCHC (mean corpuscular hemoglobin concentration).

chinese.chinese: 外周血细胞计数异常常是急性白血病最初室检查的结果。
chinese.english: Abnormalities of peripheral blood counts are usually the initial laboratory evidence of acute leukemia.

chinese.chinese: 将取得的细胞在室里培养，进行检测以寻找有无生化方面疾病。
chinese.english: The cells are grown in the laboratory and tested for biochemical disorders.

chinese.chinese: 常规室检查常可提供基因缺陷的诊断依据。
chinese.english: Conventional laboratory tests often provide helpful diagnostic information to complete the genetic diagnosis.

chinese.chinese: 查体和室检查符合拟诊遗传疾病，比如杜兴肌营养不良；绘制出的家谱又能清楚显示X连锁遗传规律；则遗传模式建立就十分容易了。
chinese.english: When the physical examination and laboratory studies are typical of a recognized genetic condition such as Duchenne muscular dystrophy and the pedigree demonstrates a clear pattern of X-linked inheritance, developing the genetic model is straightforward.

chinese.chinese: 根据各人具体情况制定治疗方案，水溶性普鲁卡因青霉素G(至少每日4.0×106IU)至少应用3～5d并同时服用丙磺舒，或大观霉素直到临床和室各种表现消失。
chinese.english: The treatment is established on an individual basis and should be for at least 3~5 days with aqueous penicillin G procaine (at least 4×l0s IU daily) with simultaneous probenecid, or with spectinomycin until clinical and laboratory manifestations have disappeared.

chinese.chinese: 要肯定地证明沙眼衣原体的存在应在专门室里对麦克柯伊细胞上进行微生物培养，并且应用碘或姬姆萨染色或荧光标记的单克隆抗体进行鉴定。
chinese.english: Definite proof of Chlamydia trachomatis is based on culture of the organisms on McCoy's cells in specialized laboratories and identification using iodine or Giemsa stain or fluorescence-labeled monoclonal antibodies.

chinese.chinese: 由于尚不清楚莱特尔病的特别临床表现或室表现，一般的临床特征具有决定性。
chinese.english: Because specific clinical or laboratory findings of Reiter's disease are unknown, the general clinical features are decisive.

chinese.chinese: 在Callen系列室检查中，该型LE的异常比局限性DLE更为常见，例如沉降率加快、抗核抗体升高和白细胞减少。
chinese.english: In Callen's series, laboratory abnormalities such as an elevated sedimentation rate, elevated antinuclear antibodies, or leucopenia were more common with this form of LE than with localized DLE.

chinese.chinese: 发热可以是SLE的信号，但室试验(ANA升高、白细胞减少、血尿或蛋白尿)是更为敏感的指征。
chinese.english: Fever may signal its occurrence, but laboratory tests (elevation of ANA, leucopenia, hematuria, or albuminuria) are a more sensitive indicator.

chinese.chinese: 如果没有发现室异常，则说明应消除疑虑，如果存在2或3项标准，每隔一定时间应仔细再予评价，给予休息、阿斯匹林或苯海拉明并严密观察。
chinese.english: If no abnormalities are found, reassurance is advised; if two or three criteria are present, careful reevaluation should be carried out at regular intervals, with rest, aspirin, perhaps diphenhydramine, and close observation.

chinese.chinese: 临床与室评价
chinese.english: Clinical and Laboratory Evaluation

chinese.chinese: 除了准确的病史和体检外，需要室检查以明确代谢性昏迷的诊断。
chinese.english: In addition to an accurate history and physical examination, laboratory investigations are required to establish a diagnosis of metabolic coma.

chinese.chinese: 如果心脏的某一部分长期缺氧，就会形成坏死并发生心肌梗死。
chinese.english: If the deficient supply of oxygen to a portion of the heart is permanent, necrosis will develop and myocardial infarction occurs.

chinese.chinese: 造成心脏需氧量增加的因素有：心率、心肌收缩状态和室壁的张力。
chinese.english: The factors that increase the oxygen demand of the heart are heart rate, contractile state, and wall tension.

chinese.chinese: 心脏体积越大，收缩时需氧量越多。
chinese.english: The larger the heart is, the more oxygen is required for its contraction.

chinese.chinese: 硝酸盐和亚硝酸盐的作用机制可用它们能舒张血管平滑肌，从而降低心脏的前负荷和后负荷来解释。
chinese.english: The mechanism of therapeutic actions of nitrates and nitrites may be explained by their ability to relax vascular smooth muscle and consequently reduce cardiac preload and after-load.

chinese.chinese: 心脏的血流动力学：这类药使动脉扩张，从而使血压下降，心脏做功减少。
chinese.english: Cardiac Hemodynamics: These agents cause arterial dilatation, reducing blood pressure and the work of the heart.

chinese.chinese: 这些作用的结果使心脏做功减少。
chinese.english: The consequence of these events is a reduction in the work of the heart.

chinese.chinese: 故净效应是心脏做功减少。
chinese.english: The net effect is a reduction in the work of the heart.

chinese.chinese: 通过这些途径，其有效成分被吸收入静脉循环，通过腔静脉到达心脏、主动脉和冠状动脉。
chinese.english: By these routes of administration the active ingredient is absorbed into the venous circulation, and by way of the vena cava it reaches the heart, aorta, and coronary arteries.

chinese.chinese: 硝苯吡啶通过其负性肌力降低心脏后负荷和扩张冠状动脉作用，而使心肌耗氧量降低。
chinese.english: By its negative inotropic effect, by reducing afterload, and by dilating coronary arteries, nifedipine decreases oxygen consumption.

chinese.chinese: 普萘洛尔通过阻断心脏的β-受体，可降低血压、心肌收缩力、心输出量和心肌耗氧量。
chinese.english: By causing blockade of beta receptors in the heart, propranolol reduces blood pressure, cardiac contractility, cardiac output, and oxygen consumption.

chinese.chinese: 应该指出：普萘洛尔是一种心脏抑制剂，使用不当会引起充血性心力衰竭。
chinese.english: It should be recalled that propranolol is a cardiac depressant, and its injudicious use may lead to congestive heart failure.

chinese.chinese: 去甲肾上腺素与心脏肾上腺素能受体结合，通过激活腺苷酸环化酶，使cAMP形成增加，从而增加钙内流。
chinese.english: The interaction of norepinephrine with a cardiac adrenergic receptor site may increase Ca2+ influx by activation of adenylate cyclase, enhancing the formation of cyclic AMP.

chinese.chinese: 同样，前列腺素F2α与心脏(正性肌力作用)、子宫(收缩)和肺(支气管收缩)的前列腺素受体结合也可导致cAMP介导的钙内流。
chinese.english: Similarly, the interaction of prostaglandin F2α with receptor sites in the heart (positive inotropic effect), uterus contraction), and lung (bronchoconstriction) may involve cyclic AMP-mediated Ca2+ influx.

chinese.chinese: 据报道，在心脏、肌纤膜和平滑肌膜上存在有钙泵ATP酶。
chinese.english: A Ca2+ pumping ATPase has been reported in the heart, the sarcolemma, and the membrane of smooth muscle.

chinese.chinese: (1)保护风湿热病人的心脏。
chinese.english: (1) To protect the heart in rheumatic patients.

chinese.chinese: 训练技巧的不同可能会加重膝关节劳损。如女性运动员，跑步较男性运动员更加采取直立位，以便更强的收缩股四头肌，这样的收缩强度同样增加韧带的压力。
chinese.english: Differences in training techniques may add to the problem. For example, female athletes, who run in a more upright position than men, tend to strongly contract their quadriceps, which also increases stress on their ligaments.

chinese.chinese: Shakur 博士说：“医学生涯提供一个对什么观点对当学生离开医学院和在毕业后的头几年期望什么最实用的独立的视点和全景式的调查。”
chinese.english: “A Career in Medicine offers an independent, focused and thoroughly researched outlook into what options are available to students when leaving medical school and what to expect in the first few years after graduating,” Dr Shakur said.

chinese.chinese: “上述研究显示，在创伤明显前10到20天，皮温会增加．” Xilas医学院的头Don Lawson 告诉路透社健康部．这提供了一种方法，就是测量可以被用来减少炎症
chinese.english: "Previous research has shown that skin temperature increases 10 to 20 days before a wound becomes apparent," Don Lawson, CEO of Xilas Medical, told Reuters Health. This provides a "window" during which measures can be taken to reduce the inflammation.

chinese.chinese: 对同一问题进行的另一项研究中，在鹿特丹的Erasmus医学中心的J.N. Belo领导下，荷兰发表了一个对37项研究的综述．那些研究是截至到2003年12月，测定的是关于膝骨关节炎进展的前瞻性因素．和Felson研究的案例一样，他们发现三个研究显示规律锻炼与膝骨关节炎发生之间没有有力证据证明的联系；其它研究发现与性别，膝疼痛，股四头肌力量和膝关节损伤之间也没有联系．另一方面，广泛骨关节节炎的存在和透明质酸酶（在关节内的一种蛋白）浓度是疾病进展的先兆．
chinese.english: In another study in the same issue, researchers led by J.N. Belo of Erasmus Medical Center in Rotterdam, Netherlands published an overview of 37 studies appearing up to December 2003 to determine predictive factors of the progression of knee OA. As was the case with the Felson study, they found three studies showing no strong evidence that regular exercise was related to progression of knee OA; Other studies found that sex, knee pain, quadriceps strength and knee injury were also not associated with progression of knee OA. On the other hand, the presence of generalized OA and the level of hyaluronic acid (a protein found in joints) were predictive of progression of the disease.

chinese.chinese: 这一报告发表在一月份的《耳鼻喉科学文献：头颈外科学》期刊上。Gillespie博士及其同事鉴定了325位头颈鳞状细胞癌患者。他们比较了死亡、复发以及没有复发的生存患者使用COX抑制剂的情况。
chinese.english: For the study, reported in the January issue of the Archives of Otolaryngology--Head and Neck Surgery, Dr. Gillespie and colleagues identified 325 head and neck squamous cell carcinoma patients. They compared the rate of COX inhibitor use among patients who had died or whose disease had recurred with that among survivors or those without recurrence.

chinese.chinese: 同时它也建议在奶粉喂养存在问题的国家，母亲在头6个月母乳喂养，同时避免喂其它液体或固体食物。研究表明只是母乳喂养而不提供水和固体食物的孩子比那些间断性母乳喂养的孩子更健康。
chinese.english: However, it also recommended that in countries where bottle-feeding is problematic, mothers breast-feed their children for the first six months -- but do so exclusively, allowing no other fluid or solid food. Studies show that when a mother breast-feeds her child without offering water or any solid food, the children are healthier than those who are breast-fed intermittently.

chinese.chinese: 布伊诺斯艾利丝路透新闻   周二称，他们一身以创建了4头经过克隆的，基因改变的牛，有能力生产含胰岛素的牛奶，可降低糖尿病的治疗成本
chinese.english: BUENOS AIRES (Reuters) - Argentine scientists said on Tuesday they had created four cloned and genetically modified calves capable of producing human insulin in their milk, a step they said could cut the cost of treating diabetes.

chinese.chinese: 在这些患者中，手术气道管理可能是必需的，不稳定颈椎损伤不是禁忌症，但是插管时颈椎必须保持严格的、呈线性固定。助手应该站在床旁一侧托住患者的头、颈，使患者双肩保持自然体位。敞开或去掉患者颈部衣领口，保持患者口腔全部张开。
chinese.english: In these cases, surgical airway management may be necessary. Unstable cervical spine injury is not a contraindication, but strict, in-line stabilization of the cervical spine must be maintained during intubation. An assistant should stand at the side of the bed and hold the patient's head, neck, and shoulders in an anatomically neutral position. The anterior portion of the cervical collar is opened or removed to permit the patient's mouth to be fully opened.

chinese.chinese: 但是样品药也非一无是处。医生通过这些药了解患者是否能够耐受新的药物，以免盲目购买1月的疗程。有些医生手头备些样的药给穷人和没有保险的患者。
chinese.english: But there's an upside to the samples. Using samples, a doctor can see if a patient can tolerate a new medication before the patient goes out and buys a 30-day supply. Physicians who treat poor people like to have samples on hand for them, and for uninsured patients.

chinese.chinese: 传染病科医生：当你接受诊治时，你会因我为你花费额外时间而觉得高兴，那是因为你的问题对我来说是紧急的。如果我给你安排了30分钟的预约，而实际上已经过了45分钟，你会喜欢这种变动。这种情况每天都会发生，因为有些患者比预期的更严重。在理发店，他们知道每理一个头需要多少时间，而且他们能粗略的估计时间。在餐馆，他们知道人们用餐时间大概为90分钟。但是对于一个医生，出现一个意外就会花去一个小时。
chinese.english: Dr. Virus: When you're in the room, you're happy I'm spending extra time with you, because your problem is urgent to you. If I scheduled you for a 30-minute appointment and it goes on for 45 minutes, you will like the interaction a lot. That happens every day, because someone shows up sicker than expected. At the barbershop, they know that every haircut takes X number of minutes, and they can roughly gauge the time. At the restaurant, they know 90 minutes, it's a rough estimate. But at the doctor, one unexpected problem and you're an hour behind.

chinese.chinese: 妇产科医生：我认识一位进行难度很高结肠镜检查的患者，医生说，“我们要留你在医院观察一晚。”于是当她上厕所时，发现直肠突然出血，一直出血，她吓的要死，慌忙离开厕所。她不停的按警报器，但结果是当时正值凌晨三点，整个楼层只有一名护士，而护士正在另一头发放药品。护士室没有人听到警报声。当患者在医院住上十或十五天后，大部分会逐渐康复，护士也就可以集中精力在三四名急症治疗的患者身上。可现在他们都是急症。如果让我给患者提一条非常关键的忠告――我会告诉他们，如果你需要住院，那么带一名家庭成员作陪护。最好有个人坐在那儿陪你，帮你取度冷丁，当你在浴室跌倒时帮助你，因为护士要发放药品，而且她要照顾十个患者，她要给患者静注。
chinese.english: Dr. Baby: I know one patient who had a very difficult colonoscopy and they said, “We're going to keep you in the hospital overnight, just for observation.” So she's sitting on the toilet and all of a sudden blood is falling out of her rectum and she's bleeding and bleeding and she's scared to death to get off the toilet. She's ringing and ringing and ringing the buzzer and, turns out, it was three in the morning, there's only one nurse for the whole floor, and she was on the other end dispensing medication. No one was at the nurse's station to hear the buzzing. When patients stayed in the hospital ten or fifteen days, most of them were still convalescing and a nurse could focus on her three or four acute-care patients. Now they're all acute. If I were to give patients a very critical piece of advice—if you're coming to the hospital, bring a family member. You know you gotta bring someone who will sit with you and go get your Demerol for you and help if you fall in the

chinese.chinese: 伴有糖尿病肾病的患者在头3年SMR增加(P = 0.045)并在第二、三和四年高于非糖尿病组(P < 0.05)。
chinese.english: In patients with diabetic nephropathy (DN), SMR increased during the first 3 yr (P = 0.045) and were higher than in patients without DN in the second, third, and fourth years (P < 0.05).

chinese.chinese: 方法：从2002年1月至2005年12月选取56例患者（中位年龄为7岁）行隐匿阴茎的手术治疗，11例(中位年龄为5岁)为蹼状阴茎，20例（中位年龄为8岁）为包裹阴茎。所有20例中，包裹阴茎患者既往曾因包茎行包皮环切术，除了3例（1例因多次手术的淋巴管瘤，1例行尿道下裂修补，1例行阴茎头的尿道上裂纠正）。所有蹼状阴茎患者都为包茎要求行环切术。手术技术程序由阴茎体的外置，阴茎耻骨角以及阴茎阴囊角的重建。而沿阴囊缝而不行阴茎皮肤切开的这些做法被证明是相当直接的径路。
chinese.english: From January 2002 to December 2005, 56 patients (median age 7 years) underwent surgery for a buried penis, 11 (median age 5 years) for a webbed penis, and 20 (median age 8 years) for a trapped penis. All 20 patients with a trapped penis had previously undergone circumcision for phimosis, except for 3 (1 for multioperated lymphangioma, 1 for repaired hypospadias, and 1 for corrected glanular epispadia). All webbed penises were phimotic, requiring circumcision. The surgical technique consisted of complete exteriorization of the shaft and reconstruction of the penopubic and penoscrotal angles. These maneuvers, however, proved extremely straightforward, with the addition of an incision along the scrotal raphe without any incision of the penile skin.

chinese.chinese: 十亿美元的干细胞研究所四十万年薪居然还找不头
chinese.english: Members of the agency's board “hope the move will ease concerns of drift,” Wired reports.

chinese.chinese: 在2003年的欧洲热浪中，8月的头两个星期死亡人数比预期的大约多出35000人。仅在法国，当气温彪升的时候就有15000例额外死亡。专家说，大多是由于极度炎热而使中老年人的心脏病恶化导致的。
chinese.english: During the European heat wave in 2003, there were an estimated 35,000 deaths above expected levels in the first two weeks of August. In France alone, nearly 15,000 extra people died when temperatures soared. Experts say much of that was due to heart problems in the elderly worsened by the extreme heat.

chinese.chinese: 试问今天儿童肥胖症的流行将会如何影响未来美国人的健康？考虑到儿童的健康成长连同他们的腰围，医学专家担心儿童肥胖症的流行将会导致大量年轻人出现2型糖尿病，并由此引发美国未来几代人的严重和持久的并发症。
chinese.english: How will the epidemic of childhood obesity today affect the future health of Americans? As concern about children's health grows along with their waistlines, medical experts fear that the childhood obesity epidemic could lead to large numbers of younger adults developing type 2 diabetes, causing serious and lasting health complications for future generations of Americans.

chinese.chinese: 就像去年这篇华尔街日报中文章的解释，当销售给非医保病人时，药房经常明显抬高仿制药的价格。同样如今天华尔街日报的报道，当医保病人购买仿制药时，药房的利润经理能分享其中很大一部分。
chinese.english: As this WSJ article from last year explains, pharmacies often significantly mark up the prices of generics when they sell them to the uninsured. And as the WSJ reports today, pharmacy benefits managers are keeping a big share for themselves when the insured buy generics.

chinese.chinese: 今天Cell杂志在网上发表的一篇研究报告指出：服用4个星期药物Aicar的小鼠的赛跑耐力提高了44%，纵使此期间这些小鼠根本就没有进行过任何锻炼。
chinese.english: In a study published online today by Cell, mice who were given a drug called Aicar for four weeks improved their running endurance by 44% — even though the mice didn't exercise at all during the period.

chinese.chinese: 在今天出版的肿瘤研究杂志刊登的一篇论文中德国乌尔姆大学的研究人员报道实验显示美沙酮可杀死白血病细胞而不损伤健康血细胞。美沙酮甚至对放、化疗抵抗的白血病细胞也有杀伤作用。
chinese.english: Laboratory tests show that methadone kills leukemia cells without harming healthy blood cells, researchers at the University of Ulm in Germany report in a paper published today in the journal Cancer Research. Methadone was even effective in killing leukemia cells resistant to killing by chemotherapy and radiation.

chinese.chinese: 先令-普劳公司（纽交所：SGP）今天发表声明，美国FDA已对sugammadex sodium注射液下发“不批准”函，sugammadex sodium用于逆转全麻状态下的肌肉松弛。
chinese.english: KENILWORTH, N.J., Aug. 1 /PRNewswire-FirstCall/ -- Schering-Plough Corporation (NYSE: SGP) today announced that the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has issued a "not-approvable" letter for sugammadex sodium injection for the reversal of muscle relaxation during general anesthesia.

chinese.chinese: CDC的申明上这样写道：“今天，典型的郊区房屋坐落在路的尽头，周围没有多少公路，城市分区法律鼓励居住区与学校和商场分开，它们之间通常相隔许多很长的危险的距离。小学校的自行车道通常是空的，因为家长们担心孩子们在这么狭窄的交通道路上的行驶安全。步行由于要穿过许多社区危险的十字路口也变得有风险，尽管所有的人行横道都很安全但是社区里通常没有。”
chinese.english: “Today, typical suburban homes sit in cul-de-sac subdivisions that empty out onto high volume roads,” it reads. “Zoning laws encourage the separation of residential areas from schools and shopping malls by long and often dangerous travel distances. Elementary school bicycle racks stand empty as parents fear for their children's safety on narrow or traffic-laden roads. (And) pedestrians take risks as they cross dangerous intersections in communities where safe crosswalks are all but nonexistent,” the CDC statement reads.

chinese.chinese: 今天具有代表性的都是在青少年诊断为高胆固醇水平或其他危险因素或者并发症时才采取措施。然而，50岁成年人开始降胆固醇，即使成功了，也很难逆转已建立的动脉疾病，因此影响发生与冠心病相关的不良事件。
chinese.english: Interventions today typically begin in adults diagnosed with high cholesterol levels or other risk factors or symptoms of coronary artery disease. However, initiating cholesterol-lowering interventions in 50-year-old adults, even if successful, is unlikely to reverse established arterial disease and will therefore have limited impact on the occurrence of adverse events related to coronary heart disease.

chinese.chinese: 根据Steinberg，已经有用降低胆固醇药如他汀类药物来治疗冠脉病的进展。但是用他汀类药物治疗心脏病可以减少30％的死亡，而70％的患者仍然有心血管事件的发生。一种新的有前途的治疗方法正在逐步形成，在美国冠心病仍然令人担忧的今天，减少其流行性也就很有必要了。
chinese.english: According to Steinberg, progress has been made in the treatment of coronary heart disease in adults with cholesterol lowering drugs like statins. However, while studies show a 30% decrease in death and disability from heart disease in patients treated with statins, 70% of patients have cardiac events while on statin therapy. Promising new therapies are under development, but with an alarming rate of coronary heart disease in the U.S. today, action to curtail the epidemic is needed today.

chinese.chinese: 和宫颈癌一样，肝癌在发展中国家比发达国家更广泛流行．在全球疫苗免疫联盟（GAVI）组织的支持下，越来越多资源有限的国家已将乙肝疫苗作为常规免疫项目．全球这些国家的数目已从1992年的31个增加到今天的约170个．这显然是一个进步．
chinese.english: Like cervical cancer, liver cancer is far more prevalent in the developing world than in wealthy countries. With support from the GAVI Alliance, more and more countries with limited resources are introducing hepatitis B vaccine into routine immunization programmes. Globally, the number of countries with such programmes has grown from 31 in 1992 to nearly 170 today. This is progress.

chinese.chinese: 就在今天，FDA组织了听证会讨论这一话题。据美联社报道，FDA食品添加剂安全办公室主任Laura Tarantino 在会上说：“刻不容缓，我们的临时性结论是它是安全的，因此我们不建议有所改变”。与此同时，Sen. Chuck Grassley今天也给FDA写了一封信，要求提供更多的信息解释他们何以得出该结论，这与其他专家依靠证据得出的评价结果大相径庭。
chinese.english: Just today, the FDA held a hearing to discuss the issue. “Right now, our tentative conclusion is that it's safe, so we're not recommending any change in habits,” Laura Tarantino, head of the FDA's office of food additive safety said at the meeting, the Associated Press reports. Meanwhile, Sen. Chuck Grassley wrote a letter to FDA today asking them for more info about how they came to that conclusion, which is at odds with the assessments of other experts who've looked at the evidence.

chinese.chinese: 对在中国生产的婴儿的奶制品所用的牛奶受到污染的报道作出回应，今天美国食品及药品监督局(FDA)发布健康咨询信息。这就向美国公众保证，由美国的公司生产的婴儿奶制品没有污染的威胁，这些公司符合美国销售奶制品的要求。尽管没有一个中国奶制品生产商符合在美国销售奶制品的要求，但是FDA的官员还是在调查，是否有中国生产的婴儿奶制品在一些亚裔人社区里特制品市场里销售。
chinese.english: In response to reports of contaminated milk-based infant formula manufactured in China, the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) today is issuing a Health Information Advisory. This is to assure the American public that there is no known threat of contamination in infant formula manufactured by companies that have met the requirements to sell infant formula in the United States. Although no Chinese manufacturers of infant formula have fulfilled the requirements to sell infant formula in the United States, FDA officials are investigating whether or not infant formula manufactured in China is being sold in specialty markets which serve the Asian community.

chinese.chinese: 据今天早上的内部消息称，公司不再请求FDA批准该药，并取消了这项处在III期临床的项目。这么做的原因是：（该药）剂量越大，疗效越强，但同时副作用也越多。
chinese.english: In a skinny statement this morning, the drugmaker said it won't ask regulators to approve the drug and is killing the project, which was in phase III. The reason for move: At more effective doses, the drug also caused more adverse reactions.

chinese.chinese: 比如在马萨诸塞州总院，戈哉医生讲，“肌肉骨学MRI由每天读肌肉骨学片子的人读，不会是今天读胸部MRI，明天读肌肉骨学MRI片子”
chinese.english: At Massachusetts General Hospital, for example, Dr. Gazelle said, “musculoskeletal M.R.I.'s are read by someone who does musculoskeletal imaging every day” — and not “by someone who reads chest M.R.I.'s one day and musculoskeletal M.R.I.'s the next.”

chinese.chinese: 医学博士Duffin，描述了那些恳求离开历史上疑难杂症的人，从伤口化脓和结核病肆虐的前抗生素时代到今天转移癌的诊断。

chinese.chinese: 对所有在医院工作的人，特别是病理室和尸检室的工作人员来说，结核病是一种职业性公害。
chinese.english: It is an occupational hazard for all hospital personnel, particularly those who work in pathology laboratories and autopsy rooms.

chinese.chinese: 风湿热或先天性心脏病患者拔牙时，应用青霉素。
chinese.english: Penicillin is used in dental extractions of patients with rheumatic fever or congenital cardiac abnormalities.

chinese.chinese: 这类药物可引起口腔炎、脱发、脊髓抑制和心脏异常(轻者心律失常，重者心肌炎)。
chinese.english: These agents cause stomatitis, alopecia myelosuppression, and cardiac abnormalities ranging from arrhythmias to cardiomyopathy.

chinese.chinese: 内环境的液体在全身不断混合，这是由于：①心脏通过循环系统泵血；②通过毛细血管膜，液体既向内又向外弥散，让血液中称为血浆的那部分细胞外液与组织细胞间称为组织液的那部分液体互相进行交换。
chinese.english: The fluid of the internal environment is mixed constantly throughout the body by ① pumping of blood through the circulatory system by the heart and ② diffusion of fluid both outward and inward through the capillary membranes to allow exchange between that portion of the extracellular fluid in the blood called the plasma and that portion in the spaces between the tissue cells called the interstitial fluid.

chinese.chinese: 例如，循环系统由心脏及血管组成，向全身运输血液；而水及溶解物在血液与包围细胞的液体之间来回弥散。
chinese.english: For instance, the circulatory system, composed of the heart and blood vessels, transports blood throughout the body; and water and dissolved substances diffuse back and forth between the blood and the fluids that surround the cells.

chinese.chinese: 最后，自主神经系统协助控制心脏，心脏由心肌构成，心肌是介乎平滑肌与骨胳肌之间的另一种类型的肌肉。
chinese.english: Finally, the autonomic nervous system helps to control the heart, which is composed of cardiac muscle, still another type of muscle intermediate between smooth muscle and skeletal muscle.

chinese.chinese: 刺激自主神经系统所谓的交感神经纤维可使心脏收缩的频率和力量增加，而刺激自主神经系统的副交感纤维则引起相反的反应。
chinese.english: Stimulation of the so-called sympathetic nerve fibers of the autonomic system causes the rate and force of contraction of the heart to increase, whereas stimulation of the parasympathetic fibers of the autonomic system causes the opposite effects.

chinese.chinese: 循环系统主要由心脏和血管构成。
chinese.english: The circulatory system is composed mainly of the heart and blood vessels.

chinese.chinese: 心脏由并列的两个分开的泵组成。
chinese.english: The heart consists of two separate pumps arranged side by side.

chinese.chinese: 血液由动脉流入毛细血管，然后至静脉，最后再回到心脏，从而构成了一个完整的回路。
chinese.english: From the arteries it flows into the capillaries, then into the veins and finally back to the heart, thus making a complete circuit.

chinese.chinese: (4) 对心脏的作用：刺激交感神经系统增强心脏活动，有时使心率增加2倍而收缩强度增加l倍。
chinese.english: (4) Effects on the Heart：Stimulation of the sympathetic nervous system increases the heart's activity, sometimes increasing the heart rate as much as threefold and the strength of contraction as much as twofold.

chinese.chinese: 另一方面，副交感刺激减低心脏活动。
chinese.english: On the other hand, parasympathetic stimulation decreases the activity of the heart.

chinese.chinese: 事实上，对至心脏的迷走神经进行强刺激，确能使心脏停跳几秒钟。
chinese.english: In fact, strong stimulation of the vagus nerve to the heart can actually stop the heart for several seconds.

chinese.chinese: 但这种刺激每次很少减弱心收缩力，而心脏收缩力增加30％左右。
chinese.english: But this stimulation will rarely decrease the heart strength each time it does contract more than 30 percent.

chinese.chinese: 这是调节血量和动脉血压的一个很重要的因素，因为在需要时，交感兴奋可使液体保留在循环系统内；从而增加血量和心脏的静脉回流。
chinese.english: This is a very important mechanism for regulation of blood volume and arterial pressure, for when needed, sympathetic stimulatory system, increasing the blood volume and venous return to the heart as well.

chinese.chinese: 例如增加心脏活动、抑制胃肠蠕动、提高所有细胞的代谢等等。
chinese.english: For instance, they increase the activity of the heart, inhibit peristalsis in the gut, increase the metabolism of all cells, and so forth.

chinese.chinese: SAEC是制药行业组成的数个从事基础研究的联盟之一。首个联盟创始于1999年，其头也是Holden，该联盟的研究方向是寻找人类DNA变异，起研究数据已经公开。
chinese.english: SAEC is one of several consortiums formed by the pharmaceutical industry to conduct basic research. One of the first was started in 1999 and was headed by Holden. That consortium looked for DNA variations among people. Their data were also put into the public domain.

chinese.chinese: 研究报告表明肾组织活检确诊膜性肾病的头五年，患癌的风险会升高，并一直持续到第15年。
chinese.english: The increased risk of developing cancer during the first 5 years after the kidney biopsy that diagnosed MN persisted up to 15 years, the report indicates.

chinese.chinese: 使用胰岛素泵的患者在淋浴，游泳，锻炼，或者片刻时间会中断他们的胰岛素泵持续治疗设定。胰岛素持续输注的中断会导致基础胰岛素输注的中断。19位1型糖尿病患者分开的2天内，在临床诊所进行了试验。在达到临床诊所的头一个小时是空腹状态。在这个时间，参与试验的人员分别在不同的两天中要么暂时中断胰岛素泵，间断胰岛素的注射持续30分钟，要么仅仅改变他们的胰岛素泵设定。在这两种情况中，在另外的4个小时，将观测血糖水平的变化。
chinese.english: Patients disconnect their insulin pumps from their infusion sets when showering, swimming, exercising, or during intimate moments. Interrupting insulin infusion results in cessation of the basal insulin delivery. Nineteen subjects with T1DM were studied on 2 separate in-clinic days. One hour after arriving at the clinic in a fasting state, subjects either temporarily disconnected their infusion sets from their pumps, interrupting basal insulin infusion for 30 minutes, or on a separate day, only changed their infusion sets. Glucose levels were monitored for an additional 4 hours on both occasions.

chinese.chinese: 总之，有过重型脑外伤的人约增加了7.5倍的癫痫发病相对风险.然而该风险在脑外伤后的头6个月增加更是达到20倍以上。轻型及颅骨骨折的人则在头6月分别增加了5倍及2倍的癫痫发病风险。
chinese.english: Overall, individuals who sustained severe brain injury had almost a 7.5-fold increased relative risk of developing subsequent epilepsy. However, this risk was increased more than 20-fold in the first 6 months following severe TBI, with a 5- and 2-fold increased relative risk at 6 months for mild brain injury and skull fracture, respectively.

chinese.chinese: 当前研究中包括11名体内有着孕期基线水平的拉莫三嗪药物浓度并处于孕期头3月或中3月的准妈妈们.为了限制研究条件,在被准入该项研究前,她们需至少规律服用拉莫三噙2周.
chinese.english: The current study included 11 pregnant women in the first trimester of pregnancy or in the second trimester with a prepregnancy baseline lamotrigine concentration. To qualify for study enrolment, women had to be on a stable dose of lamotrigine for a minimum of 2 weeks before entering the study.

chinese.chinese: “如果在怀孕头三个月有可能避免摄入酒精的话，孕妇应该限制酒精的摄入量并且每天少于一个标准杯。”这项建议说。
chinese.english: “Pregnant women should limit their alcohol intake to less than one standard drink … per day and if possible avoid alcohol in the first 3 months of pregnancy,” the draft) says.

chinese.chinese: 在英国引起超过 200000头 牛的死亡和 165个人的疯牛病 (牛海绵状脑病) 现在已经得到缓和。 但是朊病毒造成的混乱还在上涨中，而且有人认为新变种将会传染人类。朊病毒是不容易在物种之间传递，但一旦它们突破了物种障碍，他们可以迅速适应，并成为物种内部的传染物。紧张的工作现已展开－寻找新的，更敏感的方法来检测这些潜在致命蛋白质结构和区分不同的菌株。
chinese.english: mad cow disease (BSE), which has caused the death of more than 200,000 cattle and 165 people in the U.K., has now abated. But other prion disorders are on the rise, and there is concern that new strains will infect humans. Prions are not readily transmittable from species to species, but once they have broken through the species barrier they can rapidly adapt and become contagious within the species. Intensive work is now underway to find new, more sensitive methods for detecting these potentially deadly protein structures and distinguish between various strains.

chinese.chinese: 这项研究由英国伦敦帝国学院精神病学教授——彼得医生领导的一个科研小组实施， 研究中选择了86位年龄18岁至65岁的患者，并把这些患者分为三组：第一组接受利培酮治疗;第二组使用另一个抗精神病药物haldol ;第三组则是在服用安慰剂药丸，看护跟踪参与者的行为。多数智商非常低的患者迅速出现愤怒并辱骂攻击其他人，用头撞墙或用拳头在墙上乱打，或者对着天空懊恼地骂一些污言秽语。
chinese.english: In the study, Dr. Peter J. Tyrer, a professor of psychiatry at Imperial College London, led a research team who assigned 86 people from ages 18 to 65 to one of three groups: one that received Risperdal; one that received another antipsychotic, the generic form of Haldol; and one that was given a placebo pill. Caregivers tracked the participants' behavior. Many people with very low I.Q.'s are quick to anger and lash out at others, bang their heads or fists into the wall in frustration, or singe the air with obscenities when annoyed.

chinese.chinese: 奥斯汀最大的雇佣公司“Hormel Foods”，主要生产猪肉罐头，熏猪肉，以及其它加工肉类。（奥斯汀还有个“猪肉罐头博物馆”）。“Quality Pork Processors”隶属于“Hormel”公司，一天宰杀1万9千头活猪，其中大部分供应给“Hormel”。在城市的任何角落都可以找到这种散发出气雾与特别味道的加工肉。
chinese.english: Austin's biggest employer is Hormel Foods, maker of Spam, bacon and other processed meats (Austin even has a Spam museum). Quality Pork Processors, which backs onto the Hormel property, kills and butchers 19,000 hogs a day and sends most of them to Hormel. The complex, emitting clouds of steam and a distinctive scent, is easy to find from just about anywhere in town.

chinese.chinese: 研究者还称，接受治疗的PCOS患者体内的胰岛素水平在头12周有明显的下降，并且两组的胰岛素抵抗均有明显的改善（PCOS患者组在头12周而对照组在24周以后）。
chinese.english: Insulin levels decreased significantly during the first 12 weeks of treatment of women with PCOS, the investigators say, and insulin resistance improved significantly in both groups (during the first 12 weeks in PCOS patients and after 24 weeks in control patients).

chinese.chinese: 研究者们注意到，两组受试者体内的FSH和LH水平均没有受到奥利斯他或者体重下降的影响，但是PCOS患者体内的睾丸激素水平却有明显的下降，而且在这个为期24周研究的头12周尤其明显。
chinese.english: Levels of FSH, LH, and prolactin were not affected by orlistat treatment or weight loss in either group, the researchers note, but testosterone levels decreased significantly in PCOS patients, particularly during the first 12 weeks of the 24-week study.

chinese.chinese: 在这期的胃肠内镜上，Maffei 等人2提出自我培训未镇静的经鼻内镜。熟练的内镜师和最近已经具备一定传统内镜能力的初学者都可以进行自我培训锻炼。关于技术成功、镇静急救、患者耐受力和操作时间的基准通过10个操作设定的。这些操作是由一个执行过1000多例未镇静经鼻内镜程序操作的胃肠病学家完成的。熟练的内镜师和初学者都在头10个操作中达到了技术能力。然而，在初学者整个70例的自我培训阶段中，所用的操作时间明显延长。
chinese.english: In this issue of Gastrointestinal Endoscopy, Maffei et al2 address self training for unsedated transnasal endoscopy. Both an experienced endoscopist as well as a trainee who had recently achieved competency in conventional endoscopy were part of this self-training exercise. The benchmark for technical success, sedation rescue, patient tolerance, and procedure duration was set by 10 procedures performed by a gastroenterologist who had performed more than 1000 unsedated transnasal endoscopic procedures. Both the experienced endoscopist and the trainee achieved technical competency within the first 10 procedures. However, the duration of the procedure was significantly longer for the trainee throughout the entire self-training period of 70 cases (10 vs 7 minutes, P < .0001).

chinese.chinese: 此外，研究表明相关风险在患者80岁或更老的时候最强；没有观察到急性心肌梗死与小于60岁的患者手术之间有联系。基于这种结果，DrArief Lalmohamed（荷兰乌得勒支大学）和同事指出，急性心肌梗死的危险性发生于全髋关节置换术后的第六个星期和全膝关节置换手术后的头两个星期期间。
chinese.english: In addition, the study showed that the associated risk was strongest inpatients 80 years of age and older; there was no observed association betweenAMI risk and surgery in patients younger than 60 years old. Based on theresults, Dr Arief Lalmohamed (Utrecht University, the Netherlands) andcolleagues suggest that risk of AMI be considered during the first six weeksafter total hip-replacement surgery and during the first two weeks after totalknee-replacement surgery.

chinese.chinese: 在髋关节或膝关节置换手术之后MI危险性会短暂性升高。根据一项新的调查结果表明，在全髋关节或膝关节置换手术后的头两个星期，和健康状况相比，病人发生急性心梗的风险增加了超过25-fold。头两个星期过后急性心肌梗死的危险显著下降，虽然它仍然会在患者全髋关节置换术的第六周中大大提升，调查人员报告称。
chinese.english: MI risk shoots up temporarily after hip- or knee-replacementsurgeryIn the first two weeks following total hip- or knee-replacement surgery,patients have a more than 25-fold increased risk of acute MI when compared withhealthy controls, according to the results of a new study [1]. The risk of AMIdeclines significantly after the first two weeks, although it remainedsignificantly elevated in the first six weeks in patients undergoing total hipreplacement, report investigators.

chinese.chinese: 在一篇随后的社论中，来自巴塞罗那(Barcelona)大学/ Catalan肿瘤研究所和悉尼大学的专家表示还需要更多的数据来对这一问题下结论，同时他们也指出之前的研究已经表明很多抽烟者在头几年里体重增加值要超过从不抽烟者，但此后体重增加率要低于从不抽烟者当中所见到的(增加率)。
chinese.english: In an accompanying editorial, experts from the Catalan Institute of Oncology/University of Barcelona and University of Sydney say that more data is needed to settle this question, and they point out that previous studies have shown that many smokers gain more weight than never smokers for a few years, but then the rate of weight gain falls to that seen in people who have never smoked.

chinese.chinese: 还没有决定谁做今天下午的手术。
chinese.english: It has not been decided who will perform the operation this afternoon.

chinese.chinese: 今天上午在该公司的第三季度盈利报告中显示：该公司的Xience V支架“目前已成为美国市场的主要药物洗脱支架（DES）”。考虑到这种支架在7月中旬才上市，结果应该还是不错的。
chinese.english: In its Q3 earnings report this morning, the company said that its Xience V stent “is now the market-leading DES in the U.S.” Not bad, considering that the stent was just approved in early July.

chinese.chinese: “然而，直到今天，这一现象的分子基础以及它在体内是否也在发生却并不清楚。我们通过研究神经嵴细胞发现这些细胞的确存在这一现象。当2个迁徙中的神经嵴细胞碰到一起时，它们会停止，伪足消失并改变方向。然而，当神经嵴细胞碰到的是另一种类型的细胞时不会发生这一现象，它们会继续侵犯其它的组织。转移性肿瘤细胞也以类似的方式（即不发生接触抑制）迁徙并形成转移灶。
chinese.english: "However, until now the molecular basis of this process and whether it also occurred within the body was unknown. Our study of neural crest cells shows that these cells behave in exactly this way. When two migrating neural crest cells meet, they stop, collapse their protrusions and change direction. However, when a neural crest cell meets another cell type, it fails to behave as expected and instead invades the other tissue, in the same manner as metastatic cancer cells which migrate and go on to cause secondary tumours."

chinese.chinese: 葛兰素史克公司（GSK）今天宣布启动首个重要的III期临床试验来评价尚处于研究阶段的Lp-PLA2抑制剂darapladib对于男女慢性冠心病（CHD）的疗效。这项被称为STABILITY（darapladib对于动脉粥样硬化斑块的稳定性影响）的研究将包括来自39个国家的15,000名患者。
chinese.english: GlaxoSmithKline today announced initiation of the first pivotal Phase III clinical trial to evaluate the efficacy of long-term treatment with the investigational Lp-PLA2 inhibitor darapladib in men and women with chronic coronary heart disease (CHD). The study, called STABILITY (STabilisation of Atherosclerotic plaque By Initiation of darapLadIb TherapY) will include more than 15,000 patients from 39 countries.

chinese.chinese: 根据今天《自然》杂志出版的一篇研究报道，英国癌症研究的科学家们首次发现干细胞可能是大肠癌发生的根本原因。
chinese.english: Cancer Research UK scientists have discovered for the first time that stem cells could be the root cause of bowel cancer, according to a study published in Nature* today (Wednesday).

chinese.chinese: 集中50多项研究结果，直到今天美国的研究者们证实和提出了体育运动和结肠癌之间存在紧密联系，经常参加锻炼的男性和女性有较低的发生结肠癌的危险性，他们同时也确定了这种危险性的大小。
chinese.english: By pooling the results of over 50 studies, researchers in the US confirmed and brought up to date the evidence of a strong link between physical exercise and colon cancer whereby men and women who exercise more have a lower risk of developing the disease, and they also firmed up the estimates of the size of risk.

chinese.chinese: “FDA的调查显示，由对数据模式的质疑上升到对一些申报的可靠性以及AIP批准件的重大问题，” CDER核查办公室主任Deborah Autor说。 “今天的行动反映了FDA持续的警惕性和坚定不移地维护公众健康的义务。”
chinese.english: “The FDA's investigations revealed a pattern of questionable data raising significant questions regarding the reliability of certain applications, and this warrants applying the Application Integrity Policy,” said Deborah Autor, director of CDER's Office of Compliance. “Today's action reflects the FDA's continued vigilance and its steadfast commitment to safeguarding the public's health.”

chinese.chinese: 胰岛素抵抗已经与血管阻塞性危险因素、因纤溶酶原激活物抑制剂升高而致减弱的纤维蛋白溶解相关。到今天为止，关于慢性餐后高血糖和被O-GlcNAcylatio修饰的蛋白质对血小板功能的影响有多大在人类中没有做细致的调查。然而，在最近一项以1型糖尿病和2型糖尿病的大鼠模型为研究对象的试验中，对血小板的改变没能做出研究结果。
chinese.english: Insulin resistance has been linked with a prothrombotic risk and suppressed fibrinolysis as a consequence of elevated levels of plasminogen activator inhibitor-1 (18). To date, it has not been investigated in humans in detail to what extent chronic hyperglycemia and the posttranslational modification of proteins by O-GlcNAcylation affect platelet function. However, a recent report failed to detect this modification in platelets isolated from either a hyperglycemic murine model of type 1 diabetes or a genetically-based model (ob/ob) of type 2 diabetes (19).

chinese.chinese: “从某种意义上说，这是一个新机制的发现。”瑞典哥德堡大学的研究人员Sven Enerback说，他也是今天出现在《新英格兰医学》杂志上三项研究其中之一的第一作者。
chinese.english: "It is, in a sense, the discovery of a new organ," said Sven Enerback, a researcher at the University of Goteborg in Sweden and the lead author of one of three studies appearing today in the New England Journal of Medicine.

chinese.chinese: Caroline Cerny,今天建立英国太阳癌症研究院经理，称太阳灯浴床的UV辐射可能是正午太阳效果的十倍。
chinese.english: Caroline Cerny, the manager of the Cancer Research UK SunSmart campaign, which starts today, added that UV rays in sunbeds could be more than ten times stronger than the effect of the midday sun.

chinese.chinese: “FDA感谢这些姑息治疗群体帮助我们了解到这些药物今天怎样用来帮助病人”FDA特别健康问题办公室主任Theresa Toigo说到，“我们希望和他们继续交流以推进这些难题”。
chinese.english: “The FDA appreciates the help we received from the palliative care community about how this drug is being used today to help patients,” said Theresa Toigo, director, FDA's Office of Special Health Issues. “We want to continue to talk to them as we move forward on this difficult issue.”

chinese.chinese: 正如今天上午的华尔街日报指出的，现在已经有必要讨论一下如何才能更好的占有处方药的市场份额了。
chinese.english: As this morning's WSJ notes, there's been a debate in the field over the best way to manage patients' prescription-drug coverage.

chinese.chinese: 大型制药公司继续进军新兴市场。中文报纸充满了诺华在华扩张的信息，诺华的扩张将增加就业机会，从而提供了一个喘息的机会----即扩大对销售代表的招聘。辉瑞公司今天也表示，将增持辉瑞（印度）的股票，寻求购买其上市公司另外三分之一的股份。
chinese.english: Big Pharma continues its march into emerging markets. Chinese newspapers are full of a Novartis expansion push into their country, which is expected to boost employment and lead to--gasp!--a recruitment push for sales reps. And Pfizer said today it would mount a tender offer for Pfizer India stock, seeking to buy another one-third stake in the publicly traded company.

chinese.chinese: Dr. Kraft and Dr. Hunter说目前只能粗略估计一个人的常见病的基因组危险性，但是随着更多的变异被发现，对常见病的基因组危险性的估计会提高。Dr. Kraft说那意味着今天个人基因组学公司提供的任何危险性估计是不可靠的，未来会向上或下修改。
chinese.english: Dr. Kraft and Dr. Hunter say that a person's genetic risk of common diseases can be estimated only roughly at present but that estimates will improve as more variants are found. But that means any risk estimate offered by personal genomics companies today is unstable, Dr. Kraft said, and subject to upward or downward revision in the future.

chinese.chinese: 南加利福尼亚大学和第二视力医疗产品公司，指导视网膜假体的开发人员治疗失明。今天宣布他们已经完成了美国食品及药物管理局批准对阿格斯II型视网膜假体系统的临床研究的第一阶段的注册。他们也声称就象在墨西哥的继续研究一样，在某些欧洲关键地点的注册正在着手进行中。
chinese.english: USC and Second Sight Medical Products Inc, leading developers of retinal prostheses for treating blindness, announced today that they have completed enrollment of the first phase of a U.S .FDA approved clinical study of the Argus II Retinal Prosthesis System. They also announced that enrollment at key European sites is underway as studies continue in Mexico.

chinese.chinese: 在室，通常用电刺激神经纤维。
chinese.english: In the laboratory, nerve fibers are usually stimulated electrically.

chinese.chinese: 临床医生了解病史，进行体检及室检查，这些对了解个案病例的病情是需要的。
chinese.english: The clinician obtains the patient's history, conducts a physical examination, and orders laboratory tests, all of which are necessary in investigating the illness of an individual patient.

chinese.chinese: 流行病学工作者也对暴发流行中所有病人的病史、体检及室检查结果感兴趣，但他们收集所有病人的资料。
chinese.english: The epidemiologist is also interested in the history, physical examination, and results of laboratory tests, but he or she collects these data for all the patients involved in the outbreak.

chinese.chinese: 这些资料包括咨询临床医生、卫生官员，病人及病人的亲属、室检查报告、复习住院病史及核对工厂或学校的缺勤记录。
chinese.english: This may involve contacting a physician, a health officer, patients, and relatives of patients; examining laboratory reports; reviewing hospital records; and checking absenteeism in industries or schools.

chinese.chinese: 第2个要点是从临床病史、病人的体检及室资料核对诊断。
chinese.english: The second element is to verify the diagnosis by obtaining clinical histories, examining patients, and obtaining appropriate specimens for laboratory study.

chinese.chinese: 重新核对室资料时，必须记住室结果可因标本收集不当、标签错误或处理不当而偶有错误。
chinese.english: In reviewing the laboratory data, it must be remembered that the laboratory results may not always be correct because of inadequacies in collection of the laboratory specimens, improper labeling, or improper handling or processing in the laboratory.

chinese.chinese: 再一点是计划及进行更系统或更专门化的调查，包括观察、室分析，环境检查及分析性流行病学研究。
chinese.english: The next element is to plan and to conduct more systematic or specific investigations, including surveys, laboratory analyses, environmental examinations, and analytic epidemiologic studies.

chinese.chinese: 第6种收集监测资料的方法是回顾性查阅室报告。
chinese.english: The sixth method of gathering surveillance information is that of reviewing laboratory reports.

chinese.chinese: 对于某些疾病来说，如果要将疾病完全或一定程度准确地诊断出来，都需有病原体室鉴定。
chinese.english: For some diseases the laboratory identification of the etiologic agent is necessary if the disease is to be diagnosed at all or with any degree of accuracy.

chinese.chinese: 室检查对确定微生物的抗生素药敏试验也是很有价值的。
chinese.english: The laboratory may also play a valuable part by characterizing the antibiotic sensitivity of organisms.

chinese.chinese: 发病率报告是常用的主要方法，另加室报告。
chinese.english: Most frequently morbidity reporting is the main method used, supported by laboratory reports.

chinese.chinese: 过多死亡率及连续查阅室分离物的常规报告，附加的资料用来描述流感的流行率。
chinese.english: Routine reporting of excess mortality and review of laboratory isolates continues, but the additional data are useful in portraying the epidemic occurrence of influenza.

chinese.chinese: 在病原微生物室工作人员应常规用相应的疫苗预防感染，接触这个室或接触特殊病原菌的人也要用疫苗。
chinese.english: In a laboratory in which pathogenic organisms are handled, vaccines against them, if they exist, should be routinely used for the personnel or for those people who may have contact with this laboratory or with the specific agents.

chinese.chinese: 其他的室检查一般无助于流感病毒感染的特异性诊断。
chinese.english: The remainders of other laboratory tests are generally not helpful in making a specific diagnosis of influenza virus infection.

chinese.chinese: 在未发现过腮腺炎或以前已患过腮腺炎的情况下，必须有特异性的室检查才能确诊。
chinese.english: In the absence of parotitis or if parotitis has occurred previously, specific laboratory studies are necessary to confirm the diagnosis.

chinese.chinese: 心脏实际上是两个分开的泵：①右心，泵血通过肺；以及②左心，泵血通过身体其他部分。
chinese.english: The heart is actually two separate pumps: ① the right heart, which pumps the blood through the lungs and ② the left heart, which pumps the blood through the remainder of the body.

chinese.chinese: 这两侧心脏又各分为两个分开的腔：心房和心室。
chinese.english: Each of these two hearts is divided into two separate chambers: the atrium and the ventricle.

chinese.chinese: 心脏有4个独立的瓣，心瓣让血液向前流但阻止倒流。
chinese.english: The heart has four separate valves that allow forward flow of blood but prevent back-flow.

chinese.chinese: 心肌与骨胳肌在很多方面相似，但有两个特点使其特别适应心脏的泵功能：第一，心脏纤维相互连接，因此起自心肌任何部分的动作电位将传至心脏各部，并引起全部心肌同步收缩。
chinese.english: In many ways cardiac muscle is very similar to skeletal muscle, but it has two characteristics that make it especially adapted for the pumping function of the heart: First, the cardiac muscle fibers are interconnected with each other so that an action potential originating in any part of the muscle mass travels everywhere and causes the entire muscle mass to contract in unison.

chinese.chinese: 心脏还有一个特殊的节律控制系统，包括：①窦房结(SA结)，位于右心房壁内靠近上腔静脉入口处，②房室结(AV结)，位于房室隔靠近两心房附着于心室的附着点；以及③一个称为浦肯野纤维的、迅速传导的、大的心肌纤维系统，它将心脏冲动由AV结迅速传导到两侧心室各部。
chinese.english: The heart also has a special rhythmical control system consisting of ① the sinoatrial node (SA node), located in the wall of the right atrium near the entry point of the superior vena cava; ② the atrioventricular node (AV node), located in the atrial septum near the point where the two atria attach to the ventricles; and ③ a system of rapidly conducting large cardiac muscle fibers called Purkinje fibers that conducts the cardiac impulses rapidly from the AV node to all parts of both ventricles.

chinese.chinese: 在正常心脏，SA结控制心跳频率，因此SA结称为心脏起搏者。
chinese.english: In a normal heart, the SA node controls the rate of heart beat and therefore is called the pacemaker of the heart.

chinese.chinese: 人在休息时，SA结每分钟节律收缩约72次，而在SA结内产生的动作电位称为心脏冲动，该冲动将扩布到整个心脏——先通过心房，再进入AV结，然后通过浦肯野系统进入心室，最后通过心室肌本身。
chinese.english: When a person is at rest, the SA node contracts rhythmically at about 72 beats per minute, and the action potential, called the cardiac impulse, generated in this node spreads throughout the heart --first through the atrium, then into the AV node, next through the Purkinje system into the ventricles, and finally through the ventricular muscle itself.

chinese.chinese: 当心脏冲动经过AV结时，冲动在该处延搁十分之一秒多，这是由于该结的传导纤维极细并且传导速度很慢。
chinese.english: As the cardiac impulse passes through the AV node, it is delayed for a little more than a tenth of a second because the conducting fibers of this node are extremely small and conduct very slowly.

chinese.chinese: 此延搁对心脏功能特别重要，因为它让心房在心室收缩之前0.1秒左右就收缩，于是让血液在心室泵周期之前就流入心室。
chinese.english: This delay is especially important to heart function, because it allows the atria to beat a fraction of a second ahead of ventricular contraction, thus allowing blood to flow into the ventricles ahead of the ventricular pumping cycle.

chinese.chinese: 当心脏损伤时，如常见的冠状血管的某一支阻塞，心脏传导系统的一部分可能被阻滞，所以不再有正常传导。
chinese.english: When the heart becomes damaged, as often occurs when one of the coronary blood vessels is occluded, part of the conduction system of the heart may be blocked so that normal conduction no longer occurs.

chinese.chinese: 例如，由AV结到心室浦肯野系统之间的传导阻滞，称为心脏阻滞，在老年人中常常发生。
chinese.english: For instance, blockage of conduction from the AV node into the ventricular Purkinje system, a condition called heart block, is a frequent occurrence in old age.

chinese.chinese: 心脏的另一传导异常，一个严重得多的情况为心室纤颤，此时心脏信号循迂回曲折的径路反覆通过心室而且从不停止。
chinese.english: Another conduction abnormality of the heart, a much more disastrous one, is ventricular fibrillation, in which the cardiac signal travels around and around in devious circuits through the ventricles in such a way that the signal never stops.

chinese.chinese: 我们将在本章以后详细讨论窦房结，因为它是心脏正常的控制者。
chinese.english: We will discuss the sinoatrial node in great detail later in this chapter because it is the normal controller of the heart beat.

chinese.chinese: 正常时，起自SA结的动作电位扩布到整个心脏，于是引起心脏节律性收缩。
chinese.english: Normally, action potentials originating in the SA node spread throughout the entire heart and thereby elicit the rhythmic contractions of the heart.

chinese.chinese: 但是如果SA结不能产生节律性冲动，心脏其他部位将开始产生冲动并接管心脏的控制，这些我们在本章以后将更加充分地讨论。
chinese.english: However, if the SA node fails to generate rhythmic impulses, some other area of the hart will begin to generate impulses and will then take over control of the heart beat, as we shall discuss more fully later in the chapter.

chinese.chinese: 切除肿瘤后，当患者仍然在手术台上时，将光子放射治疗仪放射头的小型圆柱状探头放进肿瘤腔内，提供20到30分钟的表层放射剂量，而对于周围的健康组织和器官的辐射则非常有限。当移走放射头后，缝合外科手术切口。
chinese.english: Immediately following removal of the tumor, while the patient is still on the operating table, the INTRABEAM applicator's small, cylindrical tip is placed inside the tumor cavity to deliver a superficial dose of radiation for 20-30 minutes, while limiting exposure to healthy surrounding tissue and organs. After the applicator is removed, the surgical incision is closed.

chinese.chinese: CellScope所提供的第一个产品是可用于智能手机的耳镜，能使医师远程诊断患儿是否存在耳部感染。家长能使用附着在智能手机摄影头的外周设备给患儿耳内拍照并将影像传递给医师，然后医师再根据照片进行诊断，如果需要的话再给予配药。CellScope指出仅在美国每年就有30000000儿童因耳部感染看医生。据悉该设备可帮助父母减少请假以及夜间急诊。
chinese.english: CellScope's first offering will be a smartphone-enabled otoscope that will enable physicians to remotely diagnose ear infections in children. Parents will be able to use the peripheral, which attaches to a smartphone camera lens, to send an image of their child's inner ear that physicians can use to make a diagnosis and then write a prescription if need be. CellScope says ear infections in children make up 30 million doctor visits annually in the US alone. The consumer device would help parents miss less work and potentially cut down on late night emergency room visits, according to the startup.

chinese.chinese: 背景：大部分头颈部癌症（HNC）在第一次确诊的3年内会再复发。那些生存时间大于这个时间点的病人死亡风险会额外增加。我们调查了生存期满3年头颈部癌患者的死亡原因。
chinese.english: Background: Most head and neck cancers(HNC)recur within the first 3 yrs of diagnosis. Patients who live beyond this timepoint continue to have an excess risk of mortality. We investigated the causesof mortality in 3-yr survivors of HNC.

chinese.chinese: 所有和用药相关的临床事件，都是在应用达比加群的头6个月后撤药和之前用华法林治疗6个月相比。
chinese.english: Any clinical events that necessitated medication withdrawal from the first six months on dabigatran were compared with a six-month previous warfarin treatment period.

chinese.chinese: 上个春季，卫生部发布更新，建议多发短信、使用免提工具以使手机远离头来减少辐射的暴露。
chinese.english: Last spring the Department of Health updated itsadvice by saying that sending text messages or using hands-free kits can reduceexposure to radiation, by keeping the handset away from the head.

chinese.chinese: 作为一名图像处理专家，Avidan教授及其团队正在致力于研发一种高级程序，这种程序可以帮助安装在通用汽车上的摄像头探测危险并提醒驾驶员快速做出处理决定。他的研究成果已发表于一些重要杂志包括《IEEE模式分析与机器智能汇刊》上并在业内会议上受到重视。
chinese.english: An expert in image processing, Prof. Avidan and his team are working to develop advanced algorithms that will help cameras mounted on GM cars detect threats, alerting drivers to make split-second decisions. His research has been published in leading journals, including the IEEE Transaction on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence and featured at conferences in the field.

chinese.chinese: 血清中存在着CK-MB的许多亚行。Puleo等人发现：在症状出现头6h以内，升高的CK-MB2 以及CK-MB2与CK-MB1的比值比单独的CK-MB具有更高的敏感性（分别为96.6% 和 95.7%,）但具有相似的特异性[22] ，但是这种测量方法并没有为大多数医院所采用。
chinese.english: As mentioned above, CK-MB can be found in trace amounts in skeletal muscle, and has been shown to be elevated in 59% of patients with acute skeletal muscle disease, even in the absence of any myocardial injury [23]. Theoretically, calculating the CK-MB relative index should distinguish myocardial necrosis from skeletal muscle damage. Cappellan et al. showed the CK-MB relative index to be more specific than absolute CK-MB measurements, with a mild decrease in sensitivity [24]. However, Adams et al. suggested that the CK-MB relative index may be nonspecifically elevated in the setting of skeletal muscle injury [23].

chinese.chinese: 头几天，我们为一些平稳的糖尿病人，高血压患者测血糖，量血压。随后，就由医生照看，并发放捐赠药品。
chinese.english: In the first few days, we had a steady flow of people with diabetes and high blood pressure showing up for blood glucose and blood pressure tests. They were then seen by a doctor and given donated medicines.

chinese.chinese: Texas大学的M.D. Anderson肿瘤中心的胸科头Scott Lippman博士说：通过口交，HPV感染率的上升开始蔓延，大大加速了口咽肿瘤疾病的上升速度，包括喉，扁桃体，舌基底部位的肿瘤。
chinese.english: Increasing rates of HPV infection, spread through oral sex, is largely driving the rapid rise in oropharyngeal cancers, which include tumors of the throat, tonsils, and base of the tongue, said Scott Lippman, MD, who chairs the thoracic department at the University of Texas M.D. Anderson Cancer Center.

chinese.chinese: Michael Krams博士是强生公司的神经病学研究的头，他说，研发一种给患者带来百利而无一害的药物是一个挑战。
chinese.english: Dr. Michael Krams, who heads the neurology franchise at J&J, said the challenge is to develop drugs that offer lots of potential benefit with little risk to patients.

chinese.chinese: 瑞典Orphan Biovitrum，或称为Sobi公司，可能会选择在欧洲、俄罗斯、中东及北非市场投放该药。如果他们这样做，将会有助于研发费用。Biogen公司将会通过修正头六年的跨专利条款而获得退款。
chinese.english: Swedish Orphan Biovitrum, or Sobi, may choose to market the drug in Europe,Russia, the Middle East and Northern Africa. If it doesso it will contribute to the cost of research and development, a reimbursementthat would be recouped by Biogen through adjustments to the cross-royalty structure for the first six years.

chinese.chinese: 研究结果能有助于努力开拓更敏感、更精确的方法发现认知损害和脑震荡;更精确地描绘和塑造头冲击的影响所导致的认知障碍。确定单个或重复冲击后引起的认知障碍的的细胞基础，并开发新的干预方法,以减少头部冲击的风险和影响。
chinese.english: Findings could aid effortsto develop more sensitive and accurate methods to detect cognitive impairment and concussions;more accurately characterize and model cognitive deficitsthat result from head impacts;determine the cellular basis for cognitive deficits after asingle impact or repeated impacts; and develop newinterventions to reduce the risk and effects of head impacts.

chinese.chinese: 美国麻醉学杂志2012期一月发行的一个研究发现大范围脊柱手术后失明或部分失明有关的六个危险因素。它们是：1）男性，2)肥胖,3)外科架的使用，使头低于心脏，4)手术长度，5)失血量，6)使用某些液体代替流失的血液。
chinese.english: A study published in the January 2012 issue of Anesthesiology identified six risk factors associated with blindness or partial blindness that can occur after major spine surgery: 1) male sex, 2) obesity, 3) use of a surgical frame that places the head lower than the heart, 4) length of the surgery, 5) amount of blood loss and 6) use of certain fluids that replace lost blood.

chinese.chinese: 手足口病是人类已知的最容易传染的疾病之一，但是其感染动物的机制还未弄清楚。这种致病病毒繁殖迅速，能在短时间内引起广泛的机体损害。2001年在英国爆发的疫情导致约700万头绵羊和牛的死亡，这让英国的农业部门损失惨重。另一个有案可查的疫情爆发发生在2007年。
chinese.english: Foot-and-mouth is a one of the most readily transmissible diseases known to man, but the mechanisms by which it infects animals are not well understood.
