chinese.chinese: 今天发表于新英格兰医学杂志的一篇评论称，在一项政府资助的关于激素替代疗法的重大研究中发现，服用了雌激素后50多岁女性的一项心脏健康的关键指标优于（同年龄组）服用安慰剂的女性。
chinese.english: In a big, federally-funded study of hormone replacement therapy, women in their 50s who took estrogen fared better on a key measure of heart health than women who took placebos, according to an analysis published today in the New England Journal of Medicine.

chinese.chinese: 不管感情怎么想，某种程度上病人的死亡与医生的失败是等同的，医生不应为参加病人的葬礼而感到胆怯，今天一位家庭医生向英国医学杂志（BMJ）写信。
chinese.english: Despite the sentiment in some quarters that equates the death of a patient with the failure of a physician, doctors shouldn't shy away from attending patients' funerals, a family doctor writes today in the British Medical Journal.

chinese.chinese: 今天下午Cephalon的发言人Jenifer Antonacci对Health Blog说“我们希望Nuvigil的药效获得更广泛的认可”。该药目前适用于提高发作性睡眠患者或者经常因工作原因睡眠颠倒的人群还有睡眠呼吸暂停患者的清醒度。Cephalon称他们正在研究该药物的其他用途如双相性精神障碍。
chinese.english: “We want to wait to more fully understand its full potential,” Cephalon spokeswoman Jenifer Antonacci told the Health Blog this afternoon. The drug was approved today to improve wakefulness in people with narcolepsy or whose regular slumber has been disturbed by shift work or sleep apnea. Cephalon says it's studying other uses of the drug, including treating bipolar disorder.

chinese.chinese: 在日本农业部研究母牛的15年中，Masashige Kuwayama（照片中居左）和他的同事显示，冻结的卵子能持续产生后代，今天Peter Landers在他的WSJ.com column中写到。在1999年，Kuwayama离开牛厂去成为东京Kato Ladies Clinic的研究主任，它说，他去年做了18000例体外受精实验，然后不久他发展了用液氮快速冷冻的方法，这种方法不仅降低了结晶而且也减少了对乙醇的需求。
chinese.english: During his 15 years studying cows for Japan's agriculture ministry, Masashige Kuwayama (pictured, left) and his colleagues showed that frozen eggs could go on to produce live calves, Peter Landers writes today in his WSJ.com column. In 1999, Kuwayama left the bovine world to became head of research at Tokyo's Kato Ladies Clinic, which says it performed nearly 18,000 in-vitro fertilization cycles last year. He soon developed a quick-freezing method using liquid nitrogen that reduced crystallization and lowered the need for alcohol.

chinese.chinese: 尽管该领域女性的数目正在增加――1989年女性神经外科医师组织仅有8名会员，而今天美国的女性外科医师执业人员有大约250人，全世界有550人――但是该领域女性从业者依然占少数。
chinese.english: Despite the increasing numbers of women in the field — only eight women composed the founding membership of Women in Neurosurgery in 1989, but there are approximately 250 practicing women neurosurgeons in the United States today and 550 internationally — women remain a small minority in the field.

chinese.chinese: 高等生命科学Holdings, Inc. (Nasdaq: ADLS)今天宣布06临床实验阳性结果，即用于评估喹红霉素的安全性和有效性的两项3期临床实验之一，平均每天一次给药以治疗社区获得性肺炎。该项研究中，与克拉霉素制剂相比，喹红霉素在每项CAP实验记录中的初级终末点均获得了非劣效结果。应用300毫克/天喹红霉素与250毫克/两天克拉霉素进行对比评价，两种治疗方案均应用一周以上。喹红霉素与克拉霉素获得了相近的安全性治疗效果。
chinese.english: Advanced Life Sciences Holdings, Inc. (Nasdaq: ADLS), today announced positive results from Trial CL-06, the first of two pivotal Phase 3 clinical trials designed to assess the safety and effectiveness of cethromycin, a novel once-a-day antibiotic, for the treatment of community acquired pneumonia (CAP). In the study, cethromycin achieved non-inferiority in its primary endpoint of per protocol clinical cure rate compared to Biaxin(R) (clarithromycin) in CAP. Cethromycin was evaluated using a 300 mg once-daily dosing regimen compared to 250 mg twice-daily dosing for Biaxin(R), both over a seven-day course of therapy. Cethromycin also demonstrated safety results that were similar to those seen with Biaxin(R).

chinese.chinese: Abbott和medimmune今天宣布了发表在七月号《儿科学》杂志上的新研究结果，应用synagis®(帕利珠单抗)治疗可使早产儿反复喘鸣发生率降低几乎一半。
chinese.english: Abbott and MedImmune today announced results of a new study, published in the July issue of Journal of Pediatrics, showing that treatment with Synagis® (palivizumab) may reduce recurrent wheezing in premature infants by almost half.

chinese.chinese: 此前，分析家针对FDA可能的决定持不同看法。雷曼兄弟公司的Tony Butler今天早上在一篇短问中写道，他过去预期获得批准，即使现行的更年期治疗方法—激素替代疗法—“有其自身的问题。”但是，健康博客这样写道，该公司在上周的财报电话会议上的语气使得一些分析家感到不安。美林集团的David Risinger会后写道，“谨慎的评论使得我们对按时批准缺乏信心。”
chinese.english: Before the announcement, analysts had been divided about which way the FDA would go. Lehman Brothers' Tony Butler wrote in a note this morning that he had expected approval, given that the current menopause treatment, hormone replacement therapy, “has its issues.” But, as the Health Blog noted, the company's tone in last week's earnings call made some analysts skittish. The “guarded commentary,” Merrill Lynch's David Risinger wrote after the call, “causes us to have less conviction in a timely approval.”

chinese.chinese: 但是正如葛兰素史克和波赞（GSK/Pozen）公司今天所遇到的情况，这种所谓的复方药物开发的光明道路充满了陷阱。美国FDA再次重申，暂时不会批准复方药物Trexima，这种药物由葛兰素公司治疗偏头痛的重磅药物舒马普坦与非专利止痛药萘普生（商品名为Aleve）组合而成。葛兰素史克公司声明，早期实验研究表明复方药物比起单一药物增加了更多未经报道过的安全隐患，而FDA需要得到有关这方面更多的信息。
chinese.english: It turns out the golden road to combo-pill riches is full of potholes– as GlaxoSmithKline and Pozen learned today. The FDA for the second time said it wasn't ready to approve Trexima, a pill that combines Glaxo's migraine blockbuster Imitrex with the generic painkiller naproxen (sold under the brand name Aleve). The agency wants more information from an early lab study that suggested the combination could carry risks not posed by either drug alone, Glaxo said.

chinese.chinese: “很明显印度专利法中的不完善将对印度患者和公共卫生起到反作用，”今天Herrling在诺华的声明中这样提到。“药物的发展来自于不断的创新。如果印度的专利法没有认识到这些发展的重要，患者将不会得到更新更好的药物。”
chinese.english: “It is clear there are inadequacies in Indian patent law that will have negative consequences for patients and public health in India,” Herrling said in Novartis's statement today. “Medical progress occurs through incremental innovation. If Indian patent law does not recognize these important advances, patients will be denied new and better medicines.”

chinese.chinese: 数个主要的制药厂在缺乏新的、有作用的新产品的泥潭中挣扎的这一段时期，临时工雇用制及股票购回构成了这个财季的主旋律。今天，赛诺菲-安万特也加入了这个团体。这个来自法国的药厂宣布将回购超过40亿美元的股票以解决销售方面的问题。
chinese.english: As several of the major pharmaceutical companies struggle through a period of a relative dearth of big, new products, the job casualties and the share buybacks are piling up this earnings season. Today, Sanofi-Aventis is joining the group. The French drugmaker announced it will buy back more than $4 billion of its stock and get rid of even more sales reps.

chinese.chinese: 在仿制药企业的竞争中，请关注美国底特律（Detroit）的Caraco制药公司。底特律自由报称，Caraco制药公司今天宣布计划增加40%的生产规模，药物年产量将达到50亿片。
chinese.english: In the horse race among generics manufacturers, keep an eye on Detroit-based Caraco Pharmaceutical. The company is expected to announce a big expansion today that will increase production by 40%, to 5 billion tablets per year, the Detroit Free Press reports.

chinese.chinese: 莫大的沮丧在那些不知名的投资者，公司员工和病人中间弥漫，他们递交了一份网上请愿信，要求安进董事会开除Sharer。当然， Sharer在去年收到的3400万美元总赔偿金额可能已经让他“盲目自大”了。今天，他勇敢地走到话筒前召开了一个长达一小时的电话会议，面对投资者和媒体，宣布多达2600个的裁员计划，关闭工厂和办公机构，并降低今年的盈利预期。
chinese.english: Frustration is so high that unnamed investors, employees and patients are circulating an Internet petition to urge Amgen's board to throw Sharer overboard. Of course, the $34 million in total compensation Sharer received last year may have blinded him a bit. Today, however, he bravely stepped before the microphones and commandeered an hour-long teleconference for investors and the media to announce job cuts of up to 2,600; plant and office closings, and reduced earnings for this year.

chinese.english: Other laboratory studies revealed SGPT 49 U, SGOT 133 U, alkaline phosphatase 881 IU, total protein 5.6 g/100ml, albumin 3.6g/100 ml, and triglycerides 535mg/100 rag/100 ml.

chinese.chinese: 1．此临床病程、室检查和肝活体组织检查与下列哪一种情况最一致?
chinese.english: 1. The clinical course, laboratory studies, and the liver biopsy are most compatible with which of the following conditions?

chinese.chinese: 以前的病例研究对评价持续阻塞性黄疸的室检查已进行过一定程度的讨论。
chinese.english: The laboratory studies performed in the evaluation of prolonged obstructive jaundice have been discussed to some extent in the prior case study.

chinese.chinese: 此病人的室和肝活体组织检查与肝外胆道闭锁最为相符。
chinese.english: The laboratory studies and the liver biopsy in this patient are most compatible with extrahepatic biliary atresia.

chinese.chinese: 进行某些室试验(血清学的)能够帮助识别肝炎的特定原因，例如风疹综合征、巨细胞病毒感染、弓形体病、单纯性疤诊、水痘、柯萨奇病毒、乙型肝炎、梅毒、α-1-抗胰蛋白酶缺乏症以及囊性纤维化。
chinese.english: The performance of certain laboratory tests (serological) can aid in identifying the specific cause of the hepatitis, such as the rubella syndrome, cytomegalovirus disease, toxoplasmosis, herpes simplex, varicella, Coxsackie virus, hepatitis B, and syphilis, as well as alpha-l-antitrypsin deficiency and cystic fibrosis.

chinese.chinese: 3．从室角度，能根据以下某一项把轻型海洋性贫血与缺铁性贫血加以鉴别
chinese.english: 3. From a laboratory standpoint, thalassemia minor can be distinguished from iron deficiency anemia by

chinese.chinese: 可通过铁治疗试验或室测定血清铁，铁结合力以及定量测定血红蛋白F和A2来鉴别这两种贫血。
chinese.english: Distinction between the two can be done either by a therapeutic trial with iron or laboratory determination of serum iron, iron binding capacity, and quantitative F and A2 hemoglobin levels.

chinese.chinese: 室资料指示有轻至中度贫血，白细胞增加，核左移，血沉升高，血清蛋白电泳显示低白蛋白血症，α及β球蛋白增加。
chinese.english: Laboratory data indicate mild-to-moderate anemia, leukocytosis with left shift and increase in ESR; serum protein electrophoresis reveal hypoalbuminemia and increase in alpha and beta globulins.

chinese.chinese: 各种免疫学功能试验的结果摘录记于室资料部分。
chinese.english: The results of the various tests of immunologic function are outlined in the section on Laboratory Data.

chinese.chinese: 很多种基础心脏病(如包括心绞痛和心肌梗死 在内的冠心病、高血压心脏病、风湿性心脏病、先 天性心脏病、心肌病)均可引起心力衰竭。
chinese.english: Numerous underlying heart diseases (e.g., CAD including angina pectoris and MI, hypertensive heart disease, RHD, congenital heart disease, cardiomyopathy) may cause CHF.

chinese.chinese: 所以，心力衰竭并不是心脏病的基本诊断，而是表明由不同 的基础心脏病所造成的不同级别的心功能不全的最终结局。
chinese.english: Therefore, CHF is not the primary diagnosis of heart disease, but rather it is the expression of the end result of abnormal cardiac function of different degree resulting from a variety of underlying cardiac diseases.

chinese.chinese: I级：病人确有心脏病(任何类型)而完全没有症状。
chinese.english: Class I: Patients with documented heart disease (any type) who are completely symptom-free.

chinese.chinese: 此外心肌病、高血压心脏病和心肌炎也可引起收缩力受损。
chinese.english: Likewise, impairment of contractility results from cardiomyopathy, hypertensive heart disease, and myocarditis.

chinese.chinese: 心脏机械性异常包括各类瓣膜病(如二尖瓣狭窄、二尖瓣关闭不全、主动脉瓣狭窄、主动脉瓣关 闭不全)，各种先天性心脏缺损(如室间隔缺损、房间隔缺损)，室壁瘤和缩窄性心包炎或心包填塞。
chinese.english: Mechanical abnormalities of the heart may include a variety of valvular heart diseases (e.g., MS, mitral insufficiency, aortic stenosis, aortic insufficiency— various congenital cardiac defects (e.g., VSD, ASD) ventricular aneurysm and constrictive pericarditis or cardiac tamponade.

chinese.chinese: (1)左心衰竭的一般体征包括心动过速，呼吸加快，皮肤冷凉，大汗、青紫，肺部湿啰音和喘鸣，心脏增大(体征)及奔马律。
chinese.english: (1) Common physical findings of LVF include tachycardia, tachypnea, cool skin, diaphoresis, cyanosis, moist rales and wheezing in the chest, signs of cardiomegaly, and gallop rhythms.

chinese.chinese: 当基础心脏病表现突出，而心力衰竭处于早期或很轻时，心力衰竭的诊断对每一个病例来说并不都是很简单的。
chinese.english: However, the diagnosis of heart failure is not always simple in every case when clinical manifestations of the underlying heart disease are predominant and CHF is incipient or mild.

chinese.chinese: 根据心力衰竭的严重程度和基础心脏病的性质，有些病人需要完全卧床休息，而另外一些则仅仅需要坐在椅子上休息。
chinese.english: Depending upon the severity of CHF and the nature of the underlying heart disease, some patients may" require complete bed rest whereas others may need just sitting in a chair.

chinese.chinese: 很多轻型心力衰竭的病人，严格控制体力活动 加上谨慎的饮食治疗已足以改善心脏功能而不必用 任何药物。
chinese.english: In many patients with mild CHF, good control of physical activities with careful diet therapy is sufficient to improve cardiac function without using any drug.

chinese.chinese: 洋地黄(强心甙)对心脏发挥两大药理作用：1.直接的正性肌力效应；2.延长房室交界区的不应期，减慢心脏脉冲在传导组织中的传导。
chinese.english: Digitalis (cardiac glycoside) exerts two major pharmacologic actions on the heart: 1. a direct positive inotropic effect and 2. a slowing of the cardiac impulses in conduction tissue as a result of an increase in the refractory period of the A-V junction.

chinese.chinese: 心力衰竭的预后取决于不同的因素，其中包括病人的年龄，基础心脏病的性质及严重程度，心脏增大的程度，心肌损害的范围，以及同时存在的心脏本身及心外疾病的性质和严重程度。
chinese.english: The prognosis of heart failure largely depends on various factors, including the patient's age, the nature and severity of the underlying heart disease, the degree of cardiomegaly, the extent of myocardial damage, and the nature and severity of coexisting cardiac as well as noncardiac diseases.

chinese.chinese: 强效利尿药，有效的降压药，先天性心脏缺 损及瓣膜损害的外科纠治，冠状动脉一主动脉旁路手术等措施可明显地改善心力衰竭的预后。
chinese.english: The availability of potent diuretics, effective antihypertensive agents, surgical correction of congenital cardiac defects or valvular lesions, and significantly improve the prognosis.

chinese.chinese: 尽管如此，由心肌病、心肌梗死、和其他不能通过手术纠治的心脏病所致的心力衰竭，其预后仍很差。
chinese.english: Nevertheless, the prognosis is still unfavorable in patients with heart failure due to cardiomyopathy, MI, and any cardiac condition not correctable by surgery.

chinese.chinese: 对于顽固性心力衰竭患者，应尽最大努力寻求手术纠治心脏损害的可能。
chinese.english: In patients with refractory heart failure, vigorous efforts should be made to detect a surgically correctable cardiac lesion.

chinese.chinese: 缺血性心脏病。
chinese.english: Ischaemic Heart Diseases (IHD)

chinese.chinese: 美国医疗保险计划决定停止对一些和医院失误相关情况的支付，对此，Lucian Leape在今天早上的波士顿环球报专栏上写到，“许多人会说，对于美国医院而言，这是一个很好、但是被长久拖欠的警告。”
chinese.english: Medicare's recent decision to stop paying hospitals for some conditions related to hospital errors is “a loud and, many would say, long-overdue wake-up call for American hospitals,” Lucian Leape writes this morning in a Boston Globe op-ed.

chinese.chinese: 在今天出版的《癌症》杂志中一项研究报道，当吸烟率下降时，头颈癌的发病数减少，口咽癌发病率（主要出现在扁桃体和舌基底部）不变，但在年轻人中发病率升高。两位作者（均来自得克萨斯大学癌症中心Anderson博士的团队）认为，这也许是由于感染了人乳头状瘤病毒（HPV），一种和宫颈癌有关的性传播病毒。作者之一的Paul Cinciripini（葛兰素史克公司的医学顾问）正在研究人乳头状病毒疫苗，从而能够与默克公司生产的 Gardasil宫颈癌预防性疫苗相竞争。
chinese.english: Even as the rate of smoking has fallen, driving down cases of head and neck cancer, the rate of cancers oropharyngeal cancers — which occur primarily on the tonsils and the base of the tongue — has stagnated, and has increased young adults, according to a study published today in the journal Cancer. This may be due to infection with the human papillomavirus, the sexually transmitted virus that is implicated in cervical cancer, the authors argue. Both authors are based at the University of Texas M.D. Anderson Cancer Center; one, Paul Cinciripini, reported working as a consultant for GlaxoSmithKline, which is developing an HPV vaccine that would compete with Merck's Gardasil.

chinese.chinese: 远多于其它绝大数州，宾夕法尼亚州要求医院给出详细的关于医疗花费和医疗效果的信息。今天已发表的州报告给出了2005年心脏手术的相关数据。
chinese.english: Far more than most other states, Pennsylvania requires its hospitals to disclose a wide array of information about costs and the results of medical procedures. A state report released today (available here) gives heart surgery figures for 2005.

chinese.chinese: 塞法隆的女发言人Stacey Beckhardt对健康日志宣称公司对其药品的促销符合药品标签上的说明，但我们担心有些医师并未按照我们的注册商标要求正确地开具处方。她表明芬太尼是一种使用已久，医生们都很熟悉的药品，并声明“至于柠檬酸芬太尼，我们今天正在采取积极的措施来强调坚持正确按照标签信息来使用药品的重要性”。
chinese.english: Cephalon spokeswoman Stacey Beckhardt told the Health Blog that the company “promotes its medications consistent with the labeled indication, but we are aware that there are some physicians who have prescribed our medications outside the approved labeling.” She noted that fentanyl is an old drug, familiar to many doctors, and added that “in the case of Fentora, today we are taking active steps to re-emphasize the importance of adhering to the labeling information.”

chinese.chinese: 联邦政府将拨款400万美元，对大量数据进行分析，以弄清楚ADHD和ADD这两种药物是否对心脏病和中风存在风险，FDA今天说。
chinese.english: The federal government will fund a $4 million analysis of a giant pool of data to tease out whether ADHD and ADD raise the risk of heart attack and stroke, the FDA said today.

chinese.chinese: 今天WSJ指出，公司的客户和销售名单已经稳步上升，但是它仍然处于亏损。
chinese.english: The company's roster of clients and sales have been rising steadily, but it's still losing money, today's WSJ points out.

chinese.chinese: ESC指南设定主席，Panos Vardas教授说：非常感谢技术的进步，起搏治疗不仅使病态窦房结和房室传导阻滞患者获益；今天，电刺激已经进步到提供心室再同步，其能作为经过选择的心衰患者的辅助治疗.
chinese.english: Professor Panos Vardas, chairperson of the ESC Guidelines Task Force, notes: “Thanks to important developments in technology, not only patients with sinus node dysfunction and atrial ventricular conduction defects can benefit from pacing therapy; today, electrical stimulation has advanced to provide ventricular resynchronisation as an adjunctive therapy for selected patients with heart failure.”

chinese.chinese: 今天早晨，公司宣布：公司正在加强服用Zyprexa的副作用的警告力度，比如体重增加，血糖、胆固醇、血脂上升。Zyprexa是礼莱公司的销售主打药，现在已经贴上了关于注意事项及副作用的警告，但是新的注意事项却更加的具体。礼莱公司提醒大夫们此药物说明书有变的信件如下：
chinese.english: This morning the company said its beefing up the warnings on weight gain and increases in blood sugar, cholesterol and other fats associated with taking Zyprexa. The drug, Lillys biggest seller, already carried some warnings about these risks, but the new cautions go quite a bit further. The letter Lilly is sending to doctors to alert them to the changes in the instructions for the drug is here.

chinese.chinese: 今天早晨，公司宣布：公司正在加强服用Zyprexa的副作用的警告力度，比如体重增加，血糖、胆固醇、血脂上升。Zyprexa是礼莱公司的销售主打药，现在已经贴上了关于注意事项及副作用的警告，但是新的注意事项却更加的具体。礼莱公司提醒大夫们此药物说明书有变的信件如下：
chinese.english: This morning the company said its beefing up the warnings on weight gain and increases in blood sugar, cholesterol and other fats associated with taking Zyprexa. The drug, Lillys biggest seller, already carried some warnings about these risks, but the new cautions go quite a bit further. The letter Lilly is sending to doctors to alert them to the changes in the instructions for the drug is here.

chinese.chinese: 公司显然不同意他们的观点。在今天的声明中IMS VP说：“佛蒙特州和缅因州法规的问题在于，他们创造了医生执业过程中全所未有的隐私法。”
chinese.english: The companies apparently disagree. “The problem with the Maine and Vermont statutes is that they create an entirely new and unprecedented privacy right for physicians in their professional conduct,” an IMS VP said in today's statement.

chinese.chinese: 药业公司辉瑞Pfizer宣布，不再对吸入性胰岛素Exubera®  (Inhaled insulin) 投资 ，并将全世界的权利退还到Nektar Therapeutics ，该疗法拥有吸入性胰岛素工艺。这意味着从今天起，90天以后辉瑞Pfizer不再有上市或销售吸入性胰岛素Exubera®  的权利
chinese.english: Phamaceutical company Pfizer have announced that they will no longer invest in Exubera®  (Inhaled insulin) and will return the worldwide rights to Nektar Therapeutics who own the inhaled insulin technology.  This means that after 90 days from today Pfizer will no longer have any rights to market or sell Exubera.

chinese.chinese: 今天刊登在ChemMedChem杂志网页上的两篇论文包括了这种程序的详细过程。
chinese.english: The details are contained in two papers published online today in the journal ChemMedChem.

chinese.chinese: 由于生物制药的强劲增长，处方药的销售可能会乐观一些。（由于没有查到buouy的意思，所以做了以上处理）但是生物技术尚不足以逆转制药业整体的衰退，这就意味着在未来几年内我们很可能看到像今天这样的内容的报告。
chinese.english: Prescription sales may be buouyed a bit by strong growth in biotech drugs. But biotech still isn't big enough to reverse the overall pharma slowdown, which means we'll likely be seeing reports like the one that came out today for years to come.

chinese.chinese: 今天早上，我已经向冷春港实验室的理事们转达了我的愿望：立即从实验室所长和董事会的位置退休，虽然我在过去的43年里一直担任那样的工作。比起79，我现在离80岁更近了。我的领导对实验室的残留影响早已够多了。不过正在发生的这种转换的情况却不是我能够已经预期或期望的
chinese.english: This morning I have conveyed to the Trustees of the Cold Spring Harbor Laboratory my desire to retire immediately from my position as its Chancellor, as well as from my position on its Board, on which I have served for the past 43 years. Closer now to 80 than 79, the passing on of my remaining vestiges of leadership is more than overdue. The circumstances in which this transfer is occurring, however, are not those which I could ever have anticipated or desired.

chinese.chinese: A．性病研究室检查(一种检查梅毒的血清学试验)
chinese.english: A. VDRL (a serological test for syphilis)

chinese.chinese: 诊断锌缺乏的室标准尚未明确地建立。
chinese.english: The laboratory criteria for the diagnosis of Zn deficiency are not unequivocally established.

chinese.chinese: 在有高度腿部深静脉血栓形成危险的病人，经输注或反覆应用小剂量肝素后，腿深静脉血栓形成和肺栓塞的发生率即相当明显地降低；如果在作手术时就开始给病人以肝素，则对手术病人最为有效，因为肝素的剂量可通过适当的室试验来控制。
chinese.english: The incidence of DVT and pulmonary embolism in high risk patients is reduced considerably by infusion or repeated small doses of heparin: in surgical patients this is most effective if started at the time of operation, the dosage being controlled by appropriate laboratory tests.

chinese.chinese: 在病史-体检-室检查的三组合中，病史是为首的。
chinese.english: Of this triad, history-physical-laboratory, the history is primus inter pares (first among equals).

chinese.chinese: 谵妄是一内科急症，要求通过病史、体检以及室和X线的全面评价，判断其最可能的原因。
chinese.english: Delirium is a medical emergency and requires full evaluation with history, physical examination, and laboratory and x-ray studies directed at the most likely cause.

chinese.chinese: 临床医生在诊断和处理病人的疾病时，对室检查结果的依赖性日渐增强。
chinese.english: Physicians are increasingly dependent on laboratory data for the identification and management of patient diseases.

chinese.chinese: 然而大量的室检查也给临床医生提出了新的问题。
chinese.english: However, the amount availability of laboratory tests presents the clinician with new problems.

chinese.chinese: 伴随着室服务范围的扩大，医生还必须考虑到节省开支的问题。
chinese.english: Cost containment efforts must accompany the proliferation of laboratory services.

chinese.chinese: 本章将对室检查的消费与有效性之间的权衡和临床应用的基本原则进行介绍。
chinese.english: Basic guidelines to the cost-effective utilization and clinical application of laboratory services are presented in this chapter.

chinese.chinese: 参议员Chuck Grassley今天在参议院发言，表示向觉得已经被制药公司强硬策略推得太远的医生公开投诉渠道，
chinese.english: Senator Chuck Grassley took to the Senate floor today to open the complaint window for doctors who feel they've been pushed too far by drug companies' hardball tactics.

chinese.chinese: 室检查的消费——有效性的利用必须先有一个基本的认识，即临床实验是一个有限的手段。
chinese.english: Cost-effective utilization of laboratory services; must be based on an awareness that the clinical laboratory is a finite resource.

chinese.chinese: 这一认识不仅适用于需要进行室检查的数量和频繁性上，特别适用于对需要进行检查项目中哪些应作优先安排的问题上。
chinese.english: This applies to the volume and frequency of tests requested and more specifically to the priority of services demanded.

chinese.chinese: 要掌握这一重要概念需要对室仪器设计有一基本了解.
chinese.english: A general understanding of laboratory instrument design is required to appreciate this important concept.。

chinese.chinese: 对室检查资料的合理解释必须考虑到非疾病性因素可能影响试验的结果，治疗用药可以改变体液成分的浓度。
chinese.english: Intelligent interpretation of laboratory data must consider nondisease variables that may alter laboratory tests results; Therapeutic agents may alter the concentration of body fluid constituents.

chinese.chinese: 临床上应用室资料要求了解相应试验的特点以及与临床表现的相关性。
chinese.english: The clinical application of laboratory data requires understanding of test characteristics as well as correlation with clinical findings.

chinese.chinese: 即使是精确进行的室试验对很多临床问题作出决定性处理也可能缺乏特异性和敏感性。
chinese.english: Laboratory tests, even when accurately performed, may lack the specificity and sensitivity required for decision making in the management of many clinical problems.

chinese.chinese: 缺血性心脏病通常因有心性疼痛(劳力性心绞痛)或心肌梗死的病史而被发现。
chinese.english: The disease is usually inferred from a history of cardiac pain (angina of effort) or of myocardial infarction.

chinese.chinese: 而其中患缺血性心脏病的比患支气管炎、肺癌的要多得多，由吸烟而造成的意外死亡中，有50％是缺血性心脏病所致。
chinese.english: However, ischemic heart disease is so common compared with bronchitis and lung cancer that about 50% of all excess deaths attributable to cigarette smoking are due to ischaemic heart disease.

chinese.chinese: 家族史中注意有无心脏意外，对年青患者尤其要注意有无糖尿病、高血压、痛风的家族病史。
chinese.english: Family history of heart attacks, especially if young; diabetes; hypertension; gout.

chinese.chinese: 心脏室壁瘤的表现(重搏波)。
chinese.english: Evidence of a cardiac aneurysm (double impulse).

chinese.chinese: 申请系列心电图检查，心脏酶谱检查，如羟丁脱氢酶、天门冬氨酸转氨酶或肌酸磷酸激酶的同功酶MB。
chinese.english: Ask for an ECG series and a cardiac enzyme series, e.g. hydroxybutyrate dehydrogenase, aspartate transferase or MB isoenzyme of creatine phosphokinase.

chinese.chinese: 所有心脏病人都需摄取X线胸片。
chinese.english: A chest X-ray is necessary in all cardiac investigations.

chinese.chinese: 硝酸异山梨醇或肼苯哒嗪有助于降低心脏的前、后负荷。
chinese.english: Vasodilation therapy with isosorbide or hydralazine may help to reduce preload and after load on the heart.

chinese.chinese: 如果无效，可考虑心脏起搏。
chinese.english: If unsuccessful, consider cardiac pacing.

chinese.chinese: 心脏阻滞：前壁梗死时合并的各种级别的传导阻滞都比下壁梗死时的阻滞严重得多。
chinese.english: Heart block: All degrees of heart block are more serious if they complicate anterior rather than inferior infarcts.

chinese.chinese: III°阻滞：完全性心脏阻滞在等待置入起搏导管时。
chinese.english: Third degree: Complete heart block (CHB).

chinese.chinese: 注意：因为房室结动脉是右冠状动脉的一个分支，所以下壁心肌梗死时合并完全性心脏阻滞比较多见。
chinese.english: NB: CHB is commoner in inferior myocardial infarctions because the AV nodal artery is a branch of the right coronary artery.

chinese.chinese: 前壁心肌梗死合并完全性心脏阻滞是一个不祥的征兆，因为这表明典梗死的范围很大。
chinese.english: CHB complicating anterior infarction is an ominous situation since it implies a very large muscle infarction.

chinese.chinese: 当病人有阿—斯综合征发作，因心动过缓而致心排血量不足，或是传导束有广泛损害时，应安置永久性的心脏起搏器。
chinese.english: Permanent pacing should be considered in patients who have had Stokes-Adams attacks, low output states secondary to the bradycardia, and those with extensive damage to the bundle.

chinese.chinese: 此时应行胸外心脏按摩及人工控制呼吸，并继以直流电 转复，并给碳酸氢钠50～l00mmo1静注。
chinese.english: External cardiac massage with artificial ventilation followed by DC cardioversion and intravenous sodium bicarbonate 50—100 mmol.

chinese.chinese: 捶击胸部有可能成功地触发心脏再次收缩。
chinese.english: Blows on the chest may be sufficient stimulus to provoke repeated systole, but if an arterial pulse is not definitely detected, external cardiac massage and artificial ventilation are essential.

chinese.chinese: 实际上，在所有的室检查中，正常人和患病人的结果常有重叠。
chinese.english: The occurrence of an overlap of results in healthy and diseased subjects is characteristic of virtually all laboratory tests.

chinese.chinese: 在自动细胞计数器问世之前，血细胞比容最容易测定，因而较之红细胞计数和血红蛋白测定更为常用，目前，很多医院的室使用细胞自动计数器可同样方便地测定上述所有参数。
chinese.english: Before the development of the automated cell counter, the hematocrit was easiest to measure and was therefore used more often than the hemoglobin or RBC count; now many hospital laboratories measure all these parameters with equal ease using the automated cell counter.

chinese.chinese: 淋巴细胞减少是比较少见的室检查的结果。
chinese.english: Lymphocytopenia is a comparatively infrequent laboratory finding.

chinese.chinese: 血小板计数规定的正常范围在不同的临床室差别甚大。
chinese.english: There is considerable variability from one clinical laboratory to the next in the accepted range of normal for platelet counts.

chinese.chinese: 在文献中有各种不同的名称描述糖尿病在人口统计学、临床、室或遗传等方面的特征。
chinese.english: Several different terms have appeared in the literature to describe demographic, clinical, laboratory, or genetic features of diabetes mellitus.

chinese.chinese: CO2总量的测定是临床室用以估算碳酸氢盐的最为常用的方法。
chinese.english: Total CO2 content of serum is the test most commonly offered by clinical laboratories as an estimate of bicarbonate.

chinese.chinese: 在有关心脏的所有室检查中，心电图提供的信息最多。
chinese.english: Of all laboratory cardiac procedures the electrocardiogram provides the most information for the effort involved.

chinese.chinese: 心导管插入术是无菌手术，它在专门的心导管插入室内和X光科进行。
chinese.english: Cardiac catheterization is a sterile procedure performed in the cardiac catheterization laboratory or the x-ray department.

chinese.chinese: 现在，根据蛋白质特殊的化学物理性质，可以用室技术将它们方便地区分为几种类型。
chinese.english: In the meantime, proteins can be conveniently differentiated into a few classes by laboratory techniques based on their special chemical and physical properties.

chinese.chinese: 用于蛋白质分离与分类的室技术
chinese.english: Laboratory techniques used for the separation and classification of proteins

chinese.chinese: 为探索这两种突变之间的联系，Lo和他的团队分析从31名接受BRAF抑制剂治疗的黑色素瘤病人那里获得的肿瘤样本。Lo说：“在这些病人中，16%的标本在治疗前携带两种突变。”研究者利用Lo的室培养的黑色素瘤细胞株证实了以上发现。
chinese.english: To explore the association between the two mutations, Lo and his team analyzedtumor samples from 31 melanoma patients treated with a BRAF inhibitor. Amongthose patients, 16 percent of samples carried the double mutations in tumorsbefore the cancer was treated, Lo said. The findings were confirmed usemelanoma cells lines grown in Lo's laboratory.

chinese.chinese: 利用室小鼠作为实验模型，研究人员能够证明浆细胞树突状细胞参与血管内动脉粥样硬化斑块早期形成的过程。刺激浆细胞树突状细胞可引起分泌大量的刺激炎症过程的干扰素、蛋白。在炎症部位炎症细胞聚集并产生可以诱导干扰素释放的蛋白，另外，不能产生该蛋白的小鼠血管内斑块数量较少。刺激树突状细胞反过来引起斑块内巨噬细胞数量的增加。巨噬细胞通常扮演“清道夫”的角色，吞噬细胞尸体和脂肪沉积并降解它们。然而，它们也可以“过饱和”，吞噬的脂肪超过了它们的吸收能力。当发生这种情况，它们就转变为泡沫状细胞而不再与斑块抗争。除此之外，活化的、成熟的浆细胞树突状细胞可以启动针对斑块内特定分子的免疫应答，这将使斑块形成的过程恶性循环。
chinese.english: Using laboratory mice as an experimental model, the researcherswere able to show that pDCs contribute to early steps in the formation ofathersclerotic lesions in the blood vessels. Stimulation of pDCs causes them tosecrete large amounts of interferons, proteins that strongly stimulateinflammatory processes. The protein that induces the release of interferons isproduced by immune cells that accumulate specifically at sites of inflammation,and mice that are unable to produce this protein also have fewer plaques. Stimulationof pDCs in turn leads to an increase in the numbers of macrophages present inplaques. Macrophages normally act as a clean-up crew, removing cell debris andfatty deposits by ingesting and degrading them. However, they can also"overindulge", taking up more fat than they can digest. When thishappens, they turn into so-called foam cells that promote rather than combatatherosclerosis. In addition, activated, mature pDCs can initiate an immuneresponse against certain molecul

chinese.chinese: 麻省理工学院电子研究室的研究人员发明了一项基于脑血流计算机建模的全新技术。基于这一模型，研究者能够通过两项创伤性降低的测量，比如动脉血压和超声测量脑血流速度，来计算颅内压。通过这一方法，医生们能够持续监测颅压的任何变化，并且对可能缓慢积累出现的问题保持警惕。
chinese.english: Researchers at MIT's Research Laboratory of Electronics (RLE) developed the novel technique based on a computer model of the way blood flows through the brain. Based on the model, researchers are able to calculate brain pressure from two less invasive measurements, i.e. arterial blood pressure and an ultrasound measurement of the velocity of blood flow through the brain. This approach allows physicians to constantly monitor any changes in brain pressure, as well as being alerted of problems that may build up slowly.

chinese.chinese: 最新的《Science》杂志在线版的一篇文章中描述了这个新发现。他们的研究团队成员包括诺特丹大学生物科学助理教授 MichaelFerdig和基因组学核心室常务主任John Tan的博士生Becky Miller，并同Texas生物医学研究机构TimAnderson和泰国Shoklo疟疾研究机构 Nosten博士合作。
chinese.english: The new discovery is described in a paper appearing in the latest early onlineedition of the journal Science. The team of researchers includes Notre Dame'sMichael Ferdig, associate professor of biological sciences and doctoral studentBecky Miller along with John Tan, managing director of the Genomics CoreFacility, in collaboration with Tim Anderson of Texas Biomedical ResearchInstitute and Francois Nosten, M.D., the Shoklo Malaria Unit in Thailand.

chinese.chinese: 诺特丹大学研究团队和Texas 生物医学的项目带头人一同利用新的基因组学和生物信息学方法来研究疟疾的耐药。诺特丹大学基因组学和生物信息学核心室的Tan和Ferdig 团队的Mille及其他成员，在开发基因芯片来进行详细的疟疾患者样本基因分析方面起到关键性的作用。这个芯片能够分析7000个能提供信息的"SNPs"（单核苷酸多态性），它处处将寄生虫基因均与地隔开。
chinese.english: The Notre Dame team, working with the project leaders at Texas Biomedical, usedthe new genomics and bioinformatics approaches to investigate malariadrug-resistance. Tan of Notre Dame's Genomics and Bioinformatics Core Facility,working with Miller and other members of the Ferdig team was instrumental indeveloping the gene chip to perform detailed genetic analysis of malariapatient samples. This chip can analyze 7,000 informative "SNPs"(single nucleotide polymorphisms) spaced evenly throughout the parasite genome.

chinese.chinese: 在今天上午的美国药物科学家联合会的会议上，研究人员描述了这种药丸对老鼠影响的早期工作，该药丸也许有一天可以使男人暂时不孕。关键是所谓的选择性雄激素受体调节剂，或SARM。 "这些化合物抑制大脑激素，并以一个可逆的方式关闭了精子的产生， " Jim Dalton，研究和开发GTx的副总负责人，告诉健康博客。GTx的总部设在田纳西州孟菲斯，专门研究荷尔蒙疗法治疗癌症和男性的健康。
chinese.english: This morning at a meeting of the American Association of Pharmaceutical Scientists, researchers described early work in rats on a pill that one day could render men temporarily infertile. The key is something called a selective androgen receptor modulator, or SARM. “These compounds suppress a brain hormone, and shut down sperm production in a reversible way,” Jim Dalton, vice president of research and development at GTx, tells the Health Blog. GTx, based in Memphis, Tenn., specializes in hormone treatments for cancer and men's health.

chinese.chinese: 这一新发现今天由山本晋也京都大学和在美国旧金山的万科研究所心血管疾病在细胞杂志网上的一篇论文中公布，并由威斯康辛大学的詹姆斯汤姆森和他的同事发表在科学杂志的一篇论文上。
chinese.english: The new discovery is being published online today in Cell, in a paper by Shinya Yamanaka of Kyoto University and the Gladstone Institute for Cardiovascular Disease in San Francisco, and in Science, in a paper by James Thomson and his colleagues at the University of Wisconsin.

chinese.chinese: 并没有参与该研究结果的研究人员和伦理学家说，该工作可能在干细胞领域掀起革命。在不久的将来某个时间，他们说，今天的以创造并破坏人类胚胎以获取干细胞在道义上是否可以接受的辩论将变得毫无意义。
chinese.english: Researchers and ethicists not involved in the findings say the work should reshape the stem cell field. At some time in the near future, they said, today's debate over whether it is morally acceptable to create and destroy human embryos to obtain stem cells should be moot.

chinese.chinese: 该重组皮肤细胞可能尚未证明和从人类胚胎直接得到的胚胎干细胞有细微的差别，并且新的方法包括有潜在危险的步骤，如引进癌症基因。但干细胞研究人员说，他们有信心，不用不久就可以完善该方法和今天的弊端将被证明是暂时性的。
chinese.english: The reprogrammed skin cells may yet prove to have subtle differences from embryonic stem cells that come directly from human embryos, and the new method includes potentially risky steps, like introducing a cancer gene. But stem cell researchers say they are confident that it will not take long to perfect the method and that today's drawbacks will prove to be temporary.

chinese.chinese: 今天由该公司与联邦监管机构公布的最新的数据表明Xience在防止冠状动脉再狭窄表现上好于波士顿科学的Taxus 2 ，市场的领导者，在两年时间内进行了600多例该手术。
chinese.english: The newest data, released today by the company and federal regulators, showed that Xience outperformed Boston Scientific's Taxus 2, the market leader, in preventing coronary arteries from reclogging over a two-year period in more than 600 patients.

chinese.chinese: 顾问团将会在今天下午晚些时候，就是否建议批准替地沙米（tedisamil）进行投票。
chinese.english: The committee will vote later this afternoon on whether to advise approval of the drug, known generically as tedisamil.

chinese.chinese: 今天在美国的呼吸和急症医学杂志公布的这个研究将1300多个病人随机分配使用施力泰或者思力华。研究目的比较药物在多大程度改善致命性肺疾病—慢性阻塞性肺疾病的恶化。在该治疗措施上，给药方法相同。
chinese.english: The study, published today in the American Journal of Respiratory and Critical Care Medicine, randomly assigned more than 1,300 patients to take either Seretide or Spiriva. The study's main goal was to compare how well the drugs prevented exacerbations of COPD, a deadly lung disease. On that measure, the medications performed about the same.

chinese.chinese: 这项研究，由Wake Forest大学医学院、瑞典的Karolinska研究所、哈佛公共卫生学院、Johns Hopkins医学研究所共同完成，将发表在新英格兰杂志1月第31期上。该杂志的发言人Jennifer Zeis解释道，为什么今天在线发布，是因为它“是一个非常活跃的研究领域，有着太多的争论。”
chinese.english: The study, by scientists at Wake Forest University School of Medicine, the Karolinska Institute in Sweden, the Harvard School of Public Health, and Johns Hopkins Medical Institutions, will appear in the January 31 issue of the New England Journal of Medicine. It is being released online today because, journal spokeswoman Jennifer Zeis explained, “it is a very active area of research with a lot of competition.”

chinese.chinese: 在今天的Lancet杂志上有这样的报道：通过调节心功能衰竭患者的免疫系统能降低患者死亡的风险，并减少住院次数。
chinese.english: Modifying the immune system of a patient with heart failure reduces the patient's risk of death and the need for hospitalization, according to research published in today's edition of The Lancet.

chinese.chinese: 研究者在今天《科学》杂志的网络版报道，他们从零开始重建了完全基因组。尽管这个团队没有证明这个DNA可以替代已存在的基因，但是这项工作为定制细菌更有效的生产药物、生物燃料和其他对人来有用的分子铺平了道路。
chinese.english: Researchers have rebuilt an entire genome from scratch, they report online today in Science. Although the team has yet to demonstrate that this DNA can substitute for the real thing, the work paves the way for customized bacteria that could efficiently produce drugs, biofuels, and other molecules useful to humankind.

chinese.chinese: 今天发表在BMJ杂志上一文作者呼吁，气候变化将会对人类的健康产生重大影响，目前急需采取大胆的环境政策以挽救生灵。
chinese.english: Climate change will have a huge impact on human health and bold environmental policy decisions are needed now to protect the world's population, according to the author of an article published in the BMJ today.

chinese.chinese: 过去的研究显示，创伤对美国女性HIV/AIDS流行有利，是因为它与HIV阴性但有感染可能的妇女或女孩的一些危险行为或危险状态有关。但是直到今天，关于已感染HIV的妇女或女孩创伤率和PTSD率的多少仍没有确定性的估计。
chinese.english: Previous studies have shown that trauma contributes to the HIV/AIDS epidemic among American women because it is associated with variety of risky situations and behaviors among at-risk HIV-negative women and girls. But until now, no definitive estimates existed of the rates of trauma and PTSD among women and girls already infected with HIV.

chinese.chinese: 前副总统迪克·切尼今天接受了心脏移植，根据其办公室所做的声明。他现在正在 Falls Church, VA的Inova Fairfax医院的特殊病房中等待恢复。
chinese.english: Former vice president Dick Cheney received a heart transplant today, according to a statement released by his office. He is currently recovering in the intensive care unit of Inova Fairfax Hospital in Falls Church, VA.

chinese.chinese: 这项由克利夫兰诊所勒纳研究所（Cleveland Clinic's Lerner Research Institute）的研究人员所领衔的研究发现小鼠的corin（通常存在于心脏中的一种酶），他们发现，在子宫中缺乏这种酶可能是本病的根本发病原因。该项研究成果发表于今天的《自然》。
chinese.english: The study, led by researchers in Cleveland Clinic's Lerner Research Institute, examined mice for corin - an enzyme normally present in the heart - and determined that the deficiency of this enzyme in the uterus may be an underlying cause of the disease. The study was published today in Nature.

chinese.chinese: 外科肿瘤学会今天在弗罗里达州的奥兰多举办年会，会上提交了一项国家临床试验结果。该结果称术前应用芳香酶抑制剂可以增加一种可能性，即患雌激素受体阳性乳腺癌的绝经妇女可以接受乳房保留手术而不需要进行乳房切除术。
chinese.english: Preoperative treatment with aromatase inhibitors increases the likelihood that postmenopausal women with estrogen receptor-positive breast cancer will be able to have breast-conserving surgery rather than a mastectomy, according to the results of a national clinical trial presented today at the Society of Surgical Oncology annual meeting in Orlando, Fla.

chinese.chinese: 如心脏停搏反覆出。
chinese.english: Asystole may recur.

chinese.chinese: 注意：当心脏骤停抢救成功后，如病人意识不完全清醒，应给以地塞米松4mgQd静注，以减轻脑水肿。
chinese.english: NB: After successful treatment of cardiac arrest, unless the patient is fully conscious, give dexamethasone 4 mg qds i.v. to reduce cerebral oedema.

chinese.chinese: 心脏室壁瘤：其发生率比一般想象的要多，临床表现为严重心力衰竭，反复心律失常，室壁瘤内血栓脱落造成的反覆栓塞，心绞痛，心脏明显增大 及不正常的心前区搏动(如胸骨缘出现的心脏搏动)等可间断出现。
chinese.english: Cardiac aneurysm: This is more common than is usually supposed.

chinese.chinese: X线透视可见到不正常的心脏搏动及心脏外形。
chinese.english: Its presence may be suggested by persistent ST elevation in convalescence.

chinese.chinese: 心脏破裂继发心包填塞。
chinese.english: Myocardial rupture with consequent tamponade.

chinese.chinese: 高血压是中风，心力衰竭最重要的危险因素，与吸烟，肥胖、高胆固醇血症并列为缺血性心脏病的重要危险因素。
chinese.english: Hypertension is the most significant risk factor in strokes and heart failure, and in ischemic heart disease it is as important as smoking, obesity or hyper cholesterolaemia.

chinese.chinese: 心脏可出现左室肥大，主动脉喷射性杂音，主动脉瓣第二音亢进。
chinese.english: In the heart there may be left ventricular hypertrophy with an aortic ejection murmur and a loud aortic second sound.

chinese.chinese: 心电图或X线检查有心脏增大迹象者，或有其他并发症时，尽管高血压程度低，也应予以治疗。
chinese.english: Treatment may be indicated at lower pressures in the presence of ECG and radiologic, evidence of cardiac enlargement, or in the presence of other complications.

chinese.chinese: 4.风湿性心脏炎。
chinese.english: 4. Rheumatic carditis.

chinese.chinese: 3.换瓣的适应征为：a)无症状的严重狭窄(因为有猝死的危险)；b)症状恶化，包括晕厥；c)心脏迅速增大；d)心电图有“劳损”；e)一旦发生心衰。
chinese.english: 3. Valve replacement is indicated for a) asymptomatic severe stenosis (because of the risk of sudden death), b) for symptomatic deterioration including syncope, c) a rapidly enlarging heart d) 'strain' on ECG, e) as soon as failure has occurred.

chinese.chinese: 风湿性心脏炎现在仅仅是一种罕见的原因。
chinese.english: Rheumatic carditis is now is a rare cause.

chinese.chinese: 胸部X线检查：心脏增大。
chinese.english: Chest X-ray shows cardiac enlargement.

chinese.chinese: 8.如症状恶化，心脏迅速增大，或超声探查年青人左室内径>55mm；即或无症状，均应考虑换瓣。
chinese.english: 3. Valve replacement should be considered for symptomatic deterioration, if the heart size increases rapidly or if the left ventricular internal diameter is greater than 55 mm on echo in a young patient even when asymptomatic.

chinese.chinese: 心脏可见右室肥大，在肺瓣区(左第2肋间)可闻及收缩期杂音、震颤及喷射性喀喇音。
chinese.english: There is a systolic thrill and murmur in the pulmonary area (second left intercostal space) and an ejection click.

chinese.chinese: 脉搏急剧上升(与主动脉瓣狭窄时的平台状缓慢上升的脉搏不同)，心脏肥厚，可触及心房搏动，并继之以晚收缩期主动脉瓣喷射性杂音，以左第3～4肋间最明显。
chinese.english: There is a steep-rising jerky pulse (unlike the slow-rising plateau pulse of aortic valve steno- sis), cardiac hypertrophy, a palpable atrial beat followed by a late systolic aortic ejection murmur usually heard best in the left third and fourth intercostal spaces.

chinese.chinese: 在一个到目前为止世界最大的HIV疫苗试验的跟踪研究中，研究人员已经获得有关免疫系统反应的重要线索，而免疫系统反应在保护人类免受HIV感染中起到作用。以该疫苗试验为基础的室研究成果刊发于《新英格兰医学杂志》。
chinese.english: Researchers have gained important clues about immune system responses that could play a role in protecting people from HIV infection in follow-up studies from the world's largest HIV vaccine trial to date. Results from laboratory studies based on the trial were published in the New England Journal of Medicine.

chinese.chinese: 由于高毒性沙门菌株暴露于环境后的特性与低毒性菌株相似，因此之前寻找高毒性菌株的努力都白费了。Mahan教授说：“它们利用这一诡计在感染中获得毒力，而之后在室中又转换到低毒力状态。”
chinese.english: Previous efforts to find hypervirulent strains were unsuccessful since bacteria behave much like their less-virulent cousins after environmental exposure. "The trick was to assess their virulence during infection - before they switch back to a less-virulent state in the lab," said Professor Mahan.

chinese.chinese: 猝死是中风的严重结局人们却常常对他认识不足。急性卒中会干扰自主神经功能，导致心肌损伤，心电图异常，心律失常以致猝死。室和临床证据显示，岛叶梗死后自主神经异常更常见，而该区域对于控制交感神经系统和副交感神经系统的自主功能十分重要。心血管并发症可以增加卒中后心脏病的发病率、死亡率。因此，许多卒中后发生的猝死或严重的非致死性心脏病很可能是因为心血管系统和神经系统间的相互作用的结果。而人们对其引起猝死的详尽机制却还不够清楚。因而需要对急性卒中后自主神经系统的作用深入进行研究，以让我们发现有高猝死率的患者。
chinese.english: Sudden death is an important but widely under-recognisedconsequence of stroke. Acute stroke can disturb central autonomic control,resulting in myocardial injury, electrocardiographic abnormalities, cardiacarrhythmias, and ultimately sudden death. Experimental and clinical evidencesuggests that autonomic imbalance is more frequent after infarcts involving theinsularcortex, a crucial region for the control of sympathetic andparasympathetic autonomic functions. Cardiovascular comorbidities increase the riskof cardiac morbidity and mortality after stroke. Thus, many sudden deaths andserious non-fatal cardiac events after stroke are probably due to aninteraction between cardiovascular and neurological causes. The exactmechanisms leading to sudden death remain incompletely understood. Furtherresearch is needed to investigate the autonomic consequences of acute strokeand to identify patients at high risk of sudden death.

chinese.chinese: 研究团队确认了两个CNVs，它们在患侵略性前列腺癌男性和未患癌症的男性间有明显差异。在美国另一组有800名患者参与的研究中也出现了这个结果。在检查两个变异体对室细胞的影响之后，研究团队发现它们能增强肿瘤细胞生长和侵袭的能力。
chinese.english: Theteam identified two CNVs that were considerably different between those withaggressive prostate cancer and men without cancer. This finding was reproducedin another group involving 800 patients in the United States. After examining theeffect of the two variants in laboratory cells, the team found that theyincrease the ability of cancer cells to grow and to invade.

chinese.chinese: 这项研究是由来自哥本哈根室，Steno医院及哥本哈根大学医院的研究者们实施的。
chinese.english: The study was conducted by researchers from the Copenhagen Trial Unit, Steno Hospital and the Copenhagen University Hospital.

chinese.chinese: 在转移变化的过程中居民结构的签退改善了患者的照料：在这项研究中，症状轻的居民在梅奥诊所的普通神经内科，中风和神经重症监护病房的患者在轮转的前半段通过非结构化的签退方式，在后半段通过结构化的系统。居民报告称，标准化的签退大幅改善了沟通，包括相关既往病史的信息，室的检测，如何处理护理和药房电话的建议，以及最新的号码的状态。使用规范签退的居民也更容易和病人及家属提前分享测试的结果来换班。这使签退过程中的总体满意度显著提高。
chinese.english: Structured resident sign-out during shift changes improves patient care: In the study, junior residents in Mayo Clinic's General Neurology, Stroke and Neurologic Intensive Care Units spent the first half of their rotations using unstructured sign-out approaches and transitioned to a structured system for the second half. The residents reported that the standardized sign-out improved communication substantially, including information on pertinent past medical history, pending lab tests, recommendations on how to handle nursing and pharmacy calls, and up-to-date code status. Residents using standardized sign-out were also more likely to share test results with patients and their families prior to shift changes. This led to a significant increase in overall satisfaction with the sign-out process.

chinese.chinese: 来自哥伦比亚大学医学中心(CUMC)的研究人员近日发现一条调控大脑干细胞保留和释放的分子信号转导通路。这一发现为理解神经系统的正常和异常发育提供了新的见解，同时该发现也将为神经疾病和神经损伤的再生治疗开辟新的思路。该项研究由Anna Lasorella博士和Antonio Iavarone博士的两个室共同努力完成，研究成果在线发表《自然细胞生物学》杂志（Nature Cell Biology）。
chinese.english: Researchers at Columbia University Medical Center (CUMC) have identified a molecular pathway that controls the retention and release of the brain's stem cells. The discovery offers new insights into normal and abnormal neurologic development and could eventually lead to regenerative therapies for neurologic disease and injury. The findings, from a collaborative effort of the laboratories of Drs. Anna Lasorella and Antonio Iavarone, were published in the online edition of Nature Cell Biology.

chinese.chinese: 通过对这种转基因小鼠大脑内的NSCs研究，揭示了Id蛋白质分子直接调控一种称作Rap1GAP蛋白的生成，而这种Rap1GAP蛋白会再反过来控制Rap1（一种主要的细胞黏附调控因子）。研究人员发现Id-Rap1GAP-Rap1信号通路对于NSCs黏附于它们所处的特殊的‘壁龛’，以及NSC自我持续不断更新的维持起到非常关键的作用。Iavarone博士说：“也许还存在其他相关的信号通路在发挥同样的作用，但我们相信这一条信号转导通路是最关键的一条。此外，也有极充分的理由相信该信号通路在其他种类的干细胞中也发挥着类似的作用，现在我们室目前正努力着手这一衍生问题的研究。”
chinese.english: Studies of NSCs from this strain of mice revealed that Id proteins directly regulate the production of a protein called Rap1GAP, which in turn controls Rap1, one of the master regulators of cell adhesion. The researchers found that the Id-Rap1GAP-Rap1 pathway is critical for the adhesion of NSCs to their niche and for NSC maintenance. "There may be other pathways involved, but we believe this is the key pathway," said Dr. Iavarone. "There is good reason to believe that it operates in other kinds of stem cells, and our labs are investigating this question now."

chinese.chinese: 当树木和植物释放出花粉，无数的花粉过敏患者就会打喷嚏、瘙痒和流泪。在德国，粗略地估计大约每四个人中就有一个花粉过敏患者，而且这个数字正在上升。气候变化被认为是过敏症患者增加的原因之一。室研究和不多的户外研究显示空气中二氧化碳增加能加快植物生长，促进花粉的产生。温度上升和物种入侵也是导致花粉季节延长的原因。
chinese.english: When trees and plants release their pollen, millions of hay fever sufferers are affected by sneezing fits and itchy, watery eyes. Today in Germany, roughly every fourth person suffers from allergies -- and this figure is set to rise. Climate change is seen as one of the factors fuelling the increase in allergic responses. Lab experiments and a small number of open-air studies have shown that increased concentrations of carbon dioxide (CO2) in the air can boost plant growth and subsequently pollen production. Warmer temperatures and invasive species are also leading to longer pollen seasons.

chinese.chinese: 研究结果强调PTSD患者机体应激反应的生理基础同血压的调节之间存在联系。无论是ACEI还是ARBs，它们都是干预血管紧张素II(一种调节血压的激素)。Ressler表示他的室已经开始着手老鼠体内血管紧张素II的作用研究，在老鼠体内该激素对于脑内比如杏仁核和纹状核等区域对于应激和惊吓/恐惧反应的调节起着非常重要的作用。研究所得的这些数据表明，这类药物或许不但能降低心血管系统中机体对于应激刺激的生理反应，同时也能降低大脑对于应激刺激的反应。
chinese.english: The results underline the physiological basis for the body's stress responses in PTSD, and links to blood pressure regulation. Both ACE inhibitors and ARBs interfere with angiotensin II, a hormone that regulates blood pressure. Ressler says his laboratory has begun investigating the role of angiotensin II in mice, in regions of the brain known to be important for stress and fear responses, such as the amygdala and bed nucleus of the stria terminalis. These data suggest that this class of medication may both decrease the body's physiological response to stress in the cardiovascular system as well as decrease the brain's response to stress.

chinese.chinese: NSABB(国家科学生物安全顾问委员会)，该机构为NIH（国立卫生研究院）提供建议，在去年。这个机构要求删除Kawaoka室报告中的敏感数据，专家组同样这样要求Dutch研究。这个专家组去除病毒传播的内容，还有引起病毒在哺乳动物之间传播的突变的内容。在本月他们改变了决定。
chinese.english: The NSABB (National Science Advisory Board for Biosecurity), which advises theNIH (National Institutes of Health), last year recommended removing sensitivedata from Kawaoka laboratory's report. The panel recommended that the same bedone with a Dutch study. The Panel wanted the methodologies used to make thevirus transmissible removed from the report, as well as the mutations requiredto make the virus mammal-transmissible. This month they changed theirrecommendation.

chinese.chinese: 这个发现表明，肝脏中的脂肪被分割成许多微小的包被的脂质小滴有助于控制机体的胰岛素抵抗。Lazar室博士后研究员、第一作者Zheng Sun博士指出，这些发现证实了一个事实----- HDAC3在协调代谢活动的整合信号（源于内部生物钟）中有着关键性的作用，特别是在肝脏。
chinese.english: The findings suggest that the cordoning off of lipids of the liver in many, tiny coated droplets helps to manage insulin resistance in the body. And, the findings cement the fact that HDAC3 is pivotal in integrating signals from the internal body clock to coordinate metabolism, especially in the liver, notes the first author Zheng Sun, PhD, postdoctoral fellow in the Lazar lab.

chinese.chinese: 本研究的目的是调查与活检证实的LN的相关因素，确定在南非预测增殖性LN的最好的临床和室模型。
chinese.english: The purpose of this study was to document factors associated with biopsy proven LN and to determine clinical and laboratory models that best predict proliferative LN in South Africans.

chinese.chinese: 研究者将人类的基因插入到昆虫细胞中使其表达心肌蛋白以用来研究。Dawson的室是世界上少数几个可以开展此项工作的室之一。
chinese.english: The researchers inserted human genes into insect cells to make heart muscle proteins for study. Dawson's lab is one of the few in the world able to do this work.

chinese.chinese: 本研究旨在调查目前超重的SLE门诊病人的社会人口学、临床和室特征，以及评价免疫抑制剂的疗效。
chinese.english: The objective of this study is to determine the socio-demographic, clinical and laboratory characteristics of outpatients with SLE who present with excess weight as well as to assess the immunosuppressive therapy used.

chinese.chinese: 这个研究显得很受欢迎。在今天这里的2012年度美国心脏病学院科学年会最新会议上，委派的讨论者Noel Bairey Merz博士（加利福尼亚州洛杉矶西达斯西奈医学中心）说：“这些是完美的数据。”随后她在heartwire上评论道：“是不是每个人早期开始减低LDL比等到发现高危人群然后治疗他们更好，这是一个大的公共卫生问题。而这些数据提示早期开始减低LDL更好；它将使你得到3倍以上的收益。”
chinese.english: The study appeared to be well received. At the late-breaking session here today at the American College of Cardiology 2012 Scientific Sessions, designated discussant Dr Noel Bairey Merz (Cedars-Sinai Medical Center, Los Angeles, CA) said: "These are beautiful data." She later commented to heartwire: "The big public-health question is whether it is better to start early and lower LDL in everyone rather than to wait to find the high-risk subjects and just treat them later. And these data suggest it is better to go for the first option; you get three times more bang for your buck that way."

chinese.chinese: Athenahealth昨天公开发售股票，并取得今年股票首日发行的最好表现－股票升值了97％（股票在今天早晨有点下挫，但是仍然超过了最初的报价）。
chinese.english: Athenahealth went public yesterday and had the best first-day stock performance of the year, with shares up 97%. (Shares were off a bit this morning, but still way above the initial offer.)

chinese.chinese: WSJ报道，美国社区共同保险公司（American Community Mutual Insurance）今天在德克萨斯州推出一项方案，并计划在明年把它推广到超过12个的其它州，在德克萨斯州被称为“覆盖需求”，而在其它州被称为“需要时再支付”，公司将针对19－34岁的人群进行推广，这些人不需要很多照顾，而且希望以低于所有保险费用的70%来获得医疗保健。
chinese.english: American Community Mutual Insurance is rolling the model out today in Texas, and plans to introduce it in more than a dozen other states in the next year, the WSJ reports. It'll be called “Coverage on Demand” in Texas and “Pay-As-You-Go” in other states. The company will be pushing it for 19-34 year-olds, who don't tend to need much care, and expects that less than 70 cents of every premium dollar will go toward medical care.

chinese.chinese: 马里兰，伊利诺伊州和华盛顿等州加入了诉讼，Spitzer 的发言人告诉Health Blog，很可能于这周周末在纽约的联邦地方法庭提起诉讼。亚利桑那州，加利福尼亚州和新罕布什尔州都在本案中有备案，新泽西自己备案，类似的诉讼，纽约时报今天上午报道。
chinese.english: Maryland, Illinois and Washington are joining in the lawsuit, and a Spitzer spokesman told the Health Blog it would likely be filed by the end of the week in federal district court in New York. Arizona, California and New Hampshire are filing amicus briefs in the case, and New Jersey is filing its own, similar, suit,  the New York Times reports this morning.

chinese.chinese: 他谈到了安泰的推出自己的个人健康纪录——一个跟微软今天早上和谷歌推出一段时间的一样的版本。安泰今年早些时候推出了个人健康纪录。它现在提供给约80万安泰成员，并且应该在明年年底给160万所有的成员，威廉姆斯说。
chinese.english: He was talking about Aetna's rollout of its own personal health record — a version of the same thing Microsoft launched this morning and Google's been working on for a while. Aetna launched its PHR earlier this year. It's now available to some 800,000 Aetna members and should be available to all 16 million by the end of next year, Williams said.

chinese.chinese: “到处都有关于谷歌和微软正在做的hubub”，安泰总裁罗恩威廉斯（图）在今天下午参观健康博客总部说，“我们困惑的是，它们的大泡泡得到这一切的关注，我们却得到非常小”。
chinese.english: “There's all this hubub about what Google and Microsoft are doing,” Aetna CEO Ron Williams (pictured) said this afternoon on a visit to Health Blog HQ. “We're perplexed by the fact that their vaporware gets all this attention and we get very little.”

chinese.chinese: 在今天宣布的一项计划中，FDA局长Andrew von Eschenbach称希望使审批程序流水化，将更便宜的非专利药更快的推向市场。该计划（事实上大部分是在一年多前的一次工业讨论会上提出的）包括为首次上市的仿制药或专利刚过期仿制药的首批申请启用提前审批办法。他也计划在药品审批部门增加更多人手。
chinese.english: In announcing a plan today, FDA Commissioner Andrew von Eschenbach said officials hope to streamline the approval process and bring cheaper generic drugs to market faster. The plan (most of which was actually floated at an industry conference more than a year ago) includes initiatives such as leapfrogging applications for so-called first generics–or applications of drugs in which the brand-name drug just lost patent protection–to the front of the drug-review line. He's also looking to adding more people to the agency's drug approval staff.

chinese.chinese: 百时先前希望在2008年早些时候能向食品与药品管理局（FDA）申请名为长春氟宁的药物。该公司说今天基于FDA的反馈撤销其申请。Lehman Brothers预计该药在全球最高年收益可达到7.5亿美元。
chinese.english: Bristol had previously said it hoped to submit the drug, called vinflunine, to the FDA by early 2008. The reversal today was based on feedback from the FDA, the company said. Lehman Brothers projected that peak annual worldwide sales of the drug would be $750 million.

chinese.chinese: Watson博士，本来是纽约冷泉港实验室的主任，这个星期前往英国，这里是他此次售书计划中的游历地点之一。但是，今天的科学博物馆取消了他的一个演讲，之后他的演讲安排就陷入了一片混乱。
chinese.english: Dr Watson, a former president of Cold Spring Harbor Laboratory in New York, arrived in the UK this week as part of a book tour  but his speaking engagements are in disarray after the Science Museum cancelled a lecture by him planned for today.

chinese.chinese: 冷春港实验室今天宣布79岁的沃森博士在差不多为实验室卓越奉献40年后已经退休。在2003年他已经从冷春港实验室主席的位置辞职，现在大部分时间作为实验室的所长。
chinese.english: Cold Spring Harbor Laboratory (CSHL) today announced that Dr. James D. Watson, 79, has retired after nearly 40 years of distinguished service to CSHL. He had stepped down as President of CSHL in 2003 and most recently served as Chancellor.

chinese.chinese: "表现决定支付" ，一个表达卫生保健情况重要的名词，常常被理解为如果医院照顾病人越好那么付给医院就越多。在今天发布的104页的建议中，医疗保健发生了一种转变：如果他们服务不是属于最好之一，支付医院就将减少。
chinese.english: “Pay for performance,” one of the great health-care buzzwords of the moment, is often described as paying hospitals more if they take better care of patients. In a 104-page proposal unveiled today, Medicare offers a twist: Pay hospitals less if they aren't among the top performers.

chinese.chinese: 新英格兰医学杂志今天刊登了这项报告，这一研究是由联邦授权赞助的。一些专家表示这些担忧有些过度，但是他们同意减少CT检查，尤其是对儿童，因为儿童对辐射更敏感而且更容易发展为癌症。
chinese.english: It was published in The New England Journal of Medicine today, and the study was paid for by federal grants. Some experts say that estimate is overly alarming. But they agree with the need to curb these tests particularly in children, who are more susceptible to radiation and more likely to develop cancer from it.

chinese.chinese: "我们已经准备好了，我们正在部署更多的人来对付该情况， " 卫生部卫生署保健服务部部长Sam Zaramba，11月30日告诉IRIN。 "今天上午，更多的专家被派往该地区进一步研究该情况， "他补充说。
chinese.english: "We have been on the ground and we are deploying more people to manage the situation," Sam Zaramba, director of health services at the ministry of health, told IRIN on 30 November. "This morning, more experts were sent to the region to further study the situation," he added.

chinese.chinese: 今天上午纽约时报报道：联邦医疗保险即将削减两个淋巴瘤药物的返还率，它们是葛兰素史克公司（ＧＳＫ）的bexxar（碘标记托西奠单抗）和生物基因公司(Biogen Idec)的zevalin（替伊莫单抗），削减可能会导致不少医院停止用这类药物治疗，因为他们不知该如何使用这类药物。
chinese.english: Medicare's about to cut reimbursement rates for two lymphoma drugs, GlaxoSmithKline's Bexxar and Biogen Idec's Zevalin. The cuts may lead many hospitals to stop offering treatment with the drugs because they'd have to use them at a loss, the NYT reports this morning.

chinese.chinese: Winer 说："对大多数临床试验的病人来说，底线是逐日增加的毒性，根据临床经验，这是相当有限的。如果我当时没有想到它可以作为治疗妇女乳腺癌的选择，我今天也不可能在这里出现。"
chinese.english: “The bottom line is the day-to-day toxicity for most patients in the clinical trial, and in clinical experience, is quite limited,” Winer said. “I wouldn't be here today if I didn't think it should be a treatment option for women.”

chinese.chinese: 习惯上将那些较常见易诊断的心肌疾患除开，例如缺血性、高血压性及风湿性心脏病均属此类。
chinese.english: By convention the more common and more easily diagnosed myocardial disorders are excluded, i.e. ischaemic, hypertensive and rheumatic heart diseases.

chinese.chinese: Dressler’s 综合征少见，可在心肌梗塞或心脏手术后2周至2个月发生。
chinese.english: Dressler's syndrome is uncommon and occurs 2 weeks to 2 months after myocardial infarction or cardiac surgery.

chinese.chinese: 如果是化脓性的可发生毒血症，仅有心包积液而无填塞时，表现为心尖搏动消失，“寂静”的心脏，摩擦音消失。
chinese.english: The signs of pericardial effusion, without tamponade are an 'absent' apex beat, a 'silent' heart, and disappearance of the rub.

chinese.chinese: Kussmaul所云“奇"，是指心脏虽然继续在强烈搏动，而吸气时外周动脉搏动却逐渐消失。
chinese.english: The paradox which Kussmaul noted was that the heart continued to beat strongly whilst the peripheral arterial pulse virtually disappeared during inspiration.

chinese.chinese: 以上两者都可能是因为吸气时横膈下降，牵拉心包，使心包内压升高，心脏充盈减少所致。
chinese.english: Both may be the result of decreased cardiac filling on inspiration due to the descending diaphragm stretching the pericardium and increasing the intrapericardial pressure.

chinese.chinese: 超声心动图探查：是检测心包积液最敏感的方法，在心脏的前后与心包之间有无回声区。
chinese.english: Echocardiography is the most sensitive way of demonstrating pericardial fluid with free space between the heart and pericardium both in front and behind.

chinese.chinese: 系心脏缩窄、充盈减少及心排低所致。
chinese.english: They result from cardiac constriction with decreased filling and a low cardiac output.

chinese.chinese: 心内膜炎主要侵犯已受损的瓣膜，较少累及先天性缺损与人工瓣膜，高毒力的病原菌也可侵犯正常的心脏内膜。
chinese.english: When the causative bacteria are highly virulent, a normal heart may be affected by endocarditis.

chinese.chinese: 草绿色链球菌是导致先天性心脏病，风湿性心瓣膜病患者心内膜炎的最常见致病菌，临床常呈亚急性经过。
chinese.english: Streptococcus viridians are the most common bacteria to produce endocarditis, involving congenital or rheumatic heart valve lesions and its clinical course is usually subacute.

chinese.chinese: 心内膜炎的常见临床表现包括发热，心脏杂音、贫血、血尿，脾肿大，瘀点与栓塞现象。
chinese.english: Common clinical manifestations of endocarditis include fever, heart murmurs, anemia, hematuria, splenomegaly, petechiae, and embolic phenomenon.

chinese.chinese: 就基础心脏病而言，风湿性心瓣膜病最常见。
chinese.english: As far as the underlying heart disease is concerned, rheumatic valvular disease is the most common.

chinese.chinese: 约l0％的心内膜炎患者发现有各种先天性心脏病。
chinese.english: In approximately 10% of the cases with endocarditis, various congenital heart defects are found.

chinese.chinese: 常见的易发生心内膜炎的先天性心脏病有动脉导管未闭、室间隔缺损、法乐四联征、主动脉缩窄、肺动脉狭窄及二叶式主动脉瓣。
chinese.english: The congenital heart lesions that commonly predispose to endocarditis include PDA, VSD, tetralogy of Fallot, coarctation of the aorta, pulmonic stenosis, and bicuspid aortic valve.

chinese.chinese: 人工瓣心内膜炎并不少见，偶尔继发于安置人工心脏起搏器之后，动静脉瘘或动脉瘘也易发生心内膜炎。
chinese.english: Endocarditis not uncommonly occurs in patients with various prosthetic (artificial) heart valves and rarely following an implantation of artificial cardiac pacemakers.

chinese.chinese: 无明显器质性心脏病。
chinese.english: In 20%— 40% of patients with bacterial endocarditis, no evidence of apparent underlying heart disease can be demonstrated.

chinese.chinese: 超重的SLE病人与正常体重的病人相比，表现出明显的临床和室结果，社会人口学特征及治疗特点。有必要做前瞻性研究以评估这些特征是否会影响狼疮的预后。
chinese.english: Patients with SLE who have excess weight present distinct clinical-laboratory findings, socio-demographic characteristics and treatment options when compared to normal weight patients. Prospective studies should assess whether these characteristics will interfere with the outcome or prognosis of lupus.

chinese.chinese: Zeng和他的团队能在实验老鼠身上通过这个策略逆转晚期1型糖尿病，不仅阻止自体免疫进程，还有助于再生新胰岛细胞。医学博士、理学博士、Zeng室的博士后研究员、本研究的第一作者Miao Wang说，最终结果是，60%的糖尿病老鼠能通过接受该实验性疗法逆转糖尿病，而对照组则无一康复。与未经治疗的相比，接受治疗的老鼠有高出10倍的胰岛细胞体积和高出3倍的胰岛素水平，胰岛素敏感性和胰岛细胞生存能力也都随之增高。
chinese.english: Zeng and his team were able to reverselate-stage type 1 diabetes in lab mice through this strategy, not only halting the autoimmune process, but also helping new isletcells grow. As a result, diabetes was reversed in 60 percent of the diabetic mice that received the experimental therapy, while none of the control mice recovered from their disease, said Miao Wang, M.D., Ph.D., first author of thestudy and a postdoctoral research fellow in Zeng's lab. The mice that received the therapy had 10 times higher islet cell mass, three times higher insulin levels and improved insulin sensitivity and islet cell survival compared to the untreated mice.

chinese.chinese: 1型糖尿病在亚洲人群中相对少见，是具有欧洲血统人群发病率的1/10-1/5。但是1型糖尿病的诊断比较困难，因为与其相关的基因标记物和血液因子在亚裔人群中只有30%表达。换言之，仅仅依靠常规检查来诊断亚洲人是否患有1型糖尿病会导致很大一部分误诊。需要更多的研究来了解其他何种生物因导致亚洲人群胰岛素生成β细胞的破坏，进而导致1型糖尿病。然后就可以开发相关的室检测项目来检测这些特定的因子。
chinese.english: Type 1 diabetes is relatively rare in Asians, with incidencefive to 10 times lower than in people of European descent. But diagnosing thedisease is more difficult because genetic markers and blood factors generallyassociated with type 1 diabetes are present in only 30 percent of patients ofAsian descent. In other words, simply relying on conventional tests would leadto misdiagnosis of a large percentage of Asians who have type 1 diabetes. Moreresearch is needed to learn what other biological factors in Asians patientslead to the destruction of insulin-making beta cells, resulting in type 1diabetes. Lab tests then could be developed to detect these specific factors.

chinese.chinese: 研究人员统计受试人员就医、室检查次数或步骤，尤其是与多元化面板测试的八项条件相关的四项。大多数需统计的步骤或筛选试验在该年龄组无症状人群中并没有推广。研究人员发现，与没有接受试验的人们相比，受试组人群并没有改变他们全部的卫生保健服务。
chinese.english: The researchers counted the number of physician visits and laboratory tests or procedures the people received, particularly those services associated with four of the eight conditions tested by the multiplex panel. Most of the procedures or screening tests that were counted are not among those currently recommended for people in this age group who don't have symptoms. The researchers found that participants in genetic testing did not change their overall use of health care services compared with those not tested.

chinese.chinese: 今天的开放期刊PLoS ONE发表了这一成果，即利用藻类来生产疟疾的蛋白质，从而在室小鼠身上诱导出能对抗疟原虫的抗体来预防疟疾的传播。这项研究进展源自于加州大学圣地亚哥两组生物学家的一次不同寻常的跨学科合作，一组来自于生命科学部和圣地亚哥藻类生物技术中心，该小组在之前曾利用藻类开发出生物制品和生物燃料；另一组生物学家来自于医学院热带医学和急性感染性疾病中心，该中心一直致力于寻找疟疾的诊断、预防和治疗方法。
chinese.english: The use of algae to produce malaria proteins that elicited antibodies against Plasmodium falciparum in laboratory mice and prevented malaria transmission was published today in the online, open-access journal PLoS ONE. The development resulted from an unusual interdisciplinary collaboration between two groups of biologists at UC San Diego—one from the Division of Biological Sciences and San Diego Center for Algae Biotechnology, which had been engineering algae to produce bio-products and biofuels, and another from the Center for Tropical Medicine and Emerging Infectious Diseases in the School of Medicine that is working to develop ways to diagnose, prevent and treat malaria.

chinese.chinese: 这引起了一位在Mayfield 室工作的博士后研究员James Gregory的关注，想知道是否一个复杂的可以防治疟原虫的蛋白质也可以由衣藻产生。20亿人生活在这样的地区，这些地区疟疾存在，而给予它们疟疾疫苗则又非常昂贵且后勤保障上也非常困难，而更大的问题则是疫苗的生产成本昂贵。因此，加州大学圣地亚哥分校的生物学家们正是基于此出发，希望能确定是否这样的一种藻类、一种有机体能够非常廉价地生产出复杂的蛋白质，或者说能够生产出抑制疟疾感染的疟疾蛋白。
chinese.english: That got James Gregory, a postdoctoral researcher in Mayfield's laboratory, wondering if a complex protein to protect against the malarial parasite could also be produced by Chlamydomonas. Two billion people live in regions where malaria is present, making the delivery of a malarial vaccine a costly and logistically difficult proposition, especially when that vaccine is expensive to produce. So the UC San Diego biologists set out to determine if this alga, an organism that can produce complex proteins very cheaply, could produce malaria proteins that would inhibit infections from malaria.

chinese.chinese: 智能手机也许将越来越廉价，但它们对于心理学家的价值确是无价的。人们在不停的行走，研究人员面临的最大的挑战之一就是实时搜集人们每天的环境数据。当然，场景可以在室中再现。但是，心理学家Geoffrey Miller提出科学家可以通过智能手机代替模拟实验。
chinese.english: Smartphones may be getting cheaper, but their value to psychological scientists is priceless. Because people are constantly on the go, one of the biggest challenges researchers face is collecting data in real time in people's everyday environments. Sure, scenarios can be recreated in the laboratory, but psychological scientist Geoffrey Miller asks why should scientists rely on simulations when they could tap the power of smartphones instead??

chinese.chinese: 智能手机也许将越来越廉价，但它们对于心理学家的价值确是无价的。人们在不停的行走，研究人员面临的最大的挑战之一就是实时搜集人们每天的环境数据。当然，场景可以在室中再现。但是，心理学家Geoffrey Miller提出科学家可以通过智能手机代替模拟实验。
chinese.english: Smartphones may be getting cheaper, but their value to psychological scientists is priceless. Because people are constantly on the go, one of the biggest challenges researchers face is collecting data in real time in people's everyday environments. Sure, scenarios can be recreated in the laboratory, but psychological scientist Geoffrey Miller asks why should scientists rely on simulations when they could tap the power of smartphones instead?

chinese.chinese: Sneddon是Alberta大学心脏病医生Gavin Oudit的病人，Gavin Oudit一直以来在研究一种叫ACE2的分子，这种分子已被证明具有心脏保护作用。Gavin Oudit最近的工作发表在五月份第十一期的Circulation Research杂志上，Gavin Oudit及其同事在室动物模型上发现，缺乏ACE2会使与糖尿病有关的心血管并发症进一步恶化。
chinese.english: Sneddon is a patient of University of Alberta cardiologist Gavin Oudit, who has long been doing research on a molecule called ACE2, which he has previously shown protects the heart in cardiovascular disease. In his most recent work, published in the May 11 edition of Circulation Research, Oudit and colleagues at the University of Florida have found that lab models that lacked ACE2 had worse cardiovascular complications related to diabetes.

chinese.chinese: 研究人员在康涅狄格州电生理室对50岁以上病人进行了一次横断面电话调查。
chinese.english: The researchers conducted a cross-sectional telephone survey of patients 50years and older at an electrophysiology lab in Connecticut.

chinese.chinese: “直到今天，肿瘤专家非常了解迫切需要在肿瘤治疗上取得进展，”Credit Suisse公司分析师迈克乐.艾伯马在记录中提到,他认为咨委会的会议不应该是“公园里散步”。他希望咨委会专家组能向有关部门推荐阿瓦斯汀应用于乳腺癌。
chinese.english: “At the end of the day, oncologists are very familiar with the incremental improvements required to move cancer treatment forward,” Michael Aberman, an analyst at Credit Suisse, said in a note. He said that while the meeting would not be “a walk in the park,” he expected the panel to recommend approval.

chinese.chinese: 今天在《公共科学图书馆•医学》上发表的一篇文章指出,一些患细胞巨化病毒性视网膜炎(CMV)的AIDS患者未能及时被诊断与治疗,导致不必要的失明.作者在初步的研究中发现,柬埔寨,缅甸与泰国的进行性AIDS患者中患CNV的比例分别高达23%,27%与32%,而在发达国家中,由于抗病毒治疗的应用,CMV的发病率已经显著地降低.作者认为,通过训练医生筛选并提供力所能及的最佳治疗,完全可以将CMV的诊断与治疗有效融入现存的AIDS治疗体系中.
chinese.english: Failure to diagnose and treat cytomegalovirus retinitis (CMV) in people with AIDS is leading to unnecessary blindness, according to a paper published today in the journal PLoS Medicine. The authors found in pilot studies that CMV retinitis, which has been dramatically reduced in wealthy countries since the advent of antiretroviral therapy, occurred in 23%, 27%, and 32% of patients with advanced AIDS in Cambodia, Myanmar and Thailand respectively. By training clinicians to screen and taking steps to make the best treatment affordable, the authors argue that CMV diagnosis and treatment can easily be integrated into existing AIDS treatment programs.

chinese.chinese: 隶属于惠氏公司的惠氏制药事业部今天宣布，美国食品和药物管理局（FDA）已对苯卓昔芬发出第二封可批准函。苯卓昔芬是一种选择性雌激素受体调节剂，为预防绝经后骨质疏松症药物。
chinese.english: a division of Wyeth , announced today that the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has issued a second approvable letter for bazedoxifene, a selective estrogen receptor modulator, for the prevention of postmenopausal osteoporosis.

chinese.chinese: 设备制造商、医生和FDA针对导线或电极的缺陷进行讨论，这一缺陷可能导致埋藏式电复律除颤器（ICD）对心脏进行不合理的电击或者在需要电击的时候不能启动。4月份，一项研究发现40％的除颤器电极在8年内发生故障——远远超过预计的比例。高故障率“可能挑战‘ICD有较好的性价比’这一说法”，哈佛医学院的William Maisel事后写道。今天，他主持了这场会议。
chinese.english: Device makers, doctors, and the FDA are hobnobbing over failures of the wires, or leads, that can cause an implantable cardioverter defibrillator, or ICD, to give inappropriate shocks to the heart or fail to jolt it back into action when needed. In April, a study estimated that 40% of defibrillator leads fail within eight years — significantly higher than had been believed. The higher failure rate “could challenge the tenet that ICDs are cost-effective,” Harvard Medical School's William Maisel wrote then. He's chairing the conference today.

chinese.chinese: 发表在The Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences在线版的本研究基于持续进行脊髓修复研究。通过在老鼠中进行的研究，Greenberg室的科学家们在卒中后形成的空腔中注入软骨素酶ABC(ChABC)或硫酸肝素蛋白聚糖 glypican (glypican)。这两种情况都会改善试验动物的疾病预后，它们的无力症状和协调功能得到改善。
chinese.english: The research, published in the online edition of The Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences, builds on ongoing spinal cord repair studies. Working in rats, scientists in the Greenberg laboratory infused the stroke cavity with either the enzyme chondroitinase ABC (ChABC) or the protein heparan sulfate proteoglycan glypican (glypican). In both cases the treatments improved outcome in the animals - they had less weakness and improved coordination.

chinese.chinese: 20个痴呆患者（10个AD患者和10个VD患者）和20个无精神异常的对照组患者加入了临床评估，MRI大脑扫描和室检测包括白介素-6、CRP(C反应蛋白）和血清蛋白电泳。
chinese.english: Twenty demented patients (10 AD and 10 VD) and 20 non-demented controls were subjected to clinical evaluation, MRI brain scans and laboratory tests, including interleukin (IL) 6, C-reactive protein and serum protein electrophoresis.

chinese.chinese: Sneddon是Alberta大学心脏病医生Gavin Oudit的病人，Gavin Oudit一直以来在研究一种叫ACE2的分子，这种分子已被证明具有心脏保护作用。Gavin Oudit最近的工作发表在五月份第十一期的Circulation Research杂志上，Gavin Oudit及其同事在室动物模型上发现，缺乏ACE2会使与糖尿病有关的心血管并发症进一步恶化。
chinese.english: Sneddon is a patient of University of Alberta cardiologist Gavin Oudit, who has long been doing research on a molecule called ACE2, which he has previously shown protects the heart in cardiovascular disease. In his most recent work, published in the May 11 edition of Circulation Research, Oudit and colleagues at the University of Florida have found that lab models that lacked ACE2 had worse cardiovascular complications related to diabetes.

chinese.chinese: Tso表示，载脂蛋白A-IV 有很长的半衰期（7-8小时），室研究表明，在血糖浓度较低时，其对血糖水平不影响。相反，它似乎会调整葡萄糖，使血糖水平正常化。
chinese.english: Tso says apoA-IV has a long half-life (between seven and eight hours) and that tests in his lab showed it to have no effect on glucose levels when administered at low glucose concentrations. Instead, he says, it seems to function to normalize glucose.

chinese.chinese: 医生在危难中放弃这种承诺。一概而论，毕竟，是在否认人性的复杂。当然， 这些是复杂的问题—进一步民主化的医学信息把这个问题复杂化了，互联网给我们带来的病人对部分医生的较低层次和僧侣似的方法。四十年前，医生典型地劝告他们的患者不要寻找第二个选择；今天，许多好医生积极鼓励这种做法。
chinese.english: Doctors abandon such commitments at their peril. To generalize, after all, is to deny the complexity of each human being. To be sure, these are complicated questions — complicated still further by the democratization of medical information that the Internet has brought us and by the less hierarchical and priestly approach to patients on the part of doctors. Forty years ago, for example, doctors did not typically advise their patients to seek second opinions; today, most good physicians actively encourage it.

chinese.chinese: 今天，在我们高科技，高责任心和假设患者权益至上的时期，患者和医师之间最古老的所有联系，正如请求者对巫医一样，仍然发挥重要作用。如果用科学数据和临床研究结果作为判断医患关系唯一有效的标准可能是不明智的。但好医生想要治愈他们的患者， 不仅是患者的疾病；并且许多患者希望医生给予他们多些人文关怀，而不是作为一例病案研究。从透视的角度看患者给咨询室带来的被高估的期望也许是最佳选择。
chinese.english: Even today, in our high-tech, accountability-obsessed and, supposedly at least, patient-empowered times, the oldest of all relations between patient and physician — that of supplicant to shaman — continues to exert its authority. This may not seem sensible if the only valid criterion for judging the doctor-patient relationship is the use that is made of scientific data and clinical findings. But good doctors want to treat their patients, not just their patients' diseases, and certainly most patients want to be treated as human beings, not cases. Viewed from that perspective, the elevated expectations patients bring to the consulting room may be for the best.

chinese.chinese: “30年来，就这个严重问题一直没有重要临床结果文字报道，直到今天我们回顾了我们在贾克比医疗中心的工作，”诺丁博士补充。“我相信这是个另人发醒的经历－医生是多少容易把未经证实的理论信以为真啊！”
chinese.english: "At no time in the past 30 years, up to the point where we reviewed our experience at Jacobi, have any significant clinical outcomes related to this important issue been documented," Dr. Nordin added. "We believe that this serves as a cautionary tale in how easy it is as physicians to accept unproven theories as truth."

chinese.chinese: 这项研究是同类研究中规模最大的，而且得益于北欧国家中唯一的丹麦国民登记制度，使得这项大规模的研究变成了可能，这247574份血样都来自哥本哈根家庭医生室。
chinese.english: The study is the largest of its kind - and it was only possible to conduct it because of Denmark's civil registration system, which is unique in the Nordic countries. The 247,574 blood samples come from the Copenhagen General Practitioners Laboratory:

chinese.chinese: 但是他又说，并没有确凿的证据证明某些食物可以增强免疫系统。“毫无疑问，这些菜谱都有相应的营养，但是这与菜单上宣传的并不相同。”Starnbach先生说。与其它健康食物餐馆不同，家族型的甲壳虫是以越南餐馆的名义起家的，并没有明显的健康宣传。70年代，An一家人的第一家餐馆Thanh Long在圣弗兰西斯科开业，是他们在一间老熟食店买下的。那时他们还在越南，这里便作为他们进入美国的立足地。这家餐馆今天还在那里。
chinese.english: But, he said, there is not enough hard evidence to prove that any food can enhance the immune system. “There is no doubt these menu items have these nutrients,” Mr. Starnbach said. “But that is different from the claim being made on the menu.” Unlike many health-food restaurants, Crustacean, a family business, started out as a Vietnamese restaurant, without overt health claims. The An family's first restaurant, Thanh Long, opened in San Francisco in the '70s in an old deli purchased by the family, still in Vietnam at that time, as a foothold into the United States. The restaurant remains there today.

chinese.chinese: 但是，在惠氏还没来得及松口气时，陪审团于10月15号进行了第三次审查。这次，他们在惩罚性部分另外增加了9900万美元，处罚首要的就是把药片要收回。惠氏在档案中记载这次运动叫“审判后救援”，正如其公共备案中描述的一样。而也正是这是我们走到了今天。
chinese.english: But before Wyeth could wipe the sweat from its brow, the jury deliberated for a third time, on Oct. 15. This time they awarded an additional $99 million in punitive damages — bringing the bill back up to about what it had been in the first place. Wyeth filed motions for “post-trial relief,” as the company described it in a public filing, and that brings us to today.

chinese.chinese: 在美国，耳穴压籽法长期作为为成瘾治疗。但在今天, 随着选择疗法需求的扩大, 为了痛苦，焦虑，失眠等健康问题，耳穴压籽法实践也在增加()。
chinese.english: Ear seeds have long been used stateside for addiction treatment. But today, with the growing demand for alternative therapies, there has been an increase in the practice of using ear seeds (or their metallurgic equivalents, acubeads and ear magnets) for health issues from anxiety to pain to insomnia.

chinese.chinese: 虽然近来麻烦缠身,大型制药企业在今天上午的股票市场却表现良好.这是今天10:45分一些主要制药类股票的价格:辉瑞上涨0.4%,默克上涨0.8%,惠氏上涨1.5%,百时美施贵宝:上涨1%,雅培制药:上涨2%,礼来:上涨2.1%,葛兰素史克：上涨0.8%，先灵葆雅：上涨1%，阿斯利康：下跌1%，赛诺菲－安万特上涨1.2%，强生上涨0.8%，诺华上涨0.9%
chinese.english: For all of its troubles lately, Big Pharma is faring well in morning trading. Here are some prices, as of 10:45 this morning: Pfizer: up 0.4%. Merck: up 0.8%. Wyeth: up 1.5%. Bristol-Myers Squibb: up 1%. Abbott Labs: up 2%. Eli Lilly: up 2.1%. GlaxoSmithKline: up 0.8%. Schering-Plough: up 1%. AstraZeneca: down 1%. Sanofi-Aventis: up 1.2%. Johnson & Johnson: up 0.8%. Novartis: up 0.9%.
