chinese.english: In today's atmosphere of intense scrutiny of scientists who accept industry money, he said, he felt he had little choice.

chinese.chinese: 今天下午当一位记者问到这问题后，一名美国FDA官员说，我们已经检测了很多涉及到问题的产品并发现有污染，我们相当肯定因为有多个实验室进行了检测，包含了大量的污染物。（在报道中我们描述了污染物）
chinese.english: “We have tested this lot that they're referring to and have found contamination,” an FDA official said this afternoon, when a reporter asked about the subject. “We are fairly certain because of multiple laboratories here doing the testing that this lot contains contaminants.” (We described the contaminant in this post.)

chinese.chinese: 今天在新闻发布会上相对于地缘政治、公共健康和全球商业问题，肝素纠葛是热点。
chinese.english: Geopolitics, public health and global business all bubbled up in dueling press conferences over the heparin imbroglio today.

chinese.chinese: 因基础瓣膜病，先天性心脏病或细菌性心内膜炎的瓣膜损害，心脏杂音几乎总是存在。
chinese.english: Heart murmurs are also nearly always pre- sent either because of the preexisting valvular or congenital heart lesions or destruction of heart valves as a result of bacterial endocarditis.

chinese.chinese: 急性心内膜炎或药瘾者心内膜炎可无心脏杂音。
chinese.english: The heart murmurs may be absent in patients with acute endocarditis or in drug addicts.

chinese.chinese: 肺栓塞常见于药瘾者或左向右分流的先天性心脏病患者。
chinese.english: Pulmonary emboli are common in drug addicts, or patients with congenital heart lesions with left' to-right shunts.

chinese.chinese: 凡有心内膜炎常见表现(发热、贫血、心脏杂音，白血球增多以及任何部位的栓塞)及血培养阳性者，细菌性心内膜炎诊断可确立。
chinese.english: The diagnosis of bacterial endocarditis is certain when any patient presents common clinical: manifestations (fever, anemia, heart murmurs, leukocytosis, and emboli in various parts of body) associated with positive blood cultures.

chinese.chinese: 此外，心内膜炎常常侵犯已受损的心瓣膜，或先天性心脏病。
chinese.english: Otherwise, endocarditis frequently affects already damaged heart valves or congenital cardiac defects.

chinese.chinese: 大家一致推荐，凡心瓣膜病，人工瓣，先天性心脏病患者，于牙科操作，泌尿生殖道，胃肠道器械检查与手术，分娩，流产前后及术中，均给予预防性抗生素治疗。
chinese.english: It is highly recommended that all patients with known valvular heart disease or prosthetic (artificial) heart valves, and congenital cardiac lesions receive prophylactic antibiotic therapy before, during, and after dental procedures, instrumentation or surgical procedures in the genitourinary or gastrointestinal tract, delivery of an infant, and abortion.

chinese.chinese: 心内膜炎的预后取决于下列各种因素：病原菌类型，对抗生素治疗的反应、并发症的有无及其严重性，基础心脏病，以及患者的年龄。
chinese.english: The prognosis depends upon various factors including causative microorganisms, the therapeutic response to antibiotics, the presence or absence and severity of complications, the underlying heart disease, and the patient's age.

chinese.chinese: 这种环之所以可能存在与解剖异常有关(例如旁路)，或与有病的心脏组织功能异常有关，环路的大小可能是微观的(小折返环)，亦可能是宏观的(大折返环)。
chinese.english: Such circuits may exist because of abnormal anatomic structures, such as bypass tracts, or because of functional abnormalities of diseased cardiac tissue and may be either microscopic or macroscopic in size.

chinese.chinese: AVNRT者约50％的患者有器质性心脏病，常较轻。
chinese.english: Organic heart disease, frequently of minor degree, is detectable in about 50 percent of patients with AV nodal reentrance.

chinese.chinese: 隐匿性房路为先天性异常，常在无明显器质性心脏病者找到。
chinese.english: Concealed anomalous pathways are congenital abnormalities which are usually found in patients without demonstrable organic heart disease.

chinese.chinese: 窦房折返性心动过速(SART)常伴发于病窦综合征的患者，常有器质性心脏病，可能与心房病理改变有关。
chinese.english: Sinoatrial reentrant tachycardia is associated with the sick-sinus syndrome, usually occurs in patients with organic heart disease, and probably results from pathologic changes within the atria.

chinese.chinese: 症状的严重性与心室率、发作持续时间以及有无器质性心脏病有关。
chinese.english: The presence and severity of symptoms relate to the ventricular rate, the duration of the attack, and the presence or absence of organic heart disease.

chinese.chinese: 心脏起搏及手术也是可采用的治疗方法，可以有效地治疗有耐药性的反覆发作的PSVT的患者。
chinese.english: Cardiac pacing and surgery are alternate modes of therapy which have been used successfully in the management of patients with drug-resistant recurrent PSVT.

chinese.chinese: 这种调节使心脏能够在紧张时加快心率和在休息时减慢心率。
chinese.english: This modulation gives the heart the ability to increase rate with stress and to slow during periods of rest.

chinese.chinese: 任何有自律性的心脏组织的快速刺激都可引起其自律性的抑制，抑制持续的时间是可以测定的，这个时间称为恢复时间。
chinese.english: Rapid stimulation of any automatic cardiac tissue is followed by suppression of automaticity for a measurable period of time, termed the recovery time.

chinese.chinese: 使用诱导多能干细胞来获得心肌细胞的能力意味着科学家们将能够更容易地在室模拟那些疾病，诱导多能干细胞可以来自成年的心脏病患者。这样的细胞包含有患者的基因档案信息，因此可以在室中重构出这些疾病来用于疾病研究。心肌细胞非常困难或者说根本不可能直接从患者心脏当中直接获取，即使获取了心肌细胞，也只能简单地在室中存活。
chinese.english: The capacity to make the heart cells using induced pluripotent stem cells, which can come from adult patients with diseased hearts, means scientists will be able to more readily model those diseases in the laboratory. Such cells contain the genetic profile of the patient, and so can be used to recreate the disease in the lab dish for study. Cardiomyocytes are difficult or impossible to obtain directly from the hearts of patients and, when obtained, survive only briefly in the lab.

chinese.chinese: 新的指南也包含一个含5级体系的细胞学报告和解释(1级没有诊断甲状腺的结节; 2级开始诊断甲状腺结节;  3级滤泡性病变;4级可疑;5级恶性)并且更新了室检测和放射学检查在疾病诊断中的作用的信息。
chinese.english: The new guidelines also propose the adoption of a five-class system forcytologic reporting and interpretation (Class 1 Nondiagnostic; Class 2 Benign;Class 3 Follicular lesions; Class 4 Suspicious; Class 5 Malignant) and updateinformation on roles of laboratory evaluation and radionuclide scanning.

chinese.chinese: 根据Amy Bastian（物理治疗学博士，Kennedy Krieger研究所运动分析室主任）室以往做的研究显示，小脑（大脑中参与动作协调的部分）在步态调整方面起着非常重要的角色。在这次新研究中，Bastian博士及其同事共同探究刺激小脑对于适应性学习新步态模式的影响。具体来说，她的团队通过阳极（正），阴极（负）或假（无）对小脑的刺激来测试刺激是如何影响学习过程。
chinese.english: Previous studies in the lab of Amy Bastian, PhD, PT, director of the Motion Analysis Laboratory at Kennedy Krieger Institute, have shown that the cerebellum, a part of the brain involved in movement coordination, is essential for walking adaptation. In this new study, Dr. Bastian and her colleagues explored the impact of stimulation over the cerebellum on adaptive learning of a new walking pattern. Specifically, her team tested how anode (positive), cathode (negative) or sham (none) stimulation affected this learning process.

chinese.chinese: 为了弄清楚潜在的机制，室将进行更多的研究。据Monica Lind说，有几方面的可能的机制。例如，是否存在一种荷尔蒙能够影响脂肪的新陈代谢，如抑制皮质醇降解，或抑制雌激素的生成。
chinese.english: To understand the underlying mechanism, more research is needed in the form of controlled laboratory studies. According to Monica Lind, there are several possible causes. For example, it would be interesting to study whether there is a hormonal impact on fat metabolism, an inhibition of the breakdown of cortisol, or an inhibition of the creation of oestrogen.

chinese.chinese: 研究者们与NIAID落基山室的研究人员、约翰霍普金斯大学在乌干达Kalisizo进行的Rakai卫生科学项目的研究人员、乌干达坎帕拉的马凯雷大学的研究人员合作，使用超深度测序技术，对Rakai社区队列研究的HIV感染者血液样品进行检查。样品在HIV初次确诊时和至少一年后抗病毒治疗前分别进行检查。然后将重复感染率与同一时间HIV阴性患者的预计总HIV发生率进行比较。在接受测试的初次感染了D型HIV变体的149个患者中，Quinn和同事确定了7个HIV重复感染病例。另外，重复感染率为每100人1.44人；亚型内和亚型间的重复感染率相同；与研究初期HIV阴性的Rakai普通人群的HIV发生率相当。
chinese.english: Researchers, in collaboration with colleagues at the NIAID Rocky Mountain Laboratories, the Johns Hopkins Rakai Health Sciences Program in Kalisizo, Uganda, and Makerere University in Kampala, Uganda, used an ultra-deep sequencing technique to examine the blood samples of HIV-infected participants of the Rakai Community Cohort Study. Samples were tested at initial HIV diagnosis and at least one year later, prior to beginning antiretroviral therapy. The rate of superinfection was then compared to an estimated overall HIV incidence rate for HIV-negative individuals during this same time. Of the 149 individuals tested, Quinn and colleagues identified seven cases of HIV superinfection during follow-up and all were initially infected with some variant of HIV subtype D. In addition, the rate of superinfection was 1.44 per 100 persons and consisted of both intersubtype and intrasubtype superinfections, comparable to primary HIV incidence in initially HIV-negative individuals in the general po

chinese.chinese: 近日，来自德国海德堡(Heidelberg)欧洲分子生物学室(EMBL)的科研人员首次揭开了包被反转录病毒遗传物质的外壳的精细结构，比如HIV，当这些反转录病毒复制成很多拷贝，大量组装过程中这种外壳结构显得尤为关键，且在病毒的整个生命周期当中，也是一个潜在的易感阶段。研究成果在线发表于《自然》杂志(Nature)，该项研究也为潜在的以病毒外壳为靶点的药物研发提供了一些信息。
chinese.english: Scientists at the European Molecular Biology Laboratory (EMBL) in Heidelberg, Germany, have for the first time uncovered the detailed structure of the shell that surrounds the genetic material of retroviruses, such as HIV, at a crucial and potentially vulnerable stage in their life cycle: when they are still being formed. The study, published online in Nature, provides information on a part of the virus that may be a potential future drug target.

chinese.chinese: Tripathi室创造的这种芯片的边长小于2英寸，其中可以容纳4套微管-膨出孔道系统。Tripathi说：这种芯片可以进行商业生产，因此可以在每个芯片上蚀刻更多的孔道系统。
chinese.english: The chips created in Tripathi's lab are less than two inches across and can fit four tube-and-bulb channels. Tripathi said the chips could be commercially manufactured and made so more channels could be etched on each.

chinese.chinese: 发表在柳叶刀感染性疾病上文章称，众所周知室确定的死于流感的人数远比实际死于流感的人数低。研究人员估计，在2009年大约有151700到575400人由于接触H1N1流感而死亡。80%不幸离开的人年龄小于65岁。
chinese.english: The study, published online in The Lancet Infectious Diseases, notes that the number of lab-confirmed flu deaths is known to be considerably lower than the actual number of flu deaths that occurred. The researchers estimate that 151,700 to 575,400 people died due to contracting H1N1 in 2009, and that 80% of the deaths occurred in people under 65 years of age.

chinese.chinese: Pison说很多治疗小组参观了他们的室，包括来自欧洲和美国的电生理专家。他们对杂交手术中肺静脉隔离的速度印象深刻。这就留给电生理医生更多的时间去寻求肺静脉以外导致房颤发病的基质。外科手术能在所有的病人肺静脉区进行有效的双极能量消融。
chinese.english: To heartwire, Pison explained that numerousgroups, including electrophysiologists from Europe and the US, have visitedtheir lab and are impressed with how quickly the pulmonary veins are isolated,which leaves the EP with a lot of time to look for substrate outside thepulmonary veins that might be contributing to AF. In all patients, the surgeonis able to isolate the pulmonary vein given the effectiveness of the bipolarenergy source.

chinese.chinese: 意大利研究者所开发的这一检测新方法是基于可竞争引物结合位点的肽核酸（PNA）-引导下的PCR发夹技术（PNA分析法）。Lo Nigro博士解释道：“标准引物与新合成的PNA分子之间存在PCR的竞争，多数室已经配备了PCR的实验材料，只需新合成用于检测反应的15mer的PNA [NH2-GGAGCTGGTGGCGTA-CONH2]。
chinese.english: The new method developed by the Italian group is based on primer exclusion peptide nucleic acid (PNA)-directed PCR clamping (PNA assay). "There is PCR competition between a standard primer and a newly synthesized PNA molecule," Dr. Lo Nigro explained. "Most laboratories already have PCR facilities and only need to synthesize the new 15mer PNA [NH2-GGAGCTGGTGGCGTA-CONH2] to act as the comparator in order to perform the test," she commented.

chinese.chinese: 我被我刚刚产生的亲和力所鼓舞，我又发了一条消息：“我想早点说，你今天看起来很不错。”
chinese.english: Encouraged by how youthful my newfound amiability made me feel, I sent a text message to my Twitter entourage that said, “I mean to mention earlier, you look really good today.”

chinese.chinese: 今天下午Dana-Farber癌症研究所的结直肠癌专家Robert Mayer告诉健康博客: “这表明你不能把所有东西都扔进一个罐子里并且认为他们都将有效。”Mayer本人在做一个独立的，类似的研究。
chinese.english: “It shows you can't throw things into a pot and assume they'll work,” Robert Mayer, a colorectal cancer specialist at Dana-Farber Cancer Institute, told the Health Blog this afternoon. Mayer himself is working on a separate, similar study.

chinese.chinese: 实验室研究提示，Zometa可能有抑制肿瘤细胞和新生血管的生长的作用，也可能增强免疫系统功能——即使目前Zometa如何发挥效果还并不完全清楚。“即使目前我们还不知道它确切的好处，这还是很了不起的发现。”第一作者、澳大利亚的研究者Michael Gnant在今天上午的新闻发布会上说。
chinese.english: Lab studies have suggested the drug may inhibit tumor cell growth and the growth of new blood vessels, and may strengthen the immune system — though it's not entirely clear why the drug showed the effect it did. “It's still great, even if we don't know the exact benefit,” Michael Gnant, an Austrian researcher who was the lead author, said at a press conference this morning.

chinese.chinese: Kopetz指出一个叫KRAS的基因，是针对EGFR药物，（如：ImClone 公司Erbitux，） 的“很好”（治疗无效）的一个标志。在今天一项的大会报告中，发现大肠癌患者中有一个共同KRAS基因突变的患者，对Erbitux治疗并没有任何好处。这项研究提示，许多受这种药物副作用折磨的患者，化费了成千上万的美元，但没有任何疗效。
chinese.english: Kopetz pointed to a gene called KRAS, which he called an “exquisite” marker for EGFR drugs such as Imclone's Erbitux. One of today's plenary sessions shows that colorectal cancer patients with a common mutant form of the gene receive no benefit at all from the drug. The study suggests that lots of patients have been suffering the sometimes serious side effects of the drug, at a cost of tens of thousands of dollars, with no clinical benefit.

chinese.chinese: 建立在Kanneganti室早期的研究结果上，该研究把重点放在了NOD样受体蛋白6（the NOD-like receptor protein 6，缩写为NLRP6）。NLRP6所在蛋白家族属于固有免疫的一部分。固有免疫系统是对抗感染的第一道防线。这些蛋白像哨兵一样，在细胞内对致病原进行识别并且发生反应。然而，直到现在，人们对于NLRP6在该过程中的功能一无所知。
chinese.english: This study builds on earlier work from Kanneganti's laboratory and focuses on the NOD-like receptor protein 6 (NLRP6). NLRP6 belongs to a family of proteins that are part of the innate immune response that serves as the first line of defense. These proteins serve as sentinels working inside cells to recognize and response to infectious agents. Until now, however, nothing was known about NLRP6's role in the process.

chinese.chinese: 该项研究工作的合作者包括Geoffrey Pitt博士(M.D., Ph.D.)，心内科助理教授，领衔杜克大学离子通道研究单位/中心；以及Albert Y. Sun博士(M.D.)，在Pitt室从事心血管病研究，他们实施了明确是否TLQP-21会增加心率的试验。该项研究的其他作者还包括Jonathan C. Schisler博士(Ph.D.)，Hans E. Hohmeier博士(M.D., Ph.D.)以及Jie An博士(Ph.D.)。
chinese.english: The work was a collaboration with Geoffrey Pitt, M.D., Ph.D., an associate professor of medicine in cardiology who heads the Duke Ion Channel Research Unit, and Albert Y. Sun, M.D., a cardiovascular disease fellow in the Pitt lab, who ran the tests to determine whether TLQP-21 raised heart rates. Other authors of the study include Jonathan C. Schisler, Ph.D., Hans E. Hohmeier, M.D., Ph.D., and Jie An, Ph.D.

chinese.chinese: 科学家使用了很多种那么材料，包括极细的炭黑，碳纳米管和不同大小（20到400纳米）的二氧化硅颗粒。他们将这些材料加入来自人气道表层的细胞系以及那些所谓的噬菌作用来源的细胞上——这些细胞经常的暴露于吸入的外源颗粒，或者负责清除体内的颗粒。与此同时，参与该研究合作的美国国立职业安全和卫生研究所（位于美国西弗吉尼亚州摩根镇）健康效应室的研究人员对长期吸入单壁碳纳米管污染空气的小鼠进行了研究。
chinese.english: The scientists applied a wide range of nanomaterials including ultrafine carbon black, carbon nanotubes and silicon dioxide particles of different sizes, ranging from 20 to 400 nanometres, to human cells derived from the lining of the airway passages, and to the cells of so-called phagocytic origin ? those cells that are most frequently exposed to the inhaled foreign particles or are tasked with cleaning up our body from them. At the same time, collaborating researchers from the Health Effects Laboratory Division, National Institute for Occupational Safety  Health (Morgantown, WV, USA) have conducted the studies in mice exposed to chronic inhalation of air contaminated with single walled carbon nanotubes.

chinese.chinese: 零售诊所企业组，便利保护协会今天在一项声明中说，“我们不明白强迫零售商人在出售储存药品和烟草产品做选择，更广义的目的就是给消费者提供接近高质量，承担的起的医疗保健的可更简捷的途径。”
chinese.english: For its part, the Convenient Care Association, the retail clinic industry group, said this in a statement today: “We do not understand how forcing retailers to choose between having an in-store clinic and selling tobacco products serves the broader goal of providing consumers with easier access to high-quality, affordable healthcare.”

chinese.chinese: 美国今天早些时候提交的一项研究称，如果母亲在怀孕期间摄入高脂饮食，孩子会提早进入青春期，并变得和成人一样肥胖。
chinese.english: Children whose mothers eat a high-fat diet during pregnancy are likely to enter puberty earlier and become obese as adults, a study presented in the US earlier today suggests.

chinese.chinese: 今天的柳叶刀，贾卡罗•科米和和同事两人报到了一种新的口服药物，拉喹莫德，0.6毫克/天，减少复发缓和多发性硬化的新MRI损伤。
chinese.english: In today's Lancet, Giancarlo Comi and colleagues2 report that a new oral drug, laquinimod at 0.6 mg daily, reduces new MRI lesions in relapsing-remitting multiple sclerosis.

chinese.chinese: George Liu,博士，是一位Cedars-Sinai传染病专家并且还是这项研究的共同高级作者。他说，Vb3的作用令人惊讶，它可以杀死并且防止机体感染今天一项非常受人关注的威胁公共健康的疾病，他还说这种途径可以减少人们对抗生素的依赖。
chinese.english: Dr. George Liu, an infectious disease expert at Cedars-Sinai and co-senior author on the study, said that "this vitamin is surprisingly effective in fighting off and protecting against one of today's most concerning public health threats." Such approaches could help reduce dependence on antibiotics, he said.

chinese.chinese: George Liu,博士，是一位Cedars-Sinai传染病专家并且还是这项研究的共同高级作者。他说，Vb3的作用令人惊讶，它可以杀死并且防止机体感染今天一项非常受人关注的威胁公共健康的疾病，他还说这种途径可以减少人们对抗生素的依赖。
chinese.english: Dr. George Liu, an infectious disease expert at Cedars-Sinai and co-senior author on the study, said that "this vitamin is surprisingly effective in fighting off and protecting against one of today's most concerning public health threats." Such approaches could help reduce dependence on antibiotics, he said.

chinese.chinese: 该协议包括一项产品开发和Cardiosolutions的技术测试计划。在7月2日Sorin宣布以1400万美元收购加利福尼亚医学室后，该协议达成一致，从而增加了Sorin在美国的投资额。
chinese.english: The agreement includes a plan to developproducts and test Cardiosolutions' technology, a deal that adds to Sorin'sinvestment in the United States after it announced a $14 million acquisition ofCalifornia medical laboratories on July 2.

chinese.chinese: 由国家国立卫生研究院(NIH)资助的研究人员在室研发出一种新的稳定剂，这种新型的稳定剂可以在高达华氏140度保持某些疫苗和抗生素稳定。这为无需冷藏保护某些疫苗和抗生素开辟了新的康庄大道，也正是由于此，每年可以节省数十亿美元的费用，同时也可以提高疫苗和抗生素在第三世界人口的普及。
chinese.english: Researchers funded by the National Institutes of Health have developed a new silk-based stabilizer that, in the laboratory, kept some vaccines and antibiotics stable up to temperatures of 140 degrees Fahrenheit. This provides a new avenue toward eliminating the need to keep some vaccines and antibiotics refrigerated, which could save billions of dollars every year and increase accessibility to third world populations.

chinese.chinese: Depomed公司今天宣布，公司已向FDA递交了Serada的新药申请（NDA）。Serada是Depomed公司拥有专利权的加巴喷丁（gabapentin）延迟释放剂，拟用于治疗更年期潮热。
chinese.english: Depomed, Inc. today announced that it has submitted a New Drug Application (NDA) for Serada to the United States Food and Drug Administration. Serada is Depomed's proprietary extended release formulation of gabapentin in development for the treatment of menopausal hot flashes.

chinese.chinese: 大家好，我是Sandra Fryhofer博士，欢迎来到“医学问题”节目，今天的话题是，百日咳的危险正与日俱增，具体细节可以参看最近的《发病率与死亡率周报》以及CDC（美国疾病控制和预防中心）网站。
chinese.english: Hello. I'm Dr.Sandra Fryhofer. Welcome to Medicine Matters. The topic: agrowing risk of whooping cough. You can find the details in a recent Morbidityand Mortality Weekly Report and from the Centers for Disease Control andPrevention (CDC) Website. Here is why it matters.

chinese.chinese: Alnylam制药公司(Nasdaq: ALNY)是RNAi治疗领域中的一家领军企业，该公司与来自荷兰奈梅亨大学Nijmegen医学中心的合作人员今天宣布，他们在《癌症与免疫治疗》(Cancer Immunology Immunotherapy)杂志上发表了一项临床前试验的新结果(doi:10.1007/s00262-012-1334-1)，该文对具有更高的免疫原性的树突状细胞(DC)癌疫苗的研发情况进行了描述。结果表明，在体外试验中，靶向于程序性死亡配体(PD-L1 与 PD-L2)的RNAi 可显著提升DC相关疫苗的免疫原性。该结果可能会促进治疗癌症或慢性病毒感染的细胞疫苗疗法研发。
chinese.english: Alnylam Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (Nasdaq: ALNY), a leading RNAi therapeutics company, and collaborators at Radboud University Nijmegen Medical Centre in the Netherlands announced today that they have published new pre-clinical results in the journal Cancer Immunology Immunotherapy(doi:10.1007/s00262-012-1334-1) describing the development of a dendritic cell (DC) cancer vaccine with enhanced immunogenic potential. The findings show that ex vivo RNAi targeting of the programmed death ligands (PD-L1 and PD-L2) can significantly boost the immunogenicity of DC-based vaccines. These results could lead to the development of improved cellular vaccine therapies for the treatment of cancer and chronic viral infections.

chinese.chinese: Senesco技术公司(以下简称“Senesco”或“公司”) (NYSEMKT: SNT)今天公布了SNS01-T联合来那度胺的非临床研究结果，该项业已完成的研究针对多发性骨髓瘤模型进行。SNS01-T联合来那度胺(REVLIMID中的活性成分；由Celgene公司推出)在抑制肿瘤生长方面比各药单用更为有效。所有经过治疗的小鼠的存活期均超过100天直至研究结束。经过一轮为期6周的联合用药后，有三分之二的动物肿瘤消失，并且经过为期8周的继续治疗后，在未经过进一步治疗的情况下，均未出现肿瘤重新生长。
chinese.english: SenescoTechnologies, Inc. (“Senesco” or the “Company”) (NYSE MKT: SNT) announced todaythe results from the completed non-clinical study of SNS01-T in combination oflenalidomide in a model of multiple myeloma. Combining SNS01-T treatment withlenalidomide (the active ingredient in REVLIMID; marketed by CelgeneCorporation) inhibits tumor growth more effectively than either drug alone. Allmice treated with the combination survived over 100 days to the end of thestudy. Tumors were eradicated after a single 6-week cycle of the combination intwo thirds of the animals, and there was no regrowth after an additional 8weeks without further treatment.

chinese.chinese: 美国食品和药物管理局今天宣布， 2012-2013年的流行性感冒疫苗将继续防护2009年产生至今的流行性感冒病毒(H1N1)。
chinese.english: The influenza vaccine for the 2012-2013 season will once again guard against the pandemic A(H1N1) virus from 2009, the US Food and Drug Administration (FDA) announced today.

chinese.chinese: ImmunoCellular Therapeutics（纳斯达克股票名称：IMUC）今天宣布，其研发产品ICT-107的I期临床试验数据获得期刊接受出版，目前刊登在著名的医学杂志-《癌症免疫学》的网络版。发表文章的数据显示，初诊的多形性胶质母细胞瘤(glioblastoma multiforme， GBM)患者体内， ICT-107的4 种靶抗原在疫苗治疗前的肿瘤组织中的表达量，与较长的总生存率(OS)及无进展生存期(PFS)相关。初诊GBM患者的中位PFS为16.9个月，中位OS??为38.4个月。
chinese.english: ImmunoCellular Therapeutics (NYSE MKT: IMUC) announced today that clinical data from its Phase I trial of ICT-107 was accepted for publication, and is currently in the online edition of the prestigious medical journal Cancer Immunology. In the publication, the data showed that the expression of four ICT-107 targeted antigens in the pre-vaccine tumors correlated with longer overall survival (OS) and progression free survival (PFS) in newly diagnosed glioblastoma multiforme (GBM) patients. Median PFS in newly diagnosed GBM patients was 16.9 months and median OS was 38.4 months.

chinese.chinese: 观察到的快速房性心律失常包括阵发性房颤、阵发性房扑和阵发性房性折返性心动过速，每一种均可能产生心悸，这取决于心室率的快慢，心动过速持续的时间，基础心脏病的存在及其严重性，也可能引起头昏、晕厥、充血性心力衰竭和心绞痛。
chinese.english: The atrial tachyarrhythmias observed include paroxysmal atrial fibrillation, paroxysmal atrial flutter, and paroxysmal atrial reentrant tachycardia; each of these may produce palpitation, and depending on the ventricular rate, the duration of the tachycardia, and the presence and severity of underlying heart disease, may also cause dizziness, syncope, congestive heart failure, and angina pectoris.

chinese.chinese: 心得安20mg tid，可以很快改善症状，病人自觉好转，但在甲状腺功能亢进性心脏病心衰时不能单独用本药。
chinese.english: Propranolol 20 mg three times a day may give rapid improvement in cardiac symptoms and sense of well-being.

chinese.chinese: 缺血性心脏病常见。
chinese.english: Ischaemic heart disease is common.

chinese.chinese: 如果合并有缺血性心脏病，开始时应取最低剂量。
chinese.english: If ischaemic heart disease is present, the lowest dose should be used initially.

chinese.chinese: 缺血性心脏病发生心绞痛和心肌梗死在中年糖尿病人中的发生率高出于同年龄组非糖尿病人群中的5倍。
chinese.english: Ischaemic heart disease produces angina and myocardial infarction five times more common in middle-aged diabetics than in the general population.

chinese.chinese: 心脏：心包炎在临床上少见，可有或无渗液，但可见于30％的尸检者。
chinese.english: Cardiac: Pericarditis (with or without effusion) is clinically uncommon though found at post-mortem in about 300 %.

chinese.chinese: 损伤可发生在肾脏、心脏及神经，从而引起急性肾炎和严重的心脏衰竭。
chinese.english: Lesions may occur in the kidney, heart and nerves, resulting in acute nephritis and serious cardiac weakness.

chinese.chinese: 晚期危害包括损害大脑、脊髓和心脏。
chinese.english: Later stages include damage to the brain, spinal cord, and heart.

chinese.chinese: 这个系统中的神经纤维从中枢神经系统把刺激传导给腺体、心脏、血管、及管状器官壁如肠道，并传到中空器官象胃及膀胱的非随意肌。
chinese.english: This system of nerve fibers carries impulses from the central nervous system to the glands, heart, blood vessels, and the involuntary muscles found in the walls of tubes like the intestines and hollow organs like the stomach and urinary bladder.

chinese.english: 2. Cardiac center, which slows the heart rate when the heart is beating too rapidly; and

chinese.chinese: 6．贫血症和肺病：现在多数人都知道，吸烟可增加心脏病和肺癌的发生。
chinese.english: 6. Anemia and lung disease: Most people know by now that smoking may increase the tendency toward heart attacks and lung cancer.

chinese.chinese: 出汗是被交感神经系统控制的，它的神经纤维是被刺激出汗的下丘脑心脏调节中枢所激活。
chinese.english: Perspiration is controlled by the sympathetic nervous system, whose nerve fibers are activated by the heart regulatory center in the hypothalamic region of the brain, which stimulates sweating.

chinese.chinese: 目前，癌症是第二位最易致死性疾病，预计在21世纪初将超过心脏病而跃居首位。
chinese.english: Cancer is the second most deadly disease and is expected to surpass heart disease early in the twenty-first century to top that nefarious list.

chinese.chinese: (5)注意事项或警告，例如，“若症状持续超过24小时，请看医生”及“有高血压或心脏病的人禁服，或遵医嘱”。
chinese.english: e. Cautions or warnings such as, “If symptoms persist more than 24 hours, see your doctor” and “Should not be taken by persons with high blood pressure or heart disease unless directed by a doctor.”

chinese.chinese: “Swan-Ganz导管测量心脏的流出量，屏幕显示压力，而那就是计算机算出的心输出量。
chinese.english: “The Swan-Ganz catheter measures the outflow of the heart, that screen shows pressures, and that's the computer-calculated cardiac output.

chinese.chinese: 在一个自然发生却难以获得的分子之后，室已经创造出一种经过设计的“bryologs”化合物。新的化合物已经被证实可以相等或强于原物质的效力来激活潜伏的HIV库。室的这一工作也有可能会为医生提供一种切实可行的方法来清除潜伏的病毒。
chinese.english: The lab has created a collection of "bryologs" designed after a naturally occurring, but difficult to obtain, molecule. The new compounds have been shown to activate latent HIV reservoirs with equal or greater potency than the original substance. The lab's work may give doctors a practical way to flush out the dormant virus.

chinese.chinese: 艾滋病患者的招募也暂时停滞，直至Wender Group室能生成了更容易得到的化合物时可能会再启动招募。
chinese.english: Patient enrollment was suspended until more accessible compounds came out of the Wender Group's lab.

chinese.chinese: 该项实验研究是建立在之前Klein室的研究证据基础上的，研究表明在阿尔茨海默症与糖尿病之间存在着密切联系，同时研究人员也决定通过此实验来调查是否未经治疗的糖尿病可以作为阿尔茨海默症神经病理学的一种生理学模型。
chinese.english: The study was built on evidence from previous studies at Klein's lab, which suggested a close link between Alzheimer's disease and diabetes and decided to investigate whether untreated diabetes could be a physiological model of Alzheimer neuropathology.

chinese.chinese: 基因检测制造商说公共卫生加利福尼亚部的室现场服务单位已经获准在加利福尼亚州销售BrevaGen。
chinese.english: The genetic test maker said the Laboratory Field Services Unit of the California Department of Public Health had granted it a license to sell BrevaGen in the state.

chinese.chinese: 葛兰素史克投资3100万美元，支持伦敦奥运会，被授予优秀企业公民称号。但事实证明，公司宣传的投入获得了回报。多亏一个明智的营销举措，设立反兴奋剂室，许多报纸的头版头条及新闻节目对葛兰素史克进行报道，以至于不难看出专业媒体都在为其运转。
chinese.english: Throwing its weight--and $31 million--behindthe London Olympics qualified GlaxoSmithKline (GSK) as a good corporatecitizen. But as it turns out, the company is getting its money's worth inpublicity. Thanks to a savvy marketing move--setting up an anti-dopinglab--Glaxo has made so many headlines and newscasts that it would be easier tocount which major media haven't run a feature.

chinese.chinese: 现在，大家都在关注葛兰素史克的奥运广告。电视广告，海报和户外广告牌已经遍布整个英国，再次将人们的目光聚集在反兴奋剂室。并且所有的这些在奥运盛典开始前都未曾见到。葛兰素史克的电视广告采用的是由举办国运动员出演这一平常的方式，但放弃了常见的人如潮水般的镜头及伤感音乐。
chinese.english: Now, Glaxo'sOlympic advertising is turning heads. TV ads, posters and billboards have goneup all over the U.K., focusing, again, on the anti-doping lab. And these are noseen-it-all-before Olympic-ring celebrations. Glaxo's TV commercialsdo take the usual approach of featuring home-country athletes, but foregohackneyed crowd shots and swelling, sentimentalmusic.

chinese.chinese: 现在，大家都在关注葛兰素史克的奥运广告。电视广告，海报和户外广告牌已经遍布整个英国，再次将人们的目光聚集在反兴奋剂室。并且所有的这些在奥运盛典开始前都未曾见到。葛兰素史克的电视广告采用的是由举办国运动员出演这一平常的方式，但放弃了常见的人如潮水般的镜头及伤感音乐。
chinese.english: Now, Glaxo'sOlympic advertising is turning heads. TV ads, posters and billboards have goneup all over the U.K., focusing, again, on the anti-doping lab. And these are noseen it all before Olympic ring celebrations. Glaxo's TV commercials do take the usual approach of featuring home country athletes, but foregohackneyed crowd shots and swelling, sentimental music.

chinese.chinese: 在文献中维生素D在阐明室诊断价值的作用已经受到关注。Souberbielle等列举在“健康”人群中维生素D缺乏普遍存在，故伴骨质疏松症或骨量减少的维生素D缺乏人群中定义的PTH参考范围为<46 pg/mL（以前65 pg/mL），作者提议新的参考范围可便于诊断轻度1°HPT。然而参考标准被用于患代谢骨病的一组患者。Aloia等对研究进行了复制，在年龄20岁到80岁之间的503个健康妇女队列中测量了相关生化指标，虽然作者认可许多因素可显著预测PTH，但发现很大一部分健康人群的PTH值在Souberbielle等制定的参考标准之下。因此一般降低参考标并不可取。
chinese.english: The role of vitamin D in the interpretation of diagnostic laboratory values for 1°HPT has also garnered some attention in the literature.Citing the high prevalence of vitamin D deficiency in "healthy" persons, Souberbielle et al redefined the PTH reference range to <46 pg/mL (previously, 65 pg/mL) in a population of vitamin D-sufficient patients with osteopenia or osteoporosis. The authors proposed that the new reference range would facilitate the diagnosis of patients with mild 1°HPT. This reference standard, however, was defined in a group of patients with metabolic bone disease. In an attempt to replicate these findings in healthy patients, Aloia et al  measured relevant biochemical analytes in a cohort of 503 healthy women between the ages of 20 and 80 years. Although many factors were identified that were significantly predictive of PTH, the authors found that a substantial portion of healthy patients had PTH values above the reference standard proposed by Souberbielle et al. Thus

chinese.chinese: 从现有文献中清楚的认识到伴室临界值的“轻度”1°HPT仍是有挑战性的诊断。正如前面所提到，尽管明确了众多因素可影响PTH值，但这样的认识并不能成功转化为能增加诊断精确性和对所有病人普适的改良参考标准。因此，目前我们这项研究的目的是能否开发一个新的，多维的PTH列线图，从而能清晰区分甲状旁腺疾病的正常表型和疾病表型，期望在诊断1°HPT 有挑战的情况下能增强诊断的精确性。
chinese.english: What is clear from the existing literature is that cases of "mild" 1°HPT with borderline laboratory results present a diagnostic challenge. Although numerous factors have been identified to affect PTH, as previously noted herein, such knowledge has not translated successfully into a modified reference standard with increased diagnostic accuracy and general applicability to all patients. Therefore, the purpose of the current study was to determine whether we could develop a new, multidimensional PTH nomogram that would yield clearer distinction between normal and disease phenotypes of parathyroid disorders, with the expectation that it should enhance the diagnostic accuracy in challenging 1°HPT scenarios.

chinese.chinese: 这项研究是由神经科学助理教授贝德诺西亚人Zachary Weil和神经学和心理学教授Randy Nelson合作完成的。Randy Nelson的室首先应用动物模型将仓鼠慢性接触光亮与抑郁症和肥胖相联系起来。
chinese.english: The study was a collaboration of Bedrosian, Zachary Weil, research assistantprofessor in neuroscience and Randy Nelson, professor of neuroscience andpsychology, whose lab conducted previous studies in which he linked chronicexposure to light at night to depression and obesity in animal models.

chinese.chinese: 研究已经表明，睡眠不足可以导致易患某种疾病，比如上呼吸道感染。为了探究睡眠持续时间、睡眠效率、和睡眠质量——这些指标都在家里而不是在控制的睡眠室里进行评估，这些指标是否会影响免疫进程，这些免疫进程在抗感染保护机体方面有重要作用，对于健康的成人予以应用乙型肝炎病毒疫苗后，机体对疫苗会产生反应产生抗体，研究者对这些抗体浓度进行了调查研究。由免疫系统产生的抗体可以识别和中和异物，比如病毒。
chinese.english: Research has shown that poor sleep can make one susceptible to illnesses suchas upper respiratory infections. To explore whether sleep duration, sleepefficiency, and sleep quality - assessed at home and not in a controlled sleeplab -- would impact immune processes important in the protection againstinfection, the researchers investigated the antibody response to hepatitis Bvaccinations on adults in good health. Antibodies are manufactured by theimmune system to identify and neutralize foreign objects such as viruses.

chinese.chinese: 参加这次项目的单位包括UPC，欧洲帕金森病协会，Tekon医学中心，Telefónica R&D和位于德国，瑞典，比利时，意大利，葡萄牙，爱尔兰和以色列的多个研究中心和公司。这个项目目前纳入的志愿者来自爱尔兰，西班牙，意大利和以色列。这种新型装置测验帕金森病患者是在家里而不是在室。
chinese.english: Participants in the project include the UPC, the European Parkinson's disease Association, Teknon Medical Center, Telefónica R&D, and several research centers and companies based in Germany, Sweden, Belgium, Italy, Portugal, Ireland, and Israel. The project is currently recruiting volunteers in Ireland, Spain, Italy, and Israel. The novel device will tested on Parkinson's patients at home instead of in the laboratory.

chinese.chinese: 目前为止，尚没有一种疟疾疫苗获得广泛应用批准。“由于疟原虫非常复杂，因此研制有效的疟疾疫苗是出名的困难。在任何疟疾流行地区，数百种不同的疟原虫品系同时存在，”Read说。大多数疫苗开发者仅利用这些疟原虫中的一小部分生产抗原分子，这些抗原分子随后成为高纯度疟疾疫苗的一个关键成分。Read室测试了抗原AMA-1现在处于不同临床研究阶段的数个此类疫苗的一个关键成分。
chinese.english: No malaria vaccine ever has been approved for widespread use. "Effective malaria vaccines are notoriously difficult to develop because the malaria parasite is very complex. Hundreds of different malaria strains exist simultaneously within any local region where the disease is prevalent," Read said. Most vaccine developers use only small sections of the malaria parasite to produce an antigen molecule that then becomes a key ingredient in a highly purified malaria vaccine. Read's lab tested the antigen AMA-1, a component of several such vaccines now in various stages of clinical trials.

chinese.chinese: 来自默克研发室（Merck Research Laboratories）的科学家与其他研究者进行合作研究，他们分别来自Chapel Hill的北卡罗来纳大学，哈佛大学的公共卫生学校，国家癌症协会，圣地亚哥的加州大学，该合作研究去年开始启动，目的是为了确定可以把HIV病毒从身体里清除的新方法，以免该病毒引起持续性的感染。
chinese.english: Scientists from Merck Research Laboratories collaborated with researchers fromthe University of North Carolina (UNC) at Chapel Hill, the Harvard School ofPublic Health, National Cancer Institute, and the University of California atSan Diego in the study in a collaboration initiated last year to identify newways to purge persistent infection of HIV from the body.

chinese.chinese: 该化合物重要是针对非典型蛋白激酶C，该蛋白酶在血管内皮生长因子（VEGF）共同的作用下来使血管渗液。然而，Antonetti室已经声明该化合物可以阻止糖尿病视网膜病变肿瘤坏死因子。该化合物的该方面的作用还可以用于治疗葡萄膜炎，或脑瘤或中风中脑血管变化。
chinese.english: The compound targets atypical protein kinase C (aPKC), required for VEGF tomake blood vessels leak. Moreover, Antonetti'slaboratory has demonstrated that the compound is effective at blocking damagefrom tumor necrosis factor also elevated in diabetic retinopathy that comprisespart of the inflammation. Benefits of this compound could extend to therapiesfor uveitis, or changes to the brain blood vessels in thepresence of brain tumors or stroke.

chinese.chinese: 尽管有着喷射式快速增长和巨额回报，但药物也不能免于面临迅速变化的行业所带来的挑战；由于竞争产品或安全性问题，今天的热门产品可能会成为明天的最大失败。虽然一些药物的地位正在巩固中，但FirstWord的报告，将提出显著论据使得他们的位置很快被推翻。
chinese.english: Despite these jet fast growths and massive returns, drugs are not immune to challenges in a swiftly changing industry; today's hot product could be tomorrow's biggest failure due to competitors or safety concerns. Still, some are getting entrenched, FirstWord reports, and will take something significant to unseat them soon.

chinese.chinese: 这项研究本月早些时候发表在nature网络版上，今天将会发表在纸质版上。该研究团队发现在人胰腺癌的小鼠模型中发现著名的癌基因WNT2在循环肿瘤细胞中表达量升高。在人类胰腺癌也有同样的发现。
chinese.english: In astudy that will appear today in the print edition of Nature and receivedadvanced publication online earlier this month, the Dream Team reported findingincreased expression of WNT2, a member of a known family of oncogenes, in CTCsfrom mouse models of pancreatic cancer and from human patients.

chinese.chinese: 在今天展示的数据，研究人员通过24周五项联合试验三期临床试验发现使用5mg沙格列汀比安慰剂对于有心血管疾病（患有高血压、使用他汀类、多种心血管危险因素和具有心血管病史的患者）在糖化血红蛋白、空腹血糖和餐后两小时血糖方面控制血糖效果更好。
chinese.english: In the analyses presented today, researchers found that patients taking Onglyza5 mg demonstrated glycemic improvements compared to placebo in HbA1c, FPG andtwo-hour PPG in a pool of patients assessed by multiple characteristicsindicating increased risk of cardiovascular disease (patients withhypertension, statin use, multiple cardiovascular risk factors and previouscardiovascular disease history) across the five pooled Phase III studies at theend of 24 weeks.

chinese.chinese: 约翰逊旨在用今天宣布来创造一种乐观的氛围。他坚持说，zytiga是Provenge的补充药物，而不能替代他。他说，工厂停工不会太多的影响Provenge，因为其他生产基地的效率提高很多。他把第二季度销售额降低归结于销售人员流失; 在没有失去一个代表的地区，总收入较上一年增加了近三分之一。
chinese.english: Johnson aimed for an upbeat note with today's announcement. Zytiga is acomplementary drug, not an alternative to Provenge treatment, he maintained.The plant shutdown won't eat into Provenge capacity much, because ofimprovements in efficiency at other production sites, he said. And he blamedsales-rep turnover for the second-quarter slowdown; in territories that didn'tlose a rep, revenues were almost a third higher year-over-year.

chinese.chinese: 大学预科教师称它们为“重建年”。辉瑞公司的2012年更象一个改进年。公司的CEO，Ian Read提出了“革新核心”，公司依此已经把焦点重聚在a.k.a.——公司的品牌药品生意上。目前公司把其营养部贱价出售给雀巢公司的程序已经启动。其动物保健子公司产权转移的进程也进行中；今天辉瑞公司公告称，本月份公司将与证券交易所签署IPO文件，将其20%的股份新授予给Zoetis部。
chinese.english: High-school coaches call them "rebuilding years." Pfizer's 2012 ismore of a refining year. The company has been refocusing itself on what CEO IanRead calls its "innovative core," a.k.a., the branded drugs business.It's in the process of selling off its nutrition unit to Nestle. And it'smoving right along with its animal health spinoff; today, Pfizer said it wouldfile IPO documents with the Securities and Exchange Commission this month, fora 20% stake in the newly dubbed Zoetis unit.

chinese.chinese: 伊利诺伊州迪尔菲尔德，2012年7月26日，Horizon Pharma制药公司今天宣布，美国食品和药物管理局（FDA）已批准Rayos（强的松）缓释片（1毫克，2毫克和5毫克）治疗的疾病如类风湿关节炎（RA），风湿性多肌痛（PMR），银屑病关节炎（PSA），强直性脊柱炎（AS），哮喘和慢性阻塞性肺疾病（COPD）等范围广泛的疾病。Rayos的药代动力学和控释放强的松以及强的松昼夜在RA（卡普拉-1和2）试验的数据支持了FDA的批准。卡普拉-2试验表明，中度至重度RA的人使用Rayos治疗在ACR20反应上，与安慰剂相比有统计学上的显著改善。卡普拉-1试验支持的Rayos全部安全。
chinese.english: DEERFIELD, Ill., July 26, 2012 /PRNewswire/ -- Horizon Pharma, Inc. announced today that the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has approved Rayos (prednisone) delayed-release tablets (1 mg, 2 mg and 5 mg) to treat a broad range of diseases including rheumatoid arthritis (RA), polymyalgia rheumatica (PMR), psoriatic arthritis (PsA), ankylosing spondylitis (AS), asthma and chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD). The FDA approval was supported by data bridging the pharmacokinetics of Rayos to immediate-release prednisone and data from the Circadian Administration of Prednisone in RA (CAPRA-1 and 2) trials. The CAPRA-2 trial demonstrated that people with moderate to severe RA treated with Rayos experienced a statistically significant improvement in ACR20 response criteria compared to placebo. The CAPRA-1 trial supported the overall safety of Rayos.

chinese.chinese: 提倡和为寻找治愈杜氏进行性肌营养不良方案提供科研基金的非盈利性组织CureDuchenne（治愈杜氏），于今天由前AVI（阿维）生物制药公司Sarepta Therapeutics很高兴地宣布：外显子跳越化合物，eteplirsen，已经在杜氏患者的IIb期试验中获得了显著的临床效果。CureDuchenne（治愈杜氏）联合华盛顿特区全国儿童医疗中心、消除杜氏基金会于2010年为这项试验在人体上开展临床试验提供基金。
chinese.english: a nonprofit that raises awareness and funds research to find a cure for Duchenne muscular dystrophy, is pleased by today's announcement by Sarepta Therapeutics (formerly AVI BioPharma) that its exon-skipping compound, eteplirsen, achieved a significant clinical benefit in a Phase IIb trial in Duchenne patients. CureDuchenne, along with Children National Medical Center in Washington, DC and the Foundation to Eradicate Duchenne, provided funding in 2010 for this research to progress into human clinical trials.

chinese.chinese: 一家在口服小分子变构调节器类药物发现和开发方面处于领先地位的制药公司，今天宣布公司旗下的新型高度选择性代谢型谷氨酸受体4（mGluR4）正向别构调节剂（PAM）——口服小分子药物ADX88178的临床前研究获得阳性结果，并公布了ADX88178对帕金森的疗效。研究结果发表在2012年7月11日的《药理学与实验疗法杂志》(JPET)上，DOI（数字对象唯一标识符）:10.1124/jpet.112.196063。研究者报道了ADX88178的发现过程，ADX88178是一种新型的有效的脑渗透剂同时也是一种选择性mGluR4 PAM，研究探索了mGluR4调节剂对帕金森动物模型的治疗潜力。这项研究是与默克公司联合开展的。
chinese.english: a leading company pioneering allosteric modulation-based oral small molecule drug discovery and development, announced today the publication of positive pre-clinical efficacy data on its novel, highly selective oral small molecule positive allosteric modulator (PAM) of metabotropic glutamate receptor 4 (mGluR4), and its role in Parkinson's disease. The results were published in the Journal of Pharmacology and Experimental Therapeutics (JPET) on 11 July 2012 as DOI:10.1124/jpet.112.196063. The researchers report the discovery of ADX88178, a novel, potent, brain penetrant and selective mGluR4 PAM, with drug-like properties, to explore the therapeutic potential of mGluR4 modulation in disease models. The research was conducted in collaboration with Merck & Co.

chinese.chinese: ASCO（美国临床肿瘤协会）的专家组今天在一项基于新证据的PCO（即时临床鉴定）中提出，对于超过10年的长预期寿命的患者，医生应与患者全面讨论进行PSA前列腺癌筛查的利与弊。该鉴定建议医生应向有长预期寿命并没有前列腺癌症状的患者解释为何赞成或反对使用前列腺特异性抗原（PSA）测试。ASCO同时提出，对于短预期寿命的患者，这项筛查的风险是大于益处的。
chinese.english: Doctors should discuss with their patients fully the risks and benefits of PSAprostate cancer screening if the patient has a life expectance of more than tenyears, an ASCO (American Society of Clinical Oncology) Panel advised today in anew evidence-based PCO (provisional clinical opinion). The Opinion advisesdoctors whose patients have long life expectancies and have no signs orsymptoms of prostate cancer to explain the pros and cons of prostate-specificantigen (PSA) testing. ASCO added that for men with shorter life expectancies,the screening risks are greater than the benefits.

chinese.chinese: Kasinathan总结道：“按照今天大致的阿尔茨海默症和糖尿病的流行病学增长，研究一种阿尔茨海默症神经病理的生理学模型一直是一个重要的目标。它使得我们可以明确阿尔茨海默症的一种潜在生物标志物，同时可能对于阿尔茨海默症的药物测试和研发也会起到非常重要的作用。”
chinese.english: Kasinathan concluded: "In light of the near epidemic increases in Alzheimer's disease and diabetes today, developing a physiological model of Alzheimer neuropathology has been an important goal. It allows us to identify a potential biomarker for Alzheimer's disease and may also make important contributions to Alzheimer drug testing and development."

chinese.chinese: 但差距不是很大。在该杂志的评分系统中，两家医院今年都累积获得了30个“荣誉榜”积分。但是麻省总医院在16个专业上具有高的排名，相对约翰霍普金山医院只有15个，位列今天在网上发布的2012年排名的第二。
chinese.english: But not by much. Both hospitals this year amassed 30 "honor roll" points in the magazine's scoring system, but Massachusetts General was highly ranked in 16 specialties compared with 15 specialties for Johns Hopkins, which came in a close second in the 2012 ranking, published online today.

chinese.chinese: 尽管人们一直在下功夫解决公共健康问题，但大肠杆菌仍继续渗入食品供应链并引起爆发流行，世界上每年因此造成了严重发病和重大死亡。然而研究团体正取得一项进展，La Jolla过敏与免疫学研究所的研究人员在于今天发表的科学期刊《自然》(Nature)上称，一个主要发现表明，有一种分子具有前所未知的功能，可抵抗大肠杆菌及其他细菌感染，通过该发现可能会开拓出一种保护人们免受这些微生物威胁的新方法。
chinese.english: Despite ongoing public health efforts, E. coli outbreaks continue to infiltrate the food supply, annually causing significant sickness and death throughout the world. But the research community is gaining ground. In a major finding, published today in the scientific journal Nature, researchers from the La Jolla Institute for Allergy & Immunology have discovered a molecule's previously unknown role in fighting off E. coli and other bacterial infections, a discovery that could lead to new ways to protect people from these dangerous microorganisms.

chinese.chinese: 今天发表于bmj.com的一项研究报道：戒烟会引起之后12个月内的平均体重增加4-5kg，而且大部分发生于戒烟之后的前三个月内。
chinese.english: Giving up smoking is associated with an average weight gain of 4-5 kg after 12 months, most of which occurs within the first three months of quitting, finds a study published on bmj.com today.

chinese.chinese: Yardley教授将会在今天的WONCA大会上展示研究结果。该研究招募的受试者超过300人，他们被随机分配到3个组，分别接受常规治疗（一般为心理安慰和抑制眩晕症状的药物）；基于手册的前庭康复治疗；或者基于手册的潜艇治疗和卫生保健专业人员的电话咨询。
chinese.english: During the study, which Professor Yardley will present at the WONCA conference today, more than 300 participants were randomly allocated to receive either routine medical care (commonly just reassurance and medication to suppress dizziness symptoms), booklet based vestibular rehabilitation only, or booklet based vestibular rehabilitation with telephone support from a healthcare professional.

chinese.chinese: 今天，Asthmapolis公司宣布，FDA510（k）批准它的产品哮喘传感系统和相关软件向医务人员和患者销售。
chinese.english: Asthmapolis announced today that it has received U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) 510(k) clearance to market its asthma sensor system and associated software to healthcare providers and their patients.

chinese.chinese: “我们正在经过的是心脏护理中心(CCU)。
chinese.english: “This area we're passing is the CCU (Cardiac Care Unit).

chinese.chinese: ”他接着说，“它能让你检查胎儿或观察体内跳动的心脏。”
chinese.english: “It lets you examine a fetus or look at the internal movements of a beating heart.”

chinese.chinese: 1990年，一组英国医生首次成功地为一名孕晚期胎儿实施了心脏手术。
chinese.english: But in 1990, a team of British doctors performed the first successful prenatal heart operation on a fetus in the last trimester of development.

chinese.chinese: 外科医生利用超声扫描的帮助进行定位，用很小的气管纠正了心脏瓣膜缺损。
chinese.english: The surgeons corrected a heart valve defect with a tiny balloon catheter guided into place with the help of an ultrasound scan.

chinese.chinese: 从尸体上取出的器官进行移植(较普通的如肾、心脏、肝脏)一直是很成功的，而且一般的公众也视之为惯例。
chinese.english: Organ transplants (most commonly of the kidney, heart, or liver) from cadavers have been quite successful, and the general public has come to view them as almost routine.

chinese.chinese: 窒息、电击、溺水、心脏病突发或其它原因都会引起呼吸停止。
chinese.english: This may be the result of asphyxiation, electrocution, drowning, a heart attack, or some other cause.

chinese.chinese: 第二步是利用胸部压力挤压心脏丽迫使血液进入循环系统。
chinese.english: The second procedure is the application of chest pressure to compress the heart and force blood into the circulatory system.

chinese.chinese: 如果施救者单独操作，口对口呼吸和心脏挤压必须交替进行，如果两人一组操作，心肺复苏将更加简便、有效。
chinese.english: If one is alone with a victim, breathing and massage must be alternated, but CPR is much easier and far more effective if performed by a team of two.

chinese.chinese: 对怀疑有心肌梗死的病人的研究提示，如果没有并发症的早期征象(在一份研究中是最初的2小时，在另一研究中为24小时)，病人在心脏病监护病房中得到的治疗并不优于在一般病房或家中得到的治疗。
chinese.english: Studies of patients suspected of having a myocardial infarction have suggested that if there are no early indications of complications (initial 2 hours in one study, at 24 hours in another), management in a coronary care unit does not offer any advantage over care in a hospital room or at home.

chinese.chinese: C．心脏病
chinese.english: C. Cardiac disease

chinese.chinese: 头及臀先露时，胎心音在胎背处听得最清楚, 只有在面先露时可在胎儿心脏处听到。
chinese.english: They are best heard over the back of the fetus in vertex and breech presentations; only in face presentations are they usually heard over the heart.

chinese.chinese: 无激惹试验是一种估计胎儿心脏对胎动反应的方法。
chinese.english: The nonstress test (NST) is a method of evaluating the fetal cardiac response to fetal movement.

chinese.chinese: 应记住，胎头是一个特殊区域，由于绝大部分心脏输出的高氧血经流此处。
chinese.english: It should be remembered that the head of the fetus is a privileged area in so far as the greatest part of the cardiac output with the most highly oxygenated blood is diverted there.

chinese.chinese: 放射线照片可显示颅骨重叠或排列不齐（Spalding征），偶尔在胎儿心脏及大血管内有气体存在（Roberts征）。
chinese.english: A radiograph will show overlapping and disalignment of the skull bones (Spalding's sign) and occasionally the presence of gas in the fetal heart and great vessels (Roberts' sign).

chinese.chinese: 与宫内生长有关的内科疾病为心血管病和肾病，包括慢性高血压和紫绀型心脏病、母体酸中毒、贫血、糖尿病、免疫性疾病、血红蛋白病和母体长期性发热。
chinese.english: Among the medical illnesses associated with intrauterine disease are cardiovascular and renal disease, including chronic hypertension and cyanotic heart disease, maternal acidosis or anemia, diabetes, immune disorders, hemoglobinopathies, and prolonged maternal fever.

chinese.chinese: 样本被送到室，在那里，间质干细胞从骨髓中分离，在病人的血液中用生长因子培养成更多。干细胞反过来注射到病人的相关领域。
chinese.english: Thesamples are sent to the Regenerative laboratory where the mesenchymal stemcells are isolated from the bone marrow and grown to greater numbers usinggrowth factors in the patient's blood. The stem cells are injected back intothe relevant area in the patient.

chinese.chinese: Watson制药（WPI），是一个较为典型的专利悬崖时代的公司案例。它不断的推出重磅药物的仿制药，从授权仿制强生公司（JNJ）治疗ADHD的药物Concerta，到授权仿制Lipitor，其2011年的增长率为46％。雷迪博士室也是其中之一，销售增长了34％，主要靠仿制辉瑞公司的$1.8亿销售额的胃药Protonix和礼来（LLY）最畅销的抗精神病药物Zyprexa。同时，Big制药公司依赖建立伙伴关系和彻底收购赛诺菲（SNY）的仿制药，使去年的销售额增长了19％，也使它成为最接近我们榜单资格的制药公司。
chinese.english: Watson Pharmaceuticals (WPI) is a more typical patent-cliff-era case. Itrolled out one blockbuster copycat after another, from an authorized version ofJohnson & Johnson's (JNJ) ADHD drug Concerta to its authorized Lipitorcopy. Its 2011 growth rate was 46%. Or Dr. Reddy's Laboratories, which boostedsales 34% on copycat versions of Pfizer's $1.8 billion stomach drug Protonixand Eli Lilly's (LLY) top-selling antipsychotic pill Zyprexa, among others.Meanwhile, partnerships and outright acquisitions pumped Sanofi's SNY)generics sales up 19% last year, making it the Big Pharma closest to qualifyingfor our list.

chinese.chinese: 疫苗是一种叫Hendra-sG的亨德拉病毒糖蛋白G的可溶性部分，Hendra-sG是介导病毒感染的部分，并可在室中利用分子技术产生。第一作者Katharine Bossart, Ph.D.——USU女校友、波士顿大学医学院微生物学系助理教授——当她在Dr. Broder的室做学生时就研发了Hendra-sG疫苗。Dr. Bossart说：“尽管疫苗只是病毒的重组片段，但它可以由病毒自我产生和纯化，被认为是一种亚单位疫苗，应用非常安全。”
chinese.english: The vaccine is a soluble portion of the G glycoprotein of Hendra virus, known as Hendra-sG, which mediates viral infection and is produced in the laboratory using molecular techniques. Lead author, Katharine Bossart, Ph.D., a USU alumna and assistant professor in the Department of Microbiology, Boston University School of Medicine, developed the Hendra-sG vaccine while a student in Dr. Broder's laboratory at USU. "Since the vaccine is only a recombinant piece of the virus, it can be produced by itself and purified, and is a type of vaccine known as a subunit, thus making it extremely safe to use," Dr. Bossart said.

chinese.chinese: Nag见到许多医学创业公司收到来自政府的不会冲减每股收益的资金，干细胞诊疗公司也一样，它得到来自美国国家科学基金会的小型企业创新研究拨款。今年早前发展这项技术的室开展的一项临床研究也得到加州再生医学研究院两千万的拨款。“我看到许多同事都参加了投资者会议并听说了这所有惊骇的故事”，她说“我会告诉其他人没有风险投资一个公司将非常可能倒闭，即使现在投资者不会注资于生物科技公司。”
chinese.english: Nag has seen many startups in medicine receive nondilutive funding from the government, including Stem Cell Theranostics, which received an SBIR grant from the National Science Foundation. The laboratory that developed the technology also received a $20 million CIRM grant earlier this year to proceed with a clinical trial. “I see a lot of my peers taking investor meetings and hear all of these horror stories,” she said. “I would tell others that it is totally possible to get a company off the ground without raising any VC money, even now when investors aren't funding biotech companies.”

chinese.chinese: NanoViricides股份有限公司宣布发现一种FluCide 工程下的抗流感候选药物在口服时效果极佳。该公司在相关动物实验中已经获得证据表明FluCide候选药物在用于口服时显示出非常好的疗效。KARD科技股份有限公司的合约室发现并得出了这一结论。试验中用了致死的动物模型，公司用它继续研究流感药物。该公司正期望从中获得一些数据，试图得到新的发现。
chinese.english: NanoViricides, Inc. (OTC BB: NNVC) (the "Company") announced today that an anti-influenza drug candidate under its FluCide  program is effective when given orally. The Company has received information that a FluCide drug candidate designed for oral administration has shown very strong efficacy in corresponding animal studies. This information was received from the contract laboratory that performed the studies, namely, KARD Scientific, Inc. The studies involved the same highly lethal animal model the Company has continued to use for its influenza drug development program. The Company is awaiting data from the studies and intends to release additional information as the data are analyzed and studied.

chinese.chinese: 最近的室检测数据显示头孢克肟治疗淋病的有效性可能正在下降。基于此，CDC更新了淋病治疗指南，不再推荐常规应用头孢噻肟。目前CDC建议使用头孢曲松联合二线抗生素治疗淋病。
chinese.english: Recent laboratory data suggest that the effectiveness of cefixime for treating gonorrhea may be declining. For this reason, CDC has updated its gonorrhea treatment guidelines and no longer recommends the routine use of cefixime. Instead, CDC now recommends using ceftriaxone along with a second antibiotic to treat gonorrhea.

chinese.chinese: 兰伯西室今天推出了该公司版本的爱妥糖，并开始了长达180天的市场专营权期。但这种专营权并不完全，Mylan (MYL)同样享有这些权利。相对于专利药价格来说，这两份大餐可能意味着更大的折扣，因而对于武田公司的爱妥糖收入来说，这也意味着更大的威胁。
chinese.english: Ranbaxy Laboratories rolled out its version of Actos today, beginning its 180days of exclusivity on the market. It's not completely exclusive; Mylan (MYL)shares those rights. Their dual entree may spell a bigger discount against thebranded price--and therefore, a bigger threat to Takeda's Actos revenue.

chinese.chinese: 在发展中国家的大多数室所用的唯一方法，一直以来仍是1880年代开发的涂片显微镜技术。这种方法依赖的是在显微镜下对TB细菌的目测，同时，它很容易将数百万感染HIV的患者误诊为TB阴性，而TB是非洲身处HIV环境下的人们的头号杀手。除此之外，涂片显微镜技术也无法检测到TB耐药株，这些问题引起了人们越来越多的关注。
chinese.english: The only method used in most laboratories in the developing world has been smear microscopy, developed in the 1880s. It requires visual detection of the TB bacterium under a microscope — and it easily misses TB in the millions of patients who are infected with HIV. TB is the leading cause of death among people living with HIV in Africa. Smear microscopy also can't detect drug-resistant strains of TB, which are an increasing concern.

chinese.chinese: 勃林格殷格翰公司位于俄亥俄州的Ben Venue室工厂出现的生产问题，造成了货源短缺。强生正与FDA协作，将对Ben Venue的库存Doxil给予放行，FDA也同意对Sun制药公司的Lipodox给予临时进口许可，Lipodox是一种类似药物，但尚未在美国获批。
chinese.english: The shortage arose after manufacturing problems at Boehringer's Ben Venue Laboratories plant in Ohio halted production. J&J worked with the FDA to release Ben Venue's stock of Doxil, and the FDA allowed temporary imports of Sun Pharma's Lipodox, a similar drug not yet approved in the U.S.

chinese.chinese: 会林医院和西弗吉尼大学医疗保健中心是首批进入覆盖全西弗吉尼亚州健康信息网络(WVHIN) 健康信息交换系统这部分功能的单位，早在2006年，政府与私人合作创立了WVHIN HIE，意在为医生、医院、诊断室、其他医疗保健机构和利益相关者在交换资料时提供一个安全的电子医疗信息系统。
chinese.english: Wheeling Hospitals and West Virginia University Healthcare are thefirst to go live with this new part of the statewide WVHIN HIE,a public/private partnership created in 2006 aiming to create a secureelectronic health information system for the exchange of patient data amongphysicians, hospitals, diagnostic laboratories, other care providers andstakeholders.

chinese.chinese: Vertex制药公司(Nasdaq: VRTX)今天宣布了VX-809 与KALYDECO (ivacaftor)临床2期研究的最终数据，研究表明，囊性纤维化病(CF)成年患者的肺功能出现了统计学意义上的显著改善，这些患者的囊性纤维化跨膜转导调控基因(CFTR) --F508del上，存在最常见的两个拷贝（纯合子）突变。在该研究中，纯合子F508del患者被随机分为3组，在开始的28天中，对单剂VX-809增加剂量进行评估(200mg, 400mg 或 600mg; QD)，在接下来的第28天至第56天，对VX-809 与 KALYDECO (250mg; q12h)联合用药进行评估。与安慰剂组相比，患者接受两种药物联合治疗时(第28 至 56天)，各纯合子治疗组肺功能(预测1秒钟用力呼吸量比值, FEV1)均有显著改善。600mg VX-809(该研究中的最高剂量)与KALYDECO联用治疗的患者肺功能改善情况最佳。这些数据有利支持了Vertex公司计划于2013年初启动的一项关键项目，该项目对VX-809 (600mg)联合KALYDECO (250mg)治疗纯合子患者进行评估，Vertex已经停止了与监管机构就该项目进行的讨论。各治疗组、治疗过程中以及安慰剂组在为期56天的研究中，观察到的多数不良事件的严重程度为轻度到中度。
chinese.english: Vertex Pharmaceuticals Incorporated (Nasdaq: VRTX) announced today final data from a Phase 2 study of VX-809 and KALYDECO? (ivacaftor) that showed statistically significant improvements in lung function among adults with cystic fibrosis (CF) who have two copies (homozygous) of the most common mutation in the cystic fibrosis transmembrane conductance regulator (CFTR) gene, F508del. The study randomized homozygous F508del patients to three treatment groups that evaluated increasing doses of VX-809 (200mg, 400mg or 600mg; QD) alone for 28 days, followed by VX-809 in combination with KALYDECO (250mg; q12h) from Day 28 to 56. When patients received the two medicines in combination (Day 28 to 56), there was a statistically significant improvement in lung function (percent predicted forced expiratory volume in one second, FEV1) in each of the homozygous treatment groups compared to placebo. The greatest improvements in lung function were observed in patients who received 600mg of VX-809, the highest dose evaluated in this study, in combination with KALYDECO. These data support Vertex's plans to initiate a pivotal program in early 2013, which is expected to evaluate VX-809 (600mg) in combination with KALYDECO (250mg) in homozygous patients, pending discussions with regulatory agencies. Most adverse events observed during the 56-day study were mild to moderate in severity across all treatment groups and similar between treatment and placebo groups.

chinese.chinese: Osterman博士：我对此非常有信心，不过，与此同时，如果我们想想今天的情况，还没有很多种由基因组方法开发出的新药，这些工作正在进行中。我不会说很多种药物会依靠这种从头开始的理性方法开发出来。今天我们看到的大部分药物都是之前已经存在的几种药物的衍生物。我对于未来会（凭借这种新的开发途径）开发出新药满怀希望。我知道大公司（我们和一些大公司有合作关系）正在寻找新的作用靶点。
chinese.english: Dr. Osterman: I'm very hopeful, but at the same time, if we think about today, there are not many new drugs that were developed from genomics -- although there was a lot of expectation and a lot of enthusiasm, which is still ongoing, I wouldn't say too many drugs came out of this sort of de novo, rational approach. Most of the drugs that we're seeing today are still variations on the previous themes. I am hopeful there will be new drugs coming that will be developed. I know about the efforts in big pharmaceutical companies -- we collaborate with some of them -- that are trying to explore new targets.

chinese.chinese: 现在，在伯明翰的阿斯顿大学和达德利的罗素堂医院的科学家已经做了这种植物提取物的试验并且证实这种物质在室条件下可以杀死肿瘤细胞而不破坏正常的乳腺细胞。
chinese.english: Now, scientists at Aston University in Birmingham and Russells Hall Hospital inDudley have undertaken tests of the plant extract and proved that it killscancer cells without damage to normal breast cells in laboratory conditions.

chinese.chinese: CREST试验入选了从2000年12月21日至2008年7月18日美国和加拿大117所临床中心的无症状性的或仅有短暂性脑缺血发作，一过性黑曚，或小卒中的颈动脉狭窄的患者。在二次分析时，主要终点事件是在2年后再狭窄或闭塞的复合终点。在试验的1，6，12，24，和48个月对患者进行评估，靶动脉直径减少至少70％，收缩期峰值速度大于等于3.0米/秒被认为存在再狭窄和闭塞。研究在CREST认证的室进行，结果由超声核心室（华盛顿大学）来进行解释。 采用Kaplan-Meier生存估计来计算再狭窄的频率，并在2年的随访期间进行对其比较。我们采用比例风险模型来评估基线特征和再狭窄风险之间的关联。
chinese.english: Patients with stenosis of the carotid arterywho were asymptomatic or had had a transient ischaemic attack, amaurosis fugax,or a minor stroke were eligible for CREST and were enrolled at 117 clinicalcentres in the USA and Canada between Dec 21, 2000, and July 18, 2008. In thissecondary analysis, the main endpoint was a composite of restenosis or occlusionat 2 years. Restenosis and occlusion were assessed by duplex ultrasonography at1, 6, 12, 24, and 48 months and were defined as a reduction in diameter of thetarget artery of at least 70%, diagnosed by a peak systolic velocity of atleast 3·0 m/s. Studies were done in CREST-certified laboratories andinterpreted at the Ultrasound Core Laboratory (University of Washington). Thefrequency of restenosis was calculated by Kaplan-Meier survival estimates andwas compared during a 2-year follow-up period. We used proportional hazardsmodels to assess the association between baseline characteristics and risk ofrestenosis. Analyses were per protocol.

chinese.chinese: 该普查为专家提供了包括身高、体重、臀围、腰围在内的身体测量数据，以及合并症、社会经济地位、生理和室检查结果。为了确定随访死亡数，基线数据同全美死亡指数（NDI）进行了匹配。
chinese.english: The survey provided experts with body measurements, including height, weight, hip and waistcircumference, as well as comorbidities, socioeconomic status, andphysiological and laboratory measurements. In order to assess deaths at follow-up, baseline data were matched to the National Death Index.

chinese.chinese: Osterman博士：我认为，目前，我们已经准备好了这些工具，而且由于基因组的发展，以及具备的生理工具和我们分析转录子或者一系列代谢物的能力，我们能够对付微生物感染。我们今天对于主要病原体的认识（包括基因组信息）已经非常深刻。我认为，目前的焦点是实际开发。另外，基于这些信息，我们有很多个研究项目的例子，这些项目的进展非常顺利。
chinese.english: Dr. Osterman: I think at this point, we are very well set with tools as far as dealing with microbial infection because of the genomes, physiologic tools, and our ability to analyze the transcriptome or a set of metabolites. Our knowledge of major pathogens, including genomic knowledge, is very profound today. I think at this point the focus is on actual development. Again, we have multiple examples of research projects, which are already well advanced, based on this knowledge.

chinese.chinese: Osterman博士：细菌的耐药性在几百万年前就已经开始出现了。本质上来说，今天的大多数抗生素都是与目标微生物处于同一微环境的生物（比如真菌和植物）分泌的天然产物。本质上来说，我们得到这些天然产物，对它们进行修饰，然后用于临床实践；这是非常美妙，非常伟大的事情。能够在这么多年中受到抗生素的保护，我们非常幸运。
chinese.english: Dr. Osterman: Development of resistance in microbes started millions of years ago. Essentially, most of our antibiotics today, as you know, are natural products that were developed by other cohabitants of the environmental niche, such as fungi and plants to fight bacteria. Essentially, we took some of them, modified them, and are using them now in clinical practice, which is a wonderful and great thing to do. We were fortunate for many years.

chinese.chinese: 今天和我一起来到这里的嘉宾是传染病和炎症性疾病中心的Andrei Osterman博士。今天的节目主要集中在确定和理解抗生素耐药性的建立机制和该研究对临床实践的影响。Andrei，谢谢你今天能够出席。
chinese.english: Joining me today is my colleague, Dr. Andrei Osterman, Professor at the Infectious and Inflammatory Disease Center. Today's program will focus on key research in identifying and understanding mechanisms behind the development of antibiotic resistance and how this research will affect clinical practice. Thank you for joining us today, Andrei.

chinese.chinese: 功能改善情况以INCAT评分进行评估，该评分系统测定患者完成任务的能力（如行走、动手任务等）。这种评分系统中，无力和残疾越重，得分越高；而基本运动功能改善则表现为评分的降低。今天发表的结果显示，总体平均INCAT评分由基线的3.7显著降低至治疗完成后的2.3。治疗有效患者中一半是在治疗4周内达到有临床意义的临界值。
chinese.english: Functional improvement was evaluated by the INCAT scale, which is used to measure a patients' ability to perform tasks (i.e., walking, motor hand tasks, etc.). On this scale, patient scores rise with increasing weakness and disability, whereas improvement in basic motor functions is indicated by a reduction in the score. Results presented today showed that mean overall INCAT score significantly improved from 3.7 at baseline to 2.3 at completion of treatment. Half of the responders achieved the clinically meaningful threshold by Week 4.

chinese.chinese: 移动接口使用户能够在各种设备下就能查看远程医疗信息和医疗服务文件，包括考试期间在椅子上或床边，医师远程审查室和恢复故障站点。
chinese.english: The mobile interface will enable users to view medical information and document medical care in a variety of settings, including chair or bed-side during examinations; remotely for physician review of labs; and remotely at disaster recovery sites.

chinese.chinese: 移动接口使用户能够在各种设备下就能查看远程医疗信息和医疗服务文件，包括考试期间在椅子上或床边，医师远程审查室和恢复故障站点。
chinese.english: variety of settings, including chair or bed-side during examinations; remotely for physician review of labs; and remotely at disaster recovery sites.

chinese.chinese: 今天，在荷兰鹿特丹举行的周围神经协会炎症性神经病合作会议上公布了PRIMA（Privigen对运动和自主神经功能的影响）试验的结果。试验数据显示，Privigen（10%静脉用人体免疫球蛋白溶液）可改善慢性炎症性脱髓鞘性多发性神经病（CIDP)患者的病情。
chinese.english: Data presented today from the Privigen Impact on Mobility and Autonomy (PRIMA) trial at the Peripheral Nerve Society Inflammatory Neuropathy Consortium Meeting in Rotterdam, Netherlands, suggests that treatment with Privigen® [Immune Globulin Intravenous (Human), 10% Liquid], an intravenous immunoglobulin (IVIg), may lead to improvement in function in patients with chronic inflammatory demyelinating polyneuropathy (CIDP).

chinese.chinese: Lexicon 制药公司(Nasdaq: LXRX)，今天宣布，在一项2b期临床试验中，在服用二甲双胍控制不佳的2型糖尿病患者中同时使用LX4211，糖化血红蛋白呈现明显的，剂量依赖性的下降，且有统计学意义，LX4211是一种同时抑制钠葡萄糖转运子1和2 (SGLT1 和SGLT2)的尚处于研究期的口服药物。LX4211也可以明显降低体重及血压。重要的是，LX4211的安全性较好，在该研究中患者耐受良好。
chinese.english: Lexicon Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (Nasdaq: LXRX), announced today that LX4211, an investigational, oral, dual inhibitor of sodium glucose transporters 1 and 2 (SGLT1 and SGLT2), showed substantial, dose-dependent, statistically-significant reductions in hemoglobin A1c (HbA1c) in a Phase 2b trial in patients diagnosed with poorly-controlled type 2 diabetes who were concurrently treated with metformin, an established diabetes therapy. LX4211 treatment also produced significant reductions in body weight and blood pressure. Importantly, LX4211 treatment had a favorable safety profile and was well tolerated in the study.

chinese.chinese: 阿斯利康, Rigel制药公司今天宣布R256全球发展和商业化的全球独家许可协议，Rigel吸入型(JAK抑制剂)抑制IL -13和IL - 4的信号，它被用作治疗中度至重度慢性哮喘的药物。在临床前研究， R256已被证明可以减少呼吸道炎症及改善肺功能。
chinese.english: AstraZeneca and Rigel Pharmaceuticals Inc. today announced an exclusive worldwide license agreement for the global development and commercialization of R256, Rigel's inhaled JAK inhibitor shown to inhibit IL-13 and IL-4 signalling, which is being investigated as a treatment for moderate to severe chronic asthma. In preclinical research, R256 has been shown to reduce airway inflammation and improve lung function.

chinese.chinese: Dyax公司首席医疗官，Burt Adelman博士说：“今天的决定绝不会减轻我们对整体血管神经性水肿，尤其是遗传性血管神经性水肿患者的承诺。这些研究结果并未影响Kalbitor（ecallantide）用于遗传性血管神经性水肿的紧急治疗。”
chinese.english: “Today's announcement in no way diminishes our commitment to the overall angioedema space and, in particular, to patients with hereditary angioedema,” said Dr. Burt Adelman, Chief Medical Officer at Dyax. "These results have no bearing on the use of Kalbitor? (ecallantide) to treat patients during an acute attack of HAE."

chinese.chinese: 今天，你的记性有没有让你感到挫败？那个词就在嘴边，却无论如何说不出来。如果这样，我得说，你并不孤单。
chinese.english: Has your memory failed you today, such asstruggling to recall a word that's "on the tip of your tongue?" Ifso, you're not alone.

chinese.chinese: Biomay AG今天宣布了其创新性的BM32疫苗第一次用于人体的临床IIa试验结果，该结果前景良好。在一个70例草类花粉过敏患者组成的研究组中，该疫苗显著降低了过敏相关鼻部症状。环境挑战研究也表明，通过皮肤点刺试验，BM32可显著降低皮肤对草类花粉反应性。除需在治疗首日需注射完整疫苗剂量外，治疗方法被证明安全并且总体耐受性良好。患者需在2个月的时间段内，总共皮下注射3剂BM32或安慰剂。该给药方案较传统需要多次注射的免疫疗法增效显著。
chinese.english: Biomay AG announced today promising results from a First-in-Man Phase IIa trial with its innovative allergy vaccine BM32. The vaccine significantly reduced allergy-related nasal symptoms in a study group of 70 patients suffering from grass pollen allergy. The environmental challenge study also showed that BM32 significantly reduced skin reactivity to grass pollen as demonstrated by skin prick testing. The treatment was shown to be safe and was generally well tolerated, despite the fact that a full dose of the vaccine was given from the first day of treatment. All in all, patients were given three doses of BM32 or a placebo by subcutaneous injections over a period of two months. This dosing regimen offers a dramatic improvement over conventional immunotherapy, which requires multiple injections.

chinese.chinese: 在今天公布的文件中，白宫工作的民主党顾问要求会见法案的支持者“共同讨论我们的广告战”，美国家庭消费群体华盛顿总部执行董事罗恩·波拉克在2009年6月发给PhRMA代表的电子邮件中披露。
chinese.english: In the documents released today, Democratic consultants working with the White House asked to meet supporters of the law ''to discuss our ad campaign,'' Ron Pollack, executive director of the Washington-based consumer group Families USA, said in a June 2009 e-mail to PhRMA lobbyists.

chinese.chinese: Gerstin计划于今天在费城召开的美国糖尿病学会的科学会议上发表ORIGIN（Outcome Reduction with an Initial GlargineIntervention study）研究的结果。此结果同时发表于今天出版的新英格兰杂志上（NEJM）
chinese.english: Gerstein isscheduled to present the findings of the ORIGIN study (Outcome Reduction withan Initial Glargine Intervention study), today at the scientific sessions ofthe American Diabetes Association in Philadelphia. The results are alsopublished today in two papers in the medical journal New England Journal of Medicine (NEJM).

chinese.chinese: 在20世纪70年代，人们注意到在瑞典北部心血管疾病的发病率高于瑞典的其他地区，该地区男性的心血管疾病发病率甚至在世界范围内名列前茅。为了解决上述问题，在1985年启动了V?sterbotten干预项目（VIP），后来推广到全国。VIP项目包括为注明健康食物标签、普及健康信息、烹饪指导及健康体检和咨询（包括食物建议），这些措施在今天仍然在进行。
chinese.english: In the 1970's it was noticed that the incidence of cardiovascular disease was higher in northern Sweden than anywhere else in the country and that for men it was amongst the highest in the world. The V?sterbotten Intervention Programme (VIP) was set up in 1985 to address this and was later extended to include the entire country. The VIP included better food labelling, healthy information, cooking demonstrations and health examinations and counselling, including diet advice, and still continues today.

chinese.chinese: 患有其他慢性疾病，如癫痫、紫绀型心脏病、镰状细胞病的孕妇也很危险。
chinese.english: Women with other chronic medical illnesses such as epilepsy, cyanotic heart disease, or sickle cell disease are also at risk.

chinese.chinese: 某些器官尤其是心脏、肝脏和肾上腺，由于细胞肥大和增殖而显著增大。
chinese.english: Certain organs, notably heart, liver, and adrenals, were significantly enlarged due to both cellular hypertrophy and hyperplasia.

chinese.chinese: 胸部X线可见心脏肥大和静脉充血。
chinese.english: Cardiomegaly and venous congestion are seen in the chest x-ray.

chinese.chinese: 在这种情况下地高辛禁用，而β-肾上腺素阻断剂，如心得安，可能减缓心脏的代偿失调。
chinese.english: In such circumstances digoxin is contraindicated and a beta-adrenergic blocking agent, such as propranolol, may be useful in alleviating the cardiac decompensation.

chinese.chinese: 多数婴儿在满月后转为非症状性，数月后心脏增大消失。
chinese.english: Most infants become asymptomatic by 1 month of age, and cardiomegaly resolves after several months.

chinese.chinese: 两个有趣的研究提示糖尿病母亲的婴儿对心脏和脊柱畸形有特殊危险性。
chinese.english: Two interesting studies suggest that IDMs are at particular risk for cardiac and spinal anomalies.

chinese.chinese: 回顾Joslin Clinic的经验，Rowland发现糖尿病母亲婴儿中4％病例证实有先天性心脏病，或5倍于普通人群预期数。
chinese.english: In reviewing the Joslin Clinic experience, Rowland found a 4% incidence of proved congenital heart disease among IDMs, or 5 times the number expected in the general population.

chinese.chinese: 心脏错构瘤
chinese.english: Hamartoma of the heart

chinese.chinese: 心脏检查示心率快速而节律规则，无杂音。
chinese.english: Examination of the heart revealed a rapid regular rhythm with no murmurs.

chinese.chinese: 在没有潜在的心脏病时，一般并无发生心内膜炎的危险。
chinese.english: Endocarditis is not a risk in the absence of underlying heart disease.

chinese.chinese: 心脏较小。
chinese.english: The heart appeared small.

chinese.chinese: 一名4岁女孩，出生体重5 lb 70z，(2.5kg)，生后l月时注意到患儿有心脏杂音(收缩期和舒张期隆隆声)。
chinese.english: This 4-year-old girl, born weighing 5 lb 7 oz, was noted to have a cardiac murmur (systolic with diastolic rumble) at 1 month of age.

chinese.chinese: 1．上述病史中哪些方面提示患儿可能有一个相当大的心内左向右分流的心脏病?
chinese.english: 1. Which factors in the history noted above suggest that this patient may have heart disease consisting of a fairly large intracardiac left-to-right shunt ?

chinese.chinese: A．直到出生1个月才听到心脏杂音
chinese.english: A. A cardiac murmur not noted until 1 month of age.

chinese.chinese: 心脏检查显示心尖搏动在锁骨中线外第5肋间。
chinese.english: The heart revealed the apical impulse to be in the fifth left intercostal space just outside the midclavicular line.

chinese.chinese: 研究发现高剂量的VB3可以使机体免疫细胞杀死金葡菌的能力增加1000倍，这项研究在室的动物身上以及人体血液中均已经被证实。
chinese.english: The research found that high doses of this vitamin increased by 1,000 times the ability of immune cells to kill staph bacteria. The work was done both in laboratory animals and with human blood.

chinese.chinese: 研究人员应用大鼠模型，将在胸腺（免疫系统中很重要的器官）中生长的干细胞，在室控制的条件下，转变成为皮肤毛囊干细胞。
chinese.english: Researchers, who used rat models, grew stem cells from the thymus - an organ important for our immune systems - in the laboratory using conditions for growing hair follicle skin stem cells.

chinese.chinese: 研究人员将3个品系雌雄性小鼠分别分配到3个试验组。第一组采用戴手套或室大衣袖子套住手抓小鼠尾基部捉拿小鼠；第二组用充满了小鼠熟悉气味腈纶隧道笼来运送小鼠；第三组戴手套的手在小鼠周围慢慢地关闭带柄的小铲将小鼠舀起来，直到小鼠完全适应。每次1分钟每天9~16次。
chinese.english: The researchers placed male and female mice from three strains into one of three experimental groups. Some mice were lifted by the base of the tail and held on a gloved hand or lab-coat sleeve. A second group of mice crawled into an acrylic tunnel filled with a familiar scent. In the third group, the handlers scooped mice up with gloved hands that loosely closed around the animals until the mice had adapted to the routine. Each of the 9-16 daily sessions lasted 1 minute.

chinese.chinese: 对于信息的追求存在于临床工作的每一部分：病人病史的询问，室的检查，读过哪些书，包括对同事的提问等等。
chinese.english: The need for information underlies essentially all clinical work: the questions asked during a patient history, the tests ordered, the books read, and the questions asked of colleagues.

chinese.chinese: 根据其研究生的指控，Goodwin还是UW-M大学的农业和生命科学分校以及医学与公众健康分校的副教授的时候，发生了造假行为。她是一个室的带头人，集中于线虫性别决定的研究。尤其是，她正在研究一个特定的小RNA链在线虫性别决定过程的行为。为了支持她的研究，Goodwin获得了NIH和美国农业部的国立基金，超过180万美元。
chinese.english: The misconduct occurred while Goodwin was an associate professor of the UW-M College of Agriculture and Life Sciences and the School of Medicine and Public Health, according to the allegations of her graduate students. She spearheaded a lab that focused on nematode sex determination. In particular, she was researching the behavior of a particular strand of small RNA in the sex determination process of Caenorhabditis elegans. To support her research, Goodwin was awarded over $1.8 million dollars in federal grants from the National Institutes of Health and the US Department of Agriculture.

chinese.chinese: 然而她室的几个研究生开始怀疑她在基金项目中伪造表格和数据，这使得它的结果看起来要好于实际。作为回应，Goodwin辞职，在接下来的法律程序中无法联系到。
chinese.english: Yet several graduate students in her research lab became suspicious about falsified figures and data in her grant proposals, which implied better results than they had actually achieved. In response, Goodwin resigned and was unreachable during much of the following legal proceedings.

chinese.chinese: 纽约州批准700万美元拨款用于冷泉港室购置设备
chinese.english: New York State Approves $7M in Grants for Equipment at Cold Spring Harbor Labs

chinese.chinese: 接下来的文章部分是一些临床-科学家的故事，包括Jenner, Snow, Koch, and Pasteur都对这篇文章有所贡献，这些故事告诉我们临床-科学家非常有必要进行的双向交流（从临床到室，从室到临床）探索与进展之路。
chinese.english: This is followed by an essay on the history of the physician-scientist, in which the work of physicians such as Jenner, Snow, Koch, and Pasteur helps the author make the case that physician-scientists are essential to initiating bidirectional—bedside to bench and bench to bedside—discovery and progress.

chinese.chinese: 每日科学日报（（2010.9.23）——爱荷华州大学的爱德华于和Ames室的研究团队发现细菌里的晶状泵结构可以移除重金属毒物而使细菌产生耐药性。
chinese.english: ScienceDaily (Sep. 23, 2010) — A research team led by Edward Yu of Iowa State University and the Ames Laboratory has discovered the crystal structures of pumps that remove heavy metal toxins from bacteria, making them resistant to antibiotics.

chinese.chinese: 每日科学（2010年9月23日）- 艾奥瓦州立大学 Ames室Edward Yu领导的一个研究团队发现：移走细菌体内重金属的泵的的晶体结构使细菌产生抗药性。
chinese.english: ScienceDaily (Sep. 23, 2010) — A research team led by Edward Yu of Iowa State University and the Ames Laboratory has discovered the crystal structures of pumps that remove heavy metal toxins from bacteria, making them resistant to antibiotics.

chinese.chinese: 研究人员已经使用大量的多人网络游戏作为自然室，但是数据的分析是一个挑战。在一次会议上，一位计算机专家提出用一种数学工具（基模分析）来获取数据，基模分析可以识别更多的极限数据点并描述模型整体的其它部分。
chinese.english: Researchers have been using massively multiplayer online games as natural laboratories, but the data are a challenge to interpret. At the meeting, a computer scientist presented results obtained using a mathematical tool called archetype analysis that works by identifying the most extreme data points and describes the rest as combinations of these archetypes.

chinese.chinese: ISO/IEC 17025标准由国际标准组织（ISO）和国际电子技术委员会（IEC）共同制定，目的是为了整合工艺可行性检测和质量体系对室校正的需求。
chinese.english: The ISO/IEC 17025 is a standard developed by the International Standards Organization (ISO) and the International Electrotechnical Commission (IEC) to merge requirements for technical competence in testing and calibration laboratories with requirements for quality systems.

chinese.chinese: 每日科学（2010-10-30）-来自美国Wake Forest大学Baptist医学中心再生医学研究所的研究人员已经在室培植替代肝脏方面达到一个新的里程碑，它虽然还只处于早期阶段，但是意义重大。他们是第一批利用人类肝细胞成功制造出像人类肝脏一样-----至少在室条件下功能齐全的微型肝脏的人。下一步的工作是将这种肝脏移植至动物模型体内后，观察它们是否还能继续发挥功能。
chinese.english: ScienceDaily (Oct. 30, 2010) — Researchers at the Institute for Regenerative Medicine at Wake Forest University Baptist Medical Center have reached an early, but important, milestone in the quest to grow replacement livers in the lab. They are the first to use human liver cells to successfully engineer miniature livers that function -- at least in a laboratory setting -- like human livers. The next step is to see if the livers will continue to function after transplantation in an animal model.

chinese.chinese: 也许算是早期的超级模仿型病毒，梅毒曾经大肆泛滥（AI Capone，Edouard Manet，和Leo Tolstoy 据说都曾得过，这张来自20世纪20年的老式的法语广告证实对人们的发出针对它的警告），它的晚期也会聚合多种其他疾病并且很难找到合适的诊治方法。每一例都是由不同类型的螺旋状被称为螺旋菌的细菌导致，因为和莱姆症很类似，没有治愈的梅毒能够对心脏和神经系统造成破坏。尽管医生花了数百年来解决梅毒之谜，当今通过室测试已经很容易诊断出梅毒，通过盘尼西林也很容易将它治愈。
chinese.english: Perhaps the original great imitator disease, syphilis used to be widespread (Al Capone, Edouard Manet, and Leo Tolstoy were said to have had it, and this vintage French ad from the 1920s warns against it), in its late stages resembled many other illnesses, and was difficult to properly diagnose. Much like Lyme disease—each is caused by a different type of corkscrew-shaped bacterium known as a spirochete—untreated syphilis can cause damage to the heart and nervous system. Though it took hundreds of years for doctors to solve the riddle of syphilis, the disease is now generally easy to diagnose with laboratory tests, and easy to treat with penicillin.

chinese.chinese: Vanda医药公司（纳斯达克：VNDA），这是一家致力于研发和商品化中枢神经系疾病药物的生物药剂公司，今天在第26届联合专业睡眠协会会议上发布了目前睡眠状况，显示有睡眠障碍的全盲人群中，70%患有非24小时障碍。非24小时障碍是一种昼夜节律性睡眠障碍，其特征为生物钟长期失调。上述结果强调了调整昼夜节律时钟并使其与24小时同步新疗法的必需性。目前尚无FDA批准用于治疗非24小时障碍的药物。
chinese.english: Vanda Pharmaceuticals Inc. (NASDAQ: VNDA), a ********aceutical company focused on the development and commercialization of products for the treatment of central nervous system disorders, announced today that data presented at SLEEP, the 26th annual meeting of the Associated Professional Sleep Societies (APSS), show that seventy percent (70%) of totally blind people with sleep complaints suffer from Non-24-Hour Disorder (Non-24). Non-24 is a circadian rhythm disorder characterized by a chronically misaligned body clock. The results underscore the need for a new therapy that can regulate the circadian clock and keep it synchronized with the 24-hour day. There are currently no FDA approved medications for the treatment of Non-24.

chinese.chinese: 所有关于今天宣布的albiglutide临床3期试验的数据咨询联系方式都由GSK提供。
chinese.english: All inquiries regarding the albiglutide Phase 3 data announced today should be directed to the contacts provided by GSK.

chinese.chinese: Vertex制药有限公司(Nasdaq: VRTX)今天宣布了一项长期随访研究的新数据，该数据表明，应用KALYDECO? (ivacaftor)进行为期48周治疗人群中，肺功能（1秒强力呼吸量，FEV1）、呼吸系统症状及体重增加方面均有改善，该治疗方案是两项总共持续96周治疗的关键研究(STRIVE 或 ENVISION)之一。正在进行中的PERSIST扩展研究已招募了患有囊胞性纤维化病（CF）的6岁以上患者，这些患者囊性纤维化跨膜转导调节因子(CFTR)基因有至少一个拷贝的G551D变异，而且他们已完成STRIVE 或 ENVISION的临床3期治疗（KALYDECO与安慰剂治疗组），这些患者还经过了一些其他方面的筛选标准。在2012年6月6日至9日于都伯林召开的第35届欧洲囊性纤维化病协会会议上，总共提交了9项关于KALYDECO的报告。
chinese.english: Vertex Pharmaceuticals Incorporated (Nasdaq: VRTX) announced today new data from a long-term follow-up study that showed that the improvements in lung function (forced expiratory volume in one second, FEV1), respiratory symptoms and weight gain among people who were treated with KALYDECO? (ivacaftor) for 48 weeks in one of two pivotal studies (STRIVE or ENVISION) were durable for up to 96 total weeks of treatment. The ongoing PERSIST extension study enrolled people with cystic fibrosis (CF) ages 6 and older who have at least one copy of the G551D mutation in the cystic fibrosis transmembrane conductance regulator (CFTR) gene and who completed treatment in the Phase 3 STRIVE or ENVISION studies (KALYDECO and placebo treatment groups) and met certain other eligibility criteria. A total of nine presentations on KALYDECO are being presented at the 35th European Cystic Fibrosis Society (ECFS) Conference in Dublin, June 6 to 9, 2012.

chinese.chinese: 助理研究员Maria Garcia-Fernandez,和凋亡与strang癌症生物学室的头Hermann Steller,还有他们的同事们,探索了一种叫做Sept4的基因的活性,这种基因编码一种蛋白ARTS, 这种蛋白能够增加程序化细胞死亡,或凋亡,通过与其他预防细胞死亡的蛋白相拮抗.ARTS是由Sarit Larisch首次发现的 ,他是洛克菲勒大学的访问教授,并且发现在白血病和其他一些癌症中缺乏这种蛋白,表明他能够抑制肿瘤.为了研究ARTS的作用,研究人员繁殖了一组缺乏Sept4基因的经过遗传功能处理的小鼠.
chinese.english: Research associate Maria Garcia-Fernandez, Hermann Steller, head of the Strang Laboratory of Apoptosis and Cancer Biology, and their colleagues explored the activity of a gene called Sept4, which encodes a protein, ARTS, that increases programmed cell death, or apoptosis, by antagonizing other proteins that prevent cell death. ARTS was originally discovered by Sarit Larisch, a visiting professor at Rockefeller, and is found to be lacking in human leukemia and other cancers, suggesting it suppresses tumors. To study the role of ARTS, the experimenters bred a line of mice genetically engineered to lack the Sept4 gene.

chinese.chinese: AFFiRiS公司今天宣布，帕金森病候选疫苗PD01A启动I期临床试验。
chinese.english: AFFiRiS AG announced today the start of the Phase I study of its Parkinson?s vaccine candidate PD01A.

chinese.chinese: 今天公布的报告结果（摘要#8057）来自基于每周给药的第一阶段临床评估的拓展试验。拓展试验中，对患者每周给药SAR3419并连续四周，接着每两周给药并持续四次。研究者指出“这一给药方案相对先前的测试方案更加安全”而且保持了抗肿瘤活性：
chinese.english: The findings reported today (abstract #8057) arefrom an extension of a weekly dosing Phase I trial. In this extension, SAR3419was administered weekly for four weeks and then on an every two-week basis foranother four doses.
