The study investigators note that this schedule“demonstrates an improved safety profile compared to prior tested schedules”while preserving antitumor activity:

chinese.chinese: “我们相信，今天公布的数据可以支持SAR3419有潜力成为治疗B细胞恶性肿瘤的新疗法”该公司总裁兼首席执行官Daniel Junius如是说。“而且这些结果为我们的靶向型抗体载荷技术的运用提供了更多的数据支持，同时也拓展了我们产品机会的深度–超出任何一种癌症治疗的化合物、抗体以及产品设计。”
chinese.english: “We believe the findings reported today support thatSAR3419 has the potential to become an important new therapy for key B-cellmalignancies,” commented Daniel Junius, President and CEO. “These findings alsoadd to the growing body of clinical data supporting that the utility of our TAPtechnology – and the depth of our product opportunities – extend well beyondany one compound to multiple types of cancers, antibodies, and productdesigns.”

chinese.chinese: ImmunoGen, Inc.（纳斯达克：IMGN），一个生物技术公司，今天在芝加哥举行的美国临床肿瘤协会年度会议上介绍了其对化合物SAR3419研究的最新临床数据。化合物SAR3419运用了ImmunoGen公司的靶向型抗体载荷(Targeted AntibodyPayload，TAP)技术，它对CD19+非霍奇金淋巴瘤（NHL）和B细胞恶性肿瘤具有潜在的治疗前景。这一化合物由ImmunoGen公司创造并作为广泛合作的一部分授权给赛诺菲公司（Sanofi）。今天公布的数据来源于该药的第一阶段评估研究（给药方案），这一给药方案正被用于SAR3419的第二阶段评估。
chinese.english: ImmunoGen, Inc. (Nasdaq: IMGN), a biotechnology company, today announced thepresentation of new clinical data for the investigational compound, SAR3419, atthe American Society of Clinical Oncology (ASCO) annual meeting taking place inChicago, IL. SAR3419 uses ImmunoGen's Targeted Antibody Payload (TAP)technology and is a potential treatment for CD19+ non-Hodgkin's lymphoma (NHL)and other B-cell malignancies. The compound was created by ImmunoGen andlicensed to Sanofi as part of a broader collaboration. The data reported todayare from the Phase I evaluation that established the dosing schedule being usedwith SAR3419 in its Phase II evaluation.

chinese.chinese: 一家致力于研究精确诊断放射性药物的生物制药公司--Navidea生物制药公司(NYSE MKT: NAVB)今天宣布，一项摘要回顾已于2012年美国临床肿瘤学会(ASCO)年度会议之际发表，该文荟萃分析比较了乳腺癌淋巴结术中淋巴映射(ILM)临床3期试验与标准护理技术。该题为“靶标为新型受体(CD206)的tilmanocept标记99mTc与现有Tc99m-硫胶体在乳腺癌术中淋巴映射(ILM) 关键性能指标对比（novel receptor targeted (CD206) 99mTc-labeled tilmanocept versus the currently employed Tc99m-sulfur colloid in intraoperative lymphatic mapping (ILM) on key performance metrics in breast cancer”）的摘要发表于《临床肿瘤学杂志在线2012》。
chinese.english: Navidea Biopharmaceuticals, Inc. (NYSE MKT: NAVB), a ********aceutical company focused on precision diagnostic radiopharmaceuticals, today announced that the abstract reviewing a meta-analysis of Phase 3 clinical trial for Intraoperative lymphatic mapping (ILM) of lymph nodes in breast cancer, compared to standard of care techniques has been published in conjunction with the 2012 Annual Meeting of the American Society of Clinical Oncology (ASCO). The abstract entitled, “The novel receptor targeted (CD206) 99mTc-labeled tilmanocept versus the currently employed Tc99m-sulfur colloid in intraoperative lymphatic mapping (ILM) on key performance metrics in breast cancer” is published in the Journal of Clinical Oncology Online 2012; e21066.

chinese.chinese: 大多数人认为领导者都是外向的、引人注意的、具有超凡魅力的。我认为这种看法比较片面。对于今天的管理者来说，最大的挑战是深入了解你的同事。你可能正好发现你的公司中就有性格内向，可是具有领导天赋的人。外向型的人可能能够更快的完成任务；而内向性格的人根据需要完成各项工作，在规定的最后时刻，最好的完成任务。
chinese.english: Most people think of leaders as being these outgoing, very visible, and charismatic people, which I find to be a very narrow perception. The key challenge for managers today is to get beyond the surface of your colleagues. You might just find that you have introverts embedded within your organization who are natural-born leaders. Extroverts may get places faster, but for introverts it's all about working at the pace you need and, at the end of the day, performing at your best.

chinese.chinese: LipoScience公司，一个通过核磁共振(NMR)这种高科技临床诊断方法，推进患者治疗的体外诊断公司，今天宣布，通过临床研究发现α脂蛋白水平正常的患者由于低密度脂蛋白粒子(LDL-P)数量的增多，仍旧有患动脉粥样硬化的危险。脂蛋白是动脉粥样硬化疾病的危险因素，如心脏病、中风。
chinese.english: LipoScience, Inc., an in vitro diagnostic company advancing patient care by developing high value proprietary clinical diagnostic tests using nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR) technology, today announced results from a clinical study demonstrating that patients with normal levels of lipoprotein(a) may retain significant risk of atherosclerosis due to an elevated low density lipoprotein particle (LDL-P) number. Lipoprotein(a) is considered a risk factor for atherosclerotic diseases such as coronary heart disease and stroke.

chinese.chinese: 杨森研发有限公司今天宣布，他们已经向美国食物及药物管理局(FDA)提交了一个治疗2型糖尿病的药物canagliflozin的新药申请，旨在获得使用这个药物的批准。该药物是一种选择性钠离子葡萄糖共转运子2 (SGLT2)的抑制剂，每日口服一次的研究新药，用于2型糖尿病成年患者的治疗。
chinese.english: Janssen Research Development, LLC (Janssen), announced today that it has submitted a New Drug Application (NDA) to the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) seeking approval for the use of canagliflozin, an investigational, oral, once-daily, selective sodium glucose co-transporter 2 (SGLT2) inhibitor, for the treatment of adult patients with type 2 diabetes.

chinese.chinese: 葛兰素史克在今天的美国临床肿瘤协会（ASCO）年会上发布了dabrafenib 和trametinib两种药物的临床试验结果。Trametinib的第三期临床数据也已经在新英格兰医学杂志在线发表。
chinese.english: GSK is presenting the clinical trial results for dabrafenib and trametinib today at the annual conference of the American Society of Clinical Oncology, or ASCO. The phase 3 data for trametinib were also published online in the New England Journal of Medicine.

chinese.chinese: 剑桥，Mass.&CARLSBAD,Calif.---(美国商业新闻社)---赛诺菲（Sanofi）旗下健赞（Genzyme）公司，与Isis制药公司今天宣布，FDA已接受审查健赞公司已提交的KYNAMRO（mipomersen sodium）新药申请（New Drug Application，NDA），用于纯合子家族性高胆固醇血症（homozygous familial hypercholesterolemia ，HoFH）患者的治疗。健赞将支付Isis公司2500万美元的阶段性付款。
chinese.english: CAMBRIDGE, Mass. & CARLSBAD, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Genzyme, a Sanofi company, and Isis Pharmaceuticals Inc., announced today that the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has accepted for filing the New Drug Application (NDA) for Kynamro (mipomersen sodium) for the treatment of patients with homozygous familial hypercholesterolemia (HoFH). The NDA filing with the FDA triggers a $25 million milestone payment to Isis from Genzyme.

chinese.chinese: Inovio医药公司(NYSEMKT: INO)今天宣布其SynCon&reg的一期临床试验结果，证实SynCon&reg这一禽流感疫苗可以针对6种不同的H5N1菌株产生具有保护性HAI滴度的抗体。Inovio公司在研究路径上取得了明显的成就，即发展通用流感疫苗。通过设计Inovio公司的SynCon&reg流感疫苗并不能对抗任何一种单一的病毒。重要的是，所合成的疫苗可以产生1:40的血凝抑制（HAI）滴度，并且在17名接受疫苗的人群中的8名患者（47%）中，每6个人中至少有一人可以高效的对抗H5N1菌株，说明了疫苗的广泛的覆盖性，17人中有12人（71%）接受疫苗后可以产生1:20或以上的HAI滴度，预示对抗H5N1菌株时，疫苗反应阳性。
chinese.english: By design, Inovio's SynCon® flu vaccine is not matchedto any single virus. Importantly, the vaccine generated a hemagglutinationinhibition (HAI) titer of 1:40 or higher against at least one of the six testedH5N1 strains in 8 of 17 (47%) immunized subjects, demonstrating the vaccine'sbroad coverage; 12 of 17 (71%) vaccines generated an HAI titer of 1:20 orhigher, indicating a positive vaccine response, against at least one H5N1strain.

chinese.chinese: Cipher 制药公司今天宣布,美国食品和药物管理局(FDA)批准了Absorica（Cipher 制药公司的新产品）治疗严重反复发作的结节粉刺,Absorica是粉刺药物异维甲酸的专利品牌配方。 预计将于2012年第四季度登陆美国市场。
chinese.english: Cipher Pharmaceuticals Inc. announced today that the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has approved Absorica， Cipher's novel, patented brand formulation of the acne medication isotretinoin, for the treatment of severe recalcitrant nodular acne. Absorica is expected to be launched in the U.S. in Q4 2012.

chinese.chinese: 2．患者4岁时心脏听诊发现一杂音，与下列所有情况除某项外皆相符
chinese.english: 2. Cardiac auscultation of the patient at 4 years of age reveals a murmur compatible with all of the following except

chinese.chinese: 胸部X线检查：心脏中度增大及肺血管影增多。
chinese.english: Chest x-ray: Moderate cardiomegaly and increased pulmonary vascularity.

chinese.chinese: A．第l度心脏传导阻滞
chinese.english: A. first-degree heart block.

chinese.chinese: 1. (E)具有中型及大型室间隔缺损的患者在新生儿早期经常不出现心脏杂音。
chinese.english: 1. (E) Patients with moderate-to-large ventricular septal defects usually do not exhibit cardiac murmurs in the early neonatal period.

chinese.chinese: 通常在生后3～4周首次健康婴儿检查时才发现心脏杂音。
chinese.english: A cardiac murmur, however, is usually discovered at the first well baby checkup at 3-4 weeks of age.

chinese.chinese: 其结果是使有关的心脏杂音延迟出现。
chinese.english: The result is a delay in the appearance of the associated cardiac murmur.

chinese.chinese: 3．(B)伴有相当大的左向右心内分流的患者若有舒张中期杂音表示在心脏舒张期心室充盈度增加(房间隔缺损时为右室充盈，室间隔缺损时为左室充盈)，当肺血流量达到至少两倍于体循环血流量或更大时常可听到这一杂音。
chinese.english: 3. (B) The mid-diastolic murmur in patients with sizable left-to-right intracardiac shunts represents increased filling of the ventricles during diastole (right ventricular in atrial septal defect and left ventricular in ventricular septal defect) and is frequently audible when the pulmonary flow is at least twice that of the systemic or greater.

chinese.chinese: 5．(D)已发现M型和二维超声心动图检查对准确地确定心脏解剖和大血管的关系以及对心脏功能的估计是有价值的。
chinese.english: 5. (D) M-mode and two-dimensional echocardiography have been found to be of value in accurately defining cardiac anatomy and great vessel relationship and in assessing cardiac function, Flow determinations in the pulmonary Circuits have not been possible using regular echocardiography.

chinese.chinese: 但在多数一流的医疗中心所遇到的心脏完全传导阻滞仅占1％或更低。
chinese.english: Fortunately, complete heart block is encountered in only about 1% or less at most first-rate medical centers.

chinese.chinese: B．风湿性心脏病
chinese.english: B. rheumatic heart disease.

chinese.chinese: 治疗开始4周后，进行胸部X线检查显示心脏体积缩小。
chinese.english: The chest x-ray taken 4 weeks after the beginning of treatment reveal marked reduction in heart size.

chinese.chinese: A．心脏填塞
chinese.english: A. cardiac tamponade

chinese.chinese: 12．奇脉是心脏填塞的迹象
chinese.english: 12. Pulsus paradoxus is a sign of cardiac tamponade.

chinese.chinese: 胸部X线片；心脏略扩大，考虑为继发于贫血
chinese.english: Roentgenogram of the chest: some cardiac dilatation, thought to be secondary to the anemia

chinese.chinese: 颈静脉明显，心脏有Ⅱ／Ⅳ级收缩期杂音。
chinese.english: The neck veins were prominent and the heart showed grade II/VI systolic murmur.

chinese.chinese: 该研究小组回顾了超过1000项研究和评论 ，最终做出了他们的结论。这项报告称检测维他命D的室可能高估了缺乏微生物D人群的数目，因为他们的检测不是基于严格的科学研究。
chinese.english: The panel reviewed more than 1,000 studies and comments from scientists in drawing its conclusions. The report said labs that test for vitamin D may overestimate the number of people who are deficient because their tests aren't based on “rigorous scientific studies.”

chinese.chinese: 在室中干细胞可以转变成复杂的、有功能的肠组织
chinese.english: Stem Cells Turned Into Complex, Functioning Intestinal Tissue in Lab

chinese.chinese: 2010年12月13日的《科学日报》报道 - 科学家首次在室中利用多能干细胞创造了有功能的人体肠道组织。
chinese.english: ScienceDaily (Dec. 13, 2010) — For the first time, scientists have created functioning human intestinal tissue in the laboratory from pluripotent stem cells.

chinese.chinese: 莫斯科流行病学和微生物学研究所Gamaleya团队测试了对包括绿脓杆菌，金黄色葡萄球菌细菌的低温等离子体炬。这些物种是常见的慢性伤口感染的罪魁祸首，并能抵抗抗生素的治疗，因为它们可以生长出称为生物膜保护层。科学家发现，五分钟后等离子体不仅使多达99%的室培养细菌生物膜被破坏，而且，等离子十分钟后在大鼠皮肤伤口杀死的细菌平均大约90％。
chinese.english: The team from the Gamaleya Institute of Epidemiology and Microbiology in Moscow tested a low-temperature plasma torch against bacterial species including Pseudomonas aeruginosa and Staphylococcus aureus. These species are common culprits of chronic wound infections and are able to resist the action of antibiotics because they can grow together in protective layers called biofilms. The scientists showed not only that plasma was lethal to up to 99% of bacteria in laboratory-grown biofilms after five minutes, but also that plasma killed about 90 % of the bacteria (on average) infecting skin wounds in rats after ten minutes.

chinese.chinese: 科学日报（2010年12月1日） - 在美国洛斯阿拉莫斯国家室的理论生物学家已经使用了新墨西哥州的超级计算机，以帮助一个国际研究小组解开有关核糖体另一个谜- 活细胞的蛋白质工厂分子神秘动力 。这项研究发表在12月2日的自然杂志上，可以有助于研发药针对美国许多医院中的对抗生素抗药的葡萄球菌（耐甲氧西林金黄色葡萄球菌感染）。这项工作也可用于防治炭疽工程菌和鼠疫。
chinese.english: ScienceDaily (Dec. 1, 2010) — Theoretical biologists at Los Alamos National Laboratory have used a New Mexico supercomputer to aid an international research team in untangling another mystery related to ribosomes -- those enigmatic jumbles of molecules that are the protein factories of living cells. The research, published December 2 in the journal Nature, could aid in development of new antibiotics used to fight multidrug resistant superbugs such as MRSA (methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus infections) found in many U.S. hospitals. The work may also be important for combating engineered strains of anthrax and plague.

chinese.chinese: 每日科学（2010.12.27）--MIC-1蛋白可以促进肿瘤中血管的产生，通过靶蛋白MIC-1来阻止黑色素瘤的生长可能对这种高侵袭力和致死性肿瘤有更好的疗效，宾夕法尼亚州医学院领班基础研究工作室研究人员如是说。
chinese.english: ScienceDaily (Dec. 27, 2010) — Halting the growth of melanoma tumors by targeting the MIC-1 protein that promotes blood vessel development in tumors may lead to better treatment of this invasive and deadly cancer, according to Penn State College of Medicine researchers in The Foreman Foundation Research Laboratory.

chinese.chinese: 医学院的放射科教授Eric Halgren博士，社会科学部的认知科学教授Jeff Elman博士以及作为第一作者的多式联运成像室和神经科学部门的Katherine E. Travis，均来自加州大学圣迭戈分校的他们共同领衔了这项研究。这篇文章发表在本周牛津大学出版社的《大脑皮质》期刊上。
chinese.english: This study was jointly led by Eric Halgren, PhD, professor of radiology in the School of Medicine, Jeff Elman, PhD, professor of cognitive science in the Division of Social Sciences, and first author, Katherine E. Travis, of the Department of Neurosciences and the Multimodal Imaging Laboratory, all at UC San Diego. The work is published this week in the Oxford University Press journal Cerebral Cortex.

chinese.chinese: 俄亥俄州立大学综合癌症中心- -阿瑟詹姆斯克肿瘤医院和Richard J. Solove研究所（OSUCCC）的研究人员表示，这两个药物在乳腺癌模型早期试验的结果显示有双重作用可以抑制肿瘤生长，该研究所开发了这两个药物并且在室和动物试验中评价了这两个药物的抗肿瘤效果。
chinese.english: This early test of the two agents in a breast cancer model suggests that the double hit can stifle tumor progression, avoid drug resistance and cause few side effects, say researchers at the Ohio State University Comprehensive Cancer Center -- Arthur G. James Cancer Hospital and Richard J. Solove Research Institute (OSUCCC -- James) who developed the agents and evaluated their effectiveness in laboratory and animal tests.

chinese.chinese: 科学日报（2011年3月19日）——在推动活细胞显微成像相关“衍射极限”研究中，新墨西哥州阿尔伯克基（Albuquerque, NM）的桑迪亚国家室（Sandia National Laboratories）的研究人员证实了一项叫做随机光学重建显微术（Stochastic Optical Reconstruction Microscopy，STORM）的新型超分辨率显微技术的能力，它可以对活免疫细胞进行多分子同时成像。
chinese.english: ScienceDaily (Mar. 19, 2011) — In work that is pushing the "diffraction barrier" associated with microscopic imaging of living cells, researchers at Sandia National Laboratories in Albuquerque, NM demonstrated the power of a new super-resolution microscopy technique called Stochastic Optical Reconstruction Microscopy (STORM), which can simultaneously image multiple molecules in living immune cells.

chinese.chinese: 苏格兰科学家成功在室培育出肾脏，这为应对器官移植的严重短缺提供了突破性的解决措施。
chinese.english: SCOTTISH scientists have succeeded in growing kidneys in a laboratory in a breakthrough that could help tackle the tragic shortage of organs for transplant.

chinese.chinese: 神经性疾病和损伤是世界范围内导致残疾的一种主要原因，因此亟需找到一种针对中枢神经系统的修复治疗方法。尽管干细胞治疗代表着再生医学药物研究的前沿，然而“基础到临床”的差距，即将室的科学发现转化为实际可用的患者治疗方法，仍然面对了众多挑战。
chinese.english: Neurological disease and injury are a major cause of disability worldwide, and there is a pressing need to find reparative therapeutics for the central nervous system (CNS). Although stem cell therapies represent the frontier of regenerative medicine, the "bench to bedside" leap where scientific discoveries in the laboratory are translated to actual patient therapeutics faces many challenging hurdles.

chinese.chinese: 由文章的第一作者、Umetsu室的Ya-Jen Chang博士和Hye Young Kim博士领衔的后续研究表明在流感诱导哮喘的小鼠模型的动物肺中真的存在这种细胞，但在过敏哮喘小动物肺中却没有。这种模型表明甲型流感可以刺激产生一种名为IL-33的物质，这种物质可以激活天然辅助细胞分泌可以诱发哮喘的物质。
chinese.english: Subsequent experiments, led by first authors Ya-Jen Chang, PhD, and Hye Young Kim, PhD, in Umetsu's lab, showed that the cells are indeed in the lung in a mouse model of influenza-induced asthma, but not in allergic asthma. The model showed that influenza A infection stimulates production of a compound called IL-33 that activates natural helper cells, which then secrete asthma-inducing compounds.

chinese.chinese: 科学日报（2011年5月29日）---小鼠和人类的基因中有95%是相同，这种动物已被全世界公认为研究人类生理和疾病的最主要的试验模型。然而，杰克逊室研究人员Gary Churchill博士却认为“现在我们从基因水平了解了实验小鼠的相关信息”，我们要学习的内容还有很多。
chinese.english: ScienceDaily (May 29, 2011) — Mice and humans share about 95 percent of their genes, and mice are recognized around the world as the leading experimental model for studying human biology and disease. But, says Jackson Laboratory Professor Gary Churchill, Ph.D., researchers can learn even more "now that we really know what a laboratory mouse is, genetically speaking."

chinese.chinese: 现在使用的实验小鼠的品系是100多年选择性培育的结果。20世纪早期，包括杰克逊室创始人Clarence Cook Little在内第一批哺乳动物遗传学家，试图了解导致癌症和其他疾病的遗传学进程。小鼠由于生长迅速、产出量高、体积小及容易保存成为当时选择的天然试验动物。
chinese.english: The current array of laboratory mouse strains is the result of more than 100 years of selective breeding. In the early 20th century, America's first mammalian geneticists, including Jackson Laboratory founder Clarence Cook Little, sought to understand the genetic processes that lead to cancer and other diseases. Mice were the natural experimental choice as they breed quickly and prolifically and are small and easy to keep.

chinese.chinese: 一种特别有潜力的抗癌抗生素是格尔德霉素及其名为17AAG的修饰后衍生物。尽管室研究表明这种抗生素可以选择性杀死多种不同类型的肿瘤，但是这类药物的副作用，主要为肝功能衰竭，限制了其在肿瘤患者中的应用。
chinese.english: One particularly promising anticancer antibiotic is geldanamycin and a modified form of this drug known as 17AAG. Despite its proven ability to selectively kill many different forms of cancer in laboratory studies, the use of these drugs is limited due to side effects, mainly liver failure, in patients.

chinese.chinese: 世界卫生大会今天一致同意，GVAP将在地区和全国水平实施。这一过程中的全国覆盖的策略加强了GVAP的关键原则，那就是提高国家免疫计划的所有率。大会同时会建立一个监督和评价框架来最终评估基金需求和潜在的资金节约。
chinese.english: Following today's approval by the World Health Assembly, the GVAP will be adapted for implementation at the regional and country level. Country involvement in this process reinforces a key tenet of the GVAP, which is to increase national ownership of immunization programs. The collaboration will also establish a monitoring and evaluation framework and finalize estimates for funding needs as well as potential cost savings.

chinese.chinese: GeoVax实验室公司（OTCQB/OTCBB: GOVX）--总部位于亚特兰大的一家生物制药公司，致力于开发预防和对抗HIV感染的疫苗。今天宣布，由美国国立卫生研究院资助的艾滋病疫苗试验网络（HVTN）已经开始了公司的第二代HIV疫苗的1期临床试验阶段。第二代疫苗与第一代疫苗（目前已进入2a期临床试验阶段）基本相同，唯一的区别在于添加了粒细胞-巨噬细胞集落刺激因子（GM-CSF）作为佐剂（添加剂）以用来提高免疫应答。GM-CSF是一种促进启动免疫应答的正常人类蛋白，GeoVax公司的第二代疫苗将GM-CSF与HIV蛋白整合共同表达DNA启动蛋白。GM-CSF并未包括在GeoVax公司的DNA初期MVA加强剂计划当中。
chinese.english: GeoVax Labs, Inc. (OTCQB/OTCBB: GOVX), an Atlanta-based ********aceutical firm developing vaccines to prevent and fight Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV) infections, today announced that the NIH-funded HIV Vaccine Trials Network (HVTN) has opened enrollment for a Phase 1 trial for the company's second-generation HIV vaccine. The second-generation vaccine is identical to the first generation (currently in a Phase 2a clinical trial) except for the inclusion of granulocyte-macrophage colony-stimulating factor (GM-CSF) as an adjuvant (additive) to enhance vaccine responses. GM-CSF is a normal human protein that promotes the initiation of immune responses. GeoVax's second-generation vaccine co-expresses GM-CSF with HIV proteins in the DNA priming vaccinations. GM-CSF is not included in the MVA boost for the GeoVax DNA prime-MVA boost regimen.

chinese.chinese: 今天递交的“伞”系统的两个首次在人类中进行实验的临床数据显示：使用该设备治疗两年后，治疗依然有效，而临床事件自治疗以来一直较低。
chinese.english: Clinical data from the two first-in-human studies of the Parachute system presented today show meaningful and sustained low clinical events two years following treatment with the device.

chinese.chinese: 美国AVEO制药公司(纳斯达克：AVEO)和日本安斯泰来制药公司(东京证券交易所：4503)今天宣布，TIVO-1 (Tivozanib与晚期肾细胞癌一线药物索拉非尼比较)的详细结果，将在2012年6月2日的美国临床肿瘤学会 (ASCO) 年度会议上，由主要研究者Robert J. Motzer口头公布。Robert J. Motzer是纽约威尔康奈尔大学医学院医学博士, 主治医师，纪念斯隆-凯特琳癌症中心的医学教授，从事泌尿生殖系统肿瘤研究。
chinese.english: AVEO Oncology (NASDAQ:AVEO) and Astellas Pharma Inc.(TSE:4503) today announced that detailed data from TIVO-1 (Tivozanib Versus Sorafenib in 1st line Advanced RCC), will be presented on June 2 in an oralsession by the principal investigator, Robert J. Motzer, M.D., attending physician, genitourinary oncology service, Memorial Sloan-Kettering Cancer Center, professor of medicine, Weill Medical College, Cornell University, NewYork, at the 2012 Annual Meeting of the American Society of Clinical Oncology(ASCO).

chinese.chinese: 为提高公众对皮肤癌的认识，并促使人们为预防和发现皮肤癌而改变他们的行为方式，美国皮肤病学会(学院)今天发起了一个倡议活动，旨在倡导公众提高识别皮肤癌(Skin Cancer?)的意识。该倡议的主题可简单概括简单为“预防、发现、生命”，主要聚焦于努力使人们积极行动起来，从而使自己远离皮肤癌，这其中包括在适当的时候去看皮肤科医生。
chinese.english: In an effort to increase the public's understanding of skin cancer and motivate people to change their behavior to prevent and detect skin cancer, the American Academy of Dermatology (Academy) today launched the new SPOT Skin Cancer? public awareness initiative. The campaign's simple tagline - "Prevent. Detect. Live." - focuses on the positive actions people can take to protect themselves from skin cancer, including seeing a dermatologist when appropriate.

chinese.chinese: Clinigen医疗保健机构，Clinigen组的医药产品部，今天宣布其对Foscavir（膦甲酸钠）的补充新药物申请。该药用于治疗艾滋病相关的巨细胞病毒和疱疹病毒感染，已经通过美国食品药品监督管理局（FDA）的审批。
chinese.english: Clinigen Healthcare, the pharmaceutical products division ofClinigen Group, announced today that its supplemental new drug application(sNDA) for Foscavir (foscarnet sodium), a treatment for HIV/AIDS-relatedcytomegalovirus (CMV) infections and herpes, has been approved by the US Foodand Drug Administration (FDA).

chinese.chinese: 在今天是声明中，FDA报道了一项针对病毒反弹风险的临床试验的发现结果。该实验观察了同时感染有HCV和HIV的98位患者，联合使用ritonavir刺激的HIV蛋白酶抑制剂和peginterferon, ribavirin和boceprevir（或仅peginterferon和ribavirin）。其中7位患者HIV的RNA水平经不可监测期后又急剧升高。
chinese.english: In today's announcement, the FDA reported the findings of a clinical trial that underlined the risk for virologic rebound.The trial looked at the outcomes of 98 patients coinfected with HCV and HIV who were treated with ritonavir-boosted HIV protease inhibitors and peginterferon,ribavirin, and boceprevir; or just peginterferon and ribavirin. In 7 patients,HIV RNA levels surged back after falling off the radar.

chinese.chinese: 的确，开发复方制剂和服用的成本是今天会议的反复说到的主题。Prabhakaran称这个题目为“房间里的大象”，因为复方制剂策略要在经济不发达国家取得成功需要的是药物便宜，而且制药公司还担心开发药物的投资并不能给他们带来回报。
chinese.english: Indeed, costs both of developing a polypill and of taking it were recurring themes in today's session. Prabhakaran called the topic "the elephant in the room," since the success of a polypill strategy in underdeveloped countries requires that the drug be cheap, yet companies are leery of developing a pill that won't bring them return on their investment.

chinese.chinese: “启动尚未批准药物程序的一个重要目标是确保上市药品满足目前FDA标准，”美国FDA药品评估和研究中心副主任Douglas Throckmorton博士说：“我们今天的行动体现了在确保病人获取必要的药品和确保公司遵守法律之间细致的平衡。”
chinese.english: “An important goal of the unapproved drugs initiative is to make sure that marketed drugs meet current FDA standards,” said Douglas Throckmorton, M.D., deputy director for the FDA's Center for Drug Evaluation and Research. “Our action today reflects a careful balance between ensuring patient access to necessary medicines, while making sure companies comply with the law.”

chinese.chinese: 根据今天在英国医学杂志发表的一宗1248例病例研究显示，血液中维生素D浓度高与结直肠癌发生的风险降低有关。研究发现血液中维生素D浓度最高的人群比最低人群发生结直肠癌的风险要降低近40%。
chinese.english: Higher blood levels of vitamin D are associated with a reduced risk of colorectal cancer, according to a large, 1248-case study published today in the British Medical Journal (BMJ). Participants with the highest levels of blood vitamin D concentration had a nearly 40% decrease in colorectal cancer risk compared to those with the lowest levels of vitamin D.

chinese.chinese: “在我们对阿司匹林和阿司匹林类药物都很了解的今天回头去看Starko的文章，会发现Starko能将死亡与阿司匹林过量联系起来实属不易，”Chyka博士说，“因为除感冒外，还有其他一些因素也会让病情变得很复杂。”
chinese.english: “In the context of what we know today about aspirin and aspirinlike products, Starko has made an interesting effort to put this together,” Dr. Chyka said. “There are things other than flu that can complicate a disease like this.”

chinese.chinese: 位于以色列特拉维夫Sourasky医学中心的高级临床科学家发起的临床试验今天宣布，一家制药公司即Anadis公司已集中研究和制造免疫奶（初乳）——分化的多克隆抗体和定位重要疾病的其他蛋白。该临床试验将探索由Anadis研发的一种成分的作用以报告炎症性肠病（IBD）的症状，后者是一种每年影响数百万人口的严重慢性病变。
chinese.english: Anadis Ltd (ASX:ANX; OTC:ANDIY), a pharmaceutical company focused on research, development and production of immune milk (colostrum)-derived polyclonal antibodies and other proteins to address major diseases, today announces the initiation of a clinical trial with top clinical scientists at Tel Aviv Sourasky Medical Center in Israel. The clinical trial will explore the efficacy of a formulation developed by Anadis to address the symptoms of Inflammatory Bowel Disease (IBD), a serious chronic condition effecting millions of persons annually.

chinese.chinese: 产生胰岛素的细胞也被称作β细胞.它们被发现在胰腺胰岛中成群分布.患有I型糖尿病的患者不能产生胰岛素,在他们体内这些细胞已被摧毁。胰岛素是保持我们血糖水平稳定的激素.今天大多数糖尿病患者通过皮下注射针或胰岛素泵注射胰岛素一天几次。在一些极端情况下，外科医生把来自另一个个体的β细胞移植到患者体内，试图重建稳定的血糖,但由于免疫并发症和捐赠组织的稀缺性，这种治疗策略有严重的局限性。
chinese.english: Insulin-producing cells are also called beta cells. They are found in groups in the pancreas in the Islets of Langerhans. These cells have been destroyed in people with type 1 diabetes, who cannot therefore produce insulin. Insulin is the hormone that keeps our blood glucose level stable. Today most people with diabetes take insulin doses several times a day by hypodermic needle or insulin pump. In a few extreme cases surgeons transplant beta cells from another person to try to re-establish stable blood glucose, but this treatment strategy has severe limitations due to immunological complications and scarcity of donor tissue.

chinese.chinese: “今天的批准表明用细胞培养来代替基于鸡胚的过程来发展季节性流感疫苗的努力到达了顶峰。”FDA生物评价与研究中心医学博士KarenMidthun讲道。
chinese.english: “Today's approval represents the culmination of efforts to develop a seasonal influenza vaccine using cell culture as an alternative to the egg-based process,” said Karen Midthun, M.D., director of the FDA's Center for Biologics Evaluation and Research.

chinese.chinese: 一项试验研究了对心脏骤停患者采用两种温度冷却病人的治疗效果，结果显示，与较高的一种温度——34℃相比较，较低的一种，32℃ (89.6℉)可以改善心脏骤停病人的预后结局[1]。来自西班牙马德里拉巴斯大学医院的Esteban López-de-Sá博士今天在美国心脏病学会2012年度科学会议上报道了这一最新的临床试验结果。该研究结果同时也在线发表于今天的《循环》杂志（Circulation）。
chinese.english: A pilot trial examining which of two temperatures to use when cooling patients following a sudden cardiac arrest suggests that the lower one, 32°C (89.6°F), may improve outcomes compared with the higher, 34°C [1]. Dr Esteban López-de-Sá (La Paz University Hospital, Madrid, Spain) reported the findings at a late-breaking trials-session here today at the American Heart Association 2012 Scientific Sessions. The results are also published online today in Circulation.

chinese.chinese: 胸部X线： 普遍性心脏扩大，无明显肺淤血
chinese.english: Chest x-ray: generalized cardiomegaly with no gross pulmonary congestion

chinese.chinese: 这些儿童发育不良，表现为明显的贫血、黄疸、脾肿大、心脏肥大、骨髓腔增宽。
chinese.english: These children are underdeveloped and exhibit profound anemia, jaundice, splenomegaly, cardiomegaly, and an increased marrow space.

chinese.chinese: 肺部清晰，叩诊呈清音；心脏无异常。
chinese.english: The lung fields were clear and resonant and the heart showed no abnormality.

chinese.chinese: 出于肿瘤占据使髓腔扩大，骨皮质受累或骨膜下出血所引起的骨痛与其他临床表现如发热、贫血、继发于贫血的心脏杂音，腹痛等可得出风湿热或风湿性关节炎的诊断。
chinese.english: Bone pain due to expansion of the medullary canal with tumor deposits, cortical involvement, or subperiosteal hemorrhages together with other manifestations such as fever, anemia, heart murmur secondary to the anemia, abdominal pain, and so on may lead to the diagnosis of rheumatic fever or rheumatoid arthritis.

chinese.chinese: 心脏检查阴性，
chinese.english: Cardiac examination was negative.

chinese.chinese: 胸部X线拍片显示中等度心脏扩大，肺血管影增多。
chinese.english: Chest x-ray revealed a moderate degree of cardiomegaly and increased pulmonary vascularity.

chinese.chinese: 心脏检查无异常。
chinese.english: Examination of the heart revealed no abnormalities.

chinese.chinese: 然而，按照上述定义的机体死亡，现在有可能使许多病例恢复其心脏的血液循环功能和肺的呼吸功能，而且借助于特别的设备能使细胞和器官(包括神经系统)两者完整的功能维持很长一段时间。
chinese.english: However, it is now possible to restore the circulatory and respiratory functions of heart and lungs in many cases of somatic death as defined above, and integrated function both of cells and of organs (excluding those of the central nervous system) can then continue for prolonged periods with the aid of special equipment.

chinese.chinese: 少数心肌梗死灶(常呈凝固性坏死)以这种软化为其显著特征，并可引起心脏破裂；这种情况在腰椎结核也常见，其干酪样物质液化并沿腰大肌筋膜向下流注形成腹股沟“冷脓肿”。
chinese.english: Such softening is a notable feature in a small proportion of myocardial infarcts (which usually show coagulative necrosis) and may lead to rupture of the heart; it is also common in tuberculosis of the lumbar vertebrae where the caseous material liquifies and tracks down beneath the psoas fascia to form a 'cold abscess' in the groin.

chinese.chinese: 现将这三个因素在心脏、动脉和静脉内血栓形成中的作用叙述如下。
chinese.english: The roles of these three factors in the formation of thrombi in the heart, arteries and veins are considered below.

chinese.chinese: (1)心脏的血栓形成
chinese.english: (a) Cardiac thrombosis

chinese.chinese: 当心脏、主动脉或其他动脉壁上发生明显的局部扩张(动脉瘤)时，血液的涡流常导致一些血栓形成。
chinese.english: When there is gross localized dilatation (aneurysm) of the wall of the heart, aorta or other arteries, eddying of the blood usually results in some thrombosis.

chinese.chinese: 肺动脉及其分支的血栓栓塞系继发于体静脉或心脏右侧的血栓形成。
chinese.english: Thus embolism of the pulmonary arteries and their branches is secondary to thrombosis in the systemic veins or in tire right side of the heart.

chinese.chinese: 在罕见的情况下，由于患者卵圆孔未闭，栓子可从心脏右侧至左心房而被带到体循环(交叉性或奇异性栓塞)。
chinese.english: Rarely, where there is a patent foramen ovale, an embolus may pass from the right side of the heart to the left atrium and thus be carried to the systemic circulation; (crossed or paradoxical embolism).

chinese.chinese: 除了这种少数例外，体循环的栓子都是来自形成于心脏左侧的血栓(即主动脉瓣和二尖瓣的血栓性疣赘物)或来自主动脉或大动脉的血栓或动脉粥样化斑块的脱落碎片。
chinese.english: With this rare exception, emboli occurring in the systemic circulation are derived from thrombi formed in the left side of the heart, e.g. thrombotic vegetations on the aortic and mitral valves, and from thrombi or detached portions of atheromatous plaques in the aorta or large arteries.

chinese.chinese: 考虑到目前对于乳腺癌和宫颈癌筛查的各种指南，You Test You的上市是及时的。这是第一个帮助患者监测自我健康的检测。此外，在今年早些时候上市了一个可在家里获取样本并用于室检测的试剂盒。
chinese.english: The launch of You Test You is particularly timely, given recentrecommendations from various sources setting guidelines for both breast andcervical cancer screening. The test is the first of its kind for cancer,helping patients monitor their own health. In addition to the lab-based test, ahome sample collection kit will be available early this year.

chinese.chinese: Tyner的室症正在继续研究PTK6在癌症中的作用，这将可能不仅仅为结肠癌也为乳腺癌的治疗提供新的靶点。
chinese.english: Tyner's laboratory is continuing to investigate the role of PTK6in cancer, which may provide a future target for therapies not only for coloncancer but breast cancer as well.

chinese.chinese: 该推荐来于一篇美国国立卫生研究所发表于《科学转化医学》11月刊的文章，文章概述了最近由国立过敏与传染疾病研究所（NIAID）主任Anthony S，国立癌症研究所主任Harold Varmus，联合NIAID疫苗研究中心主任Gary Nabel以及NIAID传染病室主任Jeffrey Cohen参与的一次会议，规划了EB病毒疫苗发展的方向.该会议由国立卫生研究所于2011年2月1日举办，到会人员还有政府，学术和产业方面的专家。
chinese.english: This recommendation is described in an article from the National Institutes of Health, published in the November issue of Science Translational Medicine. In the article, Anthony S. Fauci, MD, director of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases (NIAID), and Harold Varmus, MD, director of the National Cancer Institute, join Gary Nabel, MD, PhD, director of NIAID's Vaccine Research Center, and Jeffrey Cohen, MD, chief of NIAID's Laboratory of Infectious Diseases, to summarize a recent meeting of experts who gathered to map directions toward an EBV vaccine. The meeting was held at the National Institutes of Health on February 1, 2011, and included scientists from government, academia, and industry.

chinese.chinese: 人们已经寻找HIV疫苗很长时间了，不可能找到了。制作HIV疫苗的科学很有挑战性，但是科学的认识始终在发展。在刚刚过去的两年里，在泰国的RV144试验以及令人兴奋的室工作，例如新发现的对抗HIV的广泛中和抗体，都有了前途光明的成果。HIV病毒是一个强大的对手，但是科学家们正不断地学习，采用先进的技术来与之战斗。
chinese.english: The search for an HIV vaccine has been going on for a long time and it's just not possible to find one that works. The science of HIV-vaccine development is challenging, but scientific understanding continues to improve all the time. In just the past two years there have been promising results from the RV144 study in Thailand as well as exciting laboratory work, such as the discovery of new broadly neutralizing antibodies against HIV. HIV is a powerful opponent, but scientists are constantly learning from one another and using advanced technology to fight it.

chinese.chinese: “该研究是一个逆向转化医学研究的例子。不“室到临床”（转化医学研究的常规模式）
chinese.english: This study is an example of reverse translation. Instead of 'bench to bedside,'

chinese.chinese: 由于室检查的费用，他们发现了通过哪种试验检测为指导的治疗更贵。CD4+监测花费低（其5美元/试验比 30美元/病毒负荷试验），弥补了一些需要昂贵的二线抗病毒药物治疗的患者的费用。
chinese.english: What they found was that treatment for those monitored through either test was more expensive because of the cost of laboratory monitoring. For CD4+ monitoring the costs were lower ($5 per test, versus $30 per test for viral load), and offset some by a decreased need for expensive second line antiretroviral drugs.

chinese.chinese: 在该杂志12月5日的印刷版上公布了它们的室结果，研究人员想要了解室结果对难以治疗小儿脑肿瘤如髓母细胞瘤和高级别胶质瘤提供更安全有效的联合疗法。为此，他们开始了对脑肿瘤细胞的室测试。
chinese.english: Researchers would to like see their laboratory findings - published in thejournal's Dec. 5 print edition - lead to safer, more effective combinationtherapies for hard-to-treat pediatric brain cancers like medulloblastoma andhigh-grade gliomas. To this end, they are starting laboratory tests on braincancer cells.

chinese.chinese: 这个团队利用一种大脑缺乏对瘦素反应能力的小鼠模型。Flier与他的室长期研究瘦素，它由下丘脑调控。对瘦素信号的失控，这些小鼠变得危险性超重。
chinese.english: The groups used a mouse model in which the brain lacks the ability to respond to leptin. Flier and his lab have long studied this hormone, which is mediated by the hypothalamus. Deaf to leptin's signaling, these mice become dangerously overweight.

chinese.chinese: 来自Anderson室的博士后周玉东进行受体电路中移植神经元及其功能的深部电生理检测，利用神经元泛有荧光水母蛋白的绿色荧光为标记。
chinese.english: Postdoc Yu-Dong Zhou, from Anderson's lab, performed in-depth electrophysiological analysis of the transplanted neurons and their function in the recipient circuitry, taking advantage of the neurons' glowing green from a fluorescent jellyfish protein carried as a marker.

chinese.chinese: 之前对亨廷顿病的研究发现大脑内的错误折叠蛋白会导致神经元功能紊乱，随后死亡。在这项研究中，Finkbeiner博士开始寻找哪一类型的错误折叠HTT最具毒性。在老鼠的室研究中，他和他的同事筛选了许多抗体，这些抗体分别与一种错误折叠HTT以独特的方式结合，以便于鉴别和标记各自的类型。这些抗体充当分子跟踪装置，Finkbeiner博士运用他们的室新自行研发的自动显微镜和专业软件检测它们。实验显示，这些抗体中的一种，3B5H10，绑定到一种与神经元死亡密切相关的HTT上，因此导致疾病恶化。
chinese.english: Previous research into Huntington's found that misfolded proteins in the brain lead to the dysfunction and subsequent death of neurons. In this study, Dr. Finkbeiner set out to find which misfolded htt types were the most toxic. In laboratory experiments on mice, he and his colleagues screened numerous antibodies that each bind uniquely to one type of misfolded htt in order to identify and tag each type. These antibodies acted as molecular tracking devices that Dr. Finkbeiner monitored with an automated microscope and specialized software, both of which his lab created. Experiments revealed that one of the antibodies, 3B5H10, bound to a form of htt closely linked to neuron death and, therefore, disease progression.

chinese.chinese: 该研究的假设来自Copland和他的研究团队，包括并列作者Laura Marlow，他从一个化疗耐药的转移卵巢癌患者的肿瘤组织中分离出了两个供室研究的卵巢癌细胞系。
chinese.english: The idea for the study arose because Copland and theteam at his lab, including co-author Laura Marlow, hadset up two new ovarian laboratory cell lines derived from tumor tissue takenfrom a patient whose ovarian cancer had spread and had stopped responding tochemotherapy treatments.

chinese.chinese: 第三个主要的认知陷阱是“归因错误”。当一个临床医生被某一人格特点所影响的时候，这类错误就会发生。尤其在那些符合社会固定模式的人中。医生会将病史、体格检查和室检查融合成对患者的预先设定的想法，而不是以一种客观冷静的方式来评估信息。
chinese.english: The third major thinking trap is an “attribution error.” This occurs when a physician is overly influenced by certain personal characteristics, particularly those that correspond to social stereotypes. The doctor then fits the history, physical findings and laboratory studies into a preset conception about that person, rather than weighing the information in a dispassionate way.

chinese.chinese: 收到人们的重新关注治疗性乙肝疫苗的去年,美国食品与药品管理局批准了第一个治疗癌症疫苗,一种药物被称为Provenge,用于治疗转移性前列腺癌。Provenge处理,生产在佐治亚,需要临床医师与患者的免疫细胞分离,然后把细胞一个室,在那里它们被连接到一种蛋白质,会刺激免疫系统。这些细胞被归还到病人的治疗医师,
chinese.english: Therapeutic vaccines received renewed attention last year when the Food and Drug Administration approved the first cancer treatment vaccine, a drug known as Provenge that is used to treat metastatic prostate cancer. Treatment with Provenge, which is manufactured in Georgia, requires clinicians to isolate immune cells from the patient and then to send the cells to a lab, where they are linked to a protein that stimulates the immune system. The cells are returned to the patient's treating physician

chinese.chinese: 自去年FDA批准第一个用于转移性胰腺癌治疗的肿瘤疫苗Provenge后，治疗性疫苗受到越来越多的关注。Provenge在乔治亚州生产，需要医务人员分离肿瘤患者免疫细胞，在室中为这些细胞上嵌入可刺激免疫系统的蛋白。临床医生用处理后的细胞进行输注治疗，每隔两周一次，共计三次。
chinese.english: Therapeutic vaccines received renewed attention last year when the Food and Drug Administration approved the first cancer treatment vaccine, a drug known as Provenge that is used to treat metastatic prostate cancer. Treatment with Provenge, which is manufactured in Georgia, requires clinicians to isolate immune cells from the patient and then to send the cells to a lab, where they are linked to a protein that stimulates the immune system. The cells are returned to the patient's treating physician, who then infuses the drug over three treatments, usually two weeks apart.

chinese.chinese: 糖尿病仪表盘可以提供病人的生命体征、健康状况、目前用药情况，并能指出病人需要做哪些室检查。研究表明，使用糖尿病仪表盘的医生正确的找到他们需要的资料的时间利用率为100%，而传统的电子医疗记录时间利用率为94%。此外，使用糖尿病仪表盘可使寻找信息而点击鼠标的次数由60次降至3次。
chinese.english: The diabetes dashboard provides information about patients' vital signs, health conditions, current medications, and laboratory tests that may need to be performed. The study showed that physicians who used the dashboard were able to correctly identify data they were searching for 100 percent of the time, compared with 94 percent using traditional electronic medical records. Further, the number of mouse clicks needed to find the information was reduced from 60 to three when using the diabetes dashboard.

chinese.chinese: 佛罗里达州迈阿密大学首席研究员Joshua Hare博士告诉heartwire说：“我们对这一试验充满了乐观，同时我们认为对于明确细胞治疗可以而且应该用于缺血性心肌梗死的一些参数，我们也起到了一定的帮助作用。尝试着解决未满足的需求，我们已经对使用这些细胞建立了一套重要的安全参数。”Hare今天在美国心脏病协会2012年科学会议上报告了这一试验的结果，同时该研究成果也在线发表于《美国医学协会杂志》（JAMA）上。
chinese.english: "We come away from this trial with optimism and feel that we've helped to define the parameters around which cell therapy can and should be used for ischemic cardiomyopathy," lead investigator Dr Joshua Hare (University of Miami, FL) told heartwire. "Trying to address an unmet need, we've established important safety parameters around using these cells." Hare presented the trial results here today at the American Heart Association 2012 Scientific Sessions, which have also been simultaneously published online in the Journal of the American Medical Association.

chinese.chinese: 名为dal-OUTCOMES的Ⅲ期临床试验，即验证研发中的胆固醇酯转移蛋白（CETP）抑制剂－dalcetrapib（罗氏公司）疗效的试验，今天在美国心脏学会2012年科学会议上公布最终结果，同时发表在“新英格兰医学杂志”上，它给研究者们留下了为何该药对临床预后无影响的困扰。一些专家认为幅度不大却临床意义显著的血压升高可能已经决定了药物的命运。
chinese.english: Final results of the dal-OUTCOMES study, a phase 3 clinical trial testing the efficacy of the investigational cholesteryl ester transfer protein (CETP) inhibitor dalcetrapib (Hoffman-La Roche, Ltd), were presented today at the American Heart Association 2012 Scientific Sessions and published simultaneously in the New England Journal of Medicine, leaving investigators to wrestle with reasons that the drug failed to have an impact on clinical outcomes. Some experts believe the modest but clinically significant increase in blood pressure might have doomed the drug.

chinese.chinese: Affymax制药公司（Nasdaq:AFFY）和武田美国制药公司（TPUSA）今天发布了EMERALD三期临床试验的事后子群分析报告，这一研究对一个红细胞生成激发剂（ESA）OMONTYS（peginesatide）注射剂进行了评估，这一药物用于治疗成年透析病人慢性肾病（CKD）引起的贫血。这一分析报告在2012年美国肾病学会(ASN)肾周会议上进行口头报告，这一分析报告检测了EMERALD 3期临床试验的美国病人静脉注射的铁利用率。
chinese.english: Affymax, Inc. (Nasdaq:AFFY) and Takeda Pharmaceuticals U.S.A., Inc. (TPUSA) today announced the presentation of post-hoc sub-group analyses of the EMERALD Phase 3 studies that evaluated OMONTYS[sup]®[/sup] (peginesatide) Injection, an erythropoiesis-stimulating agent (ESA), for the treatment of anemia due to chronic kidney disease (CKD) in adult dialysis patients. The analyses, which explore intravenous (IV) iron utilization in U.S. patients in the EMERALD Phase 3 studies, were presented in an oral session at the 2012 American Society of Nephrology (ASN) Kidney Week meeting.

chinese.chinese: 美国食品和药物管理局（FDA）今天宣布，该机构在对新英格兰药品配制中心（NECC）的检查中发现“不良状况”，促使FDA对这家机构发出了FDA 483表，该机构生产的类固醇注射剂受到污染，与最近正在爆发的真菌性脑膜炎事件有关联。
chinese.english: An inspection of the New England Compounding Center (NECC) that produced the tainted steroid injections linked to the ongoing fungal meningitis outbreak has turned up "objectionable conditions," prompting the US," prompting the US Food and Drug Administration (FDA) to issue the company with FDA F483, the agency announced today.

chinese.chinese: 电话会议将于美国东部时间今天（2012年10月23日）下午4:45举行
chinese.english: Conference Call to be Held at 4:45 p.m. Eastern Time today, October 23, 2012

chinese.chinese: 与此同时，今天，《新英格兰医学杂志》（NEJM）对来自田纳西州纳什维尔范德比尔特大学医学院的公共卫生学硕士April C. Pettit博士及其同事提供的，病历中真菌性脑膜炎疫情的详细情况进行在线报道。
chinese.english: Meanwhile, a report online today in the New England Journal of Medicine (NEJM) from April C. Pettit, MD, MPH, and colleagues at Vanderbilt University School of Medicine in Nashville, Tennessee, provides details of the index case for the fungal meningitis outbreak.

chinese.chinese: Genzyme及其合伙人Isis制药公司（$ISIS）的实验性治疗纯合性家族性高胆固醇血症的降血脂药mipomersen在今天得到了认可。Mipomersen以9-6的投票微弱的胜利得到许可，但是这与昨天以13-2得到许可的来自竞争对手Aegerion制药公司($AEGR)的lomitapide相比，使得mipomersen的新药申请之路显得很崎岖。
chinese.english: Genzyme and its partners at IsisPharmaceuticals ($ISIS) won a key endorsementtoday for mipomersen, an experimental therapy for homozygous familialhypercholesterolemia. But the tepid 9-6 outcome left the new drug applicationlooking relatively weak compared with the 13-2 vote that greeted the rival druglomitapide from Aegerion Pharmaceuticals ($AEGR) yesterday.

chinese.chinese: 通过利用在棕色脂肪生物学和胰岛素增敏技术上的突破来改革代谢性疾病治疗的Ember Therapeutics 股份有限公司今天公布了关键临床前期数据的出版，该数据显示TRPV家族特别是TRPV4离子通道的抑制将导致棕色/灰棕色脂肪的活化以及防止食源性肥胖、炎症和胰岛素抵抗。Ember持有对TRPV4的发现和技术的独家选择权。
chinese.english: Ember Therapeutics, Inc., a company harnessing breakthroughs in brown fat biology and insulin sensitization to revolutionize the treatment of metabolic disease, today announced the publication of key preclinical[1]data demonstrating that inhibition of the Transient Receptor Potential Vanilloid (TRPV) family of ion channels - specifically TRPV4[2] - resulted in activation of brown/beige fat and protection from diet-induced obesity, inflammation and insulin resistance. Ember holds an exclusive option[3] to license these TRPV4 findings and technology.

chinese.chinese: 通过利用在棕色脂肪生物学和胰岛素增敏技术上的突破来改革代谢性疾病治疗的Ember Therapeutics 股份有限公司今天公布了关键临床前期数据的出版，该数据显示TRPV家族特别是TRPV4离子通道的抑制将导致棕色/灰棕色脂肪的活化以及防止食源性肥胖、炎症和胰岛素抵抗。Ember持有对TRPV4的发现和技术的独家选择权。
chinese.english: Ember Therapeutics, Inc., a company harnessing breakthroughs in brown fat biology and insulin sensitization to revolutionize the treatment of metabolic disease, today announced the publication of key preclinical[1]data demonstrating that inhibition of the Transient Receptor Potential Vanilloid (TRPV) family of ion channels - specifically TRPV4[2] - resulted in activation of brown/beige fat and protection from diet-induced obesity, inflammation and insulin resistance. Ember holds an exclusive option[3] to license these TRPV4 findings and technology.

chinese.chinese: 虽然在培养基上生长细菌的历史悠久的技术和在显微镜下染色和检查细菌在今天仍然是很重要的，但是更新一些的技术已经转移到了微生物诊断领域。
chinese.english: Although the time-honored techniques of growing bacteria in broth or solid cultures and staining and examining them under microscopes are still important today, newer technologies have transformed the field of microbial diagnosis.

chinese.chinese: 今天的一个调查中显示：年龄在14-45岁之间的德国人中，有4/10的人曾经尝试过晒黑房（indoor tanning），其中有1/7人目前仍在使用。
chinese.english: Four in ten Germans ages 14 to 45 say they havetried indoor tanning and one in seven are current users, according to a surveyout today.

chinese.chinese: 但最引人注目的手术这个概念是如何稳定牢靠地建立在人们心目中，并且把它当做一种必要的工具来帮助人们提高寿命和保持健康。几乎每一个人都会遇到所得的疾病只有手术治疗才能得到有效治疗这种情况：如一个严重的骨损伤、白内障、肿瘤、难产、关节疾病,严重的心脏疾病。今天,外科医生在他们的领域有2500种医疗规范。因此,关注该领域的最新进展有利于确保外科医师成功治疗一个患者而不是靠单单靠增加医疗规范。
chinese.english: But the most striking story of surgery in recent decades is how firmly it has become established as an essential tool for helping people live long and healthy lives. Virtually no one escapes having a condition for which effective treatment requires surgery — a serious orthopedic injury, a cataract, a tumor, obstructed labor, joint failure, severe cardiac disease. Today, surgeons have in their arsenal more than 2500 different procedures. Thus, the focus of recent advances in the field has been less on adding to the arsenal than on ensuring the successes of the treatments we have.

chinese.english: In the condition termed familial hypercholesterolaemia there is an inherited deficiency of the receptors and patients suffering from it have enormously elevated blood cholesterol and a high probability of early death due to ischemic heart disease.

chinese.chinese: 一般而言，如果LDL升高，就有患心脏病的危险，对他们可用低脂饮食和／或促使胆固醇从机体排泄的药物进行治疗。
chinese.english: In general they carry a risk of heart disease if LDL is raised and they can be treated by a low fat diet and / or drugs which clear cholesterol from the body.

chinese.chinese: 研究员运用了MammaPrint技术，一项通过FDA确认的用来诊断评估肿瘤是否会从乳房向别处转移的风险。这个技术印证如何用基本的室研究指导实用临床，说明了“从科研到医疗"医学的重要性  ， 是由Laura J. van 't Veer博士，此项研究的资深作者和UCSF癌症中心乳房肿瘤学负责人，开发的。
chinese.english: The researchers utilized MammaPrint, an FDA-approved diagnostic test used by physicians to gauge the risk that a tumor in the breast will metastasize elsewhere. Illustrating the importance of "bench to bedside'|| medicine in which basic laboratory research leads to practical clinical use, MammaPrint was developed by Laura J. van 't Veer, PhD, the senior author of the study and leader of the breast oncology program at UCSF's cancer center.

chinese.chinese: 这一撤稿声明由科学主编Bruce Alberts博士撰写，两个月发生的故事传奇得值得拍电视剧，包括难以复制这些数据，一些作者要求撤销他们在文章中的署名，诡秘地进入办公室，并逮捕了首席作者，Judy A. Mikovits博士，其被指控窃取室笔记本电脑后从内华达州逃离到加利福尼亚州，以寻求免遭起诉。
chinese.english: The retraction, written by Science Editor-in-Chief Bruce Alberts, PhD, caps 2 months of reality TV–worthy activity, including failed attempts to replicate the data, requests by some authors to have their names withdrawn from the article, surreptitious entry into offices, and the arrest of the senior author, Judy A. Mikovits, PhD, on charges of stealing laboratory notebooks and fleeing from Nevada to California to avoid prosecution.

chinese.chinese: 所以，我想向你转达的消息是：警惕慢性肾脏病，监测肌酐，估测肾小球滤过率。在网络上有很多、很多的很好的公式。即使您的室可能会提供正确的肾小球滤过率。检查肾小球滤过率;如果低于60，意味着你可能需要量身定制不同的治疗方案。通过这样做，并确保您使用药物剂量正确，我想你将会对病人的治疗效果很满意。并且患者也会很高兴，因为你没让他们遭受没必要的、与治疗方案相关的并发症风险。因此，出于这个原因，我想说：警惕慢性肾脏病。当你发现时，应立即采取措施。
chinese.english: So, the message I would like to convey to you is: Watch out for chronic kidneydisease, measure the creatinine, and do the estimations of the eGFR. There aremany, many wonderful formulas on the Web. Even your laboratory probably willprovide you with the correct eGFR. Check that; if it's below 60, be aware thatyou may have to tailor the treatment differently. By doing that and making surethat you're using the available drugs in the right dosages, I think you aregoing to be very happy with the result for your patients. And patients will bevery happy because you don't put them at risk for unnecessary complicationsthat are related to the treatment. So, by that, I would like to say, watch outfor chronic kidney disease. When you find it, take action.

chinese.english: The solution uses a laboratory-grown virus called a bacteriophage, which disrupts the DNA of resistant bacteria and renders them susceptible to antibiotics.

chinese.chinese: 住院治疗时间为期2周。常规治疗包括每周3次在局部麻醉下使用清创手术用手术刀。蛆虫清创术治疗是使用含80个无菌蛆的封闭的敷料（Vitapad, BioMonde室）。出院时才用常规的换药方式，并在第30天对患者随访。

The MDT was administered using an enclosed dressing (Vitapad, BioMonde Laboratories) containing 80 sterile maggots. At discharge, a conventional dressing was applied, and patients were followed-up at day 30.

chinese.chinese: 这项研究的独创性在于寻找用于诊断空间运动障碍的室工具与临床床旁工具的相关性。研究者对51例右脑卒中左侧空间忽视的连续住院病人进行观察（评价在中风发生后22.3天）。对每例患者进行评估，运用知觉—注意与运动—意识缺损的室检查及两项床旁检查——行为忽略测试（BIT）和Catherine Bergego量表（CBS）。

In patients older than the age of 50 years, initial laboratory work should include a blood count, electrolytes, liver enzymes, calcium, and thyroid function tests.

chinese.english: Researchers at Duke University Medical Center have developed a new way to identify the genes of harmful microbes, particularly those that have been difficult to study in the laboratory.

chinese.english: WHO scientists say that as soon as all remaining lab investigations come back negative, India will be officially recognized as a nation that has stopped indigenous transmission of wild poliovirus, leaving just three countries with existing indigenous transmissions - Pakistan, Nigeria and Afghanistan.

chinese.chinese: 以前,基于室及对老鼠的研究，研究群体建立假设，T细胞——身体的士兵样的攻击细胞——识别和反应β细胞的某些分子结构,然后杀死β-细胞。La Jolla学院的研究证实了这些事件并且显示了T细胞在胰岛中的位置，胰岛储存β细胞。该研究团队同时还首次鉴别出特定的T细胞-CD8-作为消灭了β-细胞的关键。这种破坏导致β细胞最终未能产生胰岛素, 1型糖尿病的标志性。
chinese.english: Previously, the researchcommunity had assumed, based on lab and mouse studies, that T cells - the body'ssoldier-like attack cells -- recognize and react against certain molecularstructures on the beta cells and then kill the beta cells.The LaJolla Institute study confirmed this occurrence and showed the T cellslocation in theislets ofthe pancreas, which house the beta cells. The team isalso is the first to identify the specific T cells -- CD8 -- asbeing key in the destruction of beta cells. Thisdestruction eventually leads to the beta cell's inability to produce insulin,the hallmark of type 1 diabetes.

chinese.chinese: 现在，来自奥地利维也纳大学和维也纳医科大创建的马克斯-F-佩鲁茨室的研究细胞信号转导的Manuela Baccarini研究小组揭示了这种机制，他们已确定一种多功能信号转导蛋白因子Raf-1在这种过程中发挥着关键性的作用
chinese.english: The mechanism has now been uncovered by Manuela Baccarini's group at the Max F. Perutz Laboratories, a joint venture of the University of Vienna and the Medical University of Vienna, who investigate cell signaling. They have established a crucial role for Raf-1, a multi-purpose signal transducer, in this process.

chinese.english: The sensor's camera will then capture the lesion or tumor images caused by the reflected light and they are processed with a novel algorithm developed by the CSNAP Lab to calculate the lesion's mechanical properties.

chinese.english: The greatest reductions were achieved when these measures were combined with discussions and in-office availability of the C-reactive protein (CRP) rapid diagnostic test.

chinese.chinese: 杂志社和美国的研究和生物安全团体现在正在争论该如何发布此项研究结果，如是否该隐瞒病毒易于传播的机制（以防被生物恐怖分子利用）。但矛盾的是，又该如何把这些细节提供给一些正在搜寻野生型H5N1病毒突变体的病毒学家呢。荷兰室的Ron Fouchier昨天指出，病毒学家必须确保他们不在无意间制造出突变的H5N1禽流感病毒。他估计查证，有人很显然已经有了含有4种突变的病毒（总共5种突变）。
chinese.english: The journals and the research and biosafety community in the US are now debating how to publish that research, which details to withhold about what made the virus transmissible (just in case a bioterrorist is interested), and paradoxically, how to make those details available to virologists who must now look for the mutations in H5N1 in the wild. Virologists must also, as Ron Fouchier of the Dutch lab noted yesterday, ensure that they don't inadvertently create H5N1 viruses with those mutations in low-containment labs. He checked, and apparently someone had a virus with four of the five mutations required.

chinese.chinese: Exelixis公司(纳斯达克：EXEL)今天宣布了BRIM7的初步结果，BRIM7为由罗氏公司和基因泰克公司（基因泰克公司为Exelixis合作者和罗氏公司的一员）正在进行的Ib试验阶段,对携带BRAFV600突变基因、局部晚期/无法切除或转移性黑色素瘤患者使用BRAF抑制剂(BRAFi) 维罗非尼，联合MEK抑制剂GDC-0973治疗。来自科罗拉多丹佛大学黑色素瘤研究所主任、皮肤病学教授雷内·冈萨雷斯博士作为本次试验的研究者,今天在欧洲奥地利维也纳举办的2012年肿瘤医学会议(ESMO)年度会议公布了肿瘤靶向药GDC-0973数据(摘要# LBA28)。这一研究结果在ESMO新闻发布会上重点介绍。
chinese.english: Exelixis, Inc. (NASDAQ:EXEL) today announced preliminary results from BRIM7, an ongoing Phase Ib trial conducted by Roche and Genentech, Exelixis' collaborator and a member of the Roche Group (SIX: RO, ROG; OTCQX: RHHBY), of the BRAF inhibitor (BRAFi) vemurafenib in combination with the MEK inhibitor GDC-0973 in patients with locally advanced/unresectable or metastatic melanoma carrying a BRAFV600 mutation. Rene Gonzalez, M.D., Professor of Medicine and Dermatology and Director of the Melanoma Research Clinics at the University of Colorado Denver, and an investigator on the trial, presented the data today at the European Society for Medical Oncology (ESMO) 2012 Annual Meeting (Abstract #LBA28), which is taking place in Vienna, Austria. The results of the study were also highlighted in an ESMO press briefing.

chinese.chinese: 今天，在维也纳的2012年欧洲肿瘤内科学会（ESMO）上，来自美国哈佛医学院达纳法癌症研究所的Richard D. Gelber PhD汇报了HREA实验的数据。
chinese.english: Data on the HERA trial was presented today at the ESMO 2012 Congress (European Society for Medical Oncology) in Vienna, Austria, by Richard D. Gelber PhD, of the Dana-Farber Cancer Institute.

chinese.chinese: 你们好，我是埃特.卡普兰，现在是在纽约大学兰贡医学中心医学伦理部。今天我想要和大家讨论一个许多初级保健者不得不面对的问题。无论是你是哪类医生或者医护人员，你会不得不在一次聚会或者某些你参与社交的地方面对它。怎么样在豁免权上下工夫才能让你的孩子接种疫苗成了一个难题。从伦理学观点的角度看，难道豁免权是很容易获得的吗？
chinese.english: Hi. I am Art Caplan, at the New YorkUniversity (NYU) Langone Medical Center in the Division ofMedical Ethics. Today I want to talk to you about a problem that a lot ofprimary care providers have to grapple with. You will have to grapple with itat a party or somewhere that you might be socially, no matter what type ofphysician or healthcare worker you are. It is the question of what to do aboutexemptions to having your child vaccinated. From an ethics point of view, areexemptions too easy to get?

chinese.chinese: 通过利用在棕色脂肪生物学和胰岛素增敏技术上的突破来改革代谢性疾病治疗的Ember Therapeutics 股份有限公司今天公布了关键临床前期数据的出版，该数据显示TRPV家族特别是TRPV4离子通道的抑制将导致棕色/灰棕色脂肪的活化以及防止食源性肥胖、炎症和胰岛素抵抗。Ember持有对TRPV4的发现和技术的独家选择权。
chinese.english: Ember Therapeutics, Inc., a company harnessing breakthroughs in brown fat biology and insulin sensitization to revolutionize the treatment of metabolic disease, today announced the publication of key preclinical data demonstrating that inhibition of the Transient Receptor Potential Vanilloid (TRPV) family of ion channels - specifically TRPV4 - resulted in activation of brown/beige fat and protection from diet-induced obesity, inflammation and insulin resistance. Ember holds an exclusive option to license these TRPV4 findings and technology.

chinese.chinese: 2012年9月24日，美国商业资讯，密歇根州安阿伯和新墨西哥州圣达菲消息—NanoBio®公司今天宣布，公司将在第八届年度呼吸道合胞病毒(RSV)国际研讨会上公布来自3个临床前研究的数据，该研讨会将于9月27 – 30日在新墨西哥州圣达菲市召开。
chinese.english: ANN ARBOR, Mich. & SANTA FE, N.M.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Sep 24, 2012 - NanoBio® Corporation announced today it will present data from three preclinical studies at the 8th Annual International Respiratory Syncytial Virus (RSV) Symposium taking place from Sept. 27-30 in Santa Fe, N.M.

chinese.chinese: 坎伯兰郡，R.I.——（美国商业资讯）——Collegium制药公司是一家专业制药公司，致力于慢性疼痛的创新疗法，它今天宣布要发行科技海报，总结羟考酮 DETERx的研究结果，它的防破坏的，扩展缓释多层面颗粒剂型，表明这个产品可以通过喷洒在易消化的食物上或者通过肠内插管进行有效的给药。也对咀嚼时防破坏特性的试管内药物动力学结果进行了总结。标题为“羟考酮 DETERx给药的多种方法”的海报将在美国疼痛管理协会第23届年度临床会议上展示，此会议在亚利桑那州的菲尼克斯召开，时间为2012年9月20号到23号。
chinese.english: CUMBERLAND, R.I.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Collegium Pharmaceutical, Inc., a specialty pharmaceutical company focused on the development of innovative treatments for chronic pain, today announced the presentation of a scientific poster summarizing the results for Oxycodone DETERx®, its tamper-resistant, extended-release multiparticulate formulation showing that this product may be effectively administered via sprinkling on soft foods or through enteric feeding tubes. In vivo pharmacokinetic results showing its tamper-resistant properties when chewed were also summarized. The poster, titled “Alternative Methods of Oxycodone DETERx Administration,” was presented at the American Academy of Pain Management's 23rd Annual Clinical Meeting, held in Phoenix, Arizona from September 20th-23rd, 2012.

chinese.chinese: 他说他只赠送最微小的礼物，像是一支钢笔。今天，他总是收到全国各地医药代表对他们工作的抱怨。因为那玷污了他们的专业形象，他说。在工作的时候携带所有那些礼物是一件困难的事。“他们被分给一个大的包来装那些东西，”他说。“肩上背着一个，手上还提着另外两个。”
chinese.english: He says he resisted giving anything but the smallestgifts, like pens. Today, he says, he receives frequent complaints from repsacross the country about the practice. It taints their professional image, hesays. Also, it's hard work toting around all those gifts. "They have beengiven huge extra bags to carry," he says. "One on the shoulders andtwo others in the hands."

chinese.chinese: AHRQ主任Carolyn Clancy博士在今天的新闻发布会上说，直到最近，医生依然认为HAIs是理所当然的，将它们视为“护理中的一个不幸的结果”。
chinese.english: AHRQ Director Carolyn Clancy, MD, said at a press briefing today that, until recently, physicians took HAIs for granted, viewing them as "an unfortunate consequence of care."

chinese.chinese: 2012年9月6日美通社蓝牛报道/Inovio制药公司今天宣布他们研制的H1N1流感通用疫苗SynCon&reg在I期临床实验中的中期分析结果显示，这种疫苗能针对过去100多年流行的多数H1N1流感株产生血凝素抑制抗体。
chinese.english: BLUE BELL, Pa., Sept. 6, 2012 /PRNewswire/-- Inovio Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (NYSE MKT: INO) announced today that theinterim analysis of its SynCon® universal H1N1 influenza vaccine showedthat it generated protective HAI titers against some of the most prevalentstrains of H1N1 influenza from the past 100 years in a phase I clinical trial.

chinese.english: “Appropriate pediatric dosage forms, such as Afinitor Disperz, help to ensurethe safe and effective use of oncology drugs in children,” said Richard Pazdur,M.D., director of the Office of Hematology and Oncology Products in FDA'sCenter for Drug Evaluation and Research. “In addition, today's approvaldemonstrates the value of further studying a drug to better characterize itsbenefits and how it should be used in pediatric patients.”

chinese.chinese: 然而，另有一基础机制成为免疫系统应答的基础。这个机制是由Professor Max Loehning (Charité Berlin 医学院)和Daniel Pinschewer教授首次提出并发表在今天的《科学》杂志。当病毒杀伤某些细胞后，这一机制开始起作用。当他们发生坏死时他们会释放大量的分子，包括一些特异的分子，专家们称他们为损伤相关分子模型或DAMPs。在这些微小的分子碎片中，DAMPs能提供一明确的信号：我们的身体受到损害。
chinese.english: However, another fundamental mechanism underlies the counter-attack launched by the immune system. This mechanism is described for the first time by Professor Max Loehning (Charité Berlin Medical University) and Professor Daniel Pinschewer (UNIGE) in an article published today in the journal Science. It is engaged after the virus has already killed certain cells. These cells release all kinds of molecules when they die, including some very distinctive molecules that experts have dubbed damage-associated molecular patterns or DAMPs. Among the molecular debris of this miniature battlefield, DAMPs are unique in providing an unequivocal signal that the body has suffered damage.

chinese.english: A racing heart sensation which begins and ends abruptly (within minutes) may represent paroxysmal supraventricular tachycardia.

chinese.chinese: RNA干扰首次发现了在矮牵牛繁殖过程中影响颜色变化的机制，现在这一方法应用于医疗技术提升上。利用RNAi沉默技术，Tripp的室发现了流感病毒在宿主细胞内复制的关键途径。
chinese.english: RNA interference, which was first discovered as the mechanism that effects color change in petunia breeding, is now being applied to medical advancements. Using RNAi silencing technologies, Tripp's lab was able to identify key host cell pathways needed by influenza virus for replication.

chinese.chinese: 为了评估这些进化军备竞赛的分子特征，第一作者Efrem Lim，在Emerman室的研究生，比较SAMHD1在整个灵长类动物进化的进化率。他发现追溯到2300万年前，很少的证据证明SAMHD1迅速演变的过程。与此相反，SAMHD1蛋白在古时代猴子庇护了VPr/VPx-包含了慢病毒迅速演变了数百万年。
chinese.english: To assess molecular signatures of these evolutionary arms races, first author Efrem Lim, a graduate student in Emerman's lab, compared the evolutionary rates of SAMHD1 across primate evolution. He found that prior to 23 million years ago, there was very little evidence for rapid evolution of SAMHD1. In contrast, SAMHD1 proteins in Old World monkeys that harbor Vpr/Vpx-containing lentiviruses have evolved rapidly for millions of years.

chinese.chinese: 为了测试这种micro-RNA对其他感染的重要性，研究人员将hsa-mir-21引入人体巨噬细胞，随后它将在室中感染肺结核。研究人员发现，micro-RNA似乎抑制了巨噬细胞杀死细菌的能力。
chinese.english: To test the significance of this micro-RNA with other infectious diseases, the researchers also introduced hsa-mir-21 to human macrophages that were then infected with tuberculosis in the lab. Researchers found that the micro-RNA similarly blocked the ability of the macrophages to kill the bacteria.

chinese.chinese: 科学家相信如果他们可以在室研究不同人群的肝细胞，他们可以确定遗传差异是怎样导致上述对丙肝病毒的不同反应。然而，干细胞不容易获得和在实验条件下培养非常困难，因为肝细胞在体外条件下容易失去正常的结构和功能。
chinese.english: Scientists believe that if they could study liver cells from different peoplein the lab, they could determine how genetic differences produce these varyingresponses. However, liver cells are difficult to obtain and notoriously difficultto grow in a lab dish because they tend to lose their normal structure andfunction when removed from the body.

chinese.chinese: 为了建立一个独立的贫血与死亡风险之间的相关性的模型，研究者排除了能够影响研究结果的病人的因素。包括年龄、卒中的严重程度、卒中风险因素、生命体征、室结果和病人卒中前后的健康状况。

This finding will benefit a large number of patients since colorectal cancer is the second most frequent tumor and cetuximab is a drug used regularly to treat this form of cancer.

chinese.chinese: 这一重要发现始于有关小斑马鱼的研究。在这一生物中，研究人员发现斑马鱼突变lta4h基因与易患类结核感染风险的联系。戴维托宾，现就职于杜克大学分子遗传学和微生物学系，是该研究的首席研究人员。在华盛顿大学拉马克里希南博士的室从事博士后研究期间，他与另外一名该室的博士后人员朗西斯科罗卡开始了这项研究。
chinese.english: This important observation for people began with a study of the tiny zebrafish. In these animals, the researchers linked mutations in the zebrafish version of the LTA4H gene to increased susceptibility to a TB-like infection. David Tobin, now on the faculty of the Department of Molecular Genetics and Microbiology at Duke University, is first author of the study. He performed the research while he was a postdoctoral fellow in the University of Washington laboratory of Dr. Ramakrishnan, working closely with another postdoctoral fellow Francisco Roca.

chinese.chinese: 另17名患者接受干细胞治疗，在局部麻醉下进行微创活检。将导管通过颈静脉插入心脏，并取出一小块心脏组织，大小约为葡萄干大小的一半。活检的心脏组织被送往Marbán的专业室，并使用他发明的方法培养心肌细胞。
chinese.english: The other 17 patients who were randomized to receive the stem cells underwent a minimally invasive biopsy, under local anesthesia. The biopsied heart tissue was then taken to Marbán's specialized lab at Ced ars-Sinai, using methods he invented to culture and multiply the cells.

State University are responsible for the heritage of the mice in the Collaborative Cross. As scientists use this resource to find ways to prevent and address the genetic changes that cause disease, findings in laboratory experiments should be much easier to translate to humans."

chinese.english: In 60 days maybe you can reassure the public – and that seems to be what this is about. In today's statement the researchers "recognize that we and the rest of the scientific community need to clearly explain the benefits of this important research and the measures taken to minimize its possible risks".

chinese.chinese: 马萨诸塞州沃尔瑟姆市布兰代斯大学的Gregory Petsko已观察到，在那时候把做相关研究的科学家召集到一个房间里是比较容易的。但在今天，我敢肯定，让所有的流感研究人员都同意暂停其研究，则是个相当骄人的成绩。
chinese.english: Gregory Petsko of Brandeis University in Waltham, Massachusetts, has observed that it was easy, then, to get everyone doing the work into a room. Today, I'm sure it was quite a feat just getting all the top flu researchers to agree on the moratorium and its wording. If all the people on today's statement were in a plane crash, top-of-the-line flu research would largely shut down for a bit.

chinese.chinese: 今天发表在Cancer Prevention Research杂志上的一篇文章显示McGill University和University of Montreal的研究者们报道了一项出乎意料的发现：他们发现使用二甲双胍可以减少细胞的突变率和DNA损伤的累积。众所周知这种突变直接会产生致癌作用，但是通过抑制突变率来减少癌症发生风险以前向来被认为是不可行的。
chinese.english: In a paper published today in the journal Cancer Prevention Research, researchers from McGill University and the University of Montreal reported an unexpected finding: they learned that exposure to metformin reduces the cellular mutation rate and the accumulation of DNA damage. It is well known that such mutations are directly involved in carcinogenesis, but lowering cancer risk by inhibiting the mutation rate has never been shown to be feasible.

chinese.chinese: 高血糖症、或具有高水平的血糖,是住院病人的一种常见的、严重的并且昂贵的医疗问题。今天,内分泌协会发布了一个临床实践指南，对达到安全的血糖目标以及操作提供了建议，并且描述了非重症监护患者达到血糖目标所需的草案和改善方法。
chinese.english: Hyperglycemia, or having high glucose levels in the blood, is a common, serious and costly health care problem in hospitalized patients. Today, The Endocrine Society released a clinical practice guideline (CPG) providing recommendations for practical and safe glycemic targets and describing protocols and system improvements required to achieve glycemic goals for hospitalized patients in a non-critical care setting.

chinese.chinese: 2011年12月29日 –据新英格兰医学杂志今天在网上的报道，在2009年大流行的A型流感病毒（H1N1）的耐奥斯他韦（达菲，罗氏公司）变种在澳大利亚出现蔓延之势，特别是新南威尔士州。
chinese.english: December 29, 2011 — A variation of the pandemic 2009 A(H1N1) influenza virus that is resistant to oseltamivir (Tamiflu, Roche) appears to be spreading in Australia, at least in the state of New South Wales, according to a letter to the editor published online today in the New England Journal of Medicine.

chinese.chinese: 在今天的癌症发现期刊上，研究者报道调查的药物对神经性前列腺癌症动物模型有着巨大的反应，因此可以第一次向人类提供有效治疗这种致命的癌症方法。虽然男性中最初只有2%的前列腺肿瘤被分类为神经性的，但是很多前列腺腺癌在激素治疗中会转变他们的生物学性而变成进展型的亚型。
chinese.english: In today's issue of Cancer Discovery, the researchers report that the investigational drug had a dramatic response in animal models of neuroendocrine prostate cancer, and so provides the first hope of an effective human therapy for this lethal cancer. While fewer than 2 percent of prostate tumors in men are initially classified as neuroendocrine, many common adenocarcinoma prostate cancers change their biology during hormone therapy and morph into this aggressive subtype.

chinese.chinese: Bartlett医生也讨论了1981年艾滋病疫情来临之际的经历。“在巴尔的摩使用注射***问题很严重。并且很早我就认为我们必须处理好这个问题。所有我们开了个诊所。由于那时候普遍认为这种患这种疾病是种耻辱，所有我们的诊所保密工作做得很好——除了来就诊的患者和诊所的医生，没有人知道我们在做些什么。”1983年起，Johns Hopkins开始首次提供艾滋病的综合治疗，当然今天仍在继续运作。
chinese.english: Dr Bartlett also discusses his experiences at the dawn of the AIDS epidemic in 1981. "We had a problem in Baltimore mostly because of injection drug use. And I decided early that we needed to deal with it…so we started a clinic. There was a terrible cloud around the disease in terms of stigma. So we hid the clinic—nobody knew we had it except the patients who came to it and the doctors that worked in it." In 1983, Johns Hopkins first opened its comprehensive HIV/AIDS service, which of course continues to operate today.

chinese.chinese: 但Muller告诉我，现行的制度是“是一些大期刊一直试图执行的强迫性措施。” 1969年，新英格兰医学杂志的编辑，Franz Ingelfinger，规定任何想在新英格兰医学杂志上发表的文章在这之前都不能在任何地方公开。今天，很多杂志纷纷制定了这一规则，阻止科学家们在其他地方展示自己的研究成果。
chinese.english: But the current system is “a tyranny [large journals] have been trying to enforce”, Muller tells me. In 1969, the editor of the New England Journal of Medicine, Franz Ingelfinger, implemented the rule that work published in his journal must not have previously been publicly available anywhere. Today, several journals have this rule, preventing scientists from showcasing their own work elsewhere.

chinese.chinese: 全球产品研发部门首席医务官兼部门主任Hal Barron博士说，“今天阿瓦斯汀得到了批准，标志着15年来新诊断卵巢癌的治疗第一次大的进展…这是欧洲批准阿瓦斯汀治疗的第15类肿瘤，并使其成为少数几类治疗多种癌症的生物药物之一。”
chinese.english: Hal Barron M.D., Chief Medical Officer and Head， Global Product Development said :"Today's approval of Avastin marks the first major treatment advance in newly diagnosed ovarian cancer in 15 years ...This is the fifth tumor type for which Avastin has been approved in Europe, making it one of the few biologic drugs indicated for multiple cancers."

chinese.chinese: 在今天发表的bmj.com的圣诞一期上，Malcolm Green教授说：“对于一个1848年的历史研究的复审表明，鱼肝油是一种有效的肺结核治疗方法。”
chinese.english: In the Christmas issue published on bmj.com today, Professor Sir Malcolm Green explains: "a review of a historical study from 1848 reveals that cod liver oil was an effective treatment for tuberculosis."

chinese.chinese: 今天看美国2011医学新闻幻灯片，这条信息有意思，特摘录下，与大家分享：

Addex制药公司（SWX：ADXN），是一家领先的以开拓变构调制为基础的药物发现和开发公司，今天宣布其科学家已经证明，在GLP- 1存在的情况下，胰高血糖素样肽1受体（GLP1R）可以与抑胃肽受体（GIPR）形成异二聚体受体复合物。发现这两个G蛋白偶联受体（GPCR）之间的新的相互作用，有可能触发发现治疗糖尿病的新疗法。这项研究结果发表在同行评审的杂志分子药理学网络版（胰高血糖素受体家族中的横向变构：GLP- 1诱导GPCR形成异源复合体[Schelshorn等，分子药理学，网络版公布，DOI：10.1124/mol.111.074757]）。
chinese.english: Addex Pharmaceuticals (SIX:ADXN), aleading ***aceutical company pioneering allosteric modulation-based drugdiscovery and development, announced today that its scientists havedemonstrated that, in the presence of GLP-1, glucagon-like-peptide-1 receptor(GLP1R) can form a heterodimer receptor complex withgastric-inhibitory-peptide-receptor (GIPR). The discovery of this novelinteraction between the two G-protein-coupled receptors (GPCR) has thepotential to trigger the discovery of novel therapies for the treatment ofdiabetes. The findings were published online in the peer-reviewed journalMolecular Pharmacology (Lateral Allosterism in the Glucagon Receptor Family:GLP-1 Induces GPCR Heteromer Formation [Schelshorn et al., MolecularPharmacology, Published online, doi: 10.1124/mol.111.074757]).

chinese.chinese: 触诊：心脏最强搏动点、震颤、抬举感、心前区搏动。
chinese.english: Palpation: Point maximal impulse, thrills, lifts, thrusts.

chinese.chinese: 病理性肥胖是指体内脂肪的沉积达到使病人遭受生理功能损害的程度，这时(由于机体的病理性损害而致身体的脂肪沉积)病人可能有呼吸、心脏或骨骼方面的问题。
chinese.english: Pathologic obesity is deposition of body fat to the point of physiologic compromise of the individual, who may have respiratory, cardiac, or orthopedic difficulty.

chinese.chinese: 显著的呼吸加快常在急性病时出现，还可由慢性或急性肺或心脏疾病或全身性病变(如休克、严重疼痛和酸中毒)引起。
chinese.english: Extreme tachypnea is present during many acute illnesses.

chinese.chinese: 在检查颈部时(病人取坐位)和检查心脏时(病人取卧位)都要包括此项内容。
chinese.english: They are observed both during examination of the neck (with the patient sitting) and again as part of the cardiac examination (with the patient supine).

chinese.chinese: (3)	听诊心脏。
chinese.english: (3) Auscultate the heart.

chinese.chinese: 叩诊肺下界以及心脏和上纵隔的宽度。
chinese.english: Percuss the lower margins of the lungs and the width of the heart and upper mediastinum.

chinese.chinese: 在心脏部位叩诊常为浊音并伴有叩诊板指下的一种低抗感。
chinese.english: It is heard normally over the heart and is accompanied by an increased sense of resistance in the pleximeter finger.

chinese.chinese: 要全面评价心血管系统，检查不应仅限于心脏本身。
chinese.english: Complete evaluation of the cardiovascular system extends beyond the examination of the heart itself.

chinese.chinese: 中心型有三个主要原因：①伴有右到左分流的先天性心脏病；②肺动静脉瘘；③晚期肺部疾病伴有低氧血症。
chinese.english: Central cyanosis has three major causes: ① congenital heart diseases with right-to-left shunts; ② pulmonary arteriovenous fistulas; and ③ advanced pulmonary disease with hypoxemia.

chinese.chinese: 杵状指趾：青紫型先天性心脏病、感染性心内膜炎、肺部疾病伴发肺心病者是引起杵状指趾的三大病因。
chinese.english: Clubbing: Three cardiovascular causes of clubbing are cyanotic congenital heart disease, infective endocarditis, and pulmonary disease often associated with cor pulmonale.

chinese.chinese: 有时，这种反应异常强烈，致使压迫颈动脉窦造成严重心动过缓(甚或心脏停跳)或低血压(颈动脉窦综合征)。
chinese.english: On occasion this response may be exaggerated, and carotid sinus pressure will result in extreme bradycardia (even cardiac standstill) or hypotension (the carotid sinus syndrome).

chinese.chinese: 一般说这是一种无病理意义的，无不良后果的体征，但有可能与心脏杂音相混淆。
chinese.english: The hums are generally an innocent finding of no consequence, although they may be confused with cardiac murmur.

chinese.chinese: 任何可以见到的心脏性搏动的特点和部位均应记录。
chinese.english: The character and location of any visible cardiac impulses should be noted.

chinese.chinese: 触诊的价值在于判断心脏大小，心室肥厚与否，有无低频(有时不能闻及)震颤以及有无期外搏动。
chinese.english: The value of palpation lies in the estimation of heart size, ventricular hypertrophy, identification of low frequency (and sometimes inaudible) vibrations, and ectopic impulses.

chinese.chinese: 有些心脏病病人，其最大搏动点不在心尖部。
chinese.english: In some patients with cardiac disease, however, the cardiac apex may not be the point to maximum impulse.

chinese.chinese: 这项新的研究也表明，神经胶质细胞指挥脑干神经元的生长有赖于脑源性神经营养因子（Brain-Derived Neurotrophic Factor，BDNF）。BDNF是Balkowiec的室发现的对心肺控制起重要作用的另一种分子。
chinese.english: The new study also shows that glial cells direct the growth of brainstem neurons caused by BDNF (Brain-Derived Neurotrophic Factor), another molecule found by the Balkowiec lab to play an important role in cardiorespiratory control.

chinese.chinese: 他们说，曾经对H5N1大流行可有多严重的有充分的讨论，这才是核心问题。进一步的说，当前的争论为科学家和公共政策专家们讨论流感研究、预备、描绘蓝图提供了机会。而科学界和决策者间的争论需要从H5N1是否会如曾经般构成严重的国际威胁转向开始探讨我们如何避免病毒从室逃逸和科学家们如何共享其所需的病毒相关研究成果。
chinese.english: This is the heart of the matter, they say:there has been enough discussion about how severe an H5N1 pandemic might be.Moving forward, the current controversy has provided a valuable opportunity forscientists and public policy experts to discuss influenza research andpreparedness and create "a roadmap for the future." The discussionamong scientists and policy makers needs to move on from whether H5N1 poses aserious international threat - as it clearly does - and begin discussing how wecan prevent these viruses from escaping labs and how scientists can share theirflu-related results with those who have a need to know.

chinese.chinese: 现下有两个重要的议题。其一是通过交流提高公众对这次研究的认识和理解，另一个是对室改造的H5N1流感病毒的生物研究安全性和生物安全领域的评估。世界卫生组织将与相关专家一起讨论、推进这两个议题。
chinese.english: Two critical issues are to increase public awareness and understanding of thisresearch through communications and the review of biosafety and biosecurityaspects raised by the new laboratory-modified H5N1 influenza virus. WHO willcontinue discussion with relevant experts to move this forward.

chinese.chinese: 现在，回到大学室，黄和他的团队已经朝着更有效地修复那些病人神经的目标迈进了一步。在PLoS One杂志上发表的一篇论文中，黄和Rochester大学医学中心的同事报道了一组令人惊奇的、可能具备神经移植潜能的细胞。
chinese.english: Now, back in his university laboratory, Huang and his team have taken a step toward the goal of repairing nerves in such patients more effectively. In a paper published in the journal PLoS One, Huang and colleagues at the University of Rochester Medical Center report that a surprising set of cells may hold potential for nerve transplants.

chinese.chinese: 这个发现对更好的治疗美国每年遭受外周神经严重损伤的35万多名病人来说是一个进步。黄的室是少数开创新技术来治疗此种创伤的室之一。
chinese.english: The finding is one step toward better treatment for the more than 350,000 patients each year in the United States who have serious injuries to their peripheral nerves. Huang's laboratory is one of a handful developing new technologies to treat such wounds.

chinese.chinese: 科学家追寻的目标是在室里生长出可以替代的组织.
chinese.english: scientists are pursuing the aim of growing replacement tissue in the laboratory.

chinese.chinese: 普林斯顿大学研究者已经发现一种通用疫苗可以“通过“抑制流感病毒的变异和传播在第一时间最快最广的预防流感的发生。通用型也叫交叉保护型疫苗，正像它们的名字一样可以有效的对抗几种流感毒株。世界上很多室正在开发这种疫苗，一些已经在进行临床试验当中。
chinese.english: Princeton University-based researchers have found that the "universal" vaccine could for the first time allow for the effective, wide-scale prevention of flu by limiting the influenza virus' ability to spread and mutate. Universal, or cross-protective, vaccines - so named for their effectiveness against several flu strains are being developed in various labs worldwide and some are already in clinical trials.

chinese.chinese: 这项隶属于摩根·约瑟夫创伤研究计划的研究，是由全身系统性炎症室的主任Andrej Romanovsky博士所领导，并发表在《神经系统科学杂志》上。同样《科学美国人》也显著的刊登这项开创性的发现。
chinese.english: The research, led by Andrej Romanovsky, MD,PhD, Director of the Systemic Inflammation Laboratory(FeverLab), which is a part of St.  Joseph's Trauma Research program, was published in theJournal of Neuroscience. The groundbreaking discovery has also been highlightedin Scientific American.

chinese.chinese: 科学家们已经成功完成了一项更加可靠的新超声乳腺筛查的初期试验。国家物理室（NPL）的研究团队，英国测量学院与大学附属医院Bristol NHS新型医院共事，现正寻求将该技术应用于临床装置。
chinese.english: Scientists have successfully completed an initial trial of a new, potentially more reliable, technique for screening breast cancer using ultrasound. The team at the National Physical Laboratory (NPL), the UK's National Measurement Institute, working with the University Hospitals Bristol NHS Foundation Trust, are now looking to develop the technique into a clinical device.

chinese.chinese: 在美国能源部（DOE）SLAC国家加速器室工作的研究人员使用功能强大的X射线，以帮助破译某些天然抗生素如何对抗长期存在的一整套化学规则 - 一种困惑了有机化学家们几十年的机制。
chinese.english: Researchers working at the U.S. Department of Energy's (DOE) SLAC National Accelerator Laboratory have used powerful X-rays to help decipher how certain natural antibiotics defy a longstanding set of chemical rules - a mechanism that has baffled organic chemists for decades.

chinese.chinese: 本文的作者，包括合著者Richard I. Kuo，Wu的室中的一个在读的研究技师（以从爱丁堡大学毕业）发现，频率调变讯号的处理始于中脑，近大脑中心部皮质下方的区域，Wu说，这很令人感到惊奇。
chinese.english: The researchers - including co-author Richard I. Kuo, a research technician in Wu's laboratory at the time of the study (now a graduate student at the University of Edinburg) - found that the processing of FM sweeps begins in the midbrain, an area located below the cerebral cortex near the center of the brain - which, Wu says, was actually a surprise.

chinese.chinese: 据报道，注射部位有些轻微的不适，目前没发现解决的方法。T淋巴细胞应答的测定由宾夕法尼亚免疫中心室的酶联免疫法完成，这种测试方法是目前最具有效力的检测方法之一。
chinese.english: Reported injection site reactions were mild to moderate and didnot require treatment to resolve. T-cell responses were measured using avalidated ELISpot assay at the U Penn Immunology Core Facility.

chinese.chinese: 阿斯利康公司下设14个研发中心，位于包括瑞典、美国和英国在内的八个国家。公司为研究人员提供做出正确工作决策所必须的强有力的工具及技能。公司为研发中心网罗当地人才的主要原因是他们更家熟悉本地的疾病流行状况。例如，阿斯利康在班加罗尔的药物公司专注于传染性疾病，其关于多耐药结核的研究目前已处于临床试验阶段。公司在中国上海的研发中心正致力于胃肠道及肝脏等部位癌症的研究，而亚洲地区具备导致上述癌症高发率的条件。负责阿斯利康全球研发亚洲及新兴市场的副总裁Steve Q Yang表示：我们已经与瑞典及英国的室开展合作以促进研究的顺利进行。
chinese.english: The company has 14 RD centres in eight countries, including Sweden, the USand the UK.It is giving researchers the enhanced tools and skills required to make theright decisions to deliver performance. This is where we are looking for localtalent for our RD centres in India and Chinaprimarily because scientists will have a better understanding of the diseasesprevalent in their countries. Like for instance, AstraZeneca at itsPharmaceutical Development Bangalore (PDB) focuses on infectious diseases andits study on multi drug resistant tuberculosis is undergoing clinical trials onhumans. Its RD Centre at Shanghai in China, is engaged in cancer studies of GastroIntestinal (GI) tract and liver because Asiaaccounts for a high incidence of the condition. We have now collaborated with Sweden and UK labs to drive this research,stated Dr Steve Q Yang, vice president, head, RD, Asia' EmergingMarkets, AstraZeneca Global RD.

chinese.chinese: 该药由艾恩伍德医药(IRWD)与森林室(FRX)共同开发，但生物科技公司拥有其在美国的联合推广（促销）权，并处于可以取得很多回报的地位。阿尔米拉利公司（almirall）取得了其在欧洲的联合推广（促销）权，而阿斯特拉公司（Astellas）则签约了其在亚洲的经营权。
chinese.english: The drug was developed by Ironwood Pharmaceuticals (IRWD), which partnered with Forest Laboratories (FRX), but the biotech company held onto the co-promotion rights in the U.S., which put it into position to reap much of the reward. Almirall acquired the rights to Europe while Astellas inked an Asian deal.

chinese.chinese: 该方法使用了一种称作流式细胞的室技术，利用这种技术可以在最初数周敏感的密集化疗之后将残留在患者骨髓中的鉴定出来，敏感度可以达到在每1,000个正常细胞中发现1个癌细胞。St. Jude的研究人员正在着手开发测试非常低水平癌症，或称作微小残留病的检测手段。
chinese.english: The method uses a laboratory technique called flow cytometry, which makes it possible to identify a single cancer cell in 1,000 normal cells that remain in patient bone marrow after the initial intensive weeks of chemotherapy. St. Jude investigators were instrumental in developing the test for identifying very low levels of cancer called minimal residual disease.
