chinese.chinese: 在医疗卫生快速发展的今天，医生经常压缩病人的应诊时间。Missouri大学的研究人员开发了一种可以使医生在电脑屏幕上观察病人糖尿病相关健康状况电子信息的工具。一项新的研究结果表明，糖尿病仪表盘这种工具可以节省看病时间，提供诊断准确性以及改善病人情况。
chinese.english: In the fast-paced world of health care, doctors are often pressed for time during patient visits. Researchers at the University of Missouri developed a tool that allows doctors to view electronic information about patients' health conditions related to diabetes on a single computer screen. A new study shows that this tool, the diabetes dashboard, saves time, improves accuracy and enhances patient care.

chinese.chinese: 今天在华盛顿举行的美国公共卫生协会第139届年会上公布的一项新的研究称，少数民族移民在美国停留时间越长，不良健康的风险越高。
chinese.english: Minority immigrants are at higher risk ofexperiencing poor health outcomes the longer they stay in the U.S., accordingto new research released today at the American Public Health Association's139th Annual Meeting in Washington, D.C.

chinese.chinese: 美敦力在其人工胰腺的不谢追求之路上又迈进了一步，今天美敦力公司宣布美国FDA批准其ASPIRE研究中关键中关键家庭临床试验方案的IDE申请。此申请的获批，使ASPIE研究成为糖尿病治疗闭环系统中首项获批的关键国内临床试验。
chinese.english: In our continued commitment to develop an artificial pancreas, Medtronic, Inc. (NYSE:MDT) today announced U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) approval of its Investigational Device Exemption (IDE) to conduct a pivotal in-home clinical trial protocol for the ASPIRE study of the MiniMed Paradigm[sup]®[/sup] System featuring Low Glucose Suspend (LGS) automation. FDA approval of the IDE makes Medtronic's ASPIRE study the first in-home pivotal trial of a closed loop system for Type 1 diabetes management.

chinese.chinese: 美国国家癌症研究所主任Harold Varmus博士说：“我们很高兴能看到美国癌症总体发生率和死亡率持续平稳的下降，这是对于一些类型癌症的预防、检测和治疗方法改进的后果。但是今天报道的数据谱也显示出癌症的极其复杂性，不同类型的癌症有着不同的趋势，不同的人群间又有很大的差别，而且现在对各种癌症预防、检测和治疗的能力又各有不同。随着美国人口的老龄化，我们不得不发现和实施好的措施来队所有类型的癌症进行控制。”
chinese.english: “It is gratifying to see the continued steady decline in overall cancer incidence and death rates in the United States—the result of improved methods for preventing, detecting, and treating several types of cancer,” said NCI Director Dr. Harold Varmus. “But the full repertoire of numbers reported today also reflects the enormous complexity of cancer, with different trends for different kinds of cancers, important differences among our diverse people, and different capabilities to prevent, detect, and treat various cancers. Moreover, as our population continues to age, we have an obligation to discover and deliver better ways to control all types of cancers.”

chinese.chinese: 今天BMC的Respiratory Research接受并在线发表氢气治疗肺动脉高压研究论文Protective effects of hydrogen-rich saline on monocrotaline-induced pulmonary.pdf。本研究是来自泰山医学院赵晓民教授课题组。2年前，我与大学同学赵教授谈到氢气的生物学效应的进展，赵教授在学术上很有眼光，对当时尚没有被广泛认可的这个新进展这个非常有兴趣。随后就组织实施了多项研究，特别是在心肺器官损伤等方面有重要发现。这是他们第一篇关于氢气效应的研究论文，有望不久将有多篇研究论文面世。
chinese.english: Background Hydrogen-rich saline has been reported to have antioxidant and anti-inflammatory effects and effectively protect against organ damage. Oxidative stress and inflammation contribute to the pathogenesis and/or development of pulmonary hypertension. In this study, we investigated the effects of hydrogen-rich saline on the prevention of pulmonary hypertension induced by monocrotaline in a rat model. Methods In male Sprague–Dawley rats, pulmonary hypertension was induced by subcutaneous administration of monocrotaline at a concentration of 6 mg/100 g body weight. Hydrogen-rich saline (5 ml/kg) or saline was administred intraperitoneally once daily for 2 or 3 weeks. Severity of pulmonary hypertension was assessed by hemodynamic index and histologic analysis. Malondialdehyde and 8-hydroxy-desoxyguanosine level, and superoxide dismutase activity were measured in the lung tissue and serum. Levels of pro-inflammatory cytokines (tumor necrosis factor-α, interleukin-6) in serum were determined with enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay. Results Hydrogen-rich saline treatment improved hemodynamics and reverse right ventricular hypertrophy. It also decreased malondialdehyde and 8-hydroxy-desoxyguanosine levels, and increased superoxide dismutase activity in the lung tissue and serum, accompanied by a decrease in pro-inflammatory cytokines. ConclusionsThese results suggest that hydrogen-rich saline ameliorates the progression of pulmonary hypertension induced by monocrotaline in rats, which may be associated with its antioxidant and anti-inflammatory effects.

chinese.chinese: 就像过度呵护孩子父母在开学的第一天那样，有时需要针对目标因子轻轻一推使得其离开原有位置。在法国格勒诺布尔的欧洲分子生物学实验室（EMBL），科学家们可直视这样的一个交接。他们是最早确定参与核糖体蛋白复合体结构新生的细胞蛋白质。他们的工作，今天在《Nature Structural》网络版上发表了一个分子的生物学，可以提高对诸如囊肿性纤维化和某些帕金森氏症的认识，其中这种蛋白质的定位不当导致有害蛋白质在细胞内积累。
chinese.english: Like an overprotective parent on the first day of school, a targeting factor sometimes needs a little push to let go of its cargo. Scientists at the European Molecular Biology Laboratory (EMBL) in Grenoble, France, have visualised one such hand-over. They were the first to determine the structure of a ribosome-protein complex involved in carrying nascent proteins out of the cell. Their work, published online today in Nature Structural and Molecular Biology, could increase understanding of illnesses such as cystic fibrosis and some forms of Parkinson's disease, in which improper protein targeting leads proteins to harmfully accumulate inside cells.

chinese.chinese: 今天，美国食品和药物管理局公告称，由于临床试验研究结果资料显示使用诺美婷减肥患者心脏疾病发作和中风副作用的发生风险增加，雅培试验室制药股份有限公司同意其减肥药诺美婷（西布曲明）自愿撤出美国市场。
chinese.english: Abbott Laboratories has agreed to voluntarily withdraw its obesity drug Meridia (sibutramine) from the U.S. market because of clinical trial data indicating an increased risk of heart attack and stroke, the U.S. Food and Drug Administration announced today.

chinese.chinese: 她在ICU的病床一进门就能看到。即使到了今天，我还能够清晰地记得来自慢性开放伤口散发出的令人厌恶的甜味、病床边的按铃声和吹哨声、主管外科医生和其他临床医生的对病情讨论声。外科医生一天天憔悴，压力越来越大，确信有一天他能够送她出院。但是其他人，护士，咨询医生甚至医院伦理委员开始要求对她的护理计划进行改变。他们想要停止一切支持治疗，改为姑息护理。
chinese.english: Her bed in the I.C.U. was in plain view to any doctor or nurse walking by. Even today, I can recall the sickeningly sweet odor of what had become chronic open wounds, the sounds of the bells and whistles of the small army of machines that kept her alive and the increasingly rancorous discussions between the lead surgeon and other clinicians as the months dragged on. The surgeon, ever more haggard, pressed on, convinced that one day he'd send her home. But the others — nurses, consultants and eventually the hospital ethics committee too — began demanding that her care plan be changed. They wanted to cease all life support interventions and begin comfort care.

chinese.chinese: 今天早上，强生制药股份有限公司和荷兰库赛尔生物科技公司宣告他们在进行进一步的交易谈判—美国医疗保健巨头收购荷兰库赛尔生物科技公司疫苗部门剩余接近82%股份。
chinese.english: Johnson & Johnson and Crucell have announced this morning that they are in advanced negotiations over a deal which would see the US healthcare giant buy the near-82% stake in the Dutch vaccines group it does not already hold.

chinese.chinese: 今天发表于《自然方法1》杂志网络版上，英国利物浦大学行为生物学家简•赫斯特主持开展的一项试验研究，由于许多动物均具有防止被捕捉预警应急能力，当有人抓住她们的尾巴时，小鼠自然非常紧张。然而，科学家们却常常这样做，部分原因是避免被小鼠咬伤。采用这种方式捉小鼠增加他们的焦虑和降低它们与试验人员自愿互动合作的可能性。
chinese.english: As prospective prey for many animals, mice are understandably nervous when someone seizes their tail. Yet scientists do this regularly, in part to avoid being bitten. Gripping mice in this way increases their anxiety and decreases the likelihood that they will voluntarily interact with experimenters, according to a study led by Jane Hurst, a behavioural biologist at the University of Liverpool, UK, published online in Nature Methods1 today.

chinese.chinese: 今天在优酷上看视频得知9.11中救援人员竟然有300人患癌症，很震惊。
chinese.english: But now 85 per cent of them are suffering from lung diseases which they say were caused by the huge clouds of dust. Those people are now calling on the state for medical support.

chinese.chinese: 今天Andhra议会讨论了这一问题，此后不久议长YS Rajasekhar Reddy和其它MLA进行了HIV检测。
chinese.english: The issue was discussed today in the Andhra Assembly, shortly after Chief Minister Y S Rajasekhar Reddy and other MLAs took HIV tests.

chinese.chinese: 研究人员今天宣布，有力证据表明，一种名为六价铬的化学物质加入饮用水中时，可以导致实验动物发生癌症。这项为期两年的研究由美国国家毒理学计划(NTP)实施，证实了动物服用六价铬后会发生恶性肿瘤。
chinese.english: Researchers announced today that there is strong evidence a chemical referred to as hexavalent chromium, or chromium 6, causes cancer in laboratory animals when it is consumed in drinking water. The two-year study conducted by the National Toxicology Program (NTP) shows that animals given hexavalent chromium developed malignant tumors.

chinese.chinese: 诺和诺德公司今天宣布，美国食品与药物管理局（FDA）批准诺德人体生长激素（R）（rDNA来源的生长激素注射剂）用于治疗努南综合征患儿的身材矮小症。努南综合症是一种常染色体显性遗传性综合征，其一般特征为身材矮小、先天性心脏缺陷及特殊面容。其外部特征包括器官距离过远（眼距过宽）、向下斜视、蹼状颈，还有其它表现，如受累者半数患有先天性心脏病。高达80%的努南综合征患儿身材明显矮小。
chinese.english: Novo Nordisk today announced that Norditropin(R) (somatropin[rDNA origin] injection)received U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) approval for the treatment of short stature in children with Noonan syndrome. Noonan syndrome is defined as an autosomal dominant genetic syndrome commonly characterized by short stature, congenital heart defects, and unique facial features. The appearance of this disorder can include hypertelorism (widely-set eyes), down-slanting eyes, webbed neck, and other conditions, including congenital heart disease in half of those affected. Up to 80 percent of children with Noonan syndrome suffer from significant short stature.

chinese.chinese: 更新：WSJ.com报导，在今天的听证会上，美国糖尿病协会的一个即将上任的会长John Buse表示：在1999年他提高了对文迪雅的心脏风险的关注之后，他就被告知这个制药公司的人认为他肯定会是使该公司的股票下跌的人。Buse补充说他曾经被要求签署一份由该公司写的一份澄清声明。
chinese.english: Update: Also at today's hearing, John Buse, an incoming president of the American Diabetes Association, said that after he raised concerns about Avandia's heart risk in 1999, he was told there were “people in the company who felt I might be liable” for a drop in the company's stock, WSJ.com reports. Buse added that he was asked to sign a “clarifying statement” written by the company.

chinese.chinese: (2)叩诊：直接或间接叩诊法偶尔可用以估记心脏的大小。
chinese.english: (2) Percussion: The methods of direct and indirect percussion are occasionally applicable to the estimation of heart size.

chinese.chinese: 当左心缘超过左锁骨中线，常表明心脏已增大。
chinese.english: When the left border of cardiac dullness falls outside the midclavicular line, the heart is usually enlarged.

chinese.chinese: 然而，由于已累积了有关正常和异常心前区搏动的详细知识，在心脏的检查中，触诊在很大程度上代替了叩诊。
chinese.english: However, as more detailed knowledge of normal and abnormal precordial movements has been accumulated, palpation has largely replaced percussion in cardiac examination.

chinese.chinese: 超声心动图和X线胸片对心脏外形大小和腔室增大判断的优势，已使心脏叩诊检查的意义成为历史。
chinese.english: The superiority of the echocardiogram and roentgenogram for evaluation of overall heart size and chamber enlargement has relegated percussion of the heart largely to a place of historical interest.

chinese.chinese: (3)听诊：心脏听诊必须在床边学习。
chinese.english: (3) Auscultation: Cardiac auscultation must be learned at the bedside.

chinese.chinese: 尽管心脏产生的震动的频率范围为l～l000Hz，值得注意的是仅仅在25~600Hz范围内的震动强度可达到足以使一般听诊者能听到的程度。
chinese.english: Notice that only vibrations ranging from 25 to 600 cps achieve intensity levels that are high enough to become audible by the average listener, although the heart produces vibrations ranging from 1 to 1 000 cps.

chinese.chinese: 简言之，心脏产生的震动频率在25Hz以下(并非少见)时完全听不见。
chinese.english: In simple terms this means that vibrations originating in the heart with frequencies below 25 cps (and there are many) are entirely inaudible.

chinese.chinese: 相反，血清K+同样为5.9mmol／L(5.9mEq／L)而病人是急性少尿性肾功能衰竭，如果不予以治疗，则可能是即将发生高钾性心脏骤停的先兆。
chinese.english: Conversely, a serum K+ of 5.9 mEq/liter in a patient with acute oliguric renal failure may be early warning of impending hyperkalemic cardiac arrest if therapy is not instituted.

chinese.chinese: 任何病人血钾超过6．4mmol／L(6．4mEq／L)，必须立即进行心电图检查以明确有无高血钾性心脏中毒。
chinese.english: Any patient with a serum K+ exceeding 6.4 mEq/liter should have rapid and careful evaluation of the electrocardiogram for evidence of hyperkalemic cardiac toxicity.

chinese.chinese: 在有关心脏的所有实验室检查中，心电图提供的信息最多。
chinese.english: Of all laboratory cardiac procedures the electrocardiogram provides the most information for the effort involved.

chinese.chinese: 心电图可以提供有关心率、心律、心肌状况、有无心脏肥大、缺血或坏死、传导异常和心脏位置等资料。
chinese.english: The electrocardiogram provides information about heart rate, rhythm, state of the myocardium, the presence or absence of hypertrophy, ischemia or necrosis, abnormalities of conduction, and distribution.

chinese.chinese: 需要强调的是，尽管在各种慢性心脏疾患时心电图检查可能正常，但急性或严重的心脏疾患时极少有心电图正常者。
chinese.english: Perhaps most importantly, although a normal electrocardiogram may be found in the presence of a variety of chronic disorders of the heart, it is rarely seen with acute, serious disease.

chinese.chinese: 心电图(ECG)是记录由心脏收缩所产生的电压升、降的曲线，并有时间作对照。
chinese.english: The electrocardiogram (ECG) is a written record of the rising and falling voltages generated by the contracting heart and recorded against time.

chinese.chinese: 而窦房结(SAN)、窦房结和房室结之间的特殊细胞、希氏束及其分支包括蒲肯野纤维均具有自律性，可以自动除极，通过放射状传导可以引起整个心脏激动。
chinese.english: However, the sinoatrial node (SAN), certain cells between it and the atrioventricular node, and the His bundle and its divisions including the Purkinje system are capable of automatic rhythmic depolarization and can cause stimulation of the entire heart by radial conduction.

chinese.chinese: 大部分电能在心脏内，心肌内及邻近的周围组织中被抵消了，面净值部分由于轻度的不对称性和非同步性使得有可能被记录下来。
chinese.english: The bulk of the ECG is believed to arise from the more electrically available and less completely cancelled epicardial surfaces of the heart.

chinese.chinese: HIV患者平均年龄在49岁，他们有足够长的时间接受治疗、护理，在治疗安排到心导管插入检查室以前至少接受过三次的门诊随访。
chinese.english: The HIV patients had a median age of 49 and had been in care long enough to have had at least three visits to the clinic before referral to the cath lab.

chinese.chinese: 过去的一些研究已经发现慢呼吸是一种能缓解潮热症状的方法，但是那些研究要么规模非常的小，且又在不切实际的室条件下完成；要么就是这些研究设计的本身就很不周到，据Carpenter和她的同事们这样称。
chinese.english: Some past research has found that slow breathing can give women a measure of relief from hot flash symptoms, but those studies were either very small, conducted under unrealistic laboratory conditions or poorly designed, according to Carpenter and her colleagues.

chinese.chinese: Wilson的室擅长于X线晶体成像技术和其它能够准确地研究抗体通过哪些部位如何与靶病毒作用的技术。利用这些技术，他的团队发现C05有效避开了和流感病毒受体结合区周围的高度可变区结合。相反，它利用一个单独的延长的蛋白质环状结构接触并以“单手”或“单指”的方式锚定受体结合区本身。当抗体两条臂上各一激活的环状结构与两个独立的病毒血凝素上的一个受体结合区结合的时候，抗体的作用显得最大。“看起来这些抗体要发挥最大的功效需要两个血凝素的交联。”
chinese.english: Wilson'slaboratory specializes in the use of X-ray crystallography and other techniquesto determine precisely where and how such antibodies bind to their viraltargets. Using these methods, his team found that C05 effectively avoidsgrabbing the hypervariable regions around the flu RBS. Instead it uses a singleelongated protein loop to reach in and make a "one-handed"—or"one-fingered"—grab of the RBS itself. The antibody apparently worksbest when two of these active loops, one on each arm, grab two viral RBSs onseparate hemagglutinins. "It looks like these antibodies need tocross-link two hemagglutinins to have maximum effect," said Wilson.

chinese.chinese: Sainte-Justine大学医院研究中心和蒙特利尔大学的研究人员鉴定出了几种新基因，与其他儿童相比，在面对疟疾感染时，携带这些基因的部分儿童的免疫系统可更有效地产生应答。这项针对产生疟疾特异免疫反应易感基因而进行的合作性探索研究，在世界上尚属首次，该研究最终目的是鉴定出最适于疫苗或治疗方法的靶点，并且已发表于《美国国家科学院院刊》(Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences)上，文章第一作者和资深作者分别为Youssef Idaghdour博士和Philip Awadalla教授，在过去13年里，他们的室一直在世界范围内进行疟疾的相关研究。
chinese.english: Researchers from Sainte-Justine University Hospital Center and University of Montreal have identified several novel genes that make some children more efficient than others in the way their immune system responds to malaria infection. This world-first in integrative efforts to track down genes predisposing to specific immune responses to malaria and ultimately to identify the most suitable targets for vaccines or treatments was published in the Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences by lead author Dr. Youssef Idaghdour and senior author Pr. Philip Awadalla, whose laboratory has been performing world-wide malaria research for the past 13 years.

chinese.chinese: 该委员会在分析了一些以往其他国际性组织的专家们进行的相关研究，以及别的领域的新近研究后发现，在这个比较特别的课题上其实已经有了非常多的实验和研究，诸如：在室进行细胞学和组织学分析；既有对人的研究，也有对动物的研究。还有很多国家已经进行了人口研究和肿瘤注册研究。
chinese.english: The Committee has analyzed the previous studies conducted by other international groups of experts, and recent studies from other professionals. They say that there has been a substantial amount of research done on this particular subject, done by analyzing cells and tissues in laboratories, and also humans and animals. Population studies and cancer registry studies have been done in various countries, as well.

chinese.chinese: 没有一个室在慢性疲劳综合症及正常对照的血样中发现XMRV或pMLV感染的证据。为保证该结果可靠，独立的阳性（人为使之感染病毒）及阴性（筛查结果阴性）血样被用于验证上述结果，然而发现该诊断分析运作正常。
chinese.english: None of the laboratories found evidence of XMRV or pMLV in samples from therecruited CFS/ME or control subjects. For quality assurance of the moleculartests, separate positive controls (blood samples intentionally spiked withXMRV/pMLV) and negative controls (blood samples prescreened and lacking theretroviruses) were used and confirmed that the diagnostic assays werefunctioning properly.

chinese.chinese: 该研究所使用的新技术可以在室无限期地保持正常细胞和肿瘤细胞的存活，而这在之前几乎是不可能的。对于该病例，这项技术使得研究人员可以培养出患者活的正常细胞和肿瘤细胞（在病人的知情同意下进行），因此可以在体外主动地筛查（更好的）治疗方法。在短短的两周之内，该患者的细胞就迅速增殖并建立稳定的细胞培养株，这就使得Schlegel和他的研究小组可以筛查出可用于治疗的药物，而这些药物原本是由美国食品药品监督管理局（FDA）批准作为其他用途的。
chinese.english: The technology used is one that keeps normal and tumor cells alive indefinitely in the laboratory - which previously had not been possible. In this case, the technique allowed researchers to establish live cultures of the patient's normal and tumor cells (with the patient's consent) so that treatments could be screened for in vitro activity. Within two weeks, the man's cells had rapidly generated to create stable cell cultures allowing Schlegel and his team to screen available drugs approved by the U.S. Food and Drug (FDA) for other uses.

chinese.chinese: 新技术所使用的促进正常细胞和肿瘤细胞增殖的方法曾在最近的《美国病理学杂志》（American Journal of Pathology）有描述过（2012年2月）。该方法依赖于Rho激酶（ROCK）抑制剂的使用和成纤维细胞饲养层细胞。Schlegel说：“简而言之，我们发现我们可以将从同一个患者身上得到的正常细胞和肿瘤细胞永远生长下去，而在此之前，尚没有人能做到这样。对于绝大多数器官系统的正常细胞培养株都不能在室建立，所以以前直接比较正常细胞和肿瘤细胞是不可能的。”
chinese.english: The technique used to propagate the normal and tumor cells was described recently in American Journal of Pathology (Feb. 2012). It relies on the use of Rho kinase (ROCK) inhibitor and fibroblast feeder cells. "In short, we discovered we can grow normal and tumor cells from the same patient forever, and nobody has been able to do that," Schlegel says. "Normal cell cultures for most organ systems can't be established in the lab, so it wasn't possible previously to compare normal and tumor cells directly."

chinese.chinese: 这其中的机制是借助这些因子的影响来诱导细胞重编程，并可以在当前的研究条件下可以使细胞无限生长，但利用其他化学疗法来证实该技术仍在努力进行当中。Schlegel表示来自美国周边的研究人员/小组已经造访了他的乔治敦室，以期能学习这一“乔治敦方法/技术”，这是一个由研究人员在该项研究工作发表时伴随着对其的解说报道而新创造的词。
chinese.english: The mechanisms by which these factors induce cell reprogramming and unlimited cell growth are currently under investigation, but efforts to validate this technique with other chemotherapy regimens are underway. Schlegel says teams of researchers from around the U.S. have visited his Georgetown lab to learn the "Georgetown Method," a phrase coined by researchers who provided an accompanying commentary at the time the work was published.

chinese.chinese: 当常用浓缩因子剂量不起作用时，我们便怀疑患者体内已产生抑制剂。根据室诊断，通过测定抑制剂的活性水平（低抗体滴度vs高抗体滴度）和反应（低反应vs高反应）可指导治疗。例如低反应或低定量抑制剂的患者出血时可通过升高浓缩因子的剂量而对替代因子起反应。
chinese.english: Patients are suspected of having developed inhibitors when usual factor doses are ineffective. Upon laboratory diagnosis of inhibitors, corresponding levels (ie, low titers vs high titers) and reactivity (ie, low responding vs high responding) are tested, which help to guide therapy. For example, bleeding episodes in patients who are low responders or have low titers of inhibitors may respond to factor replacement with increased dose of factor concentrate.

chinese.chinese: WHO正与对确证新病毒负有责任的室合作，例如HPA和位于荷兰的另一个室。
chinese.english: The WHO has been collaborating with laboratories such as the HPA and anotherlab in the Netherlandswhich were responsible for the confirmation of new virus.

chinese.chinese: 为了给决策者及其他利益相关者提供一些指导，Boulware 及其同事计算出在坎帕拉、乌干达的现有费用，包括用药、医院及室费用，及方案相关全体人员的费用。
chinese.english: To provide some guidance for policymakers and other stakeholders, Boulware and colleagues calculated current costs in Kampala, Uganda, including medications, hospital and lab costs, and personnel for these regimens:

chinese.chinese: 使整体的疫苗接种率降低的是其他医疗工作者，如医疗助理，医院清洁人员，办公室管理人员，以及室技术人员。在2011-2012年，他们发布了62.8％的疫苗接种率，比前一季节高出1.8个百分点。这些在养老院和其他长期保健设施工作的人员的疫苗接种率从66.9％下降至50.2％。
chinese.english: What brought down the overall vaccinationrate were other healthcare workers such as medical assistants, hospitalhousekeeping staff, office managers, and lab techs. They posted a vaccinationrate of 62.8% in 2011-2012, 1.8 percentage points higher than the seasonbefore. The vaccination rate for this personnel category in nursing homes andother long-term-care facilities dropped from 66.9% to 50.2%.

chinese.chinese: Spelling和他的同事们发现，在室小白鼠身上通过阻断细菌毒性产物中的一种而非杀死它们，可以减缓细菌潜在的致死作用。
chinese.english: Spelling and his colleagues found that in laboratory mice it was possible to mitigate the potentially lethal effects of the bacterium by blocking one of its toxic products rather than killing it.

chinese.chinese: 20世纪早期，外科领域,以其激进行为和完美主义细化的风气,定义了许多医学文化。但是到了本世纪中叶,手术的夸大的作用和影响开始消退。 1922年外科学界的文章占了杂志文章总数的半壁江山，然而在接下来的十年降至三分之一。 直到19世纪50年代,从湿室报告出的新诊断测试、疫苗、抗生素占了杂志的大多部分。 科学家已经发现了一个比手术室更能产生新发现的地方:室的长凳上。 随着化学疗法,分子医学和其他技术的探索,手术不再是唯一医学突破背后的推动力量。 自1972年以来,只有十分之一的的文章用于报道外科手术的进步。
chinese.english: The field of surgery, with its ethos of radical action and perfectionist refinement, defined much of medical culture in the early 20th century. By midcentury, however, surgery's outsize role and influence began to subside. Whereas its discoveries had taken up half the space in the Journal in 1922, the proportion fell to one third during the next decade. By the 1950s, reports of new diagnostic tests, vaccines, antibiotics, and other innovations from the wet laboratory dominated the pages of the Journal. Scientists had found an even more prolific source of discovery than the operating room: the laboratory bench. With the advent of chemotherapeutics, molecular medicine, and other technologies, surgery was no longer the driving force behind medical breakthroughs. Since 1972, just a tenth of the Journal's articles have been devoted to surgical advances.

chinese.chinese: Novacea已经为开发一种维生素D型药物（维生素D衍生物--不确定）进行了大量的努力，此药为治疗前列腺癌提供了新方法。今天，这个小公司得到了巨大回报并获得先灵保雅的支持，先灵保雅同意与Novacea共同开发该药，其价值最后可能会达到5亿美元或更多。
chinese.english: Novacea has been toiling largely below the radar to develop a Vitamin D-based drug as a new approach to treating advanced prostate cancer. Today, the little company got a big dose of visibility and a vote of confidence from Schering-Plough, which agreed to a co-development deal with Novacea that eventually could be worth $500 million or more.

chinese.chinese: 今天在网上提前公布了FDA将要在会议上公布的文件：Sanofi-Aventis公司的减肥药Acomplia有增加精神病风险的副作用，如引起自杀念头和自杀行为。
chinese.english: Sanofi-Aventis's drug Acomplia helps patients lose weight but appears to increase the risk of psychiatric side effects, including suicidal thoughts and behaviors, according to FDA documents published online today in advance of an upcoming meeting.

chinese.chinese: 有的公司给雇员现金、奖品或医疗保险费上较大的折扣，试图让他们参与专门设计的计划以改善他们的长远健康。纽约时报今天报导，这些努力是公司为减缓医疗成本的上升所做的又一次尝试。引用的例子中：
chinese.english: Some companies are giving employees, cash, prizes or big discounts on health insurance premiums in exchange for participating in programs designed to improve their long-term health, the New York Times reports today. The effort is yet another attempt to slow the rise in health care costs. Among the examples cited by the story:

chinese.chinese: 今天FDA召集专家委员会就赛诺菲-安万特公司的减肥药物Zimulti（在欧洲市场上称为Acomplia）进行咨询，此前该公司股票价格持续下跌，昨天下跌1.5%之多。分析家认为，证券市场对该药物近期获得批准持怀疑态度。
chinese.english: Sanofi-Aventis's stock price has been falling steadily in the run-up to today's FDA advisory committee meeting on the company's weight-loss drug, sold in Europe as Acomplia and known here as Zimulti, with shares down more than 1.5% yesterday. Analysts feel the market is skeptical that the drug is likely to win approval anytime soon.

chinese.chinese: 该药物已经在欧洲获准上市，而被拒绝在美国上市的原因是考虑到其精神病学方面的副作用，包括抑郁和增加自杀念头的风险。今天赛诺菲公司人员向专家委员会做陈述时，辩称可通过筛除精神病疾患的病人而得以控制该药物的风险。
chinese.english: The drug has been approved for sale in Europe but has not been approved here due to concerns over its psychiatric side effects, which include depression and an increased risk of suicidal thoughts. In a presentation to the panel today, Sanofi officials argued that the drug's risks could be managed by screening out patients with psychiatric problems.

chinese.chinese: 芝加哥论坛报在今天早晨的报道中说道，在广告消费超过药物销售的情况下，到目前为止Takeda每年在广告消费上的花费超过1亿美元。
chinese.english: So far Takeda has been spending more than $100 million annually on consumer ads–an amount that exceeds sales of the drug, the Chicago Tribune writes this morning.

chinese.chinese: 对于正在医药战线努力奋斗以提高力普妥销售额的辉瑞公司来说，此举无异于出尔反尔。在今年三月份举行的新闻发布会上辉瑞公司援引一位研究者的话说“该研究对医生、医疗管理公司的老板和董事这些在现实中真正为病人提供治疗的人来说具有重要意义，”因为它“进一步支持了先前提出的力普妥可降低心血管疾病风险的观点。”今天辉瑞公司并没有举行新闻发布会对此进行纠正。
chinese.english: That's quite a rowback by Pfizer, which is fighting in the medical trenches to keep Lipitor sales humming. The March press release by Pfizer quoted a study author as saying the “analysis is important for physicians, employers and formulary directors at managed care companies who are making real-world treatment decisions for patients” because it “further supports the cardiovascular benefits previously seen with Lipitor.” There was no corrective press release issued today.

chinese.chinese: UBS的Roopesh Patel对于股市较为乐观，在他今天的记录中，将目标价格定为35美元。按照他的计算，百时美公司以36美元的价格被收购有80%的可能。按照Patel的说法，如果百时美—施贵宝单干的话，每股价格是28美元。
chinese.english: Roopesh Patel at UBS is more bullish on the stock. He ups the price target to $35 in his note today. By his calculation, there's an 80% probability of the company being acquired at $36. If Bristol-Myers goes it alone, the stock is worth $28 per share, according to Patel.

chinese.chinese: 两年前,辉瑞花一百万从科利制药买到一个抗艾滋病药，同年该公司上市发行价为每股16美元 ，但是昨天公司股票跌幅超过5美元，跌幅超过59%，今天下午4点在纳斯达克交易价格为3.46美元。
chinese.english: Two years ago, Pfizer bought rights to the medicine, a potent stimulator of the immune system, and invested $10 million in its inventor Coley Pharmaceutical. Coley went public the same year at $16 a share. But the company's shares tumbled more than $5 a share yesterday, or 59%, and traded at $3.46 at 4pm on Nasdaq.

chinese.chinese: 两年前,辉瑞花一百万从科利制药买到一个抗艾滋病药，同年该公司上市发行价为每股16美元 ，但是昨天公司股票跌幅超过5美元，跌幅超过59%，今天下午4点在纳斯达克交易价格为3.46美元。
chinese.english: Two years ago, Pfizer bought rights to the medicine, a potent stimulator of the immune system, and invested $10 million in its inventor Coley Pharmaceutical. Coley went public the same year at $16 a share. But the company's shares tumbled more than $5 a share yesterday, or 59%, and traded at $3.46 at 4pm on Nasdaq.

chinese.chinese: 伯明翰阿拉巴马（UAB）大学研究人员发现了有关某种细菌关键酶结构的新资料，这将有助于改善抗菌素并减少抗生素耐药性。在今天自然杂志在线版的两篇补充论文中，刊登了这一新发现，文中研究小组描述了细菌与人类RNA聚合酶的不同。这种差别为药物设计提供了潜在的新目标。
chinese.english: Researchers at UAB (University of Alabama at Birmingham) have new information on the structure of a key enzyme in bacteria that could lead to improved antibiotics and less antibiotic resistance. In findings published today online in two complementary papers in Nature, the research team describe the differences in an enzyme called RNA polymerase in bacterial cells as opposed to human cells. These differences provide potential new targets for drug design.

chinese.chinese: 六周前，麻州政府官员Deval L. Patrick提出一项十年计划，捐赠十亿美元的州政府基金用于生物医药研究，但是正如今天早上波士顿环球报指出的一样，谁将得到这笔基金还不确定。
chinese.english: Six weeks ago, Massachusetts Governor Deval L. Patrick proposed a decade-long plan to dole out $1 billion in state money to fund biomedical research. But, as the Boston Globe notes this morning, it's still unclear who's gonna get the cash.

chinese.chinese: 赛诺菲科学和医疗事务主管Marc Cluzel 今天在一个吹风会上说，公司会满足FDA（的要求）并且晚些时候会再提交批准此药申请，而且对患者群的定位会更准确。据Thomson财政部门提供的笔录，他说道：“我们觉得肥胖患者本身没有好的体形，而有疾病表现的肥胖与肥胖症关系密切”
chinese.english: The company will meet with the FDA and re-submit the drug for approval at some point, possibly with a more targeted patient population in mind, Sanofi's head of science and medical affairs Marc Cluzel said today on a conference call. “We really feel the good profile is … not the obese patient per se, but obese with morbid complications linked to obesity,” he said, according to a transcript provided by Thomson Financial.

chinese.chinese: 与其等待看来是不可避免的FDA的驳回，今天赛诺菲撤回了在美国销售减肥药Zimulti的申请
chinese.english: Rather than wait for a FDA rejection that had come to seem inevitable, Sanofi-Aventis today withdrew its application to sell its weight-loss drug Zimulti in the United States.

chinese.chinese: 正常儿童大脑是什么样子？没人知道确切的答案，但今天Lee Hotz在WSJ科学专栏中说，一项由联办政府基金资助的研究打算寻找此答案。
chinese.english: What's a normal kid's brain look like? Nobody knows exactly, but a federally funded study aims to find out, Lee Hotz writes today in his WSJ science column.

chinese.chinese: 这既不能说明心脏有病，也不能否定有病。
chinese.english: This is neither a manifestation of heart disease nor proof against it.

chinese.chinese: 早搏虽然不是心脏疾病的独立证据，但被认为可能是更严重紊乱的先兆。
chinese.english: Though not separately evidence of heart disease, they are said to be forerunners of more important disorders.

chinese.chinese: 心房扑动并不是一种无害的体征，常发生于瓣膜性心脏病和冠心病。
chinese.english: Atrial flutter is not an innocent finding, occurring most often with valvular and coronary disease.

chinese.chinese: 事实上，它可以发生于所有的心脏疾患，有时为阵发性房颤而没有明显的原因。
chinese.english: It is, in fact, encountered in all cardiac disorders and sometimes in paroxysmal form without apparent cause.

chinese.chinese: 能够通过心电图识别的最严重的急性心脏疾患就是真正威胁生命的心肌梗死。
chinese.english: The most important acute cardiac disorder which can be identified by the electrocardiogram is the real or threatened myocardial infarction.

chinese.chinese: 当梗塞发生在心脏后壁时，在正常标准的12导联中均不出现异常Q波。
chinese.english: Abnormal Q waves may not develop on any of the standard 12 leads when the infarct occurs on the posterior surface of the heart.

chinese.chinese: 事实上，这就是心脏背面异常Q波的镜像改变。
chinese.english: These are, in fact, mirror images of abnormal Q waves on the dorsal surface of the heart.

chinese.chinese: 它们表现为心脏急症，如伴有相应的主诉时，应按真正的经典的心肌梗死处理。
chinese.english: They represent cardiac emergencies and when accompanied by appropriate complaints are managed as though they indeed indicated classic infarctions.

chinese.chinese: 奇怪的是，偶尔在没有心脏疾患但发生急性脑血管意外的患者，也可以有几乎与上述相同的心电图表现。
chinese.english: Curiously, almost identical patterns are occasionally seen in patients with acute cerebrovascular accidents who have no heart disease.

chinese.chinese: 典型的右心室肥厚见于患有青少年左房室瓣狭窄或先天性心脏病的儿童，表现为电轴右偏大于+90o；心房肥大P波增高、右胸导联R波高大伴有T波倒置。
chinese.english: Classic right ventricular hypertrophy acquired in childhood as with juvenile mitral stenosis or congenital disease reveals an axis more positive than +90o, large P waves from atrial enlargement, and tall R waves in the inner (right) thoracic leads accompanied by inverted T waves.

chinese.chinese: 尽管所有类型的室内阻滞均可以突然发生或是作为心脏急症的一部分，如果不伴有其他的急性紊乱表现，则不属、于急诊处理的问题。
chinese.english: Although all types of intraventricular block can occur abruptly or as part of an acute cardiac illness the presence of any without the additional findings of an acute disorder does not constitute an emergence treatment problem.

chinese.chinese: 即使有心脏阻滞的病人仅发生一次晕厥，也应采取积极的态度，使用暂时的或永久的人工起搏器。
chinese.english: A history of even a single syncopal attack in the presence of heart block justifies the adoption of an emergent attitude and prompt use of an artificial temporary or permanent stimulator.

chinese.chinese: 心脏、胃和脑都是器官。
chinese.english: The heart, the stomach, and the brain are all organs.

chinese.chinese: 心肌：心脏的肌肉是不随意肌，它是介于平滑肌和骨骼肌之间的一种类型。
chinese.english: Cardiac: Involuntary muscles of the heart, an intermediate type between the smooth and the skeletal muscles.

chinese.chinese: 心脏是一个泵，它使血液在这个血管网内循环。
chinese.english: The heart is the pump that circulates the blood throughout this network of blood vessels.

chinese.chinese: 另外6家都超过10亿美元，包括Reddy博士室的创立者和格伦马克制药公司都位列增长最快的仿制药公司之中，但医药资产增长最快的是 Habil Khorakiwala公司 的Wockhardt ，他的财富增长了三倍。实际上Khorakiwala's 是名单上当期财富增长最快的。医药行业也成就了最富有的白手起家的女性——百康公司总裁基朗-妈祖达尔-萧
chinese.english: Six others topped $1 billion, including the founders of Dr. Reddy's Laboratories($1.4 billion) and Glenmark Pharmaceuticals ($1.1 billion), both of which qualified for our Fastest-Growing Generics Companies ranking. But the fastest-growing pharma fortune belonged to Wockhardt's Habil Khorakiwala, whose wealth tripled. In fact, Khorakiwala's was the fastest-growing fortune on the list, period. Pharma also contributed to the list's richest self-made woman, Kiran Mazumdar-Shaw of Biocon.

chinese.chinese: Carlyon室的研究人员正在试图深入了解OmpA是如何促进感染并且试验其对抗嗜粒细胞无形体和其它无形体家族成员感染的作用。
chinese.english: Researchers in Carlyon's lab are presently refining their understanding of howOmpA promotes infection and testing its efficacy in protecting againstinfection by A. phagocytophilum and other Anaplasmataceae members.

chinese.chinese: 研究者推测，致癌过程可能受肥胖人群饮食的影响。不过，来自该中心人类疾病预防分子医学布朗基础研究所内干细胞和再生医学室的米哈伊尔．科洛宁博士认为：诚然饮食是造成肥胖的重要因素，但究竟是什么直接导致肿瘤上出现多余脂肪，尚需进一步研究。
chinese.english: Some researchers have theorized that what obese people eat may affect cancer progression. However, although diet is an important factor, the direct effect of excess fat tissue on tumors has to be taken into consideration, said Mikhail Kolonin, Ph.D., senior author and associate professor at the Center for Stem Cell and Regenerative Medicine at the Brown Foundation Institute of Molecular Medicine for the Prevention of Human Diseases at UTHealth.

chinese.chinese: 研究者推测，致癌过程可能受肥胖人群饮食的影响。不过，来自该中心人类疾病预防分子医学布朗基础研究所内干细胞和再生医学室的米哈伊尔．科洛宁博士认为：诚然饮食是造成肥胖的重要因素，但究竟是什么直接导致肿瘤上出现多余脂肪，尚需进一步研究。
chinese.english: Some researchers have theorized that what obese people eat may affect cancer progression. However, although diet is an important factor, the direct effect of excess fat tissue on tumors has to be taken into consideration, said Mikhail Kolonin, Ph.D., senior author and associate professor at the Center for Stem Cell and Regenerative Medicine at the Brown Foundation Institute of Molecular Medicine for the Prevention of Human Diseases at UTHealth.

chinese.chinese: Zaki 等人描述了HCoV-EMC的发现，他提出了一个日渐得到认可的主题：需要在病毒进化为要有效在人-人传播的能力前鉴定出新致病原病毒。过去的经验显示，细心的医师，公共卫生署，或室工作人员可能意识到不寻常的事件并通知有关卫生部门，后者将就这些事情进行调查。诊所，室，以及公共卫生部门之间的良好协调沟通对于迅速有效地评估健康风险是相当重要的。
chinese.english: The detection of HCoV-EMC, as described by Zaki et al., probably forecasts an increasingly common theme in which new pathogens are identified before they may develop the potential for efficient human-to-human transmission. From past experience, an astute clinician, public health official, or laboratory worker will recognize an unusual event and contact the appropriate health officials, who will investigate the event. Good communication between the clinic, laboratory, and public health community is important for rapid and effective assessment of the health risks.

chinese.chinese: IDWeek会议在圣地亚哥举行，一直持续至周日。这些发现是其中在IDWeek会议开幕式上讨论的重要研究。IDWeek以“发展科学、改善医疗”为主题，在预防、诊断、治疗和传染性疾病的流行病学（其中包括纠缠终生的艾滋病）的最新科学成果和室到临床试验方法都起着重要作用。在与会五天期间，将突显国内外科学家中的1500则摘要。
chinese.english: The findings are among the significantresearch being discussed at the inaugural IDWeekmeeting, which took place through Sunday in San Diego. With the theme AdvancingScience, Improving Care, IDWeek featured the latest science andbench-to-bedside approaches in prevention, diagnosis, treatment, andepidemiology of infectious diseases, including HIV, across the lifespan. Morethan 1,500 abstracts from scientists in this country and internationally willbe highlighted over the conference's five days.

chinese.chinese: 这一室检查结果进一步确认了注射NECC的上述批次类固醇激素药物与当前的真菌性脑膜炎和关节感染爆发之间存在关联。目前，仍在继续对其他2个受累批次的醋酸甲基强的松龙和其他NECC注射用药物进行检测，美国疾病预防控制中心(CDC)在其网站上说道。
chinese.english: The laboratory confirmation further links steroid injections from these lots from NECC to the multistate outbreak of fungal meningitis and joint infections. Testing on the other 2 implicated lots of methylprednisolone acetate and other NECC injectable medications continues, the CDC said on its Web site.

chinese.chinese: Platt和研究生Keon-YoungPark收集了14名健康者的血液样本，在室里从样本中分离出单核细胞，然后使用一种特殊的分子来刺激这些细胞，使它们转化为巨噬细胞或破骨细胞。通过这项工作，研究者们再现了体内过程：单核细胞从坏死的组织获得这种刺激物，离开血液，转化成巨噬细胞或破骨细胞，巨噬、破骨细胞促进了动脉粥样硬化、肿瘤和骨质疏松症的组织变化。
chinese.english: Platt and graduate student Keon-Young Park collected blood samples from 14 healthy individuals, removed white blood cells called monocytes from the samples and stimulated those cells with certain molecules so that they would become macrophages or osteoclasts in the laboratory. By doing this, the researchers recreated what happens in the body -- monocytes receive these cues from damaged tissue, leave the blood, and become macrophages or osteoclasts, which are known to contribute to tissue changes that occur in atherosclerosis, cancer and osteoporosis.

chinese.chinese: 研究人员随机指定来自38个中心的预定冠状动脉支架术的2440例患者接受血小板功能监测，对抗血小板治疗应答不良的受试者需接受药物校正，接受传统治疗无监护也需接受药物校正。试验主要终点为冠状动脉支架植入术后1年内死亡，心肌梗塞，术后支架内血栓形成，中风，或急性血运重建的复合。对于床边监护组的患者，分别于支架植入之前的心血管插入室以及之后2到4周的门诊诊所，需进行Verify Now P2Y12 和阿司匹林定点照护检测。
chinese.english: We randomly assigned 2440 patients scheduled for coronary stenting at 38 centers to a strategy of platelet-function monitoring, with drug adjustment in patients who had a poor response to antiplatelet therapy, or to a conventional strategy without monitoring and drug adjustment. The primary end point was the composite of death, myocardial infarction, stent thrombosis, stroke, or urgent revascularization 1 year after stent implantation. For patients in the monitoring group, the Verify Now P2Y12 and aspirin point-of-care assays were used in the catheterization laboratory before stent implantation and in the outpatient clinic 2 to 4 weeks later.

chinese.chinese: 普林斯顿神经科学学院就职并在分子生物学教授Henry L. Hillman 的Lynn Enquist室做博士后研究员的Matthew Taylor作为此项研究的第一作者称：事实上只有1或2个病毒颗粒参与其中是令人惊讶的，因为这些病毒在一个细胞中可以上百倍的自我复制。
chinese.english: The fact that just one or two virus particles are involved is surprising because these viruses can replicate themselves hundreds of times in a single cell," said Matthew Taylor, first author on the study and a postdoctoral researcher in the laboratory of Lynn Enquist, the Henry L. Hillman Professor in Molecular Biology and the Princeton Neuroscience Institute.

chinese.chinese: 在AHA的新闻发布会上，澳大利亚维多利亚州CSL室的Andreas Gille博士指出增加胆固醇的外排能力最近已被证实可以降低MI风险。他补充道：“我们在之前的体外研究中已经证实CSL-112是胆固醇一种有效的受体。现在我们也证实在人类它也是有效的，CSL-112可以比之前其他任何治疗都恩能够更高更快地升高HDL的含量水平。”
chinese.english: Speaking at an AHA press conference, Dr Andreas Gille (CSL, Victoria, Australia) noted that increased cholesterol-efflux capacity has recently been shown to be associated with reduced MI risk. He added: "We have previously shown CSL-112 to be an efficient acceptor of cholesterol in in vitro studies. Now we have also shown that it is effective in humans, raising HDL to higher levels and faster than any other previous therapy."

chinese.chinese: 这项研究是不同室之间十余年合作的一个峰点，比如Mark Denison博士（M.D.），Vanderbilt大学医学院儿科学和病理学、微生物学以及免疫学教授Craig-Weaver教授，北卡罗来纳州大学教堂山分校Gillings全球公共卫生学院微生物学、免疫学和流行病学教授Ralph Baric博士（Ph.D.）。研究人员的目标就是为了更好地了解冠状病毒，该病毒同时也引起普通感冒，并能在物种之间进化和传播。
chinese.english: The study is the culmination of more than a decade of collaboration between the laboratories of Mark Denison, M.D., Craig-Weaver Professor of Pediatrics and professor of Pathology, Microbiology &Immunology at Vanderbilt University School of Medicine, and Ralph Baric, Ph.D., professor of Microbiology, Immunology and Epidemiology at the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill's Gillings School of Global Public Health. The researchers' aim is to better understand how coronaviruses, which also cause the common cold, evolve and spread between species.

chinese.chinese: 来自Dana-Farber癌症研究所胸廓肿瘤学Lowe中心的研究人员，与布里格姆女子医院病理科高级分子诊断中心及致力于个性化基因药物的合伙医疗中心分子药学室的人员一起，于2009年7月介绍了晚期NSCLC在BRAF, HER2, PIK3CA和ALK上的体细胞性改变的预期基因分型，还包括在2004年以来对EGFR和KRAS的常规突变分析。在中位数为31天的周转时间内，（他们）成功地对419名患者中的344例样本进行了基因分型。
chinese.english: Researchers from the Lowe Center forThoracic Oncology at the Dana-Farber Cancer Institute, in conjunction with the Center for Advanced Molecular Diagnostics in the Pathology Department at the Brigham and Women's Hospital and the Laboratory for Molecular Medicine at the Partners Healthcare Center for Personalized Genetic Medicine, introduced prospective genotyping of advanced NSCLC for somatic alterations in BRAF, HER2,PIK3CA, and ALK in July 2009, in addition to routine mutational analysis ofEGFR and KRAS, which had been ongoing since 2004. Three-hundred forty-four specimens taken from 419 patients were successfully genotyped with a median turnround time of 31 days.

chinese.chinese: “关于安全性的分析显示在使用Heplisav and Engerix-B之后局部和系统申报的不良事件的发生率或死亡人数上没有统计学差异，并且，室调查并没有显示任何临床意义在两组之间。不致命的事件在两组之间有相似的发病率”，FDA的评论家LorieSmith, MD说道。
chinese.english: Safety analyses showed no statistically significant differences betweenHeplisav and Engerix-B in local and systemic solicited adverse events ordeaths, and laboratory investigations did not any clinically significantdifferences between the 2 groups. Nonfatal serious adverse events occurred withsimilar incidence between groups, FDA reviewer Lorie Smith, MD, said.

chinese.chinese: 髓磷脂修复基金会宣布一项新的同行评议的研究结果强调了多发性硬化症的一项有针对性、新颖的治疗方法。通过利用髓磷脂修复基金会的旨在加速学术研究的商业化的加速协作研究(ARC) 模型，髓磷脂修复基金会的药物发现顾问委员会和西北大学Stephen Miller博士的室为这个适用于MS平台技术确定了一种新的方法。这第二代技术提高获得制药行业兴趣的潜能，而且最接触到病人。通过利用这种病人导向的方法,这项研究表明,髓磷脂在多发性硬化症动物模型的免疫反应耐受性得到了改进。
chinese.english: The Myelin Repair Foundation (MRF) announced the results of a new peer-reviewed research study published in Nature Biotechnology highlighting a targeted, novel approach for multiple sclerosis (MS). By utilizing the Myelin Repair Foundation's Accelerated Collaboration Research (ARC) model designed to speed academic research to commercialization, the MRF's Drug Discovery Advisory Board and Dr. Stephen Miller's laboratory at Northwestern University identified a new approach for this platform technology that is applicable to MS. This second generation technology enhances the potential to garner pharmaceutical industry interest and ultimately, to reach patients. By utilizing this patient-oriented approach, this study demonstrated improved tolerance of myelin in the immune response in animal MS models.

chinese.chinese: 然而，尽管30年前就发现象这样的问题，到今天保健系统并没有多大改变。Wennberg说：“我们都被‘我们一直在进步’的宣传欺骗了，但是如果你在这一领域待足够长的时间，你可能改变这件事的想法。”
chinese.english: Yet, despite three decades of findings such as these, the system hasn't changed much. “We're all basically dupes of the enlightenment — we believe in progress,” Wennberg said. “But if you stick around in this field long enough, you're likely to change your thought on that one.”

chinese.chinese: 这项研究今天发表在《国家科学院年报》上。
chinese.english: The research appears today in the Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences.

chinese.chinese: 本研究今天发表在bmj.com 上，估计了在无已存在的心血管疾病或糖尿病的英国总人口中，约有320万年龄≤75岁的成人是发展为心脏病的高危人群。这低于以前评分推测的结果，但研究者认为对于英国人来说这是更合适的评估，并有助于将健康差异减少到最低。
chinese.english: The study published on bmj.com today, estimates that in the general population without pre-existing cardiovascular disease or diabetes, there are 3.2 million adults under the age of 75 in Britain at high risk of developing heart disease. This is lower than previous scores have suggested, but the researchers believe that it is a more appropriate estimate for the UK and will help minimise health inequalities.

chinese.chinese: 这一发现今天发布在内科学年鉴上，其结果与美国糖尿病协会和其它组织的建议“在使用其它药物前先试用二甲双胍来治疗患者”是一致的。当二甲双胍单独使用没有效果后，与其它药物合用。
chinese.english: The finding, published today in the Annals of Internal Medicine, is consistent with recommendations from the American Diabetes Association and other groups that call for starting patients on metformin before trying other drugs. When metformin alone doesn't work, it's often prescribed in combination with other medicines.

chinese.chinese: 更新：《华尔街日报》记者Sarah Rubenstein从今天早上的电话会议现场报道，惠氏公司首席医学官Gary Stiles称，FDA所提问题涉及少数患者在试验期间出现的肝酶升高或心血管问题。肝脏问题并非只有Pristiq才有的问题，公司谨慎对待心血管问题。该公司认为这些问题并非Pristiq所致。
chinese.english: Update: WSJ's Sarah Rubenstein reports from this morning's conference call. Gary Stiles, Wyeth's chief medical officer, said the FDA's questions related to a small number of patients who experienced increases in liver enzymes or had cardiovascular problems during trials. The liver issue wasn't unique to Pristiq, and the company looked carefully at the cardiovascular issues, he said. Wyeth doesn't believe the problems were caused by Pristiq.

chinese.chinese: 该公司今天早上宣布，FDA通知惠氏公司进行一项为期一年的研究，以考察该药物是否与严重的心血管和肝脏问题有关。
chinese.english: The FDA told Wyeth to do a year-long study of the drug to see whether it is associated serious cardiovascular or liver problems, the company said this morning.

chinese.chinese: 纽约时报今天早晨报道：总统候选人们正争先恐后地向国家4千5百万没有医疗保险的人群作出承诺。
chinese.english: The presidential candidates are falling over each other to promise to help the nation's 45 million or so uninsured, the New York Times reports this morning.

chinese.chinese: 调查发表在今天的《内科档案》，它的对象是40个内科培训项目的154个医疗机构，询问四年住院医培训的效果。支持此限制的人说，住院医工作时间少于80小时/星期，每次最大时间少于24小时，这能保证他们不会过于疲乏而犯错。
chinese.english: The survey, published today in the Archives of Internal Medicine, asked 154 clinical faculty members from 40 internal-medicine training programs about the effects of the four-year-old restrictions. Supporters of the limits, which prohibit residents from working more than 80 hours per week and more than 24 hours at a stretch, say they protect patients by reducing the likelihood that an exhausted resident will make a mistake.

chinese.chinese: 我们差不多赶不上这周专家关于受争议的药物向FDA提议的速度了。星期一是文迪雅，星期二是Tysabri，昨天是粉刺药异维甲酸，今天，我们会错过什么么？
chinese.english: We can hardly keep up with the meetings of experts advising FDA on controversial drugs this week. There was Avandia on Monday, Tysabri Tuesday, and acne treatment Accutane yesterday. Are we missing something today?

chinese.chinese: 来自于制造婴儿配方Enfamil的勃列斯多•迈耶施贵宝下属公司Mead Johnson的这个礼包有多个形式的版本，公司的发言人Gail Wood在今天下午告诉华尔街健康博客。有一款为母乳喂养的母亲设计的礼包包括一本母乳喂养教程、一个母乳冷却器以及一个emfamil牌奶粉的免费小样。有一些公司会付费放一些取样管在礼包里。礼包里甚至还有尿布。
chinese.english: The bag from Mead Johnson, the Bristol-Myers Squibb subsidiary that makes infant formula Enfamil comes in a few versions, company spokeswoman Gail Wood told the Health Blog this afternoon. The one designed for breast-feeding mothers includes a how-to guide for breast feeding, a cooler for breast milk — and a free sample of Enfamil. Other companies pay to put coupons in the bag. The bag also holds diapers.

chinese.chinese: 今天诺华在印度争取快速获得药物专利的抗争失败了。CEO Dan Vasella去年说这场斗争是“原则问题”。但这个原则显然不足以使诺华赢得印度最高法院审理的这场官司。在低级法院失利后，诺华曾说不会就此再次上诉。
chinese.english: Novartis bowed today in its fight to make it easier to get patents on drugs in India. The battle was a “question of principle,” CEO Dan Vasella said last year. But that principle apparently wasn't enough to make the company take the case to the country's highest court. After losing a battle in a lower court, the company said it won't appeal its case.

chinese.chinese: 今天早晨的《波士顿环球报》上关于教学医院处境的最新消息又吸引了人们的注意——教学医院依然在艰难地适应这些已经发布了4年的，有关限制实习医生工作时间的规则。
chinese.english: So this morning's Boston Globe grabbed our attention with an update on teaching hospitals' continuing struggle to adapt to four-year-old rules limiting residents' work hours.

chinese.chinese: MiRNA药物研发公司Rosetta Genomics Ltd.(纳斯达克代码：ROSG)今天出版了2007年第二季度财政报告。同很多生物制药企业一样，报告中没有销售记录；财政主要集中在公司的研发、同第三方合作伙伴的合同及药物上市所需时间上。
chinese.english: MicroRNA-based drug development comapny Rosetta Genomics Ltd. (Nasdaq:ROSG) today published its financial report for the second quarter of 2007. Like many biomedical companies, it did not record any sales; the financials focused on progress in the company's R&D, contracts with third parties, and the time for products to reach market.

chinese.chinese: 今天出版了2007年第二季度财政报告。
chinese.english: published its financial report for the second quarter of 2007.

chinese.chinese: 市场似乎对仿制药生产商Barr Pharmaceuticals今天早上出炉的第二季度的收入报告很满意，其股票价值在早些的交易中上涨了5%。
chinese.english: The market seemed pleased by this morning's second-quarter earnings report from generic drug maker Barr Pharmaceuticals, sending shares up 5% in early trading.

chinese.chinese: 血液进入心脏的两个上腔(心房)，并通过两个下腔(心室)流出心脏。
chinese.english: Blood enters the two, upper chambers of the heart, the atria, and leaves through the two lower chambers, the ventricles.

chinese.chinese: 主动脉从心脏发出后不久便开始分枝为较小的动脉,这一分枝过程一直持续到身体的每个区域都有动脉分布为止。
chinese.english: At the aorta the process of branching into smaller arteries begins, almost immediately and continues until every area of the body is reached.

chinese.chinese: 心脏是心血管系统的泵，它位于胸腔的中央，右心室在前而左心室在后。
chinese.english: The heart, the pump of the cardiovascular system, is located in the center of the Thoracic cavity and is positioned so that the right ventricle laces anteriorly, and the left ventricle posteriorly.

chinese.chinese: 心脏被包在一个囊(心包)内。
chinese.english: The heart itself is contained in a sac, the pericardium, which has two layers.

chinese.chinese: 心包有两层，它的脏层(也称心外膜)直接附着在心脏上，心包的外层(壁层)和脏层间有一个充满液体的腔，它将两层心包分隔开。
chinese.english: The visceral pericardium (also called the epicardium) is directly attached to the heart; the outer membrane, the parietal pericardium, is separated from it by a fluid-filled pericardial space.

chinese.chinese: 心脏由一层厚实的肌肉(心肌)和衬在其内的上皮组织(心内膜)构成。
chinese.english: Thick muscle called myocardium which is lined with epithelial tissue (endocardium) constitutes the entire heart.

chinese.chinese: 心脏有四个腔：左，右心房(由心耳将其闭合)和左、右心室。
chinese.english: The heart has four chambers: the right and left atria, which are closed by an earlike flap called an auricle, and the right and left ventricles.

chinese.chinese: 胎儿心脏的两心室间的情况也如此。
chinese.english: The same is true for the ventricles of the fetal heart.

chinese.chinese: 如果卵圆孔和室间孔中有任何一个不闭合，便发生心脏缺损。
chinese.english: If either foramen doesn't close, a defect in the heart results.

chinese.chinese: 心脏瓣膜有两种类型。
chinese.english: There are two types of heart valves.

chinese.chinese: 心脏是首先接受氧合血的器官。
chinese.english: The heart is the first, organ to receive oxygenated blood.

chinese.chinese: 在主动脉的升位发出两根冠状动脉，它们给整个心脏供血。
chinese.english: From the ascending portion of the aorta two coronary arteries supply blood to the entire heart.

chinese.chinese: 心脏搏动是心肌产生的(肌原性的)。
chinese.english: Heartbeat is a product of the heart muscle (myogenic).

chinese.chinese: 收缩期指心脏的收缩时期。
chinese.english: A systole is the contraction of the heart.

chinese.chinese: 它一旦受到刺激，心脏就发生最大限度的收缩。
chinese.english: During its systole it cannot be stimulated to contract again.

chinese.chinese: 多发性硬化症是一种攻击神经髓磷脂的免疫系统疾病，导致大脑信号受阻,进而引起运动技能、协调和认知能力的丧失。与目前的多发性硬化症治疗不同——其无区别对待抑制整个免疫系统,该研究强调了一个抗原耦合纳米治疗的有效性，该治疗仅仅刺激对髓磷脂的免疫耐受，终止多发性硬化症动物模型的自身免疫攻击。而且，通过附加抗原到一个纳米粒子而不是患者自身的免疫细胞,在生物制药行业制造这种治疗的潜力得到了改进,使这种潜在的多发性硬化症治疗更容应用于临床实践。这种新方法是由髓磷脂修复基金会的药物发现顾问委员会, Michael Pleiss博士——髓磷脂修复基金会的内部研究团队的一名成员和西北大学室的Stephen Miller博士协作鉴定的。
chinese.english: Multiple sclerosis is a disease of the immune system that attacks the myelin on the nerves, resulting in blocked brain signals that can cause loss of motor skills, coordination and cognitive ability. Unlike current MS therapies that non-discriminately suppress the entire immune system, this study highlights the effectiveness of an antigen-coupled nanoparticle treatment that stimulates immune tolerance to myelin only, halting the autoimmune attacks in animal MS models. Furthermore, by attaching antigens to a nanoparticle instead of the patient's own immune cells, the potential for manufacturing this treatment in the biopharmaceutical industry is improved, making it easier for this potential MS therapeutic to reach the clinic. This new approach was identified collaboratively by the Myelin Repair Foundation's Drug Discovery Advisory Board, Dr. Michael Pleiss, a member of the Myelin Repair Foundation's internal research team and Dr. Stephen Miller's laboratory from Northwestern Uni

chinese.chinese: 研究方案间3-4级不良事件和室数据异常的频率也基本相似。然而，102号研究中，与Atripla相比，在96周治疗期内服用Stribild患者的神经精神副作用（1-4级）出现频率较低，包括异常做梦（Stribild 15%比Atripla 28%）、头晕（Stribild 8%比Atripla 25%）以及失眠（Stribild 11%比Atripla 16%）。与Atripla治疗患者相比，服用Stribild患者的总胆固醇和LDL（低密度脂蛋白或者“坏”胆固醇）增加量也较低；而在103号研究中，与采用基于阿扎那韦方案治疗的患者相比，服用Stribild患者的甘油三酯增加量明显较少。另外， 96周治疗期内，与基于阿扎那韦方案治疗组相比，Stribild组中3-4级高胆红素不良事件报告次数较低（0.6%比65%）。
chinese.english: The frequency of Grade 3-4 adverse events and laboratory abnormalities was also comparable between study regimens. However, in Study 102, patients taking Stribild experienced lower rates of neuropsychiatric side effects (Grades 1-4) through 96 weeks compared to Atripla patients, including abnormal dreams (15 percent for Stribild vs. 28 percent for Atripla), dizziness (8 percent vs. 25 percent) and insomnia (11 percent vs. 16 percent). Patients taking Stribild also experienced lower increases in total cholesterol and LDL (low-density lipoprotein or “bad” cholesterol) compared to Atripla, and in Study 103, experienced significantly smaller increases in triglycerides compared to those taking the atazanavir-based regimen. Additionally, through week 96, reports of Grade 3-4 hyperbilirubinemia were lower in the Stribild arm compared to the atazanavir-based arm (0.6 percent vs. 65 percent).

chinese.chinese: 目的：蛛网膜下动脉瘤破裂出血患者的新神经保护方法的研究，更好的家庭知识将从脑缺血室标志物的研制中获利。该研究的目的是为了评估蛛网膜下动脉瘤破裂出血预后的平均15天S100B。
chinese.english: Objectives: Studies of new neuroprotective approaches methods in patients with subarachnoid aneurysmal hemorrhage and better family information would benefit from the development of laboratory markers of brain ischemia. The goal of this study was to evaluate mean 15-day S100B for predicting outcomes after subarachnoid aneurysmal hemorrhage.

chinese.chinese: Peterson 和 Julien Viaud（Peterson室的博士后研究员），在杂志肿瘤分子治疗发表他们的研究结果，现在可上网查询。曾经的研究已经在33,000个候选基因中识别出IPA-3，而且该分子从那时起变成为世界各地的癌症室研究的重要课题。在文章中，研究人员使用了多种技术，以确定IPA-3和 PAK1如何相互作用。
chinese.english: Peterson and Julien Viaud, a postdoctoral researcher in the Peterson lab, published their findings in the journal Molecular Cancer Therapeutics, available online now. The researchers previously identified IPA-3 from a screen of 33,000 candidates, and the molecule has since gone on to become an important subject of study by cancer laboratories around the world. In the article, the researchers use a variety of techniques to define how IPA-3 interacts with PAK1.

chinese.chinese: 最新研究显示，通过激活腺苷酸活化蛋白激酶(AMPK)而起效的糖尿病治疗药物二甲双胍，有可能用于治疗人类癌症。室研究显示，二甲双胍能减少仓鼠胰腺癌发生率，延缓肿瘤易感小鼠乳腺肿瘤和其他肿瘤的发生，这些研究结果支持了二甲双胍有抗肿瘤作用的假设。此外，二甲双胍还能够抑制人类乳腺肿瘤细胞的生长。尽管对二甲双胍在人体抗肿瘤的可能性还没有进行深入研究，但初步的病例对照研究结果显示：使用二甲双胍的II型糖尿病患者罹患癌症的风险的确降低了。然而，上述结果仅限于医院收治的癌症，并且癌症的确诊日期以首次医院收治时间为准。
chinese.english: Recent research suggests that the antidiabetic drug metformin, which exerts its effects by activating the AMP-activated protein kinase (AMPK), may have potential for the treatment of cancer in humans . The hypothesis that metformin may have anticancer effects is supported by laboratory studies showing that metformin is associated with reduced incidence of pancreatic cancer in hamsters  and delays onset of mammary  and other tumors  in tumor-prone mice. Metformin also inhibits growth of human breast cancer cells . Although the potential for prevention of cancer in humans using metformin has not been explored, we previously reported the results of a pilot case-control study that identified a reduced risk of cancer among patients with type 2 diabetes who had used metformin . However, the outcome was limited to hospital admissions for cancer, and the date of diagnosis was assumed to be date of first hospital admission.

chinese.chinese: 一些对孪生子(包括共同抚养和分开抚养)的研究指出，脂肪分布和代谢是一系列决定于基因的表型。Framingham的研究发现遗传因素(包括基因和早期环境因素)决定了57%的皮下和36%的内脏脂肪分布。根据Fernandez Twinn和Ozanne的综述，由于子宫内营养和激素异常的影响，低体重新生儿体内脂肪更多，成人后更容易出现代谢异常和心血管疾病。值得注意的是：1、脂肪的增加发生于妊娠后期3个月。2、动物室发现，妊娠后期孕母的营养不足可导致后代成年后葡萄糖耐量异常，这种异常与脂肪含量(不是肌肉葡萄糖转运蛋白-4，GLUT4)减少或脂肪含量增多有关。来源于旁轴中胚层的脂肪组织发育为躯干脂肪，来源于侧板中胚层的脂肪发育为四肢脂肪，这种机制也反映出脂肪分布与代谢病风险的关系。
chinese.english: Studies in twins, who have been raised apart and together (54), have documented that body fat distribution and metabolic abnormalities are a clustering genetic trait. Heritability in the Framingham study, including genetic and early environment contributions, was 57% for subcutaneous and 36% for visceral fat mass . As reviewed by Fernandez-Twinn and Ozanne , because of intrauterine nutritional and hormonal factors, low–birth weight newborns have more fat and are at higher risk of metabolic and cardiovascular diseases in adulthood. It is noteworthy that fat accretion occurs during the last trimester and maternal under-nutrition in animals during late pregnancy leads to glucose intolerance in adult offspring, in association with reduced adipose, but not muscle GLUT4, content and increased adipose tissue mass. The embryonic origin of adipose tissue, i.e., the paraxial mesoderm, gives rise to truncal fat, whereas the lateral plate mesoderm gives rise to fat in the limbs , which also reflec

chinese.chinese: 最近我们室关于病人的研究发现，减重可以逆转全身性炎症、全身/骨骼肌/肝脏胰岛素抵抗，但不能逆转脂肪组织胰岛素抵抗和低灌注。这与另一发现--肌细胞可进行CLUT4转位的诱导和逆转，但在脂肪细胞无法实现--是一致。脂肪组织的儿茶酚胺抵抗也不随体重下降而减轻，就像肥胖倾向者的脂肪性胰岛素抵抗一样。这也是体重反弹的原因之一。
chinese.english: Recent human studies from our lab  have documented that whereas systemic inflammation,  whole-body/skeletal muscle/hepatic insulin resistance, hypertension, dyslipidemia, and hyperglycemia all are reversed by weight loss, adipose tissue insulin resistance and hypoperfusion  are not. This is consistent with the notion that GLUT4 translocation defects are inducible and reversible in myocytes but not in adipocytes . Like fat-specific insulin resistance in obesity-prone individuals, catecholamine resistance of adipose tissue does not regress with weight loss , partly explaining a tendency to regain the lost weight.

chinese.chinese: 欧洲分子生物学室（EMBL）的科学家在原本令人失望的试验结果中得到了一项重要的发现。这项发现发表在本周《Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences》的在线版本上。
chinese.english: Ruffell D, Mourkioti F, Gambardella A, Kirstetter P, Lopez RG, Rosenthal N, Nerlov C. 2009. A CREB-C/EBPbeta cascade induces M2 macrophage-specific gene expression and promotes muscle injury repair. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2009 Oct 13;106(41):17475-80（附件）.

chinese.chinese: 这种相关性弱，没有进一步研究无法保证饮食上的变化。英国剑桥Strangeways研究室的公共卫生和初级保健部的营养与癌症的MRC中心的首席调查者Heather Ward告诉路透社健康版。
chinese.english: The associations are weak and without further study do not warrant changes in diet, lead investigator Heather Ward, of the MRC Center for Nutrition and Cancer in the Department of Public Health and Primary Care at Strangeways Research Laboratory in Cambridge, England, told Reuters Health.

chinese.chinese: 卡尔加里大学的研究人员发现在罂粟植物中特定基因如何产生类似从开花植物中提取的可待因和吗啡药物的止痛效用。根据罂粟如何产生这些化合物的研究，科学家也许可以通过基因工程改良植物或在室生产这样的镇痛药物。这样可以帮助他们更有效和经济地控制生物加工装置以生产可待因和其他镇痛类药物。
chinese.english: University of Calgary researchers have found how specific genes inside the poppy plant produce the painkilling power of drugs like codeine and morphine that are derived from the flower. And by understanding how the opium poppy produces these compounds, scientists may be able to manipulate the production of opiates by genetically engineering plants or manufacturing them in a lab. This could help them produce codeine and other opiate drugs more efficiently and economically in controlled bioprocessing facilities.

chinese.chinese: 这项研究发表在旧金山举行的美国化学学会春季研讨会上，Brownlee博士指出，下一步将招募志愿者，研究它们在室模型上的效果能否在人体重现，以及这些食物在普通膳食中能否被接受。
chinese.english: Presenting their findings at the American Chemical Society Spring meeting in San Francisco, Dr Brownlee said the next step was to recruit volunteers and study whether the effects they have modelled in the lab can be reproduced in real people, and whether such foods are truly acceptable in a normal diet.

chinese.chinese: 纽约时报今天早晨象里维尔（Paul Revere：美国银器工匠，在美国独立战争期间，英军计划发动突袭，里维尔得知后连夜骑马通知独立人士，英军的到来）沿街骑马似的宣布了仿制药浪潮的到来，报纸宣称，对于除了制药商以外的所有人，这是个好消息。
chinese.english: The New York Times plays Paul Revere this morning, riding through the streets declaring that a tidal wave of generics is approaching — good news, the paper suggests, for everyone except the pharmaceutical industry.

chinese.chinese: 国会能源和商务委员会今天分别致信强生公司及FDA，要求其提供2004年FDA发给强生Cordis关于药物涂布支架Cypher安全警告信的更多资料。John Dingell 及 Bart Stupak在今天的信中指出，FDA检查员发现大量系统性违规操作，导致Cypher支架质量低劣。尽管存在大量违规操作，FDA仍然允许Cordis继续生产Cypher 支架。这封信由华尔街日报的Anna Wilde Mathews交给健康博客。
chinese.english: The House Committee on Energy and Commerce sent out letters today to Johnson & Johnson and the FDA, asking for more information about a warning letter the FDA sent to J&J's Cordis unit in 2004 about its drug-coated stent called Cypher. FDA inspectors found “numerous systemic violations resulting in the adulteration of Cypher stents,” reps John Dingell and Bart Stupak note in today's letters, which the WSJ's Anna Wilde Mathews sent to the Health Blog. “Despite these numerous violations, however, Cordis was allowed to continue marketing Cypher stents.”

chinese.chinese: 药品开发专业公司Foldrx，专门聚焦于那些蛋白质折叠成错误三维结构的相关疾病。今天宣布的协议为期五年，当公司取得阶段性成果时，比如有药物进入了I期临床试验，基金会将启动对这家公司的赞助。虽然离药物上市还有很远的路要走，但是如果候选公司最后成功了，基金会将有权获得特许使用费。
chinese.english: The company, FoldRx, specializes in developing drugs for diseases associated with proteins that fold into the wrong three-dimensional shape. The five-year deal announced today will fund the company as it hits milestones, including bringing two cystic fibrosis drugs into Phase I trials. That's still a long way from getting a drug to market, but if the candidates pan out, the foundation would be eligible for royalties.

chinese.chinese: FDA很快就会满意：一旦今天发布的规定实施，制造商们将不能在他们的产品说明中使用“sunblock”这个词，荷曼称。
chinese.english: The agency may soon find satisfaction: Manufacturers will no longer be able to call their products sunblock if the rules proposed today are put into effect, Holman said.

chinese.chinese: 研究指出，对于这个群体的更深入的研究将有助于心理学家更好的理解和治疗它们的行为，最近实验表明，最近室实验表明，人们可以接受培训，提高他们的自我行为控制能力，更好的限制冲动，调节情感和注意力，麦克奈特说，实际上，当他们接受自我控制测试时，接受训练的人更自律，这包括身体锻炼，花销，饮食习惯，这将提高人的意志力
chinese.english: The researchers suggest that further studies of this subset group can help psychologists better understand and treat the behaviors. "Recent laboratory experiments suggest that people can be trained to enhance their self-control capacities and thus better inhibit impulsive urges and regulate emotions and attention," says McKnight. "Essentially, training people to be more self-disciplined - whether in physical workout routines or finances or eating habits - improves willpower when their self-control is tested."

chinese.chinese: 这种脑偏好性侵袭可能和隐球菌在野生环境中在富含肌醇的植物上生长从而被驯化有关。文章的第一作者Chaoyang Xue博士（Ph.D.）如是说。Xue博士之前在Heitman博士的室从事博士后研究，现在是新泽西药学和牙科大学公共健康研究所的一名助理教授。“实际上，我们对隐球菌基因组方面的研究表明，这种病原性酵母菌的肌醇转运分子比所有其他真菌界的真菌都要多。”
chinese.english: This specialized brain attack likely occurred because these fungi adapted to grow on plants in the wild, which also are abundant in inositol, said lead author Chaoyang Xue, Ph.D., formerly a postdoctoral research associate in the Heitman lab and now an assistant professor at the Public Health Research Institute at the University of Medicine and Dentistry of New Jersey (UMDNJ). "In fact, this pathogenic yeast has more inositol transporters than all other fungi we have compared it to in the fungal kingdom, based on what we know from genome research."

chinese.chinese: 在2007年和2008年发生了引起死亡和过敏反应的污染事件之后，在美国药典（USP）（一家非赢利性的标准设立组织）的提议下，通过生产工艺的控制使肝素制剂发生了变化。该机构首次于2009年10月在一项由heartwire最初报告的健康警告中，提醒医生和公众有关肝素效价的改变。最近在FDA的要求下进行的室检验证实了新肝素制剂的效价有降低。
chinese.english: The heparin reformulation is the result of manufacturing controls occurring in the wake of the 2007 and 2008 contamination that were linked to deaths and allergic reactions and was proposed by the US Pharmacopeia (USP), a nonprofit standards-setting organization. The agency first alerted physicians and the public about the change in the potency of heparin in October 2009, a health alert that was previously reported by heartwire . These most recent laboratory tests, requested by the FDA, confirm the reduced potency of the new heparin.

chinese.chinese: 据今年早些时候我们引用的一位分析师的报道，该复方药丸计划曾被搁置了一段时间，原因是前期的临床试验结果不理想。但是公司随后再次进行了临床试验，今天的声明证明先灵葆雅一定提交了一些它认为足以保证得到批准的数据。
chinese.english: The combo-pill plan was shelved for a while, because early trials were underwhelming, according to an analyst report we cited earlier this year. But the combo has been back in clinical trials lately, and today's announcement suggests there must be some data somewhere that Schering-Plough deems good enough to win approval.

chinese.chinese: 先灵葆雅似乎决意通过其与默克合作开发的一种复合了先灵的抗过敏药克敏能和默克的抗哮喘药顺尔宁的药丸来打一场翻身仗。今天早晨，先灵公司的主页向世界宣布，FDA已同意考虑该公司的复合药丸申请。同一时间，搜索默克公司的网页，未发现该报道。
chinese.english: Schering-Plough seems pretty fired up about its joint venture with Merck to create a single pill combining Schering's allergy medicine Claritin with Merck's asthma drug Singulair. This morning, Schering's home page proclaimed to the world that the FDA had agreed to consider the companies' application for the combo pill. A search of Merck's Web site, on the other hand, found no mention of the news.

chinese.chinese: 今天美国妇产科学协会预期放出一个警告，用于使妇女对名如“更加年轻的阴道”和“设计更有弹性的阴道”等名称的生殖器整形手术提起注意，《华尔街日报》报道。
chinese.english: The American College of Obstetricians and Gynecologists is expected to issue a warning today, cautioning women against genital cosmetic surgeries with names like “vaginal rejuvenation” and “designer vaginoplasty,” the WSJ reports.

chinese.chinese: 但是，对于支架制造商强生和波士顿科技公司来说，没有更多关于支架的坏消息就已经可以称得上“好消息”了。来自莱曼兄弟公司的分析师托尼－巴特在今天早上的备忘中写到，“总的来说，今年的ESC年会对于支架制造商来说，情况要比去年好一些。如果没有出现比之前已有的证据，那么就不会再有负面影响了。”
chinese.english: On the bright side for stent makers, including Johnson & Johnson and Boston Scientific, an absence of more bad news on stents may be enough to constitute good news. Overall, this year's meeting is better than last year's for stent makers “if for no other reason than there have been no major negative surprises,” Lehman Brothers' analyst Tony Butler writes in a note this morning.

chinese.chinese: 3年后，当Carl Novina（Phillip Sharp室的博士后，我在Tufts时认识他，当时他还是一个研究生）跑来给我看他准备发表的新闻（即哺乳动物细胞中也存在类似的RNA干扰现象）时，我的好奇心得到了极大的满足。Tom Tuschl已经发现细胞内一些基因可以被导入的一小段双链RNA沉默。Carl想探究这一方法能否被用于抑制HIV感染免疫细胞。想到我们如果能用这些小干扰RNA来阻断HIV感染人类，这前景太诱人了！
chinese.english: My curiosity was thus piqued when 3 years later Carl Novina, a postdoc in Phillip Sharp's lab whom I had known when he was a graduate student at Tufts, came to me with the still-unpublished news that RNA silencing also functions in mammalian cells. Tom Tuschl had found that genes could be silenced by introducing small double-stranded RNAs into a cell. Carl wanted to find out if this method could be used to inhibit HIV infection of immune cells. The prospect was tantalizing. What if we could use small interfering RNA to block HIV infection in humans?

chinese.chinese: 今天发表在《内科医学总览》一篇论文显示：关于可能由处方药导致的严重伤害和死亡的报道在1998至2005年间如流星焰火般爆发，但是并不清楚送到FDA的报告暴涨是否真实反映了因严重不良反应受害的人数增长。
chinese.english: Reports of serious injuries and deaths that may have been caused by prescription drugs skyrocketed between 1998 and 2005, says a paper published today in the Archives of Internal Medicine. But it's unclear if the jump in reports to FDA reflects a true increase in the number of people who suffered serious side effects.

chinese.chinese: 根据今天报道在美国心脏病协会2012科学会议及同期在线出版的新英格兰医学杂志中爱因斯坦肺栓塞（PE）研究结果，在治疗肺栓塞（PE）上，口服抗凝血药利伐沙班（Xarelto，拜耳）至少与标准治疗方案（注射低分子量肝素后加法华林）效果相当。
chinese.english: The new oral anticoagulant rivaroxaban (Xarelto, Bayer) is at least as effective as the standard therapy of injected low molecular weight heparin (LMWH) followed by warfarin for the treatment of pulmonary embolism (PE), according to the results of the EINSTEIN PE study reported today at the American College of Cardiology 2012 Scientific Sessions and simultaneously published online in the New England Journal of Medicine .

chinese.chinese: 但是根据控制感染及流行病学学会和美国微生物学会今天公布的调查显示，典型的实验室实验结果周期可能没有期望那么好。在实验室和预防感染之间的合作是消除障碍的关键，而且有效的处理一些护理相关感染。
chinese.english: But, according to a survey released today by theAssociation for Professionals in Infection Control and Epidemiology (APIC) andthe American Society for Microbiology (ASM), the typical turnaround time forlaboratory test results may not be meeting expectations. Greater collaborationbetween labs and infection preventionists may hold the key to addressing thegap -- and to more effective management of some HAIs.

chinese.chinese: 最新数据显示，当今三分之一的澳大利亚年轻人将会患上糖尿病。今天，澳大利亚糖尿病协会对全国健康数据的最新评估显示，目前有150万的澳大利亚人患有糖尿病。该协会说，未来十年，澳大利亚糖尿病发病率至少翻一倍，并预测到2025年将有300万人患有2型糖尿病。
chinese.english: According to the latest figures, one in three oftoday's young Australians will go on to develop diabetes. A new assessment of nationalhealth data released by Diabetes Australia today shows 1.5 millionAustralians currently have diabetes. It says the diabetes rate is likely to atleast double in Australia over the next decade, and predicts 3 million peoplewill have type 2 diabetes by 2025.

chinese.chinese: 然而，在今天的一篇福布斯专栏文章里，Avik Roy，一位经常批评政府官僚主义作风的纯左翼作家声称新的TREAT法案和原来的版本相比显得苍白无力。首先，他写道，Hagan，北卡罗莱纳州的民主党人，已经试图提出一项议案，以允许开发者寻求进入临床二期实验的临时性批准。
chinese.english: In a column in Forbes today, though, Avik Roy--a frequent critic of government bureaucracy and left-wingers of all stripes--maintains that the new TREAT Act is a pale version of its original form. Initially, he writes, Hagan, a North Carolina Democrat, had sought to offer a proposal that would have allowed developers to go after a provisional approval with Phase II data.

chinese.chinese: 據bmj.com今天公布的一項研究，日常食用過多白米飯，會大大增加罹患2型糖尿病的風險。
chinese.english: According to a study published today on bmj.com, consuming to much white rice regularly considerably increases the risk of developing type 2 diabetes.

chinese.chinese: “我们深知今天快速的生活方式需要移动工具来帮助我们颠倒忙碌的日程并且简化信息的容量，我们需要经营我们的日常生活，”Fidelity投资的执行副总裁Julia McCarthy说道，“为此，Fidelity一直在为人们研发一系列新的有魅力的方式来借助其移动设备可以更轻易的方式获取工作场所福利，不管人们身在何处。”
chinese.english: “We understand that today's hectic lifestyles require mobility tools to help us juggle busy schedules and simplify the volume of information we need to manage our daily lives,” said Julia McCarthy, executive vice president, Fidelity Investments. “In response, Fidelity is continually developing new and engaging ways for people to leverage their mobile devices for easier access to their workplace benefits wherever they are.”

chinese.chinese: 在心脏处于收缩期时它不可再接受刺激而收缩(指人工引起肌肉收缩的强直)。
chinese.english: (Tetanization is the process of artificially inducing muscular contraction.

chinese.chinese: 心脏的休息期(称为舒张期)比骨骼肌的舒张期长。
chinese.english: ) The heart's rest period, called a diastole, is somewhat longer than that of skeletal muscles.

chinese.chinese: 自主神经系统的交感分枝通过心脏加速神经来加快心跳，而副交感分枝通过心脏抑制神经来减慢心跳。
chinese.english: The sympathetic division of the ANS increases heartbeat through cardioaccelerator nerves and the parasympathetic division decreases heartbeat through cardioinhibitor nerves.

chinese.chinese: 心电描记器可用来测定起源于心脏的电冲动,将描记器的电极(金属板)接触在病人的腕部和踝部，将另一个吸盘样电极接触在病人的胸部。
chinese.english: The electrical impulses originating in the heart can be measured by an electrocardiograph whose electrodes (metal plates) are attached to an individual's wrists and ankles and to his chest with a suction cup.

chinese.chinese: 在心室舒张期后心脏处于休息阶段，这称为心舒张后期。
chinese.english: Throughout the ventricular rest the heart is in a resting stage called diastasis.

chinese.chinese: 动脉将血液带离心脏而静脉将血液送回心脏。
chinese.english: An artery transports blood away from the heart whereas a vein brings blood to the heart.

chinese.chinese: 体循环的动脉将氧合血液送至全身,而肺动脉将脱氧的血液送至肺,肺将氧化的血通过肺静脉送回心脏。
chinese.english: The arteries of the systemic circulation carry oxygenated blood throughout the body; the arteries of the pulmonary circulation, however, carry deoxygenated blood to the lungs, which send oxygenated blood back to the heart through the veins.

chinese.chinese: 血液通过主动脉(体循环)和肺动脉干(肺循环)离开心脏。
chinese.english: Blood leaves the heart through the aorta (systemic circulation) and through the pulmonary trunk (pulmonary circulation).

chinese.chinese: 上腔静脉将头、颈和上肢的血液送回心脏(进入右心房)，下腔静脉将身体其余部分的血液送回心脏(也进入右心房)。
chinese.english: The superior vena cava returns blood to the heart (enters the right atrium) from the head, neck, and upper extremities and the inferior vena cava returns blood from the rest of the body (again through the right atrium).

chinese.chinese: 血液进入胎儿心脏后，大部分从右心房通过卵圆孔进入左心房。
chinese.english: Most of the blood entering the fetus passes through the foramen ovale and into the left atrium.

chinese.chinese: 静脉虽然容纳着全身血液总量的60％左右，但它不像动脉那样直接影响心脏。
chinese.english: Unlike the arteries, the veins, which contain about 60% of the body's total blood volume, don't have the direct help of the heart.

chinese.chinese: 心脏传导阻滞：从心房传到心室的电冲动受阻。
chinese.english: Heart block: Electrical impulses from the atria to the ventricles are obstructed.

chinese.chinese: 心脏传导阻滞有两种类型：房室阻滞(发生在房室结)和束支性传导阻滞(希斯氏束的一个分支阻滞)．
chinese.english: Two types of heart block are AV block, which occurs in the atrioventricular node, and bundle-branch block, in which one of the branches in the bundle of His is blocked.

chinese.chinese: 心脏传导阻滞分三期：
chinese.english: There are three degrees of heart block:

chinese.chinese: 把人工心脏起搏器植入腋窝内并连接至右心房，用它来纠正心脏传导阻滞。
chinese.english: An artificial pacemaker leading to the right ventricle may be implanted in the axilla to correct heart block.

chinese.chinese: 通过我们的共同努力，发现乳腺肿瘤干细胞表达的microRNA远远少于分化更高的肿瘤细胞，尤其是let-7家族（人类有11个成员）。let-7是进化上最古老的microRNA之一，Ruvkun室发现它能调控蠕虫从幼虫到成虫的转化（蜕变）。我们对let-7的功能分析越多，越对它感兴趣。let-7在肿瘤干细胞中不表达，但随着细胞的分化，它的表达水平逐渐增高。当我们用腺病毒转染外源性的let-7到肿瘤干细胞时，可促使它分为为对治疗敏感的肿瘤细胞。惊奇的是，过表达let-7减少了小鼠形成肿瘤的数目、并且转移也降低了。
chinese.english: Our collaborative effort revealed that the breast cancer stem cells expressed far fewer microRNAs than their more differentiated counterparts. One family of microRNAs stood out: the let-7 family containing 11 related sequences in humans. let-7 is one of the most evolutionarily ancient microRNAs that Ruvkun's lab had shown regulates the larval-to-adult transition in worms. The more we looked at this microRNA in functional assays, the more interesting it became. let-7 was not expressed in cancer stem cells, but its expression increased as the cell differentiated. When we infected cancer stem cells with a lentivirus expressing let-7, we could force their differentiation into treatment-susceptible cancer cells. Surprisingly, forced expression of let-7 also reduced the number of tumors formed in the mouse and reduced their metastases.

chinese.chinese: 这种新方法可直接应用于细胞和组织切片，能够研究从多种疾病的样本中遗传变异的作用，其中包括，特别是癌症病人。这种方法是在Mats Nilsson教授指导下研发出来的，他是Uppsala大学Rudbeck室遗传学和病理学系分子诊断学教授。研究结果刚刚发表在《Nature Methods》杂志上。
chinese.english: The new method, which is directly applicable to cell preparations and tissue sections, should enable studies of the effects of genetic variation in patient samples from a variety of diseases, including, particularly, cancer. The method was developed under the supervision of Mats Nilsson, Professor of Molecular Diagnostics at the Department of Genetics and Pathology, Rudbeck Laboratory, Uppsala University. The findings have just been published as an article in the journal Nature Methods.

chinese.chinese: 麦罗塔是于2000年5月通过FDA的快速审批程序而获准上市的。该程序允许FDA根据替代终点来批准用于治疗当前医学无法满足的严重疾病的药物，所谓替代终点是一种用于代替直接检查患者感受、功能恢复或存活情况的临床终点的室研究或身体体征。
chinese.english: Mylotarg was approved in May 2000 under the FDA's accelerated approval program. This program allows the agency to approve a drug to treat serious diseases with an unmet medical need based on a surrogate endpoint – a laboratory measurement or a physical sign used as a substitute for a clinically meaningful endpoint that directly measures how a patient feels, functions, or survives.

chinese.chinese: 麦罗塔已被批准用于治疗60岁及以上伴有复发性AML且不考虑接受其他化疗的患者。该药的最初获批是基于在3项临床试验中的142名AML患者中所观察到的反应比率的替代终点（如在室检验中显示白血病减少或消失的患者百分比）。
chinese.english: Mylotarg was approved to treat patients ages 60 years and older with recurrent AML who were not considered candidates for other chemotherapy. The initial approval was based on the surrogate endpoint of response rate (i.e., the percentage of patients whose leukemia decreased or disappeared in laboratory tests), observed in 142 patients with AML across three clinical trials.

chinese.chinese: 科学家发现两种潜在的人类抗体可以在室阻止90%以上全球已知的HIV毒株感染人类细胞，并且已经阐释了其中一种与该疾病抗争的蛋白是如何完成这项壮举的。
chinese.english: Scientists have discovered two potent human antibodies that can stop more than 90 percent of known global HIV strains from infecting human cells in the laboratory, and have demonstrated how one of these disease-fighting proteins accomplishes this feat.

chinese.chinese: 目的 为了更新HIV感染成人诊治的推荐意见，使用了国际上先进的抗逆转录病毒药物，同时应用先进的室设备进行监测。对于何时开始抗逆转录病毒治疗、选择何种合适的开始方案、病情的监测、更换治疗方案的时间、病情改变时的预案等，该报告提供了指导性建议。
chinese.english: Objectives To provide updated recommendations for management of HIV-infected adults, using antiretroviral drugs and laboratory monitoring tools available in the international, developed world setting. This report provides guidelines for when to initiate antiretroviral therapy, selection of appropriate initial regimens, patient monitoring, when to change therapy, and what regimens to use when changing.

chinese.chinese: FDA正在设法确定能够从中国进口产品进行认证的室，并提供必要的培训，加快中国商品在美国的结关速度。
chinese.english: The FDA offices would try to identify and train laboratories that can certify shipments for faster clearance into the United States, with the goal of ultimately accepting inspections by Chinese quarantine and inspection agency AQSIQ.

chinese.chinese: 茶匙泥土中约含1万种细菌，但其中仅有1%（容易在室培养）为我们带来了抗生素、抗癌药及其他有用的药物。
chinese.english: A teaspoon of dirt contains an estimated 10,000 species of bacteria, but it's only one percent of these microbial bugs — the ones that can be grown easily in a lab — that have brought us antibiotics, anticancer agents and other useful drugs.

chinese.chinese: 正建在诺华现有基地旁边的新室，将成为其集团在中国的产品孵化地，同时也将服务于整个亚太地区。
chinese.english: The new facility, which is being constructed adjacent to an existing Novo Nordisk plant, will be the company's primary production site in China, while also serving the entire Asia Pacific region.

chinese.chinese: 他建议，为了避免错误的警报，运动后24小时人们应避免室检查。他说，如果不这样做，“你在寻求被探察出异常的结果。”
chinese.english: To avoid false alarms, he suggests that patients avoid lab tests within 24 hours of exercise. If not, he said, “you are asking for abnormalities to be detected.”

chinese.chinese: 在80年代初期的那次的经历，使APPLE医生对剧烈运动后的室检查结果产生了好奇，随后他对此问题进行了系统性的研究，证明了运动后的影响。
chinese.english: That experience, in the 1980s, made Dr. Apple curious about lab tests after strenuous exercise, and led him to systematically study the problem, documenting the exercise effect.

chinese.chinese: 人们从酵母的老龄化中发现了一个线索。大约十几年前，Sinclair和同事在麻省理工学院的Leonard Guarente室发现蛋白质SIR2能稳定酵母基因组，但是当有DNA 发生断裂的时候，这个就蛋白质离开它的岗位去参与DNA修复，使基因启动，酵母不能增殖，也就是呈现衰老的特点。
chinese.english: One clue lay in what happens in yeast. About ten years ago, Sinclair and colleagues at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology lab of Leonard Guarente discovered that the protein Sir2 stabilized the yeast genome, but when there was a break in DNA, the protein left its post and went to effect repairs, allowing genes to switch on that leave yeast sterile, a characteristic of aging.

chinese.chinese: 这是波士顿马萨诸塞州哈佛医学院病理和Glenn衰老室的Dr David Sinclai和他在美国其他的研究中心的同事所做的研究，并发表在11月28日的Cell杂志上。
chinese.english: The discovery was the work of Dr David Sinclair of the Department of Pathology and Glenn Labs for Aging Research, Harvard Medical School, Boston, Massachusetts, and colleagues from other research centres in the US, and is published as a study in the 28 November issue of the journal Cell.

chinese.chinese: 凯尔西称，主要担忧预期的立法细节问题，此次立法会为非专利生物制品审批铺平道路。企业喜欢称之为仿制生物制品，（我们仍称之为非专利药。）与其他生物技术公司一样，基因泰克也认为，对于希望推出赫赛汀（Herceptin ）仿制药的公司而言，应该通过大量的临床试验数据证明其仿制品与原研药效果类似，而非仅仅进行相对简单的室分析，虽然传统仿制药获准上市就只需提供这种简单分析即可。
