chinese.english: One worry, Kelsey said, is the details of expected legislation to pave the way for approval of generic biotech drugs — the industry likes to call follow-on biologics. (We still call them generics.) Genentech, like its biotech brethren believes companies companies wanting to bring, say, a Herceptin knockoff to market should be required to prove its similarity to the real McCoy with data from a substantial clinical trial-not just a relatively simple lab analysis that is required to get conventional generics to the market.

chinese.chinese: 为了避免假阳性，他建议病人在运动后24小时内避免室检查。他说，如果不这样，“你就是故意要得到异常结果。”
chinese.english: To avoid false alarms, he suggests that patients avoid lab tests within 24 hours of exercise. If not, he said, “you are asking for abnormalities to be detected.”

chinese.chinese: Concert制药公司，今天宣布开始CTP-499治疗糖尿病肾病的二期临床研究。糖尿病肾病是美国引起慢性肾脏病的主要原因。CTP-499打算加到现在的标准治疗中，像血管紧张素转换酶抑制剂或者血管紧张素受体阻断剂的治疗，可以预防或缓解由糖尿病肾病或其他类型慢性肾脏病引起的肾脏损伤。
chinese.english: Concert Pharmaceuticals, Inc. today announced the initiation of dosing in a Phase 2 clinical trial evaluating CTP-499, an investigational drug for the treatment of diabetic nephropathy, the leading cause of chronic kidney disease (CKD) in the US. CTP-499 is intended to be additive to the current standard of care, angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitor (ACEi) or angiotensin receptor blocker (ARB) therapy, to prevent or slow progression of kidney damage in diabetic nephropathy and other types of chronic kidney disease.

chinese.chinese: 美国食品及药物管理局（FDA）今天批准对所有他汀药物做出新的标签更改：服用他汀可能升高血糖及糖化血红蛋白HbA1c水平。
chinese.english: Taking a statin can raise blood sugar and glycosylated hemoglobin HbA1c levels, according to a new labeling change approved by the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) today for the entire drug class [1].

chinese.chinese: 今天，即2月27日，周一，在IOP出版社呼吸研究杂志发表的研究中，研究人员发现硫化氢（H2S）增加成体干细胞分化成肝细胞的能力，这一研究将提高它们的声誉，它将成为未来肝细胞治疗的可靠材料。
chinese.english: In a study published today, Monday 27 February, in IOP Publishing's Journal of Breath Research, researchers showed that hydrogen sulphide (H2S) increased the ability of adult stem cells to differentiate into hepatic (liver) cells, furthering their reputation as a reliable source for future liver-cell therapy.

chinese.chinese: 但是发表在今天澳大利亚《医学杂志》上的研究发现，澳大利亚推荐的三个小时运动量与爱尔兰建议的60分钟明显不同,而美国的国家体育与运动协会呼吁每天应进行60分钟有组织的体育活动和“几个小时”的自由运动。
chinese.english: But the review published today in the Medical Journal of Australia has found Australia's three-hour recommendation to be markedly different to the 60 minutes that Ireland advises parents is required, while the US National Association for Sport and Physical Education calls for 60 minutes of structured physical activity and "several hours" of unstructured play.

chinese.chinese: 在今天的委员会会议中, Qnexa药物给患者带来何种疾病不良反应，非代理机构专家和公司行政人员讨论应该针对该问题进行风险评估和制定减轻损失的策略。在今天的专家小组投票之前，分析师从FAD的简报文档要旨中推测，代理机构因为寻求额外的安全信息可能延误Qnexa的许可批准，
chinese.english: During today's committee session, non-agency experts and company officials discussed having a risk evaluation and mitigation strategy for Qnexa to limit any ill effects of the drug on patients. Prior to today's panel vote, analysts had speculated from the tenor of the FDA's briefing documents that the agency might delay approval of Qnexa to seek additional safety information.

chinese.chinese: 这项新研究旨在探讨溶栓药物是否可安全的用于患有中风的儿童患者。研究结果在今天刊出并将于2012年4月21至28日在新奥尔良市召开的第64届美国神经病学年会上宣读。
chinese.english: New research looks at whether clot-busting drugs can safely be given to children who have strokes. The research was released today and will be presented at the American Academy of Neurology's 64th Annual Meeting in New Orleans April 21 to April 28, 2012.

chinese.chinese: 由英国癌症研究院资助的科学家们发现核磁共振成像技术（MRI，一种测量肿瘤中水分子运动情况的技术）可能是检测患有晚期卵巢癌女性对治疗反应最好的方法。这项研究今天已经发布在了《放疗学》杂志。
chinese.english: Cancer Research UK-fundedscientists have determined that a magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) technique,which measures the movement of water molecules within the tumour, may be thebest way to monitor how women with late-stage ovariancancer are responding to treatment. The study ispublished in the journal Radiology today.

chinese.chinese: 美国食品与药品管理局（FDA）今天批准Tyzeka (替比夫定)用于成人慢性乙型肝炎的治疗。慢性乙型肝炎是由乙型肝炎病毒（HBV）侵犯肝脏引起持续感染、肝脏瘢痕化（肝硬化），最终导致肝癌、肝衰竭及死亡的严重病毒感染性疾病。FDA 称Tyzeka是一种包含有效成分的新药，之前从未批准以任何形式在美国销售。
chinese.english: The Food and Drug Administration (FDA) today approved Tyzeka (telbivudine) for the treatment of adults with chronic hepatitis B (HBV), a serious viral infection that attacks the liver and can cause lifelong infection, scarring of the liver (cirrhosis), and eventually liver cancer, liver failure, and death. Tyzeka is a new molecular entity, which is a term used by the FDA to describe a medication containing an active substance that has never before been approved for marketing in any form in the United States.

chinese.chinese: 根据新闻稿，此项调查结果今天于华盛顿一个名为抑制大型流感模型社区的医学研究会提出。这个疾病防控中心目前致力于推出社区抑制方法并希望12月份能发布。
chinese.english: The survey results were to be presented today in Washington, DC, at an Institute of Medicine workshop called Modeling Community Containment for Pandemic Influenza, according to the news release. The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention is currently working on recommendations about community containment measures and is expected to issue them in December.

chinese.chinese: 圣路易大学肝脏中心的科学家在今天的研究报告中提出一种对目前药物治疗无应答型丙肝更为有效治疗方法。
chinese.english: Saint Louis University Liver Center scientists are presenting research today on a more effective way to treat hepatitis C patients who have been unresponsive to current drug therapies.

chinese.chinese: 吸烟已被认为是导致许多肿瘤治疗效果不佳的罪魁祸首。今天Fox Chase肿瘤中心的研究者们将吸烟与前列腺癌放疗后的急性副作用联系起来。这项研究已于今天在费城召开的美国肿瘤及放射治疗协会第48届年会上提出。
chinese.english: Smoking has been found to contribute to poorer outcomes for people treated for many kinds of cancer and now, researchers at Fox Chase Cancer Center have associated smoking and acute side-effects following radiation therapy for prostate cancer. The study was presented today at the 48th Annual Meeting of the American Society for Therapeutic Radiology and Oncology in Philadelphia.

chinese.chinese: John Eaton教授今天（星期三，11月8号）在欧洲癌症治疗研究组织-国立癌症研究所-美国癌症协会关于分子靶向与癌症治疗专题讨论会上发表了一个新的简报：“我们发现给小鼠接种干细胞后，再接种路易士肺癌，移植的干细胞对80%-100%的小鼠有预防作用，对暴露在造成肺癌的致癌物质中的小鼠，移植的干细胞对60%-90%的小鼠有预防作用”。
chinese.english: Professor John Eaton told a news briefing at the EORTC-NCI-AACR [1] Symposium on Molecular Targets and Cancer Therapeutics in Prague today (Wednesday 8 November): "We found that the vaccinations were between 80-100% effective in preventing tumour growth in mice that were subsequently challenged with transplanted Lewis lung carcinoma, and it was between 60-90% effective in mice subsequently exposed to carcinogens that cause lung cancer.

chinese.chinese: 今天，国际糖尿病联盟主席Pierre Lefebvr教授说，糖尿病是破坏人类社会和经济的发展的全球性问题。
chinese.english: Professor Pierre Lefebvre, president of the IDF, today described diabetes as a "global problem of devastating human, social and economic impact".

chinese.chinese: 自然遗传学杂志今天发表的一篇文章说，发现了果蝇精子细胞中381种蛋白质，随着研究深入，还会发现更多，这是第一个真正针对高等真核细胞中全部蛋白质的研究。
chinese.english: Research published in Nature Genetics today describes 381 proteins present in sperm of the fruit fly, Drosophila melanogaster. Whilst more proteins may be identified as research progresses, this study marks the first substantial 'whole-cell' characterisation of the protein components of a higher eukaryotic cell (a cell in which all the genetic components are contained within a nucleus).

chinese.chinese: 今天的报告还显示高脂饮食促使脂肪细胞产生趋化因子，后者使炎症性的白细胞进入脂肪组织。在免疫系统中起重要作用的巨噬细胞及T细胞聚集在脂肪组织中，引发糖尿病和心脏病。
chinese.english: Research presented today shows that a high fat diet leads fat cells to produce molecules called chemokines, which attract inflammatory white blood cells into fat tissue. Both macrophages and T cells , which play a critical role in the immune system, accumulate in fat tissue, beginning the process that leads to disease.

chinese.chinese: 心脏的一些区域变得和起搏区一样，引起心跳减弱和不规整。
chinese.english: Several areas of the heart act as pacemakers and heartbeat is weak and uncoordinated.

chinese.chinese: 心脏杂音是心脏瓣膜闭合不全产生的不正常心音。
chinese.english: Heart murmurs are abnormal heart sounds produced as a result of heart valves not closing completely.

chinese.chinese: 细菌引起的心脏病
chinese.english: Heart disease resulting from bacteria

chinese.chinese: 风湿性心炎：由于风湿热，心脏的全部组织都发炎(心炎)，结果使心脏瓣膜变形。
chinese.english: Rheumatic carditis: As a result of rheumatic (discharge) fever, all areas of the heart tissue may become inflamed (carditis), causing the heart valves to be deformed.

chinese.chinese: 细菌性心内膜炎 心内膜发炎，特别是瓣膜内壁发炎，本病患者有感染病史、心脏杂音和瓣膜脱落形成的栓子。
chinese.english: Bacterial endocarditis: The membrane lining the heart becomes inflamed, especially the lining of the valve, affection, irregular heart murmur, and embolization of pieces of heart valve accompany this disease.

chinese.chinese: 将导管经周围血管插入大血管或心腔内以观察心脏的解剖结构或进行专门的功能试验，这一手术称心导管插入术。
chinese.english: Cardiac catheterization is a procedure in which a catheter, by way of a peripheral artery, is introduced into a chamber of the heart or one of the major vessels so that the anatomy of the heart can be visualized and specific function tests performed.

chinese.chinese: 此外，还有心血管造影术(将一种专门的染料注入心脏以进一步检查心脏的机能和发现可能的堵塞)也可以在插管时进行。
chinese.english: In addition, an angiocardiography, the injection of a special dye into the heart for further testing of function and possible occlusion, can also be performed during cardiac catheterization.

chinese.chinese: 通过动脉推进导管直至它到达心脏为止。
chinese.english: From this point it is moved through the artery until it reaches the heart.

chinese.chinese: 特别是眼、肾和心脏的动脉硬化也会出现。
chinese.english: The blood vessels of the eye, kidneys, and heart are especially susceptible to diabetic-induced arteriosclerosis.

chinese.chinese: 心脏病用药：强心药使心肌兴奋而加强心脏的收缩。
chinese.english: Cardiac drugs: Cardiotonic agents stimulate heart muscle and strengthen the contractions of the heart.

chinese.chinese: 心脏抑制药减慢心率并使快速而无规律的心跳恢复为缓慢的正常心跳。
chinese.english: Cardiac depressants slow the heart rate and reduce quick, irregular heartbeats to slow, normal beats.

chinese.chinese: 因此，心脏抑制药又称为抗心率失常药。
chinese.english: For this reason, cardiac depressants are called antiarrhythmic agents.

chinese.chinese: (5)循环系统包括心脏和血管以及由淋巴结和淋巴管组成的淋巴系统。
chinese.english: (5) The circulatory system, comprising the heart and blood vessels and including the lymphatic system composed of lymph nodes and lymph vessels.

chinese.chinese: 心脏和血管又常称为心血管系统。
chinese.english: The heart and the blood vessels are often referred to as the cardiovascular system.

chinese.chinese: 动脉将血液由心脏带到毛细血管床。
chinese.english: Arteries carry blood away from the heart to the capillary bed.

chinese.chinese: 80年代的这次经历，让Apple博士对大强度体育活动后的室检查产生兴趣，并引导他对这个问题进行系统研究，记录运动效应。
chinese.english: That experience, in the 1980s, made Dr. Apple curious about lab tests after strenuous exercise, and led him to systematically study the problem, documenting the exercise effect.

chinese.chinese: MicroIslet在过去十几年研发1型糖尿病的室治疗期间花了5000万美元，这包括移植从猪胰腺收集的产生胰岛素细胞到糖尿病患者，让糖尿病患者放弃注射胰岛素。这项来自国家美国北卡罗莱纳州杜克大学的先进治疗技术，在动物身上进行了试验，但是没有用于人身上。
chinese.english: MicroIslet spent $50 million during the past decade developing an experimental treatment for Type 1 diabetes that would involve transplanting insulin-producing cells harvested from the pancreas of pigs into diabetics to allow them to forego insulin injections. The treatment, tested in animals but not in humans, came from technology developed at Duke University in Durham, North Carolina.

chinese.chinese: UCL细胞与发育生物学（室？）的Roberto Mayor博士领导的这一最新研究在活体组织中成功的捕捉到了这一现象并阐明了它的机制，由于它确实在起作用，因此它可能会成为将来肿瘤治疗的新标靶。
chinese.english: The latest UCL study led by Dr Roberto Mayor, UCL Cell and Developmental Biology, has captured the phenomenon 'in vivo' – in living tissue – and has identified the mechanism by which it works, suggesting possible new targets for future cancer therapies.

chinese.chinese: 这一方法是法国国家科学研究中心的认知神经科学和脑成像室与位于法国巴黎的Pitié-Salpêtrière总医院的神经放射科及急性中风中心的合作的结果。Charlotte Rosso及其共同作者进行的这一研究的结果在线发表在放射线学杂志网站，结果表明这一新技术可以怎样利用常规临床MR扫描仪帮助在几分钟内预测中风梗塞的严重性。
chinese.english: The approach results from the collaboration of the Cognitive Neuroscience & Brain Imaging Laboratory of the French National Center for Scientific Research (CNRS) (2), the Neuroradiology Department and the Acute Stroke Centre (3) of the Pitié-Salpêtrière General Hospital in Paris France. The results of the study from Charlotte Rosso and her coauthors – which are published online on the Radiology journal web site – demonstrate how this new technique may help predict within minutes the severity of stroke infarcts using a conventional clinical MR scanner.

chinese.chinese: 李凌衡室与研究所的其他几个支持的研究室合作开发一种新技术——干细胞体外成像或者EVISC——来监测干细胞的机能活动。这种技术是研究团队能够跟踪被植入老鼠体内的造血干细胞的归巢。研究结果被记载在李凌衡室2003年造血干细胞利基的研究发现中（张 等，2003年10月23日发行的Nature）。
chinese.english: The Linheng Li Lab collaborated with several of the Institute's support facilities to develop a new technology — ex vivo Imaging of Stem Cells, or EVISC — to monitor the dynamic behavior of stem cells. This technology enabled the team to track the homing of hematopoietic stem cells after being transplanted in mice. The findings build on the Linheng Li Lab's 2003 discovery of the hematopoietic stem cell (HSC) niche (Zhang, et al. in the October 23, 2003 issue of Nature).

chinese.chinese: 斯托瓦斯医学研究所的李凌衡室确定出骨髓干细胞利基的精确位置。 今天，研究结果发表在了在线自然研究进展刊物上。
chinese.english: The Stowers Institute's Linheng Li Lab has identified the precise location of the bone marrow stem cell niche. The findings were published today in the Advance Online Publication of Nature.

chinese.chinese: 俄勒冈州大学室的研究人员在调控DNA甲基化机制方面的研究已经走在了世界前列，DNA甲基化是一个基本的生物学过程，它将甲基添加到生物体细胞中的遗传物质DNA上。
chinese.english: Researchers in a University of Oregon lab have shed more light on the mechanism that regulates DNA methylation, a fundamental biological process in which a methyl group is attached to DNA, the genetic material in cells of living organisms.

chinese.chinese: 来自Kawakami et al,的结论与之前Sacks and Yoshida室公布的数据一起证明，载脂蛋白CIII具有对内皮细胞功能直接的影响作用，并提出载脂蛋白CIII在单核细胞中活动的分子机制观点。内皮细胞功能紊乱是导致动脉粥样硬化起源出现在最早期的异常里。在临床可由人们代谢紊乱有动脉硬化风险而探知。19、尽管确切的关于载脂蛋白CIII/TLR2途径的病理生理机制还需通过适合的动物模型来研究，TRL2缺乏小鼠在易感动脉粥样硬化的LDL受体缺乏的基因环境下喂养表现为显著的抗动脉粥样硬化进展的作用。然而，这可能涉及分离出的高甘油三酯血征不是主要的心血管风险因素（其伴随升高的血浆载脂蛋白CIII浓度）。这不同于载脂蛋白CIII诱导内皮细胞功能紊乱是单独的动脉粥样硬化事件，它和其它在人类伴ALP致动脉粥样硬化刺激因素的协同作用相类似，总之，这种新的发现证实载脂蛋白CIII是血脂障碍和内皮功能紊乱的分子连接，心血管疾病的特征表现。
chinese.english: The results from Kawakami et al,17 together with the previous data published by the laboratories of Sacks and Yoshida,13–16 demonstrate that apoCIII has a direct effect on endothelial functions and provide insights on the molecular mechanisms of apoCIII actions on monocytes. Endothelial dysfunction is a causal factor in the initiation of atherosclerosis and among the earliest abnormalities that can be detected clinically in people with metabolic disorders at risk for atherosclerosis.19 Although the exact pathophysiological relevance of the apoCIII/TLR2 pathway remains to be studied using appropriate animal models, TRL2-deficient mice bred on the atherosclerosis-susceptible LDL receptor–deficient genetic background displayed a significant protection against atherosclerosis development.18 However, it should be noted that isolated hypertriglyceridemia, which is accompanied by elevated plasma apoCIII concentrations, is not a major cardiovascular risk factor. Hence, it is unlikely that apoC

chinese.chinese: 霍华德.休斯医学研究会宣布，他们会出资2500万美元，帮助科学家把室研究成果转变为新的临床医学治疗，这是一项独特研究人才培养项目资助资金。
chinese.english: The Howard Hughes Medical Institute has announced that it will award up to $25 million in new grants to build on a unique program that prepares scientists to translate laboratory discoveries into new medical treatments.

chinese.chinese: 使用氯法拉滨后可出现需紧急处理的室异常，这些异常包括在半数以上病人中出现的3级或更高级的白细胞减少(87.7%),、淋巴细胞减少(82.3%),、血小板减少(79.8%)、贫血(75.4%)和嗜中性白血球减少症(63.7%)。
chinese.english: The incidence of treatment-emergent laboratory abnormalities after clofarabine administration may occur; the abnormalities occurring in more than half of patients at grade 3 or higher are leukopenia (87.7%), lymphopenia (82.3%), thrombocytopenia (79.8%), anemia (75.4%), and neutropenia (63.7%).

chinese.chinese: 实验背景：大学附属医院室
chinese.english: Setting: Research laboratory of a university hospital.

chinese.chinese: Dr. Palmenberg说，这个家族的病毒目前在室还不能培养，但可以通过它们与其他鼻病毒的共同序列来研究其基因。
chinese.english: This family of virus cannot at present be grown for study in the laboratory, Dr. Palmenberg said, but can now be researched genetically through the common elements they share with other rhinoviruses.

chinese.chinese: 非放射性单链构型多态性分析  非放射性单链构型多态性分析（SSCP）按照我们室以前报道的方法分析。
chinese.english: Nonradioactive single-strand conformation polymorphism analysis Nonradioactive single-strand conformation polymorphism (SSCP) analysis was performed with a protocol established in our laboratory, as reported previously.

chinese.chinese: vectical乳膏适用于十八岁以上中重度斑块型银屑病的治疗。临床研究中最常见不良反应（发生率大于3%）包括室检查异常，小便异常，银屑病，高钙血症，瘙痒。皮肤不适感也有报告。对钙代谢异常、正在服用钙剂或者维生素D，或服用升高血钙药物的患者都应当慎用此药。如果钙代谢紊乱发生，应当停用该药直到钙恢复正常。应当提醒患者在用药期间避免过多自然光或人造光的暴露。如果发生严重刺激感，应停药。避免该药接触眼睛，嘴唇和面部。vectical ointment在孕妇和哺乳期妇女的研究尚未进行。每周用药不超过200g。
chinese.english: Vectical(TM) Ointment is indicated for the topical treatment of mild to moderate plaque psoriasis in patients 18 years and older. The most frequent adverse events reported in clinical trials (>3%) were lab test abnormality, urine abnormality, psoriasis, hypercalciuria and pruritus. Skin discomfort has also been reported. Vectical(TM) Ointment should be used with caution in patients with known or suspected disturbances in calcium homeostasis, who are taking calcium or Vitamin D supplements, or who are on medications known to increase serum calcium levels, such as thiazide diuretics. If aberrations in parameters of calcium metabolism occur, Vectical(TM) Ointment should be discontinued until these normalize. Patients should be cautioned to avoid excessive exposure to natural or artificial sunlight after applying the ointment. If severe irritation occurs discontinue use. Avoid contact with eyes, lips and face. Vectical(TM) Ointment has not been studied in pregnant or nursing women. Use

chinese.chinese: 布什的这一活动5年来提供了150亿美元，以用于200万人的治疗，700万人的预防，和1000万人的护理。今天白宫宣称，超过800，000人正接受延长生命药物。
chinese.english: The Bush initiative committed $15 billion over five years to support treatment for 2 million people, prevention for 7 million and care for 10 million. The White House says that today, more than 800,000 people are receiving lifesaving drugs.

chinese.chinese: 这项国际研究纳入4360名新诊断为2型糖尿病的患者，研究结果发表在今天的《新英格兰医学杂志》上，并在国际糖尿病联盟第19届世界糖尿病大会上公布。
chinese.english: The results of this international study involving 4,360 people recently diagnosed with type 2 diabetes were today published in the New England Journal of Medicine and presented at the 19th World Diabetes Congress of the International Diabetes Federation (IDF).

chinese.chinese: 研究人员在今天出版的《神经科学》杂志上发表的文章报道，健康志愿者服用能够提高神经递质5-羟色胺和去甲肾上腺素的抗抑郁药后，他们能够感觉到低浓度的不同味道（咸、甜、酸和苦），即意味其味觉能力得以提高。
chinese.english: The researchers gave healthy volunteers antidepressant drugs that increase levels of the neurotransmitters serotonin and noradrenaline. They report today in the Journal of Neuroscience that these tests resulted in the volunteers being able to detect different tastes (salt, sugar, sour, and bitter) at lower concentrations, thus enhancing their ability to taste.

chinese.chinese: 从今天开始，本田汽车将关闭原先指定的户内吸烟区。同时，根据禁烟令，禁止在一些烟雾可能会飘进室内的户外区域吸烟。
chinese.english: Starting today, Honda's designated inside smoking areas will close. Smoking also no longer will be allowed at some exterior locations where smoke could waft into open doorways, a violation of the ban.

chinese.chinese: 因此，反吸烟团体不断做宣传，提醒各行各业从今天开始要消灭吸烟。
chinese.english: So anti-smoking groups are working to remind businesses that today is the day to snuff out cigarettes.

chinese.chinese: 禁烟令今天起生效，30天前，58%俄亥俄州的选民支持该法令。
chinese.english: The law takes effect today, 30 days after 58 percent of Ohio voters chose to enact it.

chinese.chinese: 病人的血压、胆固醇以及其他心脏健康的室指针都接近正常水平。目前研究人员正在研究这种药物是否能够预防健康人心血管疾病的发生而不仅仅是治疗已经患病的人。
chinese.english: The patients had near normal levels of blood pressure, cholesterol and other laboratory markers of heart health. The researchers are studying whether the pill can prevent cardiovascular disease from developing in healthy people, rather than treating people who are already ill.

chinese.chinese: 研究结果今天在线报告（12月10日），并预期刊登在自然医学杂志上。
chinese.english: The findings are reported today (December 10) online and are scheduled to appear in the January issue of Nature Medicine.

chinese.chinese: 今天《自然》杂志上发表了一篇深入研究疼痛机制的文章，这篇论文可能引起更有效治疗疼痛的方法的发展。
chinese.english: The research, published today in the journal Nature, provides insight into the mechanics of pain and could lead to the development of more effective pain treatments.

chinese.chinese: (美国)食品及药物管理局今天批准Invega帕利瑞酮进入临床治疗精神分裂症，帕利瑞酮是一种新的分子药物，这种药物中包含一种在美国市场上从来没有批准过的活性物质。帕利瑞酮是利培酮主要的活性代谢物，利培酮是已经上市的治疗精神分裂症的药物。
chinese.english: The Food and Drug Administration (FDA) today approved Invega (paliperidone) extended-release tablets for the treatment of schizophrenia. Paliperidone is a new molecular entity, which means this medication contains an active substance that has never before been approved for marketing in any form in the United States. Paliperidone is the principal active metabolite of risperidone, a marketed drug for treating schizophrenia.

chinese.chinese: Progen产业公司(ASX: PGL; Nasdaq: PGLA)今天宣布了PI-88治疗原发性肝癌肿瘤切除术后患者的II期临床试验初步结果呈阳性。试验表明PI-88使肿瘤复发时间延长了76%。
chinese.english: Progen Industries (ASX: PGL; Nasdaq: PGLA) today announced positive preliminary results from its Phase II clinical trial of PI-88 for the treatment of patients with primary liver cancer following surgical resection of the tumour. The trial demonstrated that PI-88 increased time to tumour recurrence by 76%.

chinese.chinese: 联合国大会今天通过了一份具有划时代意义的决议，承认糖尿病带来的全球性恐怖。这是政府第一次承认一种非传染性疾病如传染性疾病（例如HIV/AIDS、肺结核、疟疾）那样对全球人民健康存在严重威胁。
chinese.english: The United Nations General Assembly has today passed a landmark Resolution recognizing the global threat of the diabetes epidemic. For the first time, governments have acknowledged that a non-infectious disease poses as serious a threat to world health as infectious diseases like HIV/AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria.

chinese.chinese: 研究人员称，该发现可为某些癌症的新的早期筛查方法建立基础，其文章发表在今天的科学医学公共图书馆杂志网络版上。
chinese.english: The findings, which researchers say could form the basis for a new early detection screen for certain cancers, are published today in the online journal Public Library of Science Medicine.

chinese.chinese: 今天（2006年12月13日）该研究在图卢兹举行的EVGN年会（12月11日－14日）上公布。由于研究数据还是初步数据，因此该结果应用于人类还需要很长时间。然而，这些令人鼓舞的结果促使科学家们开始了一系列新的实验，旨在研究VPC分泌的能愈合糖尿病溃疡的物质特性。
chinese.english: The research was presented today, December 13th 2006, at the Annual EVGN Conference which is taking place in Toulouse (Dec. 11-14). As they are still preliminary data, the applications of these results to man are still far in the future. However, these extremely encouraging results prompted the scientist to start a whole set of new experiments aimed at the characterization of the compounds secreted by the VPCs, which are responsible for the healing properties on diabetic ulcers.

chinese.chinese: 科学家发现了新的干细胞的来源，在实验室中已经可以用来制造肌肉、骨骼、脂肪、血管、神经和肝细胞。这种更易获得的干细胞来源于包围胚胎的羊水中。关于这种干细胞来源的首篇报道刊登在今天的《Nature Biotechnology》。
chinese.english: Scientists have discovered a new source of stems cells and have used them to create muscle, bone, fat, blood vessel, nerve and liver cells in the laboratory. The first report showing the isolation of broad potential stem cells from the amniotic fluid that surrounds developing embryos was published today in Nature Biotechnology.

chinese.chinese: 2007年一月11日荷兰化学集团Akzo Nobel公司下属的医疗保健机构Organon（欧加农）公司宣称今天已经向日本卫生局递交新抗抑郁药米尔塔扎平（在大多数国家叫做瑞美隆）新药2007年中期上市的申请，晚于预期三年。
chinese.english: OSS, The Netherlands, Jan. 11, 2007-Organon-the human healthcare business unit of Akzo Nobel - announced today that it anticipated filing a new drug application for its novel antidepressant mirtazapine (known as Remeron® in most countries) to Japanese health authorities (PMDA) towards the middle of 2007, three years earlier than expected.

chinese.chinese: 心脏收缩间期动脉压的维持有赖于弹性动脉的弹性。
chinese.english: The maintenance of blood pressure within the arterial system between contractions .of the heart results from the elasticity of the elastic arteries.

chinese.chinese: 静脉将血液由毛细血管床回流到心脏。
chinese.english: Veins return blood to the heart from the capillary bed.

chinese.chinese: 许多静脉有瓣膜防止血液倒流，并保证血液流向心脏。
chinese.english: Many veins contain valves which prevent backflow of blood and encourage the flow of blood toward the heart.

chinese.chinese: 自主神经系(ANS)的神经和神经节将神经冲动传至心脏、平滑肌和腺体。
chinese.english: The autonomic nervous system (ANS) is a system of nerves and ganglia concerned with the distribution of impulses to the heart, smooth muscles and glands.

chinese.chinese: 在健康心脏，左心室室壁厚约为右心室的三倍。
chinese.english: In healthy hearts, the wall of the left ventricle is about three times as thick as the wall of the right ventricle.

chinese.chinese: 室间隔膜部是室间隔缺损的常发部位，单纯室间隔缺损或合并其他心异常，在所有先天性心脏病中约占50％。
chinese.english: The membranous part of the interventricular is the common site of a ventricular septal defect, isolated or associated with other cardic anomalies, is present in about 50 % of all congenital abnormalities of the heart.

chinese.chinese: 神经纤维沿大动脉(沿冠状动脉形成冠状动脉丛)和静脉到达心脏。
chinese.english: The nerve fibers reach the heart along the great arteries (forming coronary plexuses on the coronary vessels) and veins.

chinese.chinese: 中心腱的中央部位于心脏下方。
chinese.english: The middle part of the central tendon lies just inferior to the heart.

chinese.chinese: 由于纤维心包会合于中心腱，故心脏紧密地固着于膈。
chinese.english: The heart is held closely to the diaphragm because the fibrous pericardium is fused with the central tendon.

chinese.chinese: 由于血液可能还有组织内的胆固醇含量与缺血性心脏病有关，因而任何可能降低β-羟-β-甲基戊二酰coA还原酶活性的因素在控制此病时引人注意。
chinese.english: Since the blood and probably the tissue content of cholesterol is associated with ischemic heart disease, any factor potentially decreasing the activity of β-hydroxy-β-methyl glutaryl coenzyme A reductase is of interest in the control of the condition.

chinese.chinese: 任何清除胆固醇的措施对有缺血性心脏病危险性的人都有预防作用。
chinese.english: Any removal of cholesterol is thought to be prophylactic against ischaemic heart disease in those subjects at risk.

chinese.chinese: 这项分析中包括的4名介入心脏病医生都是有经验、高负荷工作的操作者，他们承担了半夜的PCI，每人每4天值一次夜班，每人每年约处理240例PCI病人。PCI 1/4发生在晚上11点至凌晨6点（这正是忙碌的医生应该休息的时间），因此他们每6天的值班要做一次半夜PCI。
chinese.english: The four interventional cardiologists involved in this analysis were experienced, high-volume operators. The operators shared the workload for middle-of-the-night PCIs, with each being on-call once every four days, and each treated approximately 240 patients annually for primary PCI. One in four primary PCIs occurs between the hours of 11 PM and 6 AM, the hours when a busy doctor should be in bed, leading doctors to respond to a middle-of-the-night primary PCI once every sixth night of being on call.

chinese.chinese: 最近在线发表于欧洲心脏病预防杂志上的这份调查纳入了65名香港的老年人，其中29名来自当地的太极拳会馆，每周至少练习1.5小时，已有3年。另外36名受试者没有经过太极拳练习。所有受试对象的身体活动水平都根据代谢指数分为轻、中、重三度，不过在两组间没有不同。
chinese.english: The study, recently published online in the European Journal of Preventive Cardiology, involved 65 elderly subjects from Hong Kong, 29 recruited from local Tai Chi clubs who had each practised Tai Chi for at least 1.5 hours a week for three years, and 36 controls with no Tai Chi experience. All subjects' physical activity levels were defined according to metabolic index unitsas light, moderate and heavy -- but there were no differences between the two groups.

chinese.chinese: Crudu在heartwire上这样介绍，人们通常认为出现医疗差错风险的上升与医务人员的睡眠不足有关，一些研究报道了一些医学门类人员加班执行医疗活动会增加不良后果的发生。医生在彻夜未眠后会出现更多的工作失误，这会对病人的康复造成严重不良影响，尤其是那些在加班时间施行多例急诊PCI术的介入手术专家们。这次参与研究的几位心脏介入手术专家们常常会在半夜被召回心导管室施行急诊PCI，而且第二天早上还得继续开展日常手术。
chinese.english: To heartwire, Crudu said that sleep deprivation among medical personnel is known to increase the risk of medical errors and that some studies have reported an increase in adverse outcomes in medical procedures performed after hours in other medical specialties. Errors in the performance of doctors tends to be higher after a night without sleep, and this can significantly impact patient care, especially because a large number of primary PCIs are done after hours. Interventional cardiologists who respond to calls in the middle of the night are often back in the cath lab the next morning to handle their regular caseload.

chinese.chinese: 受试者被问及睡眠持续时间后可根据其回答分为三组：1)少于六小时者 2)六至八小时之间者 3)多于八小时者。每个患者还需回答是否患有充血性心力衰竭，心脏病，冠状动脉疾病，心绞痛以及中风。协变量如年龄、性别、总胆固醇、高密度脂蛋白、收缩压、吸烟室、糖尿病、体重指数用来校正分析。调查者亦要对已被证实与心脏病相关的睡眠暂停以及其他睡眠障碍进行控制。
chinese.english: Respondents were asked about sleep durationand subsequently stratified into one of three categories: 1) less than sixhours of sleep a night, 2) between six and eight hours of sleep a night, 3)over eight hours of sleep a night. Each patient was also asked if they wereever told they had congestive heart failure, heart attack, coronary arterydisease, angina or stroke. Analyses adjusted for covariates such as age,gender, total cholesterol, high-density lipoprotein, systolic blood pressure,smoking status, diabetes mellitus and body mass index. Investigators alsocontrolled for sleep apnea and other sleep disturbances that have previouslybeen linked to heart problems

chinese.chinese: 为了获得进一步增长，无锡药明康德正在筹建两个主要项目。在苏州筹建的毒理室，将于2009年下半年提供non-GLP毒理试验服务，于2010年中可提供GLP毒理试验服务。无锡药明康德承认该室将增加2009年的运营成本，并且直到2010年才能带来显著收益。该公司同时也扩大了金山的生产车间，该工程将于2009年底完成。该车间将专用于III期临床试验产品的后期中间体及原料药（APIs）的工业化生产。
chinese.english: To improve future growth, WuXi has two major projects underway. It is building a toxicology facility in Suzhou that will begin providing non-GLP toxicology services in the second half of 2009 and GLP toxicology services in mid-2010. WuXi admitted that the plant will incur operating costs in 2009, but won't generate significant revenues until 2010. The company is also expanding its manufacturing facility in Jinshan, a project that should be completed by the end of 2009. This facility will be devoted to commercial-scale manufacture of advanced intermediates and APIs for products in late-stage-development.

chinese.chinese: 公司称，中国核心业务的基本增长率为45%。2009年，无锡药明康德预期中国的室外包业务收益将进一步增长15%-20%。不过，中国国内的生产外包业务将减少。公司在2008年上半年获得一大单生产外包业务，该业务为2008年全年带来4850万美元的收益。
chinese.english: The company said organic growth in its core China operations was 45%. For 2009, WuXi expects revenue growth in its China-based Laboratory Services will increase a further 15% to 20%. Manufacturing in China will be lower, however. The company had a single large manufacturing project in the first half of 2008, which brought that business up to $48.5 million for full-year 2008.

chinese.chinese: 无锡药明康德报告称，2008年室外包业务翻倍，达2.05亿美元。其中中国国内的室外包服务占大部分，为 1.473亿美元。其余的就是AppTec的检测服务业务，包括生物制药和医学检测，收益为5270万美元。无锡药明康德进一步称，已经中止的AppTec生产外包业务也在2008年带来830万美元的收益。在无锡药明康德收购AppTec后的十一个月内，AppTec共带来5770万美元的收益。
chinese.english: WuXi reported that its Laboratory Services business doubled to $205 million in 2008. The majority of that came from China Lab Services revenues of $147.3 million. The remainder, called AppTec testing services and consisting of ***aceutical and medical testing, works out to $52.7 million. WuXi further said that AppTec's discontinued manufacturing business added $8.3 million in revenues. WuXi listed AppTec's contribution to revenues at $57.7 million over the eleven months it was part of WuXi.

chinese.chinese: 研究设计与方法：将Ⅱ型糖尿病患者随机分到五个dapagliflozin剂量组，二甲双胍XR组 及安慰剂组研究观察12周。主要目标是比较糖基化血红蛋白（A1C）相对于基线的平均变化情况。其他目标还包括对空腹血糖（ FPG ） ，体重，不良事件及室测量值的比较。
chinese.english: RESEARCH DESIGN AND METHODS— Type 2 diabetic patients were randomly assigned to one of five dapagliflozin doses, metformin XR, or placebo for 12 weeks. The primary objective was to compare mean change from baseline in A1C. Other objectives included comparison of changes in fasting plasma glucose (FPG), weight, adverse events, and laboratory measurements.

chinese.chinese: 我们使用病人水平和透析设备水平的Cox模型分析评估病人死亡风险。该模型使用口服罗格列酮患者的透析设备属性作为预报因子（工具变量方法）、人口的调节模型、共条件、室价值和实现透析剂量。
chinese.english: We assessed mortality risk using Cox models in patient-level and dialysis facility–level analyses that used the facility proportion of patients on rosiglitazone as the predictor (instrumental variable approach) and adjusted the models for demographics, comorbid conditions, laboratory values, and achieved dialysis dosage.

chinese.chinese: 基于这个发现的新药物正在研发过程中，位于Lyon的de la国立科学研究中心和Buck研究所是神经生物技术公司的协作单位，负责将室发现带到临床试验中去。
chinese.english: Research is underway to develop a drug based on the findings. The Buck Institute and the CNRS in Lyon are partnering with Neurobiological Technologies Inc., to bring the discovery from the laboratory to clinical trials.

chinese.chinese: 美国亚特兰大佐治亚理工研究所生物学学院；美国亚特兰大Emory大学医学院人类遗传学系；美国亚特兰大理工学院研究院光电系统室
chinese.english: School of Biology, Georgia Institute of Technology, Atlanta, GA 30332, USA; Department of Human Genetics, Emory University School of Medicine, Atlanta, GA 30322, USA; Electro-Optical Systems Laboratory, Georgia Tech Research Institute, Atlanta, GA 30332, USA

chinese.chinese: 研究发现，高浓度NNAL的室动物有较高的肺癌发病率，但它对人类的影响尚不清楚。
chinese.english: Studies have found that laboratory animals with high concentrations of NNAL had higher rates of lung cancer, but its effect in humans has not been clear.

chinese.chinese: 最近一代来自不同室的所有雄性和条件AR敲除小鼠的特性显示AR信号传导对男性外部和内部表型发育的必要性。
chinese.english: The recent generation and characterization of male total and conditional AR knockout mice from different laboratories demonstrated the necessity of AR signaling for both external and internal male phenotype development.

chinese.chinese: 第一个相关研究是Ralph Steinman博士1973年在洛克菲勒大学室，以及目前在洛克菲勒室工作的是细胞生理和免疫学Henry G. Kunkel教授，发现了一种以前未知的白细胞，命名为树突状细胞。这种中枢细胞被证明是固有免疫的“迷失的链接”;作为其中央调节器，他们接触细菌并引发第一步免疫反应。树突状细胞对入侵者非常警惕，“告诉”其它叫T细胞的白细胞增殖，好“打击敌人”或发送信息给其它细胞来忽略不引起机体伤害的因素。
chinese.english: The first revelation came in 1973 at a lab at Rockefeller University when Dr. Ralph Steinman, who is now the Henry G. Kunkel Professor in Rockefeller's Laboratory of Cellular Physiology and Immunology, discovered a previously unknown type of white blood cell—which he named the dendritic cell. These pivotal cells turned out to be the “missing link” in innate immunity; as its central regulator, they process germs to initiate the front-line immune response. Dendritic cells, ever watchful for invaders, “tell” other white blood cells called T-cells to multiply and get the immune system ready to “fight the enemy” or they give the word to other cells to ignore agents that will not harm the host.

chinese.chinese: 下列国家报告了室确诊病例，但无人死亡：加拿大（6）新西兰（3）英国（2）以色列（2）西班牙（2）
chinese.english: The following countries have reported laboratory confirmed cases with no deaths – Canada（6）, New Zealand (3), the United Kingdom (2), Israel (2) and Spain (2).

chinese.chinese: 美国政府报告了64例室确认的人患病例，无人死亡。
chinese.english: The United States Government has reported 64 laboratory confirmed human cases, with no deaths.

chinese.chinese: 本指南适用于对怀疑猪流感A（ H1N1）病毒感染患者的临床标本进行诊断试验或执行病毒分离操作的室工作人员。
chinese.english: This guidance is for laboratory workers who may be processing or performing diagnostic testing on clinical specimens from patients with suspected swine influenza A (H1N1) virus infection, or performing viral isolation.

chinese.chinese: 今天早晨新闻发布会的声明以后，又发布了一个卫生官员周五作出的决定，隔离位于贝尔蒙的Bonnie Brae Terrace，一个生活着164位老人的生活中心。包括至少3个职员在内的大约85个人被诺瓦克(norovirus)病毒感染。
chinese.english: The announcement at a press conference this morning follows a decision by health officials on Friday to quarantine Bonnie Brae Terrace, an independent living center in Belmont that houses 164 seniors. About 85 people became sick with norovirus there, including at least three staffers.

chinese.chinese: OncoMed制药公司曾开发以肿瘤干细胞为靶点的新疗法。在今天出版的《新英格兰医学杂志》上他们宣布一种新的基因表达标签与致瘤性乳腺癌细胞有关，这种细胞也被称为肿瘤干细胞。肿瘤干细胞是在实体肿瘤中发现的一个小的细胞亚群，其具有自我更新和分化、引发肿瘤并促进肿瘤生长、复发和转移的能力。研究人员发现，基因表达标签与乳腺癌以及其他某些类型的实体肿瘤的临床结果具有很高的相关性。这篇题为“来自于致瘤性乳腺癌细胞的基因标签的预后作用”的研究是由OncoMed制药公司、密歇根大学和斯坦福大学的研究人员合作完成的，其中包括OncoMed实验室的共同创立者Michael Clarke博士，他目前是斯坦福大学干细胞生物和再生医学研究所的副所长。
chinese.english: OncoMed Pharmaceuticals, a company developing novel therapeutics that target cancer stem cells, today announced the publication in the New England Journal of Medicine of the discovery of a novel gene expression signature associated with tumorigenic breast cancer cells, also known as cancer stem cells. Cancer stem cells, a small subset of cells found in solid tumors, have the capacity to self-renew and differentiate, initiate tumors and drive tumor growth, recurrence and metastasis. Researchers found that the gene expression signature is highly correlated with clinical outcomes in patients with breast cancer and certain other types of solid tumors. The study, titled "The Prognostic Role of a Gene Signature from Tumorigenic Breast Cancer Cells," was conducted collaboratively by researchers at OncoMed Pharmaceuticals, the University of Michigan and Stanford University, including the lab of OncoMed co-founder Michael Clarke, MD, currently Deputy Director of the Stanford Institute for Stem

chinese.chinese: FDA今天发布了关于生产胎盘/ 脐带血产品的生产许可证申请草案，为厂家生产满足医疗使用条件的脐带血产品提供了获得许可证的一系列流程。
chinese.english: The Food and Drug Administration (FDA) today issued a draft guidance recommending a streamlined path to licensure for establishments that manufacture cord blood for certain medical conditions.

chinese.chinese: 其中美国政府报告109名室确诊病例（1人死亡），么西哥报告97名确诊病例（7人死亡)
chinese.english: The United States Government has reported 109 laboratory confirmed human cases, including one death. Mexico has reported 97 confirmed human cases of infection, including seven deaths.

chinese.chinese: 墨西哥已改变了其公布感染新AH1N1病毒患者数目的方式——现在是等待室确认病例的结果，而不是以前的推测。
chinese.english: Mexico has changed the way it reports its figures on victims from the new AH1N1 virus, waiting to get laboratory confirmation of cases rather than trying to speculate.

chinese.chinese: 此研究结果今天在线发表在癌症杂志上，其书面形式将在3月1日美国癌症协会所属的期刊上发表。
chinese.english: The results, reported on-line today in Cancer, a journal of the American Cancer Society, will be published in the March 1 print issue of the journal.

chinese.chinese: 这项研究结果今天将在母婴医学会在旧金山召开的一个会议上公布。
chinese.english: Results of the study are to be reported today at a meeting of the Society for Maternal-Fetal Medicine in San Francisco.

chinese.chinese: 今天在美国变态反应、哮喘和免疫学学会(the American Academy of Allergy, Asthma & Immunology， AAAAI)的年会上报导了这项调查资料。
chinese.english: The survey data (poster #896) were presented today at the annual meeting of the American Academy of Allergy, Asthma & Immunology (AAAAI).

chinese.chinese: 这项研究的结果在今天的«儿科和青春期医学档案»出版了,它是美国同类儿科学研究中有史以来最大的.研究者把“脱离标签”定义为一种特殊的药物用于年龄低于食品和药品管理局批准的药物使用年龄范围的病人.然而有些药物,就像扑热息痛,很少被“脱离标签”的使用,而强力的镇静药如异丙酚,咪达唑仑,和芬太尼, Shah说,被经常开处方.在这项研究中“脱离标签”的使用吗啡发生在27.8%的所有儿童.
chinese.english: The findings, published today in Archives of Pediatric and Adolescent Medicine, are the result of the largest-ever U.S. pediatric study of its kind. Researchers defined "off label" as the use of a specific drug in a patient younger than the Food and Drug Administration-approved age range. While some drugs, like acetaminophen, were found to be rarely used off label, powerful sedatives like Propofol, Midazolam and Fentanyl, says Shah, were commonly prescribed. Off-label morphine was used in 27.8 percent of all children in the study.

chinese.chinese: 首次发现作用于细菌外壁令人琢磨不透的药物靶点详尽图像给科学家提供足够的新信息以帮助设计新型抗生素。这些药物正是今天治疗由金黄色葡萄球菌和其他病原菌引发的致死性感染。
chinese.english: The first detailed images of an elusive drug target on the outer wall of bacteria may provide scientists with enough new information to aid design of novel antibiotics. The drugs are much needed to treat deadly infections initiated by Staphylococcus aureus and other bacterial pathogens.

chinese.chinese: FHS包括了心血管和其它慢性疾病的危险因素的资料，它涵盖了从1948年到今天马萨诸赛州Framingham城的数代居民。
chinese.english: The FHS contains risk factor data on cardiovascular and other chronic diseases covering several generations of residents in Framingham, Massachussets from 1948 to the present day.

chinese.chinese: 一些高血压的治疗方法可以增加心脏病发作的危险性，而且还能导致更多的人需要使用心脏起搏器，根据今天刊登的一项新的研究结果表明。
chinese.english: Some treatments for high blood pressure could be increasing the risk of heart attacks and causing more people to need cardiac pacemakers, according to new research findings published today.

chinese.chinese: 手术在2000年3月和2001年1月进行,五名患者四男一女年龄在41和56岁之间,已经随访了五年.结果在今天的柳叶刀杂志报道,指出移植物仍然很好在所有的病人体内发挥功效并且他们的疼痛已经缓解.病人不需要正常的被给予移植物受体的免疫抑制药物来维持生命.
chinese.english: The operations were performed between March 2000 and January 2001 and the five patients - four men and a woman then aged between 41 and 56 - were followed up for five years. The results, reported in The Lancet today, show the transplants were still functioning well in all the patients and their pain had improved. None of the patients needed immunosuppressant drugs normally given to transplant recipients for life.

chinese.chinese: 许多常规植入支架以开通动脉的心脏病病人与只有药物治疗的病人相比并没有得到更持久的获益，研究人员今天报道说。
chinese.english: Many heart patients routinely implanted with stents to open arteries gain no lasting benefit compared to those treated with drugs alone, researchers are reporting today.

chinese.chinese: Nathans说“我们今天在这些小鼠中看到的是具有革命性意义的事件，正如同发生在某位很久远的灵长类共同祖先身上的改变一样，这种改变最终使我们今天具有三色视色觉。”
chinese.english: That we are looking at in these mice is the same evolutionary event that happened in one of the distant ancestors of all primates and that led ultimately to the trichromatic color vision that we now enjoy,said Nathans.

chinese.chinese: 德国的这项研究发表在今天（2007/04/13，星期五）的学术期刊生殖上，是由Karim Nayernia教授领导完成的的，Nayernia教授原属Göttingen  大学，现就职于纽卡斯尔生命科学中心的干细胞研究所。
chinese.english: The research published today (Friday, April 13 2007), in the academic journal Reproduction: Gamete Biology, was carried out in Germany* by a team of scientists led by Professor Karim Nayernia, formerly of the University of G鰐tingen  but now of the North-east England Stem Cell Institute (NESCI), based at the Centre for Life in Newcastle upon Tyne.

chinese.chinese: 由英国的Allan Brandley和Martin Turner领导的，和哈佛医学院Klaus Pajewsky领导的两大科学家团队建立了一个敲除产生小RNA基因的小鼠系。他们的报道今天发表在《科学》杂志上。
chinese.english: Two groups of scientists, one led by Allan Bradley and Martin Turner in England and the other by Klaus Rajewsky at Harvard Medical School, had the idea of creating strains of mice from which the gene that generates the micro-RNA had been deleted. Their reports were published today in the journal Science.

chinese.chinese: 总之，对于心脏病学专业或冠心病监护病房的医学生、心脏病科住院医师、心脏病科医师（除非你已经是心力衰竭专家）来说，这一app不可或缺。
chinese.english: This app is a must-have for medical students on a cardiology service or in the CCU, internal medicine residents interested in cardiology, cardiology fellows, and cardiologists in general (unless you're already a heart failure expert).

chinese.chinese: Stone对心脏在线说，对于不完全血运重建，目前还没有统一的定义。
chinese.english: To heartwire, Stone said there is currently no uniform definition for incomplete revascularization.

chinese.chinese: 昨天，这项发现在线发表在美国心脏病学会杂志上。
chinese.english: The findings were published online yesterday in the Journal of the American College of Cardiology.

chinese.chinese: Tanguay说他们使用的低浓度BPA不会引起身体畸形或心脏缺陷。但是正如本研究提示地即使没有身体上的异常，行为缺陷仍然存在。
chinese.english: Tanguay says the low concentrations of BPA they used don't cause physical malformations or cardiac defects. But even without physical abnormalities, behavioral deficits can still occur, as this study indicates.

chinese.chinese: 心脏节律协会目前尚未公布他们的五个滥用和误用干预治疗的注意事项。这似乎是电生理学家进一步探索的大好时机。但现实世界中的电生理专家们却在一个特别的好地方对此事发表评论。
chinese.english: The Heart Rhythm Society has yet to publish its list of five overused and misused interventions. This seems a great time for electrophysiologists to look inward. And real-world EPs are in an especially good place to comment on this matter.

chinese.chinese: 值得注意的是在我的注意事项中没有被提及的可称之为高尚的论述，即更多的特殊的EP问题：小于宽的或无左束支分支传导阻滞（LBBB）的QRS波群的病人的心脏再同步治疗（CRT）。在无症状AF患者中使用不足的CRT起搏点代替了CRT除颤器，或作为阻断抗凝作用和明显的中介性晕倒情况下实施倾斜台实验的一个策略。
chinese.english: Notably absent from my list, call them honorable mentions, are more EP-specific problems: the use of cardiac resynchronization therapy (CRT) in patients with less than wide or non–left-bundle-branch-block (LBBB) QRS complexes, the underuse of CRT pacemakers in lieu of CRT defibrillators, AF ablation in asymptomatic patients or as a strategy to stop anticoagulation, and tilt table testing in cases of obvious neutrally mediated faints.

chinese.chinese: 及早的进行眼部检查可能有助于发现心脏病的早期征兆。
chinese.english: Soon an eye test would be able to pick up the early signs of heart disease.

chinese.chinese: 爱丁堡大学的科学家们对检查眼底视网膜血管的扫描方法进行了改进。他们正在组织一项计划参加人数超过1000名患者的研究课题来验证通过眼部检查早期发现心脏病这个方法的可靠性。
chinese.english: Scientists at the University of Edinburgh have developed the test which scans blood vessels in the retina at the back of the eyes. They are now launching a study involving more than 1,000 patients to see if the test is reliable.

chinese.chinese: 主要研究者Elizabeth Magnuson博士(密苏里州堪萨斯城圣路加中旬美国心脏研究所)告诉heartHearwire：“我们发现，控制患者水平危险因素和饮食中脂肪摄取，胆固醇升高率具有显著变化，多个国家水平影响因素是重要的风险增加预测指标。”
chinese.english: The study was exploratory and not designed to show causation, she acknowledged. However, the findings may help guide national healthcare policy decisions, and they highlight the need "to summon governmental support . . . for programs and policies aimed at forestalling the continued increase in the incidence of cardiovascular disease," she said.

chinese.chinese: 尤其是在高压电极中，这些短路偶尔会是致命性的。按照出席ACC会议的Robert G Hauser博士（Abbott西北医院和明尼阿波利斯心脏研究院，明尼苏达州）的说法，他帮助组织召开了1月份的峰会。
chinese.english: Such shorts in the high-voltage leads, in particular, have occasionally been fatal, according to a presentation at the ACC sessions by Dr Robert G Hauser (Abbott Northwestern Hospital and Minneapolis Heart Institute, MN), who had helped organize and run the January summit.

chinese.chinese: 2010年12月，公司曾经向医生发布了一封有关Riata和Riata ST电极的警示信，当电极被召回时，在1年后，（公司）发布了更强的安全建议—FDA在2011年12月将其重新划分为I类召回，就像心脏在线报道的。已经发现，电极的内部导线能够磨损电极内部并且可以侵蚀透过其绝缘硅胶“露出表面”。整个过程看起来要花费几年的时间，在引起可察觉的电异常之前，总共需约6年的时间。
chinese.english: The company had issued a warning letter about the Riata and Riata ST leads to physicians in December 2010, when it pulled them from distribution, and a stronger safety advisory a year later—which the FDA reclassified as a class I recall in December 2011, as covered by heartwire. It had been found that the leads' internal conductor wires could abrade the inside of and erode through their silicone insulation and "externalize." The process appeared to be taking at least a couple of years and up to about six years before causing detectable electrical abnormalities.

chinese.chinese: 《Archives of Internal Medicine》杂志在线发表的一项荟萃分析结果显示：没有足够的证据表明，omega-3脂肪酸补充剂对有心脏病史的个体间的总体心血管事件具有二级预防作用。
chinese.english: Results of a meta-analysis published Online First by Archives of Internal Medicine, indicate that there is not enough evidence that omega-3 fatty acid supplements have a secondary preventive effect against overall cardiovascular events among individuals who have a history of heart disease.

chinese.chinese: 美国心脏病学会注意事项中要求避免低风险患者接受常规的应激测试，没有做常规超生心电图随访轻度瓣膜病回声的情况下，不得使用紧急的非创伤性的脉管PCI支架。其他主要的医疗协会也增加了五个同样好的注意事项。要点包括：放射科医生建议减少CT扫描在肺栓塞中的初步评估；初级保健医生反对不管三七二十一的使用MRI作为腰痛的初次筛查；肿瘤医生甚至建议不给于恶病质的实体瘤病人化学治疗。
chinese.english: The list from the American College of Cardiology calls for avoiding routine stress testing in low-risk patients, not doing routine follow-up echos in cases of mild valve disease, and not using stents in nonculprit vessels during acute PCI. Other major medical societies have added equally good lists of five. Highlights include: radiologists recommend fewer CT scans in the initial evaluation of pulmonary embolism; primary-care doctors come out against willy-nilly MRIs as the first test for low back pain, and oncologists, even, suggest not giving chemotherapy to debilitated patients with solid tumors.

chinese.chinese: 这个研究“增加了一个小而日渐增长的文献库，（该类文献）显示了确定的严重心脏衰竭患者的血糖控制和生存之间的复杂关系，”未参与这项研究的戴维·阿吉拉尔博士（贝勒医学院，休斯敦，得克萨斯州）告诉heartwire记者。然而，因为这是一项观察性研究，残余混杂因素可能会导致相反结果。
chinese.english: This "adds to a small but growing body of literature demonstrating a complex relationship between levels of glycemic control and survival in patients with advanced, established heart failure," Dr David Aguilar (Baylor College of Medicine, Houston, TX), who was not involved with this research, told heartwire. However, because it was an observational study, residual confounding factors may be contributing to adverse outcomes.

chinese.chinese: 临床实践中的含义是在于“严重心脏衰竭的患者，如果对低血糖或糖尿病药物治疗的其他不良影响难以忍受，那么不是那么严格的血糖控制（糖化血红蛋白<8％）是可以接受的，”他说。另一方面，“如果病人对容忍药物治疗没有困难，在我们等待进一步前瞻性临床试验的信息的同时，目前的血糖准则应继续遵循。”
chinese.english: The implications for clinical practice are that "in someone with advanced heart failure who may be having difficulties with hypoglycemia or other adverse effects of diabetic medications, less stringent glycemic control (HbA1C <8%) may be acceptable," he said. On the other hand, "if patients are tolerating the medications without difficulties, current glycemic guidelines should continue to be followed as we await further information from prospective clinical trials."

chinese.chinese: ActiViews公司今天宣布，其将进一步巩固他们的承诺，领先开展胸腹部肿瘤微创外科手术治疗。
chinese.english: ActiViews公司率先发展了简单、准确及具有成本效益的外科导航解决方案，它已得到美国食品药品管理局的认可，其旗舰产品CT?针引导肝介入治疗系统已投放市场。

chinese.chinese: 欧洲肝脏研究协会在西班牙的巴塞罗那召开第47届年会（国际肝脏会议2012）。吉利德公司今天将在该年会的口头会议上提交他们的发现。
chinese.english: Gilead's findings will be presented today duringan oral session, at the 47th Annual Meeting of the European Association for theStudy of the Liver (International Liver Congress 2012), in Barcelona, Spain.

chinese.chinese: 吉利德科学公司今天宣布该公司的一种试验性丙肝药物对HCV的清除率高达88%。这对丙肝患者来说是个好消息。丙肝对肝脏造成严重损害，并逐步导致肝硬化和肝衰竭，还有可能导致肝癌以及致命的食管和胃底静脉曲张。
chinese.english: Anexperimental hepatitis C drug from Gilead Sciences Inc. cleared the disease in88% of patients, the company announced today. It is great news for sufferers ofthe disease, which wreaks havoc on the liver, slowly causing cirrhosis andliver failure. Other problems can include liver cancer, and life threateningesophageal and gastric varicose.

chinese.chinese: 世界心血管会议今天提供的新数据显示：运动可帮助吸烟者戒烟并维持该状态，而且运动可延长吸烟者和非吸烟者的平均寿命。
chinese.english: Exercise may help smokers to quit and remain smokefree, according to new data presented today at the World Congress of Cardiology. Moreover, exercise increases life expectancy in smokers and non-smokers alike.

chinese.chinese: 更多有关今天食品药品管理局发表声明的消息可在该机构的官方网站获知。
chinese.english: More information about today's FDA announcement is available on the agency'swebsite.

chinese.chinese: 大约30万年前，人类在遗传上就能够适应产生大量的Omega-3和Omega-6脂肪酸。而这种适应在现代人独特脑容量形成的过程中起关键作用。然而在今天的生活环境下，这种遗传性适应则会使一系列疾病，如心血管疾病的风险增高。
chinese.english: About 300 000 years ago humans adaptedgenetically to be able to produce larger amounts of Omega-3 and Omega-6 fattyacids. This adaptation may have been crucial to the development of the unique brain capacity in modern humans. In today's lifesituation, this genetic adaptation contributes instead to a higher risk ofdeveloping disorders like cardiovascular disease.

chinese.chinese: 去年研究发现小鼠棕色脂肪与肌肉的关系要比白色脂肪更紧密，从分子机制上幼稚细胞变为棕色细胞。Kahn室、HMS大学布鲁斯斯皮格曼及HMS和Dana-Farber 癌症研究所的ley J. Korsmeyer 将它发表在自然杂志的相关版块。今年4月9日新英格兰医学杂志的三篇文章继续了以上研究。
chinese.english: The three papers in the April 9 New England Journal of Medicine come on the heels of last year's discoveries in mice of brown fat's closer kinship with muscle than with white fat and of the underlying molecular mechanisms that can turn immature cells into brown fat. That work was published in a related pair of Nature papers from the labs of Kahn and HMS colleague Bruce Spiegelman, the Stanley J. Korsmeyer professor at HMS and the Dana-Farber Cancer Institute (see Focus, Sept. 12, 2008).

chinese.chinese: 本着成为美国肝衰竭研究领域领路者的目标，一群来自马萨诸塞州医学院生物室（MBL）的科学家研制出了能拮抗丙肝病毒的人类单克隆抗体。这种新的抗体能有效的拮抗培养的丙肝病毒，还在临床前丙肝动物模型中起到预防作用。
chinese.english: Taking aim at a leading cause of liver failure in the United States, a team of scientists at the Massachusetts Biologic Laboratories (MBL) of the University of Massachusetts Medical School (UMMS) has developed a human monoclonal antibody that neutralizes the Hepatitis C virus (HCV). The new antibody effectively neutralized the virus in culture, and then prevented infection by the virus in a pre-clinical animal model of the disease.

chinese.chinese: 糖尿病护理医学杂志报道的这个研究，包括652名1型糖尿病女性患者，在10年后，被调查者完成了一份性功能调查问卷，接受了身体测试、心理评估及室检查。
chinese.english: The study, reported in the medical journal Diabetes Care, involved 652 women with type 1 diabetes. After 10-years, the participants completed a sexual function questionnaire and underwent a physical examination, an evaluation of mood, and laboratory testing.

chinese.chinese: 资深作者Akiko Hata公共卫生博士也是Tufts医学中心的MCRI分子信号室主任。
chinese.english: Senior author Akiko Hata, PhD, is also the director of the Molecular Signaling Laboratory at the MCRI at Tufts Medical Center.

chinese.chinese: 目前这一理论正在进行室实验。
chinese.english: The theory is currently the subject of laboratory tests.

chinese.chinese: 今天发表于网上的美国癌症研究协会的《临床癌症研究》杂志及在2012年美国癌症研究协会年会新闻发布会上发布的研究显示：低氧或缺氧与中危前列前肿瘤患者放射疗法后的早期的生化复发和原位复位有关。
chinese.english: Hypoxia, or a lack of oxygen, in prostate cancer tumors was associated with early biochemical relapse and local recurrence after radiotherapy in men with intermediate-risk disease, according to a study published online today in Clinical Cancer Research, a journal of the American Association for Cancer Research, and presented at an AACR Annual Meeting 2012 press conference.

chinese.chinese: 今天发布的所有建议都是专家协会在进行了数月仔细的讨论和总结后得出的。通过使用目前最常用的治疗的证据，五个问题建议会对患者接受的健康服务、服务安全和服务质量产生显著影响。
chinese.english: All the lists released today as part of Choosing Wisely were developed by the specialty societies after months of careful consideration and review. Using the most current evidence about management and treatment options within their specialty, the "Five Things" lists include recommendations that can make a significant impact on patient care, safety and quality.

chinese.chinese: 消费者报告（CR）——世界最大的独立产品测试组织——和ABIM基金会、专业医师组织共同制定了建议。在今天的新闻发布会上，CR宣称11个消费者组织参与了明智选择计划来帮助传播信息及教育患者做出明智决定。每一个消费组织具有潜在1百万的患者。
chinese.english: Consumer Reports (CR) – the world's largest independent product-testing organization – is working with the ABIM Foundation and the specialty societies to lead the effort. At today's press conference, Consumer Reports announced eleven consumer-oriented organizations joining Choosing Wisely to help disseminate information and educate patients on making wise decisions. Each of these organizations has the potential to reach at least 1 million consumers.

chinese.chinese: ABIM基金会主席、首席执行官Christine K. Cassel, M.D指出：“今天这些协会发表的建议就医师和患者之间需要什么样的医疗服务进行了对话。医师和患者协作能帮助确保在合适的时间向合适的患者提供合适的医疗服务。我们希望今天发布的建议能帮助医师和患者就医疗服务做出明智的选择。”
chinese.english: "Today these societies have shown tremendous leadership in starting a long overdue and important conversation between physicians and patients about what care is really needed," said Christine K. Cassel, M.D., president and CEO of the ABIM Foundation. "Physicians, working together with patients, can help ensure the right care is delivered at the right time for the right patient. We hope the lists released today kick off important conversations between patients and their physicians to help them choose wisely about their health care."

chinese.chinese: 世界卫生组织在周四称，甲型H1N1型流感病毒并不是室事故导致的，澳大利亚病毒学家首先散布这种谣言，而这种谣言被世界各地的新闻迅速报道。
chinese.english: The swine flu virus did not result from a laboratory accident, the World Health Organization said Thursday, working to debunk rumors started by an Australian virologist and circulated by news outlets all over the world.

chinese.chinese: 烧烤对健康威胁来自烧烤过程中的两类危险化学反应。滴下来的油脂产生的烟雾充满了致癌的多环芳烃，简称PAHs，当烟雾环绕在食物周围的时候，这些多环芳烃也附着在了食物的表面，当猪肉，鸡肉或是鱼肉在长时间的高温烧烤时，这些食物本身所含有的成分产生了化学变化生成杂环胺类物质，简称HCAs，这类物质相当的麻烦，因为室研究发现它们会引起大鼠和小鼠乳腺，结肠以及前列腺部位的肿瘤。
chinese.english: The problem with grilling is that it creates two types of risky chemical reactions. Fat drippings create smoke that is filled with carcinogenic polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons, or PAHs. When the smoke envelopes the food, it transfers the PAHs onto the surface of the meat. And when meat, chicken and fish are grilled at high temperatures for long periods of time, compounds inside the food react and create heterocyclic amines, or HCAs. HCAs are worrisome because in lab studies they've been shown to trigger breast, colon and prostate tumors in rats and mice.

chinese.chinese: 这两个研究团队的整合使之能快速从室进入患者的试验。该研究团队为参加扎提供了一种模拟其天然靶点——利巴韦林，借此靶向研究其基因。“我们的结论首次显示靶向作用于eIF4E基因对人体是有益处的。”Borden博士解释道：“我们也发现利巴韦林不仅仅具有阻滞eIF4E基因的效果，另一个优点就是其对患者没有副作用。”
chinese.english: The integration of these two teams made it possible to rapidly move from a research lab to patient tests. The study team targeted the gene by giving trial participants a mimic of its natural target, ribavirin. "Our results are the first to show that targeting eIF4E in humans is clinically beneficial," explains Dr. Borden. "We also found that ribavirin not only blocks eIF4E, it has no side effect on patients."

chinese.chinese: 多数临床病理学家现在认为他们自己通过对活检、细胞学、肿瘤切片、分子病理研究和室诊断的解释直接参与病人的诊治。
chinese.english: Most practicing pathologists now dedicate themselves to direct patient care through the interpretation of biopsies, cytology, tumor resections, molecular studies and laboratory diagnostics.

chinese.chinese: 威斯康星州：拨款主要给予麦迪逊市的农业部。威斯康星州的拨款将主要用于建设食品应急网络化学室的化学相关分析能力的储备，或处理威胁到国家食品供应这种重大事件。
chinese.english: Wisconsin – Wisconsin Department of Agriculture, Madison, Wis. The grant will provide for standing reserve capacity within the FERN for response to chemical-related analysis needs, or an event of such significance that it threatens the national food supply.

chinese.chinese: 内布拉斯加州的拨款将主要用于食品分析，食品过剩问题的处理以及提高室相关的化学品分析能力。
chinese.english: The award will enable analyses of foods and food products in the event redundancy or additional laboratory capacity is needed for chemical-related analyses.

chinese.chinese: 这三个州分别获得35万美元来建设食品应急网络化学室。该室对于美国食品和药品管理局的监管工作是必不可少的。这笔资金用于升级设施，培训目前食品检测方法，增加室样品分析能力，以及用于其他活动。
chinese.english: The three states each received $350,000 to fund Food Emergency Response Network (FERN) chemistry laboratories. FERN labs are essential to the FDA's regulatory efforts and the grants may be used for facility upgrades, training in current food testing methodologies, and increased laboratory sample analysis capacity, and other activities.

chinese.chinese: 这项研究成果是由上海生物化学和细胞生物学研究所的干细胞室的肖雷博士和其团队取得的，即将发表于6月初出版的最新一期《细胞生物学》杂志上
chinese.english: The study, which is to published early June in the newly launched Journal of Molecular Cell Biology, was the work of principal investigator Dr Lei Xiao, who leads the stem cell lab at the Shanghai Institute of Biochemistry and Cell Biology, and colleagues.

chinese.chinese: 年龄、eGFR基线水平、种族的不同、糖尿病或心血管疾病是否存在、血压水平，所有的室参数和ACEI、ARB、他汀类药物或维生素D的应用，这些因素在研究分析中被修正。研究者运用有竞争风险的方式来检查与性别有关系的主要的预后，包括死亡和肾脏替代治疗（RRT）。
chinese.english: The analysis was adjusted for a number of covariates, including age, baseline eGFR, ethnicity, presence of diabetes or cardiovascular disease, level of blood pressure, all relevant laboratory parameters, and the use of ACE inhibitors, ARBs, statins, or vitamin D supplements. Investigators used a competing risk approach to examine the association of sex with progression to key outcomes, including death and renal replacement therapy (RRT).

chinese.chinese: 十项研究合理地随机分为两组来形成新的评估公式和新的内在合理的公式。克立夫兰临床室，血清肌酐值用罗氏酶学标准血清测量法来重新测量。这个公式包含有可能的临床预测变量包括：血清肌酐、年龄、种族（白人、黑人或其他）和性别。附加变量包括糖尿病、器官移植和体重也包含其中。
chinese.english: Ten studies were available and were randomly divided into 2 groups for development of the new estimation equation and the internal validation of the new equation. At the Cleveland Clinical Laboratory, serum creatinine values were recalibrated to standardized creatinine measurements using the Roche enzymatic method. The equation was developed with potential clinical predictor variables of serum creatinine, age, race (black vs white and other), and sex. Additional variables available in some models include diabetes mellitus, previous organ transplantation, and weight.

chinese.chinese: 主要研究终点为死亡或两年内对心脏移植的迫切需要以及各种原因的死亡率。两年后，181例患者经历了紧急心脏移植，180例死亡。
chinese.english: The primary end points were death or urgent need for heart transplantation and all-cause mortality at two years. At two years, 181 patients had undergone urgent heart transplantation and 180 patients had died.

chinese.chinese: 心脏节律协会(Heart Rhythm Society)目前尚未公布他们所提出的五个滥用和误用干预治疗。这似乎也为电生理学家们进一步探索探讨提供了一个绝好的机会。但实际上电生理专家们却在一个特别的好地方就此事发表他们的高见。
chinese.english: The Heart Rhythm Society has yet to publish its list of five overused and misused interventions. This seems a great time for electrophysiologists to look inward. And real-world EPs are in an especially good place to comment on this matter.

chinese.chinese: 这种装置特别的地方在于三种报警模式的结合，虽然震动报警通常是用于手术室或ICU危急情况下呼叫医务人员的装置，很少有人研究用作病人的自我监护这种很有潜力的功能，听觉装置拥有选择性的可植入的心脏除纤颤器，但研究表明一些病人尤其是老年人不能听见这种报警。
chinese.english: What makes the device distinctive is this combination of alert modes. Although vibrotactile (vibrating) alarms are sometimes used to warn medical personnel in operating rooms or ICUs of an emergency, very little research has focused on their potential as a self-monitoring device for patients. Auditory alarms are provided with selected implantable heart defibrillators, but research indicates that some patients - particularly the elderly - are unable to hear the alarms.

chinese.chinese: 这种装置提供两类紧急情况的报警，一种优先报警的是病人有可能心脏病急性发作并拨号911，一种情况是发出次级报警的是在48小时内要求看医生的，这种报警都是由如同起搏器大小的可植入式的医疗仪器完成，植入地方在人体左侧胸腔上部，连接一个类似于一个页面管理装置的外部装置，发出可听音报警或发出红色或黄色的警报灯光。
chinese.english: The device offers two levels of alarm urgency: A high-priority alarm indicates that the patient may be having a heart attack and should call 911, and a low-priority alarms indicates that a condition has been detected that requires a doctor visit within 48 hours. The alarms are provided by an implanted medical device, similar in size to a pacemaker, that is placed in the upper left chest, plus an external device, similar to a pager, that emits an auditory alarm and flashes a red or yellow warning light.

chinese.chinese: 猝死是中风的严重结局人们却常常对他认识不足。急性卒中会干扰自主神经功能，导致心肌损伤，心电图异常，心律失常以致猝死。实验室和临床证据显示，岛叶梗死后自主神经异常更常见，而该区域对于控制交感神经系统和副交感神经系统的自主功能十分重要。心血管并发症可以增加卒中后心脏病的发病率、死亡率。因此，许多卒中后发生的猝死或严重的非致死性心脏病很可能是因为心血管系统和神经系统间的相互作用的结果。而人们对其引起猝死的详尽机制却还不够清楚。因而需要对急性卒中后自主神经系统的作用深入进行研究，以让我们发现有高猝死率的患者。
chinese.english: Sudden death is an important but widely under-recognisedconsequence of stroke. Acute stroke can disturb central autonomic control,resulting in myocardial injury, electrocardiographic abnormalities, cardiacarrhythmias, and ultimately sudden death. Experimental and clinical evidencesuggests that autonomic imbalance is more frequent after infarcts involving theinsularcortex, a crucial region for the control of sympathetic andparasympathetic autonomic functions. Cardiovascular comorbidities increase the riskof cardiac morbidity and mortality after stroke. Thus, many sudden deaths andserious non-fatal cardiac events after stroke are probably due to aninteraction between cardiovascular and neurological causes. The exactmechanisms leading to sudden death remain incompletely understood. Furtherresearch is needed to investigate the autonomic consequences of acute strokeand to identify patients at high risk of sudden death.

chinese.chinese: 医学上和神经病学上病情稳定的患者发生意外死亡时，我们称为猝死，在缺血性卒中时经常被人们低估却又十分严重。尽管中风治疗发展很快，包括为重症患者建立专业的卒中单元，但是很多发生卒中的患者在发病后很快就死亡了。尽管，引起死亡的神经病学病因如脑水肿和缺血性卒中的出血性转变，在卒中后一周内占主要地位，但是一周之后绝大多数人都是死于非神经系统病变。缺血性卒中的最初三个月，大约4%患者死于心脏病，大约19%发生过致命的或非致命的心血管事件，包括急性心肌梗死、室性心动过速、室颤或者由轻度心衰发展为重度心衰。因此，我们研究卒中的神经系统并发症和其他内科并发症。
chinese.english: Sudden death—the unexpected death of amedically and neurologically stable patient—is an important but widelyunder-recognised consequence of ischemic stroke. Despite major advances instroke treatment, including the establishment of specialised stroke units forintensive care,1 a substantial number of patients with stroke die shortly afterthe event. Although neurological causes of death, such as brain edema and hemorrhagictransformation of an ischemic infarct, predominate during the first week afterstroke, most deaths in the following weeks are due to non-neurological causes. Within the first 3 months after ischemicstroke, about 4% of all patients die from cardiac causes and about 19% have afatal or serious non-fatal cardiac event, including acute myocardialinfarction, ventricular tachycardia or fi brillation, or moderate-to-severeheart failure. Medicaland neurological complications of stroke have been reviewed recently.

chinese.chinese: 自主神经系统功能失常在猝死中的潜在作用曾被强调过——精神创伤和精神应激能够激发严重的心血管事件。南加州大地震发生当天，心源性猝死发病率是之前一周平均值的五倍（P<0.001）。2001年美国纽约的世贸中心发生的911事件30天后，在那些安装了植入式心脏除颤器的患者中，其发生室性心律失常的频率比发生911事件之前30天要高2-3倍。
chinese.english: The potential role of autonomic dysfunction insudden death has been emphasised by reports that emotional trauma andpsychological stress can trigger serious cardiac events.On the day of a major earthquake inSouthern California, the number of sudden cardiac deaths was about five times higher than the daily average in the preceding week (p<0·001).Among patients with an implantablecardioverter defibrillator, the incidence of ventricular arrhythmias was2·3-times higher during the 30 days after the World Trade Center attack in NewYork, USA, 2001, than during the preceding 30 days.

chinese.chinese: 术前使用他汀类药物可能使心脏手患者获益
chinese.english: Patients Who Undergo Heart Surgery May Benefit From Pre-Operative Statins

chinese.chinese: 据Cochrane研究者新近的系统回顾研究，术前使用他汀类药物可降低心脏手术病人术后发生心房纤颤的几率，并缩短病人在ICU中的治疗时间和住院时间。但是术前使用他汀类药物并不对围手术期的死亡，中风，心脏病，肾功能衰竭发生的风险产生影响。
chinese.english: Pre-operative statin therapy can reduce the chance of post-operative atrial fibrillation and shortens the stay on the intensive care unit (ICU) and in the hospital in patients who undergo cardiac surgery, according to a new systematic review by Cochrane researchers. However, statin pre-treatment had no influence on the risk of dying, stroke, heart attack or kidney failure around the time of the operation.

chinese.chinese: 已知他汀类药物有助于降低血液中的脂质水平，从而降低冠心病患者的死亡风险。在本研究之前，术前使用他汀类药物是否使心脏手术的病人获益，并不清楚。
chinese.english: Statins are known to help lower the levels of lipids in people's blood. This in turn reduces the risk of patients with coronary heart disease dying. Before this study, it was unclear whether patients who are about to undergo heart surgery would also benefit if they took statins before the operation.

chinese.chinese: 他们发现术前使用他汀类药物可以降低术后心房纤颤的发生几率，使用他汀类药物治疗的病人较未使用者获益。而且他们发现术前使用他汀类药物的病人提前约3.5小时离开ICU,提前约半天时间离开医院。但是没有显著降低术后病人发生心脏病或肾功衰的比例。此外，他汀类药物并不影响术后病人发生死亡或发生中风的风险。
chinese.english: They found that giving statins before surgery reduced the incidence of post-operative atrial fibrillation, suggesting a beneficial effect for patients with a statin treatment when compared to patients without a statin therapy. In addition, they discovered that patients who had statins before the operation tended to leave the ICU about three-and-a half hours earlier, and left hospital about half a day earlier. There was, however, no significant reduction in the proportion of people who had a heart attack or kidney failure subsequently. Furthermore, statins had no effect on the number of people who died or had a stroke soon after the operation.

chinese.chinese: 研究者指出了他们研究存在的局限性。“因为我们分析的数据主要来自于接受冠脉搭桥的病人，所以这些结论不能推广至进行其他心脏手术的病人，比如心脏瓣膜手术或是主动脉手术。”主研究员Oliver J.Liakopoulos如是说，该研究员工作于科隆大学心脏中心的心胸外科。
chinese.english: The researchers point to one limitation of their findings. "Since the data we analysed had come mainly from patients having coronary artery bypass operations, the results cannot be extrapolated to patients undergoing other cardiac procedures such as heart valve or aortic surgery," says lead researcher Oliver J. Liakopoulos, who works in the Department of Cardiothoracic Surgery at the University of Cologne's Heart Centre.

chinese.chinese: 研究人员警告说过多摄入软饮会导致肥胖并且是糖尿病、高血压、心脏病和中风的一个主要危险因素。首席研究员Naveed Sattar教授说：“你喝的东西可以和你吃的东西一样对你造成损害。毫无疑问摄入太多含糖饮料会大为导致肥胖。一些饮料的变种例如果汁和冰沙被认为是健康的选择，其实它们含糖量通常也非常高。对于许多对和他们体重作斗争的人来说，减少饮用这类饮料而替换成水或健康饮品会是一个明智的首选，这能帮助他们减少卡路里摄入。”
chinese.english: The team warned that the over-consumption of soft drinks was contributing to obesity and was a major risk factor for conditions such as diabetes, high blood pressure, heart disease and stroke. Lead researcher Professor Naveed Sattar said, “What you drink can be as damaging to the body as what you eat. There is no question that consuming too many sugar-sweetened drinks can greatly contribute to obesity. Some varieties of drinks such as pure fruit juices and 'smoothies', which are perceived as 'healthy' options, are also very high in sugar. For many people struggling with their weight, reducing their intake of such drinks and replacing with water or diet drinks would be a sensible first target to help them lessen their calorie intake.”

chinese.chinese: 研究者对不同邮政编码的地区被称为PM2.5的细微颗粒物（这类颗粒物比人的头发的宽度还窄，其直径仅为2.5微米或一下）进行了估计。这些颗粒物，如交通工具排放的烟尘、发电厂排放的其他颗粒物、木材燃烧烟尘、某些工业过程排放的颗粒物，当沉积到肺内后，会引起显著的健康危害，导致局部和全省的炎症反应，并导致肺部及心脏疾病发生。
chinese.english: The researchers estimated zip code concentrations of fine air particles known as PM2.5 -- air matter with a diameter of 2.5 microns or less and more narrow than the width of a human hair. These particles, such as soot from vehicles, and other particles from power plants, wood burning, and certain industrial processes, are a significanthealth riskwhen they lodgein the lungs, causing inflammation there and in the rest of the body, and contributing to lung and heart disease.

chinese.chinese: 睾酮的补充可以改善心衰患者的呼吸功能，增加运动能力，根据发表在循环心力衰竭部分，美国心脏病协会杂志上的研究发现。
chinese.english: Testosterone supplements helped heart failure patients breathebetter and exercise more, according to research in Circulation Heart Failure,an American Heart Association journal.

chinese.chinese: 这一研究由Silvia Buonamic博士领导，他是纽约大学癌症研究所和病理学系Aifantis博士室的博士后，同时也在该大学Langone 医学中心的Martin S. Kimmel干细胞中心供职。其他研究的调查者分别为：来自纽约大学Langone 医学中心的Thomas Trimarchi, Maria Grazia Ruocco, Linsey Reavie, Severine Cathelin, Yevgeniy Lukyanov, Jen-Chieh Tseng, Filiz Sen, Mengling Li, Elizabeth Newcomb, Jiri Zavadil, Daniel Meruelo, Sherif Ibrahim, David Zagzag和 Michael L. Dustin；来自哥伦比亚大学医学中心的Brenton G. Mar, Apostolos Klinakis和Argiris Efstratiadis；来自Mount Sinai 医学院的Eric Gehrie 和Jonathan S. Bromberg及来自柏林Max Delbrück分子医学中心的Martin Lipp。
chinese.english: The study was led by Dr. Silvia Buonamici, a post-doctoral fellow in the laboratory of Dr. Aifantis in the Department of Pathology and the NYU Cancer Institute, and in the Helen L. and Martin S. Kimmel Stem Cell Center at NYU Langone Medical Center. Other study investigators are; Thomas Trimarchi, Maria Grazia Ruocco, Linsey Reavie, Severine Cathelin, Yevgeniy Lukyanov, Jen-Chieh Tseng, Filiz Sen, Mengling Li, Elizabeth Newcomb, Jiri Zavadil, Daniel Meruelo, Sherif Ibrahim, David Zagzag, and Michael L. Dustin from NYU Langone Medical Center; Brenton G. Mar, Apostolos Klinakis, and Argiris Efstratiadis from Columbia University Medical Center; Eric Gehrie and Jonathan S. Bromberg from Mount Sinai School of Medicine; and Martin Lipp from the Max Delbrück Center for Molecular Medicine in Berlin.

chinese.chinese: CDC以调查资料而非室证据为基础得出上述数字，但统计数字也显示H1N1甲型流感病毒所致死亡率比预想的低。
chinese.english: The CDC based its figures on surveys, rather than laboratory evidence, but the numbers suggest the death rate from swine flu is lower than thought.

chinese.chinese: 地点：大学医学中心研究室
chinese.english: Setting: University medical center research laboratory.

chinese.chinese: 制药公司将分析测试外包的趋势很大程度上鼓舞了CRO公司之间的合作和组合扩张。PPD 的Sharbaugh说：“我们室服务已经取得很快速的成长。最近我们又实施了三项战略性的扩张项目。首先，我们在Athlone和Ireland分别建立cGMP分析室，投资了大概1800万，有250个工作岗位；其次，为了服务于东南亚地区的客户，我们在新加坡建立了中心室；第三，我们收购了Merck的疫苗检测机构，集中精力发展疫苗和生物制剂的分析和免疫原性测试服务。”
chinese.english: The trend for pharma to outsource analytical testing has spurred partnerships and portfolio expansion projects among CROs. Mr. Sharbaugh at PPD said, “We have seen very strong growth across our lab business. We have recently undertaken three strategic expansion projects. First, we are building a cGMP analytical testing lab in Athlone, Ireland, investing as much as $18 million and creating approximately 250 jobs. Second, we are building a central lab in Singapore in response to growing client demand in Southeast Asia. Third, we acquired Merck's vaccine testing facility to focus on assay development and immunogenicity testing services for vaccines and biologics.”

chinese.chinese: Abbott ARCHITECT HIV Combo (Ag/Ab)测定时自动免疫分析检测，该方法设计用来检测人血清或血浆中HIV - 1病毒M组和O组和/或HIV-2 p24抗原和抗体。不像常规HIV血清学测定分析只检测HIV抗体，Abbott ARCHITECT HIV Combo (Ag/Ab)合并检测p24抗原，能使室在抗体出现前检测到HIV感染。HIV p24抗原是HIV抗原病毒蛋白。
chinese.english: The Abbott ARCHITECT HIV Combo (Ag/Ab) assay is an automated immunoassay test designed to detect HIV p24 antigen and antibodies to HIV type 1 (HIV-1 Group M and Group O) and/or type 2 (HIV-2) in human serum and plasma. Unlike conventional HIV serology assays that only detect HIV antibodies, ARCHITECT HIV Combo (Ag/Ab) incorporates HIV p24 antigen detection which enables laboratories to diagnose HIV infection before HIV antibodies are detectable. HIV p24 antigen is a viral protein of the HIV antigen.

chinese.chinese: 其实大米中有很多的铁,但是这些铁只有存在在种皮里。因为未剥皮的大米会在热带和亚热带气候中很快变质,因此,种皮——连同珍贵的铁都会被移除。苏黎世理工学院与Christof Sautter和Wilhelm Gruissem一起工作的植物生物技术室的研究人员，现在已经成功地通过转移两段植物基因到现有的稻株品种，开发出了铁含量增加的优质大米。他们的研究成果7月21日发表于《植物生物技术杂志》的网络版。
chinese.english: Rice actually has a lot of iron, but only in the seed coat. Because unpeeled rice quickly becomes rancid in tropical and subtropical climates, however, the seed coat - along with the precious iron - has to be removed for storage. Researchers working with Christof Sautter and Wilhelm Gruissem in the laboratory of plant biotechnology at ETH Zurich have now succeeded in increasing the iron content in polished rice by transferring two plant genes into an existing rice variety. Their work was published July 21 in the online edition of Plant Biotechnology Journal.

chinese.chinese: BTI的研究人员开发出的这种酶，三聚氰胺脱氨基酶，被用于MaxDiscovery Melamine Test kit，此酶将在BTI Pilot Plant的发酵设施中生产。三聚氰胺脱氨基酶可断裂三聚氰胺中的C-N键，释放出铵基，再用一个简单试验，利用铵基使液体变蓝。Jennifer Seffernick，Wackett室的一名研究助理，在进行除草剂生物降解研究时发现了这种酶。这一发现，再次证明了基础研究可带来对社会有益的新技术。
chinese.english: Researchers at the BioTechnology Institute (BTI) developed the enzyme, melamine deaminase, used in the MaxDiscovery Melamine Test kit and the enzyme will be produced in the BTI Pilot Plant fermentation facilities. Melamine deaminase works by breaking one of the C-N bonds in melamine to release ammonia, which can be detected by a simple test that turns the liquid blue. Jennifer Seffernick, a research associate in Wackett's lab, discovered the enzyme while conducting research on biodegradation of s-triazine herbicides. It is one of many examples of how basic research can lead to new technologies that benefit society.

chinese.chinese: 虽然在室内对肿瘤干细胞进行研究被证明尚存疑问。这种细胞，在数量上明显少于其他类型肿瘤细胞，当体外生长时，将失去其干细胞样特性。
chinese.english: Yet studying cancer stem cells in the lab has proven problematic. The cells, already fewer in number than other types of tumor cells, tend to lose their stem cell-like properties when grown outside the body.

chinese.chinese: 为了检测黑素体在恶性核素刘对化疗剂的敏感性中的作用，贝塞斯达国家肿瘤研究所细胞生物学室的Kevin Chen, Ph.D., Vincent Hearing, Ph.D., Michael M. Gottesman, M.D.以及其他同事比较了在黑素瘤细胞体系对于化疗剂的应答性过程中，染色和和黑素体的发展阶段，数量以及细胞结构。
chinese.english: To examine the role of melanosomes in the sensitivity of malignant melanoma to chemotherapeutic agents, Kevin Chen, Ph.D., Vincent Hearing, Ph.D., Michael M. Gottesman, M.D., of the Laboratory of Cell Biology at the National Cancer Institute in Bethesda, Md., and colleagues compared pigmentation and melanosome developmental stage, number, and cellular structures in melanoma cell lines in response to treatment with chemotherapeutic agents.

chinese.chinese: 问题是肿瘤干细胞数量很少并且他们很快会变成其他类型的细胞故难以在室进行研究，想杀死他们很难。
chinese.english: The problem is that cancer stem cells are rare and difficult to study in the lab because they quickly change into other types of cells. And they are hard to kill.

chinese.chinese: 这种叫做盐霉素的化合物不仅能杀死室诱导产生的肿瘤干细胞，还能杀死自然发生的肿瘤干细胞。与常规抗乳腺癌的化疗药紫杉醇相比较，盐霉素降低肿瘤干细胞的数量比紫杉醇强100倍，盐霉素还能减少小鼠体内乳腺肿瘤的生长速度。
chinese.english: The compound, called salinomycin, kills not only laboratory-created cancer stem cells, but also naturally occurring ones. Compared to a common chemotherapeutic drug prescribed for breast cancer (known as paclitaxel), salinomycin reduced the number of cancer stem cells by more than 100-fold. It also diminished breast tumor growth in mice.

chinese.chinese: 为了克服这些困难，布罗德研究院和白头研究院的研究者们借鉴了Weinberg及其同事的发现，用他们的方法可以在室中将大量的肿瘤细胞转变成具有干细胞样特征的细胞。这项技术通过诱导成熟细胞经历一次关键性的转变（从上皮细胞转化为间质细胞），这种转化可以改变细胞的表型和活力，与此同时，细胞具备了类似干细胞的特征。
chinese.english: To overcome these hurdles, Broad and Whitehead Institute researchers drew upon recent findings from Weinberg and his colleagues that suggested a way to generate in the laboratory large numbers of cancer cells with stem cell-like qualities. The technique works by coaxing adult cells to undergo a critical change (known as an “epithelial-to-mesenchymal transition”) that alters their shape and motility. At the same time, the cells also adopt similar properties as stem cells.

chinese.chinese: 南安普顿大学的科学家发明了一种可在医生手术期间，提供床旁检测的手持血细胞分析仪，相关报道发表于本月的《芯片室》（Lab on a Chip）中。
chinese.english: A hand-held device which could offer point-of-care blood cell analysis in doctors' surgeries is being developed by academics at the University of Southampton and is described in a paper in Lab on a Chip this month.

chinese.chinese: 干细胞具有一种独特的能力：它们分裂时，它们既可以带来更多的干细胞，或变成一种专门类型的细胞。在小鼠和人类在皮肤基底层的细胞层含有干细胞，可以发展成为在上面层的特化的细胞。在蒙泰罗通的欧洲分子生物学室（EMBL）的科学家与在马德里的能源环境及技术中心（CIEMAT）的同事合作发现两种蛋白质控制何时以及如何将这些干细胞转化成皮肤细胞。
chinese.english: Stem cells have a unique ability: when they divide, they can either give rise to more stem cells, or to a variety of specialised cell types. In both mice and humans, a layer of cells at the base of the skin contains stem cells that can develop into the specialised cells in the layers above. Scientists at the European Molecular Biology Laboratory (EMBL) in Monterotondo, in collaboration with colleagues at the Centro de Investigaciones Energéticas, Medioambientales y Tecnologicas (CIEMAT) in Madrid, have discovered two proteins that control when and how these stem cells switch to being skin cells.

chinese.chinese: Kathryn A. Phillips, PhD，California-San Francisco大学卫生经济学和健康服务研究所教授，她领导的研究小组对文献进行了综述，检索的资料包括HER2检测的患者比例，检测的方法，社区检测结果和中心/参考性室结果的一致性，HER2检测后曲妥珠单抗治疗情况，以及检测方法的成本效益。
chinese.english: The researchers, led by Kathryn A. Phillips, PhD, professor of health economics and health services research at the University of California-San Francisco, conducted a literature review and examined available evidence about the percentage of eligible patients tested for HER2, the test methods used, concordance of test results between community and central/reference laboratories, the use of trastuzumab by HER2 test result, and the cost-effectiveness of testing strategies.

chinese.chinese: 来自约克大学的团队由JenniferPotts教授领衔，包括由英国心脏协会资助的博士生DominikaGruszka。他们发现细菌通过释放长且薄的蛋白链黏附于其它细菌或细菌产物。这些蛋白链与众不同，是一种不能被预测的重复结构，为其作用机制提供了重要线索。
chinese.english: The team from the University of York, led by ProfessorJennifer Potts, included British Heart Foundation-funded PhD student DominikaGruszka. They found that the bacteria release long, thin protein chains toconnect with other bacteria or mesh with other bacterial products. The chainshave a highly unusual repetitive structure which could nothave been predicted and provides important clues to how they might work.

chinese.chinese: 英国心脏协会的高级研究员Potts教授说：“该发现使人们对生物膜形成机制的理解更进一步。这将有利于新方法的研发以预防这些细菌导致的心脏植入物感染。
chinese.english: Professor Potts, a BHF Senior Research Fellow, said: "This discoveryprovides an important step forward in understanding how biofilms form. Itshould help in the development of new ways of preventing infection of cardiacdevices by these bacteria."

chinese.chinese: 根据发表于欧洲心脏病学会旗舰杂志——《欧洲心脏杂志》上的一篇报道，以血管紧张素转化酶(ACE)抑制剂治疗发病率较高的高血压，患者死亡率明显降低。
