chinese.english: Treatment with an ACE inhibitor for lowering high blood pressure showed asignificant mortality reduction in patients with a high prevalence ofhypertension, according to a report published in the European Heart Journal,the flagship journal of the European Society of Cardiology.

chinese.chinese: 根据美国心脏协会杂志——循环衰竭的研究报道，睾酮制剂能帮助心力衰竭病人改善呼吸和运动功能。
chinese.english: Testosterone supplements helped heart failure patients breathe better and exercise more, according to research in Circulation Heart Failure, an American Heart Association journal.

chinese.chinese: 吸烟是引起心血管疾病的主要原因之一，全球约1/10的心血管疾病直接尤其引起。吸烟者心脏病发作的可能性是非吸烟者的两倍。而且，每年有600,000人因暴露于二手烟环境中而死亡。
chinese.english: Smoking is one of the major causes of CVD and directly responsible for one-tenth of all CVD worldwide. Smokers are almost twice as likely to have a heart attack as people who have never smoked. Moreover, second-hand smoke exposure is responsible for 600,000 deaths every year.

chinese.chinese: 研究表明，第二代抗高血压药物除降压外还有辅助的心脏保护功能。
chinese.english: Second-Generation Drug Used for Hypertension Aids Heart Function Independent of Blood Pressure Effect, Study Suggests

chinese.chinese: 科学日报（2012年4月22日）讯 - 心力衰竭是世界上最常见的死亡原因，通常是由于慢性血压增高，即高血压。因此，有大量的研究工作，旨在预防和治疗高血压。最近，日本研究人员研究一种有效的抗高血压药物莫索尼定，其对脑干心血管中枢的咪唑啉受体产生作用。他们利用动物模型发现，药物除降压外还可以改善心脏的功能和生存。他们还发现药物对氧化应激的有利影响，氧化应激关系到胰岛素抵抗，是糖尿病的潜在异常，常见于心脏衰竭的人。
chinese.english: ScienceDaily (Apr. 22, 2012) — Heart failure is the most common cause of death throughout the world, typically the result of chronic high blood pressure, also known as hypertension. As a result, research efforts have focused on an array of approaches aimed at preventing and treating high blood pressure. Recently, Japanese researchers examined the utility of an anti-hypertensive drug, moxonidine, which acts on the imidazoline receptors in the cardiovascular center of the brainstem. They found, using an animal model, that the drug can improve heart function and survival independent of its effect on blood pressure. They also found the drug had a favorable effect on oxidative stress, which is related to insulin resistance, the underlying abnormality in diabetes, which is common in people with heart failure.

chinese.chinese: 研究团队下载进行的最新一系列的研究是，重点研究神经控制导致高血压和心脏衰竭间的联系。Hirooka博士说，展望未来，他们将找出导致莫索尼定有益作用的确切机制。他们还将用其他方法来研究，该化合物是否可以治疗高血压患者心脏疾病，防止心脏衰竭。他补充说，由于药物对胰岛素抵抗有作用，他们想进一步研究。
chinese.english: The study is the latest in a series conducted by the research team whose focus is on neural control of circulation in hypertension and heart failure. Looking ahead, they will work to identify the precise mechanisms involved in the beneficial effect of moxonidine, Dr. Hirooka said. They will also study other ways to see if the compound is a possible therapeutic tool for hypertensive heart disease to prevent heart failure. As the drug had beneficial effects on insulin resistance, they would like to further investigate the issue, he added

chinese.chinese: 据Sarrazin 和他的同事说，已确认了18F-FDG-PET/CT在肿瘤学中癌症的诊断和分期，以及心脏学中通过测量注射的18F-FDG的解聚情况来对器官内代谢活力进行三位测量并以此来评估心肌活力等方面的价值。一些病例报告和小型研究显示，18F-FDG-PET/CT可以通过标出高代谢活力的细胞有助于诊断植入物感染，所以作者希望这一技术可以显示感染的范围，并以此帮助医生确定是否值得冒风险去拔除植入物。
chinese.english: The value of 18F-FDG-PET/CT is already established in oncology forcancer diagnosis and staging and in cardiology to assess myocardial viabilitybecause it allows 3-D measurement of metabolic activity within an organ bymeasuring disintegration of the injected 18F-FDG, according to Sarrazin and colleagues. A fewcase reports and small studies suggest that 18F-FDG PET/CT can help diagnose device infections byhighlighting cells with higher metabolic activity, so the authors expect thistechnique may show the extent of an infection to allow the physician todetermine whether device extraction is worth the risks.

chinese.chinese: 全球心脏病协会举办的世界心脏病学大会展示的新研究
chinese.english: New study presented at the World Congress of Cardiology organized by the World Heart Federation

chinese.chinese: 亚临床甲减在那些甲状腺不能分泌足够的甲状腺素的人群中是一个比较普通的症状。尽管亚临床甲减经常无症状，但是最近的研究表明亚临床甲减和心血管突发和死亡上升有关，尤其是在年轻和中年患者身上。然而，研究者们强调这些流行病关联并不能证明亚临床甲减治疗对减少心脏病事件风险有效。
chinese.english: SCH is a relatively common condition in which the thyroid gland does not produce enough thyroid hormone. Although the condition is often asymptomatic, recent studies have indicated that SCH is linked with increased cardiovascular events and mortality, especially in young and middle-aged patients. However, the researchers highlight that those epidemiologic associations do not verify that treatment of SCH would be effective.

chinese.chinese: 《美国医学会》杂志4月25日刊报道称植入心脏装置的感染性心内膜炎病人患并发症的几率增高，包括瓣膜感染、心衰、持续性菌血症等。同时，患者的住院率和1年死亡率也会增高，当植入装置为心脏瓣膜时尤为明显。
chinese.english: The April 25 issue of JAMA reports that patients with infective endocarditis, an inflammation of the inner layer of the heart, who have implanted cardiac devices have a higher rate of complications, including valve infections, heart failure, persistent bacteremia, as well as high in-hospital and 1-year mortality rates, especially if it involves the heart valves.

chinese.chinese: 根据发表在美国心脏协会新兴科学系列网络研讨会的最新研究，有些不规则心跳的患者在脱离抗凝药物后会在一个月之内面临一种高的中风或凝血风险。
chinese.english: Some patients with irregular heartbeats whoare taken off anti-clotting medication face a high risk of stroke or bloodclotting within a month, according to new research presented at the AmericanHeart Association's Emerging Science Series webinar.

chinese.chinese: 杜克大学医学中心的研究人员用斑马鱼胚胎，应用能在不同细胞上标记多达90种彩色标签的一种新技术，可以在心脏形成时追踪单个细胞和细胞株。
chinese.english: Researchers at Duke University MedicalCenter used zebrafish embryos and careful employment of a new technique thatallows for up to 90 color labels on different cells to track individual cellsand cell lines as the heart formed.

chinese.chinese: Poss说的这些肌肉细胞包裹心脏的方式可能会导致新的疗法产生。
chinese.english: Poss said the manner in which these muscle cells envelope the heart could leadto new therapies.

chinese.chinese: Slamon and Genentech研发一个鼠的HER2单克隆抗体，用以阻断受体及其生长信号。Genentech 接着将这个抗体人源化，开发出曲妥珠单抗，后者可以结合于癌细胞表面的HER2受体，而不影响正常。室的进一步工作证实，虽然正常细胞表达少量的HER2，但曲妥珠单抗只影响显著高表达HER2的乳腺癌细胞。
chinese.english: Slamon and Genentech developed mouse monoclonal antibodies for HER2 in an attempt to block the receptors and their growth signal. Genentech subsequently "humanized" the antibody, creating a monoclonal antibody called trastuzumab that bound to the HER2 protein on the surface of cancer cells, leaving normal cells alone. Subsequent work in the laboratory dish showed that even though normal cells have some minor degree of HER2 expression, the antibody was only effective in breast cancer cells that made dramatically more protein than normal.

chinese.chinese: 利物浦的研究组希望能将这项技术发展起来，在欧洲应用这种比当前室所用能源强大1000倍的最强宽幅辐射源。
chinese.english: The team at Liverpool hope to develop these applications using the most powerful source of broad band terahertz available in Europe - a thousand times more powerful than current laboratory sources.

chinese.chinese: 这项计划是由西北发展局的西北科研基金资助的，将应用由CCLRC Daresbury室开发的标准第四代光源来进行发展。这个第四代光源是将用于X线技术，激光以及辐射源的光源的。
chinese.english: The THz beamline, funded by the Northwest Regional Development Agency (NWDA) through its North West Science Fund, will be developed using the prototype Fourth Generation Light Source (4GLS) being constructed at CCLRC Daresbury Laboratory, which will be used to develop light sources used in X-ray technology, laser studies and radiation sources.

chinese.chinese: Newcastle-Durham-NHS 学院的干细胞生物学和再生医学教授 Nayernia和他的研究小组在他们发表的文章中提到了一种新方法：在室里，如何将来自鼠的胚胎干细胞培养成成熟的精子，并进一步测试了该精子的实际功用。
chinese.english: Prof Nayernia, of the Newcastle-Durham-NHS Institute for Stem Cell Biology and Regenerative Medicine*, and his team describe in their paper how they developed a new strategy for generating mature sperm cells in the laboratory using embryonic stem cells from mice. They then went on to test whether this sperm would function in real life.

chinese.chinese: Shoujun Xu，伯克利室化学家、NMR/MRI专家Alexander Pines研究组的成员之一，处理了一组显示一项新的低廉轻便的MRI技术的测量数据
chinese.english: Shoujun Xu, a member of the research group of Berkeley Lab chemist and NMR/MRI expert Alexander Pines, conducted the measurements that demonstrated a new low-cost, portable MRI technology.

chinese.chinese: 提到“磁共振成像”，绝大多数人都会想到医院里特别治疗室里面的那台油煎饼状，费用高昂而且噪声很大的巨大机器。美国能源部劳伦斯伯克利室（伯克利室）里的研究人员正在试图通过对基于激光的磁共振成像技术的检验来使这项技术浓缩而且变得轻便，价格下降，噪声也会减少，以此来改变对磁共振成像的传统观念。
chinese.english: When we hear the term “MRI,” most of us probably think of a special treatment room in a hospital with a huge doughnut-shaped machine that costs a lot of money and makes a lot of noise. Researchers with the U.S. Department of Energy's Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory (Berkeley Lab) are looking to change that perception with the successful testing of a laser-based MRI technique that would make the technology compact and portable, relatively cheap, and quiet.

chinese.chinese: 基因治疗涉及到将灭活的腺病毒（与呼吸道感染相关的病毒）附着到RTVP-1 基因上。当病毒感染肿瘤细胞时，病毒也把基因带入肿瘤细胞。（RTVP代表睾丸特异性相关的蛋白）。RTVP-1基因在Timothy Thompson博士的室分离得到，Timothy Thompson也是Baylor医学院泌尿科的教授。
chinese.english: The gene therapy involves attaching an inactivated adenovirus (related to viruses that cause respiratory infections) to the RTVP-1 gene. As the virus infects the tumor cells, it will introduce the gene into the cells as well. (RTVP stands for related to testes-specific, vespid and pathogenesis proteins.) The RTVP-1 gene was isolated in the laboratory of Dr. Timothy Thompson, also a professor of urology at BCM.

chinese.chinese: 国家变态反应与传染性疾病研究所（NIAID）发布新闻说，亚特兰大CDC在生物安全3级室进行的小鼠实验也支持以上发现。
chinese.english: The mouse experiment was conducted in a biosafety level 3 laboratory at the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention in Atlanta, according to a news release from the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases (NIAID), which supported the research.

chinese.chinese: 纽约厄普顿Brookhaven国家室的研究人员首次明确了与刺激食欲有关的脑－胃通路。
chinese.english: Scientists from Brookhaven National Laboratory in Upton, New York have identified brain-stomach connections that motivate the desire to over indulge in food.

chinese.chinese: 尚没有可以应用于公众的疫苗。研究该毒素或者肉毒杆菌中毒有机体的室人员暴露在该毒素的危险性更大。这些人群因为暴露的危险性可以预防接种。
chinese.english: Not for the general public. Laboratory employees who work with the toxin or botulism organisms are more likely to be exposed to the risk of toxin. These people may be vaccinated because of the risk of exposure

chinese.chinese: 该研究的作者来自悉尼大学国家听力室，他提到这种视力和听力间的联系是可以解释的，二者都是老化的结果。而这也提示人们，有共同的危险因子使得人们易患这两种感觉损害。
chinese.english: The authors, from the University of Sydney and the National Acoustics Laboratories, Sydney, said the connection between vision and hearing could be explained by the fact that both are consequences of ageing and suggest common risk factors can predispose people to such sensory impairments.

chinese.chinese: 当皮肤受到阳光照射时人体产生维生素D。室试验也证明维生素D能够阻止癌细胞细胞分裂。
chinese.english: The body produces vitamin D in the skin when it is exposed to sunlight. Laboratory tests have also shown that vitamin D can stop cancer cells from dividing.

chinese.chinese: 从专业角度来考虑，53.3%的受调查者意见认为，临床医生认为HER最重要的作用是可以远程获得室检查结果。42.7%的受调查者报告接触医疗IT技术可以介入放射科检查结果，25%的受调查者在未来的四年内打算提供放射科检查结果接口。
chinese.english: Of particular interest for specialty practices, remote access to lab results is cited as the most important EHR feature by clinicians, according to 53.3% of the respondents. The capability to access radiology results utilizing healthcare IT is reported by 42.7% of the cohort, with 25% stating that they plan on implementing radiology access within the next four years.

chinese.chinese: 波士顿医疗记录公司在本年度针对HER发展趋势和早期使用情况进行了一项调查，发现采用本系统的最大原因是效率和远程接入的方便性，以及药房、病房和室无间断性工作流程的需要。
chinese.english: The Medical Records Institute of Boston conducted a survey of EHR trends and usage earlier this year and reported that the greatest factors driving the need for these systems were efficiency and convenience to physicians through remote access, and workflow benefits in reducing interruptions from the pharmacy and patients about refills, lab results, and the like.

chinese.chinese: 卫生官员已经意识到这个问题，因为他们相信，如果不采取措施（如这种新的室检测方法）抑制TB传播的话，一些国家的很多新确诊患者就会出现多重耐药现象。
chinese.english: Health officials have sounded alarms because they believe that TB could reach the point where most new cases in some countries are resistant to many drugs without efforts like the new laboratory test to help stop the spread of the disease.

chinese.chinese: 研究者用X射线晶体学明确了具有挑战意义的肥胖受体的瘦素结合域的晶体结构。这项发现可能有助于研究者解决如何阻断或激动此受体的问题。肥胖激素（瘦素）产生于脂肪，过多的瘦素使超重的人易患多发性硬化、癌症和心脏病。而瘦素过少得人，如营养不良的人，将导致不孕症和免疫缺陷。
chinese.english: Researchers have solved the challenging crystal structure of the leptin-bindingdomain of the obesity receptor using state of the art X-ray crystallography,helping them to work out how to block or stimulate the receptor. Leptin, theobesity hormone, is produced by fat and excess leptin predisposes overweightpeople to conditions such as multiple sclerosis, cancer and heart diseasewhilst a deficiency in leptin, as occurs in malnutrition, results ininfertility and immunodeficiency.

chinese.chinese: 研究者用X射线晶体学明确了具有挑战意义的肥胖受体的瘦素结合域的晶体结构。这项发现可能有助于研究者解决如何阻断或激动此受体的问题。肥胖激素（瘦素）产生于脂肪，过多的瘦素使超重的人易患多发性硬化、癌症和心脏病。而瘦素过少得人，如营养不良的人，将导致不孕症和免疫缺陷。
chinese.english: Researchers have solved the challenging crystal structure of the leptin-bindingdomain of the obesity receptor using state of the art X-ray crystallography,helping them to work out how to block or stimulate the receptor. Leptin, theobesity hormone, is produced by fat and excess leptin predisposes overweightpeople to conditions such as multiple sclerosis, cancer and heart diseasewhilst a deficiency in leptin, as occurs in malnutrition, results ininfertility and immunodeficiency.

chinese.chinese: 大部分同层回顾研究都认为，对于不吸烟的人，那些按照建议做的人患癌致死、患心脏病致死或其他原因致死的概率都有相当的减低。
chinese.english: The majority of peer-reviewed published studieshave shown that for the majority on non-smoking people, those who follow theserecommendations properly have a considerably lower risk of dying early fromcancer, heart disease, and most other causes.

chinese.chinese: 利物浦大学的科学家发明了一项新的X线技术用来发现心脏组织纤维，并由此进一步证实心肌跳动的节律性。
chinese.english: Scientists at the University of Liverpool have developed a new X-ray technique to identify tissue fibres in the heart that ensure the muscle beats in a regular rhythm.

chinese.chinese: 新的3D成像技术使人们进一步理解人体的心脏跳动节律如何被打乱，从而帮助临床医生找到减少患者房颤发生的方法-房颤是指心肌纤维间的联系紊乱，导致心脏不能够节律性的向机体泵血。
chinese.english: The new 3D images could further understanding of how the body's heartbeat can be disturbed, which may help medics develop ways to reduce the risk of fibrillation - a condition in which heart muscle contracts chaotically and fails to pump blood rhythmically around the body.

chinese.chinese: 利物浦大学的研究团队应用微小CT扫描技术对心脏成像，并且结合碘元素的使用使得不同组织得以区分。研究人员发现，与心肌组织相比，心脏传导系统对于碘的吸收显著降低，从而使得科学家可以在3D图像上清晰地找到这个产生电信号的区域
chinese.english: The team at Liverpool used a micro CT scanner to image hearts that had been treated with iodine to highlight the different parts of the tissue. They found that the solution was absorbed less significantly by the conducting parts of the heart compared to the muscular parts of the organ, allowing scientists to clearly identify the areas that produce electrical activity on the resulting 3D image.

chinese.chinese: UKOSS研究中所得出的这种全英国0.7/100 000孕产妇MI发生率较美国同等条件下要低2-3倍，美国孕产妇MI的发生率为1.3-6.7/100 000分娩妇女，不过，得出美国孕产妇MI发生率的这些旧的回顾性研究当时只是使用了医院的出院记录，缺乏重新回顾以及对诊断的确证，因此可能会高估这种妊娠相关MI的发生率。此外，旧的研究包括了产后6周的MI发生率，而UKOSS研究中只计算产后1周的MI发生率。事实上，在可信赖筛查(Confidential Enquiry)中，绝大多数死于妊娠相关的缺血性心脏病和MI的孕产妇都发生于产后，而非在妊娠的过程中。然而，这些因素在发病率中所占比例有如此之大的差异有点不太可信，同时我们也怀疑UKOSS研究低估了妊娠中MI的发生率。UKOSS在方法学上依赖于每个产科中心指定的报告医生(通常是产科医生或助产士)每月反馈的病例卡信息，尽管在研究过程中如果遇到有特别罕见的病例也作为纳入病例。反过来，每个产科中心的报告医生依赖他们的同事可以做他们所从事领域内的任何病例报告。这种方法已经得到证实，并且对于研究像产前肺栓塞或子痫等非常罕见的产科疾病发生率也非常适用。然而，在产房产科医生或助产士处理范围之外的一些疾病或许不能像之前那些疾病那么可靠地被纳入研究，比如发生于妊娠早期的非ST段抬高性心肌梗死。这就如同对于MI研究，密切注意冠心病监护病房的新发病例往往并不会发现额外的新发病例。
chinese.english: The incidence of 0.7 per 100000 maternities found in the UKOSS study was 2–3fold lower than incidence figures in the USA, which range from 1.3 to 6.7 per 100000 deliveries, although these older retrospective studies used hospital discharge records, without notes review to validate the diagnosis, and therefore may have overestimated the incidence. Also the older studies included events up to 6weeks postpartum, whereas the UKOSS study only counted cases up to 1week postpartum. Indeed most of the women who died from ischaemic heart disease and MI related to pregnancy in the Confidential Enquiry did so after birth, and not during their pregnancies. However, it is unlikely that these factors accounted for the large disparities in incidence rates and we are concerned that the UKOSS study has underestimated the incidence of MI in pregnancy. The UKOSS methodology relies on nominated reporting clinicians (usually obstetricians or midwives) in each obstetric unit returning a monthly notification

chinese.chinese: 或许如果要确定真正的孕期MI发生率，一个更可靠的办法就是把英国心血管病学会/中央心脏审核数据库和心肌梗死(MI)审查计划中包括“妊娠”关键词的所有MI病例强制纳入研究，无论这些MI患者是采取了保守治疗还是溶栓治疗或者血管成形术治疗。
chinese.english: Perhaps a more reliable approach to determining the true incidence of MI in pregnancy would be to include 'pregnancy' as a mandatory field in the British Cardiovascular Intervention Society/Central Cardiac Audit Database and the MI National Audit Programme to capture all MIs, whether treated conservatively or with either thrombolysis or angioplasty.

chinese.chinese: 2012年5月1日发表在美国心脏学杂志的一项研究表明，结合使用氟-18标记的氟脱氧葡萄糖，正电子发射断层成像（PET）和计算机断层成像（CT）可以将心血管植入装置周围的活动性感染与正常的术后炎症区别开来。
chinese.english: Quebec City, QC - Combined fluorodeoxyglucose marked by fluorine-18 (18F-FDG) positron-emission tomography (PET) and computed tomography (CT) distinguish between an active infection around a cardiovascular implantable electronic device and normal postoperative inflammation, a new study in the May 1, 2012 issue of the Journal of the American College of Cardiology shows .

chinese.chinese: 在其他包括尿酸的因素当中，LVMI与年龄、男性性别、腰围、BMI、心脏收缩和舒张压以及肌酐水平等明显密切相关(p<0.001)。
chinese.english: The LVMI was strongly and significantly associated with age, male gender, waist circumference, BMI, systolic and diastolic BP, and creatinine, among other things, and with uric acid(p<0.001).

chinese.chinese: 好消息是，冠脉CT血管造影术的辐射剂量已经在稳步降低，从8年前的20mSv降到了剂量控制政策要求下、新技术可达到的不到2 mSv。Heilbron共同主导了一项实际环境下的单中心研究，报告出心脏CT所需的平均有效辐射剂量为3.7 mSv，与其他方式所需的平均剂量相比减少了很多。
chinese.english: The good news is that radiation doses from coronary CT angiography have steadily declined—from 20 mSv eight years ago to doses below 2 mSv that are attainable with new technology and dose-limiting strategies. Heilbron coauthored a real-world, single-center study that reporteda mean effective radiation dose from cardiac CT of 3.7 mSv, which was much less than the mean dose from other modalities .

chinese.chinese: 心脏射频消融手术成功率随左心房体积的减小而升高
chinese.english: Success up as LA Size Declines for RF Ablation at Cardiac Surgery

chinese.chinese: 在为永久性房颤（AF）患者成功实施Cox-maze IV射频（RF）消融手术的同时，实施如冠状动脉旁路移植术（CABG）或瓣膜修补等心脏手术的可能性，会因患者左心房（LA）直径的减小而升高。但AF复发风险会随心脏手术的复杂程度而上升，例如两个或更多瓣膜的修补术比仅修补一个的风险高。
chinese.english: Success with the Cox-maze IV radiofrequency(RF) ablation procedure for persistent atrial fibrillation (AF) , performedat the same session with cardiac surgeries like CABG or valve repair, is more likely the smaller the patient's left-atrial (LA) diameter. But the risk of AF recurrence rises with complexity of the cardiac surgery--as, for example, when two or more valves are repaired compared with only one.

chinese.chinese: BMI, alongside age,smoking, diabetes, high blood pressure, high blood cholesterol levels, and individualswho have family history of the disease, has been long recognised as a riskfactor for heart disease. Despite this, the actual causal contribution of BMIto disease risk has been difficult to quantify.BMI，及年龄、吸烟、糖尿病、高血压、高血脂及家族史，很久以前即被认为是心脏病的一个危险因素。尽管如此，但BMI在疾病中的实际风险贡献值有多少却很难量化。
chinese.english: ScienceDaily (May1, 2012) — In addition to the many risk factors associated with poor health,reducing body mass index (BMI) will have a considerable and independent impactif you want to reduce the risk of developing ischemic heart disease (IHD). Thisis the key finding from new research, published in PLoS Medicine, whichevaluated the causal relationship between BMI and heart disease in 76,000individuals.科学日报2012-5-1报，除了许多与不健康相关的危险因素，减少BMI会有一种相当大的独立的影响，如果你想减少罹患缺血性病的危险。这是一项新的研究的重要发现，该研究发表在PloS医学杂志，该研究主要评估76000个体的BMI剂病间的因果关系。

chinese.chinese: BMI, alongside age,smoking, diabetes, high blood pressure, high blood cholesterol levels, and individualswho have family history of the disease, has been long recognised as a riskfactor for heart disease. Despite this, the actual causal contribution of BMIto disease risk has been difficult to quantify.BMI，及年龄、吸烟、糖尿病、高血压、高血脂及家族史，很久以前即被认为是心脏病的一个危险因素。尽管如此，但BMI在疾病中的实际风险贡献值有多少却很难量化。
chinese.english: ScienceDaily (May1, 2012) — In addition to the many risk factors associated with poor health,reducing body mass index (BMI) will have a considerable and independent impactif you want to reduce the risk of developing ischemic heart disease (IHD). Thisis the key finding from new research, published in PLoS Medicine, whichevaluated the causal relationship between BMI and heart disease in 76,000individuals.科学日报2012-5-1报，除了许多与不健康相关的危险因素，减少BMI会有一种相当大的独立的影响，如果你想减少罹患缺血性病的危险。这是一项新的研究的重要发现，该研究发表在PloS医学杂志，该研究主要评估76000个体的BMI剂病间的因果关系。

chinese.chinese: 药物易感性测试，及室支持的发展都需要提高，以能够给病人提供正确的药物。需要更好些的二线药物－其中有些已经在生产中了，治疗策略也应该提前测试好并在大规模一点的临床试验中被标准化下来。还需要流行病学研究找到结核高发区域。
chinese.english: Drug susceptibility testing, alongside the development of laboratory support, needs to be improved to give patients the correct drugs. Better second-line drugs — some are already in the pipeline — are needed, and treatment strategies should be tested and standardised in large clinical trials. Epidemiological studies are also required to identify areas of high risk.

chinese.chinese: “急诊科是研究失误的天然室。”Croskerry博士称。一些组织、委员会和特定的研究已将注意力集中在医疗实践中错误事件的发生。Croskerry指出，急诊室在多方面相互影响作用的高度不确定情形下，成为一个特别易于出错的环境。这些导致误诊的重要思维模式对急诊医师理解并纳入训练课目是至关重要的。
chinese.english: "The emergency department is a natural laboratory for the study of error," stated Dr. Croskerry. Organizations, committees, and specific studies have focused on the occurrence of errors in hospital practice. Croskerry suggested that the ED, with its multiple interacting processes in the context of high degrees of uncertainty, is a uniquely error-prone environment. The underlying patterns of thinking that can lead to misdiagnosis are crucial for EPs to understand and incorporate into training programs.

chinese.chinese: 近年来，干细胞的研究者已经能非常熟练的处理室中培养的成年干细胞。
chinese.english: In recent years, stem cell researchers have become very adept at manipulating the fate of adult stem cells cultured in the lab.

chinese.chinese: 方法、背景和患者：对19271名年龄在66岁及以上的老年患者进行基于人口数量的队列研究，这些患者均享受医疗保险，并没有接受明确的针对前列腺癌临床分期为T1-T2期的局部治疗。这些患者均在指定的美国地区，并在1992-2002年间确诊，随访至2006年12月31日，统计所有原因导致的死亡率，对前列腺癌死亡率的随访至2004年12月31日。应用室变量分析以修正由混杂变量所致的潜在偏倚。
chinese.english: Design, Setting, and Patients A population-based cohort study of 19 271 men aged 66 years or older receiving Medicare who did not receive definitive local therapy for clinical stage T1-T2 prostate cancer. These patients were diagnosed in 1992-2002 within predefined US geographical areas, with follow-up through December 31, 2006, for all-cause mortality and through December 31, 2004, for prostate cancer–specific mortality. Instrumental variable analysis was used to address potential biases associated with unmeasured confounding variables.

chinese.chinese: Javaheri和同事在他们的研究中观察了238名年龄介于13-16之间的青少年，检查他们在家和在睡眠室的睡眠模式，分别应用腕体动记录仪和全夜的人体测量法多导睡眠图，然后测量至少两天的九次血压。
chinese.english: In their study, Javaheri and colleagues looked specifically at 238 adolescents, aged 13 to 16, and measured sleeping patterns both at home, using wrist actigraphy, and in a sleep lab, using overnight polysomnography, anthropometry, and then taking nine blood-pressure measurements over two days.

chinese.chinese: 在该研究中，OHSU的研究者们在俄勒冈干细胞中心和普外学系生产并探究这些抗体。先向小鼠体内注射正常的胰腺细胞，然后便可以得到抗体。接下来，他们将小鼠的脾脏细胞与一种骨髓瘤细胞系融合，这样就可以产生能在室条件下长期存活的细胞。研究者们利用这些细胞所分泌的抗体去筛检正常胰腺组织和胰腺癌组织。
chinese.english: For this study, OHSU researchers in the Oregon Stem Cell Center and in the Department of General Surgery generated and characterized antibodies. These antibodies were developed following the injection of normal pancreas cells into mice. They next took the spleen cells of the mice and fused them with a myeloma cell line, which yields cells that can be grown for long periods of time in the laboratory. These cells secreted antibodies which researchers were then able to screen for reaction with normal pancreatic and pancreatic cancer tissues.

chinese.chinese: 在这项研究中，Lee和他的同事在室使用IGF-I刺激乳腺癌细胞，进而确定细胞中的超过800个基因对生长因子的反应是如何的。然后他们再使用这个“基因标签”和相关的基因标签对取自乳腺肿瘤的患者的样本进行预测，试图预言这些患者的命运。
chinese.english: In this study, Lee and his colleagues stimulated breast cancer cells with IGF-I in the laboratory and defined how more than 800 genes in the cells responded to the growth factor. They then examined samples of patient breast tumors with this "gene signature" and correlated the gene signatures with the fate of the patients.

chinese.chinese: 对于输卵管畸形或阻塞的女性来说，体外受精已成为怀孕的最佳手段。自从上世纪70年代后期该方法诞生以来，其技术已日臻完美，成功率也获得了显著的提高，其应用范围已扩大到了许多其它的生育问题，比如严重的男方因素和不明原因的不孕症。总的来说，这种技术是指对卵巢进行有意识的过度刺激，通过吸引针获取卵母细胞，在室条件下使其与精子结合，再从产生的胚胎中选择适合的回植到子宫中。通常在输卵管中进行的过程现在在室中完成，亦即形成某种“输卵管旁路”。IVF允许对数个胚胎进行选择，从中挑选最健康的胚胎进行回植。它的侵袭性小于外科手术，与之相关的术后休息时间也是极少的。最大的风险是卵巢过渡刺激综合征（发生率1~5%）和多胎妊娠。
chinese.english: In vitro fertilization has become the dominant technique for achieving pregnancy in women with abnormal or blocked fallopian tubes. Since its introduction in the late 1970's, the technique has been refined, success rates have improved dramatically and its use is now applied to many additional fertility problems such as severe male factor and unexplained infertility. In essence, the technique involves intentionally hyper-stimulating the ovaries, obtaining the oocytes via needle-aspiration, combining them with the sperm in the laboratory and selection among resultant embryos for transfer back to the uterus. The events which ordinarily occur in the fallopian tubes thus occur in the laboratory, providing a sort of “tubal bypass”. IVF allows selection of the healthiest embryos for transfer and often a choice among several embryos. It is less invasive than surgery and associated post-procedure down-time is minimal. Its greatest risks are ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome (occurring in 1-5%

chinese.chinese: 医生极少因为工作出色受到奖励，至少没有以任何有形的方式。在校园期间，你需要应付各种功课，通过职业资格考试，参加室技能考核，但是一旦进入了临床实践，这些传统的考核方式就不复存在。乍看起来，P4P似乎能多少弥补这一缺陷。但是，首先需要解决的深层缺陷，是P4P对医疗服务所造成的意想不到的危害。
chinese.english: Doctors have seldom been rewarded for excellence, at least not in any tangible way. In medical school, there were tests, board exams and lab practicals, but once you go into clinical practice, these traditional measures fall away. At first glance, pay for performance would seem to remedy this problem. But first its deep flaws must be addressed before patient care is compromised in unexpected ways.

chinese.chinese: 早在七月份，罗氏声称将关闭斯坦福研究园的室，但该公司含糊其辞，称如果成功收购基因泰克就关闭该室。基因泰克至今仍在犹豫不决，但大部分人认为并购只是时间问题。而现在，罗氏告诉《信使报》记者，无论如何都将关闭帕洛阿尔托的研究基地。
chinese.english: Back in July Roche said it would pull the plug on the lab in Stanford Research Park, but the company hedged, saying the closure would happen if the bid for Genentech were successful. Genentech has demurred so far, but most people think it's just a matter of time before the deal happens. And now, Roche told the Mercury News it's closing the plant, no matter what.

chinese.chinese: 与对照组的婴儿相比，母亲接受流感疫苗出生的婴儿患室确认的流感感染较少，63%具有疫苗效力（95％可信区间，5％－85％）。
chinese.english: Compared with infants in the control group, those born to mothers who received influenza vaccine had fewer cases of laboratory-confirmed influenza, with a vaccine effectiveness of 63% (95% confidence interval [CI], 5% - 85%).

chinese.chinese: Dr. Heaney测试积累的维生素C细胞水平，说道室维生素C的水平与病人过量服用维生素补充剂而达到的水平相似。癌症中心早期的研究表明与正常细胞相比，维生素C在癌症细胞积累得更多。
chinese.english: Dr. Heaney measured the buildup of vitamin C levels in cells and said that the levels of vitamin C used in the experiments were similar to those that would result if a patient took large doses of the vitamin in supplement form. Earlier research at the cancer center showed that vitamin C seems to accumulate within cancer cells more than in normal cells

chinese.chinese: 在第一个，一个患儿接受了过量的胰岛素。此后被送入重症监护病房。在另一个，一个医生忽略了一项室检查，导致一患儿因严重感染住院。结果是：过量注射胰岛素的病例更容易被告知给患儿家属，而对室检查的忽视可能并没有第一个明显。
chinese.english: In one, a child receives an overdose of insulin and is admitted to the intensive care unit. In the other, a doctor overlooks a lab test, which leads to a child being hospitalized for a serious infection. The insulin overdose would be more apparent to the child's family, while the overlooked lab test might not be so obvious.

chinese.chinese: “George Coukos博士的室正在进行卵巢癌新的治疗，该治疗主要针对肿瘤周围的血管，阻断血管对肿瘤的供应，从而阻止肿瘤生长。”来自于宾夕法尼亚州的卵巢癌研究中心的博士后研究人员李春生博士说道。
chinese.english: "The laboratory of Dr. George Coukos is developing novel treatments for ovarian cancer which target the vasculature surrounding the tumor, thereby disrupting the blood supply needed for the tumor to grow," said Chunsheng Li, Ph.D., a post-doctoral research fellow at the University of Pennsylvania Ovarian Cancer Research Center.

chinese.chinese: 在室水平的研究，这些数据展示桔子皮被认为是能除去水溶中污物的可行性材料。Bena ssa说，桔子皮作为低成本，原生态的材料可以在除去染料污物中使用，比那些昂贵的材料有更多的选择余地，在处理污水中那些有害和讨厌的物种中更有效果。
chinese.english: "In laboratory-scale studies, the data show that orange peel has a considerable potential for the removal of dyes from aqueous solutions over a wide range of concentrations," Bena ssa says. "Orange peel may be used as a low-cost, natural and abundant source for the removal of dyes, and it may be an alternative to more costly materials. It may also be effective in removing other harmful or undesirable species present in the waste effluents."

chinese.chinese: 两个心脏病专家正设法解决这一问题：何时才是开始心脏病一级预防治疗的合适时机呢？他们发现这个门槛需要提高，因为最近发现，两种常用于心血管疾病的药物，烟酸和非诺贝特都无效。
chinese.english: Two cardiologists grapple with the question of when it is appropriate to initiate medical therapy for the primary prevention of cardiovascular disease, concluding that the threshold for treatment needs to be higher, given the recent failures of niacin and fenofibrate, two drugs widely used in cardiovascular medicine .

chinese.chinese: 研究还发现，因为儿童的2型糖尿病发病较早，所以人生中患并发症的风险更大，如心脏病发作和中风等。 Terri H. Lipman博士是宾夕法尼亚护理学校的注册护士，是这个多中心研究的合作研究人，也是Miriam Stirl的有聘期的营养学教授和儿童护理教授，还是个儿科糖尿病专家。
chinese.english: The study also found that because children develop Type 2 diabetes at younger ages, there is an increased lifetime risk for serious complications such as heart attack and stroke. Terri H. Lipman, PhD, CRNP, of the University of Pennsylvania School of Nursing, was a co-investigator in this multi-center study. Dr. Lipman, the Miriam Stirl Endowed Term Professor of Nutrition and professor of nursing of children, is an expert in pediatric diabetes.

chinese.chinese: 泰瑟枪可使心脏骤停并可能导致死亡
chinese.english: Tasers Can Stop The Heart And Kill

chinese.chinese: 研究中入选的这8例男性在实施泰瑟枪电击时都有血液中酒精含量增高，同时合并/或者患有心脏结构性疾病。根据之前研究人员得出的结果，这些都是使用电子控制装置实施电击而发生室上性心动过速或室颤增加的风险因素。
chinese.english: Some of the eight men in the study had elevated blood alcohol, and/or structural heart disease when they were shot with a stun gun. According to previous researchers, these are factors which could increase the risk of ventricular tachycardia or ventricular fibrillation following a shock by an electronic control device.

chinese.chinese: 研究作者VéroniqueRegnault博士（法国南锡de Lorraine大学）和他的同事在美国心脏病学会杂志2012年5月15号刊上解释道，肱动脉脉压（BPP）和颈动脉脉压脉（CPP）之间的差异是脉压增幅的一生理标志，这种差异随时间推移衰减。Regnault博士的小组最近指出，肱动脉脉压、颈动脉脉压以及肱动脉脉压与颈动脉脉压比值（肱/颈比），都是有意义并独立的心血管疾病危险因素，其中对心血管疾病死亡最有效的预测指标是“肱/颈比”。相比绝经前妇女而言，高血压和心血管疾病并发症在男性及绝经后妇女中更常见，Regnault等人通过比较肱动脉脉压、颈动脉脉压及“肱/颈比”这些指标对死亡率的各自预测作用，来研究“肱/颈比”对心血管疾病的影响是否存在性别差异。
chinese.english: The difference between the brachial PP (BPP) and carotid PP (CPP) is a physiological marker of PP amplification that diminishes over time, study author Dr Véronique Regnault (Université de Lorraine, Nancy, France) andcolleagues explain in the May 15, 2012 issue of the Journal of the AmericanCollege of Cardiology. Regnault's group recently showed that brachial PP,carotid PP, and the ratio of BPP to CPP (B/C ratio) are significant and independent cardiovascular risk factors and that the most powerful predictor of cardiovascular death is the B/C ratio . Since hypertension and cardiovascular complications are more common in men and postmenopausal womenthan in premenopausal women, Regnault et al compared the respective impacts of carotid PP, brachial PP, and B/C ratios on mortality rates to see if the B/Cratio's impact on cardiovascular risk is different in men and women.

chinese.chinese: 研究人员发现异常心脏蛋白的位置及效应
chinese.english: Researchers discover location and effect of abnormal heart proteins

chinese.chinese: Guelph大学研究人员发现了能够引起心衰的异常心脏蛋白的位置及效应，这一发现为全世界治疗心衰这一花费昂贵的健康问题提供了潜在的新的治疗方式
chinese.english: University of Guelph researchers have found the location and effect of abnormal heart proteins that can cause cardiac failure, a discovery that points to potential new ways to treat the most costly health problem in the world.

chinese.chinese: 他们随后追踪异常发生的位置以及效应。三个位点异常引起了心脏收缩障碍的发生。另三个位点异常影响了actin蛋白的稳定性和效率。
chinese.english: They then mapped where on the abnormalities occurred and their effects. Three were in spots that resulted in problems with heart contractions; three others were in locations that affected stability and efficiency.

chinese.chinese: 在2012年心脏节律协会召开的科学大会上，Adabag报告了以上来自多中心社区动脉粥样硬化风险(ARIC)研究的研究结果。ARIC队列研究总计纳入15156人，平均年龄54岁，其中女性占55%；基于研究设计，纳入人群的四分之一是非洲裔美国人。在平均12.6年的随访中，总计观察到独立发生了301例心源性猝死事件。上述三个反应肥胖的指标都能够预测心源性猝死的风险，且与种族无关。
chinese.english: The analysis from the multicenter Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) study, which Adabag presented here at the Heart Rhythm Society 2012 Scientific Sessions, included 15 156 people (mean age 54 years), of whom 55% were women and, by design, one-fourth African American. The 301 SCD events observed over an average 12.6 years of follow-up were independently adjudicated. All three obesity markers predicted SCD risk regardless of race.

chinese.chinese: 在亚特兰大举行的美国心脏病学会2012年度护理质量和成果研究会议(QCOR12)上展示了该项研究成果。
chinese.english: The results were presented at the American Heart Association's annual Quality of Care and Outcomes Research meeting (QCOR12) in Atlanta.

chinese.chinese: 现在，由贝斯以色列女执事医疗中心(BIDMC)调查员领导的研究团队发现了这个危险疾病的新的重要线索，这是第一次提供清楚的证据证明围产期心肌病(PPCM)是血管性疾病，它可能是由于围产期心脏血管原性蛋白失衡所引起的，而刚好在分娩之前或者随着分娩直接发生。
chinese.english: Now, a research team led by investigators at Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center (BIDMC) has uncovered important new clues behind this dangerous condition, providing the first clear evidence that peripartum cardiomyopathy (PPCM) is a vascular disease, brought about by an imbalance of angiogenic proteins in the heart during the peripartum period, just prior to and immediately following delivery.

chinese.chinese: 大约每3000名无已知心脏病病史的妊娠女性就有1名患有围产期心肌病。其症状可轻微或是严重，包括心脏泵血功能的减弱引起的气短。大约1/2的围产期心肌病女性患者可自然痊愈，但对于其他的患者，情况或将变得更为糟糕，甚至达到需要心脏移植的地步。
chinese.english: PPCM affects approximately one in 3,000 pregnant women with no known history of heart disease. Symptoms can be mild or severe, and include shortness of breath, caused by the heart's diminished pumping ability. About one-half of women who develop PPCM will spontaneously recover, but for others, the condition will grow worse, even to the point that they require a heart transplant.

chinese.chinese: 这项新的研究是在以下研究基础上建立的：生命线项目和杜克大学的卡洛琳娜急诊室急性心梗再灌注研究。“通过与北卡州所有的具有初级PCI资质医院达成一致，我们能够说服大部分的急诊室和急诊医疗系统来采取统一的，协调的步骤来进行快速诊断和治疗。”杜克大学心脏病专家t Dr James Jollis在提到RACE项目是说。
chinese.english: The new program builds on the Mission: Lifeline program and Duke's Reperfusion of Acute Myocardial Infarction in Carolina Emergency Departments (RACE) project. "By building consensus among all primary-PCI hospitals in the state, we were able to convince the majority of emergency departments and emergency medical systems to adopt uniform and coordinated processes for rapid diagnosis and treatment," said Duke cardiologist Dr James Jollis, referring to the RACE program.

chinese.chinese: 早期的研究表明，孕前肥胖的女性对胎儿器官具有负面影响，比如：心脏、肝脏和胰腺。因为胎儿发育很快，而且对母亲的生理特性很敏感，因此俄亥俄州立大学研究人员试图查明母亲肥胖是否也会影响胎儿的大脑。
chinese.english: Previous research has suggested that a woman's pre-pregnancy obesity can have a negative effect on fetal organs, such as the heart, liver and pancreas. Because fetal development is rapid and sensitive to a mother's physiological characteristics, Ohio State University researchers sought to find out whether a mother's obesity also could affect the fetal brain.

chinese.chinese: 来自澳大利亚Melbourne Baker IDI心脏及糖尿病研究机构的教授Jonathan Shaw, 助理教授 Anna Peeters, 医生 Kathryn Backholer,和助理教授Dianna Magliano检查了三种不同的预防策略来预防糖尿病患者的出现。
chinese.english: Professor Jonathan Shaw, Associate Professor Anna Peeters, Dr Kathryn Backholer, and Associate Professor Dianna Magliano from the Baker IDI Heart and Diabetes Institute in Melbourne, Australia, examined three different strategy models to avert future diabetes cases that could be averted:

chinese.chinese: 然而，在Minn罗彻斯特的梅奥诊所，HIV和免疫研究室主任Andrew Badley博士说：该试验不具有足够的广泛性。
chinese.english: However, Dr. Andrew Badley, director of the HIV and immunology research lab at the Mayo Clinic in Rochester, Minn., said those tests have probably not been extensive enough.

chinese.chinese: 布雷迪说，“走出室，我们可能会找到以前从未发现过的化合物，而这些化合物具有的某些功能很可能比室合成的化合物更有帮助”。“如果你仔细观察大自然的复杂和神奇，就会很明显地发现，大自然提供给我们很多的有效讯息。”
chinese.english: “We can go out and find compounds that have never been seen before, and those are very likely to have some functionalities that are even more useful than the ones we've got in the lab already,” Banik says. “If you look at the complexity and elegance of the solutions found by Mother Nature, it just seems incredibly obvious that there are more effective elements to go after than those to which we currently have access.”

chinese.chinese: 研究人员集中研究来自犹他州的泥土样本，布雷迪室将所有的遗传物质组成一个包含千万基因的巨型基因库，远大于同类其他任何的DNA基因库。其中包括约相当于10万细菌的基因。班尼克克隆了与新OxyC序列有关的两种独特基因簇，并利用其中一个基因簇合成出一族新抗生素。这些新抗生素除了具有与目前最强效药物同样的抗菌活性以外，还有其独特的结构特点，可以做为潜在的医疗优势。
chinese.english: Focusing on the sample from Utah, the Brady lab organized all of the genetic material into a 10 million member megalibrary, far larger than any other DNA library of its kind. It contained the rough equivalent of 100,000 bacterial genomes. Banik cloned two unique gene clusters that were associated with new OxyC sequences and used one of the clusters to manufacture a new family of antibiotics. In addition to combating bacteria as well as the most powerful drugs in use today, the new antibiotics have unique structural features that could hold as yet undetermined medical advantages.

chinese.chinese: 以美元计算，没有哪一家大药厂公告能与诺华相比，最近诺华斥宣布准备花4亿美金在天津新建一个胰岛素生产基地项目搁浅，这个我们将单独报道（见文章）。诺和诺德在厂房附近正在构建一个新的室，新室将会称为诺和诺德在华的公司初级产品基地，新室有22400平米，可以容纳500人，预计2012年可以投入使用。
chinese.english: In terms of sheer dollar size, no other big pharma announcement can compete with Novo Nordisk's recent ground breaking of a $400 million insulin manufacturing facility in Tianjin, which we reported on separately (see article). The new facility, which is being constructed adjacent to an existing Novo Nordisk plant, will be the company's primary production site in China, while also serving the entire Asia Pacific region. The new 22,500 sq. meter facility, which will employ almost 500 people, is expected to become operational in 2012.

chinese.chinese: 他通过增加室中普通小鼠的骨细胞复合胺来验证这个结论，这些细胞停止了生长
chinese.english: He tested the idea by adding serotonin to normal mouse bone cells in the laboratory. The cells stopped growing.

chinese.chinese: Wood医生说，运动员和医生在临床表现与室血化验不相符时可能会小心翼翼。经常运动员在比赛后因为呼吸困难或是晕厥或胸痛而进入急诊室。（特别是因为他们胃部不适），常常，她补充说，这些运动员却是健康的。
chinese.english: Dr. Wood said that athletes and doctors should be wary of blood tests that seem at odds with clinical findings. All too often athletes end up in emergency rooms after races because they are breathing hard or they fainted or their chests hurt (typically because their stomachs are upset). Often, she added, those athletes are just fine.

chinese.chinese: APPLE医生说：每个人的反应都是不同的。“每个人都有自己的室结果。”
chinese.english: “Everyone responds differently,” Dr. Apple said. “Each person is their own little experiment.”

chinese.chinese: 明尼苏达大学医学院室医学和病理学专家 Fred Apple医生说，“我能告诉你好多相似的事情”
chinese.english: “I can tell you several stories like that,” said Dr. Fred Apple, a professor of laboratory medicine and pathology at the University of Minnesota School of Medicine.

chinese.chinese: “10年来，人们认为这一现象是酵母特有的， ” Sinclair说。因此，哈佛大学医学院室的科学家，博士后Dr Philipp Oberdoerffer和其他同事决定利用先进的芯片技术平台寻找哺乳动物中的SIR2，在老鼠细胞称为SIRT1。
chinese.english: "For ten years, this entire phenomenon in yeast was considered to be relevant only to yeast," said Sinclair. So he, Dr Philipp Oberdoerffer, a postdoctoral scientist at his Harvard Medical School lab, and other colleagues, decided to find out what happens in mammals by using a sophisticated microarray platform to probe the mammalian version of Sir2, called SIRT1, in mouse cells.

chinese.chinese: 在一股逆向移民潮中，出现了在美国培训过的科学家纷纷到大陆来建立生物技术公司、契约研究公司和大学室。
chinese.english: In a reverse migration, U.S.-trained scientists are setting up biotech startups, contract-research companies, and university labs on the mainland

chinese.chinese: 室危机：生物技术公司倒闭潮来临
chinese.english: Crisis In The Lab: Biotech Bankruptcies Are Looming

chinese.chinese: 先进仪器与物理室主任，哲学博士Winfried Wiegraebe说，“在这个研究中开发的新技术可能有各种各样的应用，包括应用于监测在在活的有机体内的其他数量很少的细胞种。”他为双光子显微镜实验提供了关键性的援助。
chinese.english: “The new technique developed in this study may have a variety of applications including monitoring other types of cells in low population numbers in vivo,” said Winfried Wiegraebe, Ph.D., Director of Advanced Instrumentation and Physics, who provided the key assistance in the two-photon microscopic experiments.

chinese.chinese: 该研究在线发表于12月，第八期Proceedings Of the national academy of sciences上，研究人员报到了这一被称为SARI的新基因，这一基因是通过Fisher室首创的消减杂交这一有力技术发现的。SARI是由干扰素这种免疫系统强调节剂诱导表达的，并可以抑制肿瘤生长和肿瘤细胞的存活，这一作用是通过干扰可以促进细胞分裂，提高癌症细胞存活的癌症细胞分子的作用而实现的。
chinese.english: In the study, published online in the Dec. 8 issue of the Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences, researchers report the discovery of a new gene named SARI, which was uncovered by a powerful technique pioneered in the Fisher laboratory known as subtraction hybridization. SARI, which is induced by a potent immune system modulator called interferon, was found to suppress growth and survival of tumor cells by interfering with the action of cancer cell molecules that drive cell division and promote survival.

chinese.chinese: 发表在2007年1月份的芯片室杂志上的一篇论文中，卡姆和他的同事首次介绍了该微流体装置。卡姆说，化学工程专业的研究生Vernella Vickerman（人名）和生物工程专业的博士后Seok Chung（人名），在该装置的开发过程中起了关键作用。
chinese.english: Kamm and his colleagues first described their microfluidic device in a January 2007 paper in Lab on a Chip. Vernella Vickerman, a graduate student in chemical engineering, and Seok Chung, a postdoctoral fellow in biological engineering, played critical roles in developing the device, Kamm said.

chinese.chinese: “默克生物仿制药是作为人造化GlycoFi酵母粉平台结果成功的独特位置，这有可能为我们提供一个潜在的竞争优势，许多市场生化治疗的专利将到期，”默克公司研究室副总裁彼得金说。
chinese.english: “Merck BioVentures is uniquely positioned for success as a result of the humanized GlycoFi yeast platform, which has the potential to provide us with a competitive advantage at a time when the patents on many marketed biologic therapeutics are set to expire,” said Peter Kim, executive vice president and president of Merck Research Laboratories.

chinese.chinese: 体温每升高1摄氏度，死亡及重残率成倍增加。已有证据表明低温疗法对心脏骤停病人有效，目前正在进行一些临床试验以证明低温疗法对卒中病人也有帮助。已经完成的临床试验表明，目标体温应该控制到正常范围（华氏95.9-99.5度）
chinese.english: For each 1 degree Cincrease in the body temperature of stroke patients, the risk of death orsevere disability more than doubles. Therapeutic cooling has been shown to help cardiacarrest patients, and clinical trials are underway todetermine whether such cooling could also help stroke patients. Until thosetrials are completed, the goal should be to keep normal temperatures (between95.9 and 99.5 degrees F).

chinese.chinese: 根据美国心脏协会杂志上的关于血液循化的最新研究表明：心脏中植入确保心脏节律设备的患者中，D型人格的患者比其他患者健康状况糟糕。
chinese.english: People with a distressed (Type D) personality reported worse health than other patients after having devices implanted to ensure proper heart rhythm, according to new research in Circulation: Cardiovascular Quality and Outcomes, an American Heart Association journal.

chinese.chinese: 有证据表明心脏的辐射剂量平均值从FB状态下的9Gy下降到DIBH状态下的3.7Gy，辐射剂量的最大值从44.9Gy到24.7Gy。DIBH同样显著地降低了肺受到的辐射量。
chinese.english: The evaluation demonstrated that under DIBH, the average dose to the heart decreased from 9 Gy under FB to 3.7 Gy, with the maximum heart dose being reduced from 44.9 Gy to 24.7 Gy. DIBH was also noted to reduce the amount of radiation to the lung.

chinese.chinese: 昔多芬，也被称为治疗阳痿的药物伟哥,，可能对儿童和年轻成人先天性心脏病发育不全的心脏有所增益。来自费城儿童医院的研究人员报告称，昔多芬可显著提高儿童和年轻成人单心室心脏疾病缓解幸存者在超声心动图中的心脏功能。
chinese.english: Sildenafil, also known as the erectile dysfunction drug Viagra, may give a boost to underdeveloped hearts in children and young adults with congenital heart defects. Researchers from The Children's Hospital of Philadelphia report that sildenafil significantly improved echocardiographic measures of heart function in children and young adult survivors of single ventricle heart disease palliation.

chinese.chinese: 近期这项研究首次表明，昔多芬可以改善心室超声心动图中一侧心室生理机能不全的儿童和年轻成人的心室功能。这种影响心室功能的生物学机制还没有完全弄清楚，Goldberg说,但他指出，针对其他心脏病患者的研究提示抑制异常高水平的磷酸二酯酶E5 (PDE5)可以产生我们在一侧心室缺陷患者实验中的效果。
chinese.english: The current study was the first to show that sildenafil improved echocardiographic measures of ventricular performance in children and young adults with single-ventricle physiology. The biological mechanisms that affect ventricular performance are not fully understood, said Goldberg, but he noted that studies in other patients with heart disease suggest that inhibiting the abnormally high levels of the enzyme phosphodiesterase E5 (PDE5) may produce the physiological benefits seen in the single-ventricle patients.

chinese.chinese: 但是也有专家心存担忧：尽管已经有大量的数据可以排除lorcaserin与心瓣膜病之间的联系，但是一旦批准lorcaserin入市后，服用药物的患者还是得规律地行超声心动图检查心脏瓣膜情况。
chinese.english: The panel was not convinced, however, that there were enough data to rule out a link between lorcaserin and valvular heart disease. Several panelists suggested that if lorcaserin is approved, patients should regularly be screened for heart valve disease via echocardiogram.

chinese.chinese: 心悸以房颤风险因素出现是作为Troms 研究的结果被发表在《欧洲心脏病预防杂志》上，而Troms 研究是一项针对挪威地区普通人群的大规模前瞻性随访研究。研究参加者的招募在1994-1995年进行，对象包括该地区年龄超过25岁的所有居民。经剔除后， 研究列入22815名年龄在25-96岁的对象，而且随访的平均时间为11.1年。调查开始时他们的平均年龄为46岁。
chinese.english: The emergence of palpitations as a risk factor for AF is reported in the European Journal of Preventive Cardiology, with results from the Troms Study, a large prospective follow-up of the general population of this region of Norway. Participants in this study were recruited in 1994-95 and included all inhabitants in the region over the age of 25. After exclusions, 22,815 people aged between 25 and 96 were included and followed up for a mean time of 11.1 years. Mean age at baseline was 46 years.

chinese.chinese: 这项研究首次表明载脂蛋白C-Ⅲ (apoC-Ⅲ), 有时位于HDL胆固醇表面的小分子蛋白，可能会增加心脏疾病风险，而不含这种蛋白的HDL胆固醇可能才具有专门的心脏保护作用。
chinese.english: This is the first study to show that a small protein, apolipoprotein C-III (apoC-III), that sometimes resides on the surface of HDL cholesterol may increase the risk of heart disease and that HDL cholesterol without this protein may be especially heart protective.

chinese.chinese: 肥胖症常常伴随有许多与健康有关的问题：糖尿病、高血压、心脏病、甚至某些癌症。也许最令人担忧的是，儿科医生报告称已经看到这些疾病的端倪——以前认为这些问题只在成年人中存在——而现在在3岁大的孩子中也发现了。
chinese.english: With obesity comes a host of health-related problems: diabetes, high blood pressure, heart disease and even certain cancers. Perhaps most worrisome of all, pediatricians report seeing the beginning of these diseases — previously considered problems among adults only — in children as young as 3.

chinese.chinese: 如果心脏性猝死和HIV/AIDS两者确实存在联系,那么,这种联系到底是什么呢?这些知识能够用于延长患者的生存期吗?
chinese.english: What is the connection, if any, between sudden cardiac death and people with HIV/AIDS? And can that knowledge help prolong their lives?

chinese.chinese: 研究人员相信：HIV极显著的改变了心脏的电生理状态，从而导致了传导异常。很多HIV治疗药物通过延长QT间隔，使心脏脱离正常的心电周期——这增加了患者发生猝死的风险。上面提到的这些因素和其他因素可能都与患者猝死有关。
chinese.english: Researchers believe HIV changes the electrophysiology of the heart in a way so pronounced that it causes conduction abnormalities. And many HIV medications can throw off the heart's electrical cycle by prolonging the QT interval, which increases the risk of sudden death. These and other variables could be contributing factors.

chinese.chinese: 在参加the National Institutes of Health–AARP Diet and Health研究的人群中（其中229119名男性，173141名女性；基线年龄为50-70岁），我们评估咖啡摄入与随后全因死亡率和特异病因死亡率的关系。我们排除了基线水平患有肿瘤，心脏病和中风的参与者并记录基线状态人们的咖啡摄入量。
chinese.english: We examined the association of coffee drinking with subsequent total and cause-specific mortality among 229,119 men and 173,141 women in the National Institutes of Health–AARP Diet and Health Study who were 50 to 71 years of age at baseline. Participants with cancer, heart disease, and stroke were excluded. Coffee consumption was assessed once at baseline.

chinese.chinese: 交感神经系统中过度活跃的神经元——或多或少——在慢性肾病的患者中非常常见。该技术不但有益于患者的高血压和心脏疾病，也有益于减缓其肾病的恶化。
chinese.english: Overactivity of neurons in the sympathetic - or fight or flight - nervous system is very common in patients with CKD. It not only contributes to high blood pressure and heart problems in these patients, but also to worsening of their kidney disease.

chinese.chinese: 这项研究在2012年5月19日-5月22日在塞尔维亚的贝尔格莱德召开的心衰会议上提出，在欧洲心脏病学会的心衰协会的主要年会。
chinese.english: The research was presented at the Heart Failure Congress 2012, 19-22 May, in Belgrade, Serbia. The Congress is the main annual meeting of the Heart Failure Association of the European Society of Cardiology.

chinese.chinese: Sneddon是Alberta大学心脏病医生Gavin Oudit的病人，Gavin Oudit一直以来在研究一种叫ACE2的分子，这种分子已被证明具有心脏保护作用。Gavin Oudit最近的工作发表在五月份第十一期的Circulation Research杂志上，Gavin Oudit及其同事在实验室动物模型上发现，缺乏ACE2会使与糖尿病有关的心血管并发症进一步恶化。
chinese.english: Sneddon is a patient of University of Alberta cardiologist Gavin Oudit, who has long been doing research on a molecule called ACE2, which he has previously shown protects the heart in cardiovascular disease. In his most recent work, published in the May 11 edition of Circulation Research, Oudit and colleagues at the University of Florida have found that lab models that lacked ACE2 had worse cardiovascular complications related to diabetes.

chinese.chinese: 几个世纪以来，人们用光学显微镜观察那些肉眼无法看到的结构。各种形式的光学显微镜是室必不可少的实验设备。尽管显微镜技术得到了巨大的发展，但是光衍射决定了光学显微镜分辩率的极限，而且人们认为光衍射是不可避免的。
chinese.english: For centuries, people have been using the light microscope to look at structures too small to see with the eye alone, and light microscopes in their myriad forms are now a vital fixture in the laboratory. Despite great strides in microscope technology over the years, however, the so-called diffraction barrier, which dictates a limit on the resolution that can be achieved by a light microscope, was considered inviolable.

chinese.chinese: 在室调查中，小组研究糖皮质激素对正处于外科治疗的儿童阻塞性睡眠呼吸暂停患者的扁桃体和腺样细胞的影响。
chinese.english: In this laboratory investigation, the group studied the effects of corticosteroids in cell cultures of tonsils and adenoids in children with OSA undergoing surgery

chinese.chinese: 腺扁桃体肥大在儿童阻塞性睡眠呼吸暂停（OSA）中是最大的病理症状。阻塞性睡眠呼吸暂停（OSA）的严重程度与腺瘤和扁桃体的大小没有紧密的联系，通常会首先用外科手术切除这些组织。但是这种方法伴随着术后并发症增多，健康相关花费增多的风险，并且病人及其家属还要承受情感上的压力在室调查中，小组研究糖皮质激素对正处于外科治疗的儿童阻塞性睡眠呼吸暂停患者的扁桃体和腺样细胞的影响。
chinese.english: Adenotonsillar hypertrophy is the biggest contributor to the pathophysiology of OSA in children.The severity of OSA loosely correlates with adenoid and tonsillar size, making surgical removal of these tissues the usual first line of treatment. But this approach is accompanied by an increased risk for potential postoperative complications and increased health-related costs, as well as emotional stress for the patient and family.In this laboratory investigation, the group studied the effects of corticosteroids in cell cultures of tonsils and adenoids in children with OSA undergoing surgery.

chinese.chinese: 医院、医生、疗养院、药剂师、室和保险公司使用病人的电子健康记录的问题已经有相应的法律来规范了。议会已经通过了一项与此有关的法案。一项类似的法案也在参议院等待批准，主要是对那些可以将信息提供给药品推广代表的机构加强管理，例如那些提供数据采集服务的公司和药品利益管理机构，以防止这些机构滥用接触到的患者个人信息。
chinese.english: Electronic health records that can be linked to individual patients are already protected by laws that apply primarily to hospitals, doctors, nursing homes, pharmacists, laboratories and insurance plans. The stimulus bill that has passed in the House, and a similar bill awaiting approval in the Senate, would strengthen the privacy requirements and apply them more directly to “business associates” of the providers, like billing and collection services or pharmacy benefit managers, that have access to sensitive data but are not readily held accountable for any misuse.

chinese.chinese: 高德美室主医学管Gottcchalk博士称，这些研究结果使我们更加觉得有义务为受银屑病困扰数百万人带来有效和安全的治疗措施，我们期待明年年初能够公布最终的研究成果。我们相信此研究能够证实对中重度斑块型银屑病vectical ointment至少在八周内可以维持使用强效激素在早期治疗中获得的疗效，
chinese.english: "These study results reinforce our commitment to bringing safe and effective therapies to the millions of patients that suffer from psoriasis," said Ron Gottschalk, M.D., Medical Director, Galderma Laboratories, L.P. "We look forward to reporting the final results of this study, which are expected to be published early next year. We believe this study will confirm that Vectical Ointment can help maintain, for at least 8 weeks, much of the gains seen when a high potency corticosteroid is used to initially treat moderate to severe plaque psoriasis."

chinese.chinese: 高德美公司室公布了一项使用丙酸氯倍他索喷雾和骨化三醇乳膏序贯治疗斑块型银屑病研究的中期结果。关于此研究的中期数据分析结果也将在3月8日上午十点半召开的第67届美国皮肤病学会年会上以壁报形式展示。该论文可在大会指南的3362页找到。
chinese.english: Galderma Laboratories, L.P. announced interim findings from a study of sequential treatment of plaque psoriasis using Clobex(R) (clobetasol propionate) Spray 0.05% followed by treatment with Vectical(TM) (calcitriol) Ointment 3mcg/g. The results of an interim analysis of the data are to be presented in a poster session at the 67th Annual Meeting of the American Academy of Dermatology on March 8th at 10:30 a.m. PT. The poster can be found under reference number 3362.

chinese.chinese: 长久以来，科学家一直怀疑自由基损伤是老化的罪魁，而且线粒体既是细胞内自由基的主要来源，也是防御自由基的主要屏障。巴尔的摩国家老年室神经科学研究室主任 Mark Mattson说，“当人逐渐变老，无效线粒体数量逐渐增多”。随着时间推移，线粒体基因变异逐渐累积。这样那样的变异可能导致线粒体效率降低，同等葡萄糖的产能量下降----就象能效差的汽车，同等汽油行驶路程变短。最终细胞越来越无法清除这些缺陷线粒体。随着年龄增长，身体机能越来越差，这也称为线粒体老化理论。
chinese.english: Free radical damage has long been suspected as a culprit in aging, and mitochondria are both the primary source of free radicals in a cell and the main protection against them. “As you get older, the number of mitochondria that are not functioning increases,” says Mark Mattson, chief of the National Institute on Aging's Laboratory of Neurosciences in Baltimore. Over time, mutations accumulate in mitochondrial genes. These and other changes may cause the power plants to work less efficiently, producing less energy for the same amount of glucose — the way a less energy-efficient car travels fewer miles on a tank of gas. Cells eventually become less able to rid themselves of these defective mitochondria. As life goes on, the body moves closer to a brownout — or so says the mitochondrial aging theory.

chinese.chinese: 举一个例子，我最近看的一个来自临近社区40岁女性患者，诊断甲减一年。简要病史：当时她表现出甲减的症状，严重便秘，疲劳，体重有一定程度增加，甲状腺质地硬，弥漫性中度肿大，没有结节。当时诊断为自身免疫性甲状腺病。室检查发现TSH显著升高(145 mIU/l, 正常值0•3–5•0 mIU/l) ，FT4降低(3•9 pmol/l, 正常 10•3–23•2 pmol/l)。她的家庭医生开始给予标准剂量的甲状腺素替代治疗，并且随后因为持续TSH升高而三次增加了剂量。服用了左旋甲状腺素300ug六周后，发现TSH仍然升高(77 mIU/l)，FT4依然低下（7•7 pmol/l），随后转到我这里进行进一步评估。
chinese.english: For example, a recent patient I was referred was a 40-year-old woman from a neighbouring community who was diagnosed with hypothyroidism 1 year prior to her visit. In brief, at that time she expressed symptoms compatible with hypothyroidism, such as severe constipation, fatigue and a modest amount of weight gain, and her thyroid gland was firm, moderately diffusely enlarged but without nodularity, suggestive of autoimmune thyroid disease. Laboratory investigation demonstrated marked TSH elevation (145 mIU/l, normal 0•3–5•0 mIU/l) and low free thyroxine (3•9 pmol/l, normal 10•3–23•2 pmol/l).Her primary care physician started thyroxine replacement at standard doses and adjusted the dosage upwards on three occasions because of persistently elevated TSH levels. After taking 300 µg of levothyroxine for 6 weeks, she was referred for further evaluation when her TSH remained elevated (77 mIU/l) and free thyroxine remained low at 7•7 pmol/l.

chinese.chinese: 如果肿瘤细胞缺少某种蛋白，可能使其穿透正常机体组织（转移的第一步）变得更容易。Heidelberg的科学家们新发现一种新的信号分子SCAI（肿瘤细胞侵害抑制因子)在室条件下可抑制肿瘤细胞转移和播散。当该细胞因子发挥作用受到干扰时，在三维矩阵系统（可模拟一些人体正常组织属性）中肿瘤细胞转移更快。
chinese.english: If cancer cells lack a certain protein, it could be much easier for them to penetrate healthy body tissue, the first step towards forming metastases. Scientists at the Pharmacology Institute of the University of Heidelberg have discovered the previously unknown cell signal factor SCAI (suppressor of cancer cell invasion), which inhibits the movement and spread of tumor cells in laboratory tests. When the factor's functioning was disrupted, the cancer cells moved much more effectively in what are known as three-dimensional matrix systems, which imitate some of the tissue properties of the human body.

chinese.chinese: 室确诊的原发性甲状旁腺功能亢进症的患者，一旦出现该疾病特征性症状或体征均应接受手术治疗。该指南侧重于无症状性原发性甲状旁腺功能亢进症，即缺乏高血钙或PTH过量引起的相关特征性症状或体征的原发性甲状旁腺功能亢进症。这是无症状性原发性甲状旁腺功能亢进症的第三个指南，和之前两个指南具有相同的看法，即和手术相比，医院监测更适合无症状性原发性甲状旁腺功能亢进患者。因为手术往往是该疾病的最后治疗方法，无症状性原发性甲状旁腺功能亢进患者也是如此，如果选择医院监测，医生应该遵循指南通过疾病表现的严重程度来判断，恰当的监测患者病情。
chinese.english: All patients with biochemically confirmed primary hyperparathyroidism (PHPT) who have specific symptoms or signs of their disease should undergo surgical treatment. This Workshop was focused upon asymptomatic PHPT, a condition defined as hyperparathyroidism that lacks specific symptoms or signs traditionally associated with hypercalcemia or PTH excess. This third Workshop on the Management of Asymptomatic Primary Hyperparathyroidism found, as had the two previous workshops on this topic, that medical monitoring rather than surgery is appropriate in certain patients with asymptomatic PHPT. Because surgery is always considered to be definitive therapy in this disease, even in asymptomatic subjects, a decision to elect medical monitoring should follow guidelines regarding severity of the manifestations of disease (Table 1), and patients should be appropriately monitored (Table 2).

chinese.chinese: 公共卫生博士Patrick Mehle是位于Lyon大学的凋亡、癌症及其进展和de la国立科学研究中心室主任，也是该研究项目的共同资深作者，他说：我们相信阿尔茨海默病在某些方面与癌症类似，也是由支持细胞生存和促使细胞更新的正常进程失去平衡所导致的，我们希望通过该研究来获得一种新的治疗方法，以用于寻求在疾病过程中的早期失衡位点。
chinese.english: “We believe that Alzheimer's disease is somewhat analogous to cancer, which results from an imbalance between the normal processes that support cell survival and those that cause cell turnover,” said Patrick Mehlen, PhD, Director of the Apoptosis, Cancer and Development CNRS Laboratory at the University of Lyon and co-senior author of the study. “Our hope is that this research will lead to therapeutics that will be used to address this imbalance much earlier in the disease process.”

chinese.chinese: 最近的室研究结果报道，有明确证据显示，可以从胚胎干细胞制造对葡萄糖产生反应的胰岛素分泌细胞，比如胰腺的β细胞.
chinese.english: Results of recent experiments provide "definitive evidence" that human embryonic stem cells can be used to generate cells that secrete insulin in response to glucose, like the beta-cells in the pancreas.

chinese.chinese: 星期四官方声称：国家室将开始用非动物模型如细胞和计算机模拟来检测化学试剂、药品和毒物的安全性。
chinese.english: Government labs will start moving to non-animal methods such as cells and computer models to test chemicals, drugs and toxins for safety, officials said on Thursday.

chinese.chinese: 该研究发表与Cell Stem Cell杂志2008-3-6。Mikkola’s 室的研究者们现在正在在老鼠模型和人体重复这项工作。
chinese.english: The study is published March 6, 2008 in the journal Cell Stem Cell. Researchers in Mikkola's lab are working now to replicate this work, done in mouse models, in humans.

chinese.chinese: 另一项检查是通过检查粪便中的与肿瘤相关的DNA，这项检查要求收集肠道中所有的粪便并将其送到室中。
chinese.english: The other test examines stool to find abnormal DNA associated with cancer and requires an entire bowel movement be packed in a kit and sent to a laboratory.

chinese.chinese: CardioKinetix 有限公司（CardioKinetix Inc.）是导管治疗心衰领域处于领先地位的医疗设备公司。University Hospitals（UH公司）病例医学中心和CardioKinetix 有限公司声称已经得到了“伞”（Parachute）心室分隔设备的临床研究结果。这些结果显示该设备具有很好的应用前景。“伞”心室分隔设备是基于导管的史无前例的设备，用于缺血性心脏病患者的经皮心室恢复治疗（Percutaneous Ventricular Restoration Therapy，缩写为PVRT）。
chinese.english: University Hospitals (UH) Case Medical Center and CardioKinetix Inc., a medical device company pioneering a catheter-based treatment for heart failure, has announced promising results for the first-of-its-kind catheter-based Parachute? Ventricular Partitioning Device, a Percutaneous Ventricular Restoration Therapy (PVRT) technology for patients with ischemic heart failure.

chinese.chinese: Sorbent Therapeutics公司致力于开发心血管病和肾病的治疗，其CLP1001的临床2a期试验数据显示为良性。有111位患有心脏衰竭并伴有慢性肾病的病人参与了本项研究，同安慰剂相比，CLP1001证明能够改善心脏衰竭的症状。
chinese.english: Sorbent Therapeutics, Inc. a company developing therapies for cardiovascular and renal diseases, presented positive data from its Phase 2a clinical study of CLP1001. In the study of 111 heart failure patients with chronic kidney disease, CLP1001 demonstrated improvement in heart failure symptoms as compared to placebo.

chinese.chinese: Sorbent Therapeutics公司致力于开发心血管病和肾病的治疗，其CLP1001的临床2a期试验数据显示为良性。有111位患有心脏衰竭并伴有慢性肾病的病人参与了本项研究，同安慰剂相比，CLP1001证明能够改善心脏衰竭的症状。
chinese.english: Sorbent Therapeutics, Inc. a company developing therapies for cardiovascular and renal diseases, presented positive data from its Phase 2a clinical study of CLP1001. In the study of 111 heart failure patients with chronic kidney disease, CLP1001 demonstrated improvement in heart failure symptoms as compared to placebo.

chinese.chinese: 在心功能不全年会上，苏黎世大学医院的医学博士GeorgM. Froelich称，心脏移植术后使用他汀类药物治疗的患者术后八年内癌症发病的累计率达到13%，而未使用他汀类药物治疗的患者术后八年内癌症发病的累计率则达到34%(P<0.003)。
chinese.english: The cumulative rate at 8 years reached 13% with statin use but34% without it (P<0.003), Georg M. Froelich, MD, of University HospitalZurich, and colleagues reported here at the Heart Failure Congress.

chinese.chinese: 免疫治疗一方面帮助机体对抗供体心脏植入带来的移植排斥，另一方便又可以有效的对抗癌症细胞
chinese.english: The rigorous immunosuppressive regimen used to keep the body from rejecting theforeign heart is thought to keep it from effectively destroying cancer cells aswell.

chinese.chinese: 显而易见的是，在考虑了胆固醇水平时，心脏移植术后患者使用他汀类药物会使得其无癌生存率显著升高(P＜0.0001)，而在不考虑胆固醇水平时，则他汀类药物带来的心脏移植术后患者无癌生存率的升高并没有显著性意义(P=0.96)
chinese.english: Notably, the advantage of statin users in cancer-free survival remained significant after accounting for cholesterol levels (P＜;0.0001) and was independent of cholesterol (P=0.96).

chinese.chinese: 2a期结果同时呈现在欧洲心脏病学会心衰大会和《欧洲心衰杂志》杂志。
chinese.english: Results from Phase 2a Presented Simultaneously at the European Society of Cardiology Heart Failure Congress and in the European Journal of Heart Failure

chinese.chinese: 以往的研究显示接受常用化疗药物多柔比星治疗的患者超过四分之一在以后存在发展为心衰的风险。实际上，心脏损伤的发生机制仍不清楚。
chinese.english: Previous research has suggested that up to a quarter of patients who receivethe common chemotherapy drug doxorubicin are at risk of developing heart failurelater in life. Exactly how that heart damage is done remains unclear.

chinese.chinese: 研究员分别予正常和遗传改变后不能产生HSF-1的两组小鼠多柔比星药物。不能产生HSF-1的小鼠在化疗后较正常小鼠心脏更健康，并且寿命更长。
chinese.english: The researchers gave doxorubicin to two sets of mice - normal animals and micethat were genetically altered so they could not produce HSF-1. Mice withoutHSF-1 had healthier hearts and lived longer after the chemotherapy treatmentthan did normal mice.

chinese.chinese: 研究员发现心脏细胞内HSF-1和其他的蛋白NF-kB的相互作用可找出保护性基因。
chinese.english: The researchers discovered that interplay in the heart cells between HSF-1 andanother protein, NF-kB, could be traced to production of the protective gene.

chinese.chinese: Ilangovan说“合适时间的抑制HSF-1，并且限制该抑制剂作用于心脏是研发药物靶向治疗的关键。”多个研究该蛋白研究结果表明这对身体的作用既有有害的一面又有有利的一面。研究员一致认为它激活的时间决定其效益，假如它在损伤或其他损害事件发生前激活，HSF-1具有保护性的作用。但在损伤后激活，如多柔比星化疗后，该蛋白普遍认为是有害的。
chinese.english: Proper timing of HSF-1 inhibition and limiting this inhibition to the heart areimportant steps in designing drugs to target it, Ilangovan said. Multiplestudies of this protein have suggested that it can have both beneficial andharmful effects in the body. Researchers appear to be reaching consensus thatthe timing of its activation helps determine which effect it will have - if itis activated before an injury or other damaging event, HSF-1 can be protective.After an injury - in this case, doxorubicin treatment - the protein is morecommonly found to be harmful.

chinese.chinese: 以前研究表明较高的钙摄入量能够降低高血压、肥胖和二型糖尿病的发病风险，而这些均是心脏病和中风发生的危险因子。
chinese.english: Previous research has linked higher calcium intake with a lowered risk of high blood pressure, obesity, and type 2 diabetes, all of which are risk factors for heart disease and stroke.

chinese.chinese: 研究人员认为：“本研究提示，从饮食中提高钙摄入可能不能带来显著的心血管获益，而服用钙补充剂或许还增加心脏病发作的风险，因此应该慎重对待钙补充剂治疗。”
chinese.english: The authors conclude: “This study suggests that increasing calcium intake from diet might not confer significant cardiovascular benefits, while calcium supplements, which might raise [heart attack] risk, should be taken with caution.”

chinese.chinese: 作者同样建议使用标准的内镜治疗技术来控制出血，因为这对于PCI术后的患者来说是安全的。理论上说体内的肾上腺素将被心肌细胞全面充分得吸收，并产生不利的交感兴奋。一项对出血性溃疡病人行内镜治疗的小型研究显示肾上腺素的确到达了体循环，但是它没有产生心脏的并发症。
chinese.english: The authors recommend standard therapeutic endoscopic techniques to control bleeding, as they are safe to use in patients postPCI. Theoretically, intramural adrenaline may be absorbed systemically and potentially reach the myocardium, producing unwanted sympathetic stimulation. A small study of patients undergoing therapeutic endoscopy for bleeding ulcers demonstrated that adrenaline does reach the systemic circulation; however,there were no cardiac complications.

chinese.chinese: 由国家心肺血液机构所赞助的TOPCAT研究将患者随机分为安慰剂组或醛固酮受体拮抗剂安体舒通组，随访时间平均为3.25年，主要终点事件包括心血管死亡、心脏骤停或因HF而住院。
chinese.english: TOPCAT, funded by the National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute, randomized the patients to placebo or the aldosterone antagonist spironolactone and followed them for an average of 3.25 years for the primary end point of cardiovascular death, aborted cardiac arrest, or HF hospitalization.

chinese.chinese: 以往的研究发现，美国成人心脏病和中风的死亡率有所下降。与非糖尿病患者相比，糖尿病患者心脏病和中风的死亡率下降更明显。近来疾控中心的研究表明，因糖尿病导致的肾衰、截肢和心脏病或中风的而住院的患者有所减少。
chinese.english: Previous studies have found that rates of heart disease and stroke aredeclining for all U.S.adults. Those rates are dropping faster for people with diabetes compared toadults without diabetes. Recent CDC studies also have found declining rates ofkidney failure, amputation of feet and legs, and hospitalization for heartdisease and stroke among people with diabetes.

chinese.chinese: Sneddon是Alberta大学心脏病医生Gavin Oudit的病人，Gavin Oudit一直以来在研究一种叫ACE2的分子，这种分子已被证明具有心脏保护作用。Gavin Oudit最近的工作发表在五月份第十一期的Circulation Research杂志上，Gavin Oudit及其同事在实验室动物模型上发现，缺乏ACE2会使与糖尿病有关的心血管并发症进一步恶化。
chinese.english: Sneddon is a patient of University of Alberta cardiologist Gavin Oudit, who has long been doing research on a molecule called ACE2, which he has previously shown protects the heart in cardiovascular disease. In his most recent work, published in the May 11 edition of Circulation Research, Oudit and colleagues at the University of Florida have found that lab models that lacked ACE2 had worse cardiovascular complications related to diabetes.

chinese.chinese: 英国和威尔士都有报道感染性心内膜炎的发病率呈稳定增长。这一趋势可能与人口老龄化造成的瓣膜退行性变增多、人工瓣膜和心脏内装置的应用相对广泛相关。此外，接受血液透析和牙周疾病的患者增多也是常见的原因。
chinese.english: The reported incidence of IE is increasing steadily in England and Wales. This trend may be due to anageing population with relatively greater prevalence of degenerative valvedisease, prosthetic valves and intracardiac devices. Additionally, morepatients are receiving haemodialysis, and periodontal disease remains common.

chinese.chinese: 与荷兰艾恩德霍文(Eindhoven)科技大学记忆美国耶鲁大学的研究人员一道，McGill研究小组将扩散的磁共振成像技术(dMRI)同计算机模拟结合在一起，从而揭示了纤维束集中在一起时的弯曲方式。研究人员分别对大鼠、人和狗的心肌组织做了成像检测，结果发现它们心脏中存在共同的模式。
chinese.english: Working with collaborators at Eindhoven University of Technology in the Netherlands, and Yale University in the U.S., the McGill-led team used a combination of Diffusion Magnetic Resonance Imaging (dMRI) and computer modeling to reveal the way that bundles of fibers bend together. The researchers examined images of the heart tissue of rats, humans and dogs - and found the same pattern.

chinese.chinese: 例如，在由心脏病而引起的心肌损害中，该项成果可以用来提供一个支架，从而引导受损的心肌纤维修复。虽然肌肉组织再生是生物工程中的一个主要领域，且该领域大多数进展也是集中于骨骼肌组织的再生，例如胳膊和腿（的肌肉再生），但这些更多地是在线性结构上，与心肌纤维的再生有所不同。
chinese.english: The knowledge could be used, for example, to provide a scaffold to guide the repair of heart-wall damage caused by heart attacks. While regeneration of muscle tissue is a major area in bioengineering, most developments in this field have involved skeletal muscle tissue - such as that in arms and legs - which is arranged in a different, more linear structure.

chinese.chinese: 据Palecek的观点，以一种精准而大量的方法培育出关键的心脏细胞是一种非常重要的能力，因为它表明同一批次大量培育出心肌细胞是潜在可行性的。为了研究，这种细胞的需求量很大，同时制药行业用于测试药物以及潜在药物毒理学效应时的大量筛查也使得这种需求不断增长。
chinese.english: The ability to make the key heart cells in abundance and in a precisely defined way is important because it shows the potential to make the production of large, uniform batches of cardiomyocytes routine, according to Palecek. The cells are in great demand for research, and increasingly for the high throughput screens used by the pharmaceutical industry to test drugs and potential drugs for toxic effects.

chinese.chinese: 使用诱导多能干细胞来获得心肌细胞的能力意味着科学家们将能够更容易地在实验室模拟那些疾病，诱导多能干细胞可以来自成年的心脏病患者。这样的细胞包含有患者的基因档案信息，因此可以在实验室中重构出这些疾病来用于疾病研究。心肌细胞非常困难或者说根本不可能直接从患者心脏当中直接获取，即使获取了心肌细胞，也只能简单地在实验室中存活。
chinese.english: The capacity to make the heart cells using induced pluripotent stem cells, which can come from adult patients with diseased hearts, means scientists will be able to more readily model those diseases in the laboratory. Such cells contain the genetic profile of the patient, and so can be used to recreate the disease in the lab dish for study. Cardiomyocytes are difficult or impossible to obtain directly from the hearts of patients and, when obtained, survive only briefly in the lab.

chinese.chinese: 该研究由Vivek Singh博士领衔，他是UC药理学和细胞生物物理学系Litsa Kranias博士下的一位研究科学家，他说对于在富含组氨酸的钙结合蛋白中携带有这种基因突变的心力衰竭患者来说，心源性猝死是他们的一个危险因素，因为在他们的心脏细胞内不能适当地控制钙离子，从而很有肯能导致心律失常的形成。
chinese.english: The team led by Vivek Singh, PhD, a research scientist under the direction of Litsa Kranias, PhD, in the department of pharmacology and cell biophysics at UC, says that sudden cardiac death is a risk for patients with heart failure who are carriers of this variant in the histidine-rich calcium-binding protein because the calcium inside their heart cells is not properly controlled, possibly leading to the development of arrhythmias.

chinese.chinese: 研究人员第一次制作了动物模型，且该动物模型心脏特异性表达人正常的(S96S)或者选择性表达 (A96A) HRC。
chinese.english: Researchers first generated animal models with cardiac-specific expression of the human normal (S96S) or altered (A96A) HRC.

chinese.chinese: 8、1922年，英国心脏病学俱乐部成立，并于1937年改为英国心脏学会。美国心脏协会成立于1924年，德国心脏病学会于1927年成立，比利时、意大利、法国以及瑞典心脏病学学会分别于1934、1935、1937、1948年成立。在美国，还有一个重要的心脏病学组织，即成立于1949年的美国心脏病学会。后来，各心脏协会/学会组织都认识到心脏病学的研究需要资金的资助，各协会都成立了基金组织以提供必要的科研基金。政府部门也开始拨款支持心脏病研究。美国于1948年成立了国立心脏研究所（现在的美国国立心脏、肺和血液学研究所NHLBI），开始进行大量心脏内外的研究。制药公司看准了开发心血管疾病治疗方法的科学利益和经济利益，并提供了大量的人力和物力资源进行心脏病的研究。
chinese.english: The British Cardiac Club was founded in 1922 and became the British Cardiac Society in 1937. The American Heart Association was begun in 1924, while the Deutsche Gesellschaft fur Kreislaufforschung was started in 1927. The Belgian, Italian, French and Swiss Cardiac Societies were formed in 1934, 1935, 1937 and 1948, respectively. In the US, a second important organization, the American College of Cardiology was established in 1949. The need for resources to support cardiovascular research became widely recognized and many cardiac societies developed foundations to help provide the necessary funds. National governments also began to support cardiac research. In the United States, the National Heart Institute (now the National Heart, Lung and Blood Institute) was established in 1948, with robust intramural and extramural programmes. The pharmaceutical industry perceived great scientific and financial opportunities in developing new treatments for cardiovascular disease and began to devot

chinese.chinese: 基因SATB1“是调节癌症是否扩散的调节基因， ”kohwi - shigematsu说。 " SATB1于在1992年被我们克隆 [在伯克利室]，众所周知该基因表达在动物的激活T细胞中，作为免疫系统反应的一部分" 。
chinese.english: The gene, SATB1, "is a regulator of whether the cancer spreads," Kohwi-Shigematsu said. "SATB1 was cloned by us [at the Berkeley lab] in 1992. The gene is already known to be expressed in activated T-cells in animals as part of the immune system response."

chinese.chinese: 如果这样的装置被移植入人体，骇客可能重新给心脏起搏器或除颤器编程来关掉它并且传递足以致命的电击。在这种情况下，研究人员在室侵入了一个装置。
chinese.english: They were able to reprogram it to shut down and to deliver jolts of electricity that would potentially be fatal — if the device had been in a person. In this case, the researcher were hacking into a device in a laboratory.

chinese.chinese: Williams说他的室找到了血吸虫的一个独特之处，能使其易受攻击而不伤害作为宿主的人。
chinese.english: Williams said his lab has been looking for unique characteristics of the parasite that would make it vulnerable, without harming the human host.

chinese.chinese: 美国FDA于1998年3月27日首次批准伟哥上市，而这一药物是由辉瑞室的科学家偶然发现的。
chinese.english: Viagra, developed by accident by scientists at Pfizer Laboratories, was first approved for use by the US Food and Drug Administration on March 27, 1998.

chinese.chinese: 当孩子36个月打的时候，他们的妈妈在晚餐前和晚餐时用磁带录音的方法与他们交流。这是为了研究妈妈和孩子在他们家中而不是不熟悉的室如何互相影响。
chinese.english: When the kids were 36 months old, their moms tape-recorded their interactions with that child just before and during dinner time. The point was to get an idea of how the moms and toddlers interact in their home, not in an unfamiliar lab.

chinese.chinese: 通过这种“便携式室”，诊断人员可以通过一个拇指大小的芯片，对患者的血液、血清以及呼吸道液体图片等样本进行检测。
chinese.english: This portable "mini-lab" allows the diagnostician to analyze a patient sample like blood, serum and respiratory swabs, on a single disposable thumbnail-sized chip.

chinese.chinese: 该疗法会出现一系列副作用，包括心脏，血液和神经系统的毒性，以及感染并发症，Rummel表示。
chinese.english: That regimen has a range of adverse effects, including cardiac, hematological, and neurological toxicity, as well as infectious complications, Rummel noted.

chinese.chinese: 为了评估植入十二指肠空肠旁路衬垫（DJBL）1年对肥胖患者的安全性、体重减轻效果和心脏代谢的改变
chinese.english: Objective: To evaluate safety, weight loss,and cardiometabolic changes in obese subjects implanted with theduodenal-jejunal bypass liner (DJBL) for 1 year.

chinese.chinese: 据Magnani 博士和他的团队美国心脏期刊4月刊的文章，已知较早绝经是心梗和中风的危险因素，伴随着死亡率升高，而较迟绝经和缺血性心脏病低死亡率密切相关。
chinese.english: Younger age at natural menopause is known to be associated with higher risk for myocardial infarction and stroke, along with increased mortality, while older age at menopause has been tied to a lower risk of death from ischemic heart disease, Dr. Magnani and his team noted in the April American Heart Journal.

chinese.chinese: 为了研究上述情况是否适用于房颤，研究者回顾了弗明汉心脏研究中登记的1809名超过60岁的女性其10年随访数据。研究对象中基线平均年龄为71.4岁，平均绝经年龄为49.8岁。随访期间，273名女性患房颤。
chinese.english: To investigate whether the same might be true of AF, the researchers looked at 10 years of follow-up data on 1,809 women 60 and older enrolled in the Framingham Heart Study. The mean age at baseline was 71.4, while their average age at menopause was 49.8. During follow-up, 273 women developed AF.

chinese.chinese: 该疗法会出现一系列副作用，包括心脏，血液和神经系统的毒性，以及感染并发症，Rummel表示。
chinese.english: That regimen has a range of adverse effects, including cardiac, hematological, and neurological toxicity, as well as infectious complications, Rummel noted.

chinese.chinese: VereFlu融合了STMicroelectronics的室芯片在线检测模式和Veredus的生物测定功能的优点。
chinese.english: VereFlu combines the In-Check lab-on-chip platform from STMicroelectronics, and the bio-application capability from Veredus.

chinese.chinese: 现在使用的方法可能需要几天甚至几周的时间，而这种新型的设备可在几个小时内给出感染测定的基因信息，并且具有较好的便携性，可将诊断检测过程从室中解放出来，可以在任何需要的情况下进行即时检测。
chinese.english: Unlike other existing methods that take days and weeks, the new device can give genetic information about an infection within two hours. It is also portable, freeing the diagnostic process from the lab and allowing it to happen at the point of need.

chinese.chinese: 他们发现，在室这种天然物能刺激胰腺细胞分泌胰岛素。
chinese.english: They found it stimulated the secretion of insulin in pancreatic cells in the laboratory.

chinese.chinese: 迈阿密大学和Karolinska学院的科学家们已发展了一个研究复杂细胞进程的方法，例如活的动物的胰腺中胰岛素的分泌－迄今为止许多还没成为可能。新的方法，包括移植一小部分胰腺到鼠的虹膜上，为糖尿病研究的基本途径铺路，这先前在人工室环境下执行。
chinese.english: Scientists at Karolinska Institutet and the University of Miami have developed a method for studying complicated cell processes, such as the secretion of insulin in the pancreas, of living animals -- something that has not been possible to this date. The new method, which involves the transplantation of a tiny part of the pancreas onto the iris of mice, paves the way for radical approaches to diabetes research, which has previously been conducted on single cells in artificial laboratory environments.

chinese.chinese: DuRoss 说：公司允许向纽约以外的其他州的居民提供服务。纽约居民必须等，直到州卫生官员批准公司指定的室为纽约人提供服务。
chinese.english: The company has been authorized to sell the service to residents of every state except New York, Ms. DuRoss said. New York residents must join a waiting list until state health officials license the company's designated lab to provide services to New Yorkers.

chinese.chinese: 据发表在柳叶刀医学杂志的论文报道，观察临床症状与室检测分析一样，均能有效地确定何时应该中止一线药物治疗，而选取服用二线药物。
chinese.english: Observing clinical symptoms is also almost as effective as laboratory analysis in deciding when to switch from first-line drug treatments to second-line drugs if resistance sets in, according to the study in the Lancet medical journal.

chinese.chinese: 美国黑人的前列腺癌相关死亡率也比欧裔男性显著提高，虽然这两组人群在社会经济学、社会人口统计数据上的差异起到一定的影响，Tiffany Wallace, PhD，国家癌症研究中心人类致癌机理研究室博士后说，研究者认为必定还有其他潜在的原因。
chinese.english: Prostate-cancer-related mortality is also significantly higher in black men than in men of European descent. Although socioeconomic and sociodemographic differences between the groups do play roles, lead author Tiffany Wallace, PhD, a postdoctoral fellow in the Laboratory of Human Carcinogenesis at the National Cancer Institute, stated that the researchers believed that there had to be other underlying issues.

chinese.chinese: 科学家们曾经千方百计想知道成熟红细胞脱核的机制。现在，Whitehead 室Harvey Lodish的研究小组，用小鼠（红细胞）在体外模拟了整个过程;他们在自然细胞生物学上 Nature Cell Biology2008-2-10的 网络版上发表面了这一研究成果。这是关于红细胞去核机制的第一个研究，这研究也为阐明哺乳动物的进化中的关键一步，带来了一线曙光。
chinese.english: Scientists have struggled to understand the mechanism by which maturing red blood cells eject their nuclei. Now, researchers in the lab of Whitehead Member Harvey Lodish have modeled the complete process in vitro in mice, reporting their findings in Nature Cell Biology online on February 10, 2008. The first mechanistic study of how a red blood cell loses its nucleus, the research sheds light on one of the most essential steps in mammalian evolution.

chinese.chinese: 意大利科学家在研究感染性疾病中发现了一种新的观点。在通常情况下，类似的研究都要通过室的工作去研究生物体以及它在人体内的作用机制。
chinese.english: Scientists in Italy have discovered a new perspective in the study of infectious disease. Normally, such studies are based upon laboratory work looking at an organism and how it works within the human body.

chinese.chinese: 遥远的未来，或者说几十年之后，心内科的发展情况很难预料。不过，看起来生物学取得的成果可能会更多地应用到心脏病学上。药物基因组学将会进一步扩展。基因组的发展将会促进疾病分类越来越细，使“个性化”治疗称为现实。RNA在之前的一段时间被研究人员冷落，不过将来会成为研究的焦点。微小RNA(MiRNAs)是很小的RNA分子，是基因表达的关键调节物。目前已经发现：MiRNA的表达改变对心脏发育、心脏肥大和心衰的影响很大。RNA干扰（RNAi）是使特定基因沉默的有效的、广泛适用的方式。RNAi有望给内科的不同领域——包括心衰治疗——提供新药。原始预防，或者说对以后出现的危险因子的预防，将会是儿童和青少年预防的重点。
