chinese.english: The long-termfuture, i.e. beyond the next decade, is more difficult to discern. However, itappears likely that the fruits of the biological revolution will be applied tocardiology with ever greater vigour. Pharmacogenomics will expand. Genomicswill enhance the sub-classification of disease, allowing truly 'personalized'care. RNA, long a stepchild, is poised to take centre stage. MicroRNAs(miRNAs) are small RNAs that are key regulators of gene expression.Changes in the expression of MiRNAs have been found to be important in cardiacdevelopment, myocardial hypertrophy, and heart failure. RNA interference(RNAi) is an efficient and versatile mechanism capable of silencing specificgenes. RNAi has the potential to provide novel drugs in many areas of medicine,including the treatment of heart failure. Primordial prevention, i.e.prevention of the future development of risk factors,will become thedominant form of prevention and will focus on children and adolescents.

chinese.chinese: 冠心病监护病房的出现是AMI治疗出现进步的一个信号。CCU的想法是爱丁堡皇家医院的副主治医生（medical registrar）Julian在1961年提出的。CCU成为现实，有赖于以下4个独立概念：1、将患者聚集在医院的一个单独区域，该区域配备有需要的经过培训的专门人员、设备和药物；2、不间断的心电图监测；3、针对心室纤维颤动的胸外心脏复苏方法的出现；4、在内科医生不在的情况下，将心室纤维性颤动和其他威胁生命的心律失常的治疗授权给接受过专门训练的护士。
chinese.english: The development of the coronary care unit (CCU) was one of a pair of signal advances in the treatment of AMI. The idea of the CCU was proposed in 1961 by Julian,then a medical registrar at the Royal Infirmary, Edinburgh. Four separate concepts made the CCU possible: (i) aggregating patients into a single area of the hospital where trained personnel, equipment and drugs are all available; (ii) continuous monitoring of the ECG; (iii) development of closed-chest cardiac resuscitation for ventricular fibrillation; and (iv) delegation of the immediate treatment of ventricular fibrillation and other life-threatening arrhythmias to trained nurses, in the absence of a physician.

chinese.chinese: 现代心外科开始于20世纪50年代早期的体外循环开心术。该技术对于成功修复绝大多数先天性心脏病和很多获得性心脏病来说，是必需的。这开启了外科医生和工程师之间的一系列令人叹为观止的合作。人工心脏瓣膜的出现给急性瓣膜心脏病患者的生命质量带来的好处令人叹为观止。
chinese.english: The modern era of cardiac surgery began in the early 1950s with the development of open heart surgery using cardiopulmonary bypass, which was necessary for the successful repair of most congenital and many acquired cardiac disorders.This ushered in a series of spectacular collaborations between surgeons and engineers. The development of prosthetic heart valves led to astounding benefits in the lives of patients with severe valvular heart disease.

chinese.chinese: 严重的心动过缓——确切地说是晚期房室传导受阻——是第一个得到控制的心律失常疾病；该疾病的治疗始于1952年Zoll在波士顿使用的外部起搏器的治疗，随后由Elmqvist和Senning于1958年在斯德哥尔摩进行了改进。稍后出现的是对心室纤维性颤动、室性心动过速和心房颤动的外部除颤技术。在几十年中，心脏疾病治疗药物的使用时间非常长，不过，药物在抑制心室纤维性颤动和高风险人群心脏性猝死的预防方面没有取得成功。Mirowski等人发明的植入式复律器-除颤器，已经在患者中证明确实具有救人性命的效果。电生理检查和心内膜电图的不断发展使大量的心律失常（包括阵发性室上性和室性心动过速）得以消失。通过对肺静脉源头进行电隔离，可以阻断心房颤动这种重要心律失常疾病的发生或者减少降低其发病频率。
chinese.english: Serious bradyarrhythmias—particularly advanced atrioventricular block—was the first arrhythmia to be controlled, initially by an external pacemaker by Zoll[32] in Boston in 1952 and then an implanted cardiac pacemaker, developed by Elmqvist and Senning[33] in Stockholm in 1958. This was followed by the development of external cardioversion of ventricular fibrillation, ventricular tachycardia, and atrial fibrillation. For several decades, pharmacological agents were used chronically, but unsuccessfully (see below) in an attempt to prevent ventricular fibrillation and sudden cardiac death in subjects at high risk of these disorders. The development of implantable cardioverter-defibrillators by Mirowski et al.[34] has proved to be life-saving in such patients. Progressive improvements in electrophysiological testing and endocardial electrical mapping have led to the abolition of a number of arrhythmias, including paroxysmal supraventricular and ventricular tachycardias. Electrical isolati

chinese.chinese: 发展中国家心脏瓣膜病患者人数正在增加；这是由于风湿性心脏病新发病例的发病率还没有降低到发达国家水平，而老年人群中，具有很高风险发生风湿性心脏病的人数正在逐渐增加。心脏瓣膜病的治疗过程中，需要对每个病人的病程进行评估，以便选择合适的干预时间。必须进行更多的手术治疗和基于导管治疗的随机试验。
chinese.english: The numbers of patients with valvular heart disease in developing countries is now rising because the incidence of new cases of rheumatic heart disease has not (yet) fallen to the low levels observed in the industrialized nations, while the number of elderly individuals at risk of degenerative valvular disease is increasing. The care of patients with valvular heart disease requires the assessment of the course of the disease in each patient to select the appropriate time for intervention. Randomized trials of surgical vs. catheter-based therapy must continue.

chinese.chinese: 实质性的进展直到成功开发出有效的口服利尿剂才开始：1957年的苯并噻二嗪，1959年的醛固酮抑制剂，1962年疗效显著的髓袢利尿药。下一个重要进展是血管扩张药物。血管扩张药物在发现之初被用于急性心脏衰竭的治疗。Cohn等随后进行的多中心临床研究（名为VHEFT）显示：慢性心衰患者在接受肼太嗪与长效硝酸盐联合用药治疗后，患者生存期有所延长。紧随其后的是神经激素阻断剂，包括：血管紧张肽转化酶阻断剂，β肾上腺素受体阻断剂和醛固酮抑制剂。每种神经激素阻断剂都能改善预后。这些药物现在被用于心衰早期患者，并且越来越多的用于通过现代成像技术或者生物标志物确定有高度心衰风险的患者中。1967年开始引入的心脏移植能够有效的延长晚期心衰患者10年寿命，不过，由于心脏供体有限，只能使少量患者受益。大约一半心衰患者因为心室颤动突然死亡，另一半因心脏泵血功能衰竭而死。这两种原因都可以通过随后开发的三种类型医疗设备解决：植入式复律器-除颤器预防心肌性猝死；特定的起搏器使心脏复律，增加心脏的收缩性；左心室辅助设备作为心脏移植的桥梁，并且越来越成为一种“最终治疗方案”。
chinese.english: No real advances occurred until the development of effective oral diuretics; the benzothiadiazines in 1957, the aldosterone inhibitors in 1959,and the powerful 'loop diuretics' in 1962. The next important step was vasodilator therapy, which was first administered intravenously in acute heart failure. Cohn et al. then led a multicentre trial, the VHEFT trial, which showed improved survival in patients with chronic heart failure who received the combination of hydralazine and a long-acting nitrate. Next came the application of neurohormonal blockers angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors, β-adrenergic receptor blockers,and aldosterone inhibitors --each of which was shown to improve prognosis. These drugs are now begun earlier in the course of heart failure and increasingly in patients at risk of developing heart failure identified by modern imaging and biomarkers. Cardiac transplantation, introduced in 1967, is effective in prolonging life by about 10 years in end-stage heart failu

chinese.chinese: Buck室的研究人员，他们后来就职于波士顿哈佛大学医学院，制造了一个能够在具有特殊的气味受体的神经元上表达一种植物蛋白的转基因小鼠，这种植物蛋白可以跨越神经元的结合处，这就使得研究人员能够通过精确定位这种蛋白的位置而确定神经网络地图。但是Buck室的研究人员，他们目前就职于西雅图Fred Hutchinson癌症研究中心，不能够复制当时的结果。
chinese.english: Researchers in Buck's lab, then at Harvard Medical School in Boston, Massachusetts, produced transgenic mice that expressed a plant protein in neurons that have a specific odour receptor. The plant protein can travel across the junctions between neurons, allowing researchers to map neuronal networks by pinpointing the protein's location .But researchers in Buck's lab, now at the Fred Hutchinson Cancer Research Center in Seattle, Washington, have since been unable to reproduce the original results.

chinese.chinese: Thomas L. MaCarthy室的研究者和外科的Michael Centrella从鼠源性成骨细胞中分离了这种雌激素样分子。由于成骨细胞在培育过程中分化，他们产生了一种分子——研究者试验性的称之为“Ob-SERM.”这种物质触发了一些由雌激素受体活化诱发的生化反应。然而，这些成骨细胞源性分子在功能上和化学上都有别于雌激素，这更有希望成为一种相对传统的激素替代疗法更安全的方法。
chinese.english: Researchers in the laboratories of Thomas L. McCarthy and Michael Centrella in the Department of Surgery isolated this estrogen-like molecule from rat-derived osteoblasts, or cells that can build bones. As the osteoblasts differentiated in culture, they produced a molecule that the investigators tentatively termed "Ob-SERM." This substance triggered several of the biochemical responses induced by estrogen receptor activation. The osteoblast-derived molecule, however, was in part functionally and chemically distinct from estradiol, raising hopes that it may be a safer alternative to traditional hormone replacement therapies.

chinese.chinese: 以前的观察研究中已经发现在有体育锻炼的人中胆囊结石的发病率少并且胆固醇含量低，但是室研究还没有证实它们之间的联系因素。
chinese.english: Previous observational studies have suggested that people who are physically fit have fewer gallstones and lower cholesterol, but laboratory studies had not confirmed the link.

chinese.chinese: 本次研究将需要进行肾替代治疗的患者和需要继续进行保守治疗的患者的临床症状和室检查进行比较。
chinese.english: The aim of the present study is to compare clinical and laboratory data from patients with crush syndrome who needed RRT with those who could be maintained on conservative medical treatment.

chinese.chinese: 有规律的锻炼能够非常有效的预防和治疗许多常见的慢性疾病，同时提高心血管的健康和延长寿命。然而，最近的研究表明这样的慢性训练和竞赛以及超级耐力训练，比如：马拉松、铁人三项和长距离自行车赛，可能会引起心脏和大动脉的结构改变，并导致心肌损害。在6月份的《梅奥诊所学报》上的一篇文章回顾了（相关）文献并且首次详细介绍了过量耐力训练导致心血管系统损伤的机制、病理生理和临床表现。
chinese.english: Regular exercise is highly effective for the prevention and treatment of many common chronic diseases, and improves cardiovascular health and longevity. However, recent research suggests that chronic training for, and competing in, extreme endurance exercise such as marathons, iron man distance triathlons, and very long distance bicycle races may cause structural changes to the heart and large arteries, leading to myocardial injury. A study in the June issue of Mayo Clinic Proceedings reviews the literature and outlines in detail for the first time the mechanisms, pathophysiology, and clinical manifestations of cardiovascular injury from excessive endurance exercise.

chinese.chinese: 这项研究的对象为有患糖尿病风险的患者，研究的他们和心脏病发生相关的血管反应性与运动之间的关系，每周至少锻炼150分钟的患者其血管反应性几乎接近非糖尿病人正常水平，并且伴有明显的胆固醇水平和炎性标志物降低，这些与心脏病发作相关。有趣的是，这些进行运动的患者在为期6周的干预期内并没有体重减轻，提示血管反应性的改善与体重减轻无关
chinese.english: The research included patients at-risk of developing diabetes and studied their vascular reactivity, which is associated with heart disease, in relation to exercise. Those persons who exercised at least 150 minutes per week had vascular reactivity near normal levels of a non-diabetic person, in addition to experiencing significant reductions in cholesterol profiles and markers of inflammation, which have been associated with heart attacks. Interestingly, the patients undertaking exercise did not lose weight during the six-week intervention period, indicating the improvement in vascular reactivity was independent of weight loss.

chinese.chinese: 确切的说，减肥进行29周之后，平均心脏收缩压从138毫米汞柱降到了118毫米汞柱，平均心脏舒张压从90毫米汞柱降到了74毫米汞柱。
chinese.english: Specifically, mean systolic blood pressure dropped from a baseline of 138 to 118 mm Hg by week 29, and diastolic blood pressure dropped from a baseline of 90 to 74 mm Hg.

chinese.chinese: 美国科研工作者报道：一种纳米药物和一种室污染真菌可能对多种癌症有明显的作用。
chinese.english: A drug developed using nanotechnology and a fungus that contaminated a lab experiment may be broadly effective against a range of cancers, U.S. researchers reported on Sunday.

chinese.chinese: 一项为期4周，双盲、随机的Iib期临床试验，共入组464例中至重度的COPD患者，每日1次服用阿地溴胺（25微克或50微克或100微克或200微克）或安慰剂，评价其有效性和耐受性，本次试验同时设立开放标签的阳性对照组（噻托溴胺，18微克）。试验结果显示，阿地溴胺（200微克和400微克）通过多剂量的干粉吸入器给药，能显著增加24小时内每秒用力呼气量的谷值，给药第29天，与安慰剂组比，呈显著性差异（p<0.05）。每日一次吸入阿地溴胺，能剂量依赖性改善肺功能，且耐受性良好，对心电图、室指标和不良事件等，均无剂量依赖性作用。总的来看，不良事件报道较多的是头痛（4.1％）、口干（2.8％）、COPD恶化（1.7％）和咳嗽（1.7％）等。基于本次试验的结果，每次吸入1次阿地溴胺 200微克，作为两个正在进行的Ⅲ期临床试验的剂量。ACCLAIM COPDI、II的临床试验结果，将于今年下半年公布。
chinese.english: Presentations included data from a 464-patient randomized, double-blind, four-week, Phase IIb study that evaluated both the efficacy and tolerability of once-daily aclidinium (25 mcg, 50 mcg, 100 mcg, 200 mcg or 400 mcg) or placebo in patients with moderate to severe COPD. An open-label tiotropium (18 mcg) arm was included as an active control. The study demonstrated aclidinium (200 mcg and 400 mcg), administered via a multi-dose dry powder inhaler, significantly increased trough (24 hour) forced expiratory volume in one second (FEV1) - an important measure of lung function - on Day 29 compared with placebo (p<0.05 vs placebo).(1) There was a dose response observed for lung function improvement with once-daily aclidinium. Aclidinium was well-tolerated, with no dose-dependent effect on ECG, laboratory parameters, or adverse events.(1) Overall, the most frequently reported adverse events were headache (4.1% of patients), dry mouth (2.8% of patients), exacerbation of chronic obstructiv

chinese.chinese: 癌症干细胞假说—癌症起源于很小数量的被称为癌症干细胞的细胞，这些细胞为癌症的生长提供能量。这些细胞代表癌症中小于5%的细胞。Wicha室作为小组的一部分在2003年首先在人乳腺癌中识别出干细胞。
chinese.english: The cancer stem cell hypothesis says that tumors originate in a small number of cells, called cancer stem cells, and that these cells are responsible for fueling a tumor's growth. These cells represent fewer than 5 percent of the cells in a tumor. Wicha's lab was part of the team that first identified stem cells in human breast cancer in 2003.

chinese.chinese: Gabriel博士说，他们处在更大的危险之中，不仅有心脏疾病引起心脏病发作的危险，也有引起心衰的危险。她说，梅奥诊所的研究人员正努力开发一种更有效的风险评估工具，但在此期间，超声心动图的发现是向前迈进的重要一步。
chinese.english: They are in greater danger not only of the kind of heart disease that causes heart attacks, but the type that causes heart failure, Dr. Gabriel says. Mayo Clinic is working to develop a more effective risk assessment tool, but in the meantime, the echocardiogram findings are an important step forward, she says.

chinese.chinese: 佐治亚卫生科学大学的研究者们称，那些面临（罹患）心脏病最大风险的年轻人如果常思考可以减少心脏病发展的风险。
chinese.english: Regular meditation could decrease the risk of developing cardiovascular disease in teens who are most at risk, according to Georgia Health Sciences University researchers.

chinese.chinese: Tall对心脏在线强调依然存在希望的理由：“流行病学研究提供了有力的证据，我们也证实HDL可以有效促进巨噬细胞胆固醇外流。还有一系列关于这方面的动物和人体研究。合成的HDL颗粒已被证实有利于清除动脉内的胆固醇。但这与血循环中少量HDL增高明显不同。我们想确保HDL是空心的，可以容纳胆固醇。到目前为止的升高HDL疗法的大样本实验效果不佳的原因之一可能仅仅增加了已经过载的HDL。
chinese.english: Tall emphasized to heartwire that there is still reason for hope. "There is strong evidence from epidemiological studies, and we have shown efficacy of HDL in promoting cholesterol efflux from macrophages. There are a whole battery of studies in both animals and humans on this. Synthetic HDL particles have been shown to be good at sucking cholesterol out of the artery. But that is very different from a small increase in circulating HDL. We want to make sure that the HDL formed is empty and so has the capacity to take up cholesterol. The large trials of HDL-raising therapies so far may have just raised already overladen HDL. That is one possibility."

chinese.chinese: Science Daily（2012,5,31）——每天食用黑巧克力可以减少代谢综合症人群的心血管事件，诸如心脏病和中风。(注：代谢综合症是指增加心脏病和糖尿病危险的一系列症状)，这项研究发表在British Medical Journal。
chinese.english: Science Daily (May 31, 2012) — Daily consumption of dark chocolate can reduce cardiovascular events, such as heart attacks and strokes, in people with metabolic syndrome (a cluster of factors that increases the risk of developing heart disease and diabetes), finds a study published in the British Medical Journal.

chinese.chinese: O’Brien博士称，毫无经验的技术人员可以在一周内学会如何进行精密的分子检测，而且经验证明，在最贫穷国家的高质量室也可以获得与发达国家相当的检测结果。
chinese.english: Technicians who had no prior experience learned how to do the sophisticated molecular test in a week, and experience has shown that high-quality labs in the poorest countries can obtain test results comparable to those in richer countries, Dr. O'Brien said.

chinese.chinese: Wu和她的同事的下一步工作是将先进的非侵入性成像技术和治疗环节联系在一起，激活导入的基因中的某一毒性物质来杀死扩散的癌细胞。Wu希望有一天能够在病人中通过PET扫描观察发现很小的癌转移并同时杀死它们。目前，她正在室的鼠模型中改良这一影像引导的治疗术。
chinese.english: The next step for Wu and her colleagues is linking the non-invasive imaging advance with a treatment component, activating a toxic agent in the genetic payload to kill the spreading cancer cells. Wu hopes one day to be able to find tiny prostate cancer metastases in patients and kill them at the same time, watching it all on a PET scanner. She currently is refining this image-guided therapy in her lab in mouse models.

chinese.chinese: Philip M. Arlen医学博士，美国国立癌症研究所肿瘤研究中心肿瘤免疫学和生物学室的临床研究团队主任，认为这个发现对于指导治疗前列腺癌患者的方案制定有非常重要的影响。
chinese.english: Philip M. Arlen, M.D., director of the Clinical Research Group for the Laboratory of Tumor Immunology and Biology, Center for Cancer Research, at the National Cancer Institute, said the findings have important implications for guiding treatment decisions for prostate cancer patients.

chinese.chinese: 催产素是一种在按摩，生产和哺乳过程中分泌的一种神经肽，其可以使情绪平静，并有止痛效果。动物研究表明，催产素可以在动物求偶这样的社会性活动中，提升它们互动性。该激素对杏仁核有直接作用，杏仁核是大脑中掌管社会互动以及确定即可情绪危机的重要区域。瑞典卡琳斯卡研究所和伦敦Welcome Trust功能影像室联合发表于《神经科学》（Neuroscience）中的新研究表明，相比仅产生普通的良好感觉，催产素更具有靶向效应。
chinese.english: Oxytocin is a neuropeptide that is secreted by the body during massage, childbirth and breastfeeding to induce a calming, analgesic effect. Animal studies have also shown that oxytocin promotes social interaction, such as during the courting process. The hormone has a direct influence on the amygdala, a brain area that is important for social interaction and for identifying immediate emotional threats. In a new study published in The Journal of Neuroscience, scientists at the Swedish medical university Karolinska Institutet and the Welcome Trust Functional Imaging Laboratory in London show that oxytocin has a more targeted effect than simply producing a general feeling of wellbeing.

chinese.chinese: 作者强调，研究中对仅是非致命性中风和非致命性心脏病进行了评估，对于其他心血管事件（比如心衰）的潜在效应也需要评估。
chinese.english: The authors stress that only non-fatal stroke and non-fatal heart attack were assessed in their analysis, and that the potential effects on other cardiovascular events, such as heart failure, are yet to be tested.

chinese.chinese: “研究人员在限制热量摄入的22名医生身上装上便携式心脏监测仪，他们吃健康饮食，但摄入较正常少30％的卡路里。他们的平均年龄刚刚超过51岁。为了进行比较，研究人员还研究了20名年龄相仿但进食标准西方饮食的人。在CR 组中心率显著降低，他们的心率变异性也明显增高。”
chinese.english: The researchers hooked portable heart monitors to 22 practitioners of calorie restriction (CR) who ate healthy diets but consumed 30 percent fewer calories than normal. Their average age was just over 51. For comparison purposes, researchers also studied 20 other people of about the same age who ate standard Western diets. Heart rates were significantly lower in the CR group, and their heart rate variability was significantly higher.

chinese.chinese: Philip Burke博士 在他的室及我们的临床项目中提出假设：如果在最初注射两种化疗药物后有一个最佳的时间序贯输入，这种时间序贯的化疗可以令非细胞周期的恶性肿瘤细胞进入细胞周期，那么将使肿瘤细胞对短期内注射细胞周期特异性药物-第二种药物（阿糖胞苷）更敏感。
chinese.english: Philip Burke, MD, in whose laboratory and clinical program we worked, hypothesized that timed sequential chemotherapy could recruit noncycling malignant cells into cell cycle, making them more sensitive to a short infusion of the cell cycle–specific second drug (cytarabine) if given in an optimally timed sequence after an initial infusion of the two drugs together.

chinese.chinese: 她预言美沙酮在表达阿片受体的其他肿瘤也会有类似的作用。另外她说：“在我们的室我们发现美沙酮也可杀伤实体瘤。”
chinese.english: She predicts that methadone will have similar effects in other cancers that express opioid receptors. "In our lab we found that we also can kill solid tumors," she added.

chinese.chinese: 在睡眠室中参与者需一晚上进行睡眠观察，并且进行睡眠呼吸暂停的筛查。根据睡眠中苏醒和呼吸暂停的次数来判断病情严重程度，然后据此分组。
chinese.english: The participants spent one night at a sleep laboratory under observation and were screened for sleep apnea. Those diagnosed with sleep apnea were divided into groups according to the severity of their condition, as defined by the average number of breathing pauses and sleep disruptions during sleep.

chinese.chinese: 维生素C是人体必需的营养成分，通常认为是抗氧化剂，研究人员写到。但是在这项研究中，室用43种癌和5种正常细胞系，他们表明高药理学剂量时维生素C表现为促氧化剂，产生过氧化氢和产生一种抗癌作用，这种作用可以杀掉近75%的癌细胞，而对正常细胞没有不利作用。
chinese.english: Vitamin C is an essential nutrient that is commonly regarded as an antioxidant, wrote the researchers. But in this study, using 43 cancer and 5 normal cell lines in the laboratory, they showed that at high pharmacologic doses it behaved like a a prooxidant, generating hydrogen peroxide and producing an anticancer effect that killed up to 75 per cent of cancer cells without adversely affecting normal cells.

chinese.chinese: 研究人员6月7日在细胞杂志在线版上发表的文章称：一种称为血栓粘合素（thrombospondin）的蛋白激活了一种保护性细胞信号通路，使受到模拟极端高血压，心脏压力超载和心脏病发作的心脏细胞免受损伤。
chinese.english: Researchers report June 7 in the online edition of Cell that a type of protein called thrombospondin activates a protective pathway that prevents heart cell damage in mice undergoing simulated extreme hypertension, cardiac pressure overload and heart attack.

chinese.chinese: 血栓粘合素（Thrombospondin ，缩写为Thbs）蛋白由受伤、重新调整或者重新改造的组织（比如慢性心脏病的组织）细胞产生。他们出现在细胞内一种称为内质网的细胞器中。在内质网中，Thbs触发应激反应过程，调节其他蛋白的产生，帮助那些错误折叠、没有正确组装因此失去了特定功能的蛋白正确折叠。错误折叠的蛋白可能造成组织损伤或者器官功能障碍。
chinese.english: Thrombospondin (Thbs) proteins are produced by the body in cells where tissues are being injured, reconfigured or remodeled, such as in chronic cardiac disease. They appear in part of the cell's internal machinery called the endoplasmic reticulum. There, Thbs triggers a stress response process to regulate production of other proteins and help correct or rid cells of proteins that misfold and lose their form and intended function. Misfolded proteins help drive tissue damage and organ dysfunction.

chinese.chinese: 研究人员把注意力集中于在从出生起就过表达血栓粘合素蛋白（Thbs4）的小鼠中研究，Thbs4是怎样活化小鼠细胞内的应激反应的。他们比较了模拟应激和损伤状态下，Thbs4阳性小鼠的心脏细胞的反应和那些自出生起就不能表达心脏特异性Thbs4小鼠心脏细胞的反应。
chinese.english: The researchers zeroed in on how one thrombospondin protein (Thbs4) activates cellular stress responses in mice bred to overexpress the protein in heart cells. They compared how the hearts of the Thbs4-positive mice responded to simulated stress and injury to mice not bred to overexpress cardiac-specific Thbs4.

chinese.chinese: 研究提供心脏病治疗新视角
chinese.english: Research Offers New Perspectives In The Treatment Of Heart Disease

chinese.chinese: 美国心脏学会于1955年首次正式发布预防性感染性心膜炎应用指南，以用于特殊心血管疾病患者进行某些牙科手术。
chinese.english: The American Heart Association first issued formal guidelines for the use of infective endocarditis prophylaxis in patients with specific cardiovascular conditions undergoing certain dental procedures in 1955.

chinese.chinese: 佛罗里达大学药学院研究人员发现基拉戈海岸外发现一种海底组分，在室试验中发现其可以抑制癌细胞生长，他们希望能加速新药的开发，更好地战胜癌症。
chinese.english: University of Florida College of Pharmacy researchers have discovered a marine compound off the coast of Key Largo that inhibits cancer cell growth in laboratory tests, a finding they hope will fuel the development of new drugs to better battle the disease.

chinese.chinese: 随着急性风湿热发病率的降低，在美国对于手术人工心瓣更换病人来说，钙化性主动脉瓣狭窄成了最普遍的适应症。在过去的十年里，Stewart和Otto描述了钙化性主动脉瓣狭窄的危险致病因素，包括脂类，高血压，男性，肾衰竭和糖尿病。此外，这些危险因素和血管动脉粥样硬化是并行的。多年来这种疾病过程被认为是由于一种变性现象所致，通过这种现象钙黏附到主动脉瓣叶表面。试验高胆固醇血症的初始模型已经证明主动脉瓣疾病中初始事件和血管动脉硬化是相似的。在过去的十年中，越来越多的研究评估动脉瓣样品，定义了这种疾病过程中重要的细胞通路。两个独立的室，Mohler团队和Rajamannan团队研究表明，主动脉瓣钙化的出现在主动脉瓣中骨形成过程中的作用是次要的。钙化的临床重要性最初被Rosenhek等描述，Rosenhek确定主动脉瓣大量钙化的病人预后很坏。
chinese.english: With the decline of acute rheumatic fever, calcific aortic stenosis has become the most common indication for surgical valve replacement in the USA. In the past decade, Stewart and Otto1 2 have described the risk factors for calcific aortic stenosis, including lipids, hypertension, male gender, renal failure, and diabetes. Furthermore, these risk factors are parallel to those described for vascular atherosclerosis. For years this disease process was thought to be due to a degenerative phenomenon by which calcium attaches to the surface of the aortic valve leaflet. Initial models of experimental hypercholesterolaemia have demonstrated that initiating events in aortic valve disease are similar to those of vascular atherosclerosis. Over the past decade, there have been a growing number of studies evaluating human aortic valve specimens defining the cellular pathways important in this disease process. Studies from two independent laboratories, Mohler et al3 and Rajamannan et al,4 have show

chinese.chinese: GICD室的研究主管医学博士迪派克.斯里瓦斯他瓦发现了一个微小的RNA分子miR-126与血管形成信号有密切的联系，血管形成是血管发育的过程，是被严格调控的过程。也是科学家研究的焦点。在胚胎发育过程中多个基因调控血管的生成，形成一个级联反应组层层推进调控血管形成。
chinese.english: Researchers in laboratory of GICD Director Deepak Srivastava, MD, found that microRNA (miR-126), a tiny RNA molecule, is intimately involved in the response of blood vessels to angiogenic signals. Angiogenesis, the process of vascular development, is a tightly regulated and well-studied process.A cascade of gene orchestrate a series of events leading to formation of blood vessels in an embryo.Angiogenesis .

chinese.chinese: 之前Ω-3脂肪酸在患病人群中价值的数据被混合了。ANCHOR是在2011年的美国心脏联合会议上发表的，那时候心脏专家们对此表示质疑。许多人都说如果患者咨询鱼油，那他们肯定被告知去买点膳食补充剂。
chinese.english: Previous data on the value of omega-3 fatty acid in this patient population hasbeen mixed. When ANCHOR was presented at the 2011 American Heart Associationmeeting, cardiologists at the time were not overwhelmed. Many said that ifpatients inquire about fish oil, they are told to buy supplements.

chinese.chinese: 来自McMaster University的研究者们发现，长期使用胰岛素对糖尿病或糖尿病前期患者无不良影响，也不会增加其心脏事件、中风或癌症的发生率。
chinese.english: Researchers at McMaster University havediscovered that long-term insulin use does not harm people with diabetes or pre-diabetes or put them at risk of heart attacks, strokesor cancer.

chinese.chinese: 本研究的主要研究者，McMaster大学的Hertzel Gerstein医生说，这一结果同以往的担忧相反，以往认为长期使用胰岛素会导致心脏疾病。他同时也是McMaster大学人口健康研究所的副所长和汉密尔顿健康科学学院副院长。
chinese.english: This is contrary toconcerns that long-term use of insulin may cause heart disease, says Dr.Hertzel Gerstein, principal investigator of the study, professor of medicine atMcMaster's Michael G. DeGroote School of Medicine and deputy director of thePopulation Health Research Institute at McMaster University and Hamilton HealthSciences.

chinese.chinese: 研究同时发现每日摄入1g omega-3脂肪酸胶囊并不能预防糖尿病或糖尿病前期患者心脏相关死亡的风险。
chinese.english: The study alsodiscovered that daily doses of one-gram omega-3 fatty acid capsules did notprevent cardiac-related deaths in people with type 2 diabetes or prediabetes.

chinese.chinese: 结果：研究人员从以下几个领域比较了血管紧张素转换酶抑制剂及血管紧张素2受体抑制剂对稳定性缺血性心脏病的疗效：1）增强根据循证医学的结论应用药物的策略 2）强调效果及副作用的影响 3）研究疗效及副作用共存的影响 4）药物对患者生存质量的影响 5）研究不同地域的疗效及副作用影响 6) 药物对诊断的影响。该研究也提供了对未来研究反向及设计的建议。
chinese.english: Results Our stakeholders prioritized the following areas of research pertaining to the comparative effectiveness of ACE-I/ARB in stable IHD: (1) strategies to enhance greater evidence-based use, (2) impact of adherence on effectiveness or harms, (3) impact of comorbidities on effectiveness or harms, (4) medication impact on patient quality of life, (5) impact of demographic differences on effectiveness or harms, and (6) medication impact on incidence of new diagnoses. This project also yielded suggestions regarding potential study designs to address these future research needs.

chinese.chinese: 在研究生Andrew Schile 和博士后Maria Garcia-Fernandez的帮助下， Steller研究了X连锁凋亡抑制蛋白，即XIAP  和其在其很大程度上回避了RING域的一个作用，这个过程会促进细胞死亡，进而可以促进生存的改善。 Steller，Schile和Garcia-Fernandez 发现：受基因定位和消除RING影响的只有部分类型健康的小鼠的细胞。尽管如此，无RING的小鼠比有RING小鼠有较多的细胞死亡，同时在正常的室条件下正常生活。
chinese.english: With graduate student Andrew Schile and postdoc Maria Garcia-Fernandez, Steller studied the X-linked inhibitor of apoptosis protein, or XIAP, and the role of its largely ignored RING domain, which has been implicated in promoting cell death as well as survival. Steller, Schile and Garcia-Fernandez found that genetically targeting and removing RING affected only some cell types in healthy mice. And even though the mice without the RING had more cell death than the mice with the RING, both lived normal lives under normal laboratory conditions.

chinese.chinese: 波士顿达娜-法贝尔癌症研究所的研究人员说，他们在室用一个分子开关把不成熟的肌细胞变成了褐色脂肪细胞，表明与白色脂肪细胞相比，褐色脂肪细胞与肌细胞更类似。
chinese.english: Researchers at the Dana-Farber Cancer Institute in Boston said they used a single molecular switch to turn immature muscle cells into brown fat cells in the lab, suggesting that brown fat may be more akin to muscle cells than conventional white fat cells.

chinese.chinese: 在墨尔本大学微生物和免疫学室的Loreena Brown教授应用动物流行性感冒激发模型，成功地完成了一连串的证明其（指喷雾剂）原理的实验。
chinese.english: Working with an animal influenza challenge model in the laboratory of Professor Loreena Brown at the Department of Microbiology and Immunology, University of Melbourne, scientists successfully completed a series of proof-in-principal experiments.

chinese.chinese: 为什么有些肿瘤在治疗多年后还会复发？这个问题困扰了科学家和医生很多年，不过最近一个小鼠室研究结果对这个问题提供了一个新的答案，那就是一些细胞在癌变前可能就和肿瘤分开了，它们在体内播种，且无法被探测到，这样静止许多年后才生成肿瘤。
chinese.english: Why do some cancers relapse years after treatment? The question has frustrated scientists and doctors for decades, but a new study of lab mice suggests an answer: Cells may break off from a tumor even before they become cancerous, seeding the body with cells that evade detection and lie dormant for years before turning into tumors of their own.

chinese.chinese: 根据美国心脏病学会，首个包括超声和生理检查的非冠脉血管检查适用标准（AUC），目前已经可以应用。
chinese.english: The first appropriate-use criteria (AUC) for noncoronary vascular testing, including ultrasound and physiologic testing, is now available from the American College of Cardiology [1].

chinese.chinese: 这一“外周血管超声和生理检查适用标准第一部分：动脉超声和生理检查”，由来自11个专业学会的代表、囊括了对怀疑或已知非冠脉血管疾病的患者进行非侵入性检查的255条适应征（包括在不同监控时限的相同适应征）得出。这一报告将被发表在美国心脏病学会杂志2012年7月17日的期刊上。
chinese.english: The "Appropriate use criteria for peripheral vascular ultrasound and physiological testing part I: Arterial ultrasound and physiological testing," produced by representatives of 11 professional societies, covers 255 indications (including the same indication at different surveillance timeframes) for noninvasive testing of patients with suspected or known noncoronary vascular disease. The document will be published in the July 17, 2012 issue of the Journal of the American College of Cardiology.

chinese.chinese: 研究人员收录了3219名由于冠脉搭桥术（CABG）、瓣膜手术或二者兼有而参加这一研究的患者。急性肾衰或肾损伤是术后常见并发症，而且对于进行心脏手术患者的存活有显著影响。
chinese.english: The researchers enrolled 3,219 patients who were due to undergo coronary artery bypass graft (CABG), valve surgery or both, to participate in the study. Acute kidney failure or injury is a common post-operative complication and has a significant impact on the survival of patients undergoing heart surgery.

chinese.chinese: 这项新的研究数据质疑雌激素对心脏和血管是有益的。Pierre-Yves Scarabin表示，“新的研究必须要证实存在这种有害的影响，同时也要明确是否这些研究结果可以应用于较年轻的绝经后妇女。”
chinese.english: This new data questions the beneficial role of oestrogen on the heart and vessels. "Fresh studies must confirm this harmful effect and establish whether these results can be applied to younger menopausal women" stated Pierre-Yves Scarabin.

chinese.chinese: 研究人员调查了哥本哈根总体人口学研究、哥本哈根城市心脏研究以及哥本哈根缺血性心脏病研究中共计80522名丹麦人的数据
chinese.english: The researchers examined data from The Copenhagen General Population Study, The Copenhagen City Heart Study, and The Copenhagen Ischemic Heart Disease Study, which together involved 80,522 Danes.

chinese.chinese: 和她的家属交流不太容易。Martha看上去很好－痛苦的经历后的疲惫。尿袋茶色尿提示她的肾功能障碍。她没有出现骨折，她的儿子和女儿感到放松。在室检查反馈之前，这仅仅是一次简单的因为需要物理治疗的入院。
chinese.english: This was not going to be easy to communicate to her family. Martha looked well — tired after her ordeal but otherwise none the worse for wear. The tea-colored urine in the catheter bag was the only ominous sign of the assault on her kidneys. Her son and daughter had been relieved that there were no fractures. Before the lab tests came back, this was going to be a simple hospital admission for physical therapy.

chinese.chinese: 方法—180名20岁至96岁的社区居民纳入研究，对所有研究对象进行神经生理学检查，室血液学分析和脑部MRI扫描。
chinese.english: Methods—One hundred eighty community-dwelling adults aged 20 to 96 years completed neuropsychological testing, laboratory blood studies, and a brain MRI scan.

chinese.chinese: 据报道，涉及的1000名员工，其中一部分将转到其他部门，而其他人将失业。可能出现的一些人员变动情况包括：一旦帕洛阿尔托室关闭，那些从事抗炎药研究的人员将转到罗氏位于纽泽西州纳特立市（Nutley, N.J.）的研究所。假如成功收购基因泰克，病毒学研究部门将移至南旧金山。不过这些尚无时间表。
chinese.english: Some of the 1,000 employees affected will move elsewhere, and others will lose their jobs, the newspaper reports. Here's how some of the shuffling will work: Once Palo Alto labs close, those folks focusing on inflammatory diseases will move to Roche's offices in Nutley, N.J. The virology division will move to South San Francisco, providing the Genentech deal goes through. There's no timetable yet.

chinese.chinese: 发布于PNAS杂志的该研究来自于鲁哲（音译，M.D,Ph.D,生理学教授及Howard Hughes医学会审查员） 的室。其研究方向为自然蜂毒对内向滤波钾通道（简称Kir通道）的作用以找到治疗心血管疾病的新途径。
chinese.english: The study, published in the Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences, is from the laboratory of Zhe Lu, M.D, Ph.D., Professor of Physiology and a Howard Hughes Medical Institute Investigator, who looked at the action of a natural bee toxin on inward-rectifier potassium channels, Kir channels for short, to identify new approaches to treat cardiovascular disease.

chinese.chinese: 在9月16日新英格兰杂志网络首发的单盲法报道称，按照随机控制结果，用灭活的流感疫苗给孕产妇免疫，与减少63％的室证实流感和29％的6个月内发热婴幼儿呼吸道疾病相关。
chinese.english: Maternal immunization with inactivated influenza vaccine is associated with a 63% reduction in laboratory-confirmed influenza and a 29% reduction in respiratory tract illness with fever in infants up to 6 months old, according to the results of a randomized controlled, blinded trial reported in the September 16 Online First issue of the New England Journal of Medicine.

chinese.chinese: 那则新闻来自一项德国的研究。研究中，15名健康的年轻女性睡在一个专门的睡眠室里，并分别让玫瑰的芳香气味，腐烂鸡蛋的恶臭气味以及中性气味飘荡进室。
chinese.english: That news comes from a German study in which a positive smell (roses), a negative smell (rotten eggs), or a neutral smell wafted through a sleep lab while 15 healthy young women slept.

chinese.chinese: 为了检测不同个体对威胁的生理敏感性和政治信念之间存在着关联的理论假设，在2007年5月，我们在内布拉斯加州林肯市的人群中进行了电话随机采样。参与该调查的参与者经过了筛选[参阅网上补充材料（SOM）]，以确认那些具有坚定政治信念的人（无论他们所持信念的内容是什么），合格的受访者会被邀请至该城市的相关室。在第一次访谈中，46位受试者完成了一项调查（参见SOM），以便研究者确定他们的政治信念，个性特征，和人口学特征。大约在2个月之后进行的第二部分调查中，研究者用生理指标测量仪器作用于受试对象，使得他们可以测定皮肤电导率和眼轮匝肌惊跳时肌电图反应（EMG）。
chinese.english: To test the hypothesis that variations in physical sensitivity to threat are associated with political beliefs, in May 2007, we conducted a random telephone sample of the population of Lincoln, Nebraska. Participants were screened [see supporting online material (SOM)] to identify thosewith strong political attitudes (regardless of the content of those attitudes), and qualifying individuals were invited to a lab in the city. During the first visit, the 46 participants completed a survey instrument (see SOM) ascertaining their political beliefs, personality traits, and demographic characteristics. During the second session, about 2 months after the first, participants were attached to physiological equipment, making it possible to measure skin conductance and orbicularis oculi startle blink electromyogram (EMG) response .

chinese.chinese: 这个可能可以部分解释为什么75%的儿科医生说他们将对患儿过量注射胰岛素的事件会明确向家属告知，而只有33%的医生会将他们忽视了室检查明确告知家属。（值得一提的是有89%的医生将过量注射胰岛素定位为“严重失误”，而对忽视室检查的事件，只有68%的医生认为是“严重失误”。）
chinese.english: That may partly explain why 75% of pediatricians said they'd definitely report the insulin overdose to the child's family, but only 33% said they'd definitely report the overlooked lab test. (It's also worth noting that 89% rated the insulin overdose as a “serious error,” compared with 68% for the overlooked test.)

chinese.chinese: 宾夕法尼亚州立大学的研究者检测了一个纳入1741人的随机民众样本，肯定了肥胖及情绪应激是目前广泛“流行”并困扰这个国家的“嗜睡疲乏”的主要原因。睡眠不充足及阻塞性睡眠呼吸暂停综合症（OSA）也发挥着作用，二者还与高血压、心脏疾病、中风、抑郁症、糖尿病、肥胖和意外事故的发生有关。
chinese.english: Researchers at Penn State examined a random population sample of 1,741adults and determined that obesity and emotional stress are the main causes ofthe current "epidemic" of sleepiness and fatigue plaguing thecountry. Insufficient sleep and obstructive sleep apnea also play a role; bothhave been linked to high blood pressure, heart disease, stroke, depression,diabetes, obesity and accidents.

chinese.chinese: 11月4日的备忘录上写到，发现在Fresenius下属的医疗中心中，2010年中有941例患者曾出现过心脏停博。与使用同类产品的其他患者相比，Fresenius公司得出的结论是：高浓度碳酸氢盐的患者出现心脏停博的风险是低浓度患者的6倍。
chinese.english: The Fresenius memo, dated Nov. 4, found that 941 patients hadsuffered cardiac arrest inside Fresenius clinics in 2010. By comparing thesepatients with others, the company's medical staff concluded that patients withhigh levels of bicarbonate in their blood had about six times the risk ofcardiac arrest as those with lower levels.

chinese.chinese: 新的抗凝预防卒中的科学发现为欧洲心脏病学会（ESC）的房颤治疗指南的更新铺平了道路。
chinese.english: New scientific findings in anticoagulation for stroke prevention are paving the way for updates to the European Society of Cardiology (ESC) Guidelines for the management of atrial fibrillation.

chinese.chinese: 2012年在法国尼斯Cardiostim会议欧洲心律学会（EHRA）分会议上发表了部分研究结果。 Cardiostim是电生理和心脏技术领域的国际科学大会，是欧洲心脏病学会（ESC）和欧洲心律学会（EHRA）共同组织的，这是一个ESC的注册分支。
chinese.english: Some of these findings were presented during the European Heart Rhythm Association (EHRA) sessions at Cardiostim 2012 in Nice, France. Cardiostim is an international scientific congress in the field of electrophysiology and cardiac techniques. It is organised in collaboration with the ESC and EHRA, which is a registered branch of the ESC.

chinese.chinese: 他说，指南所依据的实验并不能证明心脏复律治疗是否会对非适应症之外的患者有好处。
chinese.english: The trials that inform these guidelines were not powered to show whether CRT benefits this group of patients, he argues.

chinese.chinese: 利用动脉血管管壁上的斑块数量对高风险糖尿病进行分层要好于传统的危险因素。在这周，心脏科医师和初级保健医师还建立了合作关系。
chinese.english: The amount of plaque in several arterial beds can help stratify high-risk diabetes better than traditional risk factors. Also this week, cardiologists and primary care physicians form a partnership.

chinese.chinese: 研究者说，该研究第一次将低BMI与适用于CRT-D治疗的心脏逆重构模型联系起来，但对其确切机制的探索将会比较困难。
chinese.english: The researchers said this was the "first study to associate a lower BMI with cardiac reverse remodeling attributed to CRT-D therapy," but discerning the exact mechanism will be difficult, they added.

chinese.chinese: 加州大学洛杉矶分校的研究人员及其同事进行的最新研究发现心脏移植患者在接受支架植入治疗后发生再狭窄的长期生存率较低。他们的这一研究对这类患者群进行随访研究中最大和最长的研究之一，并发表美国心脏病学杂志6月15日期。
chinese.english: New research by UCLA researchers and colleagues has found that heart transplant patients who develop restenosis after receiving a stent have poor long term survival. Their study, one of the largest and longest follow up studies of this patient population, appeared in the June 15 edition of the American Journal of Cardiology.

chinese.chinese: 研究团队发现，在七年随访中未发生支架内再狭窄的患者更易于发生终点死亡、心脏病发作以及反复移植（63.2%），高于发生再狭窄的患者（27.9%）。这基本由于发生再狭窄患者相对于未发生患者较低的存活率所致，前者为38.5%，后者为84.2%。
chinese.english: The team found that patients at a seven-year follow-up who had not developed in-stent restenosis were further from an end-point of death, heart attack or repeat transplantation (63.2 percent) than patients who had developed restenosis (27.9 percent). This was primarily due to a lower survival rate in patients who developed restenosis (38.5 percent) compared to patients who did not (84.2 percent).

chinese.chinese: 研究人员注意到，发生支架内再狭窄的移植冠脉疾病患者中增加死亡、心脏病发作以及需要额外心脏移植的风险的确切机制尚未明确。
chinese.english: Researchers note that the exact mechanism that heightens the risk of death and heart attack and increases the need for additional transplant in patients with transplant coronary artery disease who develop in-stent restenosis is not known.

chinese.chinese: 为了研究这个观点， Beatty 和她的同事研究了556个在心脏与灵魂研究中登记的患有冠心病门诊病人的资料。所有人都做过6分钟步行测试并且步行和活动平板运动测试从2000年的9月11号到2002年的12月20日。
chinese.english: To explore the issue, Beatty and colleagues examined data from 556 outpatients with stable coronary heart disease who were enrolled in the Heart and Soul Study. All underwent a 6-minute walk test and treadmill exercise testing from Sept. 11, 2000, through Dec. 20, 2002.

chinese.chinese: 心脏病发作引起的PTSD增加心脏病再发及死亡率
chinese.english: PTSD Caused By Heart Attack Raises Recurrence And Mortality

chinese.chinese: 研究者也发现出现PTSD症状的心脏病患者在未来1-3年里再发心血管事件甚至死亡的可能性是无PTSD心脏病患者的2倍。
chinese.english: The researchers also found that heart patients who experience these symptoms of PTSD have twice the chance of experiencing another cardiac event, or even mortality, within the next one to three years.

chinese.chinese: 他说心脏病风险的减少与炎症的抑制有关。
chinese.english: The reduced risk for heart attacks, he says, is tied to suppressing inflammation.

chinese.chinese: 心脏病的预防及生存率的改善证实了之前的研究，Patience White博士说，她是公共卫生关节炎基金会的副主任。她向WebMD回顾了这些发现。
chinese.english: The studies about heart attack prevention and better survival are confirming previous research, says Patience White, MD, vice president for public health at the Arthritis Foundation. She reviewed the findings for WebMD.

chinese: 今天，已停止种痘，也不再有天花病例的报告。
english: Today, smallpox vaccination has been discontinued, and no more cases of smallpox are reported.

chinese: 我们今天甚为珍视的科学基础会成为通往明天的跳板，而明天正是我们大多数第20版《希氏内科学》的读者大显身手之时。
english: The scientific infrastructure that we appreciate today is the springboard for the future in which most of the readers of Cecil Textbook of Medicine, 20th edition, will practice.

chinese: 我们今天正以更快的速度经历着这些个“黄金时代”：不到60年前的抗生素的发现，过去30年中对免疫在分子水平上的阐释，以及目前的遗传学，不仅是在分子水平上对其进行了解，而且掌握了利用其为人类直接造福的技能。
english: We now experience these “golden ages” in more rapid order: the discovery of antibiotics less than 60 years ago; an understanding of immunology in molecular terms within the last 30 years; and now in genetics, not just knowledge at the molecular level but understanding how to manipulate genes for the immediate benefit of mankind.

chinese: 从病人和简单的归纳法开始，到今天的单个分子和基本生物化学的过程，是一种获取科学知识的模式。这种模式不应对人类生存环境的其它有益者构成诋毁。
english: This pattern of attaining scientific knowledge, beginning with a sick patient and moving in a reductionist process to individual molecules and fundamental biochemical processes, should not be allowed to lessen our appreciation for the other contributors to the human condition.

chinese: 对佝偻病和软骨病有关的各种异常今天已有了大量的认识和描述。
english: The various disorders associated with rickets and osteomalacia that have been identified and characterized to date are numerous.

chinese: 然而，今天的分子诊断技术提高了诊断这类病人是否属于杂合子的准确率。
english: Today, however, molecular diagnostic tools have refined the ability to determine heterozygosity in this situation.

chinese: 但是今天人们生活在密集的世界里，进行无休止的阅读和案头工作。
english: But people now live in a close-up world—lots of reading and desk work.

chinese: 激发试验：在青霉素产生之前，激发方法是必不可少的，今天则已基本废弃。
english: Provocation: The provocation methods, indispensable before the penicillin era, have largely been abandoned today.

chinese: 今天，药理学和治疗学的进展加深了我们的以下认识：①人体对药物性能的处置机制，②药物对宿主生理完整性所具有的影响能力；③当多种药物同时存在于体内时，药物之间的相互作用和相互竞争影响机体或被机体所影响。
english: Today, advances in pharmacology and in therapeutics have broadened our appreciation of the ① mechanisms involved in disposition of drugs by the body, ② the inherent ability of drugs to modify the physiologic integrity of the host, and ③ the interactions between drugs when present simultaneously in the body and the competition between them for each to influence or to be influenced by the organism.

chinese: 今天，这些药物的应用和效果被看作是医学界一个新纪元的开端，它的意义不仅让我们认识到在健康和疾病中钙作用的复杂性，而且促使一些高度特异性的钙通道阻滞剂的研制和应用。
english: The application and usefulness of these drugs in medicine now should be regarded as the dawn of a new era not only in comprehension of the multiplicity of calcium actions in health and diseases but also in the introduction and application of highly specific calcium channel blocking agents.

chinese: 今天正是由于CT扫描，磁共振和一些特殊的定位仪器，这项技术正成功用于对脑部肿瘤进行定位、活体组织检查及治疗。
english: Today, thanks to CT scanning, MRI, and special stereotactic instruments, the technology is being used successfully to locate, biopsy, and treat brain tumors.

chinese: 今天各种不同的激光已用于很多医学专业，如妇产科、胃肠科、耳鼻喉科、神经外科和皮肤科。
english: Today, various kinds of lasers are used in many medical specialties including gynecology, gastroenterology, otolaryngology, neurosurgery, and dermatology.

chinese: (3)今天，无论是复杂的超声扫描还是经腹壁羊膜穿刺，都能够检查出胎儿有无严重异常。
english: (3) Today, either sophisticated ultrasound scans or amniocentesis can be used to check a fetus for serious abnormalities.

chinese: 今天，对住院病人或高于70岁的非住院病人实施心肺复苏术，成功率不到10％。
english: Cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR), when performed on hospitalized patients or persons older than age 70 out of the hospital, may be successful less than 10% of the time.

chinese: 来自梅奥诊所的一项新的研究发现：食谱中补充γ-亚油酸可以抑制胰腺癌细胞的生长，并且能选择性地促进小鼠中癌细胞的死亡。研究人员表示，所补充的这种被称为GLA的脂肪酸，当和化疗药物吉西他滨联合给予患者的时候能很好地发挥作用。梅奥诊所的病理学家Ruth Lupu博士今天在2012年美国癌症研究协会年度会议上正式报告这些研究结果。Lupu博士说：“对于胰腺癌，很不幸的是目前缺乏有效的治疗药物。我们从20年前的研究结果知道一些多不饱和脂肪酸，像GLA，能普遍地对肿瘤产生一定的影响，但是我们并不知道是那种脂肪酸会起到这种作用，以及这种脂肪酸会对肿瘤影响到何种程度都不是很清楚。”
english: The dietary supplement gamma-linoleic acid can inhibit the growth of a subset of pancreatic cancer cells and selectively promote cancer cell death in mice, a Mayo Clinic study has found. The supplement, a fatty acid also known as GLA, worked particularly well when combined with the chemotherapy drug gemcitabine, the researchers say. The findings were presented today by Mayo Clinic pathologist Ruth Lupu, Ph.D., at the American Association for Cancer Research (AACR) Annual Meeting 2012. "One of the most devastating facts about pancreatic cancer is the paucity of effective drugs that exist to halt a tumor," Dr. Lupu says. "We knew from studies done about 20 years ago that polyunsaturated fatty acids such as GLA could influence cancers in general, but we didn't know which type of fatty acids and to what degree."

chinese: 性活动时，神经反射主要始于阴茎头，然后进入脊髓再返回到性器官，引起；①阴茎勃起；②阴茎旁腺分泌起润滑作用的粘液，③泄精和射精，这些都发生在性兴奋高峰——男性性高潮期。
english: During sexual activity, nerve reflexes begin mainly in the glans of the penis, pass then to the spinal cord, and then return to the sexual organs to cause ① erection of the penis, ② secretion of mucus by glands associated with the penis for the purpose of lubrication, and ③ emission and ejaculation, which occur at the height of sexual stimulation—the period of the male orgasm.

chinese: 在阴道前缘有阴蒂，其勃起与男性阴茎相似，并有一个小得多的像阴茎具有的阴茎头。
english: At the anterior margin of the vagina is the clitoris, which erects like the male penis and has a glans the same as the penis but much smaller.

chinese: 刺激该阴茎头内的神经末梢以及阴道周围较小的其他区域，在性交时引起强烈的性感觉。
english: Stimulation of the nerve endings in this glans, and to a less extent in other areas around the vagina, elicits powerful sexual sensations during intercourse.

chinese: 在妊娠的头几个星期，胎盘还分泌另外一种激素称为绒毛膜促性腺激素，它在妊娠头几个星期刺激黄体，使其继续分泌雌激素和黄体酮。
english: During the first few weeks of pregnancy, another hormone, chorionic gonadotropin, also secreted by the placenta, stimulates the corpus luteum and makes it continue to secrete estrogen and progesterone during the early weeks of pregnancy.

chinese: 所有胎儿器官的基本结构是在妊娠头三个月发育的。
english: The basic structures of all the fetal organs are developed during the first 3 months of pregnancy.

chinese: 由此引起的眼球运动称为玩偶头部现象(眼头运动反射)。
english: Eye movements thus induced are called doll's head phenomena (oculocephalogyric reflex).

chinese: 在一名助手的协助下，让病人伸展颈部并将头躺在枕头上，以便头位不偏离身体的中线水平。
english: With the help of an assistant, have the patient extend the neck and rest the head on a pillow so that it does not deviate from the midplace of the body.

chinese: 它还有刺激它自身新陈代谢的不寻常特点，因而在头两个月期间，剂量应增加到保持相同的血浓度。
english: It also has the unusual feature of stimulating its own metabolism so that over the first 2 months the dose must be increased to maintain the same blood level.

chinese: 头后缩是颈极度强直的征象，常伴有下段脊柱某种程度的强直。
english: Head retraction is an extreme degree of cervical rigidity and is usually associated with some rigidity of the spine at lower levels.

chinese: 它有穿透脑膜的作用良好，且在头2或3个月内有效，可与其他药物联合应用。
english: It has a good meningeal penetration, is effective in the first 2 or 3 months, and can be combined with other drugs.

chinese: 在梗死后的头10天到2周，持续性血管扩张出现于梗死区和(或)其周围，并且这些血管保持扩张状态。
english: Persistent vasodilatation appears in the infarct and/or the surrounding area during the first 10 days to 2 weeks after infarction, and the vessels remain dilated.

chinese: 天幕上出血者，其头和(或)眼照例转向受累半球侧，因而患者的眼睛“是注视病灶侧而偏离偏瘫侧”。
english: With supratentorial hemorrhages, head and /or eye deviation toward the involved hemisphere is the rule so that the patient "is looking toward the lesion and away from the hemiparesis."

chinese: 其能动性具有特征性，包括三种活动姿势：一种沿长轴直线前进，一种沿长轴旋转前进，另一种两头弯曲或两侧扭转。
english: The motility is characteristic, consisting of three movements: a projection in the direction of the long axis, a rotation of the spiral on its long axis, and a bending or twisting from side to side.

chinese: 3.20％在哀悼亲人的头3周内猝死；
english: 3. Twenty percent died during the first three weeks of grief for a loved one.

chinese: 9头猪(雄性5头，雌性4头)体内植入遥测器以记录肾盂充盈和排空期的幅度和频率。
english: Nine pigs, five male and four female, were implanted with a telemeter package to record the amplitude and frequency of the filling and emptying phase of the renal pelvis.

chinese: 银泉镇，马里兰州—美国食品药品管理局今天宣布[1]，含有一种合成的孕酮（曲罗酮）的口服避孕药，可能比其他类型的孕酮类避孕药更易于引起深静脉血栓。
english: Silver Spring, MD -Oral contraceptives containing drospirenone, a synthetic progestin, may belinked to a higher risk for venous thromboembolism (VTE) than pills with othertypes of progestins, the US Food and Drug Administration (FDA) announced today[1].

chinese: OncoSec医疗公司今天宣布，改进了治疗晚期实性肿瘤的OncoSec 医疗系统电疗法，对来自欧洲81名原发和局部复发头颈部鳞癌患者进行OMS电化疗4期临床试验，结果数据分析显示电化疗效果好。该研究显示与外科标准治疗结果相比，电化疗更有利于控制局部病灶和提高生存质量。该项结果于2012年4月20日（周五）在荷兰波兹南举办的第五届欧洲头颈部肿瘤会议上被提出。
english: OncoSec Medical Inc.(OTCBB:ONCS), which is developing its advanced-stage OncoSec Medical System(OMS) ElectroOncology therapies to treat solid tumors, today announced positiveinterim analysis of data from 81 subjects in a Phase IV study of primary andlocally recurrent squamous cell carcinoma of the head and neck (HNSCC) treatedwith OMS ElectroChemotherapy in Europe. The study demonstrated the therapy'sability to provide local tumor control and quality of life outcomes thatcompare favorably to standard outcomes associated with surgery. These resultswere presented at the 5th European Conference on Head and Neck Oncology in Poznan, Polandon Friday, April 20, 2012.

chinese: 带状疱疹疫苗于2006年获得许可，但国家统计局显示，很少有人接种疫苗。免疫试验咨询委员会建议60及60岁以上老年人接种疱疹疫苗。食品药品监督管理局也建议50岁至59 岁人群接种。今天发布的此疫苗研究结果为此阶段人群及60岁以上老年人提供了重要的接种疫苗安全性的信息。
english: The herpes zoster vaccine was licensed in 2006, but few people have been vaccinated, national data shows. The ACIP recommends the vaccine for healthy people ages 60 years and older. In 2011, the U.S. Food and Drug Administration approved the use of the herpes zoster vaccine in individuals 50 to 59 years of age. The study results released today provide important safety data for people in this age group as well as adults 60 and older.

chinese: 根据医学研究所今天发表的一项报告，预防肥胖迫切需要整个美国社会行动起来。
english: Obesity prevention requires nothing less than changes throughout American society, according to a report from the Institute of Medicine (IOM) being released today .

chinese: 今天宣布的“区域系统的护理服务示范工程”使的旨在促进更好地协调救治不同区域ST抬高心梗患者项目
english: The aim of facilitating better coordinated regional programs for STEMI patients is taking another step forward with the "Regional Systems of Care Demonstration Project," announced today .

chinese: Pharmaceuticals公司和Eisai公司今天宣布：美国食品药品监督管理局（FDA）内分泌和代谢药物咨询委员会以18票赞成，4票反对,1票弃权的结果，通过了对氯卡色林的支持建议，因为有充足而有效的数据可以证实在长期服用氯卡色林的超重及肥胖人群中，药物对其潜在的获益大于对其潜在的风险。氯卡色林是为控制体重而开发的试验性药物，其功能包括减肥作用和对减肥效果的维持作用，适用人群为至少有一种与体重相关的伴生性疾病的超重患者（体重指数大于或等于27）或肥胖患者（体重指数大于或等于30）。
english: Pharmaceuticals, Inc. and Eisai Inc. announced today that the US Food and Drug Administration (FDA) Endocrinologic and Metabolic Drugs Advisory Committee voted 18 to 4, with one abstention, that the available data demonstrate that the potential benefits of lorcaserin outweigh the potential risks when used long-term in a population of overweight and obese individuals. Lorcaserin is an investigational drug candidate intended for weight management, including weight loss and maintenance of weight loss, in patients who are obese (BMI greater than or equal to 30) or patients who are overweight (BMI greater than or equal to 27) and have at least one weight-related co-morbid condition.

chinese: 相应研究于今天（2012年5月7日）发表在国际内分泌学大会和欧洲内分泌学大会的联合会议上。瑞士波尔坦大学校医院内分泌学系临床研究人员Emanuel Christ教授说：目前手术切除胰岛癌的瓶颈在于常规成像方法很精确定位。不过，他和同事们发现胰岛癌细胞表面存在高密度的特定类型受体，可以通过放射标记药物定位这些受体。定位这些受体后，患者接受单电子发射计算机断层显像（single photon emission computed tomography，简写为SPECT，是一种2维或者3维成像技术）扫描联合计算机断层扫描（Computed Tomography，简写为CT）扫描。由于能够对肿瘤实现精确定位，该技术使研究者能够检测到结合了标记性药物所在的肿瘤细胞位置，即使在肿瘤的直径只有1厘米或者更小。
english: Presenting the findings at the joint International Congress of Endocrinology/European Congress of Endocrinology today (7 May 2012), Professor Emanuel Christ, a clinical researcher in the Department of Endocrinology at the University Hospital of Bern, Switzerland, said that at present surgical removal of insulinomas was hampered by difficulties in localising them using conventional imaging procedures. However, he and his colleagues had found that the insulinomas had high densities of a particular type of receptor on their cell surfaces that could be targeted with a radioactively labelled drug. When patients were then scanned by a 2-D/3-D imaging technique called Single Photon Emission Computed Tomography (SPECT) combined with conventional computerised tomography (CT)scan, this technique allowed the researchers to detect where the drug had bound to insulinoma cells, indicating the precise location of the tumours, even when they were as small as about one centimetre in diameter.

chinese: Pharmos公司（OTC-PINK: PARS）今天宣布：已经完成了使用左托非索泮（S-托非索泮）治疗高尿酸血症和痛风病人概念证明型临床试验。这个临床IIa期试验在杜克大学杜克临床研究中心完成，研究负责人是医学博士、哲学博士、痛风治疗专家和关键意见领袖John Sundy。该研究的初衷是评价左托非索泮（levotofisopam）作为降尿酸药物在治疗痛风病人过程中的安全性和有效性。
english: Pharmos Corporation (OTC-PINK: PARS) today announced that it has successfully completed a proof-of-concept clinical trial using its compound levotofisopam (S-tofisopam) to treat patients with hyperuricemia and gout. This phase 2a trial was conducted at the Duke Clinical Research Unit of Duke University and the principal investigator was John Sundy, MD, PhD, an expert and key opinion leader in the treatment of gout. The trial was designed to assess the safety and efficacy of levotofisopam as a uric acid-lowering agent in patients with gout.

chinese: 今天，百健艾迪（纳斯达克：BIIB）和Elan公共有限公司（纽约证券交易所：ELN）宣布：在新西兰医学杂志发表了公司在多发性硬化患者中进行的，TYSABRI(那他珠单抗)使用与发生进行性多灶性白质脑病（progressive multifocal leukoencephalopathy，缩写为：PML）风险的全球性风险管理项目的研究结果。PML是一种罕见的但严重的脑部感染，经常使患者死亡或者出现严重残疾。该项目调查了三项与PML相关的风险因素：抗JC病毒（JCV，一种首先发现于PML的多瘤病毒，命名来源于发现者的首字母）抗体状态，TYSABRI治疗前使用免疫抑制剂，以及长期使用TYSABRI进行治疗。
english: Idec (NASDAQ: BIIB) and Elan Corporation, plc (NYSE: ELN) today announced that the New England Journal of Medicine published research from the companies' global risk management program that updates the risk of TYSABRI (natalizumab)-associated progressive multifocal leukoencephalopathy (PML), an infrequent but serious brain infection that usually leads to death or severe disability, in people with multiple sclerosis (MS). The analysis looked at three risk factors associated with a patient's PML risk: anti-JC virus (JCV) antibody status, use of immunosuppressant (IS) therapy prior to TYSABRI initiation, and longer duration of treatment with TYSABRI.

chinese: 今天的开放期刊PLoS ONE发表了这一成果，即利用藻类来生产疟疾的蛋白质，从而在实验室小鼠身上诱导出能对抗疟原虫的抗体来预防疟疾的传播。这项研究进展源自于加州大学圣地亚哥两组生物学家的一次不同寻常的跨学科合作，一组来自于生命科学部和圣地亚哥藻类生物技术中心，该小组在之前曾利用藻类开发出生物制品和生物燃料；另一组生物学家来自于医学院热带医学和急性感染性疾病中心，该中心一直致力于寻找疟疾的诊断、预防和治疗方法。
english: The use of algae to produce malaria proteins that elicited antibodies against Plasmodium falciparum in laboratory mice and prevented malaria transmission was published today in the online, open-access journal PLoS ONE. The development resulted from an unusual interdisciplinary collaboration between two groups of biologists at UC San Diego—one from the Division of Biological Sciences and San Diego Center for Algae Biotechnology, which had been engineering algae to produce bio-products and biofuels, and another from the Center for Tropical Medicine and Emerging Infectious Diseases in the School of Medicine that is working to develop ways to diagnose, prevent and treat malaria.

chinese: Receptos公司今天宣布该公司的技术人员将会向消化疾病周(DDW)年会提交一项科学口头报告。该会议于2012年5月20日，周五上午9时在加利福尼亚圣地亚哥会议中心举办。DDW吸引了来自世界各地的数千名医生、研究人员和学者，他们在这首屈一指的科学会议上分享胃肠道健康方面的最新研究成果。以一篇名为“一种小分子S1P1受体激动剂可以显著改善动物模型的炎症性肠病(IBD)”的摘要为依据，Receptos公司学术人员将会讨论RPC1063在两例不同的IBD体内模型中的积极的临床前数据。
english: Receptos Inc. today announced that company personnel will deliver a scientific podium presentation about RPC1063 at the Digestive Disease Week (DDW) annual meeting at 9 a.m. PDT on Sunday, May 20, 2012 at the San Diego Convention Center in San Diego, California. DDW attracts thousands of physicians, researchers, and academics from around the world to share the latest research in gastrointestinal health topics, for which DDW is the premier scientific conference. Based on an abstract entitled "A small molecule S1P1 receptor agonist with significant efficacy in animal models of inflammatory bowel disease (IBD)," Receptos scientific personnel will discuss positive preclinical data with RPC1063 in two distinct in vivo models of IBD.

chinese: 世界糖尿病领域的领头羊--诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk）今天宣布，美国食品药品管理局（FDA）已经批准Levemir（注射用地特胰岛素[rDNA 来源]）应用于2到5岁1型糖尿病患儿。随着在儿科适应症的扩展，Levemir现在可用于两岁至成年的1型糖尿病患者及2型糖尿病成人患者。
english: Novo Nordisk, a world leader in diabetes care, announced today that the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has approved Levemir (insulin detemir [rDNA origin] injection) for use in children ages two to five years with type 1 diabetes. With the expansion of its pediatric indication, Levemir is now available for type 1 diabetes patients from age two through adulthood and adult patients with type 2 diabetes.

chinese: 今天公布的最新研究显示：皮下注射抗TNF-α药物SIMPONI（戈利木单抗）可以使大部分中到重度溃疡性结肠炎患者出现临床反应，而这些患者在常规治疗中失败或者不能忍受常规药物的副作用。研究人员将杨森公司研发部资助的III期临床试验的结果公布在最新科学发现会议期间的消化药物周（DDW）上。结果显示：在SIMPONI治疗的两个不同剂量组中，超过50%患者在第6周出现了临床反应（该研究的主要终点指标），明显高于对照组的出现比例。与安慰剂组相比，在第六周，SIMPONI治疗组能够显著促进症状缓解、粘膜修复和健康相关的生活质量提高。
english: New study findings presented today show that subcutaneous induction regimens of the anti-tumor necrosis factor (TNF)-alpha therapy SIMPONI(golimumab) induced clinical response in a majority of patients with moderately to severely active ulcerative colitis (UC) who had previously failed or were intolerant to conventional agents. Investigators presented data from the Janssen Research Development sponsored Phase 3 study at Digestive Disease Week (DDW） during a late breaker session and reported that more than 50 percent of patients in each of two SIMPONI dosing groups achieved clinical response at week 6, the primary endpoint of the study, which was significantly more than those in clinical response after receiving placebo. Treatment with SIMPONI also resulted in significant induction of clinical remission and mucosal healing and improvement in health-related quality of life measures at week 6 compared with placebo.

chinese: 参议院今天批准了美国食品药品监督管理局（FDA）安全和创新法案。根据美国消费者协会政策和宣传消费者报告的消息：这项法案在现行法律基础上有所提高，不过，在FDA的现行医疗设备监督方面的缺陷并没有丝毫改进。
english: The Senate approved the Food and Drug Administration Safety and Innovation Act today. While the legislation includes some improvements over current law, it leaves significant flaws with the FDA's current medical device oversight system in place, according to Consumers Union, the policy and advocacy arm of Consumer Reports.

chinese: Rainbow Coral (OTCBB:RBCC) 公司的生物技术子公司Rainbow BioSciences今天宣布,其最新合资对象AmarantusBioSciences有限公司(OTCBB:AMBS)将有望公布旨在评估治疗创伤性脑损伤(TBI)的一项新型蛋白治疗方法潜力的临床前实验结果.
english: Rainbow BioSciences, the biotechsubsidiary of Rainbow Coral Corp. (OTCBB:RBCC), announced today that its latestjoint venture target, Amarantus BioSciences, Inc. (OTCBB: AMBS), expects toannounce the results of a preclinical study evaluating the potential of its newprotein therapy as a treatment for Traumatic BrainInjury (TBI).

chinese: 按例l—27所用的相同实验方法，给9头猪注射以下剂量：第l次给予2毫克／公斤体重盐酸双苯乙硫酯(其分子式中R为二乙氨基的双取代氨基)，第2次给予2毫克／公斤体重盐酸双苯乙硫酯(其分子式中R为吗啉基的双取代氨基)，第3次给予2毫克／公斤体重盐酸双苯乙硫酯(其分子式中R为哌啶子基的双取代氨基)。
english: The same procedure as utilized in examples 1-27 was used on the nine pigs which were given a dose of 2 milligrams of: first, a thiphenamil hydrochloride (in which R is a disubstituted amino radical of the diethylamino group) per kilogram of body weight; second, a 2 milligram dose of a thiphenamil hydrochloride (in which R is a disubstituted amino radical of the morpholino group) per kilogram of body weight (mg / kg); and third, a 2 milligram dose of a thiphenamil hydrochloride (in which R is a disubstituted amino radical of the piperidino group) per kilogram of body weight (mg / kg).

chinese: 按例l—54所用的相同实验方法，给9头猪使用以下剂量：第l次5毫克／公斤体重盐酸双苯乙硫酯(其分子式中R为二乙氨基的双取代氨基)，第2次给予5毫克／公斤体重盐酸双苯乙硫酯(其分子式中R为吗啉基的双取代氨基)，第3次给予5毫克／公斤体重盐酸双苯乙硫酯(其分子式中R为哌啶子基的双取代氨基)。
english: The same procedure as utilized in examples 1-54 was used on the nine pigs which were given a dose of 5 milligrams of.- first, a thiphenamil hydrochloride (in which R is a disubstituted amino radical of the diethylamino group) per kilogram of body weight (mg/kg); second, a 5 milligram dose of a thiphenamil hydrochloride (in which R is a disubstituted amino radical of the morpholino group)per kilogram of body weight (mg / kg) and third, a 5 milligram dose of a thiphenamil hydrochloride (in which R is a disubstituted amino radical of the piperidino group) per kilogram of body weight (rag / kg).

chinese: 按例l—80所用的相同实验方法，给9头猪注射以下剂量：第l次10毫克／公斤体重盐酸双苯乙硫酯(其分子式中R为二乙氨基的双取代氨基)，第2次10毫克／公斤体重盐酸双苯乙硫酯(其分子式中R为吗啉基的双取代氨基)，第3次l0毫克／公斤体重盐酸双苯乙硫酯(其分子式中R为哌啶子基的双取代氨基)。
english: The same procedure as utilized in examples 1-80 was used on the nine pigs which were given a dose of 10 milligrams of: first, a thiphenamil hydrochloride (in which R is a disubstituied amino radical of the diethylamino group) per kilogram of body weight (mg/kg); second, a 10 milligram dose of a thiphenamil hydrochloride (in which R is a disubstituted amino radical of the morpholino group)per kilogram of body weight (mg/kg); and third, a 10 milligram dose of a thiphenamil hydrochloride (in which R is a disubstituted amino radical of the piperidino group)per kilogram of body weight(rag / kg).

chinese: 5头试验动物的测定，是在打开腹腔和堵塞输尿管的条件下进行的。
english: In five of the experimental animals, measurements were taken with the abdomen open and the ureter obstructed.

chinese: 静脉注射盐酸双苯乙硫酯2.5毫克／公斤体重，使5头试验动物中的4头静息肾盂压显著降低，降至5.9±3.1厘米水柱。
english: Intravenous thiphenamil hydrochloride at 2.5mg / kg significantly reduced the resting renal pelvic pressure to 5.9 -+ 3.1 cm H20 in four of the five test animals.

chinese: 考虑到我们手头有l00多份随机阳性血清，我们选择其中1组用FIAX法测定是否存在I期抗体。
english: Given the fact that we have over 100 random positive sera on hand, we elected to survey a group of them for the presence of phase I antibody by FLAX.

chinese: 主要器官系统回顾：皮肤、造血系统(包括淋巴结)，头、眼、耳、鼻、口、喉、颈、乳房及呼吸系统、心血管系统、胃肠道系统、泌尿系统、肌肉骨骼系统、神经系统、内分泌和精神系统
english: Systematic review of major organ systems: skin, hematopoietic system (including lymph nodes), head, eyes, ears, nose, mouth, throat, neck, breasts, and respiratory, cardiovascular, gastrointestinal, genitourinary, musculoskeletal, nervous, endocrine and psychiatric systems.

chinese: 具体说，前上臂的肱二头肌就是一块屈肌。
english: For example, the biceps muscle in the front of the upper arm is a flexor.

chinese: 而后上臂的肱三头肌则是一块伸肌。
english: The triceps muscle in the back of the upper arm is an extensor.

chinese: 与此同时，肱二头肌放松，使肱三头肌能够把它恢复到原位。
english: At the same time, the biceps relaxes so the triceps can pull it back to its original length.

chinese: 如果您愿意的话，您可以通过曲臂来感受到你上臂肱二头肌的肌腹。
english: If you want, you can feel the fleshy belly of the biceps of your arm when you bend your elbow.

chinese: 试着用手掌去抬桌子边，就可感受到肱二头肌。
english: Now try to lift the edge of a table with your palm and feel the biceps.

chinese: 顺肌腹摸向肘关节，可感受到肱二头肌的肌腱。
english: Follow the fleshy belly toward the elbow and feel its cord-like tendon.

chinese: 肱二头肌、肱三头肌和其它类的骨骼肌也被称为随意肌，这是因为它们接受人主观意愿的驱使。
english: The biceps, triceps or other kinds of skeletal muscles are also called voluntary muscles because they are under the control of our willpower.

chinese: 在生命的头二十年即可发生完全瘫疾或死亡。
english: Complete paralysis and death usually ensue within the first two decades of life.

chinese: 今天，美国临床内分泌医师协会(AACE)欢迎了一个来自中国的内分泌医师代表团，该代表团将参加于5月23日至27日在费城举行的AACE第21届科学与临床年度会议。这是该世界人口最多国家的内分泌医师团体首次访问（感觉参与更合适）AACE活动。中国医师将参与讲座和活动，参观行业展览，会见AACE领导层并考察AACE会员的方法与实践。
english: Today, the American Association of Clinical Endocrinologists (AACE) welcomes a delegation of endocrinologists from China to its 21st Annual Scientific and Clinical Congress in Philadelphia May 23-27. It is the first time a group of endocrinologists from the world's most populous nation has visited this AACE event. The Chinese physicians will attend lectures and events, review industry exhibits, meet with AACE leadership and examine the methods and practices of AACE members.

chinese: 美国内分泌专家协会（AACE）今天在线公布了有关胰岛素泵管理的共识意见，并且将会刊登在AACE协会的官方医学期刊内分泌实践中。
english: The American Association of Clinical Endocrinologists (AACE)today published a consensus statement for insulin pump management online, andthe statement will be published in the next issue of the association's officialmedical journal Endocrine Practice.

chinese: 今天，安进公司（纳斯达克股票代码：AMGN）报道了III期临床EVOLVE实验的结果。EVOLVE(EValuation Of Cinacalcet HCl Therapy to Lower CardioVascular Events,译为对盐酸甲状旁腺素降低心血管不良反应的评价)试验用来评估Sensipar/Mimpera（甲状旁腺素）降低心血管不良事件的程度。EVOLVE试验是在3883名继发性甲状旁腺功能亢进（hyperparathyroidism，缩写为HPT）患者中进行的；患者同时患有慢性肾病，正在接受透析治疗。该研究的主要终点指标是复合事件发生，包括全因死亡率或者第一个非致命性心血管不良反应（包括心肌梗塞，不稳定心绞痛的入院治疗，心衰或者外周血管不良反应）的发生率。虽然Sensipar/Mimpara治疗组的复合主要不良事件较少，不过，两组间的差异没有统计学意义；该研究没有达到意向性治疗分析的主要终点指标。
english: Amgen (NASDAQ:AMGN) today announced top-line results of the Phase 3 EVOLVE (EValuation Of Cinacalcet HCl Therapy to Lower CardioVascular Events) trial, which evaluated Sensipar?/Mimpara? (cinacalcet) for the reduction of the risk of mortality and cardiovascular (CV) events among 3,883 patients with secondary hyperparathyroidism (HPT) and chronic kidney disease (CKD) receiving dialysis. The primary endpoint of the study was time to the composite event comprising all-cause mortality or first non-fatal cardiovascular event, including myocardial infarction, hospitalization for unstable angina, heart failure or peripheral vascular event. Although patients in the Sensipar/Mimpara arm experienced numerically fewer composite primary events, the results were not statistically significant, and the trial did not meet its primary endpoint in the intent-to-treat analysis.

chinese: Ophthotech公司今天宣布：从第一个临床研究结果看，治疗神经血管性年龄相关性黄斑变性（湿性年龄相关性黄斑变性），联合用药优于单用Lucentis（兰尼珠单抗，抗血管内皮生长因子单抗），两者具有统计学上差异
english: Ophthotech Corporation today announced results from the first clinical trial to show statistically significant superior efficacy over Lucentis (ranibizumab) monotherapy for the treatment of neovascular age-related macular degeneration (wet AMD).

chinese: 注意！美国，该降低体重了——肥胖不但使你一直感觉疲倦而且可能会让你容易出现意外事故，今天在SLEEP2012大会上公布的三项研究结论显示肥胖及抑郁症可能是造成我们在清醒时过度疲乏嗜睡的罪魁祸首。
english: Wake up, America, and lose some weight - it's keeping you tiredandprone to accidents. Three studies being presented today at sleep2012 conclude that obesity and depression are the two main culprits making usexcessively sleepy while awake.

chinese: 辉瑞公司今天发布声明称收到美国食品和药物管理局关于Tafamidis新药申请的答复信。政府要求批准之前需完成次要疗效的研究，以确保建立疗效的证据牢靠。并且还要求关于目前tafamidis新药申请的额外信息。辉瑞将与FDA合作，解决答复信中的问题。Tafamidis是种治疗有症状的成人甲状腺素家族性淀粉样多发性神经病(TTR-FAP)的新型研究药物，可延缓神经损害。
english: Pfizer Inc. announced today that it hasreceived a Complete Response Letter from the U.S. Food and Drug Administration(FDA) on its New Drug Application (NDA) for tafamidis meglumine. The Agency isrequesting the completion of a second efficacy study to establish substantialevidence of effectiveness prior to an approval. The Agency has also asked foradditional information on the data within the current tafamidis NDA. Pfizerwill work with the FDA to address the content of the letter. Tafamidis is anovel, investigational medication for the treatment of Transthyretin FamilialAmyloid Polyneuropathy (TTR-FAP) in adult patients with symptomaticpolyneuropathy to delay neurologic impairment.

chinese: 波士顿Brigham 妇女医院的Marc Bonaca博士今天在美国心脏协会新兴医学系列的在线会议上发表了TRA 2°P TIMI 50研究中的PAD患者数据。
english: The PAD data from TRA 2°P TIMI 50 was presented today by Dr Marc Bonaca (Brigham and Women's Hospital, Boston, MA) in an American Heart Association Emerging Science Series webinar.

chinese: Veracyte (South San Francisco, CA, USA; www.veracyte.com)是一家在新兴的分子细胞学领域处于领先水平的分子诊断公司。他们今天宣布了一项大样本、多中心、前瞻性研究的结果，证明通过基因表达分类器检测Afirma基因的表达能降低超过一半以上不必要的甲状腺癌手术。
english: Veracyte, Inc., a molecular diagnostics company that is pioneering the emerging field of molecular cytology, today announced results from a large, prospective, multicenter study, which demonstrated the potential for the Afirma Gene Expression Classifier, a gene expression test, to reduce the large number of unnecessary surgeries in thyroid cancer diagnosis by more than half.

chinese: PROLOR生物技术公司(NYSE MKT: PBTH)今天宣布，在第58届血栓与止血国际协会(ISTH)科学与标准化委员会年会上，PROLOR公司科学家Gili Hart博士将公布该公司长效凝血因子用于治疗血友病的临床前研发数据。Hart博士将于明天，即2012年6月30日，在英国利物浦ISTH会议上进行该口头报告。
english: PROLOR Biotech, Inc. (NYSE MKT: PBTH), today announced that PROLOR scientist Dr. Gili Hart will present data on the company's long-acting clotting factors in preclinical development for the treatment of hemophilia at the 58th Annual Meeting of the Science and Standardization Committee of the International Society on Thrombosis and Haemostasis (ISTH). Dr. Hart's oral presentation will take place tomorrow, June 30, 2012, at the ISTH meeting in Liverpool, UK.

chinese: 我希望一旦临床医生开始将基因组分析手段用于诊断，他们就能够理性地使用这些药物。我们今天看到这有望变成现实，我确信很快就会看到它变成现实。临床医生将能够确定特定患者受到了哪种感染，然后从药柜中取出针对这种细菌的药物。这可能会完全改变今天的开药方法。
english: My other hope for clinicians is that they will be able to use them more rationally once they start using genome analysis as a diagnostic tool. What we're seeing in capability today, I have no doubt that it's going to happen very, very soon. The clinician will be able to identify precisely what type of infection is ongoing in this particular patient and then go the shelf and pick the right drugs against the right bugs. That may change the picture entirely.

chinese: Tak Mak博士的这个研究结果今天发表在Nature上，他评论说：“我们首次证明代谢异常可导致癌症发生。这为开发阻断相关基因突变以抑制致癌性代谢酶的产生搭建了平台。”该研究组的科学家分别来自于英国纽约的威尔康乃尔医学院以及美国马萨诸塞州剑桥大学的Agios制药公司。
english: Says Dr. Tak Mak of the findings published today in Nature: "For the first time, we have demonstrated how a metabolite can cause cancer. This sets the stage for developing inhibitors to block the mutation and prevent the production of this disease-initiating enzyme." The research team included scientists at Weill Cornell Medical College, New York City, and Agios Pharmaceuticals, Cambridge, Massachusetts.

chinese: Vertex将在今天，即美国东部时间2012年6月28日早8:00，就这些数据召开面向投资者和媒体的电话会议。该研究的完整数据将提交到一个即将召开的医学会议上进行发布。
english: Vertex will host a conference call for investors and media today, June 28, 2012 at 8:00 a.m. ET, to discuss these data. Full data from this study will be submitted for presentation at an upcoming medical meeting.

chinese: TONIX今天提出的新研究报告证实，该公司舌下含服片型TNX-102（2.4毫克）能使环苯扎林较口服环苯扎林片更快速地交换和吸收。事实上，TONIX公司发现新型SL制剂的吸收同静脉注射环苯扎林一样好。环苯扎林是美国FDA批准的两种肌肉松弛处方药中的活性成分。这两种肌松药由其他制药公司生产。
english: The new research reported by TONIX todaydemonstrates that the Company's SL TNX-102 (2.4 mg) tablet provides fasterdelivery and more efficient absorption of cyclobenzaprine as compared to thecurrently available pills that deliver cyclobenzaprine to the stomach. In fact,TONIX discovered that cyclobenzaprine given in a novel SL formulation isabsorbed as well as intravenous cyclobenzaprine. Cyclobenzaprine is the activeingredient in two prescription muscle relaxants that have been approved by theU.S. Food and Drug Administration and are marketed by other companies.

chinese: 以色列2频道电视台在今天采访了一个原本患有重症肌无力而近期又被诊断为“肌萎缩侧索硬化”的患者。该患者说经过姑息性NurOwn细胞（BrainStorm公司研制）治疗后，他的语言、行走、平衡、姿势、肌力、食欲、消化功能都获得明显改善，体重也增加了。
english: Israeli Channel 2 TV interviewed today a patient suffering from Myasthenia Gravis (MG) and recently diagnosed with ALS. The patient reported that he has experienced visible improvement in his speech, walking, balance, posture, muscle strength, appetite, digestion, and weight gain following compassionate treatment with BrainStorm's NurOwn cell therapy.

chinese: 2012年6月29日--美国商务在线--加利福尼亚州雷德伍德市消息-- A.P.制药公司(OTCBB: APPA.OB)是一家专业制药公司，该公司今天公布了APF530临床3期研究的附加数据，APF530用于预防化疗引起的恶心呕吐反应(CINV)。对该研究子系列数据进行的分析发现，在5天的时间内，APF530与帕洛诺司琼(Aloxi)在控制恶心呕吐以及患者满意度方面效果类似。A.P.公司今天将研究结果以海报方式，发表于在纽约召开的癌症支持性护理跨国协会与国际口腔肿瘤协会(MASCC/ISOO)国际座谈会上。根据之前的报道，临床3期研究表明，APF530与帕洛诺司琼在预防患者急性与迟发型CINV方面效果类似，这些患者的治疗方式为适度呕吐型化疗(MEC)或高度呕吐型化疗(HEC)。
english: REDWOOD CITY, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Jun 29, 2012 - A.P. Pharma, Inc. (OTCBB: APPA.OB), a specialty pharmaceutical company, today announced additional data from the Company's Phase 3 study of APF530 for the prevention of chemotherapy-induced nausea and vomiting (CINV). The findings from the analysis of this subset of data indicate that APF530 offered comparable nausea control and patient satisfaction to palonosetron (Aloxi?) over a 5-day period. The Company presented the study results today at a poster presentation during the Multinational Association of Supportive Care in Cancer and the International Society of Oral Oncology (MASCC/ISOO) International Symposium in New York. As previously reported, the Phase 3 study showed APF530 was comparable to palonosetron in preventing both acute- and delayed-onset CINV in patients receiving either moderately emetogenic chemotherapy (MEC) or highly emetogenic chemotherapy (HEC).

chinese: 为了避免这种类型的呼吸困难，患者通常会在头和胸部之下垫上两个或更多枕头。
english: Patients usually learn to avoid dyspnea of this sort by sleeping with the head and thorax on two or more pillows.

chinese: 大多数自然流产发生在妊娠头三个月。
english: Most spontaneous abortions occur within the first 3 months of pregnancy.

chinese: 妊娠头三个月内，胎儿对以上因素最为敏感。
english: The fetus is most susceptible to their effects during the first three months of pregnancy.

chinese: 在出生后的头几个月，他是远视眼，就象他的穴居祖先。
english: In the first few months he was long-sighted, like his caveman ancestors.

chinese: a．盘状LE，限局性(头和颈)或全身性(“播散性”)盘状LE。
english: a. Discoid LE, localized (head and neck) or generalized ("disseminated") discoid LE.

chinese: 红斑狼疮脂膜炎(深部LE):该型LE有真皮深层以致皮下的结节，其直径为l～3或l～4cm，像橡胶一样坚实，境界清楚，且为无痛性，最常发生于头、面和上肢的正常皮肤的下面。
english: LE Panniculitis ("LE Profundus"): In this type of LE, deep dermal or even subcutaneous nodules 1 to 3 or 4 cm in diameter, rubbery-firm, sharply defined, and nontender, occur, most often beneath normal skin of the head face, or upper arms.

chinese: 如果用25针头，发生率仅为1％。
english: The incidence is only 1% when a 25-gauge needle is used.

chinese: 头三天经静脉输入氢化可的松，每H 30m9／k9．可能有益。
english: Hydrocortisone, 30 mg/kg/d intravenously, may be useful for the first 3 days.

chinese: 大多数排斥反应发生于头三个月内。
english: Most rejections occur within the first 3 months.

chinese: 头几个月过后死亡相当少见而且大多数存活者术后一年时健康状态极好，这种情况表明可望获得长期存活。
english: Deaths are relatively uncommon after the first few months, and the excellent health of most survivors at 1 year suggests that prolonged survival can be expected.

chinese: 若累及腰4神经根，可见膝腱反射减弱和轻度股四头肌无力。
english: With involvement of the L4 root, the patellar tendon reflex may be diminished and slight quadriceps weakness may be observed.

chinese: 在本书头三章里，对与药物治疗有关的这三个方面将分别在药代动力学、药效动力学和药物间相互作用的详细阐述过程中进行讨论。
english: In the first three chapters, this triad of therapeutics is discussed by elaborating on the pharmacokinetics, the pharmacodynamics, and the drug-drug interactions.

chinese: 此作用可引起股四头肌群肌肉消瘦。
english: This effect causes muscle wasting in quadriceps femoris groups.

chinese: 它用于治疗头、颈和食管的鳞状细胞癌，与其他药物联用可治疗睾丸癌以及何杰金病和其他淋巴瘤。
english: Bleomycin is used in squamous-cell carcinoma of the head, neck, and esophagus, in combination with other drugs in testicular carcinoma, and in Hodgkin's disease and other lymphomas.

chinese: 在每个横桥末端有一个伸长的头，它可以弯动。
english: At the end of each cross-bridge is an elongated head that can bend from side to side.

chinese: [/u]【1】修正： Onyx制药公司今天宣布：美国食品药物管理局（FDA）肿瘤药物咨询委员会(ODAC) 以11票赞成、0票反对、1票弃权通过Kyprolis（carfilzomib拟议的品牌名称）的效益风险评估。Kyprolis将用于治疗曾接受至少两种包括蛋白酶抑制剂或免疫调节剂（IMiD）药物治疗的复发性或难治性多发骨髓瘤患者。
english: SouthSan Francisco, CA. —Jun. 20, 2012—[u]Onyx制药公司宣布美国食品药物管理局（FDA）肿瘤药物咨询委员会(ODAC) 以11票赞成、0票反对、1票弃权认为那些先前至少接受两种治疗包括蛋白酶抑制剂或者免疫调节剂(IMiD)的复发性或者难治性多发骨髓瘤患者使用Kyprolis（carfilzomib拟议的品牌名称）的效益风险评估是有益的。Onyx公司正在推动Kyprolis在多发性骨髓瘤中多线治疗中的应用。

chinese: 今天，在Vancouver举办的2012年度阿尔茨海默病协会国际会议（AAIC）上首次报道了静脉用丙种球蛋白(Gammagard,Baxter)对阿尔茨海默病能够产生长期稳定病情的效果。该项研究考核了认知、记忆、日常功能和情绪等方面。
english: The first report of long-term (three-year) stabilization of Alzheimer's disease symptoms with IVIG (Gammagard,Baxter), including no decline on measures of cognition, memory, daily functioning and mood, was reported today at the Alzheimer's Association International Conference 2012 (AAIC 2012) inVancouver.

chinese: 这项研究，今天在温哥华的国际阿尔兹海默协会研讨会上提出，实验组人员包括了71名从WRAP招募来的中年人，其中29人符合代谢综合征的诊断标准，42人不符合。
english: The study, presented today at the Alzheimer's Association International Conference in Vancouver, British Columbia, involved 71 middle-aged people recruited from the Wisconsin Registry for Alzheimer's Prevention (WRAP). Of this group, 29 met the criteria for metabolic syndrome and 42 did not.

chinese: 今天，辉瑞公司宣布了对普瑞巴林胶囊治疗广泛性焦虑症状（GAD）的长期安全性和有效性的研究（A0081147）结果。研究结果显示：通过对GAD病人追踪调查三个月和六个月，逐渐减少普瑞巴林的治疗用量，药物停药后症状会比较少。
english: Pfizer Inc.(NYSE: PFE) announced today that top-line results forLyrica (pregabalin) capsules Study A0081147 – Long Term Safetyand Efficacy of Pregabalin in Subjects with Generalized Anxiety Disorder (GAD)– demonstrate that drug discontinuation symptoms were low after tapering Lyricatreatment following three months and six months in GAD patients.

chinese: 吉利德科技公司(Gilead Sciences, Inc. Nasdaq: GILD)今天公布了一项为期24周的临床3期试验数据，该试验名为SPIRIT(利匹韦林与特鲁瓦达复方单片剂切换给药对PI的促进作用)，旨在对接受病毒抑制治疗的HIV患者从多片剂(含双蛋白酶抑制剂)切换至每日一次、单片给药的Complera疗法(恩曲他滨/利匹韦林/富马酸替诺福韦酯)进行评估。研究达到了24周主要目标并发现，切换到Complera疗法后的疗效并不比继续进行双蛋白酶抑制剂疗法的疗效差。这些发现将于今天在华盛顿特区召开的第19届国际艾滋病会议(AIDS 2012)上，以口头报告(TUAB0104摘要)的形式发表。
english: Gilead Sciences, Inc. (Nasdaq: GILD) today announced 24-week data from a Phase 3 clinical trial, SPIRIT (Switching boosted PI to Rilpivirine In Combination with Truvada as a Single Tablet Regimen), which evaluated virologically suppressed treatment-experienced HIV patients switching from a multi-pill regimen containing a ritonavir-boosted protease inhibitor to the once-daily single tablet regimen Complera (emtricitabine/rilpivirine/tenofovir disoproxil fumarate). The study met its 24-week primary endpoint, which found that switching to Complera was non-inferior to remaining on a ritonavir-boosted protease inhibitor regimen. These findings will be presented today in an oral session (Abstract #TUAB0104) at the 19th International AIDS Conference (AIDS 2012) in Washington, D.C.

chinese: 慢性阻塞性肺病的慢性肺部状况是美国第三大致死和致残原因。该疾病的患者可能会弗吉尼亚联邦大学的医生发表在今天的《新英格兰医学杂志》上的研究中获益良多。这是一项关于慢性阻塞性肺疾病一周三次剂量的抗生素治疗的研究。
english: Patients suffering from the chronic lung condition COPD, which is the third-leading cause of death and disability in the United States, may benefit greatly from a three times a week dose of an antibiotic, according to a study by Virginia Commonwealth University physicians published in today's issue of the New England Journal of Medicine.

chinese: 有人说，“急诊大夫面临的最大难题是他们不能解决一切问题，而不是今天有哪怕300个病人要接诊。
english: One said, "'emergency physicians have a limited ability to focus on anything other than the 300 patients they're going to see today.'"

chinese: 一个综合的临床前期药物研究机构（CRO）——Ricerca Biosciences——今天宣布推出最新的最先进的细胞检测服务：早期安全性筛查细胞毒性和免疫信号？细胞因子风暴细胞分析。
english: RicercaBiosciences, anintegrated preclinical pharmaceutical contract research organization (CRO),today announced the introduction of two new state-of-the-art cellular assayservices: Early Safety Screening Cytotoxicity and ImmunoSIGNAL? Cytokine StormCellular Assay.

chinese: 奥尼克斯制药公司宣布说今天美国血液协会的医学杂志已经发表了003-A1phase 2b 试验的结果，这是一个评估Kyprolis注射治疗     后阶段多发性骨髓瘤单组多中心试验，这些病人都已经接受了平均5个的抗骨髓瘤方案.
english: OnyxPharmaceuticals, Inc.  announced today that Blood, the medicaljournal of the American Society of Hematology, has published results from the003-A1 Phase 2b trial, a single-arm, multicenter clinical trial evaluatingKyprolis (carfilzomib) for Injection for the treatment of patients withadvanced multiple myeloma, who had received a median of five prior anti-myelomaregimens.

chinese: 英国初级卫生保健信托机构（PCT）主席Jonathan Montgomery教授对这一决定进行了解释：“我们仍然认为政策是合法的，明智的，对病人是安全的。然而，今天考虑到这一政策，董事会推测假如诺华提供折扣价，SHIP地区每年在雷珠单抗上的花费可能将显著地减少750万。”
english: Professor Jonathan Montgomery, chairman of the PCT Cluster Board, explained the decision: “We remain of the view that the policy was lawful, sensible and safe for patients. However, in our consideration of the policy today, the Board has concluded that given the discount being offered, it will be possible to reduce significantly the $7.5 million spent annually on Lucentis in the SHIP area.
