chinese: NanoViricides，公司（OTCBB：NNVC）（“本公司”）今天宣布，它雇佣澳大利亚生物制品监管事务咨询的Pty有限公司来协调监管审查和批准在澳大利亚进行广谱抗流感药物Flucide的第一批人体试验。澳大利亚的生物制剂也将促进临床试验网站（S）的选择和临床试验协议的发展。
english: NanoViricides,Inc. (OTC BB: NNVC) (the "Company") announced today that it hasretained Australian Biologics Pty. Ltd., a regulatory affairs consulting firm,to coordinate the regulatory review and approval to conduct the first humantrials in Australia for Flucide?, the Company's broad-spectrum anti-influenzadrug. Australian Biologics will also facilitate clinical trial site(s)selection and development of the clinical trials agreements.

chinese: Rajesh Malik博士（首席药物执行和董事会管理委员）说：“我们对于今天的结果非常的失望和惊讶，特别是我们当初在看到非小细胞肺癌(NSCLC)患者talactoferrin alfa 肿瘤药物的II期双盲随机临床试验的结果后对现在的结果充满期待满。我们计划深入的分析数据来更好的理解目前的结果。我们可能会考虑所有参与到其中的患者和研究员。我们希望该研究的结果可以帮助了解该领域更多科学上的认识，正如对于进展期的非小细胞肺癌(NSCLC)患者有强烈的愿望想要了解新的治疗方法。
english: Rajesh Malik, M.D., Chief Medical Officer and Memberof the Management Board, said: "We are extremely disappointed andsurprised with today's results, especially considering the earlier promisingresults we had seen in two randomized Phase II trialswith talactoferrin alfa in non-small cell lung cancer.We plan to thoroughly analyze the data to better understand these results. Wewould like to thank all of the patients and investigators who participated inthis clinical trial. We hope that the results of this study will help toadvance scientific knowledge in this area, as there is an urgent need for newtreatment options for patients with advanced non-small cell lung cancer."

chinese: 这项今天发表在美国心脏协会科学会议2012年基础心血管科学会议《科学研讨》上的研究，共纳入了年龄7至20岁的29名患者，平均年龄14岁。如Malloy所说，房室结折返性心动过速通常使用以解剖为基础的定位系统，在右房间隔部的Koch三角区描记到心内电图。但由于少见旁路的存在和患者解剖学的变异，以解剖为基础的定位有时存在困难。
english: The study, which was presented today at the American Heart Association Basic Cardiovascular Sciences 2012 Scientific Sessions, included 29 patients ranging from seven to 20 years old, average age 14 years. As Malloy noted, ablation of AVNRT is typically guided by anatomical mapping and electrogram morphology within the triangle of Koch, an area on the septal wall of the right atrium. However, anatomical approaches can be difficult because of the unusual pathway location and variations in the patient's anatomy.

chinese: 2012年8月7日 Achillion制药公司今天宣布，正在进行多剂量的第2阶段试验用以评价使用sovaprevir（既往名为ACH-1625，为每天使用一次的蛋白酶抑制剂）同时联合聚乙二醇干扰素与利巴韦林（P / R）治疗12周，接着追加P / R治疗12周，结果持续病毒应答（SVR 4）为85％至100％。此外，该公司今天宣布：ACH-3102为第二代的泛基因型NS5A的抑制剂，它在健康志愿者中单独使用组和14天多剂量递增组均是安全的且耐受性良好。此外，第一阶段概念证明型临床试验的患者招募已经开始，用以评估在基因1型丙型肝炎病毒患者中ACH-3102的安全性和有效性。
english: on Aug. 7, 2012，Achillion Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (Nasdaq:ACHN) today announced sustained viral response (SVR4) results of 85 to 100 percent from an ongoing multi-dose Phase 2 trial evaluating 12 weeks of dosing with sovaprevir (formerly ACH-1625), a once-daily protease inhibitor, in combination with pegylated interferon plus ribavirin (P/R) followed by an additional 12 weeks of P/R. In addition, the Company announced today that ACH-3102, a second-generation pan-genotypic NS5A inhibitor, has been safe and well tolerated by healthy volunteers in both single and 14-day multiple ascending dose groups. Further, enrollment of patients in a Phase 1 proof-of-concept clinical trial to evaluate the safety and efficacy of ACH-3102 in patients with genotype 1 HCV has been initiated.

chinese: 兰伯西实验室今天推出了该公司版本的爱妥糖，并开始了长达180天的市场专营权期。但这种专营权并不完全，Mylan (MYL)同样享有这些权利。相对于专利药价格来说，这两份大餐可能意味着更大的折扣，因而对于武田公司的爱妥糖收入来说，这也意味着更大的威胁。
english: Ranbaxy Laboratories rolled out its version of Actos today, beginning its 180days of exclusivity on the market. It's not completely exclusive; Mylan (MYL)shares those rights. Their dual entree may spell a bigger discount against thebranded price--and therefore, a bigger threat to Takeda's Actos revenue.

chinese: 在低血压后，例如发生在短暂的心跳骤停或外科手术以后，曾观察到最典型的混合型。
english: Most typically, combinations have been observed after hypotension such as that which occurs with brief cardiac arrest or after surgery.

chinese: 然而运动神经分布纯粹是调节性的，它作用于心脏，根据机体的需要调节(增加或减低)心跳的速度和强度。
english: The motor nerve supply is a purely regulatory one, however; it acts upon the heart to modify, i.e., increase or decrease, the rate and strength of the heart beat according to the needs of the body.

chinese: 神经冲动对维持心跳并非必不可少的。
english: Nerve impulses are not necessary to maintain the heart beat.

chinese: 随后，若它跳动的强度不足以把它刚接纳的全部血液加上前次心跳时剩余的血液都挤压出去，它必须保持在扩大状态或进一步扩张。
english: If it then does not beat strongly enough to expel all the blood it has just received plus the residue from the previous beat, it must remain dilated or dilate still more.

chinese: 正常情况下，心脏扩张会产生更强有力的跳动，所以在扩张的某个阶段，心跳通常强得足以恢复循环的平衡(称为“代偿作用”)。
english: Normally, dilation of the heart produces a stronger beat, so at some stage of dilation the beat usually becomes strong enough to restore the balance of circulation (called "compensation").

chinese: 洋地黄对减轻代偿失调有用，因为它能增加心跳的强度从而提高心输出量。
english: Digitalis is useful in minimizing decompensation because it increases the strength of the heart beat and therefore the cardiac output.

chinese: 这些药物或者无扩张效果，或者有讨厌的副作用，如口干、视觉模糊和心跳减慢。
english: These drugs have either been ineffective as dilators or have undesirable side effects such as dryness of the mouth, blurred vision, and slowed heart beat.

chinese: 因此，本发明的一个重要目的是提供使上泌尿道平滑肌扩张和松弛而又不产生诸如口干、瞳孔扩大和心跳减慢等抗胆碱能药物副作用的方法。
english: Thus, it is an important object of the present invention to provide a method for dilating and relaxing the smooth muscles of the upper urinary tract without subjecting the patient to the undesirable side effects of anti-cholinergic drugs, for example dryness of the mouth, dilation of the pupils, and slowed heart beat.

chinese: 脑的偏下部位控制着诸如呼吸、心跳、体温、饥渴的基本活动。
english: The lower parts of the brain control basic functions such as breathing and heart rate as well as body temperature, hunger, and thirst.

chinese: 在其它的情况下，可给病人装上心肺器来保持呼吸和心跳。
english: In other cases, the patient may be placed on a heart and lung machine that maintains respiration and heartbeat.

chinese: 与受体有关的功能是：①血管扩张，②心跳加快，③支气管扩张，④正性肌力作用，⑤肠道松弛，⑥糖元分解和脂肪酸释放。
english: The functions associated with beta receptors are ① vasodilatation, ② cardioacceleration, ③ bronchial relaxation, ④ positive inotropic effect, ⑤ intestinal relaxation, and ⑥ glycogenolysis and fatty acid release.

chinese: 在正常心脏，SA结控制心跳频率，因此SA结称为心脏起搏者。
english: In a normal heart, the SA node controls the rate of heart beat and therefore is called the pacemaker of the heart.

chinese: 将电极置于心脏上的皮肤表面，或置于心脏任两侧，譬如在两臂上，并将电极与适当的记录仪器连接，就可记录到每次心跳所产生的电压。
english: By placing electrodes on the skin over the heart or on any two sides of the heart, such as on the two arms, and connecting these to an appropriate recording instrument, the electrical voltages generated during each heart beat can be recorded.

chinese: 动脉血压为脉动性，这是由于每次心跳心脏将少量血液泵入主动脉。
english: The arterial pressure is pulsatile because a small amount of blood is pumped by the heart into the aorta with each heart beat.

chinese.chinese: 在200呎 (61m)深处，15分钟至2小时内吸收的氮量就足以使人瞌睡，再深一些甚至会使人完全麻醉。
chinese.english: At a sea depth of 200ft (61m), the amount of nitrogen absorbed within 15 minutes to 2 hours is enough to cause drowsiness, and even total anesthesia can occur at still deeper levels.

chinese.chinese: 如果癫痫发作不易控制，那末就应给病人施行麻醉，同时应插入气管内导管以保证良好的通气。
chinese.english: If the seizures cannot be readily controlled, then the patient should be anaesthetized and an endotracheal tube should be inserted to ensure satisfactory ventilation.

chinese.chinese: 成瘾性: 沉溺于习惯性服用医药的或给人以愉快感的物质，以享受该物质所能提供的解脱、舒适、刺激和振奋；当没有这种麻醉剂时，常常很想服用，对鸦片类、巴比妥酸盐类和吗啡样麻醉剂成瘾，也许对酒精、可卡因、大麻与安非他明成瘾；对鸦片类、吗啡样麻醉剂、巴比妥酸盐类，以及可能对酒精的成瘾性同时还伴有明显的肉体上的依赖性；对鸦片类和吗啡样麻醉剂，以及也许对安非他明和酒精的成瘾，同时伴有耐受性(或适应性)，鸦片类、吗啡样麻醉剂、巴比妥酸盐类和酒精成瘾戒断期间，常具有精神毒性作用。
chinese.english: Addiction: Surrender and devotion to the regular use of a medicinal or pleasurable substance for the sake of the relief, comfort, stimulation, or exhilaration that it affords; often with craving when the drug is absent, in addiction to opiates, barbiturates and morphine-like drugs, and perhaps in addiction to alcohol, cocaine, marijuana and amphetamine; together with apparently physical dependence in addiction to opiates and morphine-like analgesics, barbiturates, and possibly alcohol; together with increased tolerance (or adaptation) to opiates and morphine-like analgesics, barbiturates, and perhaps amphetamine and alcohol; and usually with psychotoxic effects during withdrawal in addiction to opiates, morphine-like analgesics, barbiturates and alcohol.

chinese.chinese: 一个人可能依赖酒精和其他麻醉剂。
chinese.english: A person may be dependent on alcohol and other drugs.

chinese.chinese: 在指背处用氯乙烷恰在指的背侧面近端点状喷雾进行麻醉。
chinese.english: With ethylchloride, spray a small spot on the dorsolateral aspect just proximal to the nail to be anesthetized.

chinese.chinese: 有些急性BFP反应是由于新近预防接种、感冒、传染性单核细胞增多症、肝炎、麻疹、伤寒、水痘、流感、淋巴肉芽肿、疟疾、妊娠或麻醉剂成瘾者。
chinese.english: Some acute BFP reactions are due to recent vaccinations, the common cold, infectious mononucleosis, hepatitis, measles, typhoid, varicella, influenza, lymphogranuloma, malaria, pregnancy, or narcotic addiction.

chinese.chinese: 在手术室内可用麻醉药人工地引起病人全身或局部感觉的缺失。
chinese.english: The loss of sensation in all or part of the body can be artificially induced in the operating room by the use of an anesthesia-producing drug.

chinese.chinese: 麻醉药由麻醉师使用，他同时负责监护病人的生命征(脉膊、血压和呼吸)，并负责其它记录工作(如心电图、脑电波等)。
chinese.english: The anesthesiologist administers the anesthesia and is responsible for monitoring the patient's vital signs -- pulse, blood pressure, and respiration -- and for keeping any other records used in that operation (e.g., electrocardiogram, electroencephalogram).

chinese.chinese: 全身麻醉引起全身感觉缺失或意识丧失。
chinese.english: A general anesthetic produces a loss of sensation in the entire body and unconsciousness.

chinese.chinese: 全身麻醉的作用分为三期。
chinese.english: The effects of a general anesthetic occur in three stages.

chinese.chinese: 全身麻醉药的使用方法是使病人吸入气体或由液体挥发出的气体。
chinese.english: General anesthetics are administered by having the patient breathe a gas or inhale a vapor given off by a liquid.

chinese.chinese: 这两种给药法称为吸入麻醉。
chinese.english: Both types of administration are called inhalation anesthesia.

chinese.chinese: 乙醚、氟烷、甲氧氟烷，二乙烯醚、氯乙烷、三氯乙烷等溶液是挥发性麻醉药。
chinese.english: Such liquids as ethyl ether, halothane, methoxyflurane, divinyl, ether, ethyl chloride, and trichlorethane are examples of vaporized anesthetics.

chinese.chinese: 气体麻醉药的例子有一氧化氮、乙烯和三甲烯。
chinese.english: Examples of gases are nitrous oxide, ethylene, and cyclopropane.

chinese.chinese: 大多数全身麻醉药都有一些缺点，这就使它们在某些手术使用中不理想，甚至有危险。
chinese.english: Most general anesthetics have several drawbacks, making their use in certain operations undesirable or even hazardous.

chinese.chinese: 除吸入麻醉药外，有些全身性麻醉药可用于静脉注射。
chinese.english: Besides inhalation anesthetics, certain general anesthetics can be administered intravenously.

chinese.chinese: 静脉注射用全身麻醉药中，使用最广泛的是硫喷妥钠(戊硫巴比妥钠、巴比妥)。
chinese.english: The most widely used intravenous general anesthetic is sodium pentothal (thiopental, a barbiturate).

chinese.chinese: 它引起的麻醉作用迅速并很少引起术后并发症(如恶心和呕吐)。
chinese.english: Anesthesia is quick and postoperative complications, such as nausea and vomiting, are not common.

chinese.chinese: 硫喷妥钠用药的方式是给病人作脊椎麻醉，使病人身体逐渐松弛。
chinese.english: Sodium pentothal is frequently administered in a mild form to relax patients given a spinal anesthetic.

chinese.chinese: 局部麻醉药和全身麻醉药不同，它只麻醉身体的某个区域。
chinese.english: Unlike general anesthetics, area anesthetics desensitize only a certain area of the body.

chinese.chinese: 局部麻醉有三种类型：脊髓麻醉、区域麻醉和局部麻醉。
chinese.english: There are three types of area anesthetics: spinal, regional, and local.

chinese.chinese: 脊髓麻醉药注入脊柱的株网膜下腔。
chinese.english: A spinal anesthetic is injected into the subarachnoid space of the spinal column.

chinese.chinese: 脊髓麻醉一般用子下肢和腹部手术。
chinese.english: Spinal anesthesia is commonly used in operations of the lower extremities and abdomen.

chinese.chinese: 普鲁卡因(奴佛卡因有caine后缀的表示是可卡因的衍生物)、丁卡因(潘妥卡因)和狄布卡因(奴白卡因)等是应用广泛的脊髓麻醉药。
chinese.english: Procaine (Novocaine, -caine is a derivative of cocaine), tetracaine (Pantocaine), and dibucaine (Nupercaine) are widely used spinal anesthetics.

chinese.chinese: 部位麻醉药用来注入支配身体某一特定部位的神经内。
chinese.english: Regional anesthetics are injected into nerves supplying a particular region of the body.

chinese.chinese: 臂丛阻滞：个臂丛支配区域被麻醉。
chinese.english: Brachial plexus block: Entire area is anesthetized.

chinese.chinese: 脊柱旁阻滞：腹腔脏器和腹臂被麻醉。
chinese.english: Paravertebral block: Viscera and abdominal wall are anesthetized.

chinese.chinese: 经骶(骶管)阻滞：会阴和部分下腹被麻醉。
chinese.english: Transsacral or caudal block: The perineum and portions of the lower abdomen are anesthetized.

chinese.chinese: 局部麻醉药用来注入一定区域的组织内并且只引起该区域的麻醉。
chinese.english: Local anesthetics are injected into a certain area of tissue and produce anesthesia only in that area.

chinese.chinese: 直接把麻醉药注入切除的组织内称为浸润麻醉。
chinese.english: The application of an anesthetic directly into the tissue to be cut is also called infiltration anesthesia.

chinese.chinese: 这将减少温暖血液从内部结构流到皮肤，减少那些产生大部分热量的将热运至体表。
chinese.english: This lessens the flow of warm blood from the internal structures to the skin, decreasing the transfer of heat to the body surface from those internal organs producing most of the heat.

chinese.chinese: 梅毒是一种接触、性传播性疾病，导致皮肤和损害，由梅毒螺旋体引起。
chinese.english: Syphilis, once known as lues, is a contagious, sexually transmitted disease, leading to cutaneous and internal organic lesions; it is caused by the spirochete Treponema pallidum.

chinese.chinese: 深部树胶肿: 这可发生于肌肉、骨、骨膜、淋巴结、中枢神经系统和。
chinese.english: Deep Gummata: These may occur in muscle, bones, periosteum, lymph nodes, central nervous system, and the visceral organs.

chinese.chinese: 保护：许多由骨骼保护而免受损伤。
chinese.english: Protection: Many internal organs are protected from injury by the skeleton.

chinese.chinese: 肠外病变可以累及皮肤、肝脏和其他一些。
chinese.english: Extra-intestinal lesions may affect the skin, liver and some other internal organs.

chinese.chinese: 神经系统不仅支配肌肉，而且还控制许多的功能，并与呼吸系统协同活动以控制二氧化碳和氧的浓度。
chinese.english: The nervous system innervates the muscles and also controls the functions of many of the internal organs, and it functions in association with the respiratory system to control the concentrations of carbon dioxide and oxygen.

chinese.chinese: 其工作主要是引起一类称为平滑肌的肌肉的收缩或舒张，平滑肌构成许多的主要部分。
chinese.english: It operates principally by causing contraction or relaxation of a type of muscle called smooth muscle, which constitutes major portions of many of the internal organs.

chinese.chinese: 肝脏是特别适宜于中间代谢和储存的之一。
chinese.english: The liver is one of the internal organs especially adapted for intermediary metabolism and storage.

chinese.chinese: 平滑肌为大多数的肌肉类型，其内部组织与横纹肌不同，但收缩的化学基础则是一样的。
chinese.english: Smooth muscle, the type of muscle found in most internal organs, has a different internal organization, but the chemical basis of contraction is still the same.

chinese.chinese: 脊髓和脑可以立即对此感觉信息作出反应，并向身体的肌肉和发送信号引起某种反应，称为运动反应。
chinese.english: The spinal cord and the brain may react immediately to this sensory information and send signals to the muscles or internal organs of the body to cause some response, called a motor response.

chinese.chinese: 同样，的神经性激活，如引起心率加快或增加肠蠕动，也可以是运动反应的一部分。
chinese.english: Also, the nervous activation of the internal organs of the body, such as causing increased heart rate or increased peristalsis in the intestines, may also be part of a motor response.

chinese.chinese: 这是通过控制下列活动而实现的：①全身骨胳肌的收缩；②平滑肌的收缩；③身体很多部分外分泌腺和内分泌腺的分泌。
chinese.english: This is achieved by controlling ① contraction of skeletal muscles throughout the body, ② contraction of smooth muscle in the internal organs, and ③ secretion by both exocrine and endocrine glands in many parts of the body.

chinese.chinese: 最后效应器是一块骨胳肌或一个，如心、胃肠或腺体，它们都能被神经控制。
chinese.english: Finally, the effector is a skeletal muscle or one of the internal organs such as the heart, gut, or a gland that can be controlled by the nerves.

chinese.chinese: 特殊痛觉包括：①内脏痛，它起自，如心、胃、肝等；②头痛，它往往是起自颅腔内部的痛觉的表现。
chinese.english: Special types of pain include ① visceral pain, which comes from the internal organs such as the heart, tile stomach, the liver, or so forth, and ② headache, which is usually a manifestation of pain originating inside the cranial cavity.

chinese.chinese: 单纯疱疹病毒(HSV-1，HSV-2)(人类疱疹病毒)可引起多种感染，包括粘膜皮肤表面、中枢神经系统以及偶见的。
chinese.english: Herpes simplex viruses (HSV-1, HSV-2) (Herpesvirus hominal) produce a variety of infections involving mucocutaneous surfaces, the central nervous system, and occasionally visceral organs.

chinese.chinese: 瘀点、瘀斑、“挤压性紫癜"和脐周静脉曲张是与某些恶性疾病有关的血管性损害。
chinese.english: Petechiae, ecchymoses, "pinch purpura" and caput medusae are some of the vascular lesions associated with malignancies.

chinese.chinese: 该病导致皮肤和粘膜出血，表现为瘀点、瘀斑、紫癜。
chinese.english: This disorder results in bleeding into the skin and mucous membranes, variously described as petechiae, ecchymosis, and purpura.

chinese.chinese: 血小板减少通常存在，大约三分之一病人在诊断时就有明显出血倾向，常表现为瘀点、瘀斑、牙龈出血、鼻衄、或内脏出血。
chinese.english: Thrombocytopenia is usually present, and approximately one third of patients have clinically evident bleeding at diagnosis, usually in the form of petechiae, ecchymoses, bleeding gums, epistaxis, or hemorrhage.

chinese.chinese: 口腔内可发生瘀点和口疮。
chinese.english: Petechiae or aphthae may occur in the mouth.

chinese.chinese: 硬腭也可发生红斑、瘀点和溃疡。
chinese.english: Erythema, petechiae, and erosions may occur on the hard palate.

chinese.chinese: 如Tuffanelli和Dubois等报道的，皮肤血管炎表现为瘀点，丘疹结节性皮疹，网状青斑及表浅性溃疡可为本病早期表现。
chinese.english: Cutaneous angiitis shown by petechiae, papulonodules, livedo reticularis, and superficial ulceration may be an initial manifestation of SLE, as reported by Tuffanelli and Dubois.

chinese.chinese: 腭部有瘀点。
chinese.english: Palatal petechiae may also be observed.

chinese.chinese: 5％病人会出现斑疹样、瘀点样、猩红热样、荨麻疹样或红斑等多形性皮疹。
chinese.english: In 5 percent of patients a macular, petechial, scarlatiniform, urticarial, or erythema multiforme-like rash may appear.

chinese.chinese: 某些特征(特别是同时存在)显示预后不良：<1>住院前12h内出现瘀点者(新的淤点及紫癜在1～2h成簇出现者为不祥之兆)，<2>休克；<3>体温高于40℃，<4>无脑膜炎者，<5>白细胞降低者，<6>血小板减少者或有DIC征兆者，<7>年纪太小及太老者。
chinese.english: Certain features (particularly if present simultaneously) indicate a poor prognosis: petechiae for less than 12 hours prior to hospitalization (rapid development of crops of new petechiae and purpura from one hour to the next is ominous); shock; fever above 40℃; absence of meningitis; leukopenia; thrombocytopenia or evidence of DIC; extremes of age.

chinese.chinese: 心内膜炎的常见临床表现包括发热，心脏杂音、贫血、血尿，脾肿大，瘀点与栓塞现象。
chinese.english: Common clinical manifestations of endocarditis include fever, heart murmurs, anemia, hematuria, splenomegaly, petechiae, and embolic phenomenon.

chinese.chinese: 瘀点发生率20％～40％，亚急性细菌性心内膜炎时更为常见。
chinese.english: For instance, petechiae are present in 20%—40% of patients with endocarditis, and are more common in SBE.

chinese.chinese: 奥斯纳小结，线性出血，瘀点，罗特斑支持心内膜炎的诊断。
chinese.english: Osler's nodes, splinter hemorrhages, petechiae, and Roth's spots (described earlier) support the diagnosis of endocarditis

chinese.chinese: 有少数散在瘀点。
chinese.english: A few scattered petechiae were noted.

chinese.chinese: 最常见的皮肤损害为瘀点和瘀斑，有些病例有白血病细胞浸润。
chinese.english: Skin lesions consist mostly of petechiae, ecchymosis, and, in some cases, leukemic infiltrates.

chinese.chinese: 其主要表现为精神紊乱、发热、呼吸困难和心动过速，瘀点、有时为紫绀，咯血，昏迷和死亡。
chinese.english: Its main features are mental confusion, fever, dyspnoea and tachycardia, a petechial rash and sometimes cyanosis, haemoptysis, coma and death.

chinese.chinese: 在临床上或实验时，可明显观察到下列情况：发热、白细胞减少、低血糖、低血压及休克、主要灌流不足、激活C3和补体连锁反应、血管内凝血及死亡。
chinese.english: The following are prominently observed clinically or experimentally: fever, leukopenia and hypoglycemia, hypotension and shock, impaired perfusion of essential organs, activation of C3 and complement cascade, intravascular coagulation and death.

chinese.chinese: 3.低血压：革兰阴性菌的菌血症早期可发生广泛的小动脉及静脉收缩(病人发冷)，随后外周血管扩张，血管通透性增高，静脉回流减少，心搏出量减少，微循环淤滞，外周血管收缩，休克，灌流不足及其后果(例如无尿)。
chinese.english: 3. Hypotension: Early in Gram-negative bacteremia, there may be widespread arteriolar and venular constriction (chill) followed by peripheral vascular dilatation, increased vascular permeability, decrease in venous return, lowered cardiac output, stagnation in the microcirculation, peripheral vasoconstriction, shock, and impaired organ perfusion and its consequences (e.g., anuria).

chinese.chinese: 4．血液灌流不足及酸中毒：血管反应、低血压及休克可导致一些重要的器官(如肾、心、肝、肺及脑)缺氧和功能不全。
chinese.english: 4. Impaired Organ Perfusion and Acidosis: As a result of vascular reactions, hypotension, and shock, vital organs (kidneys, heart, liver, lungs, and brain) become anoxic and perform inadequately.

chinese.chinese: 静脉的炎症(静脉炎)也可促进血栓形成，这时可表现为游走性血栓性静脉炎，累及全身许多静脉，其病因一般不明，但有时与，特别是胰腺的癌肿有关。
chinese.english: Inflammation of veins (phlebitis) also promotes thrombosis: this may occur as a migrating thrombophlebitis, affecting various veins throughout the body: it is usually of obscure aetiology, but is sometimes associated with cancer of the internal organs, particularly the pancreas.

chinese.chinese: 可是，在血管吻合是不充分的，一条动脉阻塞就常常伴随梗死形成。
chinese.english: In the internal organs, however, anastomosis is less adequate, and blockage of a single artery is commonly followed by infarction.

chinese.chinese: 一般来说，代谢率高的的实质细胞对缺血比较敏感，而支持组织(纤维组织、脂肪组织和骨)则较不敏感。
chinese.english: As a general rule, the parenchymal cells of the internal organs, which operate at a high metabolic rate, are relatively susceptible to ischaemia, whereas the supporting tissues--fibrous and fatty tissue and bone, are much less susceptible.

chinese.chinese: 恶性高血压时，这些血管变化分布广泛：病变明显，在脑、肠和胰腺中病变尤为显著，但通常以肾脏小血管病变最为严重。
chinese.english: These vascular changes are widespread in malignant hypertension: they are conspicuous in the internal organs, and notably in the brain, gut and pancreas, but the small vessels of the kidneys are usually most severely affected.

chinese.chinese: 实际上许多受这两个系统的神经支配。
chinese.english: In fact, many visceral organs are innervated by both systems.

chinese.chinese: 正中面：贯穿人体正中线从前向后的垂直面将人体分为左右两半，除某些不在正中线上的如心、肝等之外。
chinese.english: The Median Plane: This is the vertical plane passing lengthwise through the midline of the body from front to back, dividing it into right and left halves, except for such internal organs as the heart and liver that do not lie in the midline.

chinese.chinese: 一般来说，盆腔注入髂内、外淋巴结和骶淋巴结，这些淋巴结都注入髂总和腰淋巴结。
chinese.english: From all these nodes, lymph drains to the common iliac and lumbar lymph nodes.

chinese.chinese: 小肠管虽落入盆腔内，但并非盆腔，因为即使不切断其系膜，也易于移出盆腔。
chinese.english: Hence the intestines which descend into the pelvis are not pelvic viscera because they can be easily removed from the pelvis without cutting their mesenteries.

chinese.chinese: Ray认为，这项新的研究同之前的阿司匹林试验研究一样存在一个问题，就是所谓的检测偏倚。人们在服用阿司匹林导致胃出血后就会由医生来检查他们的。因此医生可以发现并剔除肿瘤或是癌前息肉，最终可以延长患者的寿命—这就是结肠癌者筛选背后的原因。
chinese.english: One of the problems with the new study as wellas with previous aspirin trials, he said, is something called detection bias.People who develop stomach bleeding from aspirin are likely to get their bowelschecked out by a doctor. As a result, doctors may find and remove tumors orprecancerous polyps, which could prolong the patient's life --the idea behindcolon cancer screening.

chinese.chinese: 研究主要集中在使用多能干细胞（PSC）的过程中产生的内胚层细胞，三个主要的胚层之一形成，包括肺，胰腺和肝脏。多能干细胞分化或转化为内胚层细胞的能力，是发展这些器官的再生治疗的一个重要步骤。
chinese.english: The research focused on the process of using pluripotent stem cells (PSC) togenerate endoderm cells, one of the three primary germ layers which forminternal organs including the lungs, pancreas, and liver. The ability todifferentiate, or transform, PSCs into endoderm cells is a vital step todeveloping regenerative treatments for these organs.

chinese.chinese: 形成封闭血管系统的能力，是脊椎动物发育的标志之一。没有此能力人类将与无脊椎动物类似(想软体动物)，血液仅仅是在一个开放的系统中流动以滋养。但是脊椎动物进化有了封闭的循环系统，更有利于运送血液到器官和组织。
chinese.english: The ability to form closed systems of blood vessels is one of the hallmarks ofvertebrate development. Without it, humans would be closer to invertebrates(think mollusks) in design, where blood simply washes through an open system tonourish internal organs. But vertebrates evolved closed circulation systemsdesigned to more effectively carry blood to organs and tissues.

chinese.chinese: 国际研究小组希望,关于三维细胞生长环境的新知识可以为用于治疗糖尿病的细胞疗法的发展做出重大贡献。从长远来看，这知识也可以用来发展用于例如肝脏或肺中的慢性疾病的干细胞治疗。如同胰腺一样,在三维条件下,这些器官能够利用干细胞发育而成.
chinese.english: The international research team hopes that the new knowledge about three-dimensional cell growth environments can make a significant contribution to the development of cell therapies for treating diabetes. In the long term this knowledge can also be used to develop stem cell treatments for chronic diseases in internal organs such as the liver or lungs. Like the pancreas, these organs are developed from stem cells in 3D.

chinese.chinese: 局部麻醉常能有效地应用于时间短、操作简单的手术。
chinese.english: Local anaesthesias are effectively used in operations that are short and require only a simple procedure.

chinese.chinese: 牙科医师在钻牙前往往使用局部麻醉,情况正常时，浅表的伤口在局麻下缝合。
chinese.english: Dentists frequently use a local anesthetic before drilling into a tooth, and superficial wounds are normally sutured under a local anesthetic.

chinese.chinese: 普鲁卡因、丁卡因和利多卡因(赛鲁卡因)等可作为局部麻醉药。
chinese.english: Procaine, tetracaine, and lidocaine (Xylocaine) are examples of local anesthetics.

chinese.chinese: 正常情况下病人在麻醉前仰卧。
chinese.english: Normally the patient is lying on his back until the anesthesia is administered.

chinese.chinese: 这些病人中有男同性恋者、经静脉注射麻醉毒品者、经输血得病者或病因不明的人。
chinese.english: Among the patents were male homosexuals, intravenous drug users, people who acquired their disease through blood transfusions, or patients belonging to a group, where the cause of their disease is unknown.

chinese.chinese: 用麻醉的和清醒的大鼠研究了可卡因和普鲁卡因对心血管和呼吸的影响。
chinese.english: The cardiovascular and respiratory effects of cocaine and procaine were studied in anesthetized and conscious rats.

chinese.chinese: 用戊巴比妥(65毫克／公斤，腹膜内注射)麻醉的动物中，增压期之后一般出现时间较长的降压期。
chinese.english: In pentobarbital anesthetized (65mg/kg, i.p.) animals, the pressure phase was generally followed by a more prolonged depressor phase.

chinese.chinese: 普鲁卡因(0.31和1.25毫克／公斤，静脉注射)在戊巴比妥麻醉的动物中产生与可卡因相似的心血管和呼吸效应。
chinese.english: Procaine (0.31and 1.25 mg/kg, i.v.) produced similar cardiovascular and respiratory effects in pentobarbital anesthetized animals.

chinese.chinese: 在用乌拉坦(1.25毫克／公斤，腹膜内注射)麻醉的动物中，可卡因的心血管效应与清醒动物中所见相似。
chinese.english: The cardiovascular effects of cocaine (0.25-1mg/kg, i.v.) in urethane anesthetized (1.25 g/kg, i. p.) animals were similar to those in conscious animals.

chinese.chinese: 普鲁卡因(1毫克／公斤)对乌拉坦麻醉动物不产生任何心血管效应，但确实引起呼吸急促。
chinese.english: Procaine (1 mg / kg) did not produce any cardiovascular effects in urethane anesthetized animals, but did elicit tachypnea.

chinese.chinese: 用利血平预处理(10毫克／公斤，腹膜内注射)不能减轻乌拉坦麻醉动物的增压反应。
chinese.english: Reserpine pretreatment (10rag/kg, i. p.) did not attenuate the pressure response in urethane anesthetized animals.

chinese.chinese: 用酚妥拉明预处理(3毫克／公斤，静脉注射)也不能拮抗乌拉坦麻醉动物的增压反应。
chinese.english: Phentolamine pretreatment (3 mg/kg, i.v.) did antagonize the pressure effect in urethane anesthetized animals.

chinese.chinese: (1)降压期可能是可卡因和普鲁卡因的局部麻醉作用与巴比妥酸盐麻醉作用之间的相互作用引起的；(2)可卡因对清醒动物心血管系统的影响，与在乌拉坦麻醉大鼠中所观察到的结果比与在戊巴比妥麻醉大鼠中所见的更接近；(3)乌拉坦麻醉大鼠中的增压效应，显然是由抗利血平的儿茶酚胺能机制所致。
chinese.english: The depressor phase is likely due to an interaction between local anesthetic activity (cocaine and procaine) and barbiturate anesthesia, the cardiovascular effects of cocaine in conscious animals are more similar to those observed in urethane anesthetized rats than in pentobarbital anesthetized rats and the pressor effect in urethane anesthetized rats is apparently due to a reserpine resistant catecholaminergic mechanism.

chinese.chinese: 目前正在使用的上尿道扩张药，通常为抗胆碱能药物或平滑肌的直接松弛药，例如麻醉药衍生物罂粟碱。
chinese.english: Currently used urinary tract dilators are generally anti-cholinergic drugs or direct smooth muscle relaxants such as papaverine, a narcotic derivative.

chinese.chinese: 用2％氟烷和98％氧将猪轻度麻醉。
chinese.english: The pigs were lightly anesthetized with 2% halothane and 98%, oxygen.

chinese.chinese: 麻醉学的发展是美国医学史上最引人入胜的篇章之一。
chinese.english: The development of anesthesia represents one of the most interesting aspects of US medical history.

chinese.chinese: l842年克劳佛德?朗医生第一个用乙醚麻醉的方法产生了外科手术中的麻醉效果，但当时他的工作鲜为人知。
chinese.english: In. 1842, Crawford Long was the first physician to administer diethyl ether by inhalation to produce surgical anesthesia, but his work went largely unrecognized.

chinese.chinese: l846年牙科医生威廉姆?摩尔顿为外科医生约翰?瓦伦所做的下颌肿瘤切除手术使用了乙醚麻醉。
chinese.english: In 1846, a dentist, William Morton, administered diethyl ether for the removal of a submandibular tumor by surgeon John Warren.

chinese.chinese: 遗憾的是威尔士未能掌握一氧化氮的临界效应，以致在马萨诸塞州总医院示范时未能再现外科麻醉效果。
chinese.english: Unfortunately, Wells failed to appreciate the marginal potency of nitrous oxide and was unable to reproduce surgical anesthesia during a demonstration at the Massachusetts General Hospital.

chinese.chinese: 从那以后起许多全身麻醉技术得以开展和改进。
chinese.english: Since then, many techniques for general anesthesia have been developed and improved upon.

chinese.chinese: 对一个特定的病人而言，许多因素影响麻醉的选择。
chinese.english: Many factors influence the choice of anesthesia for a given patient.

chinese.chinese: 脊髓麻醉则不适于甲状腺切除术的进行。
chinese.english: Spinal anesthesia is inappropriate for thyroidectomy.

chinese.chinese: 对选择性手术和急诊手术，特别是饱腹病人需施行的急诊手术时，应给予不同类型的麻醉。
chinese.english: Different types of anesthesia may be given for elective or emergency surgery, particularly if the patient requiring emergency surgery has a full stomach.

chinese.chinese: 有几个重要的步骤必须在实施麻醉前采取。
chinese.english: Several important steps must be taken before anesthesia is administered.

chinese.chinese: 通常，麻醉工作始于给予静脉输液和系上血压表袖带时。
chinese.english: Anesthesia usually begins by starting an intravenous infusion and applying a blood pressure cuff.

chinese.chinese: 监护仪(如心电图导联)、外用神经刺激器和胸部听诊器应在病人清醒时就安置好，麻醉开始前应记录生命体征。
chinese.english: Monitors (e.g., electrocardiographic leads), a peripheral nerve stimulator, and a chest stethoscope should be applied while the patient is awake, and vital signs should be recorded before anesthesia is begun.

chinese.chinese: 必须检查麻醉机以保持正常的性能，药品和其他所需用具必须置于手边。
chinese.english: The machine for administering anesthesia must be checked for proper functioning, and drugs and other necessary supplies must be at hand.

chinese.chinese: 全身麻醉的诱导：经静脉、吸入或两种方式联合给药都能诱导全身麻醉。
chinese.english: Induction of General Anesthesia: General anesthesia can be induced by giving drugs intravenously, by inhalation, or by a combination of both methods.

chinese.chinese: a．快速序贯诱导：诱导麻醉最常用的是快速序贯诱导的方法，应用此法时先快速给予超短时作用的巴比妥(如硫贲妥钠)，接着给去极化的肌肉松弛剂(如琥珀胆碱)。
chinese.english: a. Rapid-Sequence Induction: Anesthesia is most commonly induced by the method of rapid-sequence induction, in which rapid administration of an ultra-short-acting barbiturate (e.g., thiopental) is followed by a depolarizing muscle relaxant (e.g., succinylcholine).

chinese.chinese: 这样能在30秒钟内诱导麻醉，60—90秒钟内行气管插管。
chinese.english: This allows anesthesia to be induced within 30 seconds and the trachea to be intubated within 60-90 Seconds.

chinese.chinese: 医生现在也知道了如果患者的将象皮肤一样受到侵袭，这一过程一般会在疾病的前4到5年发生。因此早期确诊和对心脏、肺和肾脏的密切监测是性命攸关的。
chinese.english: Doctors also now know that if a patient's internal organs are going to be affected as well as the skin, that is likely to happen in the first four or five years of the disease. So early diagnosis and close monitoring of the heart, lungs and kidneys are vitally important.

chinese.chinese: 第一篇文章描述了德国蒂宾根大学的研究人员如何进行研究的。他们的研究对象是314名年龄介于18岁到69岁（平均年龄为45岁）的患者，通过利用磁共振断层扫描技术测量了身体总的脂肪含量、内脏脂肪（腹部及其周围的脂肪）和皮下脂肪（皮肤下面的脂肪）。所有的研究对象还做了一次口服葡萄糖耐量试验以检测其胰岛素抵抗水平。
chinese.english: The first paper describes how researchers at the University of Tübingen in Germany studied 314 people aged 18 to 69 (the average age was 45) by measuring their total body fat, their visceral fat (the fat around the abdomen and internal organs), and subcutaneous fat (fat under the skin) with magnetic resonance tomography. The participants also underwent an oral glucose tolerance test to measure their insulin resistance.

chinese.chinese: 这些药物最终会（通过食物链）进入人体。北京某大学微生物学院的朱宝丽及其同事的一份未发表的研究曾对中国、丹麦、西班牙人肠道菌群（的DNA）进行测序，研究显示：中国人肠道菌群具有更多的耐药基因，这包括在中国主要用于养殖业的四环素类抗生素，虽然对四环素耐药并不影响临床治疗（因为四环素的副作用临床应用很少），但是有些抗生素即用在动物又用在人类（这些就会影响临床治疗）。
chinese.english: Those drugs ?nd their way into the human gut. In an unpublished study, Zhu Baoli of the Institute of Microbiology in Beijing and colleagues sequenced gut microbes in Chinese, Danish, and Spanish people. Chinese guts had the highest number of antibiotic-resistant genes. They were also dominated by genes resistant to tetracycline, which in China is mostly used in animal feed. While that might not affect clinical treatment with drugs other than tetracycline, Zhu says, “some drugs that are used in animals are also used in humans.”

chinese.chinese: 肢端肥大是罕见的内分泌紊乱性疾病，以手，脚，的增大为临床特点，也伴有面部结构的改变。大多数的肢端肥大病历是由于脑垂体部位的肿瘤过量分泌生长激素如生长因子，而导致胰岛素水平升高而引起的。
chinese.english: Acromegaly is a rare endocrine disorder characterized by enlargement of the hands, feet and internal organs, as well as changes in facial structure. The majority of acromegaly cases are caused by a non-cancerous tumour in the pituitary gland that secretes excess growth hormone (GH), leading to elevated levels of insulin like growth factor (IGF-1).

chinese.chinese: 含钆造影剂主要被用于需进行磁共振成像（MRI）或磁共振血管造影（MRA）的患者。由于使用含钆造影剂在伴有严重肾脏问题的患者中可能引起NSF（一种罕见并且严重、有时甚至致命的疾病，特征为在皮肤、关节、肌肉和中可形成结缔组织），故欧洲药管局的人用医学产品管理委员会（CHMP）对这些药物进行了审查。
chinese.english: Gadolinium-containing contrast agents are used in patients undergoing magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) or magnetic resonance angiography (MRA) scans. The Agency's Committee for Medicinal Products for Human Use (CHMP) reviewed these agents because of the association between the use of gadolinium-containing contrast agents and NSF, a rare, serious and sometimes life-threatening condition that is characterised by formation of connective tissues in the skin, joints, muscles and internal organs, in patients with severe kidney problems.

chinese.chinese: 所有的含钆造影剂，包括Gadavist在内，需要在标签上增加肾源性系统性纤维化（NSF）风险的黑框警告。肾源性系统性纤维化是一种与肾功能不全患者使用含钆造影剂相关的罕见但是非常严重的疾病，表现为疼痛和皮肤增厚，可引起的纤维化，目前并没有有效地治疗方法。目前Gadavist是一种发生肾源性系统性纤维化风险相对较低的含钆造影剂，并且可用于急性或慢性肾损伤以及严重肾脏疾病的患者。
chinese.english: All GBCAs, including Gadavist, carry a boxed warning about the risk of nephrogenic systemic fibrosis (NSF), a rare, but serious, condition associated with the use of GBCAs in certain patients with kidney dysfunction. NSF is characterized by pain and thickening of the skin, and can cause fibrosis of internal organs. There is no known treatment for NSF. Gadavist is currently considered to be one the GBCAs with a lower risk of NSF, and is not one of the GBCAs that is contraindicated in patients with acute kidney injury or chronic, severe kidney disease.

chinese.chinese: 可以用非去极化的神经肌肉阻滞剂(如维可罗宁、卡肌宁或潘可罗宁)代替琥珀胆碱，但麻醉的出现将延迟60秒钟。
chinese.english: A nondepolarizing neuromuscular blocking drug (e.g., vecuronium, atracurium, or pancuronium) can be substituted for succinylcholine, but the onset of paralysis is delayed by about 60 seconds.

chinese.chinese: b．吸入诱导：吸入一氧化氮加上强有力的挥发性麻醉剂(如氟烷、安氟醚或异氟醚)，能在3～5分钟内诱导麻醉。
chinese.english: b. Inhalation Induction: Inhalation of nitrous oxide plus a potent volatile anesthetic (e.g., halothane, enflurane, or isoflurane) can produce anesthesia within 3-5 minutes.

chinese.chinese: 吸入诱导的优点在于可根据病人的需要滴入麻醉剂。
chinese.english: The advantage of inhalation induction is that anesthetic drugs can be titrated according to the patient's needs.

chinese.chinese: c．静脉—吸入联合诱导：在吸入挥发性麻醉剂之前常经静脉给予短时麻醉剂如硫贲妥钠和安定。
chinese.english: c. Combined Intravenous-Inhalation Induction: Short-acting anesthetic drugs such as thiopental or diazepam are often administered intravenously before inhalation of a volatile anesthetic.

chinese.chinese: 这样做能最大限度地减少带麻醉面罩的不适感，并利于麻醉剂的吸入——许多人认为麻醉剂气味难闻。
chinese.english: This is done to minimize the discomfort of wearing the anesthetic mask and to facilitate inhalation of the anesthetic agent, which many people consider to have an offensive.

chinese.chinese: 麻醉诱导迅速并且可根据病人的需要滴入麻醉剂。
chinese.english: Anesthesia is induced rapidly, and anesthetic drug dosages can be titrated according to the patient's requirements.

chinese.chinese: 全身麻醉的维持：全身麻醉的主要目的在于无痛、意识消失、和骨骼肌松弛以及控制交感神经对不良刺激的反应。
chinese.english: Maintaining General Anesthesia: The main objectives of general anesthesia are analgesia, unconsciousness, skeletal muscle relaxation, and control of sympathetic nervous system responses to noxious stimulation.

chinese.chinese: 应该注意根据特殊的药理学目的来选择吸入或静脉麻醉剂、麻醉性镇痛药和肌肉松弛剂。
chinese.english: Inhaled and intravenous anesthetics, narcotics, and muscle relaxants   should be selected with specific pharmacologic goals in mind.

chinese.chinese: 评估麻醉深度的列于表12-5中。
chinese.english: Signs for assessing the depth of anesthesia are listed in Table 12-5.

chinese.chinese: 尽管肌肉松弛剂所导致的麻痹使手术野易于暴露并减少挥发性麻醉剂的需要量，但麻痹病人缺乏许多麻醉征象。
chinese.english: Although paralysis by muscle relaxants simplifies exposure of the operative site and decreases the need for volatile anesthetics, many signs of anesthesia are absent in the paralyzed patient.

chinese.chinese: 麻醉师必须持续不断地评估麻醉深度。
chinese.english: It is essential that the anesthesiologist continuously assess the depth of anesthesia.

chinese.chinese: 如果做不到这一点就会导致在麻醉过程中病人清醒而肌肉麻痹的后果。
chinese.english: Failure to do so may result in the patient being awake but paralyzed during the procedure.

chinese.chinese: 病人对区域麻醉常有误解，需要详细解释这一方法的安全性。
chinese.english: Patients often have misconceptions about regional anesthesia that require detailed explanation of the safety of this technique.

chinese.chinese: 区域麻醉的缺点之一是偶尔不能获得满意的麻醉，另外一个缺点是交感阻滞引起的低血压。
chinese.english: One disadvantage of regional, anesthesia is the occasional failure to produce adequate anesthesia; another is hypotension due to sympathetic blockade.

chinese.chinese: 区域麻醉最常用于下腹部和下肢的手术，因为这些部位交感阻滞的影响极小。
chinese.english: Regional anesthesia is used most often for surgery of the lower abdomen or lower extremities, since the effect of sympathetic blockade of these areas is minimal.

chinese.chinese: 镇静剂如巴比妥类，缓泻剂如酚酞，抗炎制剂如类固醇或非类固醇以及抗菌药物如磺胺类药物和青霉素都可引起令人痛苦的皮肤改变。
chinese.english: Sedatives such as the barbiturates; laxatives such as phenolphthalein; anti-inflammatory agents, steroidal or nonsteroidal; and antibacterial agents such as the sulfas and penicillin may all produce distressing cutaneous changes.

chinese.chinese: 药物如亚甲蓝可使尿液呈蓝绿色，安替比林吡啶和某些静脉注射的维生素制剂可引起尿液呈橘色，酚酞类药物可使尿液呈红色或蓝绿色(取决于尿液的pH值)。
chinese.english: Drugs like methylene blue impart a blue green color; phenazopyridine and certain intravenous vitamin preparations may cause an orange color; phenolphthalein imparts a red or bluish green color depending on the urine pH.

chinese.chinese: 方法：细胞分离培养于椎板和髂嵴的松质骨，镜下计数细胞数目和台盼蓝染色检测细胞活力。用磷酸麝香草酚酞中释放麝香草酚酞方法检测碱性磷酸酶ALP活性用硫酸茜红素染色法检测基质矿化。ALP、骨钙蛋白、runt相关转录因子2，Msh同源盒2，BMP7，Icam1前体（细胞内黏附分子1），骨保护素，RANKL（NF-kB配体的受体激活物）等基因的表达用实时PCR检测。所有比较间供者匹配。
chinese.english: Methods. Cells obtained from cancellous bone of both vertebral lamina and iliac crest were cultured and proliferation was evaluated by direct cell counting and viability detected by Trypan blue. Alkaline phosphatase (ALP) activity was evaluated by thymolphthalein release from thymolphthalein monophosphate and matrix mineralization by staining with alizarin red S. Gene expression of ALP, osteocalcin, runt-related transcription factor 2, Msh homeobox 2, bone morphogenetic protein 7, intercellular adhesion molecule 1 precursor, osteoprotegerin, and receptor activator of NF-kB ligand was analyzed by real-time PCR. All comparisons were donor-matched.

chinese.chinese: 脊髓和硬膜外阻滞：将局麻药注射到腰部鞘内间隙可获得脊髓麻醉。
chinese.english: Spinal & Epidural Blocks: Spinal anesthesia is achieved by injecting a local anesthetic into the lumbar intrathecal space.

chinese.chinese: 将局麻药注入硬膜外腔则产生硬膜外麻醉。
chinese.english: Epidural anesthesia is accomplished by injecting a local anesthetic into the extradural (epidural) space.

chinese.chinese: 脊髓和硬膜外麻醉时胃肠道呈收缩状态有利于手术野的暴重。
chinese.english: The gastrointestinal tract is usually contracted with spinal and epidural anesthesia, facilitating exposure of the surgical site.

chinese.chinese: 脊髓麻醉有几种并发症。
chinese.english: There are several complications of spinal anesthesia.

chinese.chinese: 因脊髓麻醉阻滞了膀胱的神经支配，大量静脉输液会会引起膀胱膨胀，因此可能需要插导尿管。
chinese.english: Because spinal anesthesia blocks innervation of the bladder, administration of large amounts of intravenous fluids may cause bladder distention, and a urethral catheter may be carried.

chinese.chinese: 在脊髓麻醉开始特别是有低血压时，会发生恶心呕吐。
chinese.english: Nausea and vomiting may occur when a spinal anesthetic is begun, especially if hypotension is present.

chinese.chinese: 除头痛外，硬膜外麻醉的并发症与脊髓麻醉相同。
chinese.english: Complications from epidural anesthesia are the same as those for spinal anesthesia, with the exception of headache.

chinese.chinese: 总的说来，由于神经阻滞引起病人不适及所需时间长，因而在麻醉中起的作用很小。
chinese.english: Overall, nerve blocks play a minor role in anesthesia because of the discomfort they cause the patient and the time they require.

chinese.chinese: 恢复室用来监测和护理麻醉及手术刚结束的病人。
chinese.english: The recovery room is designed for the monitoring and care of patients during the period immediately following anesthesia and surgery.

chinese.chinese: 随着麻醉剂的终止和气管拔管，病人在手术室里就已开始从麻醉中恢复。
chinese.english: Recovery from anesthesia begins in the operating room with the discontinuation of anesthetic drugs and extubation of the trachea.

chinese.chinese: 挥发性麻醉剂由肺排出，静脉麻醉剂被代谢或经肾脏排泄。
chinese.english: Volatile anesthetics are eliminated by the lungs and intravenous anesthetics by metabolism or renal excretion.

chinese.chinese: 吗啡仍为镇痛效果最好的麻醉性镇痛药。
chinese.english: Morphine is still the best narcotic for pain relief.

chinese.chinese: 在恢复室先静脉然后肌肉给予麻醉性镇痛药。
chinese.english: In the recovery room, narcotics are first given intravenously and later intramuscularly.

chinese.chinese: 区域性麻醉亦可用于术后镇痛。
chinese.english: Regional anesthesia can also be used for postoperative pain relief.

chinese.chinese: 硬膜外腔给予麻醉性镇痛药是镇痛的一个重要进展。
chinese.english: Epidural administration of narcotics is an important advance in pain relief.

chinese.chinese: 亦可见于麻风、结核病、肉样瘤病、组织胞浆菌病、球孢子菌病、芽生菌病、溃疡性结肠炎和用药后。
chinese.english: It may also be seen in leprosy, tuberculosis, sarcoidosis, histoplasmosis, coccidioidomycosis, blastomycosis, ulcerative colitis, and after drug use.

chinese.chinese: 系统性受累：急性膜性肾小球肾炎、胃病、直肠炎、肝炎、急性脑膜炎、感觉神经性听觉丧失、虹膜炎、前葡萄膜炎、球后视神经炎、面神经麻痹、肺底多发性结节性浸润、骨膜炎、骨髓炎、多发性关节炎或腱鞘炎均可见于二期梅毒。
chinese.english: Systemic Involvement: Acute membranous glomerulonephritis, gastropathy, proctitis, hepatitis, acute meningitis, sensorineural hearing loss, iritis, anterior uveitis, optic neuritis, Bell's palsy, multiple nodular infiltrates of the lung bases, periostitis, osteomyelitis, polyarthritis, or tenosynovitis may all be seen in secondary syphilis.

chinese.chinese: 一名75岁患者因非结石性胆囊炎行紧急胆囊切除，术后23天死亡，该病人先前确诊患结肠癌及因放射性肠炎行多次切除术而引起的短肠综合征。
chinese.english: A 75 years old patient with previously documented carcinoma of the colon and short bowel syndrome secondary to multiple resections for radiation enteritis died 23 days after emergent cholecystectomy for acalculous cholecystitis.

chinese.chinese: 轮状病毒感染一般认为是幼儿的一个重要问题；然而它们也与成人和新生儿中的严重胃肠炎有关。
chinese.english: Rotavirus infections are generally recognized as a major problem in young children; however, they have also been associated with severe gastroenteritis in adults and neonates.

chinese.chinese: 轮状病毒感染一般认为是幼儿的一个重要问题；但它们也与成人和新生儿中的严重胃肠炎有关。
chinese.english: Rotavirus infections are generally recognized as a major problem in young children; however, they have also been associated with severe gastroenteritis in adults and neonates.

chinese.chinese: 收集粪便时所有病人均患胃肠炎。
chinese.english: All patients had gastroenteritis at the time stools were collected.

chinese.chinese: 在一次胃肠炎暴发期中收集的39份成人粪样是从P.Echeverria(泰国曼谷)获得。
chinese.english: Thirty-nine samples from adults involved in an outbreak of gastroenteritis were obtained from P. Echeverria (Bangkok, Thailand).

chinese.chinese: 下列不良反应出现较少或罕见：无尿(少尿)，心血管中毒包括心律不齐、室性纤颤、心搏停止、高血压和低血压，凝血缺损，血小板减少，白细胞减少，粒细胞缺乏症，嗜酸性细胞增多，白细胞增多，黑粪症或出血性胃肠炎，斑丘疹，听力损失，耳鸣，暂时性眩晕，视力模糊或复视，外心神经病，惊厥和其他神经病症状，瘙痒(无疹)，过敏性样反应，急性肝功衰竭以及氮血症。
chinese.english: The following adverse reactions occur less frequently or rarely, anuria (oliguria); cardiovascular toxicity including arrhythmias, ventricular fibrillation, cardiac arrest, hypertension, and hypotension; coagulation defects; thrombocytopenia; leukopenia; agranulocytosis; eosinophilia; leukocytosis; melena or hemorrhagic gastroenteritis; maculopapular rash; hearing loss; tinnitus; transient vertigo; blurred vision or diplopia; peripheral neuropathy; convulsions and other neurologic symptoms; pruritus (without rash); anaphylactoid reactions; acute liver failure; and azotemia.

chinese.chinese: “炎性肠道疾病”指的是自发性、慢性肠道疾病(IBD)：克朗氏病及溃疡性结肠炎，它们主要发生于青壮年。
chinese.english: The term “inflammatory bowel disease” applies to the idiopathic chronic inflammatory bowel disease (IBD): Crohn's disease and ulcerative colitis, both of which occur mainly in adolescents and young adults.

chinese.english: Ulcerative colitis encompasses a spectrum of diffuse, continuous, superficial inflammation of the colon that begins within the rectum and extends to a variable level.

chinese.english: The postanesthetic observation phase of management comprises the few hours immediately after operation during which the acute reaction to operation and the residual effects of anesthesia are subsiding.

chinese.english: Selection of the ideal agent depends on recognition of liver or renal impairment.

chinese.chinese: d．就寝时间和麻醉前用药：麻醉医生，如果负责麻醉，通常要检查病人和书写术前用药医嘱。
chinese.english: d. Bedtime and Preanesthetic Medication: The physician anesthesiologist, if responsible for anesthesia, will usually examine the patient and write the premedication order.

chinese.chinese: 如果病人有胃肠道梗阻而且可能有胃内残留物，要术前放置鼻胃管和进行胃内吸引，或者是放置鼻胃管持续吸引，以减小麻醉诱导期间反胃和吸入的可能性。
chinese.english: If the patient has gastrointestinal obstruction with possible gastric residual, a nasogastric tube is passed preoperatively and the stomach aspirated or placed on continuous suction to reduce the possibility of regurgitation and aspiration during induction of anesthesia.

chinese.chinese: 当手术前没有插鼻胃管的指征而病人又要接受全身麻醉时，麻醉师可在病人丧失意识后插入胃管。

chinese.chinese: 可以在病人离开病房去手术室前在护理病房内插管，或者是麻醉后插管。
chinese.english: Catheterization can be done on the nursing unit just before the patient leaves for the operating room or after anesthetization.

chinese.chinese: 这样是为了避免在麻醉期间由于正压通气使没有发现的气胸转变为张力性气胸。

chinese.english: Central venous and arterial catheterization can usually be deferred until the patient is anesthetized.

chinese.chinese: 阻塞可由慢性阻塞性肺部疾病、插管或由麻醉剂引起的分泌物引起。

chinese.chinese: 经鼻胃插管和气管内置管以及药物对中枢神经系统的抑制，干扰了上述防御机能，这就使麻醉诱导期和麻醉意外时以及手术后早期易于发生肺吸入。
chinese.english: Insertion of nasogastric and endotracheal tubes and depression of the central nervous system by drugs interferes with these defenses and predisposes to aspiration during induction and emergence from anesthesia and in the immediate postoperative period.

chinese.chinese: 预防吸入包括下列措施：对刚进食的患者，避免使用全身麻醉J置管前取正确体位；需延长气管内置管时间时，在气管内导管上装用高容量，低压环。
chinese.english: Measures to prevent aspiration include the following:  avoiding general anesthesia in patients who have recently eaten, positioning the patient correctly before intubation, and using high-volume, low-pressure cuffs on the endotracheal tube when intubation must be prolonged.

chinese.chinese: 在有高度吸入危险时，于麻醉诱导前给予单剂量甲氰咪呱可能有价值。

chinese.chinese: 之所以无症状，是被认为与麻醉的残留作用及术后给予镇痛剂有关。

chinese.chinese: 也见于缺血性结肠炎，但是肠系膜上动脉栓塞所致的肠梗阻无此表现。

chinese.chinese: 这不同于与胃肠炎、痢疾和暴发性溃疡性结肠炎绞痛毫无关系的高调蠕动过强肠鸣音。

chinese.english: If there is diffuse tenderness unaccompanied by guarding, one should suspect gastroenteritis or some other inflammatory intestinal process without peritonitis.

chinese.english: Pelvic appendicitis may simulate acute gastroenteritis.

chinese.chinese: 下列疾病患者适宜作诊断性结肠镜检：（1）钡灌肠检查发现有不正常或可疑的病变；（2）不能解释的直肠出血；（3）乙状结肠镜检发现异常(如息肉)；（4）肠炎性病变；（5）以前施行过结肠手术。
chinese.english: Diagnostic colonoscopy is indicated in some patients with the following: （1） abnormal or equivocal barium enema; （2）unexplained rectal bleeding; （3） abnormal sigmoidoscopy (e.g., polyps); （4）inflammatory bowel disease; or （5） previous colonic surgery.

chinese.chinese: 结肠镜检查的相对禁忌证有：（1）暴发性结肠炎；（2）可疑结肠穿孔；（3）短期内曾行结肠吻合术J（4）病人不合作；（5）同时有内科情况。
chinese.english: Relative contraindications to colonoscopy are （1）fulminant colitis; （2） suspected colonic perforation; （3） recent colonic anastomosis; （4） uncooperative patient; and （5）associated medical conditions.

chinese.chinese: 侵袭性病变早期能自愈，或者发展为全结肠性溃疡形成和扩张，有时穿孔并导致腹膜炎；后者死亡率高，而且多半发生于误诊为溃疡性结肠炎并用糖皮质激素治疗的患者。

chinese.english: It is generally accepted that most but not all drugs (e.g., anesthetics, antiseptics) exert their potent and specific effects by forming a bond, generally reversible, with a cellular component called a receptor site.

chinese.chinese: 普鲁卡因为一种局部麻醉药，它也是由假胆碱酪酶水解的。
chinese.english: Procaine, a local anesthetic, is also hydrolyzed by pseudocholinesterase.

chinese.chinese: 药物排入乳汁对哺乳期婴幼儿是值得注意的；药物，特别是气体麻醉剂，经肺的排泄在某些特定的情况下是重要的。
chinese.english: The excretion of drugs into milk may become significant to a breast-fed child, and the excretion of drugs, especially gaseous anesthetics, from the lungs becomes important in specialized circumstances.

chinese.chinese: 例如，吗啡通过抑制大脑皮质、丘脑下部和延脑中枢，从而缓解疼痛(镇痛)，引起麻醉状态(强镇静)、抑制咳嗽中枢、先兴奋后抑制呕吐中枢，以及抑制呼吸。
chinese.english: Morphine, by depressing cerebral cortex, hypothalamus, and medullary center, is responsible for decreasing pain perception (analgesia), inducing narcosis (heavy sedation), depressing the cough center, stimulating initially and then depressing the vomiting center, and depressing respiration.

chinese.chinese: 例如，全身麻醉药硫喷妥、氟烷、环丙烷和氧化亚氮的化学结构大不相同。
chinese.english: For example, general anesthetics such as thiopental, halothane, cyclopropane, and nitrous oxide have vastly dissimilar structures.

chinese.chinese: 例如，丙烯吗啡(麻醉性拮抗剂)与吗啡(麻醉性激动剂)不同，系由于丙烯基(---CH2CH=CH2)取代了吗啡氮原子上的甲基(-CH3)。
chinese.english: For example, nalorphine, a narcotic antagonist, varies from morphine, a narcotic agonist, by replacement of the CH3 group on the morphine's nitrogen by the allyl radical --- CH2CH=CH2.

chinese.chinese: 例如左旋吗喃是一个合成的麻醉镇痛药，其作用为吗啡的5～10倍，它的(+)对映体右旋吗喃则无镇痛作用。
chinese.english: For example, levorphanol, a synthetic narcotic, is 5 to 10 times more potent than morphine, and its L (+) enantiomorph dextrorphan is devoid of analgesic activity.

chinese.chinese: 约在30年以前这是非常重要的，当时致死型流行性胃肠炎是伴有婴幼儿中耳乳突炎的。

chinese.chinese: 分析流行病学资料的时间分布有潜伏期短至数分钟的疾病，如化学物质引起的胃肠炎；有潜伏期长至数年的疾病，如麻风病。
chinese.english: The time scale for analyzing epidemiologic data varies from minutes for diseases with short incubation periods, such as chemical gastroenteritis, to years for diseases with extremely long incubation periods, such as leprosy.

chinese.chinese: CMV与艾滋病病人的症状性视网膜炎、肾上腺炎、结肠炎、脑炎等伴随关系甚为明显。
chinese.english: Cytomegalovirus is significantly associated with symptomatic retinitis, adrenalitis, colitis, and encephalitis in AIDS.

chinese.chinese: 肠热症为伤寒同义词，有时由肠炎沙门菌生物血清型副伤寒甲或副伤寒乙引起。
chinese.english: Enteric fever is synonymous with typhoid fever, which is occasionally caused also by S. enteritidis bioserotype paratyphi A or B.

chinese.chinese: O抗原的多糖侧链涉及细菌的血清学特性，其毒力很重要，因为除伤寒沙门菌及肠炎沙门菌的副伤寒甲或副伤寒乙外，其他沙门菌属不引起人类的肠热症。
chinese.english: The polysaccharide side chain of the O antigen confers serologic specificity to the organism and is essential in virulence because salmonellae other than S. typhi and S. enteritidis bioserotype paratyphi A or B do not produce enteric fever in humans.

chinese.chinese: 由于各种污染物通过胃肠道进入体内，绝大多数食物中毒都伴有某种形式的胃肠炎，伴有突出的上或下消化道症状。
chinese.english: As the gastrointestinal tract is the mode of entry for these various contaminants, most illnesses associated with food poisoning involve some form of gastroenteritis, with either upper or lower gastrointestinal manifestations predominating.

chinese.english: The most important "infectious" types of food poisoning, requiring ingestion of living organisms, are Salmonella gastroenteritis and Shigella dysentery.

chinese.chinese: 细菌性痢疾为志贺菌属引起的急性细菌感染导致结肠炎，主要侵犯直肠及乙状结肠。
chinese.english: Shigellosis is an acute bacterial infection caused by the genus Shigella resulting in colitis affecting predominantly the rectosigmoid colon.

chinese.chinese: 在严重病例中，全部结肠发生炎症并扩展到末端回肠，可形成伪膜性结肠炎。

chinese.english: Although the colonic inflammation is superficial, bacteremia occurs occasionally, especially in S. dysenteria 1 infections.

chinese.chinese: 儿童患志贺痢疾杆菌l引起的严重结肠炎易发展为溶血性尿毒综合征。
chinese.english: Children with severe colitis due to S. dysenteriae 1 are prone to develop the hemolytic uremic syndrome.

chinese.chinese: 较重的及迁延性细菌性痢疾与溃疡性结肠炎难鉴别，确切的细菌学诊断非常重要，因为这两个病在临床表现及乙状结肠镜检查时都容易混淆。
chinese.english: Definitive bacteriologic diagnosis becomes of critical importance in distinguishing the more severe and prolonged cases of shigellosis from ulcerative colitis, with which it may be confused both clinically and on sigmoidoscopic examination.

chinese.chinese: 曾有菌痢病人误诊为溃疡性结肠炎而行结肠切术。
chinese.english: Patients with shigellosis have been subjected to colectomy because of a mistaken diagnosis of ulcerative colitis.

chinese.chinese: 由于免疫交叉反应STA试验的假阳性可与布氏杆菌皮试、霍乱疫苗注射，或由于霍乱、兔热病或耶尔菌肠炎感染有关。
chinese.english: False-positive STA titers due to immunologic cross reactivity have been associated with Brucella skin testing, cholera vaccination, or infections due to V. cholerae, F. tularensis, or Y. enterocolitica.

chinese.english: Severe blood loss may result from haemorrhoids, diverticulosis, colonic tumours, ulcerative colitis, Crohn's disease, ischaemic colitis and bacillary dysentery.

chinese.chinese: 影响植物神经系统的药物可用于治疗开角性青光眼，诊断重症肌无力，作为胃肠道和尿道平滑肌兴奋剂治疗手术后的腹胀气和尿潴留，作为骨胳肌弛松药，如箭毒中毒的解毒剂;作为三环抗忧郁药中毒的解毒药；作为麻醉前用药，扩瞳药，以及睫状肌麻痹药；溃疡病胃酸过多时，本类药用于迷走兴奋引起的胃酸分泌，延缓胃排空；也用于治疗前庭神经紊乱，巴金森症；与局部麻醉药合用，治疗低血压症、休克；改善房室传导，提高心室自律性治疗心脏传导阻滞，用于支气管哮喘，可作为减轻鼻充血的药物；治疗发作性睡眠病，脑功能微小障碍；诊治嗜铬细胞瘤；治疗心律失常、心绞痛、高血压、甲状腺毒症和震颤。
chinese.english: Drugs influencing the autonomic nervous system are used in wide-angle glaucoma, in diagnosis of myasthenia gravis, as gastrointestinal and urinary tract stimulants in postoperative abdominal distention and urinary retention, as antidotes to poisoning from skeletal muscle relaxant such as curare, as antidotes to poisoning by tricyclic antidepressants, as preanesthetic medications, as mydriatics, as cycloplegics, in peptic acid oversecretion to diminish vagally mediated secretion of gastric juices, in slowing of gastric emptying, in vestibular disorders, in parkinsonism, in combination with local anesthetics, in hypotension and shock, in heart block to improve atrioventricular conduction and to stimulate ventricular automaticity, in bronchial asthma, as nasal decongestants, in narcolepsy, in minimal brain dysfunction, in diagnosis and treatment of pheochromocytoma, in cardiac arrhythmias, in angina pectoris, in hypertension, in thyrotoxicosis, and in tremor.

chinese.chinese: 由于阿托品对循环系统的作用不明显，故通常作为麻醉前用药，以减少支气管分泌和预防腹部外科手术中的明显心动过缓。
chinese.english: Since it has no significant effects on circulation, atropine is often used as a preanesthetic medication to depress bronchial secretion and to prevent pronounced bradycardia during abdominal surgical procedures.

chinese.chinese: 肾上腺素和其相关药物的治疗用途有：作为支气管扩张剂(哮喘时兴奋β2受体)；扩瞳剂(收缩辐射状肌肉)；治疗青光眼(降低眼内压)；治疗变态反应(防止抗原引起的组胺释放)；治疗低血压(升高平均压)；用作减轻鼻充血的药物(恢压敏)；用于局部麻醉(使手术野无血，延缓麻醉药的吸收，延长麻醉作用时间，保护大随和心脏不受局麻药毒性作用的影响)；用作心脏兴奋剂(心脏传导阻滞时，心内注射肾上腺素和异丙肾上腺素可改善房室传导速率和兴奋心室自律性)。
chinese.english: The therapeutic uses of epinephrine (or related drugs) are: as bronchodilator (beta2 receptor activation in asthma); as mydriatic (contracts radial muscle); in glaucoma (lowers intraocular pressure); for allergic reactions (prevents antigen-induced histamine releases); in hypotension (increasing mean pressure); as nasal decongestant (mephentermine); for local anesthesia (to produce a bloodless field of operation, to delay absorption and give longer duration of anesthetic action, and to protect brain and heart against toxic effects of local anesthetics); as cardiac stimulant (epinephrine or isoproterenol may be injected in heart block to improve atrioventricular conduction velocity and to stimulate ventricular automaticity).

chinese.chinese: 用于预防脊髓麻醉时出现的低血压，也可作为鼻部的减充血剂。
chinese.english: It is used to prevent hypotension during spinal anesthesia and as a nasal decongestant.

chinese.chinese: 此外它们也不能与增加心脏对儿茶酚胺的敏感性的麻醉剂合用。
chinese.english: In addition, they should not be used with anesthetics that sensitize the heart to catecholamine.

chinese.chinese: 麻醉性生物碱分为天然、半合成和合成衍生物。
chinese.english: Narcotic alkaloids are divided into naturally occurring, semisynthetic, and synthetic derivatives.

chinese.chinese: 麻醉性镇痛药的拮抗剂有烯丙吗啡和纳络酮。
chinese.english: The narcotic antagonists are nalorphine (Nalline) and naloxone (Narcan).

chinese.chinese: 麻醉性镇痛药有高效能镇痛药(吗啡、二氢吗啡酮、羟氢吗啡酮、美沙酮、哌替啶、芬太尼和羟甲左吗喃)和低效能镇痛药(可待因、羟氢可待酮、氢可待酮、扑嗽酚和地芬诺酯)。
chinese.english: Narcotic analgesics may have high potency (morphine, hydromorphone, oxymorphone, methadone, meperidine, fentanyl, and levorphanol) or low potency (codeine, oxycodone, hydrocodone, propoxyphene, and diphenoxylate).

chinese.chinese: 在讨论麻醉性镇痛药的药理作用时，吗啡将作为一个典型药详细讨论，而其他药则将与之相比较。
chinese.english: In discussion of the pharmacology of narcotic analgesics, morphine will be considered in detail as a prototype drug, and all other compounds will be compared to it.

chinese.chinese: 从而可以减少对疼痛的感觉，诱导麻醉，抑制咳嗽中枢，抑制呕吐中枢以及抑制呼吸中枢。
chinese.english: These effects are responsible for decrease in pain perception, induction of narcosis, depression of the cough center, depression of the vomiting center, and depression of respiration.

chinese.chinese: 不能手术的晚期肿瘤患者，通常需用吗啡或其他麻醉性镇痛药，且需要不断增加剂量，它们无疑可引起耐受和成瘾。
chinese.english: Inoperable and terminal cases of neoplastic diseases usually require morphine or other narcotics in ever increasing doses which will undoubtedly cause both tolerance and addiction.

chinese.chinese: 哮喘、肺气肿、肺心病、胸外伤、气胸或脊髓灰质炎以及有可能存在缺氧的情况下均应慎用吗啡及其他麻醉性止痛药。
chinese.english: Morphine and other narcotic analgesics should be used with extreme caution in asthma, emphysema, cor pulmonale, and where hypoxia may be present, as in chest wound, pneumothorax, or bulbar poliomyelitis.

chinese.chinese: 加入阿托品是为了防止麻醉药成瘾者滥用苯乙哌啶，这些成瘾者对大剂量的麻醉药产生了耐受性，但对阿托品的中枢兴奋作用却无耐受性。
chinese.english: Atropine is added to discourage the abuse of diphenoxylate by a narcotic addict who is tolerant to massive doses of narcotic but not to the CNS stimulant effects of atropine.

chinese.chinese: 吗啡的耐受性：人体对吗啡的麻醉作用和镇痛作用可产生耐受性，以致必须不断增加剂量才能止痛。
chinese.english: Morphine-Induced Tolerance: Tolerance is developed to the narcotic and analgesic actions of morphine so that increasingly larger doses are needed to render the patients pain free.

chinese.chinese: 机体对吗啡的许多作用都可产生耐受性，例如镇痛、欣快感、麻醉作用、呼吸抑制、低血压和抗利尿作用。
chinese.english: Tolerance is acquired to many effects of morphine such as analgesia, euphoria, narcosis, respiratory depression, hypotension, and antidiuresis.

chinese.chinese: 痔、肛裂、溃疡性结肠炎、克隆病(节段性回肠炎)、缺血性结肠炎、结肠和直肠癌症和憩搴病 均可引起急性失血，慢性和隐性出血常有嗜睡和缺铁性贫血。
chinese.english: Acute loss occurs from haemorrhoids, fissures, ulcerative colitis and Crohn's disease, ischaemic colitis, colonic and caecal carcinoma and diverticular disease.

chinese.chinese: 50％的病人可波及其他系统，如发热，关节痛、皮疹、溃疡性结肠炎、淋巴结肿大、溶血性贫血和血小板减少。
chinese.english: In 50% of patients, other systems are involved, e.g. fever, arthralgia, skin rashes, ulcerative colitis, lymphadenopathy, haemolytic anaemia and thrombocytopenia.

chinese.chinese: 这些病人病变多限于直肠和降结肠，故一般称为直肠结肠炎。
chinese.english: In these cases the disease is usually restricted to the rectum and descending colon, and then usually termed proctocolitis.

chinese.chinese: 急性病例可类似弯曲菌性小肠炎或细菌性痢疾，慢性病例可类似阿米巴结肠炎(这些可通过大便检查排除)；
chinese.english: The acute case may resemble campylobacter enteritis or bacillary dysentery and the chronic case amoebic colitis (these should be excluded by stool examination).

chinese.chinese: 克隆病的结肠型发病有增加趋势，可类似溃疡性结肠炎；
chinese.english: Crohn's disease of the colon appears to be increasingly recognised and may resemble ulcerative colitis.

chinese.chinese: 假膜性(抗生素所致)结肠炎。
chinese.english: Pseudomembraneous (antibiotic-induced) colitis.

chinese.chinese: 极少见的急性缺血性结肠炎也可能发生，其影响部位为直肠乙状结肠连合处(而不是直肠)。
chinese.english: Very rarely acute ischaemic colitis may occur and affect the rectosigmoid junction (but not the rectum).

chinese.chinese: 在溃疡性结肠炎时其直肠粘膜实际上总是不正常的，即为一远端的病变伴有不同程度的扩展，近端可及大肠。
chinese.english: The rectal mucosa is virtually always abnormal in ulcerative colitis, i.e. it is a distal disease with a variable extension proximately up the large bowel.

chinese.chinese: 如果整个结肠均有病变(全结肠炎)；如果病程绵延(10年者为10％)；如果初发很严重；如果首发于年轻时都特别容易继发结肠癌。
chinese.english: Carcinoma of the colon is more frequent if the entire colon is involved (total colitis), if the history is prolonged (10% in 10 years), if the first attack was severe, and if the first attack occurred at a young age.

chinese.chinese: 骶骼关节炎和强直性脊柱炎也常见于溃疡性结肠炎的患者。
chinese.english: Sacroiliitis and ankylosing spondylitis are commoner in patients with ulcerative colitis.

chinese.chinese: 继发性淀粉样变并不常见，但可并发于迁延性慢性结肠炎。
chinese.english: Secondary amyloidosis is uncommon but may follow prolonged chronic colitis.

chinese.chinese: 尽管使用止泻药如磷酸可待因或苯乙胍啶加上阿托品有可能导致便秘加剧结肠炎或出现中毒性巨结肠的危险，但很多病人仍然使用。
chinese.english: Many patients still use antidiarrheeal preparations such as codeine phosphate or diphenxylate phosphate with atropine despite the possible risk that the induced constipation may exacerbate colitis or produce toxic megacolon.

chinese.chinese: 有些人认为ACTH对急性中毒性结肠炎更为有效。
chinese.english: Some believe ACTH to be more effective in acute toxic colitis.

chinese.chinese: 在有严重的继发性并发症如肛周脓毒症、瘘管时须外科治疗，病程长的(10年)全结肠炎或为了改善慢性不良的健康状况，或直肠病变有发展为癌肿的危险时亦应考虑手术治疗。
chinese.english: Surgery is usually performed in the presence of severe secondary complications if perianal sepsis or fistulae are present, and in long-term (10 years) total colitis either for treatment of chronic ill health or in view of the risk of carcinoma.

chinese.chinese: 预后最好的是病变仅限于直肠者(溃疡性直肠炎)，只有10％的病例发生并发症。
chinese.english: The prognosis is best in those with disease confined to the rectum (ulcerative proctitis): only about 10% of these develop complications.

chinese.chinese: 它还常作为麻醉前用药和产科镇痛药。
chinese.english: It is also used as preanesthetic medication and as obstetric analgesic.

chinese.chinese: 麻醉药拮抗剂纳络酮不能反转哌替啶的阿托品样作用。
chinese.english: The atropine-like effects of meperidine are not reversed by naloxone, a narcotic antagonist.

chinese.chinese: 此外，用于麻醉药成瘾的解毒和治疗。
chinese.english: In addition, methadone is used in the detoxification from and treatment of narcotic addiction.

chinese.chinese: 镇痛新：镇痛新具有混合的麻醉激动剂和弱的拮抗剂作用，30mg可产生镇痛作用，其效果相当于10mg的吗啡。
chinese.english: Pentazocine (Talwin): The analgesia produced by pentazocine (30mg), a mixed narcotic agonist and a weak antagonist, is comparable to that developed by morphine (10mg).

chinese.chinese: 而镇痛新产生的镇痛和呼吸抑制作用又可被麻醉药拮抗剂拮抗。
chinese.english: However, the analgesic action and respiratory depression produced by pentazocine can be reversed by a narcotic antagonist.

chinese.chinese: 纳络酮：纳络酮可翻转吗啡、哌替啶、美沙酮麻醉药的呼吸抑制作用。
chinese.english: Naloxone: Naloxone (Narcan) reverses the respiratory-depressant action of the narcotics related to morphine, meperidine, and methadone.

chinese.chinese: 纳络酮与其他麻醉药拮抗剂有几个方面不同。
chinese.english: It differs from the other narcotic antagonist in several respects.

chinese.chinese: 5．非麻醉性镇痛药和痛风及关节炎的治疗药
chinese.english: 5. Nonnarcotic Analgesics and Therapeutics for Gout and Arthritis

chinese.chinese: 阿司匹林的镇痛作用：阿司匹林与麻醉性的镇痛药如吗啡不同，它不抑制呼吸，毒性低，且无成瘾性。
chinese.english: Aspirin-Induced Analgesia: Unlike narcotic analgesics such as morphine, aspirin does not depress respiration, is a relatively nontoxic drug, and is without addiction liability.

chinese.chinese: 麻醉是指感觉或知觉的丧失。
chinese.english: Anesthesia is loss of feeling or sensation.

chinese.chinese: 如果短时内饮用大量酒精，可出现昏迷和全身麻醉现象。
chinese.english: If a large amount of alcohol is consumed in a short period of time, unconsciousness and general anesthesia take place.

chinese.chinese: 此类药物一般用于抗惊厥、镇静、催眠和麻醉。
chinese.english: General uses of drugs in this category are to treat convulsions, to produce sedation, to produce hypnosis, and to produce anesthesia.

chinese.chinese: 在麻醉剂量时，它们抑制中枢神经系统的所有区域，包括丘脑下部体温调节系统、呼吸中枢和血管运动中枢。
chinese.english: They depress all areas of the CNS including the hypothalamic thermoregulatory system, respiratory center, and vasomotor centers at anesthetic doses.

chinese.chinese: 在需要诱导麻醉时可使用超短效药。
chinese.english: When one is inducing anesthesia, an ultrashort-acting drug is used.

chinese.chinese: 此外，某些致死性心律失常可由于许多药物，包括洋地黄、麻醉剂、具有抗胆碱作用的抗抑郁药(如阿米替林)，和具有抗胆碱作用的抗精神失常药(如甲硫哒嗪)的应用不当而引起。
chinese.english: In addition, fatal dysrhythmias may be caused by injudicious use of numerous drugs including digitalis, anesthetics, antidepressants with anticholinergic effects (e.g., amitriptyline), and neuroleptics with anticholinergic effects (e.g., thioridazine).

chinese.chinese: 年轻患者的预后比老年者好，次全结肠炎好于全结肠炎，表现在一般健康状况和结肠癌变危险两万面。
chinese.english: Young patients do better than old patients, and sub- total colitis is less severe than total colitis in terms of both general health and the risk of colonic carcinoma.

chinese.chinese: 尤以年龄大的全结肠炎患者应争取早期手术。
chinese.english: Surgery is therefore indicated early in patients who are older and have total colitis.

chinese.chinese: 更为少见的病因为血清阴性的类风湿性综合征(强直性脊柱炎，Reiter’s综合征，结肠炎性及牛皮癣性关节炎)，先天性病变(例如马凡综合征，主动脉缩窄，二叶瓣)，梅毒及创伤性破裂。
chinese.english: Even less common causes include seronegative rheumatoid syndromes (ankylosing spondylitis Reiter's syndrome, colitis and psoriatic arthropathy), congenital lesions (e.g. Marfan's syndrome, coarctation of the aorta, bicuspid valve), syphilis and traumatic rupture.

chinese.chinese: RF在强直性脊柱炎，Reiter综合征、牛皮癣 关节病变及结肠炎性关节病变时常为阴性。
chinese.english: Rheumatoid factor is usually negative in ankylosing spondylitis, Reiter's syndrome, psoriatic arthropathy and colitic arthropathy.

chinese.chinese: 质粒还可编码大肠杆菌溶血素、引起胃肠炎的肠毒素以及许多外毒素的产生(如肉毒中毒、破伤风及猩红热外毒素)。
chinese.english: Hemolysin production by E. coli, enterotoxins responsible for gastroenteritis, and many exotoxins such as those for botulism, tetanus, and scarlet fever, are also encoded by plasmids.

chinese.chinese: 因此，至少对某些细菌(如引起淋病的淋病奈瑟菌和引起胃肠炎的肠毒素型大肠杆菌)而言，菌毛和毒力菌株似乎有联系。
chinese.english: Thus, in at least several instances (such as Neisseria gonorrhoeae, the cause of gonorrhea, and enterotoxigenic Escherichia coli, a. cause of gastroenteritis), the possession of pili appears to be associated with virulent strains.

chinese.chinese: 肠炎：小肠或大肠葡萄球菌性肠炎是一种严重的感染，此种情况可见予胃肠手术后，或发生在由于大量使用抗生素治疗而破坏了大部分肠道正常菌群后。
chinese.english: Enteritis: Staphylococcal enteritis is a severe infection of the small or large intestine, which may follow gastrointestinal surgery or may occur after intensive antibiotic therapy, which destroys much of the normal intestinal flora.

chinese.chinese: 基本上有三种：伤寒沙门菌(一种血清型)、猪霍乱沙门菌(一种血清型)及肠炎沙门菌(1500多种血清型)。
chinese.english: There are 3 primary species: Salmonella typhi (one serotype), Salmonella cholerae suis (one serotype), and Salmonella enteritidis (more than 1500 serotypes).

chinese.chinese: 3．肠炎(以前称胃肠炎)：此为沙门菌感染最常见的症状。
chinese.english: 3. Enterocolitis (Formerly “Gastroenteritis”): This is the commonest manifestation of Salmonella infection.

chinese.chinese: 在肠热症发作时，从第二或第三周起粪便培养便呈阳性，胃肠炎发作时，第一周内即呈阳性。
chinese.english: In enteric fevers, the stools are positive from the second or third week on, in gastroenteritis, during the first week.

chinese.chinese: 肠热症和菌血症伴有局部病灶时需要抗菌治疗，但大多数的小肠结肠炎病人则不需要，用抗菌药甚至可延长排菌时间。
chinese.english: While enteric fevers and bacteremias with focal lesions require antimicrobial treatment, the vast majority of cases of enterocolitis do not, and excretion of organisms may even be prolonged by antimicrobials.

chinese.chinese: 不发生呼吸窘迫综合征的早产儿也可有严重的问题，如坏死性小肠结肠炎、高胆红素血症或颅内出血。
chinese.english: Premature infants who do not have problems with RDS may still have serious difficulties with necrotizing enterocolitis, hyperbilirubinemia, or intracerebral bleeds.

chinese.chinese: 大多数婴儿无明显异常，但在宫内感染的婴儿中约有10％发生先天性异常，诸如小脑儿(头异常小)，因中枢神经系统损伤而致的癫痫、耳聋、智力障碍、精神运动性障碍、视力异常、慢性胃肠炎、黄疸、肺炎或血小板减少症(缺少血小板)。
chinese.english: Most infants do not show obvious abnormalities, but about 10% of those infected in utero develop congenital abnormalities, such as microcephaly (an abnormally small head), central nervous system damage resulting in seizures and deafness, mental retardation, psychomotor retardation, ocular abnormalities, chronic gastroenteritis, jaundice, pneumonia, or thrombocytopenia (lack of thrombocytes).

chinese.chinese: C．严重腺病毒肺炎常伴有肺外表现，如脑膜脑炎，心肌炎、胃肠炎和肝脾肿大
chinese.english: C. Severe adenovirus pneumonias are often accompanied by extrapulmonary manifestations such as encephalomeningitis, myocarditis, gastroenteritis, and hepatosplenomegaly.

chinese.chinese: D．有湿疹，鼻炎，并可能有过敏性胃肠炎
chinese.english: D. Presence of eczema, rhinitis, and possible allergic gastroenteritis

chinese.chinese: 我们先看一个实验，当实验开始时平均动脉压为100mmHg (13.3kPa)，然后向脊椎管内注射局部麻醉药使药物达到脊椎管全部以实行全脊髓麻醉。
chinese.english: Let us see an experiment, at the beginning of which the mean arterial pressure was 100mmHg (13.3kPa); then total spinal anesthesia was instituted by injecting a local anesthetic all the way up the spinal canal.

chinese.chinese: 这种麻醉法阻断来自脊髓的所有神经，包括交感神经。
chinese.english: This blocked all nerves coming from the spinal cord, including the sympathetic nerves.

chinese.chinese: 取溃疡刮片作革兰和吉姆萨染色（溃疡区是相对麻木的，很少需要局部麻醉剂），将标本培养于血－琼脂平皿，萨布罗斜面（鉴别真菌）和脑－心硫代乙酸盐培养基（培养厌氧菌）。
chinese.english: Ulcer scraping should be taken for Gram and Giemsa staining (the ulcerated area is relatively anaesthetic and a local anaesthetic is rarely necessary) and the specimens incubated on a blood-agar plate, a Sabourraud slope (for fungus identification and brain-heart and thioglycollate media (for anaerobic organisms).

chinese.chinese: 应用可卡因滴剂麻醉眼后（有助于眼部抗生素的穿透作用），先在结膜下注射40mg庆大霉素和0．3mg mydricaine（由于它具有血管收缩作用，故可延长前房内抗生素水平），抗生素治疗方案可按照细菌的检查结果进行修改（如有必要，可用广谱抗生素滴眼剂，如庆大霉素或氯霉素，每半小时点眼l次）。
chinese.english: After anaesthetizing the eye with cocaine drops (which incidentally aid the penetration of ocular antibiotics), a subconjunctival injection of 40 mg gentamicin and 0.3 mg mydricaine (which prolongs the antibiotic level in the anterior chamber, due to its vasoconstrictive action) initiates the antibiotic regime, which can then be modified according to the results of the bacteriological investigations (broad-spectrum antibiotic drops such as gentamicin or chloramphenicol are given every half-hour if necessary).

chinese.chinese: 这种激光治疗只需局部麻醉以安置观察眼底的透镜（而不像氙弧灯光凝那样需要球后或全身麻醉）。
chinese.english: Such laser applications require only topical anaesthesia to allow insertion of a fundus lens (rather than the retro-bulbar or general anaesthesia needed with the xenon-arc photocoagulator).

chinese.chinese: 患者立刻开始用广谱抗生素，而麻醉师应注意诊断避免用丁二酰胆碱肌肉松弛剂（因用时可产生暂时性眼压升高）。
chinese.english: The patient is immediately started on a broad-spectrum systemic antibiotic and the anaesthetist should be aware of the diagnosis as he will wish to avoid using succinylcholine as a muscle relaxant (since this produces a transient rise in intra-ocular pressure during induction).

chinese.chinese: 疼痛常剧烈，局部滴麻醉剂可减轻。
chinese.english: Pain is often intense and local anaesthetic drops bring relief.

chinese.chinese: 一旦粘膜麻醉，便烧灼破损血管。
chinese.english: Once the mucosa is anaesthetized the offending vessel is cauterized.

chinese.chinese: 其他溶液如利多卡因亦可用于鼻部麻醉。
chinese.english: Other solutions, e.g. lignocaine, may be used to anaesthetize the nose.

chinese.chinese: 在这样的病理，明智之举是麻醉下触诊鼻咽腔，如果存在腺样体则可将其切除。
chinese.english: In such cases it is wiser to give an anaesthetic and to palpate the postnasal space, and if adenoids are present they may then be removed.

chinese.chinese: 有时，有些声门上肿瘤实际上是麻醉医师在为其他手术作插管时偶然发现的。
chinese.english: Sometimes, in fact, turnouts in the supraglottis are discovered accidentally by an anaesthetist during intubation for another procedure.

chinese.chinese: 外耳道内应该滴用氯仿水或气体，以便麻醉或杀灭蛆虫而解除其对皮肤的吸附。
chinese.english: Chloroform water or vapour must be applied to the external meatus in order to anaesthetize or kill the maggots and so release their grip on the skin.

chinese.chinese: 自口咽中吸入细菌可在牙科麻醉时发生，亦可在延髓麻痹时发生。
chinese.english: Aspiration of bacteria from the oropharynx may follow dental anaesthesia and can occur in bulbar palsies.

chinese.chinese: 当动脉PC02持续或进行性升高，特别是伴有耗竭时(常在病程长达48h以上)，提示需要请有经验的麻醉医师作人工通气。
chinese.english: Persistent or increasing elevation of arterial PC02 especially with accompanying exhaustion (usually becoming important by 48 hours) suggests the need for artificial ventilation by an experienced anesthetist.
