chinese.english: 2. Aspiration (e.g., gastric contents with Mendelson's syndrome, water with near drowning).

chinese.chinese: 1．(A、C)急性胃肠炎小儿大便用阴性—对照染色(磷钨酸)电子显微镜检查已显示几种可能的病毒为祸首。
chinese.english: 1. (A, C,) The examination of feces from children with acute gastroenteritis by negative-contrast stain (phosphotungstic acid) electron microscopy has revealed several possible viral agents as culprits.

chinese.chinese: 它们引起急性胃肠炎，特别是在冬季，估计范围在40~90％之间。
chinese.english: Estimates of their responsibility in producing acute gastroenteritis, especially during the winter months, have ranged between 40 and 90%.

chinese.chinese: 急性胃肠炎特别在冬季流行的，其主要病原体推测为轮状病毒-环状病毒-微小核糖核酸样病毒-十二指肠病毒。
chinese.english: Acute gastroenteritis is particularly prevalent during the winter months and has resulted in the speculation of the proposed predominant causative role of rotavirus-orbivirus- reo-like-virus-duovirus.

chinese.chinese: Kerzner等发现在小猪有传递性胃肠炎者(TGE)，其空肠有葡萄糖与钠偶联转运缺陷。
chinese.english: In piglets with transmissible gastroenteritis (TGE), Kerzner et al.have found a defect in glucose-mediated sodium transport in the jejunum.

chinese.chinese: 传递性胃肠炎与人类临床情况如急性病毒性胃肠炎的相似处是引人注目的，进一步有关的研究将阐明其可能的联系。
chinese.english: The resemblance of TGE to human clinical states, such as acute viral gastroenteritis, is striking, and further correlative studies should clarify a possible link.

chinese.chinese: 在急性胃肠炎患儿的持续护理中，必须注意到获得性双糖或单糖不耐受。
chinese.english: In the continued care of the patient with acute gastroenteritis, acquired disaccharide or monosaccharide intolerance must be watched for.

chinese.chinese: 其他结缔组织病、结核、溃疡性结肠炎和慢性活动性肝炎荧光抗核抗体阳性率稍低，所以阳性试验的解释应与临床情况相联系。
chinese.english: Therefore, a positive test should be interpreted in context of the clinical setting.

chinese.chinese: C．Grohn病(节段性回肠炎)
chinese.english: C. Crohn's disease

chinese.chinese: 曾有报告小肠锌吸收不良和锌缺乏与Crohn病(节段性回肠炎)和囊性纤维化有关。
chinese.english: Intestinal malabsorption of Zn and Zn deficiency have been reported in association with Crohn's disease and cystic fibrosis.

chinese.chinese: 还有一些慢性炎症(包括类风湿性关节炎、溃疡性结肠炎和克隆氏病)的原因尚不明，但认为免疫机能紊乱起着重要的病因学作用。
chinese.english: In still other types of chronic inflammation, including rheumatoid arthritis, ulcerative colitis and Crohn's disease, the cause is not known but disturbances of immune mechanisms are believed to play an important etiological role.

chinese.chinese: 在溃疡性结肠炎时，多发性恶变也是一个规律。
chinese.english: In ulcerative colitis multiple malignancy is also the rule.

chinese.chinese: 有些患者还可有慢性肠炎、慢性甲状腺炎，Sjogren’s综合征以及其他可能是由自身免疫引起的疾病。
chinese.english: Some patients also may have chronic inflammatory bowel disease, chronic thyroiditis, Sjogren's syndrome, and other diseases of possible auto-immune aetiology.

chinese.chinese: 本病多发生于男性，男、女之比为3：1，而且70％的患者合并慢性炎性肠道疾病，尤其是溃疡性结肠炎。
chinese.english: This disease shows a male preponderance of 3:1 and in 70% of cases is associated with chronic inflammatory bowel disease, especially ulcerative colitis.

chinese.chinese: 本病的病因未明，与溃疡性结肠炎的关系也不清楚。
chinese.english: The aetiology is not known and the association with ulcerative colitis is obscure.

chinese.chinese: 大肠的炎性病变，例如溃疡性结肠炎和肉芽种性结肠炎，为渗出状态，造成出血性腹泻。
chinese.english: Inflammatory bowel diseases, including ulcerative colitis and granulomatous colitis, are exudative states with consequent bloody diarrhea.

chinese.chinese: 4． 麻醉药过量导致的肺水肿(例如海洛因、美散痛、吗啡及丙氧吩)。
chinese.english: 4. Narcotic overdose pulmonary edema (e.g., heroin, methadone, morphine, dextropropoxyphene).

chinese.chinese: 5． 非麻醉药的作用(例如硝基呋喃妥因)。
chinese.english: 5. Nonnarcotic drug effects (e.g., nitrofurantoin).

chinese.chinese: 室性心动过速：在短效全身麻醉下，使用直流电转复。
chinese.english: Ventricular tachycardia: DC cardioversion under short-acting general anaesthetic.

chinese.chinese: 3.心内膜炎见于麻醉药成瘾者。
chinese.english: 3. Endocarditis in drug addicts.

chinese.chinese: 除了当氧的张力特别低的时候，如高空、缺氧性麻醉等，本类患者一般无自觉症状，而且预后良好。
chinese.english: Patients with the trait are usually symptom-free except when the oxygen tension is very low, e.g. high altitude and anoxic anaesthesia.

chinese.chinese: 因此，必须在全身麻醉以前，对每一例病人的颈椎作X光检查。
chinese.english: It is necessary to X-ray the cervical spine in all patients with rheumatoid arthritis prior to general anaesthesia.

chinese.chinese: 但特别使人感兴趣和值得注意的是许多抗生素、诊断试剂、药物和麻醉剂也可成为某些个体的变应原。
chinese.english: However, of particular interest and concern is that many antibiotics, diagnostic agents, drugs, and anesthetics can serve as allergens for some individuals.

chinese.chinese: 病人接受某种麻醉后，浸泡在水池中，用电产生震波。
chinese.english: After receiving some type of anesthesia, the patient is immersed in a tank of water and shock waves are generated electrically.

chinese.chinese: 气雾剂(雾化药物)就是通过吸入给药的，许多麻醉剂就是这样投药。
chinese.english: Aerosols (particles of drug suspended in air) are administered by inhalation, as are many anesthetics.

chinese.chinese: 麻醉剂：减轻或消除痛觉的药物。
chinese.english: Anesthetic: Drug that reduces or eliminates sensation.

chinese.chinese: 麻醉药：成瘾药，即强力止痛药，引起昏懵或失去知觉，从而解除疼痛的药物。
chinese.english: Narcotic: Habit-forming drug (potent analgesic) that relieves pain by producing stupor or insensibility.

chinese.chinese: 危重病医学主要是由内科医师、麻醉师、外科医师和儿科医师进行工作。
chinese.english: Critical care medicine is practiced for the most part by internists, anesthesiologists, surgeons, and pediatricians.

chinese.chinese: 危重监护病房最早产生于20世纪50年代，因为患有脊髓灰质炎或正从麻醉中恢复的病人需要机械通气而建立了危重监护病房。
chinese.english: Critical care units were first developed in the 1950's for patients who required mechanical ventilation because they had poliomyelitis or were recovering from anesthesia.

chinese.chinese: 然而对于手术后病人，对心率失常、服用麻醉剂或镇静剂过量的病人、患可逆转的神经肌肉性疾病的病人、失血性休克、哮喘和慢性阻塞性肺疾病的患者大有裨益。
chinese.english: Yet patients in the postoperative period and patients with cardiac arrhythmias, narcotic and sedative drug overdose, reversible neuromuscular disease, hypovolemic shock, and asthma and chronic obstructive pulmonary disease clearly benefit from critical care.

chinese.chinese: 为了正确诊断附件肿块，偶有需要在麻醉下行盆腔检查，儿童更是如此。
chinese.english: For accurate diagnosis of an adnexal mass, the pelvic examination must occasionally be performed under anesthesia, especially in children.

chinese.chinese: 粪便可能滞留在结肠憩室内引起结肠炎。
chinese.english: Feces can become lodged in the diverticula of the colon, causing diverticulitis.

chinese.chinese: 今天公布的最新研究显示：皮下注射抗TNF-α药物SIMPONI（戈利木单抗）可以使大部分中到重度溃疡性结肠炎患者出现临床反应，而这些患者在常规治疗中失败或者不能忍受常规药物的副作用。研究人员将杨森公司研发部资助的III期临床试验的结果公布在最新科学发现会议期间的消化药物周（DDW）上。结果显示：在SIMPONI治疗的两个不同剂量组中，超过50%患者在第6周出现了临床反应（该研究的主要终点指标），明显高于对照组的出现比例。与安慰剂组相比，在第六周，SIMPONI治疗组能够显著促进症状缓解、粘膜修复和健康相关的生活质量提高。
chinese.english: New study findings presented today show that subcutaneous induction regimens of the anti-tumor necrosis factor (TNF)-alpha therapy SIMPONI(golimumab) induced clinical response in a majority of patients with moderately to severely active ulcerative colitis (UC) who had previously failed or were intolerant to conventional agents. Investigators presented data from the Janssen Research Development sponsored Phase 3 study at Digestive Disease Week (DDW） during a late breaker session and reported that more than 50 percent of patients in each of two SIMPONI dosing groups achieved clinical response at week 6, the primary endpoint of the study, which was significantly more than those in clinical response after receiving placebo. Treatment with SIMPONI also resulted in significant induction of clinical remission and mucosal healing and improvement in health-related quality of life measures at week 6 compared with placebo.

chinese.chinese: 在6周治疗过程中，对照组和治疗组发生副作用（adverse event，缩写为AE）的人群比例相似（对照组为38.2%，SIMPONI治疗组为39.1）。严重副反应在对照组和SIMPONI治疗组的出现率分别为6.1%和3.0%。注射部位反应在SIMPONI治疗组和安慰剂组中都不常见，而且发生率相当。恶性率反应在200 mg/100 mg SIMPONI组、400 mg/200 mg SIMPONI组和安慰剂组的发生率分别为0.0%，0.3%和0.3%。在400 mg/200 mg SIMPONI治疗组中，有1例由于重复手术治疗后并发症坐骨直肠窝脓肿所致死亡病例和1例脱髓鞘病例。SIMPONI诱导治疗在溃疡性结肠炎的治疗过程中的安全性与SIMPONI在适应症关节炎标示出的安全谱一致。
chinese.english: Through week 6, a similar proportion of patients in the combined SIMPONI groups (39.1 percent) and placebo group (38.2 percent) reported an adverse event (AE). Rates of serious AEs were 3.0 percent and 6.1 percent in the combined SIMPONI groups and placebo group, respectively. Injection site reactions were uncommon and comparable across SIMPONI groups. Malignancy rates were 0.0 percent, 0.3 percent and 0.3 percent in the SIMPONI 200 mg/100 mg, SIMPONI 400 mg/200 mg and placebo groups, respectively. One death resulting from postoperative complications following repeated surgeries for an ischiorectal abscess and a single case of demyelination were reported in the SIMPONI 400 mg/200 mg group. The safety of SIMPONI induction in the treatment of UC was consistent with the safety profile of SIMPONI in labeled rheumatologic indications.

chinese.chinese: 结果显示，单次结肠腔内使用Kappaproct后一周内，所有用药患者结肠炎活动指数均显著而迅速下降，4周时效果进一步增强，此时，单次使用Kappaproct治疗后，临床有效率达71%，临床缓解率为43%。至12周时，临床有效率及临床缓解率分别为82%和71%。超过两年的随访结果显示，8例患者中除1例外均免于结肠切除术，其中有1例患者的无症状缓解期超过27个月。
chinese.english: The findings showed that Kappaproct induced a pronounced and rapid reduction in the colitis activity index for all treated patients within 1 week following a single intracolonic administration. Further improvements were evident at week 4, resulting in a clinical response rate after a single-dose treatment with Kappaproct of 71%, with 43% in clinical remission. By week 12, the clinical response and remission rates had reached 82% and 71%, respectively. A follow-up period of over 2 years post treatment indicated that all but one of the treated patients had avoided the need for colectomy, with the longest patient being in symptom-free remission for over 27 months.

chinese.chinese: 此前对该分子的研究证明，NLRP6有助于抑制结肠炎和结肠癌。Kanneganti说，该发现强调了对免疫系统功能进行合理的调整具有重要作用。她说：“该分子有助于在促进和抑制炎症中保持平衡。在大肠炎中，NLRP6具有保护宿主免受慢性感染的作用；在我们进行的几个细菌感染研究中，它抑制细菌的清除。”
chinese.english: Previous work on this molecule demonstrated that NLRP6 also helps to limit colitis and colon cancer. Kanneganti said the findings underscore the importance of balance to a properly functioning immune system. "This molecule helps maintain a balance between promoting and suppressing inflammation. In Colitis, NLRP6 seems to protect the host from the consequences of chronic inflammation and in the other we show it impedes bacterial clearance," she said.

chinese.chinese: 该项研究中对于儿童患者大多数治疗相关不良事件强度较为温和或中等，性质短暂。有一项严重不良事件被认定为治疗相关，即胃肠炎。报告称该事件是由于需要住院复水导致。该患者仍继续接受taliglucerase alfa治疗。总之，该研究结果表明，像对成人患者一样，taliglucerase alfa有潜力称为儿童患者的另一种治疗方法。
chinese.english: With respect to pediatric patients in this study, the majority of the treatment-related adverse events were mild or moderate in intensity, and transient in nature. One severe adverse event was assessed as treatment-related; gastroenteritis. The event was reported as serious due to the need for hospitalization for rehydration. This patient continues to receive taliglucerase alfa. In conclusion, the results of this study suggest that taliglucerase alfa has the potential to provide alternative therapy in pediatric patients with Gaucher Disease, as it is for adults.

chinese.chinese: 弧菌是一类通常生长在温带及热带海洋环境中的细菌类型。人类生食或食用未煮熟的贝类或接触海水后，可导致该菌引起的包括从霍乱以至胃肠炎样症状等的多种感染。
chinese.english: Vibrios is a group of bacteria which usually grow in warm and tropical marine environments. The bacteria can cause various infections in humans, ranging from cholera to gastroenteritis-like symptoms from eating raw or undercooked shellfish or from exposure to seawater.

chinese.chinese: 根据炎性肠病和习性联系的最大可能性研究的结果证实，吸烟增加了克罗恩病的风险而没有增加了溃疡性结肠炎风险。
chinese.english: Smoking increases the risk for Crohn'sdisease(CD) but not ulcerativecolitis(UC), theresultsof the largest prospective study of the link between inflammatory boweldisease(IBD) and the habit confirm.

chinese.chinese: 该研究小组之前曾证实，患有结肠癌、炎性肠病、克罗恩氏病和溃疡性结肠炎的患者结肠中存在大量的一种粘性大肠杆菌。
chinese.english: The Liverpool team had previously shown that people with colon cancer and with the inflammatory bowel diseases, Crohn's disease and ulcerative colitis, have high numbers of a sticky type of E. coli in their colons.

chinese.chinese: 利物浦大学与北卡罗来纳大学的研究人员合作研究证明，具有结肠炎的小鼠更有可能携带这些大肠杆菌，携带着包含pks基因的大肠杆菌的小鼠常常会形成结肠癌。但是，携带着不包含pks基因的大肠杆菌的小鼠则不会得癌症。他们还发现携带pks基因的大肠杆菌的存在似乎并没有加重肠道的炎症。
chinese.english: Research, in collaboration with the University of North Carolina, showed that mice with colitis are more likely to carry these E. coli and they often develop colon cancer when carrying E. coli containing pks genes. They did not, however, develop cancer with identical E. coli that did not contain pks. They also found that the presence of E. coli carrying the pks genes did not appear to increase inflammation of the gut.

chinese.chinese: 美国药物评审员透露Abbott Laboratories Inc可能需要再进行额外的临床药物试验来证明Humira这种药可以治疗溃疡性结肠炎的功效。
chinese.english: U.S. drug reviewers said Abbott Laboratories Inc might need to conduct additional trials of Humira to prove the blockbuster drug helps patients with ulcerative colitis.

chinese.chinese: 这个研究并不是提倡说让病人感染幽门螺旋杆菌来治疗结肠炎，而是说那些已经感染了这个细菌的病人不必去治疗根除HP，除非出现了那些并发症才需要去治疗。
chinese.english: The researchers aren't advocating infecting people with H. pylori to treat colitis, but say this may indicated that those already carrying the bacteria should not be treated unless they develop symptoms. These findings also raise significant concerns about global vaccination against H. pylori.

chinese.chinese: 幽门螺旋杆菌感染最常见于发展中国家或者那些环境卫生比较差的地方，而这些地方结肠炎、沙门氏菌感染和炎症性肠病是比较少见的。大多数人是在他们生命中的前7年感染幽门螺旋杆菌，且绝大多数是通过粪口途径感染的。
chinese.english: The H. pylori infection is more commonly found in developing countries or those with poor sanitation, where colitis, Salmonella and inflammatory bowel diseases are less common. Most people contract H. pylori in their first seven years of life, most commonly through an oral-fecal route.

chinese.chinese: 左侧图片为正常结肠，右侧为结肠炎病理图片，显然右侧图片中巯基亚硝化水平（绿色）远比左侧高。
chinese.english: The right image shows abundant S-nitrosylation (green) in human colitis compared with much less found in the left image of a normal colon.

chinese.chinese: 每日科学（2010-8-3）—华盛顿大学圣路易斯分校医学院的一项研究表明，在接受同样治疗的情况下，50岁以后诊断为溃疡性结肠炎的人比50岁之前诊断为溃结的人更容易获得症状上的缓解。
chinese.english: ScienceDaily (Aug. 3, 2010) — Adultsdiagnosed with ulcerative colitis after age 50 are more likely to achieveremission from their symptoms than patients diagnosed at younger ages, evenwhen those patients receive similar treatments, according to research atWashington University School of Medicine in St. Louis.

chinese.chinese: 临产后忌进固体食物，以减少麻醉诱导期呕吐，及吸入呕吐物的危险。
chinese.english: Once labour is established solid food is withheld so as to reduce the risk of vomiting during induction of anaesthesia and the risk of inhalation of vomit.

chinese.chinese: 当胎头在外阴处披露时，给些麻醉剂通常是合适的。
chinese.english: By the time that the head begins to appear at the vulva some form of analgesia is usually desirable.

chinese.chinese: 可用阴部神经阻滞麻醉，或吸入混合酶一氧化氮和氧气，或混合的三氯乙烯与空气，也常有效。
chinese.english: A pudendal block may be used but alternatively inhalation of a mixture of nitrons oxide and oxygen, or of trilene and air, is often effective.

chinese.chinese: 处理及结果：麻醉下重复盆腔检查，结果相同。
chinese.english: Management and findings: The pelvic examination was repeated under anesthesia with identical findings.

chinese.chinese: 麻醉师应站在手术台前准备随时作气管插管，4个单位的血以便紧急使用。
chinese.english: The anesthesiologist should be standing by the patient at the head of the table prepared for crash intubation and, 4 units of blood should be immediately available.

chinese.chinese: 如胎心率正常阻滞麻醉是过期妊娠分娩期最常规用的镇痛方法，但阻滞麻醉药物注入前应注意给患者先输入足够的液体.
chinese.english: Conduction anesthesia is the most routine analgesia in labor for the postdate fetus, provided the FHT is normal, but care is taken to preload the patient with fluids before installation of the block.

chinese.chinese: 他可能接着就娩出，因此，双胎分娩时必须有一名麻醉师在产房。
chinese.english: It may have to be delivered without delay and therefore an anaesthetist must be ready in the labour ward during all twin deliveries.

chinese.chinese: 在麻醉下检查可作出诊断。
chinese.english: The diagnosis is made by examination under anaesthesia.

chinese.chinese: 任何试行解脱都要求深度麻醉，也许要用氟烷。
chinese.english: Any attempt at disengagement requires deep anaesthesia, perhaps with fluothane.

chinese.chinese: 在应用和滥用的物质中主要是酒精、烟和麻醉剂。
chinese.english: Prominent among the substances used or abused are alcohol, cigarettes, and narcotics.

chinese.chinese: 这显然是由于麻醉、手术分娩和感染率增高的关系。
chinese.english: This is obviously due to anesthesia, operative delivery, and increased risk of infection.

chinese.chinese: 检查时需用麻醉者甚少；用一小钢丝套圈或吸管可进入阴道获取白带作细菌学检查。
chinese.english: It is seldom necessary to give an anaesthetic for examination; a small wire loop or pipette may be passed into the vagina to obtain discharge for bacteriological examination.

chinese.chinese: （1）突眼症很明显且不能复原，不因睡眠、麻醉或死亡而消退；易引起暴露性角膜炎。
chinese.english: (1) Exophthalmos is well marked and irreducible, disappearing neither with sleep, anaesthesia, nor death; it readily leads to exposure keratitis.

chinese.chinese: 而从理论上看，后一方法会使肝炎患者受到麻醉和外科手术的危险。
chinese.english: The latter has the theoretical risk of exposing patients with hepatitis to anesthesia and surgery.

chinese.chinese: 血源性肺炎见于有软组织感染者、由于感染分流而长期透析著、非肠道麻醉剂滥用者，特别是右心细菌性心内膜炎的患者。
chinese.english: Hematogenous pneumonia is seen in those with soft tissue infections, in patients undergoing long-term dialysis, because of infected shunts, and in parenteral narcotic users, especially those with right-sided bacterial endocarditis.

chinese.chinese: 在美国将近有100万成年人患溃疡性结肠炎。克罗恩病能够累及所有的胃肠道，但是溃疡性结肠炎的炎症只会在结肠表面。溃疡性结肠炎常表现为腹泻、血便、体重丢失以及发热，严重的病例需要通过手术切除病变的肠管。
chinese.english: Nearly 1 million U.S. adults haveulcerative colitis. The related Crohn's disease can affect any part of thegastrointestinal tract, but ulcerative colitis patients have inflammation onlyin the lining of the large intestine or colon. The condition often causesdiarrhea, bloody stool, weight loss and fever. In severe cases, some patientsneed surgery to remove the colon.

chinese.chinese: 此研究包含了从2001-2008年在华盛顿大学圣路易斯分校医学院的炎症性肠病医疗中心治疗的295名病人，经过治疗后50岁以后诊断为IBD的病人有64%的人获得了缓解，年轻的时候诊断为IBD的病人只有49%获得缓解。这里说的缓解是指不再出现结肠炎的临床症状，但是很多人仍然存在炎症，可能需要继续应用5-氨基水杨酸，不过可以停止使用激素。
chinese.english: The study involved 295 people treated atthe inflammatory bowel disease clinics at the School of Medicine over aseven-year period from 2001-08. After treatment, 64 percent of patientsdiagnosed after the age of 50 were in remission, compared to 49 percent ofthose who developed colitis at younger ages. Patients in remission no longerhave clinical symptoms of colitis, but many may still have inflammation and mayneed to continue treatment with 5-ASA drugs, but are able to discontinuesteroids.

chinese.chinese: 研究人员推测晚年发病与免疫系统的退化和环境因素的影响如吸烟等有关系。在晚年患IBD的病人中有52%的有吸烟史，年轻时患病的人中只有13.5%有吸烟，而吸烟是公认的结肠炎的危险因素。
chinese.english: The researchers suspect that later-onsetdisease is related to changes in the aging immune system and to environmentalinfluences such as smoking. Nearly 52 percent in the late-onset group wereformer smokers, compared with only 13.5 percent of the younger patients.Smoking is a well-known risk factor for colitis.

chinese.chinese: 目前，大家普遍认为克罗恩病和溃疡性结肠炎的发病率最高的年龄是在20岁到40岁之间。因此，炎症性肠病会影响人们生命中最健康和最出成绩的那些年，这将导致患者、卫生保健系统和社会的长期花费。
chinese.english: Universally,incidence rates for both Crohn's disease and ulcerative colitis were highestamong individuals who were between 20 and 40 years old. Thus, IBD affectsindividuals in the most healthy and productive years of life, resulting inlong-term cost to the patient, health-care system and society.

chinese.chinese: 一般的克罗恩病和溃疡性结肠炎发病率是20岁到40岁个体之间的最高，因此,炎症性肠病影响个人生命中最健康和最有活力之年, 导致病人、医疗保健体制和社会的长期花费。
chinese.english: Universally, incidence rates for both Crohn's diseaseand ulcerative colitis were highest among individuals who were between 20and 40 years old. Thus, IBD affects individuals in themost healthy and productive years of life, resultingin long-term cost to the patient, health-care system and society.

chinese.chinese: 他们也发现，与生活在北纬地区的女性相比，那些生活在南部气候条件下的女性到30岁时，发展为克罗恩病的危险下降52%，发展为溃疡性结肠炎的危险下降38%.
chinese.english: They also discovered that in comparison to women who lived in northern latitudes, those who resided in southern climates had a 52% reduced chance of developing Crohn's disease by the age of 30 years and were 38% less likely to develop ulcerative colitis.

chinese.chinese: 他们也发现，与生活在北纬地区的女性相比，那些生活在南部气候条件下的女性到30岁时，发展为克罗恩病的危险下降52%，发展为溃疡性结肠炎的危险下降38%.
chinese.english: They also discovered that in comparison to women who lived in northern latitudes, those who resided in southern climates had a 52% reduced chance of developing Crohn's disease by the age of 30 years and were 38% less likely to develop ulcerative colitis.

chinese.chinese: 细胞毒性淋巴细胞相关抗原4(CTLA-4)配体是T细胞的负性调节剂；因此，封闭CTLA-4的活性可以提高T细胞的激活和增殖，从而抑制免疫耐受。抗CTLA-4的单克隆抗体ipilimumab现在处于随机的3期临床试验中。单用ipilimumab或联合gp100肽疫苗治疗与单用疫苗对之前治疗无反应的患者相比能够提高总体生存率。当ipilimumab为一线用药与达卡巴嗪联合应用时也被证实能够提高总体生存期（2.1个月），这样在2011年，美国FDA批准了ipilimumab 3mg/kg的剂量作为进展性黑色素瘤的治疗，在一线、二线治疗中对所有的进展性黑色素瘤患者给予每3周四次剂量。在评估联合应用达卡巴嗪与ipilimumab以10mg/kg的量作为一线治疗的关键试验中发现了高比例的肝酶的改变。这个副作用导致了很大比例的患者放弃了此治疗，这被认为是降低ipilimumab作用的原因之一。因为ipilimumab激活免疫反应开始是沉默的，所以在一些患者中有激活迟发亚临床自身免疫反应的风险，导致免疫相关的副作用。这其中主要的有结肠炎、皮炎和垂体病变，所有的这些必须严密监测，因为这些患者可能需要立即应用糖皮质激素治疗。ipilimumab大概有10%的反应率，但是反应持续时间长，中值约为20个月。在两个试验中都有明显的生存曲线的分离，显示超过3年的反应期，在很多患者中5年后都没有复发，显示出潜在治疗潜力。
chinese.english: The cytotoxic T-lymphocyte–associatedantigen 4 (CTLA-4) ligand is a negativeregulator of T cells; therefore, blockingCTLA-4 action augments T-cell activationand proliferation, and inhibits immunesystem tolerance. The anti-CTLA?4 monoclonalantibody ipilimumab has recentlybeen assessed in randomized phase IIItrials. Improved overall survival (4 months)was demonstrated for ipilimumab aloneor in combination with the gp100 peptidevaccine compared with the vaccine alone inpatients who did not respond to prior treatment.5 Improved overall survival was alsodemonstrated for ipilimumab in the firstlinesetting when combined with dacarbazine(2.1 months).6 Thus, in 2011, the FDAapproved ipilimumab for advanced melanomaat a dose of 3 mg/kg, administeredevery 3 weeks for a total of four doses forall patients with advanced melanoma inthe first-line and second-line and settings.In the pivotal trial assessing the combinationof dacarbazine with ipilimumab asfirst-line treatment at a dose of 10 mg/kg, ahi

chinese.chinese: 研究者总结道，在长期接受抗生素治疗的骨关节感染者中很难发现艰难梭菌结肠炎，但作为联合抗生素治疗的一部分，利福平也许能对抗CDAD.
chinese.english: The investigators conclude that C difficile colitis is rare in patients with osteoarticular infections on long-term antibiotic therapy, but that oral rifampin, as part of combination antibiotic therapy, might protect against CDAD.

chinese.chinese: 外科医生们在防止难辨梭菌结肠炎（艰难梭菌结肠炎）的首次感染和感染复发方面正在取得进步。难辨梭菌结肠炎是一种严重的细菌感染，约每年336,000人受到影响，尤其是那些使用抗生素的病人。波士顿马萨诸塞州总医院（MGH）的研究者，通过建立大鼠模型，发现一种口服的药物可能具有抑制艰难梭菌感染（CDI）的作用。此外，Hershey,PA宾夕法尼亚州立大学医学院的研究者，为患者作检查时，检测到某一基因突变可加强疗效而防止艰难梭菌感染复发。这些发现来自两个独立的创新研究，它们最近在芝加哥的2012年度美国外科学院临床大会上作了报告。
chinese.english: Surgeons are making progress toward preventing initial and recurrent episodes of clostridium difficile colitis (C. difficile or C. diff), a vicious bacterial infection that is estimated to affect about 336,000 people each year, typically patients on antibiotics. Using mouse models, researchers at the Massachusetts General Hospital (MGH), Boston, found that an oral medication may prevent C. difficile infections (CDI). Also, surgeons at Penn State University College of Medicine, Hershey, PA, examined human patients to detect a genetic mutation that could steer treatments to prevent repeat infections. The findings from these two separate novel studies were recently presented at the 2012 Annual American College of Surgeons Clinical Congress in Chicago.

chinese.chinese: 研究者对计数腹泻和结肠炎的严重性的标准测试也进行了评估。经过盲法分析后，服用IAP治疗的小鼠组有更多的改善腹泻个数，与炎症相关的细胞分子白细胞介素-1的水平也比那些没有服用IAP治疗的小鼠高10倍。
chinese.english: Standard tests to score diarrhea and colitis severity were also evaluated. After a blinded analysis, the IAP-treated mice showed more improved diarrheal scores. The levels of IL-1 beta, a cell molecule associated with inflammation, were also10-fold higher in mice without IAP treatment.

chinese.chinese: TNF抑制剂广泛用于治疗风湿性关节炎和银屑病，并且疗效显著。直到最近，infliximab才被批准应用于溃疡性结肠炎。FDA在九月底才批准adalimumab用于治疗溃疡性结肠炎。
chinese.english: TNF inhibitors have been used extensively and successfully in rheumatoidarthritis and psoriasis, but until recently, only infliximab (Remicade) had anapproved indication for ulcerative colitis. In late September the TNF inhibitoradalimumab (Humira) received FDA approval for ulcerative colitis.

chinese.chinese: 疫苗能够改善肠炎和减缓结肠癌的进展
chinese.english: Vaccine Could Delay Bowel Inflammation and Colon Cancer

chinese.chinese: 皮质类固醇药物布地奈德对胶原性结肠炎患者的长期疗效显著，丹麦研究者在《Gut》一月刊上报道了这一结果。
chinese.english: The corticosteroid budesonide yields good long-term results in patients with collagenous colitis, Danish researchers report in the January issue of Gut.

chinese.chinese: 研究分析了沙门氏菌在体内的播散和分布。这种细菌能够引起人类和动物的伤寒及饮食传播的胃肠炎，造成严重的后果并威胁到食品生产。把这个新的研究方法用于到大群的微生物的研究，这项研究将会具有深远的意义。
chinese.english: The work analyses the spread and distribution of Salmonella in the body, which is a bacterium that causes typhoid fever and food borne gastroenteritis in humans and animals, with severe medical and veterinary consequences and threats for the food industry. The work is of broad significance as these novel research approaches are applicable to a multitude of pathogenic microorganisms.

chinese.chinese: 相比之下，成年人很少发生过高热(41. 7～42. 2℃)，除非在以下情况时：中暑、脑梗死或手术后由于给以某些肌松剂或麻醉剂而继发的恶性高热。
chinese.english: In contrast, adults rarely have extreme elevation in temperature (41.7~42.2℃) except with heatstroke, cerebral infarction, or the postoperative complication of malignant hyperpyrexia secondary to administration of certain muscle relaxants and anesthetics.

chinese.chinese: 习惯：个人习惯包括吸烟、饮含酒精饮料、睡眠、进食、娱乐爱好以及使用麻醉剂或安眠药等。
chinese.english: Habits: Personal habits include those relating to smoking, alcoholic beverages, sleeping, eating, recreation, and the use of narcotics or sedatives.

chinese.chinese: 是否使用麻醉药、镇静药或其他类型的药物，用量多大?
chinese.english: Does he use narcotics, sedatives, or other types of medication, and to what extent?

chinese.chinese: 止痛药有麻醉的（如吗啡和可待因）和非麻醉的(如阿司匹林)。
chinese.english: Both nareotic (e.g., morphine and codeine) and nonnareotic (e.g., aspirin) analgesics exist.

chinese.chinese: 麻醉药引起病人意识和感觉的丧失。
chinese.english: Anesthetics produce a loss of awareness and sensation.

chinese.chinese: 局部麻醉药引起身体局部感觉的丧失。
chinese.english: A local anesthetic causes a loss of sensation in a limited area of the body.

chinese.chinese: 麻醉药可通过各种途径使用，如：静脉滴注、局部涂抹、吸入或注射等。
chinese.english: Anesthetics are administered in several ways---intravenously, topically, by inhalation, or by injection.

chinese.chinese: 惯常通过简单扩散穿过膜的物质有水、乙醇、尿素、麻醉剂和某些离子。
chinese.english: The substances which appear to cross membranes habitually by simple diffusion are water, ethanol, urea, anaesthetics, and some ions.

chinese.chinese: 正如评价对语言命令的动作反应一样，意识的出现是和中心网络包括皮层和边缘系统的激活有关的，即与额叶和顶叶皮质功能相关右美托咪啶诱导的麻醉清醒过程相关。
chinese.english: The emergence of consciousness, as assessed with a motor response to a spoken command, was associated with the activation of a core network involving subcortical and limbic regions that became functionally coupled with parts of frontal and inferior parietal cortices upon awakening from dexme-detomidine-induced unconsciousness.

chinese.chinese: 研究者预测因为目前的麻醉深度监测技术是基于皮质脑电（EEG）监测（在头皮上记录来自大脑皮层活动产生的电信号），他们的结果帮助解释为什么这些设备在区分清醒和未清醒时会出错和当全麻病人清醒后却不能被监测到。这些结果也对目前的麻醉机制做出了新的解释并为开发更可靠的深度麻醉技术提供基础。
chinese.english: The researchers speculate that because current depth-of-anesthesia monitoring technology is based on cortical electroencephalography (EEG) measurement (i.e., measuring electrical signals on the sur-face of the scalp that arise from the brain's cortical surface), their results help to explain why these devices fail in differentiating the conscious and unconscious states and why patient awareness during general anesthesia may not always be detected. The results presented here also add to the current understanding of anesthesia mechanisms and form the foundation for developing more reliable depth-of-anesthesia technology.

chinese.chinese: 麻醉中的大脑为理解意识的出现过程提供了新的见解。麻醉药对于其能够操纵意识状态具有临床意义。当给予受试者充足的麻药后，受试者会失去之前神秘的能意识到自身和周围环境的能力转而进入到遗忘状态。
chinese.english: The anesthetized brain provides new views into the emergence of consciousness. Anesthetic agents are clinically useful for their remarkable property of being able to manipulate the state of consciousness. When given a sufficient dose of an anesthetic, a person will lose the precious but mysterious capacity of being aware of one's own self and the surrounding world, and will sink into a state of oblivion.

chinese.chinese: 研究人员说，过量用血会产生很多问题，因为血液是稀缺、昂贵的资源，并且最近的一些研究表明，过早或无必要的输血不但不会使手术的患者获益，还有可能使状况变的更差。发表在麻醉学杂志的这项研究的首席科学家Steven M. Frank博士说：“输血不像人们所想的那么安全”
chinese.english: The resulting overuse of blood is problematic,the researchers say, because blood is a scarce and expensive resource and because recent studies have shown that surgical patients do no better, and maydo worse, if given transfusions prematurely or unnecessarily. "Transfusion is not as safe as people think," says Steven M. Frank, M.D., leader of the study described in the journal Anesthesiology.

chinese.chinese: Frank说，术中何时对患者输血是由医生和麻醉医生共同决定的，但是麻醉医生的责任是管理这些血液。对于何时有必要输血，医生和麻醉医生可能有不同的观点。他说，应该在术前就讨论好关于开始输血的水平位点的问题，因为术中再讨论就来不及了。
chinese.english: The decision about when to give a blood transfusion during surgery is made jointly by the surgeon and the anesthesiologist, but itis the responsibility of the anesthesiologist to administer the blood, Franksays. The surgeon and the anesthesiologist may have different opinions aboutwhen a transfusion is necessary. Discussions about transfusion trigger points would ideally be made before surgery, since it is too late to be making decisions when the surgery is under way, he says.

chinese.chinese: 研究人员将小鼠分为四组：对照组；经受爆炸但不给予药物治疗组；给予药物治疗但不经受爆炸组；经受爆炸并在一小时内给予药物治疗，随后七天持续给药组。在爆炸前麻醉小鼠。
chinese.english: The researchers divided their mice into four groups: a control group; a second group that was exposed to the blast without medication; a third group that received the medication but was not exposed to the blast; and a fourth group, exposed to the explosion but given the medication within an hour after the blast and continuing for seven days afterwards. The mice were placed under anaesthesia before the explosion.

chinese.chinese: 该研究由美国费城托马斯杰弗逊大学杰弗逊医学院的Jianzhong Sun教授（医学博士、哲学博士）、主治***及教授领导，于6月10日星期日在巴黎欧洲麻醉医学大会上发表。
chinese.english: The study, conducted by Professor Jianzhong Sun (M.D., Ph.D.), professor and attending anesthesiologist at Jefferson Medical College, Thomas Jefferson University, Philadelphia, US, was presented Sunday June 10th at the European Anesthesiology Congress in Paris.

chinese.chinese: 动物内脆弱类杆菌不表达PSA，螺旋菌集落生长导致结肠炎。受肝原螺旋杆菌属致病菌感染的小鼠应用脆弱类杆菌活性PSA联合白细胞介素-10抗体后也患有结肠炎。
chinese.english: In animals harboring B fragilis not expressing PSA,Hhepaticus colonization led to colitis. Also, mice given PSA-active Bfragilis incombination with an antibody that blocked interleukin 10 came down with colitis when they were exposed to H hepaticus.

chinese.chinese: 据一项新的研究(Mazmanian SK et al. Nature. 2008;453[7195]:620-624).，帕萨迪纳加州理工学院和波土顿哈佛大学医学院的科学家发现一种称作多糖体-A或PSA的糖类物质，由肠道共生菌脆弱类杆菌产生。这种糖类物质可保护受肝原螺旋杆菌属致病菌感染的小鼠不患克隆病 和溃疡性结肠炎相似的症状。
chinese.english: according to a new study (Mazmanian SK et al. Nature. 2008;453[7195]:620-624). Scientists at the California Institute of Technology in Pasadena and Harvard Medical School in Boston discovered that a sugar called polysaccharide A, or PSA, produced by the symbiotic gut bacterium Bacteroides fragilis, protects mice from developing a disorder similar to Crohn disease and ulcerative colitis that occurs following exposure to the pathogenic bacterium Helicobacter hepaticus.

chinese.chinese: 关于不良反应，数据升级后包括最普遍的按器官系统分类（N=115，混合分析）的不良反应报告（占全部≥ 5%）。在急性淋巴细胞白血病或急性髓性白血病患者中出现的发生率在1%到4%的不常见的不良反应被加到说明书中。包括盲肠炎和前列腺炎，高胆红素血症，过敏，细菌感染，菌血症，真菌感染，败血症，病毒感染，肺炎，窦炎，血肌酐升高，精神状态改变和肺水肿。
chinese.english: For adverse reactions, data have been updated to include the most commonly reported (≥ 5% overall) adverse events by organ system class (N = 115; pooled analysis). The least common adverse reactions in 1% to 4% of patients with acute lymphoblastic leukemia or acute myelogenous leukemia were added, including cecitis and pancreatitis; hyperbilirubinemia; hypersensitivity; bacterial infection; bacteremia; fungal infection; sepsis; virus infection; pneumonia; sinusitis; increased blood creatinine levels; mental status change; and pulmonary edema.

chinese.chinese: “对严重的胶原性结肠炎患者，”他总结说，“布地奈德可以作为一种有效的治疗选择推荐给他们。”
chinese.english: "For patients with severe collagenous colitis," he concluded, "budesonide can be recommended as an effective treatment option."

chinese.chinese: “这项研究证实了我们之前的发现……口服布地奈德治疗胶原性结肠炎患者是有效的，”首席研究者Ole K. Bonderup博士向路透社健康新闻表示，“这项研究还显示，布地奈德对这种疾病的维持治疗是有效的。”
chinese.english: "The study confirms our previous findings... that oral budesonide is effective in treatment of patients with collagenous colitis," lead investigator Dr. Ole K. Bonderup told Reuters Health. "In this study it was also shown that budesonide is effective in maintenance treatment of the disease."

chinese.chinese: 布地奈德对结肠炎维持治疗效果显著
chinese.english: Budesonide Effective for Colitis Maintenance Therapy

chinese.chinese: FDA批准一种用于预防婴幼儿胃肠炎的新疫苗
chinese.english: Rotarix is manufactured by GlaxoSmithKline Biologicals, Rixensart, Belgium.

chinese.chinese: 主要的诊治包括(1)轻微伤；(2)上呼吸道感染；(3)高血压；(4)皮炎；和(5)肠炎。
chinese.english: Primary diagnoses included: (1) minor injuries; (2) upper airway infection; (3) hypertension; (4) dermatitis; and (5) gastroenteritis.

chinese.chinese: 结果：9例患者植入了直型人工血管，4例为分叉型，无病例中途转开腹手术。中位手术时间为260分钟（180-355分钟）。总的中位主动脉阻断时间为77分钟（36-105分钟），中位肾上主动脉阻断时间为24分钟（9-37分钟）。平均失血量855毫升（215-2100ml）。无病例死亡。1例术后凝血功能障碍而出现出血症状。5例出现了中度的全身性并发症，包括4例无需透析的肾功能不全和1例1级的缺血性结肠炎。1天后进液体食物（1-7天），大部分病人第3天下床活动（2-17天），在ICU的中位时间为48小时（12-336小时），平均住院时间10天（4-30天）。平均随访19月（1-36月），所有病人均完全康复并没有移植物异常。
chinese.english: We implanted tube grafts in nine patients and bifurcated grafts in four. No conversions to open repair were required. Median operative time was 260 minutes (range, 180-355 minutes). Total median aortic clamping time was 77 minutes (range, 36-105 minutes). Median suprarenal clamping time was 24 minutes (range, 9-37 minutes). Median blood loss was 855 mL (range, 215-2100 mL). No patients died. One patient had a postoperative coagulopathy with hemorrhagic syndrome. Five patients had moderate systemic complications, including four renal insufficiencies without dialysis and one grade I ischemic colitis. Liquid diet was reintroduced after 1 day (range, 1-7 days). Most patients were ambulatory by day 3 (range, 2-17 days). Median lengths of stay were 48 hours (range, 12-336 hours) in the intensive care unit and 10 days (range, 4-30 days) in the hospital. With a median follow-up of 19 months (range, 1-36 months), patients had complete recovery without graft anomalies.

chinese.chinese: 传统意义上，小肠炎症细菌过度生长(SIBO)发病是以腹泻，腹胀，且有时候吸收不良。定义为小肠内大于105菌落形成单位(微)。这种条件具有代表性地小肠功能已经确定性的改变被诊断为SIBO的先兆（例如，切除瓣膜，小肠运动减弱和可能的胃酸过少）。然而最近，一关于炎症小肠综合症(IBS)对临床计划提出严峻的挑战，重视诊断此病的检查的安全性和争论抗菌素治疗易感SIBO的群体。
chinese.english: Traditionally, small intestinal bacterial overgrowth (SIBO) has been characterised by symptoms of diarrhoea, bloating and sometimes signs of malabsorption. It has been defined as >105 colony-forming units (cfu)/ml of bacteria in aspirates obtained from the small intestine.1 This condition has typically been diagnosed in patients with readily identifiable alterations in small bowel function which predispose patients to SIBO (eg, resected ileocaecal valve, small intestinal hypomotility and possibly hypochlorhydria). Recently, however, this clinical paradigm has been challenged by new theories about the aetiology of irritable bowel syndrome (IBS) and has led to renewed scrutiny of the tests employed to diagnose this condition and controversy concerning the use of antibiotics to treat IBS for suspected SIBO.

chinese.chinese: 结果：149名患者被确诊为IBD和CRC（溃疡性结肠炎89例，克罗恩病59例和不明原因肠病1例）。把诊断时间做为入组时间，在8年或15年的监测开始前，22％的患者发展成肿瘤；而对于推荐10年或20年后进行监测的广泛性或左半结肠炎患者，28%发展为肿瘤。利用出现症状做为时间间隔的开始，17－22％的患者在开始监测前发展成肿瘤。
chinese.english: Results: 149 patients were identified with confirmed diagnoses of IBD and CRC (ulcerative colitis n = 89/Crohn's disease n = 59/indeterminate colitis n = 1). Taking date of diagnosis as the entry point, 22% of patients developed cancer before the 8 or 15 year starting points of surveillance, and 28% if surveillance was commenced 10 or 20 years after diagnosis for extensive or left-sided disease, respectively. Using onset of symptoms to calculate the time interval, 17–22% of patients would present with cancer prior to the surveillance starting points.

chinese.chinese: 定期进行结肠镜成像，如果必要的话进行相应的治疗，可以降低溃疡性结肠炎病人的结肠癌发病率。与此相似的时候，经常使用抗炎症药物，例如阿司匹林，布洛芬也可以降低结肠癌发病率。但是如果发现假性息肉的话，结肠癌发病率增高。
chinese.english: By contrast, the presence of "pseudopolyps" in the colon seems to raise the risk of cancer.

chinese.chinese: “随着放射性直肠炎危险因素、诊断治疗的可用信息越来越多，临床医生和患者将能更好地解释症状，也为患者提供了更多的数据以建立更加完善的治疗方案。”
chinese.english: "As more information becomes available regarding risk factors, diagnosis, and treatments for radiation proctopathy, clinicians and patients will be better prepared to interpret symptoms and provide their patients with more evidence-based data to make more informed treatment decisions."

chinese.chinese: 美国科学家指出，治疗前列腺癌的临床医生应当考虑放射性直肠炎的可能，特别是放射治疗剂量递增时，并呼吁加强研究以助指导临床治疗。
chinese.english: Clinicians treating prostate cancer should consider the possibility of radiation proctopathy, especially when using dose escalation, say US scientists who call for more studies to help guide management decisions.

chinese.chinese: 另外2例患者结肠癌性结肠造口术和1例患者因溃疡性结肠炎行回肠造口术治疗后出现了与首例相似的临床症状和组织学检查相似的造口旁溃疡。这3例患者于出现临床症状前6到60个月开始服用尼可地尔。
chinese.english: An additional two patients with colostomies after surgery for colon cancer and one patient with an ileostomy for the treatment of ulcerative colitis had clinically similar symptoms and histologically similar parastomal ulcerations to the index case. These three patients had been started on nicorandil 6 to 60 months prior to symptom onset.

chinese.chinese: II期临床研究即在女性腹腔镜子宫切除手术中采取随机、双盲、安慰剂对照法，静脉给药（CR845，0.04mg/kg）。美国22个试验点，共计203例患者分为四组进行此项研究：1）手术前后均给药（CR845）；2）术前给药(CR845)；3）术后给药(CR845)；4）手术前后给予安慰剂。手术前后均给药（CR845）的用药组相比于安慰剂组，在术后24小时内麻醉剂用量方面的主要疗效指标显著降低（~33%，p<0.05）。该用药组24小时内疼痛强度差（0-24）（p=0.002）以及疼痛强度差异之和（0-24）（p=0.003）约为安慰组的两倍（~100%）。术后给药组24小时内疼痛强度差异之和（0-24）（p=0.014）相比于安慰剂组增加逾50%，该用药组24小时内止痛效果显著。所有用药患者对该药物的整体评价表明，GR845有显著的止痛效果（p=0.006）。手术前后均给药的用药组有80%患者对CR845的评价为良好至优秀。术前和/或术后用药患者用药安全且耐受性良好。该药物的不良反应多为常见的阿片类药物副作用如恶心、呕吐、瘙痒等，且发生率较低。重要的是，CR845没有产生任何类似中枢Kappa受体激动剂的中枢神经系统影响。
chinese.english: The Phase II study was a double-randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled study of intravenous CR845 (0.04mg/kg/dose) in women undergoing a laparoscopic hysterectomy. The trial was conducted at 22 sites across the U.S., and enrolled 203 patients who were randomized into four treatment arms: (1) both a pre-and a post-operative dose of CR845; (2) a single pre-operative dose of CR845; (3) a single post-operative dose of CR845; and (4) both pre- and post-operative placebo. Patients receiving both a pre- and post-operative dose of CR845 achieved the study's primary endpoint by exhibiting a statistically significant reduction (~33%, p<0.05) of morphine use over 24 hours compared to the placebo group. This patient group also exhibited an approximately two-fold (~100%) increase in their calculated 24 hour PID(0-24) (p=0.002) and SPID(0-24) (p=0.003) values compared to placebo-treated subjects. Significant 24-hour analgesic effects were also seen in patients receiving a single post-operati

chinese.chinese: .因肝癌接受外科手术的患者通常需要卧床休息限制活动，以预防内出血。有些患者同时需要使用麻醉镇痛药物，这会加重胃肠道胀气、上腹部满胀及上腹痛等症状。这将导致胃肠道功能恢复不良从而延长住院时间，增加院内感染风险或其它并发症。
chinese.english: Patients undergoingsurgery for liver cancer typically require bed rest and restricted ambulationto prevent internal bleeding. They may also require narcotic analgesics, whichcan increase symptoms of intestinal gas, abdominal distension, and abdominalpain. The resulting delay in return to normal bowel function can increasehospital stays, which adds to the risk for hospital-acquired infections orcomplications, the authors write

chinese.chinese: 据疾病预防控制中心统计，2009年，阿片或麻醉类药物止痛，总的用药过量死亡的人数达到15597，而当年所有因药物过量使用致死的总人数为37004。
chinese.english: Overall overdose deaths from opioid or narcotic pain relievers amounted to 15,597 in 2009, while the total number that year for all drug overdoses was 37,004, according to the CDC.

chinese.chinese: 该研究是在科学硕士、医学博士、麻醉医生Frederic T. (Josh) Billings IV的带领下完成的。该研究跟踪调查了范德堡大学医院和波斯顿Brigham医院和波斯顿女子医院的455名心脏手术患者。研究发现：25%的患者在心脏手术后出现了急性肾损伤。
chinese.english: The study, led by anesthesiologist Frederic T. (Josh) Billings IV, M.D., M.Sc., followed a sample of 455 cardiac surgery patients at Vanderbilt University Hospital and Brigham and Women's Hospital in Boston. Some 25 percent of the patients developed AKI after their procedure.

chinese.chinese: RED-CABG实验是在Mark F Newman博士（北卡罗来纳州德罕的杜克大学）的带领下完成的。该试验将300多个受试点招募的非急救体外循环冠脉搭桥术的具有中度或者高度心血管风险的患者随机分组，在麻醉诱导之前，每组以每分钟0.1 mg/kg的剂量接受7个小时的阿卡地新，或者接受安慰剂。主要终点指标是全因死亡率，非致死性休克率或者术后28天需要机械辅助的严重左心室功能障碍发生率。该实验原计划在7500名患者中进行，不过，进行了3080名患者之后，对结果进行分析时发现阿卡地新没有效果，因此试验提前终止。研究结果显示：阿卡地新在提高患者的主要重点指标方面机会渺茫。
chinese.english: RED-CABG, led by Dr Mark F Newman (Duke University, Durham, NC), randomized intermediate- to high-risk patients undergoing nonemergency, on-pump CABG surgery at 300 sites to receive either 0.1 mg/kg of acadesine per minute for seven hours or placebo beginning just before anesthesia induction. The primary end points were all-cause mortality, nonfatal stroke, or need for mechanical support for severe left-ventricular dysfunction within 28 days after surgery. The trial was originally planned for 7500 patients but was stopped with 3080 patients enrolled after a prespecified futility analysis showed the trial had a very slim chance of showing a statistically significant difference in the primary end points.

chinese.chinese: 从病人的故事里我们能得到一些蛛丝马迹。“我曾经听我的病人说他们的药掉进了厕所里”，乔治亚州布福德镇的助理医师Daniel Kane说“实际上我还听过病人说他的药被鹦鹉吃了”。另外一些病人的故事更荒谬更复杂。田纳西州，纳什维尔的精神病学和麻醉学教授Steven D. Passik,博士说道“我的一个吗啡尿检呈阳性的病人声称，他每天早晨为他的父亲准备吗啡片的时候药物经皮肤进入了他自己的体内”。
chinese.english: Some stories aregiveaways. "I've heard patients say that their pills fell into thetoilet," reported Daniel Kane, PA, PsyD, a physician assistant in Buford, Georgia."And I actually had a patient claim that his parrot ate the pills."Some tall tales areequally absurd but more complex. "I had a patient whose urine testedpositive for hydromorphone. When confronted, he claimed that he laid out hisfather's hydromorphone tablets every morning and the medication had beenabsorbed through his skin," recounted Steven D. Passik, PhD, Professor ofPsychiatry and Professor of Anesthesiology, Vanderbilt University School ofMedicine, Nashville, Tennessee.

chinese.chinese: 另外一些病人的故事更荒谬更复杂。田纳西州，纳什维尔的精神病学和麻醉学教授Steven D. Passik,博士说道“我的一个吗啡尿检呈阳性的病人声称，他每天早晨为他的父亲准备吗啡片的时候药物经皮肤进入了他自己的体内”。
chinese.english: Some tall tales areequally absurd but more complex. "I had a patient whose urine testedpositive for hydromorphone. When confronted, he claimed that he laid out hisfather's hydromorphone tablets every morning and the medication had beenabsorbed through his skin," recounted Steven D. Passik, PhD, Professor ofPsychiatry and Professor of Anesthesiology, Vanderbilt University School ofMedicine, Nashville, Tennessee.

chinese.chinese: 为了整个手术过程中可靠和安全的麻醉，需要仔细使用多种药物，并且需要对患者进行密切监控。除非万不得已，麻醉药应该由专业医师使用，使用不当会危及生命。无论使用何种类型的麻醉，例如局麻或全身麻醉，插管和机械辅助通气设备都是必须准备。
chinese.english: To produce a state of prolonged full surgical anaesthesia reliably and safely, careful administration of a variety of drugs and close monitoring of the patient are required. Anaesthesia should be undertaken by non-specialist personnel only as a last resort, because anaesthetic drugs may be fatal if inappropriately used. Irrespective of the type of anaesthesia used (i.e. general or regional), it is essential that facilities for intubation and mechanically assisted ventilation are available.

chinese.chinese: 在吸入麻醉剂时，为了避免缺氧，通常需要同时使用氧气，即使使用空气作为载体。
chinese.english: Oxygen should be added routinely during anaesthesia with inhalation agents, even when air is used as the carrier, to protect against hypoxia.

chinese.chinese: 麻醉史应该仔细考虑，了解以前对氟烷的接触和反应情况（再次接触氟烷极少数病例可能会引起爆发性肝衰竭）。如果没有充分的急救措施应该避免使用氟烷。
chinese.english: Anaesthetic history should be carefully taken to determine previous exposure and previous reactions to halothane (fulminant hepatic failure is a rare complication of re-exposure to halothane); avoid use if adequate resuscitation facilities are not available.

chinese.chinese: 2006年2月10日，FDA曾发布过一份公众健康忠告[sup]3[/sup]提醒注意苯佐卡因喷雾剂临床用于嘴部和喉部局部粘膜麻醉时发生高铁血红蛋白症的风险。同一时间，美国退伍军人卫生管理局（VHA）宣布停止苯佐卡因喷雾剂用于上述用途。发布的公众健康忠告以后，FDA又收到了72份苯佐卡因喷雾剂临床使用相关的高铁血红蛋白症事件报告，包括3例死亡报告，使FDA总共收到了319份这方面的报告。
chinese.english: On February 10, 2006, FDA issued a Public Health Advisory[sup]3[/sup] warning about the risk of methemoglobinemia associated with benzocaine sprays used to locally numb mucous membranes of the mouth and throat for medical procedures. At the same time, the Veterans Health Administration (VHA) announced its decision to stop using benzocaine sprays for these purposes. Since the issuance of the Public Health Advisory in 2006, FDA has received 72 new cases of serious adverse events, including three deaths, associated with methemoglobinemia after the use of benzocaine sprays, bringing the total to 319 cases.

chinese.chinese: 研究人员建立了一种新的全身麻醉下的矫形手术小鼠模型，事先对小鼠采用恐惧制约系统进行训练，然后再考察他们对学习任务的记忆。研究人员发现，异氟醚麻醉的矫形手术和异氟醚麻醉都会导致术后记忆障碍，对需要和不需要海马参与的学习任务记忆都出现了这样的记忆障碍。研究人员又是否了解了其作用机制呢？为了检测是否存在保护性细胞功能可以预防这种记忆缺陷，Vizcaychipi及其同事对麻醉在野生型小鼠和过度表达热休克蛋白72（Hsp72）的转基因小鼠中的效果进行了比较，Hsp72蛋白是一种应激诱导产生的具有多种保护功能的蛋白，在学习和记忆中起着重要的作用。结果发现，这类转基因小鼠大脑中Hsp72蛋白水平是普通小鼠中的10倍左右，经手术或仅单纯麻醉后，过度表达Hsp72蛋白的小鼠中未出现明显记忆障碍。研究人员发现这种作用与海马中活化小胶质细胞（大脑中的免疫细胞）数目减少间并无确切的相关性，说明存在着其它类型的作用机制。
chinese.english: The investigators describe a new mouse model of orthopedic surgery under general anesthesia; they trained the mice beforehand on a fear-conditioning task and tested their memory of the learned task afterward. The authors found that surgery under isoflurane anesthesia, as well as anesthesia alone, resulted in impairment of postoperative memory, both for tasks that required the hippocampus and for those that did not. What did they learn about the mechanism? To test whether a protective cellular function could prevent the memory deficit, Vizcaychipi and colleagues compared the effects of anesthesia in wild-type mice with those in a transgenic line overexpressing heat shock protein 72 (Hsp72), a protein induced during stress that performs numerous cell-protective functions and plays a role in learning and memory. Brain levels of Hsp72 were approximately 10 times higher than normal in this transgenic strain; remarkably, the mice overexpressing Hsp72 showed no evidence of memory impairment a

chinese.chinese: Vizcaychipi等提供了一种术后认知障碍模型，可以灵敏的测定手术和麻醉对认知的影响。他们的研究结果表明大脑的应激反应可以导致记忆障碍。但是，还需要进行进一步的研究去澄清这种损伤的机制以及确定相应治疗的作用靶标。
chinese.english: Vizcaychipi et al. present an animal model for postoperative cognitive dysfunction that is sensitive to the effects of both anesthesia and surgery. Their results implicate stress responses in the brain as modifiers of this memory impairment. Further translational research is needed to clarify mechanisms of impairment and to identify therapeutic targets.

chinese.chinese: “走进医院，你会发现这不是开玩笑”，Peter J. Papadakos博士说，一位麻醉学者，纽约州北部Rochester大学医学中心重症监护主任，描述了他所看见的医护人员以及其他工作人员和他们的移动电话、电脑和iPads形影不离。
chinese.english: Research on the subject is beginning to emerge. A peer-reviewed survey of 439 medical technicians published this year in Perfusion, a journal about cardio-pulmonary bypass surgery, found that 55 percent of technicians who monitor bypass machines acknowledged to researchers that they had talked on cellphones during heart surgery. Half said they had texted while in surgery.

chinese.chinese: 住院治疗时间为期2周。常规治疗包括每周3次在局部麻醉下使用清创手术用手术刀。蛆虫清创术治疗是使用含80个无菌蛆的封闭的敷料（Vitapad, BioMonde实验室）。出院时才用常规的换药方式，并在第30天对患者随访。
chinese.english: Treatment was administered during a 2-week hospital stay. Conventional treatment consisted of surgical debridement 3 times a week with a scalpel, with use of topical anesthesia. The MDT was administered using an enclosed dressing (Vitapad, BioMonde Laboratories) containing 80 sterile maggots. At discharge, a conventional dressing was applied, and patients were followed-up at day 30.

chinese.chinese: 贝辛斯托克（英国）和费城（美国）2007年1月16日——Shire制药公司(伦敦证券交易所代码:SHP;纳斯达克交易代码:SHPGY;多伦多证券交易所代码:SHQ)今日宣布，美国FDA已经批准具有MMX技术的LIALDA（美沙拉嗪）用于活动期轻度至中度溃疡性结肠炎的诱导缓解治疗。LIALDA是FDA首个、也是唯一批准的一日一次的口服美沙拉嗪制剂。美沙拉嗪属于氨基水杨酸类药物，含有5-氨基水杨酸（5-ASA），后者是一种常用的、也是治疗轻度至中度溃疡性结肠炎的一线药物。Shire制药公司的LIALDA将于2007年第一季度在美国上市。
chinese.english: Basingstoke, UK and Philadelphia, US ?January 16, 2007 -- Shire plc (LSE: SHP, NASDAQ: SHPGY, TSX: SHQ) announced today that the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has approved LIALDATM(mesalamine) with MMX?technology, indicated for the induction of remission in patients with active, mild to moderate ulcerative colitis. LIALDA is the first and only FDA-approved once-daily oral formulation of mesalamine. Mesalamines are a part of a drug class called aminosalicylates, which contain 5-aminosalicyclic acid (5-ASA), a well-established drug of choice and often a first-line treatment for patients with mild to moderate ulcerative colitis. Shire will launch LIALDA in the U.S. in the first quarter of 2007.

chinese.chinese: 英国科学家发现了治疗肠炎的新途径。
chinese.english: British scientists have found a new way for treatment of inflammatory bowel disease (IBD).

chinese.chinese: 在每个试验中，364个活动性溃疡性结肠炎患者对至少一种标准治疗无反应，包括皮质激素、免疫抑制剂或5-ASAs-。ACT 1和 2的病人均为有证据证实的中到重度溃疡性结肠炎（Mayo总分在6-12分，内镜分?2）。在这两个试验中，患者被随机分为3组，持续常规治疗+安慰剂注射，持续常规治疗+英夫利昔单抗5 mg/kg注射，持续常规治疗+英夫利昔单抗10mg/kg注射。ACT1试验中，患者接受注射为0，2，6周，此后为每8周一次，疗程总共46周，54周进行最后评价。ACT2试验的患者接受注射为0，2，6周，此后为每8周一次，疗程共22周，30周进行最后评价。
chinese.english: In each trial, 364 patients with active UC who were unresponsive to at least one standard therapy- including corticosteroids, immunosuppressants or 5-ASAs- were enrolled. Patients in ACT 1 and ACT 2 had evidence of moderate or severe UC (total Mayo score of 6 to 12 and an endoscopy score ?2). In both trials, patients were randomized to one of three groups: continued conventional therapy plus placebo infusions, continued conventional therapy plus REMICADE 5 mg/kg infusions or continued conventional therapy plus REMICADE 10 mg/kg infusions. ACT 1 patients received the study agent at weeks 0, 2 and 6 and then every 8 weeks through week 46 and had their last evaluations at week 54. ACT 2 patients received the study agent at weeks 0, 2 and 6 and then every 8 weeks through week 22 and had their last evaluations at week 30.

chinese.chinese: 综合有效溃疡性结肠炎试验1和2的长期数据提示，英夫利昔单抗治疗组在30周需住院应用高剂量皮质激素治疗的例数较安慰剂组少。在484个英夫利昔单抗治疗的患者中，有13个住院，而安慰剂组244个患者有19个住院（P=0.025）。
chinese.english: Combined long-term data from ACT 1 and ACT 2 indicate that at week 30, patients who were treated with REMICADE experienced fewer hospitalizations requiring high-dose corticosteroids than those treated with placebo. Among 484 REMICADE-treated patients, there were 13 hospitalizations. Among 244 patients in the placebo group there were 19 hospitalizations (P = 0.025).

chinese.chinese: 芝加哥大学医院营养和胃肠病学部主任，医学和临床药理学教授，Stephen Hanauer博士说：“严重溃疡性结肠炎是一种高花费的疾病，经常需要延长住院时间和手术。分析的结果提示，英夫利昔单抗无效的患者很可能更多的住院。”
chinese.english: "Severe ulcerative colitis is a disease characterized by high costs, as it often results in extended hospitalizations and surgery," said Stephen Hanauer, M.D., Professor of Medicine and Clinical Pharmacology; Chief, section of Gastroenterology and Nutrition at the University of Chicago Hospitals. "Results from this analysis suggest that patients who did not respond to REMICADE were more likely to be hospitalized than patients who responded."

chinese.chinese: 根据在胃肠病学会议美国学院公布的一项三期临床试验（有效溃疡性结肠炎试验1，ACT 1）的长期数据分析，英夫利昔单抗与对照安慰剂相比，平均可以减少50％的溃疡性结肠炎的住院病人。1年缓解的和有效的病人住院的较少（无住院），一年治疗无效者有23％的住院率。
chinese.english: Patients with ulcerative colitis (UC) treated with REMICADE?(infliximab) had an approximate 50 percent reduction in mean number of hospitalizations per year compared with placebo, according to an analysis of long-term data from a Phase 3 clinical trial (Active Ulcerative Colitis Trial 1, ACT 1) presented at the American College of Gastroenterology (ACG) meeting. Patients who responded and those who were in remission at one year had lower mean number of hospitalizations (no hospitalizations) vs. non-responders (23 per 100 patients, P <0.001) through one year of treatment.

chinese.chinese: 数据显示应用英夫利昔单抗即抗肿瘤坏死因子(TNF)-α单克隆抗体治疗溃疡性结肠炎可较少一半的住院病人
chinese.english: Data show treatment with Remicade reduced hospitalizations for ulcerative colitis patients by half

chinese.chinese: 凡是影响一个或更多椎骨连结，(脊)椎关节的关节炎都显示出一组紧密相关的症状，包括强制性脊柱炎，银屑病关节炎和肠炎引起的关节炎．除去慢性炎症，当异常软骨和骨形成时，这些疾病都很表现出关节强直，四肢强直，脊柱和周围关节融合．引起关节强直的诱因还未找出．关节强硬性脊椎炎和慢性椎关节破坏会引起疼痛，当前抑制肿瘤坏死因子是控制它们引起疼痛症状最有效的治疗． 为了回答解决这个问题，由Frank P. Luyten 博士领导的四组研究员在动物关节炎模型上检测了依那西普的效果．Frank P. Luyten 博士在比利时列弗大学医院风湿病区就职．依那西普是一种已经证实的肿瘤坏死因子受体．他们的发现在2007年二月刊的《关节炎和风湿病》(http://www.interscience.wiley.com/journal/arthritis)上发表．当了解关节强硬性脊椎炎发病过程中，研究怀疑使用抗肿瘤坏死策略预防关节和脊柱关节强直的可行性．有特发关节炎的雄性小鼠样本关在一起，从十周开始观察．在十二周到二十五周期间，小鼠每周接受两次依那西普或安慰剂治疗，依那西普剂量与人类患者标准剂量相当．小鼠每周两次进行关节炎记分评估，记分根据关节炎体征，例如软骨结构，骨结构以及关节强直．小鼠在第二十五周处死，解剖，并分析．通过细胞种群染色来测定肿瘤坏死因子的存在情况．
chinese.english: Any form of arthritis that affects one or more vertebral joints, spondylarthritis (SpA) represents a group of closely related disorders, including ankylosing spondylitis (AS), psoriatic arthritis (PsA), and arthritis associated with inflammatory bowel disease. Aside from chronic inflammation, these conditions are all characterized by ankylosis, stiffness and fusion of bone in the spine and peripheral joints, provoked by abnormal cartilage and bone formation. What triggers ankylosis remains unknown. Currently, inhibition of tumor necrosis factor ?(TNF?) is the most effective strategy for controlling the painful symptoms of SpA and slowing vertebral joint destruction. But does anti-TNF therapy do anything to reduce the incidence or severity of ankylosis?To answer this critical question, a quartet of researchers led by Dr. Frank P. Luyten, Division of Rheumatology, University Hospitals, Leuven, Belgium, tested the effectiveness of etanercept, an established TNF receptor, on animal models

chinese.chinese: 来自英国南安普顿大学Rona Moss-Morris教授及其同事就胃肠炎后心理因素对导致IBS影响进行研究。
chinese.english: Dr. Rona Moss-Morris, from the University of Southampton in the UK, and colleagues looked at the impact of psychological factors on the risk of IBS following an episode of gastroenteritis.

chinese.chinese: 难辨梭状芽胞杆菌的某些菌株产生的毒素可侵袭结肠细胞，那些菌株一旦进入了正在服用抗生素患者的胃肠道，便能引起从轻微腹泻到严重结肠炎的各种症状。尽管抗生素杀死了多种有害菌，但是它们也能清除大肠内抑制难辨梭状芽胞杆菌的有益菌。
chinese.english: Certain strains of C. difficile produce toxins that attack the cells lining the colon. Those strains can cause symptoms ranging from mild diarrhea to severe colitis if they enter the gastrointestinal tract of a person who is taking antibiotics. Although antibiotics kill off many types of harmful bacteria, they can also wipe out the good bugs in the large intestine that keep C. difficile in check.

chinese.chinese: 方法：343名有轻中度活动期溃疡性结肠炎的患者接受MMX美沙拉嗪2.4g/天或4.8g/天，一日一次；ASACOL2.4g/天，分三次给药；或者安慰剂，治疗8周。
chinese.english: METHODS: Three hundred forty-three patients with active, mild-to-moderate ulcerative colitis received MMX mesalamine 2.4 g/day or 4.8 g/day given once daily, ASACOL 2.4 g/day given in 3 divided doses, or placebo for 8 weeks.

chinese.chinese: 结论：检测患者肿瘤形成的第一代窄带成像技术的诊断敏感性与常规结肠镜具有可比性，即使该技术发现较多肿瘤可疑区。我们相信对长期溃疡性结肠炎患者行结肠镜检查停止附加的随机活检还为时过早。
chinese.english: CONCLUSIONS: The sensitivity of the studied first-generation NBI system for the detection of patients with neoplasia seems to be comparable to conventional colonoscopy, although more suspicious lesions were found during NBI. We believe that it is still too early to stop taking additional random biopsies at surveillance colonoscopy in patients with ulcerative colitis.

chinese.chinese: 摘要：研究背景与目的：长期溃疡性结肠炎患者有较高罹患结肠癌风险。一般推荐定期结肠镜检查，但常规结肠镜检出肿瘤困难。窄带成像(NBI)为检测的新技术，本研究目的是比较该技术与常规结肠镜对长期溃疡性结肠炎患者检出肿瘤的准确性。
chinese.english: Abstract: BACKGROUND AND STUDY AIM: Patients with longstanding ulcerative colitis are at increased risk of developing colorectal cancer. Colonoscopic surveillance is advised, but the detection of neoplasia by conventional colonoscopy is difficult. The aim of this study was to compare the accuracy of narrow-band imaging (NBI), a new imaging technique, with standard colonoscopy for the detection of neoplasia in patients with longstanding ulcerative colitis.

chinese.chinese: 尽管大多数病人主诉无结肠病史，但我们发现合并结肠炎患者与总人群相比此病的发病率明显升高，分别为14%和0 .15% .
chinese.english: Although the colon was histologically normal in most cases, there was a significantly higher proportion of collagenous colitis in patients with cat scratch colon compared with the total cohort (14% vs. 0.15%).

chinese.chinese: 结果：各组的基线特征都没有显著性差异。各组之间呼吸窘迫综合症，抗利尿素治疗的需要，坏死性小肠结肠炎，早产儿视网膜病，动脉导管未闭，新生儿脓毒症以及新生儿死亡率都没有显著性差异。
chinese.english: baseline characteristics. The rate of respiratory distress syndrome, need for vasopressor therapy, necrotizing enterocolitis, retinopathy of prematurity, patent ductus arteriosus, neonatal sepsis, and neonatal mortality were not significant different between the groups.

chinese.chinese: 两组患者的疼痛评分相似且为轻度，虽然与常规治疗相比，蛆虫清创术没有使用局部麻醉。
chinese.english: Pain scores were similar and mild in both groups, although in contrast to conventional treatment, MDT was performed without topical anesthesia.

chinese.chinese: 发现相关危险因素有年龄，中风严重程度，感染，麻醉剂，缺氧和认知障碍能帮助医生识别谵妄先期症状并及早采取措施。
chinese.english: Recognizing the associated risk factors such as age, severity of stroke, infections, narcotic use, lack of oxygen and cognitive impairment can help clinicians identify initial signs of delirium and use early interventions.

chinese.chinese: 另17名患者接受干细胞治疗，在局部麻醉下进行微创活检。将导管通过颈静脉插入心脏，并取出一小块心脏组织，大小约为葡萄干大小的一半。活检的心脏组织被送往Marbán的专业实验室，并使用他发明的方法培养心肌细胞。
chinese.english: The other 17 patients who were randomized to receive the stem cells underwent a minimally invasive biopsy, under local anesthesia. Using a catheter inserted through a vein in the patient's neck, doctors removed small pieces of heart tissue, about half the size of a raisin. The biopsied heart tissue was then taken to Marbán's specialized lab at Ced ars-Sinai, using methods he invented to culture and multiply the cells.

chinese.chinese: 正常起作用的药片应该含有10毫克的麻醉止痛药二氢可待因酮和500毫克的对乙酰氨基酚，即常用止痛药（如泰诺）的有效成分。
chinese.english: The affected pills were supposed to contain 10 milligrams of hydrocodone, a narcotic painkiller, and 500 mg of acetaminophen, the active ingredient in common pain products such as Tylenol.

chinese.chinese: 1812年发行的内外科新英格兰杂志第一册和科学杂志的副刊都指出在麻醉术和抗菌术出现之前外科医生面临着很多制约，病人需要勇气去接受手术。马萨诸塞州综合医院的外科医生约翰科林斯·沃伦（他的父亲是哈佛医学院的创始人之一）在当年四月份那期杂志上发表一篇介绍白内障治疗的新方法的文章。那时，治疗白内障的普遍方法是“针拨白内障”，其具体过程就是向眼眶中插入一根弯曲的针将视线中浑浊的晶状体向后向外拨开。沃伦两个病人共经历了六次尝试都没有成功并且现已致盲。沃伦进行了更激进的和侵入性更强的手术——切除了左侧白内障。他详述了这种手术，并且在哈佛医学院的学生之前完成了这种手术，具体如下：
chinese.english: The first volume of the New England Journal of Medicine and Surgery, and the Collateral Branches of Science, published in 1812, gives a sense of the constraints faced by surgeons, and the mettle required of patients, in the era before anesthesia and antisepsis. In the April issue for that year, John Collins Warren, surgeon at the Massachusetts General Hospital and son of one of the founders of Harvard Medical School, published a case report describing a new approach to the treatment of cataracts.1 Until that time, the prevalent method of cataract treatment was “couching,” a procedure that involved inserting a curved needle into the orbit and using it to push the clouded lens back and out of the line of sight.2Warren's patient had undergone six such attempts without lasting success and was now blind. Warren undertook a more radical and invasive procedure — actual removal of the left cataract. He described the operation, performed before the students of Harvard Medical School, as follo

chinese.chinese: 事情的转机是1846年11月18日亨利雅各布·比奇洛发表的突破性的文章，这一刻所发生的改变不仅仅代表着外科学的未来而是整个医学界的未来。他指出“通过吸入剂可以是患者在手术时进入无意识状态。”这个独创性的观点立即解决了一个重大问题“医学界长期以来存在的一个大问题就是找出能缓解手术中疼痛的方法。而能解决这个问题的有效药物终于被发现了。” 比奇洛说到，一个叫做威廉莫尔顿波士顿牙医在马萨诸塞州综合医院对他的几个病人进行手术的时候使用了一种他称之为“Letheon”气体，并且成功地使他们免除了疼痛。莫尔顿也获得了这种气体制作的专利权并且对外科医生也保密。然而，比奇洛透露，在这种气体里他可以闻到乙醚的味道。这个消息震惊了全世界。收费的编辑版面几个月内被大量的信件所占据，这些信件全是对比洛奇揭发莫尔顿秘密的反诉以及对这个发现这个秘密的诚信方面的质疑。同时，乙醚麻醉是外科学发生革命性变化。 “如何使用乙醚？”“何种情况可以尝试使用它？”甚至于像“乙醚听起来像什么？”
chinese.english: The crucial spark of transformation  the moment that changed not just the future of surgery but of medicine as a whole was the publication on November 18, 1846, of Henry Jacob Bigelow's groundbreaking report, “Insensibility during Surgical Operations Produced by Inhalation”. The opening sentences crisply summarized the achievement: “It has long been an important problem in medical science to devise some method of mitigating the pain of surgical operations. An efficient agent for this purpose has at length been discovered.” Bigelow described how William Morton, a Boston dentist, had administered to his own patients, and then to several more who had undergone surgery at the Massachusetts General Hospital, a gas he called “Letheon,” which successfully rendered them insensible to pain. Morton had patented the composition of the gas and kept it a secret even from the surgeons. Bigelow revealed, however, that he could smell ether in it. The news burst across the world. The Letters to the E

chinese.chinese: 由于患者无法忍受剧烈的疼痛，医生们被迫缩短手术的时间。无论是皮瓣术式还是循环术式，截肢都可以在一分钟之内完成，可是由经验不足的医生来操作的话，结扎残肢的血管以及缝合肌肉和皮肤有时却会用20到30分钟的时间。无论截肢手术进行的有多么快，都会给病人带来极大的痛苦。这种感觉很难用语言来形容。在这些患者中有一个乔治威尔逊教授，1843年的时候他接受了踝关节离断截肢术。手术是大名名鼎鼎的外科医生杰姆斯赛姆本人主刀的。四年之后，当麻醉药的反对者试图将麻醉药视为“不必要的奢侈品”的时候，威尔逊教授不得不站出来，写下他自己的亲身经历：
chinese.english: The limits of patients' tolerance for pain forced surgeons to choose slashing speed over precision. With either the flap method or the circular method, amputation could be accomplished in less than a minute, though the subsequent ligation of the severed blood vessels and suturing of the muscle and skin over the stump sometimes required 20 or 30 minutes when performed by less experienced surgeons.9 No matter how swiftly the amputation was performed, however, the suffering that patients experienced was terrible. Few were able to put it into words. Among those who did was Professor George Wilson. In 1843, he underwent a Syme amputation — ankle disarticulation — performed by the great surgeon James Syme himself. Four years later, when opponents of anesthetic agents attempted to dismiss them as “needless luxuries,” Wilson felt obliged to pen a description of his experience:
