chinese.english: The report notes that industry associations are looking at developing best practices for how smartphones should be used — the American Academy of Nurse Anesthetists drafted a position statement in June.

chinese.chinese: 尽管如此，在接受了EBUSTBNA的患者中，只有0.53%的人出现过气胸，1.06%的人需要升级他们的护理等级。护理升级与患者年龄超过70岁（比值比= 4.06）、正在住院（OR= 4.93），以及需要深度镇静或全身麻醉（OR= 4.68）明显相关。
chinese.english: Nevertheless, just 0.53% of patients experienced pneumothorax and 1.06% of patients required escalation in their level of care. Escalation was significantly associated with age over 70 years (OR=4.06), inpatient status (OR=4.93), and requirement of deep sedation or general anesthesia (OR=4.68)

chinese.chinese: 设置：大学医院的麻醉学和危重互利神经外科病房。
chinese.english: Setting: Anesthesiology and Critical Care Neurosurgical Unit of a university hospital.

chinese.chinese: Todd A. Miano，药学博士。曾工作于维克森林大学Baptist医学中心，现在美国宾夕法尼亚大学医院工作，是研究的主要作者。共同作者全部来自于美国威克森林大学医学院，包括麻醉科Timothy T. Houle，药学博士，Drew A. MacGregor，医学博士，以及心胸外科Edward H. Kincaid，药学博士。
chinese.english: Todd A. Miano, Pharm.D., formerly of Wake Forest University Baptist Medical Center and now with the Hospital of the University of Pennsylvania, is the study's lead author. Co-authors, all from Wake Forest University School of Medicine, are Timothy T. Houle, Ph.D., and Drew A. MacGregor, M.D., of the Department of Anesthesiology; and Edward H. Kincaid, M.D., of the Department of Cardiothoracic Surgery.

chinese.chinese: 苏灵顿说药物不能够改变麻醉作用，但是确实改善了阿片类的副作用。另一方面的作用会被证实在癌症进程中非常重要。
chinese.english: Singleton said the drug does not alter the effect of the anesthesia, but it does alter some of the side effects of opiates. "One of the side effects may turn out to be very important in terms of cancer progression," he said.

chinese.chinese: 通常，尿流改道采用回肠膀胱术，其是评价其他尿流改道术的标准术式。可控性尿流改道在技术上更复杂，手术时间较其他非可控性术式更长，但在部分患者中更改善其生活质量。尽管尚缺乏原位新膀胱术与回肠膀胱术对照的随机对照临床试验，一些回顾性病例分析表明总体手术并发症发生率比较两者无显著差异。回肠膀胱术通常适于合并严重并发症与较高手术风险预期寿命短的患者（如大于65岁的患者），而可控性尿流改道术则适于预期寿命较长、能耐受复杂手术的患者。一项比较回肠膀胱术与可控性尿流改道术的多变量回顾性分析表明，美国麻醉医师学会评分是临床中预测主要手术并发症唯一有意义的指标。
chinese.english: The ileal conduit is the urinary diversion done most frequently and is the standard to which other forms of urinary diversion should be compared. The continent diversion is technically complex and needs a longer operative time than does the non-continent type, but it can improve quality of life in some patients. Although no randomised clinical trials comparing the orthotopic neobladder with the ileal conduit have been done, results of several retrospective analyses have not shown substantial differences in overall surgical complication rates. The ileal conduit is often undertaken in elderly patients (eg, over age 65 years) with severe comorbidities and heightened operative risk, whereas the continent diversion is often used in young, healthy patients. In a multivariate retrospective analysis comparing the ileal conduit with continent urinary diversion, investigators noted that a high American Society of Anesthesiologists score was the only clinically significant predictor of early majo

chinese.chinese: 伊利诺斯州芝加哥市的Rush大学医学中心矫形外科麻醉学部主任Askomur Buvanendran表示，该新产品“可满足用于急救疼痛控制的新的非类阿片、非注射的需要，因为该药在提供有效控制中度至中重度疼痛的同时，还可使发生滥用以及与麻醉性止痛剂相关的副作用的可能性降至最低。这种方便使用的喷鼻剂还能提供院外的疼痛治疗。”
chinese.english: The new product "fills the need for a new non-opioid, non-injectable option for ambulatory pain control, because it minimizes the potential for abuse as well as the negative side effects associated with narcotic pain relievers while providing potent control of moderate to moderately severe pain at the opioid level," said Askomur Buvanendran, director of orthopedic anesthesia at Rush University Medical Centers in Chicago, Illinois, in the company release. "The convenient nasal spray formulation will also provide pain relief outside of the hospital setting."

chinese.chinese: 轻度的锻炼对分娩持续的时间和方式没有任何影响，但对阵痛的需要方面却有显著的差别。没有进行的锻炼的孕妇中，三分之二在产程中要求硬膜外麻醉缓解疼痛，但在有氧呼吸组中，仅27%的孕妇需要阵痛剂。
chinese.english: The light aerobic exercise didn't have any effect on the duration or type of delivery the women experienced. But there were dramatic differences in terms of requests for pain relief. Among women who didn't exercise, two out of three women requested epidural pain relief during labor. But among the water aerobics group, only 27 percent of women asked for pain drugs.

chinese.chinese: 研究观察了1784名患有肠炎的患者，发现其中30位患有大肠癌的患者中有25位患者同时患有溃疡性结肠炎。其中有18位患者满足受试者条件，分别匹配了1个或2个病例对照，而另外12位患者因无合适的对照病例则被排除。在这18位患者中，有15位在以前被诊断为溃疡性结肠炎。实验组与对照组的性别、种族、肠炎种类、诊断年龄、病症持续期、家族肠炎病史以及体重指数没有显著差异。
chinese.english: The study looked at 1784 patients with IBD and found 30 patients with colorectal cancer, 25 of whom had ulcerative colitis. Eighteen of these patients were matched with 1 or 2 control subjects, and 12 were not matched to any controls. Of the 18 patients matched, 15 of them were previously diagnosed with ulcerative colitis. There was no significant difference between cases and controls in terms of sex, race, type of IBD, age at diagnosis, disease duration, family history of IBD, and body mass index.

chinese.chinese: 在2007年美国大学胃肠病学科学年会上，一个研究小组指出，用于肠炎患者的药物马沙拉嗪可以显著降低用药患者罹患大肠癌的风险，后续的研究工作正在展开。
chinese.english: Mesalamine use in patients with inflammatory bowel disease (IBD) is associated with a significant risk reduction in colorectal cancer, a single-center study presented here at the American College of Gastroenterology 2007 Annual Scientific Meeting and Postgraduate Course has found.

chinese.chinese: 俄亥俄州克里夫兰诊所的胃肠病学家Carol Burke评论说：“这项研究对临床的潜在影响很大，因为我们都知道对于肠炎患者来说，发育不良的肿瘤是最头疼的事情。虽然目前一些流行病学和病例对照研究指出马沙拉嗪和叶酸酯类物质对于降低肠炎患者罹患大肠癌的风险有较好的效果，但相比叶酸酯类物质，马沙拉嗪对于降低患癌的风险，关系更为密切。”
chinese.english: "The potential clinical implications are great because we know that dysplasia in cancer is a big concern in patients with IBD," commented Carol Burke, MD, a gastroenterologist at the Cleveland Clinic in Ohio, who moderated the session. Although a few epidemiologic and case-control studies have suggested that either mesalamine or folate is effective in reducing the risk of colorectal cancer in patients with IBD, the strength of the association in this study is greater, Dr. Burke said.

chinese.chinese: 美国密西根州底特律市Henry Ford医院内科胃肠病专科的医师Jeffrey Tang向公众展示了他的病例对照回顾性研究，研究包括了从1970年至2005年所有在Henry Ford医院被确诊为肠炎而后发展为大肠癌的病人。研究数据均从图表的分析中得出。
chinese.english: Jeffrey Tang, MD, from the department of internal medicine, division of gastroenterology, at Henry Ford Hospital in Detroit, Michigan, presented the retrospective, case-control study that included all patients previously diagnosed with IBD who subsequently developed colorectal cancer at Henry Ford Hospital between January 1970 and December 2005. Data were obtained through chart review.

chinese.chinese: Index Pharmaceuticals公司总经理Jesper Wiklund说：“我们对compassionate use项目的研究结果感到欣慰，结果显示，Kappaproct可以使大部分对类固醇类激素治疗无效、且拟进行部分结肠切除的溃疡性结肠炎患者获得临床缓解，在长期的研究基础上，该结果为减少结肠切除提供了良好的前景。对于严重溃疡性结肠炎患者来说，他们的医疗需求还远远没有得到满足，Kappaproct也许可以显著改善这些危重患者的生活质量以及寿命”。
chinese.english: "We are very happy about the results from the compassionate use program,” said Jesper Wiklund, CEO of InDex Pharmaceuticals. “They underline the ability of Kappaproct to induce clinical remission in the most severe steroid-refractory UC patients, who have been selected for the surgical removal of parts of their colon. This provides the prospect to reduce the need for colectomy on a long-term basis. For severe ulcerative colitis patients, there is a high unmet medical need, and successful treatment with Kappaproct would dramatically improve the lives and prospects of these critically ill patients.”

chinese.chinese: Kappaproct当前正在欧洲进行多中心III期临床实验，实验名称：COLLECT（NCT01493960），实验专门针对对现有治疗无效的慢性活动性溃疡性结肠炎患者。
chinese.english: Kappaproct is currently in a European multicenter phase III trial called COLLECT (NCT01493960) for the treatment of chronic active UC patients not responding to available therapy. Results are expected for Q1 2014.

chinese.chinese: 他说他们对以下问题特别感兴趣：非西方人为什么不患典型的西方生活方式相关的疾病，这些疾病包括：哮喘、过敏、肥胖症、肠炎。
chinese.english: He said they were particularly interested in how non-Western populations don't suffer from the diseases we typically associate with a Western lifestyle, such as asthma, allergies, obesity, and inflammatory bowel disease.

chinese.chinese: 在调查性治疗的溃疡性结肠炎研究项目中(the Program of Ulcerative Colitis Research Studies Utilizing an Investigational Treatment ,缩写为PURSUIT)，在实验开始时（第0周）接受皮下注射200mgSIMPONI，第二周接受100mgSIMPONI组，或者在实验开始时（第0周）接受400mgSIMPONI，第二周接受200mgSIMPONI组在第二周的主要终点指标已经达到了安慰剂组的水平（三组的临床反应率分别为51.8%,55.0%和29.7%，P值< 0.0001）。第6周的临床反应定义为：至少30%的患者Mayo评分出现下降，与基线分数相比，要下降3分，并且要求直肠出血得分比基线得分下降1分或者直肠出血得分为0或1。Mayo评分是一种总共12分的临床评价指标，依据结肠镜检查对疾病的活动性进行度量。该指标可以根据直肠出血情况、内窥镜结果、排便次数和内科医生的综合评价对症状的好转情况进行评估。
chinese.english: In the Program of Ulcerative Colitis Research Studies Utilizing an Investigational Treatment (PURSUIT) trial, a significantly higher proportion of patients receiving induction treatment with subcutaneous administrations of SIMPONI 200 mg at week 0 and SIMPONI 100 mg at week 2 or SIMPONI 400 mg at week 0 and SIMPONI 200 mg at week 2 met the primary endpoint of clinical response at week 6 compared with the placebo [51.8 percent, 55.0 percent and 29.7 percent of patients achieving clinical response, respectively (P < 0.0001)]. Clinical response at week 6 was defined as a decrease in the Mayo score of at least 30 percent and 3 points compared to baseline score, with either a decrease from baseline in the rectal bleeding subscore of at least 1 or a rectal bleeding subscore of 0 or 1. The Mayo score is a 12-point clinical assessment and colonoscopy-based measure of disease activity, which assesses improvement in symptoms based on rectal bleeding, endoscopic findings, stool frequency and a physician's global assessment.

chinese.chinese: Johan Van Limbergen（英国爱丁堡大学）及其研究小组发现苏格兰儿童IBD的发病率有增长， 研究了90例Crohn’s病、36例为UC（溃疡性结肠炎）和130例未分类IBD的可疑危险因素。
chinese.english: Acknowledging the rising incidence of pediatric IBD in Scotland, Johan Van Limbergen (University of Edinburgh, UK) and team examined potential risk factors in 90 patients with Crohn's disease, 36 with ulcerative colitis (UC), and 130 with IBD unclassified.

chinese.chinese: 在非洲的一些边远地区，婴儿免疫系统破坏肠道的危险性更大。比尔和梅林达?盖茨基金会嘉奖了Wiebel并成立探索大挑战团队，对在野外做简单的细菌检测给与资助。这种细菌检测能够发现坏死性肠炎-是一种在乌干达、卢旺达和肯尼亚非常普遍和致命的感染。
chinese.english: In remote parts of Africa, the risk of the infant's immune system ravagingthe intestines is even greater. The Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation awardedWiebel and team a Grand Challenges Explorations grantto get a simple bacterial test out on the field; one that could detectnecrotizing enterocolitis - a common and often fatal infection in Uganda,Rwanda and Kenya.

chinese.chinese: 在今年上半年Sandborn和他的同事报道了Simponi治疗溃疡性结肠炎有效，并在美国胃肠协会会议上报道了包括研究时程在内的相关数据。
chinese.english: Earlier this year Sandborn and colleagues reported efficacy with golimumab asinduction therapy for ulcerative colitis. Data presented at the ACG meetingencompassed the maintenance phase of the study.

chinese.chinese: 一项随机安慰剂对照试验显示：肿瘤坏死因子（TNF）抑制剂Simponi治疗溃疡性结肠炎显著有效。
chinese.english: Significantly more patientswith ulcerative colitis achieved long-term clinical response with the tumornecrosis factor (TNF) inhibitor golimumab (Simponi), a randomized,placebo-controlled trial showed.

chinese.chinese: 研究者对计数腹泻和结肠炎的严重性的标准测试也进行了评估。经过盲法分析后，服用IAP治疗的小鼠组有更多的改善腹泻个数，与炎症相关的细胞分子白细胞介素-1的水平也比那些没有服用IAP治疗的小鼠高10倍。
chinese.english: Standard tests to score diarrhea and colitis severity were also evaluated. After a blinded analysis, the IAP-treated mice showed more improved diarrheal scores. The levels of IL-1 beta, a cell molecule associated with inflammation, were also10-fold higher in mice without IAP treatment.

chinese.chinese: 14例患者(3.6%)在接受平均14天(范围为8~193天)的抗生素治疗后发生症状性艰难梭菌结肠炎。其中6例(43%)使用万古霉素，2例(14%)使用利福平。
chinese.english: Fourteen patients (3.6%) developed symptomatic CDAD after a median of 14 days of therapy. Of those, 6 (43%) had received vancomycin and 2 (14%) had received rifampin.

chinese.chinese: IBD是一个笼统的名词，其涵盖了一系列严重的肠道疾病，包括克隆氏病以及溃疡性结肠炎。
chinese.english: IBD is a catch-all term for a group of serious intestinal conditions that include Crohn's disease and ulcerative colitis.

chinese.chinese: 一项新的研究表明，妊娠期适度的运动可能显著地降低孕妇在分娩时对硬膜外麻醉的需求。
chinese.english: Moderate exercise during pregnancy appears to markedly lower a woman's need for epidural pain relief when she delivers her baby, a new study suggests.

chinese.chinese: 病人在常规麻醉下接受了血管内修补术。在透视下，胸主动脉支架被置入远侧至左颈动脉处，覆盖了左锁骨下动脉的发起部。最后的血管造影显示，主动脉弓的假性动脉瘤被完全排除在外，没有支架周围泄露，左锁骨下动脉通过同侧椎动脉形成了延迟的侧枝循环。
chinese.english: The patient underwent endovascular repair under general anesthesia. The thoracic aortic stent graft was inserted under fluoroscopic guidance just distal to the left common carotid artery, covering the left subclavian artery origin. The final aortogram revealed the complete exclusion of the aortic arch pseudoaneurysm without endoleak and a delayed revascularization of the left subclavian artery by the omolateral vertebral artery.

chinese.chinese: 缝针的根部接近食管壁，纵隔无炎症表现。我们假设，缝针从食管移位至纵隔，对主动脉壁造成了损伤，导致血管出现了假性动脉瘤的扩张。根据美国麻醉协会的分级标准，该病人处于胸部开放性手术的“3级术前风险”水平。我们想进行胸主动脉内镜置入术来实行一个微创手术，随后使用纵隔镜来移除缝针。超声检查提示，椎动脉、颈动脉和大脑Willis动脉环血流正常，主动脉弓血管造影术显示在左锁骨下动脉后方（<1cm）处形成了假性动脉瘤。
chinese.english: The bottom of the needle was close to the esophageal wall, with no signs of mediastinitis. It was hypothesized that migration of the sewing needle from the esophagus into the mediastinum could have produced a lesion in the aortic wall, resulting in a pseudoaneurysmal dilatation of the vessel.1–3 According to the American Society of Anesthesiologists classification, the patient was considered as a "class 3 preoperative risk" for conventional thoracic open surgery. A less-invasive procedurewas thought to be the implantation of a thoracic aortic endoprosthesis, with subsequent removal of the needle through mediastinoscopy.4 Doppler ultrasound was performed and showed normal blood flow of vertebral, carotid, and Willis arteries, and an aortic arch angiogram demonstrated the pseudoaneurysm arising just behind (<1 cm from) the left subclavian artery (Figure 6).

chinese.chinese: 尚未决定将要使用的麻醉方法。
chinese.english: What method of anesthesia will be used has not been decided.

chinese.chinese: 解释    这项研究并没有呈现出全麻组和局麻组之间确切的差异。因此麻醉师和外科医师必须咨询患者的意见，并根据每个人的特点来决定采用那种麻醉方式。
chinese.english: We have not shown a definite difference in outcomes between general and local anaesthesia for carotid surgery. The anaesthetist and surgeon, in consultation with the patient, should decide which anaesthetic technique to use on an individual basis.

chinese.chinese: 这项研究的负责人是来自荷兰乌德勒支大学医学中心围手术期及急救部的麻醉学专家、加强护理学专家Anne Marie de Smet博士，研究成果刊登在2009年1月1日出版的新英格兰医学杂志上。
chinese.english: The study was the work of first author Dr. Anne Marie de Smet, an anesthesiologist-intensivist at the Division of Perioperative and Emergency Care of the University Medical Center (UMC) Utrecht in The Netherlands, and colleagues, and is published in the 1 January 2009 issue of the New England Journal of Medicine, NEJM.

chinese.chinese: 艾伯利博士说，对医生的业务水平进行评价，其中一个方法就是证实该医生是否获得美国专业委员会认证。要获得专业委员会的认证，住院医师必须完成全部的住院医生培训课程，通过笔试，并根据专业情况，进行口试，并提供证据证明她或他经历了指定的一系列临床问题和专业操作。不过美国麻醉医师学会主席罗杰A.穆尔（Roger A. Moore）博士警告说，“专业委员会认证只是一个证明，但不是保证书。”
chinese.english: One way to help assess the quality of individual physicians is to establish that a doctor is board certified, Dr. Epperly said. To become board certified, doctors must complete a full residency at an accredited training program, pass written and, depending on the specialty, oral examinations, and provide proof that she or he has experience with a defined set of clinical problems and technical procedures. However, cautioned Dr. Roger A. Moore, president of the American Society of Anesthesiologists, “board certification is one indication, but it's certainly no guarantee.”

chinese.chinese: 在神经激肽-1受体（ NK1R ） ，在所有的人类胶质瘤细胞表面可能都有分布。杜克大学麻醉学院和位于杜克的普雷斯顿罗伯特施脑肿瘤中心的研究人员证明这一受体可能是一个治疗脑瘤合适的靶位。
chinese.english: The neurokinin 1 receptor (NK1R), which may be expressed in all human glioblastoma cells, may prove to be an appropriate target for therapies aimed at treating these brain tumors, according to a study led by researchers in the Duke Department of Anesthesiology and the Preston Robert Tisch Brain Tumor Center at Duke.

chinese.chinese: 美国的麻醉师们的职责是：如果异丙酚用于镇定，指导医生应当受过严格的训练，并且不能用于手术和诊断的过程。除此之外，医生应当检查病人服药后的氧饱和度，呼吸，心率，及血压。
chinese.english: That is essentially the position of the American Society of Anesthesiologists, which has stated that: “Whenever propofol is used for sedation; it should be administered only by persons trained in the administration of general anesthesia who are not simultaneously involved in the surgical or diagnostic procedure. In addition, these persons must monitor patients continuously for oxygen saturation, respiration, heart rate and blood pressure.”

chinese.chinese: 对于最敏感部位的脸部，可以给予注射少量的利多卡因麻醉。
chinese.english: Patients are then given tiny injections of lidocaine to additionally numb the most sensitive parts of the face.

chinese.chinese: 这一过程大约需要45至90分钟。病人会在约定时间前一小时到达，在治疗区域使用麻醉霜来浸润麻醉。
chinese.english: The procedure takes about 45 to 90 minutes. Patients will arrive about an hour in advance of their appointment. A topical anesthetic cream is applied to the area being treated and allowed to soak for in for about an hour.

chinese.chinese: Percocet（一种含盐酸羟考酮和醋氨酚制剂的商品名）和其他联合对乙酰氨基酚和较强镇痛麻醉药如羟考酮的相似治疗。
chinese.english: Percocet and similar treatments combine acetaminophen with more powerful pain relieving narcotics, such as oxycodone.

chinese.chinese: 在美国，疼痛治疗不足是一个严重的问题。考虑到美国对麻醉药品控制严格，剧中的医生拒绝为Jackie开她镇痛所需剂量的药物，看起来是真实的。
chinese.english: Undertreatment of pain in the United States is a serious problem. Given how strictly narcotics are controlled here, it's certainly plausible that a doctor would refuse to prescribe the dose of narcotics Jackie needs to relieve her pain.

chinese.chinese: 研究中使用的JITS原型包括一个假人、压力感受性枕头、麻醉面罩、除颤垫片，还有一个显示屏及话筒，用来指导使用者如何操作以及反馈操作效果。操作依据美国心脏协会（AHA）规程制定。
chinese.english: The JITS device prototype used in the study consisted of a dummy "victim," a pressure-sensing headrest, an anesthesia mask, defibrillator pads, and a video screen and speakers that transmit audio and visual cues to tell the user what to do and give him or her feedback about actions taken. The cues were based on American Heart Association protocols.

chinese.chinese: 方法：2002年2月至2007年10月，我们为148例腹主动脉瘤患者行了全腹腔镜下修复术，其中包括13例近肾腹主动脉瘤。其中为年龄70岁（50-81岁），中位瘤体大小55mm（50-88mm）。8例病人被评为美国麻醉医师学会II级，5例为III级。所有病人我们均采用腹腔镜经腹膜左肾后路径和肾动脉上主动脉阻断。
chinese.english: Between February 2002 and October 2007, we performed 148 total laparoscopic AAA repairs, including a subset of 13 patients who underwent a laparoscopic JAAA repair. Median age was 70 years (range, 50-81years). Median aneurysm size was 55 mm (range, 50-80 mm). Eight patients were in American Society of Anesthesiologist class II, and five were in class III. We used laparoscopic transperitoneal left retrorenal approaches and suprarenal clamping in all patients.

chinese.chinese: 美国一项在线发表于GUT上的长期追踪研究显示生活在阳光比较充足的气候环境下的人患炎症性肠炎的几率很低，尤其对于30或以上年龄的人更是如此。
chinese.english: A long-term U.S. study published online in GUT has shown that living in sunnier climates may lower the chances of developing inflammatory bowel disease, especially in those aged 30 years or over.

chinese.chinese: 方法：受试者分为腹泻型IBS患者（IBS - D）、便秘型亚组（IBS - C）、与缓解期溃疡性结肠炎患者和健康受试者。
chinese.english: Methods: IBS patients of the diarrhea-predominant (IBS-D) and of the constipation-predominant subgroup (IBS-C), patients with inactive UC and healthy subjects were enrolled.

chinese.chinese: 大多数感染者会有持续数天的呕吐和腹泻，在全球来讲，诺瓦克病毒每年将100万人送向医院，并使超过20万儿童死亡。随着轮状病毒疫苗的研制成功，诺瓦克病毒已成为很多地方导致胃肠炎最常见的病毒。
chinese.english: Most people infected suffer a couple of days of vomiting and diarrhea, butworldwide, the norovirus sends up to 1.1 million people to the hospital andkills more than 200,000 children every year. With the success of vaccinesagainst the rotovirus, the norovirus is becoming the most important cause ofgastroenteritis in many places.

chinese.chinese: 不同类型的干细胞被用于不同的疾病。例如：源于脂肪细胞的Cytori被用来治疗心脏疾病，而源于胎盘组织细胞的Celgene被用于Crohn's病(局限性肠炎)和风湿性关节炎的治疗。胎儿细胞也正被进一步探究，例如Neuralstem公司正在研究利用流产胎儿和早期被诊断为肌萎缩侧索硬化症(也就是我们所称的Lou Gehrig's病)胎儿来源的干细胞治疗神经性障碍。
chinese.english: Different types of stem cell are being used for different diseases. Cytori is developing a heart disease product derived from fat cells, for example, while Celgene is using placental cells for Crohn's disease and rheumatoid arthritis therapies. Fetal cells are also being explored. Neuralstem Inc, for example, is developing treatments for neurological disorders from an aborted fetus and is in the early stages of testing a treatment for amyotrophic lateral sclerosis, known also as Lou Gehrig's disease.

chinese.chinese: 虽然正式的证据尚很有限，大多数胃肠病学家在临床发现PPIs（主要是兰索拉唑）与“微”结肠炎之间的联系。最近的一个回顾性的病例对照研究发现相对于对照组来说，PPIs使用组发生胶原性结肠炎发生率显著升高(38% vs 13%)。
chinese.english: Although the formal evidence is relatively limited, most gastroenterologists clinically detect an association between PPIs, perhaps particularly lansoprazole, and microscopic colitis. A recent retrospective case-controlled study has suggested that PPI use was significantly higher in patients with collagenous colitis than in controls (38% vs 13%).[sup][54][/sup]

chinese.chinese: 从某种程度上来说，H2受体拮抗剂被PPIs迅速取代令人惊讶。尽管PPIs的强力有效是其主要特征，但在迅速缓解偶发的消化不良症状方面，PPIs疗效并不好，因为最初用药的几天，胃酸对药物的降解影响了疗效。另外，PPIs的不良反应发生率高，如头痛、皮疹和腹泻（由显微镜下“微”结肠炎、症状明显的感染或其他机制所致）。近期的研究数据显示PPIs的毒性反应范围可能更广。
chinese.english: In some ways, it was surprising how readily PPIs displaced H2 antagonists. Although their key feature was their greater efficacy, they are less effective in the short term for sporadic relief of dyspepsia because degradation by acid during the first few days of treatment makes them relatively ineffective during this time. In addition, they have a higher incidence of adverse effects, including headache, rash and diarrhoea (whether because of microscopic colitis, frank infection or by other mechanisms). However, recent data suggest that PPIs may have a more extended toxicity profile.

chinese.chinese: 年长时发病的结肠炎患者易于获得更好的转归
chinese.english: Colitis Patients Diagnosed Later in LifeTend to Have Better Disease Outcomes

chinese.chinese: 密西根大学的胃肠病学专家在前面的研究中还发现Hp能够降低沙门氏菌引起的大鼠结肠炎的严重程度。
chinese.english: In previous research, U-M gastroenterologists also found that H. pylori reduced the severity of inflammation of the colon caused by Salmonella in mice.

chinese.chinese: 结肠炎主要表现为结肠的炎症与肿胀，这改变可以引起腹泻和腹痛。美国大概有330百万人患有结肠炎。
chinese.english: Colitis involves inflammation and swelling of the large intestine that leads to diarrhea and abdominal pain. Approximately 3.3 million people in the U.S. suffer from colitis.

chinese.chinese: 研究认为常见的胃内细菌DNA能够减小结肠炎的影响
chinese.english: DNA from Common Stomach Bacteria Minimizes Effects of Colitis, Study Says

chinese.chinese: IBD泛指一系列的肠功能失调，如克隆病及溃疡性结肠炎。
chinese.english: Inflammatory bowel disease (IBD) is an umbrella term that includes a variety of intestinal disorders, such as Crohn's disease and ulcerative colitis.

chinese.chinese: 无数个把我们的身体称作“家”的微生物究竟怎样帮助我们维持健康的免疫系统? 一项在小鼠身上所做的新的研究显示，梭菌属的特别细菌会促进小鼠结肠中的调节性T细胞(或Treg细胞)的产生，这一发现提示了对过敏和自身免疫反应的新的治疗方法。 Koji Atarashi及其同事首先清除了小鼠结肠中的所有细菌。他们发现小鼠结肠的Treg细胞数目发生了骤降。 通过给这些无菌小鼠定量施予某一梭菌属菌株的混合物，研究人员观察到那些Treg细胞回归到了结肠。 研究人员还发现，给野生型小鼠(即它们所有的共生菌都是完好的)喂养梭菌属细菌会在小鼠中增高其Treg细胞的水平，并帮助小鼠避免发生自身免疫性大肠炎和其它过敏症。 这些数据凸显了这些特别的梭菌属细菌是如何帮助调节特别的免疫细胞组群的。将来，这些发现甚至可被用来改善对某些自身免疫性疾病的治疗。
chinese.english: "Induction of colonic regulatory T cells by indigenous Clostridium species," by K. Atarashi; T. Tanoue; T. Taniguchi; K. Honda; Y. Momose; K. Itoh at The University of Tokyo in Tokyo, Japan; T. Shima; A. Imaoka; Y. Umesaki at Yakult Central Institute for Microbiological Research in Tokyo, Japan; T. Kuwahara at The University of Tokushima Graduate School in Tokushima, Japan; K. Takeda at University of California, Los Angeles in Los Angeles, CA; S. Yamasaki; T. Saito; S. Hori at RIKEN Research Center for Allergy and Immunology in Yokohama, Japan; Y. Ohba at Graduate School of Medicine, Hokkaido University in Sapporo, Japan; I.I. Ivanov at Columbia University Medical Center in New York, NY; K. Honda at Japan Science and Technology Agency in Saitama, Japan.

chinese.chinese: 病人与方法：本研究为前瞻性随机交叉试验研究。42例长期溃疡性结肠炎患者纳入。在至少间隔3周所有纳入研究者分别交叉先后行NBI和结肠镜检查。随机化编码决定不同的检查次序。两种检查对可疑病变均行定向活检。仅对结肠镜检查患者附加随机的活检。利用每一检测技术检出病检中确诊为肿瘤形成的患者例数评估其诊断敏感性。
chinese.english: PATIENTS AND METHODS: This was a prospective, randomized, crossover study of 42 patients with longstanding ulcerative colitis. All participants underwent NBI and conventional colonoscopy with at least 3 weeks between the procedures. Randomization determined the order of the examinations. Targeted biopsies were taken during both procedures; additional random biopsies were taken at conventional colonoscopy only. The number of patients with neoplasia detected by targeted biopsies was used to assess the sensitivity for each technique.

chinese.chinese: 研究者对比了健康供者、溃疡性结肠炎患者、空肠弯曲杆菌感染患者和艰难梭状芽胞肝菌(C. Diff.)感染患者的粪便，发现他们的化学组成彼此都明显不同。
chinese.english: The researchers compared faeces of healthy donors together with patients with ulcerative colitis, Campylobacter jejuni and Clostridium difficile (C. Diff.) and found their chemical composition were each significantly different.

chinese.chinese: 以老年女性和合并结肠炎的人群发病率为高。
chinese.english: Patients tend to be older women with higher proportion of collagenous colitis.

chinese.chinese: “我们对此感到惊讶和失望，尤其是sugammade在今年3月份获得了FDA麻醉和生命保障咨询委员会一致推荐”， 先令-普劳的执行副总裁兼研究所总裁，Thomas P. Koestler博士说，“sugammadex代表了近二十年来麻醉领域出现的第一个重要的创新药。我们仍然致力于把这一重要的医学进步提供给那些期待它的美国人，并计划和代理处理此事，此事主要与过敏反应有关。”此事与sugammadex的有效性无关。
chinese.english: "We are surprised and disappointed with this action, especially given that sugammadex received a unanimous recommendation for approval by the FDA Advisory Committee on Anesthetics and Life Support in March of this year," said Thomas P. Koestler, Ph.D., executive vice president and president of Schering-Plough Research Institute. "Sugammadex represents the first major pharmaceutical innovation in the field of anesthesia in two decades. We remain committed to bringing this important medical advance to those who are waiting for it in the United States, and plan to work with the agency to address the issues, which are primarily related to hypersensitivity/allergic reactions." There were no issues related to the efficacy of sugammadex.

chinese.chinese: 结果  高级美国麻醉医师协会评分表明高龄老年人的健康状况较差。而且，这组患者很少可以独立活动，更可能在骨折时需要医院治疗(p < 0.001)。30天和120天死亡率是更高的，即使调整了病例组合变量以后。高龄组回顾家庭或以前活动水平的可能性要更小。
chinese.english: Conclusions: Although the extremely elderly exhibited a higher prevalence of prefracture indicators of poor outcome, statistical control for these case-mix variables showed further age-related deterioration in survival and outcomes after surgery for the treatment of a hip fracture.

chinese.chinese: 方法:腰椎融合术后,26例病人使用了ON-Q镇痛泵,泵内灌注的是0.5%的布比卡因,通过弹性输液泵将麻醉药输入切口的筋膜下,回顾性分析这些配对对照研究的病例,进行资料收集包括:疼痛评分,麻醉剂在术后5天的使用,住院时间及并发症. 变量比如年龄,美国麻醉学会评分及体格状况,手术操作过程在配对病例中都是相似的.1例海洛因滥用患者除外.
chinese.english: Methods. After posterior lumbar spine fusion procedures, 26 consecutive patients received the ON-Q PainBuster, which infused 0.5% marcaine via an elastomeric pump into the subfascial aspects of the wound. Retrospective analysis compared each of these patients with a case-matched control patient. Data included pain scores and opiate use during the first 5 postoperative days (PODs), length of hospital stay, and complications. Variables such as age, American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA) physical status, and surgical procedure were similar between matched cases. One patient was excluded because of active heroine abuse.

chinese.chinese: 就在去年，FDA宣称将取缔市面上许多未经批准的含氢可酮的产品，这是一种常用的具有成瘾性的麻醉品，通常作为镇咳药。许多该类产品没有经过FDA审查或批准，其中一些的标签上注明可用于2岁儿童，然而该成分从未批准用于学龄前儿童。
chinese.english: Just last year, the F.D.A. announced that it would force off the market many unapproved products containing hydrocodone, a popular and addictive narcotic often used as a cough suppressant. Many of these products had not been inspected or approved by the agency, and some had labels stating they could be used in children as young as 2, although such products had never been approved for use in preschool children.

chinese.chinese: 海关没收他们发现的任何类固醇和麻醉品，但其他药让FDA检查员用手工费力的填写表格和送达收件人。如果收件人发誓说药品是自己个人使用，FDA常常放行被扣留的包裹。往往要花费一、两个小时来处理一个包裹，根据2003年美国国会调查，“有一个障碍使其工作职能成为不可能”。因为缺乏工作人员，堆积了几千个包裹等待FDA审查，对放行包裹几乎没做任何检查。
chinese.english: Customs seizes any steroids and narcotics they find, but they give other drugs to F.D.A. inspectors, who laboriously fill out handwritten forms and send letters to intended recipients. If the recipient swears that the drugs are for his or her own personal use, the F.D.A. often releases the detained package. It takes an hour or two to process each package, “an obstacle that makes their job functionally impossible,” according to a 2003 Congressional investigation. Thousands of packages can pile up waiting for F.D.A. review, and the agency often releases packages without any investigation for lack of staff.

chinese.chinese: 一项新的研究显示，很多妇女希望能不使用止痛药物自然分娩。但是分娩疼痛是很难承受的，她们最终还是要求硬膜外麻醉，通过向脊髓末端的硬膜外腔注射镇痛药来减轻疼痛。令人满意的是硬膜外麻醉仅仅使痛觉不敏感，但是孕妇仍然保持清醒，可以在分娩过程中起到积极的作用。
chinese.english: Many women hope to have natural childbirth without pain drugs but find labor so difficult they end up requesting an epidural, which provides pain relief through injection of a painkiller into the epidural space at the base of the spine. Ideally, the epidural only dulls the pain, and women remain alert and can still play an active role in labor.

chinese.chinese: 颈动脉手术（GALA）的全身麻醉与局部麻醉：多中心、随机对照研究
chinese.english: General anaesthesia versus local anaesthesia for carotid surgery (GALA): a multicentre, randomised controlled trial

chinese.chinese: 几乎所有的专业医师协会目前都将其官方网站向患者部分开放。这些网站及链接是提供该专业疾病信息的最佳来源，而且以外科或麻醉学会为例，还会提供具体的实施步骤。
chinese.english: Almost all of the national professional societies now have part of their official Web sites devoted to patients. These sites and links are excellent sources of information on the illnesses treated by that specialty and, in the case of surgical or anesthesia professional organizations, the procedures performed.

chinese.chinese: 在最近的专栏文章中我曾提到患者过于信任医生，对此几位读者来信讲，很难获取或筛选关于医生和疾病方面的信息。很多人寻求这方面的建议，因此两周前我联系了数位国内家庭医学、儿科、内科、肿瘤学、外科和麻醉方面的知名专家，并就如何获取医生和疾病信息请他们提供一些建议。
chinese.english: In response to my recent column on patients trusting doctors too much, several readers wrote in about the difficulty of finding or sifting through information on doctors and diseases. Many asked for suggestions, so a couple of weeks ago I contacted several nationally respected leaders in family medicine, pediatrics, internal medicine, oncology, surgery and anesthesia and asked them to share their advice on researching doctors and diseases.

chinese.chinese: 快速注射麻醉输精管切除疼痛分数低于针孔麻醉，但无统计学差异。
chinese.english: The pain score for the vasectomy itself was lower after jet injection than after needle injection, but the difference was not significant from a statistical standpoint.

chinese.chinese: 采用标准方法评价疼痛，发现快速注射麻醉疼痛明显低于针孔麻醉。
chinese.english: Pain as measured with a standard scale was significantly lower with the jet injection than with the needle injection, the authors report.

chinese.chinese: 作者解释道：No-needle麻醉采用一种喷雾装置（MadaJet），向皮肤喷雾局麻药，渗入组织，而输精管局部无需使用皮下注射。
chinese.english: No-needle anesthesia uses a device (MadaJet) that injects an aerosolized local anesthetic into the skin, underlying tissue, and vas deferens without the need for a hypodermic needle, the authors explain.

chinese.chinese: 来自Urology杂志的报道：No-needle麻醉能有效控制接受无手术刀输精管切除术患者的疼痛（一种流行的术式，包含一微小的穿刺，代替了切开）。
chinese.english: A no-needle anesthetic method is an effective means of pain control for men undergoing no-scalpel vasectomy, a popular type of vasectomy that involves a small puncture of the skin rather than an incision, according to a report in the journal Urology.

chinese.chinese: 宾夕法尼亚大学医学院的研究人员们提出，手术中药物让患者昏睡的细胞通路与麻醉复苏不同，从而回答了一个长期困扰人们的疑问，即，麻醉剂是如何作用于身体的。
chinese.english: University of Pennsylvania School of Medicine researchers have answered long-running questions about the way that anesthetics act on the body, by showing that the cellular pathway for emerging from anesthesia is different from the one that drugs take to put patients to sleep during operations.

chinese.chinese: 宾夕法尼亚大学医学院的研究人员们提出，术中全麻药物使患者入睡(意识消失)与麻醉苏醒有不同的细胞通路，从而回答了一个长期困扰人们的疑问，即:全身麻醉药物是如何作用于机体的(全麻药物的作用机制)。
chinese.english: University of Pennsylvania School of Medicine researchers have answered long-running questions about the way that anesthetics act on the body, by showing that the cellular pathway for emerging from anesthesia is different from the one that drugs take to put patients to sleep during operations.

chinese.chinese: 由波士顿马萨诸塞州综合医院，肠胃病学小组的医学博士Ashwin  Ananthakeishna领导的调研人员经过22年的研究发现维生素D摄入足量的女性与维生素D摄入不足的女性相比，患节段性肠炎的风险要小62%。吸烟和服用避孕药的情况下这种关系仍成立。
chinese.english: Investigators led by Ashwin Ananthakrishnan, MD, from the Division of Gastroenterology, Massachusetts General Hospital in Boston, found that vitamin D–sufficient women were 62% less likely to be diagnosed with CD during a 22-year period compared with those deemed deficient. The direct relationship between vitamin D ingestion and reduction in CD risk was not affected by smoking status or contraceptive use.

chinese.chinese: 根据十二月在公布网上的文章和在三月份胃肠道学杂志上公布的结果，女性增加维生素D的摄入可以显著降低患节段性肠炎的风险。
chinese.english: Increased intake of vitamin D may significantly reduce the risk for CD in women, according to an article published online December 12 and in the March issue of Gastroenterology.

chinese.chinese: 他们总结认为：尽管包括调强放射治疗在内的advanced delivery技术有助降低周围组织的放射剂量，但剂量调高到相当水平时，仍需注意放射性直肠炎的发生。
chinese.english: They conclude: "Although advanced delivery techniques including intensity-modulated radiotherapy may help to decrease radiation dose to surrounding tissues, radiation proctopathy will continue to be a concern as we dose escalate to a much higher level."

chinese.chinese: 为了了解前列腺癌治疗时，放射性直肠炎的发病情况、临床表现、发病机理、危险因素和治疗措施，研究小组就相关文献利用医学文献数据库如PubMed 和 Medline进行研究。
chinese.english: To examine the epidemiology, clinical manifestations, pathogenesis, risk factors, and treatment of radiation proctopathy in prostate cancer treatment, the team conducted a search of medical literature databases, such as PubMed and Medline, for relevant reports.

chinese.chinese: 德克萨斯休斯敦Methodist医院Bin The及其同事解释说：放射性结肠炎是直肠内层有症状的放射损伤，一般与前列腺癌放射治疗同时出现，
chinese.english: Radiation proctopathy is symptomatic radiation damage to the lining of the rectum, which commonly occurs with radiotherapy for prostate cancer, explain Bin Teh, from The Methodist Hospital in Houston, Texas, and colleagues.

chinese.chinese: 比口服抗生素带来的副作用（诸如腹泻、胃肠炎、皮炎及感染并发症等）少了。
chinese.english: They tend to cause fewer gastrointestinal problems, such as diarrhea, gastroenteritis, dermatitis or complications from yeast infections than the oral antibiotics.

chinese.chinese: 一项PharMetrics数据库的回顾性分析：按照年龄、性别随机选取55，186个患者作为对照组，其中包括2000年1月1日到2005年6月30日确诊的、年龄在18到64岁之间的13，856个溃疡性结肠炎患者。患者入选标准：确诊前连续6个月就诊或确诊后连续12月就诊，因溃疡性结肠炎有两次不同的索赔。按照最初诊断溃疡性结肠炎后的那年的疾病严重程度将患者分组，计算每个患者卫生资源的使用和花费的平均值。1组：溃疡性结肠炎需住院；2组：需长期应用皮质激素或免疫抑制剂积极治疗，疗程大于4个月；3组：其他所有患者。
chinese.english: Utilizing a control group of 55,186 patients randomly selected by age and gender, a retrospective analysis of the PharMetrics database, including 13,856 UC patients between the ages of 18 to 64 and diagnosed between January 1, 2000 and June 30, 2005, was conducted. UC patients had to be continuously enrolled for six months pre-UC diagnosis and 12 months post-UC diagnosis, and have two distinct claims for UC. Mean per-patient healthcare resource utilization and cost were calculated for each patient sorted by disease severity group in the year following their initial UC diagnosis. Group 1 required hospitalization for UC; Group 2 required chronic aggressive pharmacotherapy, defined as corticosteroids or immunosuppressants, for greater than 4 months; and Group 3 consisted of all remaining patients.

chinese.chinese: PharMetrics数据库注册溃疡性结肠炎病人的分析显示，溃疡性结肠炎住院患者（1组）的费用较长期积极的药物治疗的患者（2组）高3倍，较其他该病患者（3组）高5倍，由此可见，疾病控制不佳是导致高费用的原因。住院相关的费用所占比重最大，平均每个病人每年约5300美元。1组每个住院患者的费用为24693美元，2组为1842美元，3组为1016美元。需住院患者的门诊、急诊、医生上门处理费用以及实验室检查费用均较不需住院患者高。平均下来，2组患者积极有效的处方药物控制所需费用4283美元，1组为3502美元，3组为1508美元。2组患者的总费用大约为20000美元，少于1组患者，说明积极的药物治疗能够降低溃疡性结肠炎患者的总费用。
chinese.english: The analysis of UC patients registered in the PharMetrics database revealed that patients requiring hospitalization for UC (Group 1) incurred mean costs more than three times greater than UC patients requiring chronic aggressive pharmacotherapy (Group 2) and more than five times greater than costs for all other patients with UC (Group 3), indicating the high cost-burden of poorly controlled UC. Costs associated with hospitalization constituted the largest component of resource utilization at approximately $5,300 per patient for all UC patients. Inpatient healthcare costs per individual in Group1 were $24,693, compared with $1,842 and $1,016 per patient in Groups 2 and 3, respectively. Patients with UC requiring hospitalization also incurred higher costs relating to outpatient hospital care, emergency room visits, physician visits and laboratory tests than patients with UC who did not require hospitalization. 6.1.4 The Law of Heart

chinese.chinese: 心及大血管根部被包于心包内。
chinese.english: The heart and the root of the great vessels are contained within it.

chinese.chinese: 此层绕大血管根部反折至大血管根部及心的表面成心包脏层即心外膜。
chinese.english: This, in turn, is reflected around the roots of the great vessels to become continuous with the visceral layer or epicardium which covers the heart and the roots of the great vessels.

chinese.chinese: 心位于中纵隔心包内。
chinese.english: The heart lies obliquely in the middle mediastinum within the pericardium.

chinese.chinese: 心为中空肌性器官，略呈锥形。
chinese.english: It is a hollow muscular organ that is somewhat conical in shape.

chinese.chinese: 心底朝右上后方，与心的膈面有冠状沟的后部分界。
chinese.english: The base is towards to the right, superior and posterior and is separated from the diaphragmatic surface of the heart by the posterior part of the coronary sulcus.

chinese.chinese: 心的膈面(下面)位于膈上。
chinese.english: The diaphragmatic (inferior) surface of the heat lies on the diaphragm.

chinese.chinese: 心由两心室构成(主要是左心室)，两心室以后室间沟为界。
chinese.english: It is formed by both ventricles (mainly the left) which are separated by the posterior interventricular sulcus.

chinese.chinese: 心右缘全由右心房构成，左缘主要由左心室、部分左心耳所构成，上缘由两个心房、下缘主要由右心室和左心室的心尖所构成。
chinese.english: The right border is formed entirely by the right atrium, the left border mainly by the left ventricle and partly by the left auricle, the superior border by both atria, and the inferior border chiefly by the right ventricle and the apex of the left ventricle.

chinese.chinese: 室间隔膜部是室间隔缺损的常发部位，单纯室间隔缺损或合并其他心异常，在所有先天性心脏病中约占50％。
chinese.english: The membranous part of the interventricular is the common site of a ventricular septal defect, isolated or associated with other cardic anomalies, is present in about 50 % of all congenital abnormalities of the heart.

chinese.chinese: 心由心肌层(心肌)、外被浆膜心包(心外膜)、内衬心内膜所构成。
chinese.english: The heart consists of a layer of cardiac muscle (myocardium) covered externally with serous pericardium (epicardium) and lined internally with endocardium.

chinese.chinese: 心的传导系。
chinese.english: The conducting system of the heart.

chinese.chinese: 心的传导系由特化的心肌纤维构成，见于窦房结(SA结)、房室结(AV结)和束中。
chinese.english: This system consists of specialized cardiac muscle fibers found in the sinu-atrial node (SA node) and in the atrio-ventricular node (AV node) and bundle.

chinese.chinese: 心跳源于SA结(心的起搏点)，该结位于界嵴上部、上腔静脉开口于右心房处的右侧。
chinese.english: The heart beat is initiated in the SA node (the pacemaker of the heart), situated in the upper part of the crista terminalis just to the right of the opening of the superior vena cava into the right atrium.

chinese.chinese: 心的血管。
chinese.english: Blood vessels of the heart.

chinese.chinese: 心的血液供应来自左、右冠状动脉。
chinese.english: The heart's blood supply is derived from the right and left coronary arteries.

chinese.chinese: 旋支沿冠状沟绕心左缘至后面。
chinese.english: The circumflex branch follows the coronary sulcus around the left border of the heart to the posterior surface.

chinese.chinese: 旋支沿冠状沟供应左心房、心的左面和左心室。
chinese.english: It supplies the left atrium, the left surface of the heart, and the left ventricle.

chinese.chinese: 心的静脉主要流入冠状窦，部分小静脉直接注入心腔，主要是右侧。
chinese.english: The heart is drained mainly by veins that empty into the coronary sinus and partly by small veins that open directly into the cavities of the heart, principally those on the right side.

chinese.chinese: 心的神经来自心丛，该丛位于气管叉处。
chinese.english: The nerves are distributed to the heart from the cardiac plexuses, which lie on the bifurcation of the trachea.

chinese.chinese: 胸l～5的节后纤维分布至胸部脏器——心、大血管、肺和食管。
chinese.english: Postganglionic fibers from T1-5 are distributed to the thoracic viscera — the heart and great vessels, the lungs and the esophagus.

chinese.chinese: 骨性耳蜗状似蜗牛壳，绕骨性柱心蜗轴两圈半。
chinese.english: It somewhat resembles a snail's shell that makes two-and-one-half turns around a bony pillar or core, called the modiolus.

chinese.chinese: 脑神经核中运动神经元的神经纤维(轴突)离脑构成脑神经到：(1)横纹肌(如经第Ⅻ对脑神经即舌下神经至舌肌)；(2)自主神经节，与节内细胞突触，将冲动传至平滑肌、心和腺体。
chinese.english: The nerve fibers (axons) of motor neurons in the cranial nerve nuclei leave the brain in the cranial nerves and pass to (1) striated muscles (e.g., via CN XII to the muscles of the tongue) and (2) autonomic ganglia where they synapse with cells that relay impulses to smooth muscle, the heart, and glands .

chinese.chinese: 该节发出的节后纤维到第7、8颈神经、心及绕椎动脉形成椎动脉丛。
chinese.english: Some postganglionic fibers from this ganglion pass into the seventh and eighth cervical nerves and to the heart and the vertebral plexus around the vertebral artery.

chinese.chinese: 该节的节后纤维到第5、6颈神经、心和甲状腺。
chinese.english: Postganglionic branches pass from it to the fifth and sixth cervical nerves and to the heart and the thyroid gland.

chinese.chinese: 总的来说，Davidson说，目标是“用我们所知道关于大脑的知识来调整提高幸福感、善良、同情心的干预措施。可能我们可以开发一种多目标、专注的干预措施，利用神经可塑性机制来诱导特定的大脑电波回流的特定改变”
chinese.english: Overall, Davidson says, the goal is "touse what we know about the brain to fine-tune interventions that will improve well-being, kindness, altruism. Perhaps we can develop more targeted, focused interventionsthat take advantage of the mechanisms of neuroplasticity to induce specificchanges in specific brain circuits."

chinese.chinese: 在美国胸科协会2012年会上展示CURE-AF 实验时，Ralph J Damiano Jr博士 (华盛顿大学医学院, 圣路易斯, 密苏里州) 说，手术成功率从单中心的33%到三中心的100%不等。Damiano告诉heartwire，这些差异可能不是由患者或机构特征之间的差异引起的，因为每个中心的病例组成成分都相似，并且大部分都是富有经验的中心。
chinese.english: Success rates ranged from 33% at one center to100% at three centers, according to Dr Ralph J Damiano Jr (Washington University School of Medicine, St Louis, MO), who presented CURE-AF here at the American Association of Thoracic Surgery 2012 Annual Meeting. The differences probably weren't due to varying patient or institutional characteristics, as the case mix was similar at each place, and most were highly experienced tertiary centers, Damiano told heartwire .

chinese.chinese: 研究人员发现，对少数患者群进行侵入式牙科手术前，限制应用抗生素进行预防的建议似乎不会增加草绿色链球菌诱发的感染性心膜炎比例。
chinese.english: Recommendations restricting the use of antibiotic prophylaxis before invasive dental procedures to only a handful of patient groups did not appear to increase rates of infective endocarditis caused by viridans group streptococci, researchers found.

chinese.chinese: 美国心脏学会于1955年首次正式发布预防性感染性心膜炎应用指南，以用于特殊心血管疾病患者进行某些牙科手术。
chinese.english: The American Heart Association first issued formal guidelines for the use of infective endocarditis prophylaxis in patients with specific cardiovascular conditions undergoing certain dental procedures in 1955.

chinese.chinese: 为检视更广泛趋势，研究人员同时研究了1999年至2009年间全国住院患者样本。草绿色链球菌诱发的感染性心膜炎出院数目在研究课题阶段保持相对稳定。
chinese.english: To look at broader trends, the researchers also examined data from the Nationwide Inpatient Sample for 1999 through 2009. The number of hospital discharges for infective endocarditis caused by viridans group streptococci remained relatively stable during the study period.

chinese.chinese: 草绿色链球菌已与侵入式牙科手术相关，为搞清楚新指南与草绿色链球菌诱发的感染性心膜炎增加是否有关，研究人员对奥姆斯特德县罗切斯特流行病学项目1999年到2010年鉴定的所有确诊或疑似病例数据进行了研究。
chinese.english: To see whether the new guidance was associated with an increase in infective endocarditis caused by viridans group streptococci, which has been linked to invasive dental procedures, the researchers examined data on all definite or probable cases identified in the Rochester Epidemiology Project of Olmsted County from 1999 through 2010.

chinese.chinese: 2012年Markey肿瘤中心研究日上，Markey中肿瘤心Jin Shin Jyutsu全科医师Jennifer Bradley提出该研究。目前，该研究已吸纳了159名肿瘤患者。在Shin Jyutsu session治疗前后，Bradley都要对患者进行询问，对他们痛疼，压力和恶心等症状进行评估，评估范围分为0-10，0代表无上述症状。
chinese.english: Presented at the 2012 Markey Cancer CenterResearch Day by Jennifer Bradley who is the Jin Shin Jyutsu integrativepractitioner at Markey, the study included 159 current cancer patients. Beforeand after each Jin Shin Jyutsu session, Bradley asked patients to assess theirsymptoms of pain, stress and nausea on a scale of 0-10, with 0 representing nosymptoms.

chinese.chinese: 根据国家心、肺和血液学会的声明，计划中的350~400个试验点的选择将在十一月份开始，接者，在美国和加拿大的病人招募将在2013年的3月份开始进行。
chinese.english: Selection of the planned 350 to 400 sites for the trial is to begin in November, with patient recruitment in the U.S. and Canada to get under way in March 2013, according to an NHLBI statement.

chinese.chinese: 结节状脑硬化（TS）可引起良性（非癌性）肿瘤在大脑和其他人体部位包括眼、肺、肝、心、皮肤和肾中的生长。TS的发生是基因突变的结果，可导致肿瘤发生并引起一系列可能发生的症状包括学习和研究能力的丧失、皮肤病、癫痫、肺和肾脏疾病。
chinese.english: TS causes benign (non-cancerous) tumors to grow in the brain and in other parts of the body including the eyes, lungs, liver, heart, skin and kidneys. TS occurs as a result of genetic mutations that lead to the development of tumors and results in a variety of possible symptoms including learning and developmental disabilities, skin abnormalities, seizures, and lung and kidney disease.

chinese.chinese: 你的目标必须写下了并且可以预计。把你的计划放在你每天都能看到的地方，因为眼不见心不“烦”。
chinese.english: Your goals must be written AND visible. Place your goals where you can see them every day because out of sight is out of mind.

chinese.chinese: 该研究由国家心、肺、血液研究所资助。
chinese.english: The National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute funded the study.

chinese.chinese: 这项由“心力衰竭协会”和“欧洲心脏病学（ESC）的心律学会”联合倡议的调查，收集了13个欧洲国家的141中心共2000多例患者的资料。其目的是评估CRT对症状的影响程度的，心血管疾病再次住院，和生存率。被研究人群包括很少出现在临床试验中，俗称心脏衰竭的患者；包括非常老的老年患者，房颤患者、以前应用起搏器或其它心脏设备治疗的患者。
chinese.english: The survey - a joint initiative of the Heart Failure Association and EuropeanHeart Rhythm Association of the European Society of Cardiology (ESC) - gatheredinformation on more than 2000 patients at 141 centres in 13 European countries.Its aim was to assess the effect of CRT on symptom severity, cardiovascularre-hospitalisation, and survival. The study population included subjects poorlyrepresented in clinical trials but commonly admitted as heart failure patients- including the very elderly, those with atrialfibrillation, and those previously treated with a pacemaker or othercardiac device.

chinese.chinese: 这项由“心力衰竭协会”和“欧洲心脏病学（ESC）的心律学会”联合倡议的调查，收集了13个欧洲国家的141中心共2000多例患者的资料。其目的是评估CRT对症状的影响程度的，心血管疾病再次住院，和生存率。被研究人群包括很少出现在临床试验中，俗称心脏衰竭的患者；包括非常老的老年患者，房颤患者、以前应用起搏器或其它心脏设备治疗的患者。
chinese.english: The survey - a joint initiative of the Heart Failure Association and EuropeanHeart Rhythm Association of the European Society of Cardiology (ESC) - gatheredinformation on more than 2000 patients at 141 centres in 13 European countries.Its aim was to assess the effect of CRT on symptom severity, cardiovascularre-hospitalisation, and survival. The study population included subjects poorlyrepresented in clinical trials but commonly admitted as heart failure patients- including the very elderly, those with atrialfibrillation, and those previously treated with a pacemaker or othercardiac device.

chinese.chinese: CADUCEUS临床试验的 ,是一个由美国食品药品管理局批准，国立心、肺、血液研究所支持的第一期调查研究的一部分。
chinese.english: The clinical trial, named CADUCEUS (CArdiosphere-Derived aUtologous stem CElls to Reverse ventricUlar dySfunction), was part of a Phase I investigative study approved by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration and supported by the National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute.

chinese.chinese: Taylor, Umphrey和 Richard为患者和其家庭成员都提供了可操作性的建议。这本书对像是症状管理和生活方式转变提出了一个权威但富有同情心的指南。指南包括了来自患者自己，以及朋友和亲身参与诊断的家人的建议。结果呢，读者对于得了脑肿瘤之后的生活有个一个现实的理解并且学会了如何平衡预后和希望的不确定性。
chinese.english: Taylor, Umphrey andRichard provide practical suggestions to which both patients and family memberscan refer. The book proves an authoritative, yet compassionate guide toaddressing issues such as symptom management and lifestyle modification.Included is advice from patients themselves, as well as friends and familymembers who have experienced this diagnosis. Consequently, readers gain arealistic understanding of living with brain tumor and learn to balance theuncertainties of prognosis with hope.

chinese.chinese: 研究设计和方法：该研究为一项随机，双盲，three-arm 平行，安慰剂对照，26中心临床研究（美国和加拿大）。基于获自于胰岛素用量调整设置队列的数据（n=4），治疗组患者（n=71）随机按照1：1：1分配至安慰剂组，10mg dapaliflozin组和20mgdapagliflozin组，并联合OAD和50%常规剂量胰岛素。主要研究终点为A1C在第12周同基线相比发生变化。
chinese.english: RESEARCH DESIGN AND METHODS This was a randomized, double-blind, three-arm parallel-group, placebo-controlled, 26-center trial (U.S. and Canada). Based on data from an insulin dose-adjustment setting cohort (n = 4), patients in the treatment cohort (n = 71) were randomly assigned 1:1:1 to placebo, 10 mg dapagliflozin, or 20 mg dapagliflozin, plus OAD  and 50% of their daily insulin dose. The primary outcome was change from baseline in A1C at week 12 (dapagliflozin vs. placebo, last observation carried forward [LOCF]).

chinese.chinese: 曼彻斯特大学专为癌症幸存者设计了一套瑜伽，名为YOCAS。练习者需进行专注力练习，这其中包括呼吸、冥想、心视，和18种或坐或立或卧的姿势。
chinese.english: The University of Rochester designed YOCAS (Yoga for Cancer Survivors) program taught the participants a series of mindfulness exercises that covered breathing (pranayama), meditation, visualization, and 18 different poses or asanas where the body is seated, standing or lying down.

chinese.chinese: 该研究对目前心室辅助装置应用的局限性提出了直言不讳的分析。比如，接受VAD治疗的患者存活到1年者低于半数，而美国国家心、肺和血液协会 (NHLBI)曾假设有50%de 2年生存率。许多临床因素（如年龄、肾功能衰竭、外周血管疾病）与初始治疗组更高的死亡率相关，对存在这些状况的患者进行更加谨慎的训练也许是提高生存率的方法之一。总而言之，目前VAD作为心脏移植前的过渡措施之外的治疗地位是有限的。
chinese.english: This analysis provides a blunt insight into the current limitations of VAD use. For example, fewer than half of the patients receiving VAD treatment were alive at 1 year—the National Heart, Lung and Blood Institute (NHLBI) in the USA has set a goal of 50% survival at 2 years. Several clinical factors (age, renal failure, peripheral vascular disease) were associated with higher mortality in the primary group and exercising more caution in patients with these conditions might be one way to improve survival rates. In summary, the place of these devices apart from for bridge-to-transplant indications is currently limited.

chinese.chinese: 美国医学协会杂志周三将要发表两项研究，报告的数据来自国立心、肺和血液研究所赞助的多中心随机临床对照试验。一项分析发现锻炼提高了所有人的健康水平，而另一项发现锻炼轻微的降低了入院和死亡的风险。
chinese.english: Two studies, to be published Wednesday in The Journal of the American Medical Association, report data from a multicenter, randomized, controlled clinical trial sponsored by the National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute. One analysis found that exercise improved overall well-being, while the other found it slightly reduced the risk of hospital admissions and death.

chinese.chinese: 社会行为和保持一个积极地态度同样是阻止痴呆的有力工具。积极地，愉快的开放的，有责任心的积极行动的和目的明确的人更可能经历了年龄成功的阶段。动物研究支持这些发现。这些研究表明暴露于纷繁复杂环境中的动物（经常跑车轮，攀很多的玩具和物体以及动物伴侣）不仅获得身体上的益处，还有大脑神经上的改变。
chinese.english: Social engagement and maintaining a positive attitude are also powerful tools in deterring the arrival of dementia. Individuals who are optimistic, agreeable, open to experience, conscientious, positively motivated and goal-directed are more likely to experience successful aging. Animal research supports these findings. These studies show that exposing animals to enriched or complex environments (usually including running wheels, a multitude of toys and objects to climb, and animal companions) yields several physiological benefits, including neuronal changes in the brain.

chinese.chinese: 罗可坦是用于治疗严重痤疮的药物,现在已经受到来自世界各地的数百名自杀者的谴责,其中至少有15名来自英国.然而,它的制造商-瑞士制药业巨头罗氏药厂一直拒绝接受药物对此负有责任的主张,声称严重的痤疮能打击自尊心引起抑郁症.
chinese.english: Roaccutane, which is used to treat severe acne, has been blamed for hundreds of      suicides around the world, including at least 15 in the UK. However, its manufacturer, Swiss pharmaceutical giant Roche, has always rejected claims that the drug was responsible, claiming that severe acne can lower self-esteem and cause depression.

chinese.chinese: 退休电工Journey在中风之前是一个进取心很强的人，中风后一直担心站不起来。
chinese.english: Journey, retired electrician who was an avid runner before his stroke, feared falling more than anything.

chinese.chinese: 方法：我们把产生肿瘤风险假设的结果：在SEAS试验中，zetimibe 加 simvastatin 1873个病人（平均随访ezetimibe或相对应的安慰剂治疗后4,1年），与正在进行这个方案的两个大型的假设检定(Hypothesis Testing)试验的肿瘤数据进行比较：心和肾脏保护研究(SHARP) (NCT00125593 [ClinicalTrials.gov] )，有9264名患者（平均随访，2.7年）和提高（LDL和胆固醇）降低水平的结果研究：Vytorin 作用国际试验(IMPROVE-IT) (NCT00202878 [ClinicalTrials.gov] )，目前有11,353 名患者（平均随访，1年）。
chinese.english: Methods We compared the results of a hypothesis-generating analysis of the incidence of cancer in the SEAS trial of ezetimibe plus simvastatin in 1873 patients (mean follow-up after ezetimibe or matching placebo was begun, 4.1 years) with a hypothesis-testing analysis of cancer data from the two large ongoing trials of this regimen: the Study of Heart and Renal Protection (SHARP) (NCT00125593 [ClinicalTrials.gov] ) with 9264 patients (mean follow-up, 2.7 years) and the Improved Reduction of Outcomes: Vytorin Efficacy International Trial (IMPROVE-IT) (NCT00202878 [ClinicalTrials.gov] ), currently with 11,353 patients (mean follow-up, 1.0 year).

chinese.chinese: 当我听着他们谈论自己的工作时，我又想起Dyrbye 博士的另外一席话。“我们需要做出一些改变，因为最容易受到伤害的学生，也是最有同情心的学生。”
chinese.english: As I listened to them talk about their work, I was reminded of one other thing Dr. Dyrbye had told me. “We need to change things,” she had said, “because maybe the students who are most vulnerable are the ones who are most empathic.”

chinese.chinese: Dyrbye博士在第三个研究中发现，在同情心评分测试中，医学生的得分总体上比非医学专业同辈要高。但是，当医学生存在心理耗竭问题时，他们对病人的同情心也相应地下降。
chinese.english: In a third study, Dr. Dyrbye found that when tested for empathy, medical students at baseline generally scored higher than their nonmedical peers. But, as medical students experienced more burnout, there was a corresponding drop in the level of empathy toward patients.

chinese.chinese: 寒冷的日子，手握一杯热咖啡，不仅暖手，而且也可能温暖您的心。两项发表于10月24日科学杂志的报道表明身体感觉暖和使人们做出对他人做出更有利的判断，并且行为更加慷慨。
chinese.english: Holding a hot cup of coffee warms your hands on a cold day--but it may warm your heart as well. Two experiments, reported in the 24 October issue of Science, suggest that the physical feeling of warmth makes people judge others more favorably and act more generously.

chinese.chinese: 国立卫生研究院， 国立心、肺、血液病研究所所长伊丽莎白.诺贝尔（Elizabeth Nabel）博士称，很多研究人员都愿意做更多的这类研究。但是，研究所预算有限，只能做那么多。
chinese.english: At the National Institutes of Health, said Dr. Elizabeth Nabel, director of the National Heart, Lung and Blood Institute, “many of us would love to do many more of these studies.” But, she added, “we have a limited budget and there is only so much that we can do.”

chinese.chinese: 此项研究对象为62名接受LVH供心和365名接受无LVH供心的心脏移植病人.受者和供者平均年龄分别为56和30岁,中位随访期为3.8年.
chinese.english: The study involved 62 patients who received a heart with LVH and 365 who received one without LVH. The average recipient and donor ages were 56 and 30 years, respectively, and the median follow-up period was 3.8 years.

chinese.chinese: 心里急救并不假定每个幸存者都有严重的精神健康问题或者长期的恢复困难。相反，它是以灾难幸存者和受影响者会经历一个广泛的早期反应（比如，生理的、心理的、行为的和精神的）为基础的。其中的一些反应会导致极大的悲伤以至于影响到适应能力，具有同情心和关心人的救援者的支持可能对精神康复是有帮助的。
chinese.english: Psychological First Aid does not assume that all survivors will develop severe mental health problems or long-term difficulties in recovery. Instead, it is based on an understanding that disaster survivors and others affected by such events will experience a broad range of early reactions (for example, physical, psychological, behavioral, spiritual). Some of these reactions will cause enough distress to interfere with adaptive coping, and recovery may be helped by support from compassionate and caring disaster responders.

chinese.chinese: 最近，对同一中心209名Y-90治疗患者进行的队列研究显示，晚期HCC患者的治疗有效率较高，中位生存期为12个月。要了解该疗法单独应用或与其他标准治疗（索拉非尼）联合应用的效果，需要做进一步的III期试验。
chinese.english: Recently, a cohort study comprising 209 patients treated with Y-90 in a single center showed good response rates and a median survival for advanced HCC cases of 12 months [105]. Further phase III trials are required to understand the benefits of this therapy alone or in comparison to the standard of care, sorafenib.

chinese.chinese: 死亡通常要经历漫长的过程－我们用尽所有的现代医疗手段，但我们救不了他们。他们身体的某些部分（通常是肺、心或肝脏）逐渐衰竭。这些都是“没有遗憾的死亡”，这些患者的家人都在身边，知道会发生什么。跟所有的死亡一样，这类死亡也难以让人接受，不过它们是可控的、意料之中的、有思想准备的。
chinese.english: Usually it's at the end of a long struggle — we have done everything modern medicine can do and then some, but we can't save them. Some part of their body, usually their lungs or their heart or their liver, has become too frail to function. These are the “good deaths,” the ones where the family is present and knows what to expect. Like all deaths, these deaths are difficult, but they are controlled, unsurprising, anticipated.

chinese.chinese: 敞开心扉，我们三个人对各自在自己专业领域所取得的成就感到更满意，对话也变得更加诚恳真实。“如果回忆我的一生，”我的另外一个朋友说。“我的自尊心在那四年里处在最低谷。”他伸出一只手，在空中划出的假想曲线最低处快触及了他的膝盖。
chinese.english: With that elephant now running loose, and the three of us more comfortable with our own professional accomplishments, the conversation grew more honest. “If you look over my entire lifetime,” my other friend said, “those four years were the lowest point in terms of self esteem.” He held his hand out in the air, plotting an imaginary line that dropped precipitously to his knees.

chinese.chinese: 最近，当读了美国医学会的杂志，我发现了一个研究，关于专业主义的，提倡积极的引导和强化。使用了观察为基础的评估，Dr. Darcy A.  Reed和他的同事在美国明尼苏达州Mayo Clinic，评价148个住院医师的专业特征，比如同情心、反应能力和完整性，然后测试了他们中间最杰出的人员的专业行为。
chinese.english: Recently while reading The Journal of the American Medical Association, I came across a study on professionalism that addresses positive reinforcement. Using observation-based evaluations, Dr. Darcy A. Reed and her colleagues at the Mayo Clinic in Rochester, Minn., assessed aspects of professionalism like compassion, competence and integrity among 148 residents and then examined the specific behaviors of the most outstanding among them.

chinese.chinese: 在实习医师期间的负性强化把我们教育成为一个细心的和有责任心的医师。我们的老师很少因为我工作出色而表扬我，也从不忘记我们自己的错误，但是有时候教训和经验的确能够教会了我们如何去监护我们的病人。
chinese.english: Negative reinforcement during those early years taught me to be a cautious and conscientious doctor. Our teachers rarely praised us for good work and never allowed us to forget our errors. But sometimes the lessons had little to do with learning how to care for patients.

chinese.chinese: 第二天早上，Clark抵达重症监护病房时天还是黑的。当她进入病人的房间后，她用肃静的声音呼叫年轻女子的名字。但是没有回应。医生检查了手术部位——看起来很好——然后试图再次唤醒年轻的女人。仍没有改变。Clark的心沉了下去。她读的文章中，恢复很迅速——往往在手术后的几个小时。
chinese.english: The next morning it was still dark when Clark arrived at the I.C.U. As she entered the patient's room she called out the young woman's name in a hushed voice. No response. The doctor checked the surgical site — it looked fine — and then tried once more to rouse the young woman. No change. Her heart sank. In the paper she'd read, recovery was rapid — often within hours of the operation.

chinese.chinese: 论文作者Marcus Lind医生说：我们的结果表明，通过对血糖控制作出小的改善可能会显著降低开始治疗后10至15年发生并发症的风险，我们相信，如果所有的瑞典糖尿病人在治疗上即使能很轻微的改善一下，千分之十的眼、肾、心、神经、脑损害的病人就能得到预防。
chinese.english: “Our results show that the risk of complications 10-15 years after the start of treatment probably decreases significantly following even small improvements in blood glucose control. If the treatment of all Swedish diabetes patients could be even slightly improved, we believe that tens of thousands of cases of injuries to the eyes, kidneys, heart, nerves and brain could be prevented”, says physician Marcus Lind, author of the thesis.

chinese.chinese: “胸外按压能将更多含氧血液泵入心、脑以维持脑的功能，并使心脏能在使用除颤器后尽快恢复其自律性，”项目研究者，来自英属哥伦比亚大学的医学博士Jim Christenson说到，“我们发现在进行胸外按压时即使短暂的停顿也是相当有害的。”
chinese.english: "Chest compressions move blood with oxygen to the heart and the brain to save the brain and prepare the heart to start up its own rhythm when a shock is delivered with a defibrillator," says study researcher Jim Christenson, MD, of the University of British Columbia. "We found that even short pauses in chest compressions were quite detrimental."

chinese.chinese: CT冠状动脉成像有助于评价移植心的血管病变的显示
chinese.english: CT coronary angiography promising in assessing heart transplant vasculopathy

chinese.chinese: Aroon Hingorani博士（英国大学学会），同样在此领域研究，凭心评价本研究说：“这项大规模的设计良好的研究着重于CRP基因变异体给血浆CRP水平产生影响这个过程出现的连贯的模型，这为我们用这些基因变异体去研究CRP在心脏病的起因上创造了机会。目前该领域的更多的大规模研究将会受到欢迎。
chinese.english: Commenting on the study for heartwire, Dr Aroon Hingorani (University College London, UK), who is also working in this field, said: ”This large and well-conducted study emphasizes the consistent pattern emerging on the influence of CRP gene variants on CRP plasma levels. This gives us the opportunity to use these gene variants to study the causal role of CRP in heart disease. Additional large-scale analyses in this area would now be welcome."

chinese.chinese: 来自夏洛特的报道 -- Kimberly Cook梦见有一天拥有一个家庭，有许多孩子围绕着而且有个丈夫帮他一起抚养他们。但是像许多事业心强的女性一样，工作是她最优先的选择，于是和她一起分享生活的男人还不曾来临。
chinese.english: CHARLOTTE -- Kimberly Cook dreamed of having a family someday, with lots of kids running around and a husband to help her raise them. But like many career-minded women, her job became the top priority, and the man who would share a life with her never came along.

chinese.chinese: “到目前，对脂肪肝的唯一治疗是提供饮食和锻炼的建议，但是这经常是无效的。作为国际多渠道研究网络的一部分，我们当前正在关注维生素E和甲福明二甲双胍（一种治疗2型糖尿病的药物）作为可能的疗法。”身为IU（印第安纳大学）医学院儿科临床教授以及Riley医院儿科肠胃病学主管的Molleston, M.D如是说。Molleston博士是IU医学院开展的名为“ site of TONIC”项目的项目负责人。这个项目由国家糖尿病、消化系统与肾病研究院（the National Institute of Diabetes and Digestive and Kidney Disease）资助的8中心的三期研究，其目的是研究8-17岁的青少年脂肪肝的医疗方法，这是迄今为止同类研究中规模最大的一个。"We are seeing a growing number of young people with Fatty Liver Disease, and we need to tackle the disease before it becomes full blown in adulthood," said Dr. Molleston. "We routinely test children for conditions with much lower incidence such as scoliosis. Although we do not yet have formal guidelines for screening for Fatty Liver Disease, I personally think that all obese children should be screened for Fatty Liver Disease so we can intervene before it damages the liver."
chinese.english: Dr. Molleston is the pediatric principal investigator for the IU School of Medicine site of TONIC, an eight-center Phase III study funded by the National Institute of Diabetes and Digestive and Kidney Disease, which is investigating treatment options for Fatty Liver Disease in 8 to 17 year olds and is the largest study of its type to date.

chinese.chinese: 胰岛素泵针对了“黎明”现象、血糖变异性，改进了胰岛素输送重现能力，安全，减少了重度低血糖发生率，增加了胰岛素的生物利用度。以自身为对照的随机临床试验证实了胰岛素泵改善了血糖控制效果、提高了患者对胰岛素泵的满意度。选择合适患者很重要，患者应当训练有素、上进心强，恰当的期望值。将讨论用和不用胰岛素泵治疗的选择标准，还将讨论剂量、如何确定胰岛素基础率及多次注射进度时间表。大剂量计算器、持续血糖监测、实时血糖监测的价值在于均已经增强了胰岛素泵治疗技术。最近可利用的进展为“传感器增强泵技术”。“闭环式”胰岛素泵输入胰岛素在非正餐状态时已经显示了良好前景。闭环式系统控制餐后高血糖是未来的一个挑战。
chinese.english: Insulin pumps address the dawn phenomenon，glycemic variability，improve reproducibilty of insulin delivery，are safe，reduce severe hypoglycemia，and increase insulin bioavailability．Clinical trials using patients as their own controls，as well as randomized，controlled trials confirm improved glycemic contr01 and improved patient satisfaction with insulin Pumps．Patient selection is important：Paatients should be well-trained and well-motivated．They should have appropriarte expectations．Criteria for and against selection for pump therapy will be discussed．Dosing and how to prescribe basal rates and bolus schedules will also be discussed．The importance of bolus calculators，continuous glucose monitoring，and real-time glucose monitoring have all enhanced the technology of insulin pump therapy．The most recent available advance is”sensor-augmented pump therapy”．”Closed loop”insulin pump delivery has shown great promise in the non-prandial state．Control of postprandial hyperglycemia with a closed-l

chinese.chinese: 新罕布什尔，汉诺威的达特茅斯医学院的Bernard F Cole博士及其同事于1994年至2004年间在美国和加拿大进行了一项九中心的试验。该试验涵盖了1021例平均年龄为57岁的病人，这些病人在加入试验三个月内至少进行了一次直肠腺瘤切除但没有任何结直肠癌病史。
chinese.english: Dr Bernard F Cole of Dartmouth Medical School, Hanover, New Hampshire and colleagues conducted a nine-centre trial in the US and Canada between 1994 and 2004 involving 1,021 patients of average age 57 who had recently had at least one colorectal adenoma removed within three months of enrollment but with no history of colorectal cancer.

chinese.chinese: 妇产科医生：它并没有使我更出色，不过责任心更强了---对于发送随访信件，可以更有耐心的打三次电话问他们，“您收到乳房X光片了吗？”在过去，你可能会说，“去拿乳房X光片，这是地址，”然后下一步的责任就落在患者身上。但我们已经丢掉了这套做法，“噢，是的，她告诉我去拿乳房X光片，但是她没有告诉我这件事有多重要。她并没有强调。”我想这样的回答使得我们对随访要更认真一点，要以正确的方式教育患者。
chinese.english: Dr. Baby: It makes us not better but more conscientious—about sending the follow-up letter, more conscientious about calling the patient three times and saying, “Did you get your mammogram?” In the old days, you could say, “Go get a mammogram, here's the address,” and then the patient has the responsibility for the next step. We've lost suits over, “Oh, yeah, she told me to have a mammogram, but she didn't tell me how serious it was. She didn't emphasize it.” I think it's made us a little bit better about follow-up, about trying to nurture patients in the right direction.

chinese.chinese: 如果病人说他想听听其他人的意见，你会觉得自尊心受伤吗？
chinese.english: Is your ego wounded when a patient says he wants a second opinion?

chinese.chinese: 另外，另一项研究发现没有明显的证据显示重组生长激素治疗会影响这些儿童的心理健康或自尊心。
chinese.english: In addition, another study found no significant evidence that recombinant growth hormone treatment affects psychological well-being or self-esteem in these children.

chinese.chinese: 研究报道称，在研究初期，女心催乳素水平高于男性，但男性与女性催乳素水平改变的百分率没有显著差异。
chinese.english: Women began the study with higher prolactin levels than men, the report indicates, but the percent change in prolactin levels did not differ significantly between men and women.

chinese.chinese: 美国国立卫生研究院的心、肺、血液病研究所资助该项研究。
chinese.english: The National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute of the National Institutes of Health funded the study.

chinese.chinese: 在好奇心驱使下，我们找到该文作者明尼苏达州Metropolitan州立大学的心理学助理教授Glen Spielmans。他告诉Health Blog，他对礼来公司在推动治疗抑郁痛苦的Cymbalta上市过程中使用“抑郁杀手”的宣传语感兴趣。
chinese.english: Our curiosity piqued, we went to the study author, Glen Spielmans, an assistant professor of psychology at Metropolitan State University in Minnesota. He told the Health Blog he became intrigued by Lilly's “Depression Hurts” campaign to market Cymbalta for depression-related pain.

chinese.chinese: 评论：国立心、肺、血液研究所的结果显示虽然药物洗脱支架应用于非适应症情况可能比用于标准情况有较高的危险，但其危险与应用裸金属支架类似，而且有较低的再次再血管化危险。纽约州的关于多支血管病变患者接受冠脉旁路移植相对于接受药物洗脱支架有较低的死亡率，虽然有显著性，但差别微小（大约1％），而且仅限于不完全的随访数据（在纽约州以外的死亡没有记录在内）并且需要校正基础特征差异。正如述评者指出，潜在的混杂因素，比如患者和医生的篇号，可能影响这两项研究，而且我们有必要进行长期的随访以确认药物洗脱支架的相对安全性。虽然如此，这两项研究为作出更好的指导性意见提供了有价值的信息。
chinese.english: Comment: The NHLBI results suggest that although drug-eluting stents in off-label settings may pose greater risks than in approved settings, the risks are similar to those of bare-metal stents, and the need for repeat revascularization is reduced. The New York State findings of lower mortality with CABG than with DES in patients with multivessel disease, while significant, were slight (about 1%) and limited by incomplete follow-up data (deaths occurring outside of New York State were not recorded) and the need for substantial adjustment for differences in baseline characteristics. As the editorialist notes, unmeasured confounders as well as patient and physician preference may have influenced the results of both studies, and longer follow-up is necessary to confirm the relative safety profile of DES; nonetheless, these reports provide useful data for making better-informed decisions.

chinese.chinese: 第一项研究中，研究者采用国立心、肺、血液研究所的动态注册数据比较药物洗脱支架与裸金属支架用于制造商确认的情况以及非适应症情况下的安全性和有效性。非适应症组（药物洗脱支架1312例，裸金属支架2110例）包括支架用于再狭窄病变、旁路移植血管；长病变、小的或大的血管；开口病变、左主干病变、分差病变；以及完全闭塞。接受药物洗脱支架的患者长病变和复杂病变比接受裸金属支架的患者多，而且接受双重抗血小板治疗1年的可能性较大。药物洗脱支架组死亡率（3.7％）比裸金属支架组（6.4％）低（P<0.001），虽然在校正了基础指标后没有显著性差异。与裸金属支架组相比，药物洗脱支架组有较低的再次再血管化的校正后危险（危险比0.63）。
chinese.english: In the first study, investigators used data from the National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute (NHLBI) Dynamic Registry to compare the safety and efficacy of DES versus bare-metal stents (BMS) for manufacturer-approved versus off-label indications. The off-label group (1312 DES recipients and 2110 BMS recipients) included patients with lesions that were restenotic; in bypass grafts; in long (>30 mm), small, and large vessels; at ostial, left main, and bifurcation locations; and totally occluded. DES recipients had longer and more complex lesions than BMS recipients and also were more likely to be receiving dual antiplatelet therapy at 1 year. In this group, mortality at 1 year was lower in DES recipients (3.7%) than in BMS recipients (6.4%, P<0.001), although no significant difference remained after adjustment for baseline characteristics. The adjusted risk for repeat revascularization was lower with DES than with BMS (hazard ratio, 0.63).

chinese.chinese: 今天，在我们高科技，高责任心和假设患者权益至上的时期，患者和医师之间最古老的所有联系，正如请求者对巫医一样，仍然发挥重要作用。如果用科学数据和临床研究结果作为判断医患关系唯一有效的标准可能是不明智的。但好医生想要治愈他们的患者， 不仅是患者的疾病；并且许多患者希望医生给予他们多些人文关怀，而不是作为一例病案研究。从透视的角度看患者给咨询室带来的被高估的期望也许是最佳选择。
chinese.english: Even today, in our high-tech, accountability-obsessed and, supposedly at least, patient-empowered times, the oldest of all relations between patient and physician — that of supplicant to shaman — continues to exert its authority. This may not seem sensible if the only valid criterion for judging the doctor-patient relationship is the use that is made of scientific data and clinical findings. But good doctors want to treat their patients, not just their patients' diseases, and certainly most patients want to be treated as human beings, not cases. Viewed from that perspective, the elevated expectations patients bring to the consulting room may be for the best.

chinese.chinese: 结论:在平均随访期为33 ± 15个月(15-60个月)中,肺静脉冷冻隔离用于治疗新近发作的PAF,总有效率为82%.在能够确定致心律心常肺静脉的患者中,并对此肺静脉予以隔离,其长期随访效果很好,指示无需环肺静脉隔离.
chinese.english: Conclusions: Pulmonary vein cryoisolation is effective in 82% of patients with recent-onset PAF during a mean follow-up of 33 ± 15 (range 15 to 60) months. If the arrhythmogenic PV is identified and isolated, the long-term outcome is excellent, indicating no need to isolate all PVs.

chinese.chinese: Campfield医生说大多数着眼于孩子的糖尿病预防计划都没有涉及到能量平衡的观念，人体科学，血糖的调节，如何预防这些疾病及体象和自尊心。
chinese.english: Dr. Campfield said most diabetes prevention programs aimed at kids are missing "any notion of energy balance, the science of the human body, blood glucose regulation, how you prevent [these diseases], andbody image  body image and self esteem."

chinese.chinese: 但当他知道需要$2,500，他的好奇心开始消逝，。“这不是一个小数目。”他惊呼。
chinese.english: His curiosity began to wane when he heard that Navigenics was charging $2,500. “Whew, that's a steep price,” he said.

chinese.chinese: 如果研究证实了这些早期发现，那么研究者必须决定哪种喉癌、什么样的患者适合激光治疗，,哥伦比亚耳鼻喉教授，纽约心言语和吞咽障碍中心负责人Dr. Andrew Blitzer认为。
chinese.english: If studies confirm the early findings, then researchers must determine which kinds of laryngeal cancers and which patients are appropriate for the laser treatment, said Dr. Andrew Blitzer, a professor of otolaryngology at Columbia and director of the New York Center for Voice and Swallowing Disorders.

chinese.chinese: 的确，操作的学习曲线，不管是新的还是旧的，都正在被仔细阅读。ERCP就是个中肯的例子。传统上，一个初学者要成功完成80%的ERCP套管插入术需要在有人监督的条件下，操作180-200例。3很多培训者和操作者可能觉得80%的套管插入术是低标准的。我们真的需要依靠这种“季节性”和经过锻炼后技术进一步精炼吗？还是我们将来应该试着架起培训裂口的桥梁？Verma et al4把自然乳头的深套管插入术作为ERCP能力的标记。这个研究是一个操作者在培训时和培训后期间、在有大量ERCP的第三中心的回顾性研究。深套管插入术在培训初期的成功率只有43%。在完成400例的指导操作后，成功率提高到≥80%。如果再另外单独做300例，自由胆管套管插入术成功率可继续提高到>96%。这些数据告诉我们什么？首先，学习和能力的增加在集中培训后仍然在继续。第二，除了深胆管套管插入术外，ERCP经验是可以评估的。这些可能可以评估技术增长的速度，但是Verma 等人没有提及。4第三，初学者可能不适合做比较难的ERCP操作。另外一个需要思考的重点是：ERCP培训阈值是否需要提高？我们期待来自其他培训中心观察结果的证实。
chinese.english: Indeed, the learning curves of procedures, both new and old, are being scrutinized. A case in point would be ERCP. Traditionally, 180 to 200 supervised procedures have been recommended for a trainee to achieve an overall 80% successful ERCP cannulation.3 Most trainers and practitioners would consider an 80% cannulation rate to be substandard. Do we rely upon the “seasoning” and further refinement of skill sets that occur after training, or do we attempt to bridge the training chasm further? Verma et al4 used deep cannulation of the native papilla as a marker for ERCP competence. This study involved a retrospective review of a single operator during training and post-training periods at a single tertiary center with a large ERCP volume. The deep cannulation success rate at the outset of training was 43%. After completing 400 supervised procedures, the rate improved to ≥80%. Improvement in the rate of free biliary cannulation continued after training as the success rate climbed to >96

chinese.chinese: 在这项研究中，Yeboah和他的同事们使用的数据来自美国国家心，肺和血液研究所（NHLBI）的多种族动脉粥样硬化研究（MESA），该研究招募了来自美国六个中心的6,814名受试者。
chinese.english: For the study, Yeboah and colleagues used data from the National Heart Lung andBlood Institute (NHLBI) Multi-Ethnic Study of Atherosclerosis (MESA), which hadrecruited 6,814 participants from six US field centers.

chinese.chinese: 在这个安慰剂对照的心血管炎症减低试验研究中，甲氨蝶呤将以每周20毫克的剂量口服给药，这也是治疗类风湿关节炎和银屑病的标准剂量。治疗将持续3~4年，预期平均随访2.5年。根据国家心、肺和血液学会的声明。
chinese.english: In the placebo-controlled CIRT study, methotrexate will be given orally at 20 mg per week, a standard dose for rheumatoid arthritis and psoriasis. Treatment is to last 3 to 4 years, with an anticipated mean follow-up of 2.5 years, according to the NHLBI.

chinese.chinese: 这项为期4年，被称为心血管炎症减低试验（CIRT）的二级预防研究是由国家心、肺和血液学会(NHLBI)发起的，该研究将由来自布里格姆妇女医院和位于波士顿的哈佛大学医学院的Paul Ridker博士领导并作为主要研究人员。
chinese.english: Called the Cardiovascular Inflammation Reduction Trial (CIRT), the 4-year secondary prevention study is sponsored by the National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute (NHLBI) and will be led by Paul Ridker, MD, of Brigham and Women's Hospital and Harvard Medical School in Boston, as principal investigator.

chinese.chinese: McKesson宣布了 McKesson Cardiology 13.0的发表，这一官方法案可作为单一的数据库为强心剂和外围导管插入术，血流动力学检测，电生理学，超生心动图，血管超生，核心脏病学和心电图/心应力/24小时动态心电图的管理提供解决方案。
chinese.english: McKesson announced the release of McKesson Cardiology 13.0, which officials bill as the only single database solution for cardiac and peripheral catheterization, hemodynamics monitoring, electrophysiology (EP), echocardiography, vascular ultrasound, nuclear cardiology and ECG/stress/holter management.

chinese.chinese: 图1舒张期心尖四腔心示左心房大块肿物（6×4×4?cm）占据二尖瓣口，突出至左室腔 及通过II型房缺进入右房
chinese.english: Diastolic frame of apical four chamber view showing a large mass (6×4×4?cm) in the left atrium occluding the mitral valve orifice and protruding into the left ventricular cavity and into the right atrium through a large type II atrial septal defect.

chinese.chinese: 然而，鉴于对儿童实用的降脂处方药物的长期争议，近期国家心、肺和血液研究所（NHLBI）就减少儿童心血管疾病的风险指南中这种争议的再次出现以作回应，此外，还有儿童肥胖不断增加的问题，用这两个原因来解释似乎有些牵强。
chinese.english: However, given the longstanding controversy of prescribinglipid-lowering medications to children, a controversy that flared up again inresponse to the recent National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute (NHLBI)children's guidelines for cardiovascular risk reduction, as well as thecontinuing increase in childhood obesity, it's unlikely that these two reasonsaccount for the reduction.

chinese.chinese: 对于其他人求医者可能会保持冷静客观的态度，但对自己本人常害怕最坏可能。举个例子，有些人可能患有消化不良，我们倾向于准确认识到是消化不良，但是对自己患上相似症状可能会令自己心生恐惧且担心自己已经患上严重的疾病。
chinese.english: Consumers often fear the worst when it comes to their own health while maintaining a calm objectivity with regard to others. For example, when someone else suffers from indigestion, we tend to accurately perceive it as indigestion, but experiencing the same symptom might lead us to panic and worry that we're having a heart attack.

chinese.chinese: 实际上，FDA提交ODAC的评核报告中也提到了carfilzomib的副作用（包括心、肝及肺毒性以及可导致死亡）会冲淡它的正面疗效。由于目前缺少靶向的治疗手段，咨询委员会最终决定同意推荐此药通过审核。
chinese.english: In fact, an FDA staff report to ODAC expressed concern that carfilzomib's adverse events -- including cardiac, hepatic, and pulmonary toxicity, as well as death -- might negate any possible benefit. The committee members ultimately decided that the lack of therapeutic options for the target population warranted a favorable recommendation.
